h4.p: [21] saddhammaraṃsimālī ^a^M1.0001^ea^ ^a^V1.0001^ea^ yo, vineyyakamalākare.
[22] vibodhesi mahāmoha-tamaṃ hantvāna sabbaso..
[21] ñāṇātisayabimbaṃ taṃ, visuddhakaruṇāruṇaṃ.
[22] vanditvā nirupaklesaṃ, ^b^buddhādiccaṃ^eb^ mahodayaṃ..
[21] lokālokakaraṃ ^b^dhammaṃ,^eb^ guṇarasmisamujjalaṃ.
[22] ^b^ariyasaṅghañca^eb^ samphullaṃ, visuddhakamalākaraṃ..
[21] vandanājanitaṃ ^a^V1.0002^ea^ puññaṃ, iti yaṃ ratanattaye.
[22] hatantarāyo sabbattha, hutvāhaṃ tassa tejasā..
[21] sampannasīlācārena, dhīmatā sucivuttinā.
[22] ajjhesito ^b^dāṭhānāgattherena^eb^ thiracetasā..
[21] visuddhacarito nātho, yaṃ visuddhimanuttaraṃ.
[22] patvā desesi karuṇāsamussāhitamānaso..
[21] tassā adhigamūpāyo, visuddhanayamaṇḍito.
[22] ^b^visuddhimaggo^eb^ yo vutto, suvisuddhapadakkamo..
[21] suvisuddhaṃ asaṃkiṇṇaṃ, nipuṇatthavinicchayaṃ.
[22] mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ, samayaṃ avilomayaṃ..
[21] tassa ^a^M1.0002^ea^ nissāya porāṇaṃ, kathāmaggaṃ anākulaṃ.
[22] tantinayānugaṃ suddhaṃ, karissāma^b^tthavaṇṇanaṃ^eb^..
[21] iti ākaṅkhamānassa, saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiṃ.
[22] vibhajantassa tassatthaṃ, nisāmayatha sādhavoti..

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ svāyaṃ ^b^visuddhimaggo^eb^ yaṃ suttapadaṃ nissāya paṭṭhapīyati, taṃ tāva nikkhipitvā tassa nidānādiniddhāraṇamukhena nānappakārato atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetuṃ ^b^``sīle patiṭṭhāyā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. dhammaṃ saṃvaṇṇentena hi ādito tassa nidānaṃ vattabbaṃ, tato payojanaṃ piṇḍattho padattho sambandho adhippāyo codanā sodhanaṃ vattabbaṃ. tathā ceva ācariyena paṭipannaṃ. ettha hi ^b^bhagavantaṃ kirā^eb^tiādi desanāya nidānapayojananiddhāraṇaṃ, ^b^visuddhimaggaṃ bhāsissa^eb^ntiādi piṇḍatthaniddhāraṇaṃ ^a^V1.0003^ea^, ^b^sīle ṭhatvā^eb^tiādi padatthasambandhādhippāyavibhāvanā, ^b^kiṃ sīla^eb^ntiādi codanā, tato paraṃ sodhanaṃ, samādhipaññākathāsupi eseva nayo. kasmā panettha vissajjanagāthā ādimhi nikkhittā, na pucchāgāthā. pucchāpubbikā hi vissajjanāti? vuccate -- tadatthassa maṅgalabhāvato, sāsanassa ādikalyāṇādibhāvavibhāvanato, bhayādiupaddavanivāraṇena antarāyavidhamanato, upari saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammasaṅgahato cāti veditabbaṃ.

[03] etthāha -- kasmā panāyaṃ visuddhimaggakathā vatthupubbikā āraddhā, na satthuthomanāpubbikāti? vuccate -- visuṃ asaṃvaṇṇanādibhāvato. ^b^sumaṅgalavilāsinī^eb^ādayo viya hi dīghanikāyādīnaṃ nāyaṃ visuṃ saṃvaṇṇanā, na pakaraṇantaraṃ vā abhidhammāvatārasumatāvatārādi viya. tāsaṃyeva pana sumaṅgalavilāsinīādīnaṃ visesabhūtā. tenevāha ^b^``majjhe visuddhimaggo''^eb^tiādi (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.ganthārambhakathā; ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.ganthārambhakathā; saṃ0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.ganthārambhakathā; a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.ganthārambhakathā). atha vā thomanāpubbikāpi cāyaṃ kathā na vatthupubbikāvāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. sāsane hi vatthukittanaṃ na loke viya kevalaṃ hoti, sāsanasampattikittanattā pana satthu aviparītadhammadesanābhāvavibhāvanena satthuguṇasaṃkittanaṃ ulliṅgantameva pavattati. tathā hi vakkhati ``ettāvatā tisso sikkhā''tiādi. ^b^sotāpannādibhāvassa ca kāraṇa^eb^nti ettha hi ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena sabbasakadāgāmianāgāmino ^a^M1.0003^ea^ viya sabbepi arahanto saṅgayhanti vibhāgassa anuddhaṭattā. tena tiṇṇampi bodhisattānaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyā sīlādayo idha ``sīle patiṭṭhāyā''tiādivacanena saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. tiṇṇampi hi nesaṃ carimabhave visesato saṃsārabhayikkhaṇaṃ, yathāsakaṃ sīle patiṭṭhāya samathavipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanapaṭipatti ca samānāti. atha vā ``so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa''nti sādhāraṇavacanena sātisayaṃ, niratisayañca taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanaṃ gahitaṃ. tattha yaṃ niratisayaṃ savāsanappahānatāya. tena satthu pahānasampadā kittitā hoti, tannimittā ñāṇasampadā ca. tadubhayena nānantarikatāya ānubhāvasampadādayopīti. evampi thomanāpubbikāyaṃ kathāti veditabbaṃ. atha vā thomanāpubbikā evāyaṃ kathāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, ``sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacāro''tiādinā satthu thomanaṃ purakkhatvā saṃvaṇṇanāya āraddhattā. sā panāyaṃ yasmā pucchantassa ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ byākaraṇasamatthatāya vibhāvanavasena pavattitā, āciṇṇañcetaṃ ācariyassa yadidaṃ saṃvaṇṇetabbadhammānukūlaṃ saṃvaṇṇanārambhe satthu abhitthavanaṃ. tasmā ^a^V1.0004^ea^ iminā kāraṇena evamettha thomanā pavattitāti. thomanākārassa vuccamānassa kāraṇaṃ uddharantena paṭhamaṃ vissajjanagāthaṃ nikkhipitvā tassā nidānacodanāmukhena pucchāgāthaṃ sarūpato ca atthato ca dassetvā tassā pucchāya aviparītabyākaraṇasamatthabhāvāvajotanaṃ bhagavato thomanaṃ purakkhatvā yathādhippetadhammasaṃvaṇṇanā katā. tenāha ``sīle patiṭṭhāyā''tiādi. tattha gāthāya attho parato āvi bhavissati.

[03] ^b^itī^eb^tiādīsu ^b^itī^eb^ti ayaṃ ^b^iti^eb^-saddo hetu parisamāpanādipadatthavipariyāyapakārāvadhāraṇanidassanādianekatthappabhedo. tathā hesa ``ruppatīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā `rūpa'nti vuccatī''tiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 3.79) hetumhi āgato. ``tasmātiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā. atthi me tumhesu anukampā `kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.29) parisamāpane. ``iti vā iti evarūpā naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā paṭivirato''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 1.197) ādiatthe. ``māgaṇḍiyoti tassa brāhmaṇassa saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ ^a^M1.0004^ea^ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpo''tiādīsu (mahāni0 73, 75) padatthavipariyāye. ``iti kho, bhikkhave, sappaṭibhayo bālo, appaṭibhayo paṇḍito. saupaddavo bālo, anupaddavo paṇḍito. saupasaggo bālo, anupasaggo paṇḍito''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 3.124) pakāre. ``atthi idappaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti puṭṭhena satā, ānanda, atthītissa vacanīyaṃ, kiṃpaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iti ce vadeyya, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti iccassa vacanīya''ntiādīsu (dī0 ni0 2.96) avadhāraṇe, sanniṭṭhāneti attho. ``atthīti kho, kaccāna, ayameko anto, natthīti kho, kaccāna, ayaṃ dutiyo anto''tiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 2.15; 3.90) nidassane. idhāpi nidassane daṭṭhabbo, pakāretipi vattuṃ vaṭṭateva. paṭhamo pana iti-saddo parisamāpane daṭṭhabbo. ^b^hī^eb^ti avadhāraṇe. ^b^ida^eb^nti āsannapaccakkhavacanaṃ yathādhigatassa suttapadassa abhimukhīkaraṇato.
[03] ^b^vutta^eb^nti ayaṃ ^b^vutta^eb^-saddo saupasaggo, anupasaggo ca vappanavāpasamīkaraṇakesohāraṇajīvitavuttipamuttabhāvapāvacanapavattitājjhesanakathanādīsu dissati. tathā hi ayaṃ --
[21] ``gāvo ^a^V1.0005^ea^ tassa pajāyanti, khette vuttaṃ virūhati.
[22] vuttānaṃ phalamasnāti, yo mittānaṃ na dubbhatī''ti.. --

[25] ādīsu (jā0 2.22.19) vappane āgato. ``no ca kho paṭivutta''ntiādīsu (pārā0 289) aṭṭhadantakādīhi vāpasamīkaraṇe. ``kāpaṭiko māṇavo daharo vuttasiro''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 2.426) kesohāraṇe. ``pannalomo paradattavutto migabhūtena cetasā viharatī''tiādīsu (cūḷava0 332) jīvitavuttiyaṃ. ``seyyathāpi nāma paṇḍupalāso bandhanā pavutto abhabbo haritatthāyā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 3.59; pārā0 92; pāci0 666; mahāva0 129) bandhanato pamuttabhāve. ``yesamidaṃ etarahi porāṇaṃ mantapadaṃ gītaṃ pavuttaṃ samihita''ntiādīsu (dī0 ni0 1.285; ma0 ni0 2.427; mahāva0 300) pāvacanabhāvena pavattite. loke pana ``vutto guṇo vutto pārāyano''tiādīsu ajjhesane. ``vuttaṃ kho ^a^M1.0005^ea^ panetaṃ bhagavatā `dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā'ti''ādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.30) kathane. idhāpi kathane eva daṭṭhabbo. tasmā ``iti hi evameva idaṃ suttaṃ desita''nti yathānikkhittaṃ gāthaṃ desitabhāvena nidasseti. tassā vā desitākāraṃ avadhāreti.

[03] ^b^kasmā^eb^ti hetumhi nissakkaṃ. ^b^panā^eb^ti vacanālaṅkāramattaṃ. ubhayenāpi kāraṇaṃ pucchati. ^b^eta^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ suttapadaṃ paccāmasati. ^b^vutta^eb^nti pucchānimittaṃ. tadatthassa attano buddhiyaṃ viparivattamānataṃ upādāya ``ida''nti vatvā puna bhagavatā bhāsitākāraṃ sandhāya ``eta''nti vuttaṃ. sakalena panānena vacanena desanāya nidānaṃ jotitaṃ hoti. parato tassā desakadesakālapaṭiggāhake vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``bhagavantaṃ kirā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^kirā^eb^ti anussavanatthe nipāto. tena vuccamānassatthassa anu anu suyyamānataṃ dīpeti. ^b^rattibhāge^eb^ti rattiyā ekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse, majjhimayāmeti adhippāyo. vessavaṇādayo viya apākaṭanāmadheyyattā ^b^aññataro^eb^. devo eva ^b^devaputto. saṃsayasamugghāṭattha^eb^nti vicikicchāsallasamuddharaṇatthaṃ pucchīti yojanā. ``saṃsayasamugghāṭattha''nti ca iminā pañcasu pucchāsu ayaṃ vimaticchedanāpucchāti dasseti. yena atthena taṇhā ``jaṭā''ti vuttā, tameva atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``jāliniyā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. sā hi aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritappabhedo attano avayavabhūto eva jālo etissā atthīti ``jālinī''ti vuccati.

[01] idānissā ^a^V1.0006^ea^ jaṭākārena pavattiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``sā hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^rūpādīsu ārammaṇesū^eb^ti tassā pavattiṭṭhānamāha, rūpādichaḷārammaṇavinimuttassa taṇhāvisayassa abhāvato. ^b^heṭṭhupariyavasenā^eb^ti kadāci rūpārammaṇe kadāci yāva dhammārammaṇe kadāci dhammārammaṇe kadāci yāva rūpārammaṇeti evaṃ heṭṭhā, upari ca pavattivasena. desanākkamena cettha heṭṭhupariyatā daṭṭhabbā. kadāci kāmabhave kadāci rūpabhave kadāci arūpabhave kadāci vā arūpabhave...pe0... kadāci kāmabhaveti evamettha heṭṭhupariyavasena pavatti veditabbā. sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvattā aparāparuppatti ettha saṃsibbananti āha ^b^``punappunaṃ uppajjanato''^eb^ti. ^b^``saṃsibbanaṭṭhenā''^eb^ti idaṃ yena sambandhena jaṭā viyāti jaṭāti ^a^M1.0006^ea^ jaṭātaṇhānaṃ upamūpameyyatā, taṃdassanaṃ. ayaṃ hettha attho -- yathā jālino veḷugumbassa sākhā, kosasañcayādayo ca attanā attano avayavehi saṃsibbitā vinaddhā ``jaṭā''ti vuccanti, evaṃ taṇhāpi saṃsibbanasabhāvenāti, ``saṃsibbitaṭṭhenā''ti vā pāṭho, attanāva attano saṃsibbitabhāvenāti attho. ayaṃ hi taṇhā kosakārakimi viya attanāva attānampi saṃsibbantī pavattati. tenāha bhagavā ``rūpataṇhā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ, etthesā taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, ettha nivisamānā nivisatī''tiādi (dī0 ni0 2.400; ma0 ni0 1.86; vibha0 203). ime sattā ``mama ida''nti pariggahitaṃ vatthuṃ attanibbisesaṃ maññamānā abbhantarimaṃ karonti. abbhantarattho ca antosaddoti sakaparikkhāre uppajjamānāpi taṇhā ``antojaṭā''ti vuttā. pabbajitassa pattādi, gahaṭṭhassa hatthiādi sakaparikkhāro.

[03] ``attā''ti bhavati ettha abhimānoti ^b^attabhāvo,^eb^ upādānakkhandhapañcakaṃ. sarīranti keci. mama attabhāvo sundaro, asukassa viya mama attabhāvo bhaveyyāti vā ādinā sakāttabhāvādīsu taṇhāya uppajjamānākāro veditabbo. attano cakkhādīni ^b^ajjhattikāyatanāni^eb^. attano, paresañca rūpādīni ^b^bāhirāyatanāni^eb^. paresaṃ sabbāni vā, saparasantatipariyāpannāni vā cakkhādīni ^b^ajjhattikāyatanāni^eb^. tathā rūpādīni ^b^bāhirāyatanāni^eb^. parittamahaggatabhavesu pavattiyāpi taṇhāya ^b^antojaṭābahijaṭā^eb^bhāvo veditabbo. kāmabhavo hi kassacipi kilesassa avikkhambhitattā kathañcipi avimutto ajjhattaggahaṇassa visesapaccayoti ``ajjhattaṃ, anto''ti ca vuccati. tabbipariyāyato rūpārūpabhavo ``bahiddhā, bahī''ti ca. tenāha bhagavā ``ajjhattasaṃyojano puggalo, bahiddhāsaṃyojano puggalo''ti (a0 ni0 2.37). visayabhedena, pavattiākārabhedena ca anekabhedabhinnampi taṇhaṃ ^a^V1.0007^ea^ jaṭābhāvasāmaññena ekanti gahetvā ^b^``tāya evaṃ uppajjamānāya jaṭāyā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. sā pana ``pajā''ti vuttasattasantānapariyāpannā eva hutvā punappunaṃ taṃ jaṭentī vinandhantī pavattatīti āha ^b^``jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā''^eb^ti. tathā hi paramatthato yadipi avayavabyatirekena samudāyo natthi, ekadeso pana samudāyo nāma na hotīti avayavato samudāyaṃ bhinnaṃ katvā upamūpameyyaṃ dassento ^b^``yathā nāma^eb^ ^a^M1.0007^ea^ ^b^veḷujaṭādīhi...pe0... saṃsibbitā''^eb^ti āha. imaṃ jaṭanti sambandho. tīsu dhātūsu ekampi asesetvā saṃsibbanena ^b^tedhātukaṃ jaṭetvā ṭhitaṃ^eb^. tenassā mahāvisayataṃ, vijaṭanassa ca sudukkarabhāvamāha. ^b^``vijaṭetuṃ ko samattho''^eb^ti iminā ``vijaṭaye''ti padaṃ sattiatthaṃ, na vidhiādiatthanti dasseti.

[03] evaṃ ``antojaṭā''tiādinā puṭṭho pana assa devaputtassa imaṃ gāthamāhāti sambandho. ``edisova imaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjeyyā''ti satthāraṃ guṇato dassento ^b^``sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacāro''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sabbadhammesū^eb^ti atītādibhedabhinnesu sabbesu ñeyyadhammesu. ^b^appaṭihatañāṇacāro^eb^ti anavasesañeyyāvaraṇappahānena nissaṅgacārattā navihatañāṇapavattiko. etena tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇatāvibhāvanena ādito tiṇṇaṃ āveṇikadhammānaṃ gahaṇeneva tadekalakkhaṇatāya tadavinābhāvato ca bhagavato sesāveṇikadhammānampi gahitabhāvo veditabbo. dibbanti kāmaguṇādīhi kīḷanti laḷanti, tesu vā viharanti, vijayasamatthatāyogena paccatthike vijetuṃ icchanti, issariyadhanādisakkāradānaggahaṇaṃ, taṃtaṃatthānusāsanañca karontā voharanti, puññātisayayogānubhāvappattāya jutiyā jotanti, yathādhippetañca visayaṃ appaṭighātena gacchanti, yathicchitanipphādane ca sakkontīti ^b^devā^eb^. atha vā devanīyā taṃtaṃbyasananittharaṇatthikehi saraṇaṃ parāyaṇanti gamanīyā, abhitthavanīyā vā, sobhāvisesayogena kamanīyāti vā ^b^devā^eb^. te tividhā -- sammutidevā upapattidevā visuddhidevāti. bhagavā pana niratisayāya abhiññākīḷāya uttamehi dibbabrahmāriyavihārehi saparasantānagatapañcavidhamāravijayicchānipphattiyā cittissariyasattadhanādisammāpaṭipatti aveccapasādasakkāradānaggahaṇasaṅkhātena, dhammasabhāvapuggalajjhāsayānurūpānusāsanīsaṅkhātena ca vohārātisayena paramāya paññāsarīrappabhāsaṅkhātāya jutiyā, anaññasādhāraṇāya ñāṇasarīragatiyā, māravijayasabbasabbaññuguṇaparahitanipphādanesu appaṭihatāya sattiyā ca samannāgatattā sadevakena lokena ``saraṇa''nti gamanīyato, abhitthavanīyato, bhattivasena kamanīyato ca sabbe ^a^V1.0008^ea^ te deve tehi guṇehi abhibhuyya ṭhitattā tesaṃ devānaṃ seṭṭho uttamo devoti ^b^devadevo^eb^. sabbadevehi ^a^M1.0008^ea^ pūjanīyataro devoti vā, visuddhidevabhāvassa vā sabbaññuguṇālaṅkārassa vā adhigatattā aññesaṃ devānaṃ atisayena devoti ^b^devadevo^eb^.

[01] aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sakkānaṃ, mahābrahmānañca guṇābhibhavanato adhiko atisayo atirekataro vā sakko brahmā cāti ^b^sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā^eb^. ñāṇappahānadesanāvisesesu sadevake loke kenaci avikkhambhanīyaṭṭhānatāya kutocipi utrastābhāvato catūhi vesārajjehi visāradoti ^b^catuvesārajjavisārado^eb^. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``sammāsambuddhassa te paṭijānato ime dhammā anabhisambuddhāti tatra vata maṃ samaṇo vā...pe0... vesārajjappatto viharāmī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.150; a0 ni0 4.8). ṭhānāṭhānañāṇādīhi dasahi ñāṇabalehi samannāgatattā ^b^dasabaladharo^eb^. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``idha tathāgato ṭhānañca ṭhānato, aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī''tiādi (a0 ni0 10.21; vibha0 809). yaṃ kiñci ñeyyaṃ nāma, tattha sabbattheva anāvaṭañāṇatāya ^b^anāvaraṇañāṇo^eb^. tañca sabbaṃ samantato sabbākārato hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya paccakkhato dassanasamatthena ñāṇacakkhunā samannāgatattā ^b^samantacakkhu,^eb^ sabbaññūti attho. imehi pana dvīhi padehi pacchimāni dve asādhāraṇañāṇāni gahitāni. bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi ^b^bhagavā^eb^. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato ^b^buddhānussatiniddese^eb^ (visuddhi0 1.123 ādayo) vitthārato āgamissati.

[03] ettha ca ``sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacāro''ti iminā tiyaddhāruḷhānaṃ pucchānaṃ bhagavato byākaraṇasamatthatāya dassitāya kiṃ devatānampi pucchaṃ byākātuṃ samattho bhagavāti āsaṅkāya tannivattanatthaṃ ``devadevo''ti vuttaṃ. devānaṃ atidevo sakko devānamindo devatānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjeti, ``tato imassa ko viseso''ti cintentānaṃ tannivattanatthaṃ ``sakkānaṃ atisakko''ti vuttaṃ. sakkenapi pucchitamatthaṃ sanaṅkumārādayo brahmāno vissajjenti, ``tato imassa ko atisayo''ti cintentānaṃ tannivattanatthaṃ ``brahmānaṃ atibrahmā''ti vuttaṃ. ayaṃ cassa viseso catuvesārajjadasabalañāṇehi pākaṭo jātoti dassanatthaṃ ``catu...pe0... ^a^M1.0009^ea^ dharo''ti vuttaṃ. imāni ca ñāṇāni imassa ñāṇadvayassa adhigamena saheva siddhānīti dassanatthaṃ ``anāvaraṇañāṇo samantacakkhū''ti vuttaṃ. tayidaṃ ñāṇadvayaṃ puññañāṇasambhārūpacayasiddhāya bhaggadosatāya siddhanti dassento ``bhagavā''ti avocāti. evametesaṃ ^a^V1.0009^ea^ padānaṃ gahaṇe payojanaṃ, anupubbi ca veditabbā. yaṃ panetaṃ pacchimaṃ anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇanti ñāṇadvayaṃ, taṃ atthato abhinnaṃ. ekameva hi taṃ ñāṇaṃ visayapavattimukhena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ dvidhā katvā vuttaṃ. anavasesasaṅkhatāsaṅkhatasammutidhammārammaṇatāya sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, tatthāvaraṇābhāvato nissaṅgacāramupādāya ``anāvaraṇañāṇa''ntipi vuttaṃ. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato ^b^buddhānussatiniddese^eb^ (visuddhi0 1.123 ādayo) vakkhāma.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ mahante sīlakkhandhādike esī gavesīti mahesi, bhagavā. tena ^b^mahesinā. vaṇṇayanto^eb^ti vivaranto vitthārento. ^b^yathābhūta^eb^nti aviparītaṃ. ^b^sīlādibhedana^eb^nti sīlasamādhipaññādivibhāgaṃ. ^b^sudullabha^eb^nti aṭṭhakkhaṇavajjitena navamena khaṇena laddhabbattā suṭṭhu dullabhaṃ. ^b^sīlādisaṅgaha^eb^nti sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgahaṃ. ariyamaggo hi tīhi khandhehi saṅgahito sappadesattā nagaraṃ viya rajjena, na tayo khandhā ariyamaggena nippadesattā. vuttañhetaṃ ``na kho, āvuso visākha, ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena tayo khandhā saṅgahitā; tīhi ca kho, āvuso visākha, khandhehi ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo saṅgahito''ti (ma0 ni0 1.462). kilesacorehi aparipanthanīyatāya ^b^khemaṃ^eb^. antadvayaparivajjanato, māyādikāyavaṅkādippahānato ca ^b^ujuṃ^eb^. sabbesaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ māraṇavasena gamanato pavattanato, nibbānassa magganato, nibbānatthikehi maggitabbato ca ^b^maggaṃ. visuddhiyā^eb^ti nibbānāya, visuddhibhāvāya vā, arahattāyāti attho.

[03] ^b^yathābhūtaṃ ajānantā^eb^ti evaṃ sīlavisuddhiādivisuddhiparamparāya adhigantabbo evarūpo evaṃkiccako evamatthoti yāthāvato anavabujjhantā. sakalasaṃkilesato, saṃsārato ca suddhiṃ vimuttiṃ kāmenti patthentīti ^b^suddhikāmā. api^eb^-saddo sambhāvane. tena na kevalaṃ sīlamattena parituṭṭhā, atha kho visuddhikāmāpi samānāti dasseti. ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sāsane. bhāvanāya yuttapayuttatāya ^b^yogino vāyamantāpi^eb^ visuddhiṃ ^a^M1.0010^ea^ uddissa payogaṃ parakkamaṃ karontāpi upāyassa anadhigatattā ^b^visuddhiṃ nādhigacchantī^eb^ti yojanā. ^b^tesa^eb^nti yogīnaṃ. kāmañcāyaṃ visuddhimaggo samantabhaddakattā savanadhāraṇaparicayādipasutānaṃ sabbesampi pāmojjakaro, yogīnaṃ pana sātisayaṃ pamodahetūti āha ^b^``tesaṃ pāmojjakaraṇa''^eb^nti. bāhirakanikāyantaraladdhīhi asammissatāya suṭṭhu visuddhavinicchayattā ^b^suvisuddhavinicchayaṃ. mahāvihāravāsīna^eb^nti attano apassayabhūtaṃ nikāyaṃ dasseti ^a^V1.0010^ea^. ^b^desanānayanissita^eb^nti dhammasaṃvaṇṇanānayasannissitaṃ. ettha ca ``tesaṃ pāmojjakaraṇa''ntiādinā sabbasaṃkilesamalavisuddhatāya visuddhiṃ nibbānaṃ patthentānaṃ yogīnaṃ ekaṃsena tadāvahattā pāmojjakaro ñāṇuttarehi sammāpaṭipannehi adhiṭṭhitattā suṭṭhu sammā visuddhavinicchayo mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ kathāmaggoti dasseti. ^b^sakkaccaṃ me bhāsato^eb^ sakkaccaṃ nisāmayathāti yojetabbaṃ.

[03] ettha ca ``imissā dāni gāthāyā''ti iminā visuddhimaggabhāsanassa nissayaṃ, ``kathitāya mahesinā''ti iminā tassa pamāṇabhāvaṃ, ``yathābhūtaṃ atthaṃ sīlādibhedana''nti iminā aviparītapiṇḍatthaṃ, ``sudullabhaṃ...pe0... yogino''ti iminā nimittaṃ, ^b^``tesaṃ pāmojjakaraṇa''^eb^nti iminā payojanaṃ, ``vaṇṇayanto atthaṃ, suvisuddhavinicchayaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ desanānayanissitaṃ, sakkacca''nti ca iminā karaṇappakāraṃ dassetvā ``visuddhikāmā sabbepi, nisāmayatha sādhavo''ti iminā tattha sakkaccasavane sādhujane niyojeti. sādhukaṃ savanapaṭibaddhā hi sāsanasampatti.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ vacanatthavibhāvanena paveditavisuddhimaggasāmaññatthassa visuddhimaggakathā vuccamānā abhiruciṃ uppādetīti padatthato visuddhimaggaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``tattha visuddhī''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^tatthā^eb^ti yadidaṃ ``visuddhimaggaṃ bhāsissa''nti ettha visuddhimaggapadaṃ vuttaṃ, tattha. ^b^sabbamalavirahita^eb^nti sabbehi rāgādimalehi, sabbehi saṃkilesamalehi ca virahitaṃ vivittaṃ. tato eva ^b^accantaparisuddhaṃ,^eb^ sabbadā sabbathā ca visuddhanti attho. yathāvuttaṃ visuddhiṃ maggati gavesati adhigacchati etenāti ^b^visuddhimaggo^eb^. tenāha ^b^``maggoti adhigamūpāyo vuccatī''^eb^ti. visuddhimaggoti ca nippariyāyena lokuttaramaggo veditabbo, tadupāyattā pana pubbabhāgamaggo, tannissayo kathāpabandho ca tathā vuccati.

[03] svāyaṃ ^a^M1.0011^ea^ visuddhimaggo satthārā desanāvilāsato, veneyyajjhāsayato ca nānānayehi desito, tesu ayameko nayo gahitoti dassetuṃ ^b^``so panāya''^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^katthacī^eb^ti kismiñci sutte. ^b^vipassanāmattavasenevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇena samathaṃ nivatteti. so hi tassā paṭiyogī, na sīlādi. matta-saddena ca visesanivattiatthena savisesaṃ samādhiṃ nivatteti. so upacārappanābhedo vipassanāyānikassa desanāti katvā na samādhimattaṃ. na hi ^a^V1.0011^ea^ khaṇikasamādhiṃ vinā vipassanā sambhavati. vipassanāti ca tividhāpi anupassanā veditabbā, na aniccānupassanāva. na hi aniccadassanamattena saccābhisamayo sambhavati. yaṃ pana gāthāyaṃ aniccalakkhaṇasseva gahaṇaṃ kataṃ, taṃ yassa tadeva suṭṭhutaraṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti, tādisassa vasena. sopi hi itaraṃ lakkhaṇadvayaṃ vibhūtataraṃ katvā sammasitvā visesaṃ adhigacchati, na aniccalakkhaṇameva.

[03] ^b^sabbe saṅkhārā^eb^ti sabbe tebhūmakasaṅkhārā, te hi sammasanīyā. ^b^aniccā^eb^ti na niccā addhuvā ittarā khaṇabhaṅgurāti. ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāya. ^b^passati^eb^ sammasati. ^b^atha^eb^ pacchā udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ uppattiyā uttarakālaṃ. ^b^nibbindati dukkhe^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva aniccākārato diṭṭhe ``sabbe saṅkhārā''ti vutte tebhūmake khandhapañcakasaṅkhāte dukkhe nibbindati nibbidāñāṇaṃ paṭilabhati. ^b^esa maggo visuddhiyā^eb^ti esa nibbidānupassanāsaṅkhāto virāgādīnaṃ kāraṇabhūto nibbānassa adhigamūpāyo.

[03] ^b^jhānapaññāvasenā^eb^ti samathavipassanāvasena. ^b^jhāna^eb^nti cettha vipassanāya pādakabhūtaṃ jhānaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^yamhī^eb^ti yasmiṃ puggale. ^b^jhānañca paññā cā^eb^ti etthāyamattho -- yo puggalo jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā taṃ ussukkāpeti. ^b^sa ve nibbānasantike^eb^ti so byattaṃ nibbānassa samīpe ekantato nibbānaṃ adhigacchatīti.

[03] ^b^kamma^eb^nti maggacetanā. sā hi apacayagāmitāya sattānaṃ suddhiṃ āvahati. ^b^vijjā^eb^ti sammādiṭṭhi. ^b^sīla^eb^nti sammāvācākammantā. ^b^jīvitamuttama^eb^nti sammāājīvo. ^b^dhammo^eb^ti avasesā cattāro ariyamaggadhammā. atha vā ^b^kamma^eb^nti sammākammantassa gahaṇaṃ. ``yā cāvuso visākha, sammādiṭṭhi, yo ca ^a^M1.0012^ea^ sammāsaṅkappo, ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.462) vacanato. ^b^vijjā^eb^ti sammādiṭṭhisammāsaṅkappānaṃ gahaṇaṃ. ^b^dhammo^eb^ti samādhi ``evaṃdhammā te bhagavanto ahesu''ntiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 5.378) viya. taggahaṇeneva ``yo cāvuso visākha, sammāvāyāmo, yā ca sammāsati, yo ca sammāsamādhi, ime dhammā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitā''ti vacanato sammāvāyāmasatīnampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^sīla^eb^nti sammāvācājīvānaṃ. ^b^jīvitamuttama^eb^nti evarūpassa ariyapuggalassa jīvitaṃ uttamaṃ jīvitanti evamettha aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo vuttoti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^sīlādivasenā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0012^ea^ sīlasamādhipaññāvīriyavasena. ^b^sabbadā^eb^ti samādānato pabhuti sabbakālaṃ. ^b^sīlasampanno^eb^ti catupārisuddhisīlasampadāya sampanno samannāgato. ^b^paññavā^eb^ti lokiyalokuttarāya paññāya samannāgato. ^b^susamāhito^eb^ti taṃsampayuttena samādhinā suṭṭhu samāhito. ^b^āraddhavīriyo^eb^ti akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya paggahitavīriyo. ^b^pahitatto^eb^ti nibbānaṃ patipesitattatāya kāye ca jīvite ca nirapekkhacitto. ^b^ogha^eb^nti kāmoghādicatubbidhampi oghaṃ, saṃsāramahoghameva vā.

[03] ^b^ekāyano^eb^ti ekamaggo. maggapariyāyo hi idha ayana-saddo, tasmā ekapathabhūto ayaṃ, bhikkhave, maggo, na dvedhāpathabhūtoti attho. ekaṃ vā nibbānaṃ ayati gacchatīti ekāyano, ekena vā gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya vivekaṭṭhena ayitabbo paṭipajjitabboti ekāyano, ayanti tenāti vā ayano, ekassa seṭṭhassa bhagavato ayanoti ekāyano, tena uppāditattā, ekasmiṃ vā imasmiṃyeva dhammavinaye ayanoti ekāyano. ^b^sattānaṃ visuddhiyā^eb^ti rāgādimalehi, abhijjhāvisamalobhādiupakkilesehi ca sattānaṃ visuddhatthāya visujjhanatthāya. ^b^yadida^eb^nti nipāto, ye imeti attho. pubbe saraṇalakkhaṇena maggaṭṭhena ca maggoti vuttasseva kāyādivisayabhedena catubbidhattā ^b^``cattāro satipaṭṭhānā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^sammappadhānādīsū^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena appamādābhiratiādīnaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo ^a^M1.0013^ea^. appamādābhiratiādivasenāpi hi katthaci visuddhimaggo desito. yathāha --
[21] ``appamādarato bhikkhu, pamāde bhayadassi vā.
[22] abhabbo parihānāya, nibbānasseva santike''ti.. (dha0 pa0 32).

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tassaṃ gāthāyaṃ. upari vuccamānā gāthāya vitthārasaṃvaṇṇanā niddesapaṭiniddesaṭṭhāniyā, tato saṃkhittatarā atthavaṇṇanā uddesaṭṭhāniyāti āha ^b^``ayaṃ saṅkhepavaṇṇanā''^eb^ti. yathāuddiṭṭhassa hi atthassa niddesapaṭiniddesā sukarā, subodhā ca hontīti. ^b^sīle patiṭṭhāyā^eb^ti ettha ^b^sīle^eb^ti kusalasīle. yadipi ``katame ca, thapati, akusalā sīlā''tiādīsu akusalā dhammāpi sīlanti āgatā. vuccamānāya pana cittapaññābhāvanāya adhiṭṭhānāyogyatāya kiriyasīlānampi asambhavo, kuto itaresanti kusalasīlamevettha adhippetaṃ. ^b^sīlaṃ paripūrayamāno^eb^tiādīsu ^b^paripūrayamāno^eb^ti paripālento, parivaḍḍhento vā, sabbabhāgehi saṃvaranto ^a^V1.0013^ea^, avītikkamanto cāti attho. tathābhūto hi taṃ avijahanto tattha patiṭṭhito nāma hoti. ``sīle''ti hi idaṃ ādhāre bhummaṃ. ^b^patiṭṭhāyā^eb^ti duvidhā patiṭṭhā nissayūpanissayabhedato. tattha upanissayapatiṭṭhā lokiyā, itarā lokuttarā abhinditvā gahaṇe. bhinditvā pana gahaṇe yathā lokiyacittuppādesu sahajātānaṃ, purimapacchimānañca vasena nissayūpanissayapatiṭṭhā sambhavati, evaṃ lokuttaresu heṭṭhimamaggaphalasīlavasena upanissayapatiṭṭhāpi sambhavati. ``patiṭṭhāyā''ti ca padassa yadā upanissayapatiṭṭhā adhippetā, tadā ``saddhaṃ upanissāyā''tiādīsu (paṭṭhā0 1.1.423) viya purimakālakiriyāvasena attho veditabbo. tenāha ``pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī''ti (ma0 ni0 3.431). yadā pana nissayapatiṭṭhā adhippetā, tadā ``cakkhuñca paṭiccā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.204; 3.421; saṃ0 ni0 4.60) viya samānakālakiriyāvasena attho veditabbo. sammāvācādayo hi attanā sampayuttānaṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ sahajātavaseneva nissayapaccayā hontīti.

[01] narati ^a^M1.0014^ea^ netīti ^b^naro,^eb^ puriso. yathā hi paṭhamapakatibhūto satto, itarāya pakatiyā seṭṭhaṭṭhena puri ucce ṭhāne seti pavattatīti ``puriso''ti vuccati, evaṃ nayanaṭṭhena ``naro''ti vuccati. puttabhātubhūtopi hi puggalo mātujeṭṭhabhaginīnaṃ netuṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, pageva itaro itarāsaṃ. narena yogato, narassa ayanti vā nārī, itthī. sāpi cettha kāmaṃ taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanasamatthatā atthi, padhānameva pana sattaṃ dassento ``naro''ti āha yathā ``satthā devamanussāna''nti (dī0 ni0 1.157, 255). aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana avibhāgena puggalapariyāyo ayanti dassetuṃ ^b^``naroti satto''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^sapañño^eb^ti vipākabhūtāya saha paññāya pavattatīti sapañño. tāya hi ādito paṭṭhāya santānavasena bahulaṃ pavattamānāya ayaṃ satto savisesaṃ ``sapañño''ti vattabbataṃ arahati. vipākapaññāpi hi santānavisesanena bhāvanāpaññuppattiyā upanissayo hoti ahetukadvihetukānaṃ tadabhāvato. sampajaññasaṅkhātāya ca taṃtaṃkiccakārikāya paññāya vasena ``sapañño''ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati. aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana nipaka-saddena pārihārikapaññā gayhatīti vipākapaññāvasenevettha attho vutto. ^b^kammajatihetukapaṭisandhipaññāyā^eb^ti kammajāya tihetukapaṭisandhiyaṃ paññāyāti evaṃ tihetuka-saddo paṭisandhi-saddena sambandhitabbo, na paññā-saddena. na hi paññā tihetukā atthi. paṭisandhito pabhuti pavattamānā paññā ``paṭisandhiyaṃ paññā''ti vuttā taṃmūlakattā, na paṭisandhikkhaṇe pavattā eva.

[03] cinteti ^a^V1.0014^ea^ ārammaṇaṃ upanijjhāyatīti ^b^cittaṃ,^eb^ samādhi. so hi sātisayaṃ upanijjhānakicco. na hi vitakkādayo vinā samādhinā tamatthaṃ sādhenti, samādhi pana tehi vināpi sādhetīti. paguṇabalavabhāvāpādanena paccayehi citaṃ, tathā santānaṃ cinotītipi ^b^cittaṃ,^eb^ samādhi. paṭhamajjhānādivasena cittavicittatāya, iddhividhādicittakaraṇena ca samādhi cittanti vināpi paropadesenassa cittapariyāyo labbhateva. aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana citta-saddo viññāṇe niruḷhoti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``cittasīsena hettha samādhi niddiṭṭho''^eb^ti. yathāsabhāvaṃ pakārehi jānātīti ^b^paññā^eb^. sā yadipi kusalādibhedato bahuvidhā. ``bhāvaya''nti pana vacanato bhāvetabbā idhādhippetāti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``vipassana''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ``bhāvaya''nti ca idaṃ paccekaṃ ^a^M1.0015^ea^ yojetabbaṃ ``cittañca bhāvayaṃ, paññañca bhāvaya''nti. tayidaṃ dvayaṃ kiṃ lokiyaṃ, udāhu lokuttaranti? lokuttaranti daṭṭhabbaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesato. taṃ hi bhāvayamāno ariyamaggakkhaṇe taṇhājaṭaṃ samucchedavasena vijaṭetīti vuccati, na lokiyaṃ. nānantariyabhāvena panettha lokiyāpi gahitāva honti lokiyasamathavipassanāya vinā tadabhāvato. samathayānikassa hi upacārappanāppabhedaṃ samādhiṃ itarassa khaṇikasamādhiṃ, ubhayesampi vimokkhamukhattayaṃ vinā na kadācipi lokuttarādhigamo sambhavati. tenāha ^b^``samādhiñceva vipassanañca bhāvayamāno''^eb^ti. tattha yadā lokiyā samathavipassanā adhippetā, tadā ``bhāvaya''nti idaṃ bhāvanākiriyāya hetubhāvakathanaṃ, bhāvanāhetūti attho. taṃbhāvanāhetukā hi vijaṭanakiriyāti. yadā pana lokuttarā adhippetā, tadā kevalaṃ vattamānabhāvaniddeso. tadubhayabhāvanāsamakālameva hi taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanaṃ.

[03] ^b^``ātāpī nipako''^eb^ti idaṃ yathāvuttabhāvanāya upakārakadhammakittanaṃ. kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa hi vīriyaṃ sati sampajaññanti ime tayo dhammā bahūpakārā. vīriyūpatthaddhañhi kammaṭṭhānaṃ satisampajaññānupālitaṃ na paripatati, upari ca visesaṃ āvahati. patiṭṭhāsiddhiyā cettha saddhāsiddhi, saddhūpanissayattā sīlassa, vīriyādisiddhiyā ca. na hi saddheyyavatthuṃ asaddahantassa yathāvuttavīriyādayo sambhavanti, tathā samādhipi. yathā hi hetubhāvato vīriyādīhi saddhāsiddhi, evaṃ phalabhāvato tehi samādhisiddhi. vīriyādīsu hi sampajjamānesu samādhi sampannova hoti asamāhitassa tadabhāvato. kathaṃ panettha satisiddhi? nipakaggahaṇato. tikkhavisadabhāvappattā hi sati ``nepakka''nti vuccati. yathāha ``paramena satinepakkena samannāgato''ti. aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ``nepakkaṃ paññā''ti ayamattho dassito. taggahaṇeneva ^a^V1.0015^ea^ satipi gahitāva hoti. na hi sativirahitā paññā atthīti. apare pana ``sapañño''ti imināva pārihārikapaññāpi gayhatīti ``nipako''ti padassa ``sato''ti atthaṃ vadanti. yadipi kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ ātāpanaṃ, taṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnampi attheva. ātappasaddo viya pana ātāpasaddo vīriyeyeva ^a^M1.0016^ea^ niruḷhoti āha ^b^``ātāpīti vīriyavā''^eb^ti. atha vā paṭipakkhappahāne sampayuttadhammānaṃ abbhussahanavasena pavattamānassa vīriyassa sātisayaṃ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā vuccati, na aññe dhammā. ^b^ātāpī^eb^ti cāyamīkāro pasaṃsāya, atisayassa vā dīpako. ^b^vīriyavā^eb^ti vā-saddopi tadattho eva daṭṭhabbo. tena sammappadhānasamaṅgitā vuttā hoti. tenāha ^b^``kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanaṭṭhenā''^eb^ti. ātāpanaggahaṇena cettha ārambha dhātumāha ādito vīriyārambhoti katvā, paritāpanaggahaṇena nikkamaparakkamadhātuyo sabbaso paṭipakkhato nikkhantataṃ, uparūpari visesappattiñca upādāya. nipayati visoseti paṭipakkhaṃ, tato vā attānaṃ nipāti rakkhatīti ^b^nipako,^eb^ sampajāno. kammaṭṭhānassa pariharaṇe niyuttāti ^b^pārihārikā^eb^.

[03] abhikkamādīni sabbakiccāni sātthakasampajaññādivasena paricchijja netīti ^b^sabbakiccapariṇāyikā^eb^. kammaṭṭhānassa vā uggaho paripucchā bhāvanārambho manasikāravidhi, tattha ca sakkaccakāritā sātaccakāritā sappāyakāritā nimittakusalatā pahitattatā antarāasaṅkoco indriyasamattapaṭipādanā vīriyasamatāpādanaṃ vīriyasamatāyojananti evamādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ kiccānaṃ pariṇāyikā ^b^sabbakiccapariṇāyikā. bhayaṃ ikkhatīti bhikkhū^eb^ti sādhāraṇato bhikkhulakkhaṇakathanena paṭipattiyāva bhikkhubhāvo, na bhikkhakabhinnapaṭadharādibhāvenāti dasseti. evaṃ hi katakiccānaṃ sāmaṇerādīnaṃ, paṭipannānañca apabbajitānampi saṅgaho kato hoti. idha pana paṭipajjanakavasena attho veditabbo. bhindati pāpake akusale dhammeti vā ^b^bhikkhu. so imaṃ vijaṭaye^eb^ti yo naro sappañño sīle patiṭṭhāya ātāpī nipako cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayanti vutto, so bhikkhu imaṃ taṇhājaṭaṃ vijaṭayeti sambandho. idāni tampi vijaṭanaṃ veḷugumbavijaṭanena upametvā dassetuṃ gāthāya yathāvutte sīlādidhamme ``iminā ca sīlenā''tiādinā paccāmasati. tattha yasmā yogāvacarasantānagatā nānākkhaṇikā missakā sīlādidhammā gāthāya gahitā, tasmā te ekaccaṃ gaṇhanto ^b^``chahi dhammehi samannāgato''^eb^ti āha. na hi te cha dhammā ekasmiṃ santāne ekasmiṃ khaṇe ^a^M1.0017^ea^ labbhanti. yasmā ca puggalādhiṭṭhānena gāthā bhāsitā, tasmā puggalādhiṭṭhānameva upamaṃ dassento ^b^``seyyathāpi nāma puriso''^eb^tiādimāha ^a^V1.0016^ea^. tattha ^b^sunisita^eb^nti suṭṭhu nisitaṃ, ativiya tikhiṇanti attho. satthassa nisānasilāyaṃ nisitatarabhāvakaraṇaṃ, bāhubalena cassa ukkhipananti ubhayampetaṃ atthāpannaṃ katvā upamā vuttāti tadubhayaṃ upameyye dassento ^b^``samādhisilāyaṃ sunisitaṃ...pe0... paññāhatthena ukkhipitvā''^eb^ti āha. samādhiguṇena hi paññāya tikkhabhāvo. tenāha bhagavā ``samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.5; 4.99; 5.1071; netti0 40; mi0 pa0 2.1.14). vīriyañcassā upatthambhakaṃ paggaṇhanato. ^b^vijaṭeyyā^eb^ti vijaṭetuṃ sakkuṇeyya. vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya hi vattamānāya yogāvacaro taṇhājaṭaṃ vijaṭetuṃ samattho nāma. vijaṭanaṃ cettha samucchedavasena pahānanti āha ^b^``sañchindeyya sampadāleyyā''^eb^ti. dakkhiṇaṃ arahatīti dakkhiṇeyyo, aggo ca so dakkhiṇeyyo cāti ^b^aggadakkhiṇeyyo,^eb^ aggā vā dakkhiṇā aggadakkhiṇā, taṃ arahatīti ^b^aggadakkhiṇeyyo^eb^.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tassaṃ gāthāyaṃ. ^b^aya^eb^nti ``naro''ti ca ``bhikkhū''ti ca vutto yogāvacaro. puna ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tassaṃ paññāyaṃ. ^b^assā^eb^ti bhikkhuno. kattari cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, anenāti attho. ^b^karaṇīyaṃ natthi^eb^ visesādhānassa tihetukapaṭisandhipaññāya abhāvato. tenāha ^b^``purimakammānubhāveneva hissa sā siddhā''^eb^ti. ^b^tenā^eb^ti yoginā. bhāvanāyaṃ satatapavattitavīriyatāya ^b^sātaccakārinā. paññāvasenā^eb^ti yathāvuttanepakkasaṅkhātapaññāvasena. yaṃ kiñci kattabbaṃ, tassa sabbassa sampajānavaseneva karaṇasīlo, tattha vā sampajānakāro etassa atthi, sampajānassa vā asammohassa kārako uppādakoti sampajānakārī, tena ^b^sampajānakārinā. atrā^eb^ti assaṃ gāthāyaṃ. sīlādisampādane vīriyassa tesaṃ aṅgabhāvato taṃ visuṃ aggahetvā ^b^``sīlasamādhipaññāmukhenā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ``visuddhimaggaṃ dassetī''ti avibhāgato desanāya piṇḍatthaṃ vatvā puna taṃ vibhāgato dassetuṃ ^b^``ettāvatā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^ettāvatā^eb^ti ettakāya desanāya. ^b^sikkhā^eb^ti sikkhitabbaṭṭhena sikkhā. sikkhanaṃ cettha āsevanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. sīlādidhammehi saṃvaraṇādivasena āsevanto te sikkhatīti ^a^M1.0018^ea^ vuccati. ^b^sāsana^eb^nti paṭipattisāsanaṃ. ^b^upanissayo^eb^ balavakāraṇaṃ. ^b^vajjanaṃ^eb^ anupagamanaṃ. ^b^sevanā^eb^ bhāvanā. ^b^paṭipakkho^eb^ti pahāyakapaṭipakkho. yadipi gāthāyaṃ ``sīle''ti sāmaññato vuttaṃ, na ``adhisīle''ti. taṃ pana taṇhājaṭāvijaṭanassa patiṭṭhābhūtaṃ adhippetanti āha ^b^``sīlena adhisīlasikkhā pakāsitā''^eb^ti. bhavagāmi hi sīlaṃ sīlameva, vibhavagāmi ^a^V1.0017^ea^ sīlaṃ adhisīlasikkhā. sāmaññajotanā hi visese avatiṭṭhatīti. esa nayo sesasikkhāsupi.

[03] ^b^sīlenā^eb^ti adhisīlasikkhābhūtena sīlena. taṃ hi anaññasādhāraṇatāya sāsanassa ādikalyāṇataṃ pakāseti, na yamaniyamādimattaṃ. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ, sabbapāpassa akaraṇa''^eb^nti ca. ^b^kusalāna^eb^nti maggakusalānaṃ. ^b^kusalāna^eb^nti vā anavajjānaṃ. tena ariyaphaladhammānampi saṅgaho siddho hoti. ^b^sabbapāpassa akaraṇa^eb^nti sabbassāpi sāvajjassa akiriyā anajjhāpajjanaṃ. etena cārittavārittabhedassa sabbassa sīlassa gahaṇaṃ kataṃ hoti. kattabbākaraṇampi hi sāvajjamevāti. ^b^ādivacanato^eb^ti gāthāyaṃ vuttasamādhipaññānaṃ ādimhi vacanato. ādibhāvo cassa tammūlakattā uttarimanussadhammānaṃ. ādīnaṃ vā vacanaṃ ādivacanaṃ. ādisaddena cettha ``sīlaṃ samādhi paññā ca, vimutti ca anuttarā''ti (dī0 ni0 2.186) evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. sīlassa visuddhattā vippaṭisārādihetūnaṃ dūrīkaraṇato avippaṭisārādiguṇāvahaṃ. ``avippaṭisārādiguṇāvahattā''ti etena na kevalaṃ sīlassa kalyāṇatāva vibhāvitā, atha kho ādibhāvopīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. tathā hissa ^b^sutte^eb^ (pari0 366) avippaṭisārādīnaṃ vimuttiñāṇapariyosānānaṃ paramparapaccayatā vuttā. ^b^samādhinā^eb^ti adhicittasikkhābhūtena samādhinā. sakalaṃ sāsanaṃ saṅgahetvā pavattāya gāthāya ādipadena ādimhi paṭipajjitabbassa sīlassa, tatiyapadena pariyosāne paṭipajjitabbāya paññāya gahitattā majjhe paṭipajjitabbo samādhi pārisesato dutiyapadena gayhatīti ^b^``kusalassa upasampadātiādivacanato hi samādhi sāsanassa majjhe''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, na kusalasaddassa samādhipariyāyattā. pubbūpanissayavato hi samāhitatādiaṭṭhaṅgasamannāgamena abhinīhārakkhamatā samādhissa iddhividhādiguṇāvahattaṃ, aggamaggapaññāya adhigatāya yadatthaṃ pabbajati, taṃ pariyositanti ^b^paññā sāsanassa^eb^ ^a^M1.0019^ea^ ^b^pariyosānaṃ^eb^. tenāha bhagavā ``sikkhānisaṃsamidaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ vussati saddhādhipateyyaṃ paññuttaraṃ vimuttisāra''nti (a0 ni0 4.245). sakaṃ cittaṃ sacittaṃ, sacittassa sabbaso kilesānaṃ samucchindanena visodhanaṃ ^b^sacittapariyodāpanaṃ^eb^. evaṃ pana paññākicce matthakappatte uttari karaṇīyābhāvato sāsanassa paññuttaratā veditabbā. ^b^tādibhāvāvahanato^eb^ti yādiso iṭṭhesu, lābhādīsu ca anunayābhāvato, tādiso aniṭṭhesu, alābhādīsu ca paṭighābhāvato. tato eva vā yādiso anāpāthagatesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu, tādiso āpāthagatesupīti ^b^tādī^eb^. tassa bhāvo ^b^tādibhāvo,^eb^ tassa āvahanato. ^b^vātenā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0018^ea^ vātahetu. ^b^na samīratī^eb^ti na calati. ^b^na samiñjantī^eb^ti na phandanti, kuto calananti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^tathā^eb^ti yathā sīlādayo adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ pakāsakā, tathā tevijjatādīnaṃ upanissayassāti tesaṃ pakāsanākārūpasaṃhārattho tathā-saddo. yasmā sīlaṃ visujjhamānaṃ satisampajaññabalena, kammassakatañāṇabalena ca saṃkilesamalato visujjhati pāripūriñca gacchati, tasmā sīlasampadā sijjhamānā upanissayasampattibhāvena satibalaṃ, ñāṇabalañca paccupaṭṭhapetīti tassā vijjattayūpanissayatā veditabbā sabhāgahetusampādanato. satinepakkena hi pubbenivāsavijjāsiddhi, sampajaññena sabbakiccesu sudiṭṭhakāritāparicayena cutūpapātañāṇānubandhāya dutiyavijjāsiddhi, vītikkamābhāvena saṃkilesappahānasabbhāvato vivaṭṭūpanissayatāvasena ajjhāsayasuddhiyā tatiyavijjāsiddhi. puretaraṃ siddhānaṃ samādhipaññānaṃ pāripūriṃ vinā sīlassa āsavakkhayañāṇūpanissayatā sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavehi dīpetabbā. samādhipaññā viya abhiññāpaṭisambhidānaṃ sīlaṃ na sabhāgahetūti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``na tato para''^eb^nti. ``samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.5; 4.99; netti0 40; mi0 pa0 2.1.14) vacanato samādhisampadā chaḷabhiññatāya upanissayo. paññā viya paṭisambhidānaṃ samādhi na sabhāgahetūti vuttaṃ ^b^``na tato para''^eb^nti. ``yogā ve jāyate bhūrī''ti (dha0 pa0 282) vacanato pubbayogena, garuvāsadesabhāsākaosallauggahaparipucchādīhi ca paribhāvitā paññāsampatti paṭisambhidāpabhedassa upanissayo ^a^M1.0020^ea^ paccekabodhisammāsambodhiyopi paññāsampattisannissayāti paññāya anadhigantabbassa visesassa abhāvato, tassā ca paṭisambhidāpabhedassa ekantikakāraṇato heṭṭhā viya ``na tato para''nti avatvā ^b^``na aññena kāraṇenā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[01] ettha ca ``sīlasampattiñhi nissāyā''ti vuttattā yassa samādhivijambhanabhūtā anavasesā cha abhiññā na ijjhanti, tassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena na samādhisampadā atthīti. satipi vijjānaṃ abhiññekadesabhāve sīlasampattisamudāgatā eva tisso vijjā gahitā. yathā hi paññāsampattisamudāgatā catasso paṭisambhidā upanissayasampannassa maggeneva ijjhanti, maggakkhaṇe eva tāsaṃ paṭilabhitabbato, evaṃ sīlasampattisamudāgatā tisso vijjā samādhisampattisamudāgatā ca cha abhiññā upanissayasampannassa maggeneva ijjhantīti maggādhigameneva ^a^V1.0019^ea^ tāsaṃ adhigamo veditabbo. paccekabuddhānaṃ, sammāsambuddhānañca paccekabodhisammāsambodhisamadhigamasadisā hi imesaṃ ariyānaṃ ime visesādhigamāti. vinayasuttābhidhammesu sammāpaṭipattiyā tevijjatādīnaṃ upanissayatāpi yathāvuttavidhinā veditabbā.

[03] sampannasīlassa kāmasevanābhāvato sīlena paṭhamantavivajjanaṃ vuttaṃ. yebhuyyena hi sattā kāmahetu pāṇātipātādivasenāpi asuddhapayogā honti. jhānasukhalābhino kāyakilamathassa sambhavo eva natthīti samādhinā dutiyantavivajjanaṃ vuttaṃ jhānasamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭakāyattā. ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti maggapaññāya. ukkaṭṭhaniddesena hi ekaṃsato ariyamaggova majjhimā paṭipatti nāma. evaṃ santepi lokiyapaññāvasenapi antadvayavivajjanaṃ vibhāvetabbaṃ.

[03] sīlaṃ taṃsamaṅgino kāmasugatīsuyeva nibbattāpanato catūhi apāyehi vimuttiyā kāraṇanti āha ^b^``sīlena apāyasamatikkamanupāyo pakāsito hotī''^eb^ti. na hi pāṇātipātādipaṭivirati duggatiparikilesaṃ āvahati. samādhi taṃsamaṅgino mahaggatabhūmiyaṃyeva nibbattāpanena sakalakāmabhavato vimocetīti vuttaṃ ^b^``samādhinā kāmadhātusamatikkamanupāyo pakāsito hotī''^eb^ti. na hi kāmāvacarakammassa anubalappadāyīnaṃ kāmacchandādīnaṃ vikkhambhakaṃ jhānaṃ kāmadhātuparikilesāvahaṃ hoti. na cettha upacārajjhānaṃ nidassetabbaṃ, appanāsamādhissa ^a^M1.0021^ea^ adhippetattā. nāpi ``sīleneva atikkamitabbassa apāyabhavassa samādhinā atikkamitabbatā''ti vacanokāso. sugatibhavampi atikkamantassa duggatisamatikkamane kā kathāti. ^b^sabbabhavasamatikkamanupāyo^eb^ti kāmabhavādīnaṃ navannampi bhavānaṃ samatikkamanupāyo sīlasamādhīhi atikkantāpi bhavā anatikkantā eva, kāraṇassa apahīnattā. paññāya panassa suppahīnattā te samatikkantā eva.

[03] ^b^tadaṅgappahānavasenā^eb^ti dīpālokeneva tamassa puññakiriyavatthugatena tena tena kusalaṅgena tassa tassa akusalaṅgassa pahānavasena. ^b^samādhinā vikkhambhanappahānavasenā^eb^ti upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattinivāraṇena ghaṭappahāreneva jalatale sevālassa tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ pahānavasena. ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti ariyamaggapaññāya. ^b^samucchedappahānavasenā^eb^ti catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano santāne ``diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā''tiādinā (dha0 sa0 277) vuttassa ^a^V1.0020^ea^ samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagaṇassa accantaṃ appavattisaṅkhātasamucchindanappahānavasena.

[03] ^b^kilesānaṃ vītikkamapaṭipakkho^eb^ti saṃkilesadhammānaṃ, kammakilesānaṃ vā yo kāyavacīdvāresu vītikkamo ajjhācāro, tassa paṭipakkho ^b^sīlena pakāsito hoti,^eb^ avītikkamasabhāvattā sīlassa. okāsādānavasena kilesānaṃ citte kusalappavattiṃ pariyādiyitvā uṭṭhānaṃ ^b^pariyuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. taṃ samādhi vikkhambhetīti āha ^b^``samādhinā pariyuṭṭhānapaṭipakkho pakāsito hotī''^eb^ti, samādhissa pariyuṭṭhānappahāyakattā. appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayanato kāraṇalābhe uppattirahā ^b^anusayā,^eb^ te pana anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ laddhā uppajjanārahā thāmagatā kāmarāgādayo satta kilesā veditabbā. te ariyamaggapaññāya sabbaso pahīyantīti āha ^b^``paññāya anusayapaṭipakkho pakāsito hotī''^eb^ti.

[03] kāyaduccaritādi duṭṭhu caritaṃ, kilesehi vā dūsitaṃ caritanti ^b^duccaritaṃ,^eb^ tameva yattha uppannaṃ, taṃ santānaṃ saṃkileseti vibādhati, upatāpeti cāti ^b^saṃkileso,^eb^ tassa visodhanaṃ sīlena tadaṅgavasena pahānaṃ vītikkamapaṭipakkhattā sīlassa. taṇhāsaṃkilesassa visodhanaṃ vikkhambhanavasena ^a^M1.0022^ea^ pahānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānapaṭipakkhattā samādhissa, taṇhāya cassa ujuvipaccanikabhāvato. diṭṭhisaṃkilesassa visodhanaṃ samucchedavasena pahānaṃ anusayapaṭipakkhattā paññāya, diṭṭhigatānañca ayāthāvagāhīnaṃ yāthāvagāhiniyā paññāya ujuvipaccanikabhāvato.

[03] ^b^kāraṇa^eb^nti upanissayapaccayo. ^b^sīlesu paripūrakārī^eb^ti maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtattā ādibrahmacariyakānaṃ pārājikasaṅghādisesasaṅkhātānaṃ mahāsīlasikkhāpadānaṃ avītikkamanato khuddānukhuddakānaṃ āpajjane sahasāva tehi vuṭṭhānena sīlesu yaṃ kattabbaṃ, taṃ paripūraṃ samatthaṃ karotīti ^b^sīlesu paripūrakārī. tathā sakadāgāmī^eb^ti ``sīlesu paripūrakārī''ti etaṃ upasaṃharati tathā-saddena. ete hi dve ariyā samādhipāripanthikānaṃ kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ paññāpāripanthikassa saccapaṭicchādakamohassa sabbaso asamūhatattā samādhiṃ, paññañca bhāventāpi samādhipaññāsu yaṃ kattabbaṃ, taṃ mattaso pamāṇena padesamattameva karontīti samādhismiṃ, paññāya ca mattaso kārino ``sīlesu paripūrakārino''icceva vuccanti. anāgāmī ^a^V1.0021^ea^ pana kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ samucchinnattā ^b^samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī^eb^. arahā sabbaso sammohassa susamūhatattā ^b^paññāya paripūrakārī^eb^.
[03] vuttaṃ hetaṃ bhagavatā (a0 ni0 3.87) --

[02] ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṃ mattaso kārī, paññāya mattaso kārī. so yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni sikkhāpadāni, tāni āpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi. taṃ kissa hetu? na hi mettha, bhikkhave, abhabbatā vuttā. yāni ca kho tāni sikkhāpadāni ādibrahmacariyakāni brahmacariyasāruppāni, tattha dhuvasīlo ca hoti ṭhitasīlo ca, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. so tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo. idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu...pe0... so tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti. sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī ^a^M1.0023^ea^ hoti, samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī, paññāya mattaso kārī. so yāni tāni...pe0... sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. so pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ...pe0... anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā. idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī, paññāya paripūrakārī. so yāni tāni khuddānukhuddakāni...pe0... sikkhati sikkhāpadesu. so āsavānaṃ khayā...pe0... upasampajja viharatī''ti.

[03] ``katha''nti pucchitvā sikkhādike vibhajitvā vuttamevatthaṃ nigametuṃ ^b^``eva''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^aññe cā^eb^ti tayo vivekā, tīṇi kusalamūlāni, tīṇi vimokkhamukhāni, tīṇi indriyānīti evamādayo, sikkhattikādīhi aññe ca guṇattikā. ^b^evarūpā^eb^ti yādisakā sikkhattikādayo idha sīlādīhi pakāsitā honti, edisā.

[03] ettha hi vivaṭṭasannissitassa sīlassa idhādhippetattā sīlena kāyaviveko pakāsito hoti, samādhinā cittaviveko, paññāya upadhiviveko. tathā sīlena adoso kusalamūlaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti, titikkhappadhānatāya, aparūpaghātasabhāvatāya ca sīlassa. samādhinā alobho ^a^V1.0022^ea^ kusalamūlaṃ, lobhapaṭipakkhato, alobhapadhānatāya ca samādhissa. paññāya pana amohoyeva. sīlena ca animittavimokkhamukhaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti. adosappadhānaṃ hi sīlasampadaṃ nissāya dose ādīnavadassino aniccānupassanā sukheneva ijjhati, aniccānupassanā ca animittavimokkhamukhaṃ. samādhinā appaṇihitavimokkhamukhaṃ. paññāya suññatavimokkhamukhaṃ. alobhappadhānaṃ hi kāmanissaraṇaṃ samādhisampadaṃ nissāya kāmesu ādīnavadassino dukkhānupassanā sukheneva ijjhati, dukkhānupassanā ca appaṇihitavimokkhamukhaṃ. paññāsampadaṃ nissāya anattānupassanā sukheneva ijjhati, anattānupassanā ca suññatavimokkhamukhaṃ. tathā sīlena anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti. taṃ hi sīlesu paripūrakārino aṭṭhamakassa indriyaṃ. samādhinā aññindriyaṃ. taṃ hi ukkaṃsagataṃ samādhismiṃ paripūrakārino anāgāmino, aggamaggaṭṭhassa ca indriyaṃ. paññāya aññātāvindriyaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti. taduppattiyā hi arahā paññāya paripūrakārīti. iminā nayena aññe ca evarūpā guṇattikā sīlādīhi pakāsetabbā.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ^b^eva^eb^nti ^a^M1.0024^ea^ vuttappakārena. ^b^anekaguṇasaṅgāhakenā^eb^ti adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ, aññesañca anekesaṃ guṇānaṃ saṅgāhakena. ^b^sīlasamādhipaññāmukhenā^eb^ti ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''tiādīsu (dha0 pa0 277; theragā0 676; netti0 5) viya vipassanāmattādimukhena saṅkhepato adesetvā sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desitopi, sattatiṃsāyapi vā bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ visuddhimaggantogadhattā tattha sīlasamādhipaññā mukhaṃ pamukhaṃ katvā desitopi. etena sīlasamādhipaññāsu avasesabodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ sabhāvato, upakārato ca antogadhabhāvo dīpitoti veditabbaṃ. atisaṅkhepadesitoyeva hoti sabhāvavibhāgādito avibhāvitattā. ^b^nāla^eb^nti na pariyattaṃ na samatthaṃ. ^b^sabbesa^eb^nti nātisaṅkhepanātivitthārarucīnampi, vipañcitaññuneyyānampi vā. saṅkhepadesanā hi saṃkhittarucīnaṃ, ugghaṭitaññūnaṃyeva ca upakārāya hoti, na panitaresaṃ. ^b^assa^eb^ visuddhimaggassa. pucchanaṭṭhena pañhā, kiriyā karaṇaṃ kammaṃ, pañhāva kammaṃ ^b^pañhākammaṃ,^eb^ pucchanapayogo.

[01] ^b^kiṃ sīla^eb^nti sarūpapucchā. ^b^kenaṭṭhena sīla^eb^nti kena atthena sīlanti vuccati, ``sīla''nti padaṃ kaṃ abhidheyyaṃ nissāya pavattanti attho. tayidaṃ sīlaṃ sabhāvato, kiccato, upaṭṭhānākārato, āsannakāraṇato ca kathaṃ jānitabbanti āha ^b^``kānassa lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānānī''^eb^ti. paṭipatti nāma diṭṭhānisaṃse eva hotīti āha ^b^``kimānisaṃsa''^eb^nti. ^b^katividha^eb^nti pabhedapucchā. vibhāgavantānaṃ hi sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanamukheneva hotīti. ^b^vodānaṃ^eb^ visuddhi. sā ca saṃkilesamalavimutti. taṃ icchantena yasmā upāyakosallatthinā anupāyakosallaṃ viya saṃkileso jānitabboti āha ^b^``ko cassa saṃkileso''^eb^ti.

[01] ^b^tatrā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0024^ea^ tasmiṃ, tassa vā pañhākammassa. ^b^vissajjana^eb^nti vivaraṇaṃ. pucchito hi attho avibhāvitattā nigūḷho muṭṭhiyaṃ kato viya tiṭṭhati. tassa vivaraṇaṃ vissajjanaṃ vibhūtabhāvakāraṇato. ^b^pāṇātipātādīhī^eb^ti ettha ^a^M1.0025^ea^ ^b^pāṇo^eb^ti vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. tassa saraseneva patanasabhāvassa antare eva ativa pātanaṃ ^b^atipāto,^eb^ saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghaṃ pātananti attho, atikkamma vā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātanaṃ atipāto, pāṇaghāto. ^b^ādi^eb^saddena adinnādānādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. tehi pāṇātipātādīhi dussīlyakammehi. ^b^viramantassā^eb^ti samādānavirativasena, sampattavirativasena ca oramantassa. ^b^vattapaṭipatti^eb^nti upajjhāyavattādivattakaraṇaṃ. ^b^cetanādayo dhammā^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ pāḷivasena vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^``vuttañheta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha cetayatīti ^b^cetanā,^eb^ attanā sampayuttadhammehi saddhiṃ ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho. cetanāya anukūlavaseneva hi taṃsampayuttā dhammā ārammaṇe pavattanti. cetanā kāmaṃ kusalattikasādhāraṇā, idha pana sīlacetanā adhippetāti katvā ``kusalā''ti veditabbā. cetasi niyuttaṃ ^b^cetasikaṃ,^eb^ cittasampayuttanti attho. cetanāya satipi cetasikatte ``cetanā sīla''nti visuṃ gahitattā tadaññameva viratianabhijjhādikaṃ ^b^cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ^eb^ daṭṭhabbaṃ gobalībaddañāyena. saṃvaraṇaṃ ^b^saṃvaro^eb^. yathā akusalā dhammā citte na otaranti, tathā pidahanaṃ. ^b^avītikkamo^eb^ vītikkamassa paṭipakkhabhūtā avītikkamavasena pavattacittacetasikā. tattha ^b^cetanā sīlaṃ nāmā^eb^tiādi yathāvuttassa suttapadassa vivaraṇaṃ. ^b^viramantassa cetanā^eb^ti viratisampayuttaṃ padhānabhūtaṃ cetanamāha. ^b^pūrentassa cetanā^eb^ti vattapaṭipattiāyūhinī. ^b^viramantassa viratī^eb^ti viratiyā padhānabhāvaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.

[03] ettha hi yadā ``tividhā, bhikkhave, kāyasañcetanā kusalaṃ kāyakamma''ntiādi (kathā0 539) vacanato pāṇātipātādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā tabbirativisiṭṭhā cetanā tathāpavattā padhānabhāvena pāṇātipātādipaṭiviratisādhikā hoti, tadā taṃsampayuttā viratianabhijjhādayo ca cetanāpakkhikā vā, abbohārikā vāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya cetanāsīlaṃ vuttaṃ. yadā pana pāṇātipātādīhi saṅkocaṃ āpajjantassa tato viramaṇākārena pavattamānā cetanāvisiṭṭhā virati, anabhijjhādayo ca tattha tattha padhānabhāvena kiccasādhikā honti, tadā taṃsampayuttā cetanā viratiādipakkhikā ^a^M1.0026^ea^ vā hoti, abbohārikā vāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya cetasikasīlaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] idāni ^a^V1.0025^ea^ ^b^sutte^eb^ āgatanayena kusalakammapathavasena cetanācetasikasīlāni vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^pajahantassā^eb^ti samādānavasena ``ito paṭṭhāya na karissāmī''ti sampattavatthukānipi anajjhācaraṇena pajahantassa. ^b^satta kammapathacetanā^eb^ti pāṇātipātādipahānasādhikā paṭipāṭiyā satta kusalakammapathacetanā. abhijjhādivasena yaṃ paradāragamanādi karīyati, tassa pahāyakā anabhijjhādayo sīlanti āha ^b^``cetasikaṃ sīlaṃ nāma anabhijjhā...pe0... sammādiṭṭhidhammā''^eb^ti. yathā hi abhijjhābyāpādavasena micchācārapāṇātipātādayo karīyanti, evaṃ micchādiṭṭhivasenāpi te puttamukhadassanādiatthaṃ karīyanti. tesañca pajahanakā anabhijjhādayoti. ^b^pātimokkhasaṃvaro^eb^ cārittavārittavibhāgaṃ vinayapariyāpannaṃ sikkhāpadasīlaṃ. ^b^satisaṃvaro^eb^ manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ ārakkhā, sā ca tathāpavattā satiyeva. ^b^ñāṇasaṃvaro^eb^ paññā. ^b^khantisaṃvaro^eb^ adhivāsanā, sā ca tathāpavattā adosapadhānā khandhā, adoso eva vā. ^b^vīriyasaṃvaro^eb^ kāmavitakkādīnaṃ vinodanavasena pavattaṃ vīriyaṃ. pātimokkhasaṃvarasatisaṃvarādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āvi bhavissati.
[03] ^b^sotānī^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhiavijjāduccaritāvasiṭṭhakilesasotāni. ``sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmī''ti vatvā ``paññāyete pidhiyyare''ti vacanena sotānaṃ saṃvaro pidahanaṃ samucchedanaṃ ñāṇanti viññāyati.

[03] idamatthikataṃ manasi katvā yena ñāṇena yoniso paccavekkhitvā paccayā paṭisevīyanti. taṃ ^b^paccayapaṭisevanampi^eb^ ñāṇasabhāvattā ^b^ettheva^eb^ ñāṇasaṃvare eva ^b^samodhānaṃ^eb^ saṅgahaṃ ^b^gacchati^eb^. khamati adhivāsetīti ^b^khamo. uppanna^eb^nti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe jātaṃ nibbattaṃ. ^b^kāmavitakka^eb^nti kāmūpasaṃhitaṃ vitakkaṃ. ^b^nādhivāsetī^eb^ti cittaṃ āropetvā abbhantare na vāseti. ^b^ājīvapārisuddhipī^eb^ti buddhapaṭikuṭṭhaṃ micchājīvaṃ pahāya anavajjena paccayapariyesanena sijjhanakaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisīlampi ^b^ettheva^eb^ vīriyasaṃvare eva samodhānaṃ gacchati vīriyasādhanattā. ettha ca yathā ñāṇaṃ taṇhādisotānaṃ pavattinivāraṇato pidahanaṭṭhena saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro ca, parato pavattanakaguṇānaṃ ādhārādibhāvato sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ ^a^M1.0027^ea^, evaṃ khanti anadhivāsanena uppajjanakakilesānaṃ adhivāsanena saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro ca, khamanahetu uppajjanakaguṇānaṃ ādhārādibhāvato sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ, vīriyaṃ vinodetabbānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ vinodanena saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro ca, vinodanahetu uppajjanakaguṇānaṃ ādhārādibhāvato sīlanaṭṭhena sīlanti ^a^V1.0026^ea^ veditabbaṃ. yathā pana pātimokkhasīlādi tassa tassa pāpadhammassa pavattituṃ appadānavasena saṃvaraṇaṃ pidahanaṃ, taṃ upādāya saṃvaro, evaṃ asamādinnasīlassa āgatavatthuto viramaṇampīti āha ^b^``yā ca pāpabhīrukānaṃ...pe0... saṃvarasīlanti veditabba''^eb^nti. na vītikkamati etenāti ^b^avītikkamo^eb^. tathāpavatto kusalacittuppādo.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ ^b^avasesesu^eb^ pana pañhesu. ^b^samādhānaṃ^eb^ saṇṭhapanaṃ. dussīlyavasena hi pavattā kāyakammādayo sampati, āyatiñca ahitadukkhāvahā, na sammā ṭhapitāti asaṇṭhapitā vippakiṇṇā visaṭā ca nāma honti, susīlyavasena pana pavattā tabbipariyāyato saṇṭhapitā avippakiṇṇā avisaṭā ca nāma honti yathā taṃ okkhittacakkhutā abāhuppacālanādi. tenāha ^b^``kāyakammādīnaṃ susīlyavasena avippakiṇṇatāti attho''^eb^ti. etena samādhikiccato sīlanaṃ viseseti. tassa hi samādhānaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ avikkhepahetutā. idaṃ kāyakammādīnaṃ saṇṭhapanaṃ saṃyamanaṃ. ^b^upadhāraṇaṃ^eb^ adhiṭṭhānaṃ mūlabhāvo. tathā hissa ādicaraṇādibhāvo vutto. tena pathavīdhātukiccato sīlanaṃ visesitaṃ hoti. sā hi sahajātarūpadhammānaṃ sandhāraṇavasena pavattati. idaṃ pana anavajjadhammānaṃ mūlādhiṭṭhānabhāvena. tenāha ^b^``kusalānaṃ dhammāna''^eb^ntiādi. tattha kusaladhammā nāma sapubbabhāgā mahaggatānuttarā dhammā. ^b^aññe^eb^ pana ācariyā. ^b^siraṭṭho^eb^ti yathā sirasi chinne sabbo attabhāvo vinassati, evaṃ sīle bhinne sabbaṃ guṇasarīraṃ vinassati. tasmā tassa uttamaṅgaṭṭho ^b^sīlaṭṭho^eb^. ``siro sīsa''nti vā vattabbe niruttinayena ``sīla''nti vuttanti adhippāyo. ^b^sītalaṭṭho^eb^ pariḷāhavūpasamanaṭṭho. tena ta-kārassa lopaṃ katvā niruttinayeneva ``sīla''nti vuttanti dasseti. tathā hidaṃ payogasampāditaṃ sabbakilesapariḷāhavūpasamakaraṃ hoti. ^b^evamādinā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0028^ea^ ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena sayanti akusalā etasmiṃ sati apaviṭṭhā hontīti sīlaṃ, supanti vā tena vihatussāhāni sabbaduccaritānīti sīlaṃ, sabbesaṃ vā kusaladhammānaṃ pavesārahasālāti sīlanti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ ``sīlanaṭṭhena sīla''nti pubbe saddatthuddhārena pakāsitopi bhāvattho evāti āha ^b^``sīlanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ tassā''^eb^ti. na hi tassa cetanādibhedabhinnassa anavasesato saṅgāhako tato añño attho atthi, yo lakkhaṇabhāvena vucceyya. nanu ca anekabhedasaṅgāhakaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ nāma siyā, na visesalakkhaṇanti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha ^b^``sanidassanattaṃ rūpassa, yathā bhinnassanekadhā''^eb^ti.

[03] yathā ^a^V1.0027^ea^ hi nīlādivasena anekabhedabhinnassāpi rūpāyatanassa sanidassanattaṃ visesalakkhaṇaṃ tadaññadhammāsādhāraṇato. na aniccatādi viya, ruppanaṃ viya vā sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ, evamidhāpi daṭṭhabbaṃ. kiṃ panetaṃ sanidassanattaṃ nāma? daṭṭhabbatā cakkhuviññāṇassa gocarabhāvo. tassa pana rūpāyatanato anaññattepi aññehi dhammehi rūpāyatanaṃ visesetuṃ aññaṃ viya katvā saha nidassanena ^b^sanidassana^eb^nti vuccati. dhammasabhāvasāmaññena hi ekībhūtesu dhammesu yo nānattakaro sabhāvo, so aññaṃ viya katvā upacarituṃ yutto. evaṃ hi atthavisesāvabodho hotīti. atha vā ``saha nidassanenā''ti ettha tabbhāvattho saha-saddo yathā nandirāgasahagatāti (saṃ0 ni0 5.1081; mahāva0 14; paṭi0 ma0 2.30).

[03] ^b^dussīlyaviddhaṃsanarasa^eb^nti kāyikāsaṃvarādibhedassa dussīlyassa vidhamanakiccaṃ. ^b^anavajjarasa^eb^nti agārayhasampattikaṃ agarahitabbabhāvena sampajjanakaṃ, avajjapaṭipakkhabhāvena vā sampajjanakaṃ. ^b^lakkhaṇādīsū^eb^ti lakkhaṇarasādīsu vuccamānesu kiccameva, sampatti vā rasoti vuccati, na rasāyatanarasādīti adhippāyo. keci pana ``kiccamevā''ti avadhāraṇaṃ tassa itararasato balavabhāvadassanatthanti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ, kiccameva, sampatti eva vā rasoti imassa atthassa adhippetattā.

[03] ^b^soceyyapaccupaṭṭhāna^eb^nti ^a^M1.0029^ea^ kāyādīhi sucibhāvena paccupaṭṭhāti. ^b^gahaṇabhāva^eb^nti gahetabbabhāvaṃ. tena upaṭṭhānākāraṭṭhena paccupaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ, phalaṭṭhena pana avippaṭisārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, samādhipaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vā. sīlaṃ hi sampatiyeva avippaṭisāraṃ paccupaṭṭhāpeti, paramparāya samādhiṃ. imassa pana ānisaṃsaphalassa ānisaṃsakathāyaṃ vakkhamānattā idha aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. keci pana phalassa anicchitattā idha aggahaṇanti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ phalassa anekavidhattā, lokiyādisīlassāpi vibhajiyamānattā. tathā hi vakkhati ``nissitānissitavasenā''tiādi (visuddhi0 1.10). yathā pathavīdhātuyā kammādi dūrakāraṇaṃ, sesabhūtattayaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ, yathā ca vatthassa tantavāyaturivemasalākādi dūrakāraṇaṃ, tantavo āsannakāraṇaṃ, evaṃ sīlassa saddhammassavanādi dūrakāraṇaṃ, hiriottappamassa āsannakāraṇanti dassento āha ^b^``hirottappañca panā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^hirottappe hī^eb^tiādi tassa āsannakāraṇabhāvasādhanaṃ. tattha ^b^uppajjati^eb^ samādānavasena, ^b^tiṭṭhati^eb^ avītikkamavasenāti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ ^b^avippaṭisārādī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0028^ea^ ettha vippaṭisārapaṭipakkho kusalacittuppādo avippaṭisāro. so pana visesato ``lābhā vata me, suladdhaṃ vata me, yassa me suparisuddhaṃ sīla''nti attano sīlassa paccavekkhaṇavasena pavattoti veditabbo. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena pāmojjabhogasampattikittisaddādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^avippaṭisāratthānī^eb^ti avippaṭisārappayojanāni. ^b^kusalānī^eb^ti anavajjāni. ^b^avippaṭisārānisaṃsānī^eb^ti avippaṭisāruddayāni. etena avippaṭisāro nāma sīlassa uddayamattaṃ, saṃvaḍḍhitassa rukkhassa chāyāpupphasadisaṃ. añño eva panānena nipphādetabbo samādhiādiguṇoti dasseti.

[03] ^b^sīlavato sīlasampadāyā^eb^ti parisuddhaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā sīlassa sampādanena sīlavato, tāya eva sīlasampadāya. ^b^appamādādhikaraṇa^eb^nti appamādakāraṇā. ^b^bhogakkhandha^eb^nti bhogarāsiṃ. ^b^kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchatī^eb^ti ``itipi sīlavā, itipi kalyāṇadhammo''ti sundaro thutighoso uṭṭhahati, lokaṃ pattharati. ^b^visārado^eb^ti attani kiñci garahitabbaṃ ^a^M1.0030^ea^ upavaditabbaṃ apassanto vigatasārajjo nibbhayo. ^b^amaṅkubhūto^eb^ti avilakkho. ^b^asammūḷho^eb^ti ``akataṃ vata me kalyāṇa''ntiādinā (ma0 ni0 3.248) vippaṭisārābhāvato, kusalakammādīnaṃyeva ca tadā upaṭṭhānato amūḷho pasannamānaso eva kālaṃkaroti. ^b^kāyassa bhedā^eb^ti upādinnakkhandhapariccāgā, jīvitindriyassa upacchedā. ^b^paraṃ maraṇā^eb^ti cutito uddhaṃ. ^b^sugati^eb^nti sundaraṃ gatiṃ. tena manussagatipi saṅgayhati. ^b^sagga^eb^nti devagatiṃ. sā hi rūpādīhi visayehi suṭṭhu aggoti saggo, lokiyati ettha uḷāraṃ puññaphalanti ^b^loko^eb^ti ca vuccati.

[03] ^b^ākaṅkheyya ce^eb^ti yadi iccheyya. ^b^piyo ca assa^eb^nti piyāyitabbo piyacakkhūhi passitabbo pemaniyo bhaveyyanti attho. ^b^manāpo^eb^ti sabrahmacārīnaṃ manavaḍḍhanako, tesaṃ vā manena pattabbo, mettacittena pharitabboti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^garū^eb^ti garuṭṭhāniyo pāsāṇachattasadiso. ^b^bhāvanīyo^eb^ti ``addhā ayamāyasmā jānaṃ jānāti, passaṃ passatī''ti sambhāvanīyo. ^b^sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī^eb^ti catupārisuddhisīlesu eva paripūrakārī assa, anūnakārī paripūraṇākārena samannāgato bhaveyya. ``ādinā nayenā''ti etena ``ajjhattaṃ cetosamathamanuyutto ^a^V1.0029^ea^ anirākatajjhāno vipassanāya samannāgato brūhetā suññāgārāna''nti (ma0 ni0 1.65) evamādike sīlathomanasuttāgate sattarasa sīlānisaṃse saṅgaṇhāti.

[01] idāni na kevalamime eva avippaṭisārādayo, atha kho aññepi bahū sīlānisaṃsā vijjantīti te dassetuṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^sāsane^eb^ti imasmiṃ sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇāvahe satthusāsane. ācāra^b^kulaputtānaṃ yaṃ^eb^ sīlaṃ ^b^vinā patiṭṭhā^eb^ avaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^natthi, tassa^eb^ evaṃ mahānubhāvassa ^b^sīlassa^eb^ ānisaṃsānaṃ ^b^paricchedaṃ^eb^ parimāṇaṃ ^b^ko vade^eb^ ko vattuṃ sakkuṇeyyāti attho. etena sabbesaṃyeva lokiyalokuttarānaṃ guṇānaṃ sīlameva mūlabhūtanti dassetvā tato parampi malavisodhanena, pariḷāhavūpasamanena, sucigandhavāyanena, sagganibbānādhigamūpāyabhāvena, sobhālaṅkārasādhanatāya bhayavidhamanena, kittipāmojjajanena ca sīlasadisaṃ aññaṃ sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahaṃ natthīti dassento ^b^``na gaṅgā''^eb^tiādikā gāthā abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0031^ea^ ^b^sarabhū^eb^ti ekā nadī, ``yaṃ loke sarabhū''ti vadanti. ^b^ninnagā vāciravatī^eb^ti ``aciravatī''ti evaṃnāmikā nadī, ^b^vā^eb^ti sabbattha vā-saddo aniyamattho. tena avuttā godhāvarīcandabhāgādikā saṅgaṇhāti. pāṇanaṭṭhena ^b^pāṇīnaṃ^eb^ sattānaṃ yaṃ malaṃ ^b^sīlajalaṃ visodhayati, taṃ malaṃ visodhetuṃ na sakkuṇanti^eb^ gaṅgādayo nadiyoti paṭhamagāthāya na-kāraṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^hārā^eb^ti muttāhārā. ^b^maṇayo^eb^ti veḷuriyādimaṇayo. ^b^ariya^eb^nti visuddhaṃ. sīlasamuṭṭhāno kittisaddo gandho manoharabhāvato, disāsu abhibyāpanato ca ^b^``sīlagandho''^eb^ti vutto. so hi paṭivātepi pavattati. tenāha bhagavā ``satañca gandho paṭivātametī''ti (dha0 pa0 54; a0 ni0 3.80; mi0 pa0 5.4.1). ^b^dosānaṃ balaṃ^eb^ nāma vatthujjhācāro, taṃ tesaṃ kātuṃ adentaṃ sīlaṃ dosānaṃ balaṃ ghātetīti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ ^b^``katividha''^eb^nti ettha ^b^vidha^eb^-saddo koṭṭhāsapariyāyo ``ekavidhena rūpasaṅgaho''tiādīsu viya, pakārattho vā, katippakāraṃ kittakā sīlassa pakārabhedāti attho. ^b^sīlanalakkhaṇenā^eb^ti sīlanasaṅkhātena sabhāvena.

[03] caranti ^a^V1.0030^ea^ tena sīlesu paripūrakāritaṃ upagacchantīti carittaṃ, carittameva ^b^cārittaṃ^eb^. vāritato tena attānaṃ tāyanti rakkhantīti ^b^vārittaṃ^eb^. adhiko samācāro abhisamācāro, tattha niyuttaṃ, so vā payojanaṃ etassāti ^b^ābhisamācārikaṃ^eb^. ādi brahmacariyassāti ādibrahmacariyaṃ, tadeva ^b^ādibrahmacariyakaṃ^eb^. viramati etāya, sayaṃ vā viramati, viramaṇaṃ vā ^b^virati,^eb^ na viratīti ^b^avirati^eb^. nissayatīti ^b^nissitaṃ,^eb^ na nissitanti ^b^anissitaṃ^eb^. pariyanto etassa atthīti ^b^pariyantaṃ,^eb^ kālena pariyantaṃ ^b^kālapariyantaṃ,^eb^ yathāparicchinno vā kālo pariyanto etassāti ^b^kālapariyantaṃ^eb^. yāva pāṇanaṃ jīvanaṃ koṭi etassāti ^b^āpāṇakoṭikaṃ^eb^. attano paccayehi loke niyuttaṃ, tattha vā viditanti ^b^lokiyaṃ^eb^. lokaṃ uttaratīti ^b^lokuttaraṃ^eb^.

[03] paccayato, phalato ca majjhimapaṇītehi nihīnaṃ, tesaṃ vā guṇehi parihīnanti ^b^hīnaṃ^eb^. attano paccayehi padhānabhāvaṃ nītanti ^b^paṇītaṃ^eb^. ubhinnameva vemajjhe ^a^M1.0032^ea^ bhavaṃ ^b^majjhimaṃ^eb^. attādhipatito āgataṃ ^b^attādhipateyyaṃ^eb^. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. taṇhāya, diṭṭhiyā vā parāmaṭṭhaṃ padhaṃsitanti ^b^parāmaṭṭhaṃ^eb^. tappaṭikkhepato ^b^aparāmaṭṭhaṃ^eb^. paṭippassaddhakilesaṃ ^b^paṭippassaddhaṃ^eb^. sikkhāsu jātaṃ, sekkhassa idanti vā ^b^sekkhaṃ^eb^. pariniṭṭhitasikkhākiccatāya asekkhadhammapariyāpannaṃ ^b^asekkhaṃ^eb^. tadubhayapaṭikkhepena ^b^nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ^eb^. hānaṃ bhajati, hānabhāgo vā etassa atthīti ^b^hānabhāgiyaṃ^eb^. sesesupi eseva nayo. appaparimāṇattā pariyantavantaṃ, pārisuddhivantañca sīlaṃ ^b^pariyantapārisuddhisīlaṃ^eb^. anappaparimāṇattā apariyantaṃ, pārisuddhivantañca sīlaṃ ^b^apariyantapārisuddhisīlaṃ^eb^. sabbaso puṇṇaṃ, pārisuddhivantañca sīlaṃ ^b^paripuṇṇapārisuddhisīlaṃ^eb^.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ ^b^vuttanayenā^eb^ti ``sīlanaṭṭhena sīla''ntiādinā (visuddhi0 1.7) heṭṭhā vuttena nayena. ^b^idaṃ kattabbanti paññattasikkhāpadapūraṇa^eb^nti idaṃ ābhisamācārikaṃ kattabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbanti evaṃ paññattassa sikkhāpadasīlassa pūraṇaṃ. sikkhāpadasīlaṃ hi pūrento sikkhāpadampi pūreti pāleti nāma. sikkhā eva vā sikkhitabbato, paṭipajjitabbato ca ^b^sikkhāpadaṃ^eb^. tassa pūraṇantipi yojetabbaṃ. ^b^idaṃ na kattabbanti paṭikkhittassa akaraṇa^eb^nti idaṃ duccaritaṃ na kattabbanti bhagavatā paṭikkhittassa akaraṇaṃ viramaṇaṃ. ^b^caranti tasmi^eb^nti tasmiṃ sīle taṃsamaṅgino carantīti sīlassa adhikaraṇataṃ vibhāvento tesaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvaṃ dasseti. tenāha ^b^``sīlesu paripūrakāritāya pavattantī''^eb^ti. ^b^vārita^eb^nti idaṃ na kattabbanti paṭikkhittaṃ akappiyaṃ ^a^V1.0031^ea^. ^b^tāyantī^eb^ti akaraṇeneva tāyanti. ^b^tenā^eb^ti vārittasīlamāha. vāreti vā satthā ettha, etena vāti ^b^vāritaṃ,^eb^ sikkhāpadaṃ. taṃ avikopento tāyanti tenāti ^b^vārittaṃ. saddhāvīriyasādhana^eb^nti saddhāya, uṭṭhānavīriyena ca sādhetabbaṃ. na hi asaddho, kusīto ca vattapaṭipattiṃ paripūreti, saddho eva satthārā paṭikkhitte aṇumattepi vajje bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti āha ^b^``saddhāsādhanaṃ vāritta''^eb^nti.

[03] adhisīlasikkhāpariyāpannattā abhivisiṭṭho samācāroti abhisamācāroti āha ^b^``uttamasamācāro''^eb^ti. abhisamācārova ^b^ābhisamācārikaṃ,^eb^ yathā venayikoti (a0 ni0 8.11; pārā0 8) adhippāyo. abhisamācāro ukkaṭṭhaniddesato ^a^M1.0033^ea^ maggasīlaṃ, phalasīlañca, taṃ ārabbha uddissa tadatthaṃ tappayojanaṃ paññattaṃ ^b^ābhisamācārikaṃ^eb^. suparisuddhāni tīṇi kāyakammāni, cattāri vacīkammāni, suparisuddho ājīvoti idaṃ ^b^ājīvaṭṭhamakaṃ^eb^. tattha kāmaṃ ājīvahetukato sattavidhaduccaritato virati sammāājīvoti sopi sattavidho hoti, sammājīvatāsāmaññena pana taṃ ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. atha vā tividhakuhanavatthusannissayato micchājīvato viratiṃ ekajjhaṃ katvā vutto ^b^``ājīvo suparisuddho''^eb^ti. seṭṭhacariyabhāvato maggo eva brahmacariyanti ^b^maggabrahmacariyaṃ,^eb^ tassa. ^b^ādibhāvabhūta^eb^nti ādimhi bhāvetabbataṃ nipphādetabbataṃ bhūtaṃ pattaṃ ādibhāvabhūtaṃ. kiñcāpi desanānukkamena sammādiṭṭhi ādi, paṭipattikkamena pana ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ ādīti. ^b^tassa sampattiyā^eb^ti ābhisamācārikassa sampajjanena paripūraṇena ^b^ādibrahmacariyakaṃ sampajjati^eb^. yo hi lahukānipi appasāvajjāni parivajjeti, so garukāni mahāsāvajjāni bahvādīnavāni parivajjessatīti vattabbameva natthīti. suttaṃ pana etamatthaṃ byatirekavasena vibhāveti. tattha ^b^dhamma^eb^nti sīlaṃ. taṃ hi upariguṇavisesānaṃ dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhammoti vuccati.
[03] viratisīlassa itarasīlena satipi sampayogādike asammissakatādassanatthaṃ ^b^``veramaṇimatta''^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03] ``nissitānissitavasenā''ti ettha labbhamānanissayaṃ tāva dassetuṃ ^b^``nissayo''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha taṇhācaritena nissayitabbato taṇhāva ^b^taṇhānissayo^eb^. tathā ^b^diṭṭhinissayo^eb^. diṭṭhicarito hi asatipi diṭṭhiyā taṇhāvirahe diṭṭhinissitova pavattati. ^b^devo^eb^ti catumahārājasakkasuyāmādipākaṭadevamāha ^a^V1.0032^ea^. ^b^devaññataro^eb^ti apākaṭaṃ. taṇhaṃ eva nissitanti ^b^taṇhānissitaṃ^eb^. taṇhāya nissitanti ca keci vadanti. tesaṃ ``dve nissayā''tiādinā virujjhati. ^b^suddhidiṭṭhiyā^eb^ti ``iti saṃsārasuddhi bhavissatī''ti evaṃ pavattadiṭṭhiyā, lokuttaraṃ sīlanti adhippāyo. ^b^tassevā^eb^ti lokuttarasseva sambhārabhūtaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ, vivaṭṭūpanissayanti attho.

[03] ^b^kālaparicchedaṃ katvā^eb^ti ``imañca rattiṃ, imañca diva''ntiādinā (a0 ni0 8.41) viya kālavasena paricchedaṃ katvā. kālaparicchedaṃ akatvā samādinnampi antarāvicchinnaṃ ^a^M1.0034^ea^ sampattavirativasena yāvajīvaṃ pavattitampi āpāṇakoṭikaṃ na hotīti dassetuṃ ^b^``yāvajīvaṃ samādiyitvā tatheva pavattita''^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^lābhayasañātiaṅgajīvitavasenā^eb^ti lābhayasānaṃ anuppannānaṃ uppādanavasena, uppannānaṃ rakkhaṇavasena ceva vaḍḍhanavasena ca ñātiaṅgajīvitānaṃ avināsanavasena. ^b^kiṃ so vītikkamissatī^eb^ti yo vītikkamāya cittampi na uppādeti, so kāyavācāhi vītikkamissatīti kiṃ idaṃ, natthetanti attho. paṭikkhepe hi ayaṃ ^b^kiṃ^eb^-saddo.

[03] ārammaṇabhāvena vaṇo viya āsave kāmāsavādike paggharatīti sampayogabhāvābhāvepi sahāsavehīti ^b^sāsavaṃ^eb^. tebhūmakadhammajātanti sīlaṃ tappariyāpannanti āha ^b^``sāsavaṃ sīlaṃ lokiya''^eb^nti. ^b^bhavavisesā^eb^ sampattibhavā. ^b^vinayo^eb^ti vinayapariyatti, tattha vā āgatasikkhāpadāni. ^b^pāmojjaṃ^eb^ taruṇapīti. ^b^yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ^eb^ sapaccayanāmarūpadassanaṃ, tadadhiṭṭhānā vā taruṇavipassanā. ^b^nibbidā^eb^ti nibbidāñāṇaṃ. tena balavavipassanamāha. ^b^virāgo^eb^ maggo. ^b^vimutti^eb^ arahattaphalaṃ. ^b^vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ^eb^ paccavekkhaṇā. ^b^kathā^eb^ti vinayakathā. ^b^mantanā^eb^ti vinayavicāraṇā. ^b^upanisā^eb^ti yathāvuttakāraṇaparamparāsaṅkhāto upanissayo. ^b^lokuttaraṃ^eb^ maggaphalacittasampayuttaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlaṃ. tattha maggasīlaṃ ^b^bhavanissaraṇāvahaṃ hoti, paccavekkhaṇañāṇassa ca bhūmi,^eb^ phalasīlaṃ pana paccavekkhaṇāñāṇasseva bhūmi.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ hīnādhimuttivasena chandādīnampi hīnatā. paṇītādhimuttivasena paṇītatā. tadubhayavemajjhatāvasena majjhimatā. yatheva hi kammaṃ āyūhanavasena hīnādibhedabhinnaṃ hoti, evaṃ ^a^V1.0033^ea^ chandādayopi pavattiākāravasena. so ca nesaṃ pavattiākāro adhimuttibhedenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^yasakāmatāyā^eb^ti kittisilokābhiratiyā, parivāricchāya vā. ``kathaṃ nāma mādiso īdisaṃ kareyyā''ti pāpajigucchāya ^b^ariyabhāvaṃ nissāya. anupakkiliṭṭha^eb^nti attukkaṃsanaparavambhanāhi, aññehi ca upakkilesehi anupakkiliṭṭhaṃ. ^b^bhavabhogatthāyā^eb^ti bhavasampattiatthañceva bhogasampattiatthañca. ^b^attano vimokkhatthāya pavattita^eb^nti sāvakapaccekabodhisattasīlamāha. ^b^sabbasattānaṃ vimokkhatthāyā^eb^ti sabbasattānaṃ saṃsārabandhanato ^a^M1.0035^ea^ vimocanatthāya. ^b^pāramitāsīlaṃ^eb^ mahābodhisattasīlaṃ. yā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā mahābodhiṃ ārabbha pavattā paramukkaṃsagatasoceyyasallekhā desakālasattādivikapparahitā sīlapāramitā.

[03] ^b^ananurūpa^eb^nti asāruppaṃ. attā eva garu adhipati etassāti ^b^attagaru,^eb^ lajjādhiko. attādhipatito āgataṃ ^b^attādhipateyyaṃ^eb^. loko adhipati garu etassāti ^b^lokādhipati,^eb^ ottappādhiko. dhammo nāmāyaṃ mahānubhāvo ekantaniyyāniko, so ca paṭipattiyāva pūjetabbo. tasmā ``naṃ sīlasampadāya pūjessāmī''ti evaṃ ^b^dhammamahattaṃ pūjetukāmena^eb^.

[03] ^b^parāmaṭṭhattā^eb^ti parābhavavasena āmaṭṭhattā. taṇhādiṭṭhiyo hi ``imināhaṃ sīlena devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā, iminā me sīlena saṃsārasuddhi bhavissatī''ti pavattassa sīlaṃ parāmasantiyo taṃ parābhavaṃ pāpenti maggassa anupanissayabhāvakaraṇato. ^b^puthujjanakalyāṇakassā^eb^ti puthujjanesu kalyāṇakassa. so hi puthujjanova hutvā kalyāṇehi sīlādīhi samannāgato. parāmasanakilesānaṃ vikkhambhanato, samucchindanato ca tehi na parāmaṭṭhanti ^b^aparāmaṭṭhaṃ^eb^. tassa tassa kilesadarathassa paṭippassambhanato vūpasamanato ^b^paṭippassaddhaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^katapaṭikamma^eb^nti vuṭṭhānadesanāhi yathādhammaṃ katapaṭikāraṃ. evaṃ hi taṃ sīlaṃ paṭipākatikameva hoti. tenāha ^b^``taṃ visuddha''^eb^nti. ``katapaṭikamma''nti iminā ca ``na punevaṃ karissa''nti adhiṭṭhānampi saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ``acchamaṃsaṃ nu kho, sūkaramaṃsaṃ nu kho''tiādinā ^b^vatthumhi vā,^eb^ ``pācittiyaṃ nu kho, dukkaṭaṃ nu kho''tiādinā ^b^āpattiyā vā,^eb^ ``mayā taṃ vatthu vītikkantaṃ nu kho, na nu kho vītikkanta''ntiādinā ^b^ajjhācāre vā vematikassa^eb^ saṃsayāpannassa. ^b^visodhetabbaṃ^eb^ yathādhammaṃ paṭikammena. vimati eva vematikaṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^vematike^eb^ sati, vimatiyā uppannāyāti attho. ^b^vimati paṭivinetabbā^eb^ti sayaṃ vā taṃ vatthuṃ ^a^V1.0034^ea^ vicāretvā, vinayadhare vā pucchitvā kaṅkhā vinodetabbā. nikkaṅkhena pana kappiyaṃ ce kātabbaṃ, akappiyaṃ ce chaḍḍetabbaṃ. tenāha ^b^``iccassa phāsu bhavissatī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^``catūhi^eb^ ^a^M1.0036^ea^ ^b^ariyamaggehī''^eb^tiādinā maggaphalapariyāpannaṃ sīlaṃ maggaphalasampayuttaṃ vuttaṃ. samudāyesu pavattavohārā avayavesupi pavattantīti. ^b^sesa^eb^nti sabbaṃ lokiyasīlaṃ.

[03] ^b^pakatipī^eb^ti sabhāvopi. ^b^sukhasīlo^eb^ sakhilo sukhasaṃvāso. ^b^tena pariyāyenā^eb^ti pakatiatthavācakatthena. ekaccaṃ abyākataṃ sīlaṃ idhādhippetasīlena ekasaṅgahanti akusalassevāyujjamānataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``tattha akusala''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tathā hi sekkhattikaṃ idha gahitaṃ, idha na upanītaṃ kusalattikanti adhippāyo. ^b^vuttanayenevā^eb^ti vutteneva nayena kusalattikaṃ aggahetvā hīnattikādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ tikānaṃ vasena ^b^assa^eb^ sīlassa ^b^tividhatā veditabbā^eb^.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ ^b^yodhā^eb^ti yo idha. ^b^vatthuvītikkame^eb^ti āpattiyā vatthuno vītikkamane ajjhācāre. kāmasaṅkappādayo nava mahāvitakkā ^b^micchāsaṅkappā. evarūpassā^eb^ti edisassa. tassa hi sīlavante anupasaṅkamitvā dussīle sevantassa tato eva tesaṃ diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanena paṇṇattivītikkame adosadassāvino micchāsaṅkappabahulatāya manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni arakkhato sīlaṃ ekaṃseneva ^b^hānabhāgiyaṃ^eb^ hoti, na ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ, kuto visesādibhāgiyatā. ^b^sīlasampattiyā^eb^ti sīlapāripūriyā catupārisuddhisīlena. ^b^aghaṭantassa uttarī^eb^ti uttari visesādhigamāya avāyamantassa. ^b^ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ sīlaṃ bhavati^eb^ asamādhisaṃvattaniyattā. sampādite hi samādhismiṃ sīlassa samādhisaṃvattaniyatā nicchiyati. ^b^samādhatthāyā^eb^ti samathavasena samādhānatthāya. ^b^nibbida^eb^nti vipassanaṃ. balavavipassanādassanatthaṃ nibbidāgahaṇaṃ tāvatāpi sīlassa nibbedhabhāgiyabhāvasiddhito.

[03] yāni ca sikkhāpadāni nesaṃ rakkhitabbānīti sambandho, tāni pana asādhāraṇapaññattito aññāni. ^b^nesa^eb^nti ``rakkhitabbānī''ti padaṃ apekkhitvā kattari sāmivacanaṃ, tehi bhikkhūhīti attho. ^b^sati vā ussāhe^eb^ti ussakkitvā sīlāni rakkhituṃ ussāhe sati. ^b^dasā^eb^ti sāmaṇerehi rakkhitabbasīlamāha ghaṭikārādīnaṃ viya. ^b^aṭṭhā^eb^ti naccādimālādiveramaṇiṃ ekaṃ katvā sabbapacchimavajjāni aṭṭha.

[03] ^b^avītikkamo^eb^ti ^a^M1.0037^ea^ ^a^V1.0035^ea^ pañcannaṃ sīlānaṃ avītikkamo. ^b^pakatisīla^eb^nti sabhāvasīlaṃ. tatrūpapattiniyataṃ hi sīlaṃ uttarakurukānaṃ. ^b^mariyādācāritta^eb^nti tassa tassa sāvajjassa akaraṇe mariyādabhūtaṃ, tattha tattha kulādīsu pubbapurisehi ṭhapitaṃ cārittaṃ. kuladesapāsaṇḍadhammo hi ``ācārasīla''nti adhippetaṃ. tattha kuladhammo tāva brāhmaṇādīnaṃ amajjapānādi, desadhammo ekaccajanapadavāsīnaṃ ahiṃsanādi, pāsaṇḍadhammo titthiyānaṃ yamaniyamādi. titthiyamataṃ hi diṭṭhipāsena, taṇhāpāsena ca ḍeti pavattati, pāsaṃ vā bādhaṃ ariyavinayassa ḍetīti ``pāsaṇḍa''nti vuccati. ``pakatiyā sīlavatī hotī''ti (dī0 ni0 2.20) vacanato bodhisattamātu pañcasikkhāpadasīlaṃ paripuṇṇameva. idaṃ pana ukkaṃsagataṃ bodhisattapitaripi cittuppādamattenapi asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ ``dhammatāsīla''nti vuttaṃ. ^b^kāmaguṇūpasaṃhita^eb^nti kāmakoṭṭhāsesu assādūpasaṃhitaṃ kāmassādagadhitaṃ. ^b^dhammatāsīla^eb^nti dhammatāya kāraṇaniyāmena āgataṃ sīlaṃ. sīlapāramiṃ hi paramukkaṃsaṃ pāpetvā kucchigatassa mahābodhisattassa sīlatejena guṇānubhāvena bodhisattamātu saraseneva paramasallekhappattaṃ sīlaṃ hoti. ^b^mahākassapādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena bhaddādike saṅgaṇhāti. te kira suciraṃ kālaṃ suparisuddhasīlā eva hutvā āgatā. tenāha ^b^``suddhasattāna''^eb^nti. ^b^tāsu tāsu jātīsū^eb^ti sīlavarājamahiṃsarājādijātīsu. pubbe purimajātiyaṃ siddho hetu etassāti ^b^pubbahetukasīlaṃ^eb^. idaṃ pana pakatisīlādisamādānena vinā avītikkamalakkhaṇaṃ sampattaviratisaṅgahaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] yaṃ bhagavatā evaṃ vuttaṃ sīlanti sambandho. ^b^idhā^eb^ti vakkhamānasīlaparipūrakassa puggalassa sannissayabhūtasāsanaparidīpanaṃ, aññasāsanassa ca tathābhāvapaṭisedhanaṃ. vuttaṃ hetaṃ ``idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo...pe0... suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī''ti (dī0 ni0 2.214; ma0 ni0 1.139; a0 ni0 4.241). ^b^bhikkhū^eb^ti tassa sīlassa paripūrakapuggalaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto^eb^ti idamassa pātimokkhasīle patiṭṭhitabhāvaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^viharatī^eb^ti idamassa tadanurūpavihārasamaṅgibhāvaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^ācāragocarasampanno^eb^ti idaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarassa, upariadhigantabbaguṇānañca upakārakadhammaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī^eb^ti idaṃ pātimokkhato acavanabhāvaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^samādāyā^eb^ti sikkhāpadānaṃ anavasesato ādānaparidīpanaṃ. ^b^sikkhatī^eb^ti sikkhāya samaṅgibhāvaparidīpanaṃ ^a^M1.0038^ea^. ^b^sikkhāpadesū^eb^ti sikkhitabbadhammaparidīpanaṃ. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ parato āvi bhavissati.

[03] ^b^so^eb^ti ^a^V1.0036^ea^ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle patiṭṭhitabhikkhu. tena yādisassa indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ icchitabbaṃ, taṃ dasseti. ^b^cakkhunā^eb^ti yato so saṃvaro, taṃ dasseti. ^b^rūpa^eb^nti yattha so saṃvaro, taṃ dasseti. ^b^disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhī^eb^ti saṃvarassa upāyaṃ dasseti. ^b^yatvādhikaraṇa...pe0... anvāssaveyyu^eb^nti saṃvarassa paṭipakkhaṃ tattha ādīnavaṃ dasseti. ^b^saṃvarāya paṭipajjatī^eb^ti pageva satiyā upaṭṭhapetabbataṃ dasseti. ^b^rakkhati cakkhundriya^eb^nti satiyā upaṭṭhāpanameva cakkhundriyassa ārakkhāti dasseti. ^b^cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī^eb^ti tathābhūtā satiyevettha saṃvaroti dasseti. vītikkamassa vasenāti sambandho. ^b^channaṃ sikkhāpadāna^eb^nti ``ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā asantaṃ abhūtaṃ uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapatī''tiādinā āgatānaṃ channaṃ pārājikādipaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ. sāmantajappanādinā tividhena kuhanavatthunā vimhāpanaṃ ^b^kuhanā^eb^. attānaṃ, dāyakaṃ vā ukkhipitvā yathā so kiñci dadāti, evaṃ kathanaṃ ^b^lapanā^eb^. nimittaṃ vuccati paccayadānasaññuppādakaṃ kāyavacīkammaṃ, tena nimittena carati, nimittaṃ vā karotīti nemittiko, tassa bhāvo ^b^nemittikatā^eb^. gandhādayo viya lābhāya paresaṃ akkosanādinā nipisatīti nippeso, nippesova nippesiko, tassa bhāvo ^b^nippesikatā^eb^. mahicchatāya attanā laddhalābhena parato lābhapariyesanā ^b^lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatā. evamādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena anuppiyabhāṇitācāṭukamyatādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. paṭisaṅkhānena paccavekkhaṇāya parisuddho asaṃkiliṭṭho ^b^paṭisaṅkhānaparisuddho^eb^. cattāro paccayā paribhuñjīyanti etenāti ^b^catupaccayaparibhogo,^eb^ tathāpavattā anavajjacetanā.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tesu pātimokkhasaṃvarādīsu. ^b^ādito paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti ``idha bhikkhū''tiādinā (vibha0 508; dī0 ni0 1.194) āgatadesanāya ādito pabhuti. ^b^vinicchayakathā^eb^ti tattha saṃsayavidhamanena vinicchayāvahā kathā. paṭhamassa atthassa ^a^M1.0039^ea^ sabbasādhāraṇattā asādhāraṇaṃ pabbajitāveṇikaṃ pariyāyaṃ dassento ^b^``chinnabhinnapaṭadharāditāya vā''^eb^ti āha. evaṃ hissa paripuṇṇapātimokkhasaṃvarayogyatā dassitā hoti. bhinnapaṭadharādibhāvo ca nāma daliddassāpi niggahitassa hotīti tato visesetuṃ ``saddhāpabbajito''ti vatvā paṭipattiyā yogyabhāvadassanatthaṃ ^b^``kulaputto''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ācārakulaputto vā hi paṭipajjituṃ sakkoti jātikulaputto vā. ^b^sikkhāpadasīla^eb^nti cārittavārittappabhedaṃ sikkhāpadavasena paññattaṃ sīlaṃ. ^b^yo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0037^ea^ aniyamaniddeso yo koci puggalo. ^b^na^eb^nti vinayapariyāpannaṃ sīlaṃ. ^b^ta^eb^nti puggalaṃ. ^b^mokkheti^eb^ sahakārikāraṇabhāvato. apāye bhavāni ^b^āpāyikāni. ādi^eb^-saddena tadaññaṃ sabbasaṃsāradukkhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^saṃvaraṇaṃ^eb^ kāyavacīdvārānaṃ pidahanaṃ. yena te saṃvutā pihitā honti, so saṃvaro. yasmā pana so sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ avītikkamo vītikkamapaṭipakkhoti katvā, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``kāyikavācasikassa avītikkamassetaṃ nāma''^eb^nti. ^b^pātimokkhasaṃvarena saṃvuto^eb^ti pātimokkhasaṃvarena pihitakāyavacīdvāro. tathābhūto ca yasmā taṃ upeto tena ca samaṅgī nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``upagato samannāgatoti attho''^eb^ti.

[03] aparo nayo -- kilesānaṃ balavabhāvato, pāpakiriyāya sukarabhāvato, puññakiriyāya ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti ^b^pātī,^eb^ puthujjano. aniccatāya vā bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭiyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti ^b^pātī,^eb^ maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa pātanasīloti ^b^pātī,^eb^ sattasantāno, cittameva vā. taṃ pātinaṃ saṃsāradukkhato mokkhetīti pātimokkhaṃ. cittassa hi vimokkhena satto ``vimutto''ti vuccati. vuttaṃ hi ``cittavodānā visujjhantī''ti, ``anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ vimutta''nti (mahāva0 28) ca. atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti ^b^pātī,^eb^ ``avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata''nti (saṃ0 ni0 2.124) hi vuttaṃ. tassa pātino sattassa taṇhādisaṃkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkhaṃ ^a^M1.0040^ea^. ``kaṇṭhekāḷo''tiādīnaṃ viyassa samāsasiddhi veditabbā. atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti ^b^pāti,^eb^ cittaṃ. vuttaṃ hi ``cittena nīyati loko, cittena parikassatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.62). tassa pātino mokkho etenāti pātimokkhaṃ, patati vā etena apāyadukkhe, saṃsāradukkhe cāti ^b^pātī,^eb^ taṇhādisaṃkileso. vuttaṃ hi ``taṇhā janeti purisaṃ (saṃ0 ni0 1.55-57), taṇhādutiyo puriso''ti (itivu0 15, 105; a0 ni0 4.9; mahāni0 191; cūḷani0 pārāyanānugītigāthāniddesa) ca ādi. tato pātito mokkhoti pātimokkhaṃ. atha vā patati etthāti pātīni, cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni. vuttaṃ hi ``chasu loko samuppanno, chasu kubbati santhava''nti (saṃ0 ni0 1.70; su0 ni0 171). tato chājjhattikabāhirāyatanasaṅkhātato pātito mokkhoti pātimokkhaṃ. atha vā pāto vinipāto assa ^a^V1.0038^ea^ atthīti ^b^pātī,^eb^ saṃsāro. tato mokkhoti pātimokkhaṃ, atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā ``patī''ti vuccati. muccati etenāti mokkho, patino mokkho tena paññattattāti patimokkho, patimokkho eva pātimokkhaṃ. sabbaguṇānaṃ vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttenatthena mokkho cāti patimokkho, patimokkho eva pātimokkhaṃ. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``pātimokkhanti mukhametaṃ pamukhameta''nti (mahāva0 135) vitthāro.
