[03] atha vā pa-iti pakāre, atī-ti accantatthe nipāto, tasmā pakārehi accantaṃ mokkhetīti pātimokkhaṃ. idaṃ hi sīlaṃ sayaṃ tadaṅgavasena, samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena, samucchedavasena ca accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkhaṃ, pati pati mokkhoti vā patimokkho, tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho, patimokkho eva pātimokkhaṃ. mokkhoti vā nibbānaṃ, tassa mokkhassa paṭibimbabhūtoti patimokkho. sīlasaṃvaro hi sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo viya yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanato, patimokkhoyeva pātimokkhaṃ. atha vā mokkhaṃ pati vattati, mokkhābhimukhanti vā patimokkhaṃ, patimokkhameva pātimokkhanti evamettha pātimokkha-saddassa attho veditabbo. ^b^iriyatī^eb^ti attabhāvaṃ pavatteti. ``viharatī''ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhitassa ^a^M1.0041^ea^ bhikkhuno iriyāpathavihāro dassito. ^b^pāḷiya^eb^nti ^b^jhānavibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (vibha0 508 ādayo).

[03] tattha kāmaṃ samaṇacāraṃ, samaṇagocarañca dassetuṃ ^b^``ācāragocarasampanno''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, yathā pana maggaṃ ācikkhanto ``vāmaṃ muñca, dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhā''ti vajjetabbapubbakaṃ gahetabbaṃ vadeyya, yathā vā sasīsanhānena pahīnasedamalajallikassa mālāgandhavilepanādivibhūsanasaṃvidhānaṃ yuttarūpaṃ, evaṃ pahīnapāpadhammassa kalyāṇadhammasamāyogo yuttarūpoti ``atthi ācāro, atthi anācāro''ti dvayaṃ uddisitvā anācāraṃ tāva vibhajituṃ ^b^``tattha katamo anācāro''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^kāyiko vītikkamo^eb^ti tividhaṃ kāyaduccaritaṃ. ^b^vācasiko vītikkamo^eb^ti catubbidhaṃ vacīduccaritaṃ. ^b^kāyikavācasiko^eb^ti tadubhayaṃ.

[03] evaṃ ājīvaṭṭhamakasīlassa vītikkamo dassito. idāni mānasaṃ anācāraṃ dassetuṃ ``sabbampi ^a^V1.0039^ea^ dussīlyaṃ anācāro''ti vatvā tattha ekacciyaṃ dassento ^b^``idhekacco veḷudānena vā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^veḷudānenā^eb^ti paccayuppādanatthena veḷudānena. ^b^pattadānā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^veḷū^eb^ti manussānaṃ payojanāvaho yo koci veḷudaṇḍo. ^b^pattaṃ^eb^ gandhikādīnaṃ gandhapaliveṭhanādiatthaṃ vā, tālanāḷikerādipattaṃ vā. ^b^pupphaṃ^eb^ yaṃ kiñci manussānaṃ payojanāvahaṃ. tathā ^b^phalaṃ. sinānaṃ^eb^ sirīsacuṇṇādinhāniyacuṇṇaṃ. mattikāpi ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchati. ^b^dantakaṭṭhaṃ^eb^ yaṃ kiñci mukhasodhanatthaṃ dantaponaṃ. ^b^cāṭukamyatā^eb^ attānaṃ dāsaṃ viya nīcaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā parassa khalitavacanaṃ saṇṭhapetvā piyakāmatāya paggayhavacanaṃ. ^b^muggasūpyatā^eb^ti muggasūpasamatā saccālikena jīvitakappanaṃ. yathā hi muggasūpe paccante bahū muggā paccanti, katipayā na paccanti, evaṃ saccālikena jīvitakappane bahu alikaṃ hoti, appakaṃ saccanti. paribhaṭatīti paribhaṭo, paresaṃ dārake pariharanto. paribhaṭassa kammaṃ ^b^pāribhaṭyaṃ,^eb^ sā eva ^b^pāribhaṭyatā,^eb^ alaṅkaraṇādinā kuladārakapariharaṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ. tesaṃ tesaṃ gihīnaṃ gāmantaradesantarādīsu sāsanapaṭisāsanaharaṇaṃ ^b^jaṅghapesanikaṃ. aññataraññatarenā^eb^ti etesaṃ vā veḷudānādīnaṃ vejjakammabhaṇḍāgārikakammapiṇḍapaṭipiṇḍakammasaṅghuppādacetiyuppādapaṭṭhapanādīnaṃ vā micchājīvena jīvitakappanakakammānaṃ yena kenaci ^a^M1.0042^ea^. ^b^buddhapaṭikuṭṭhenā^eb^ti buddhehi garahitena paṭisiddhena. ^b^micchājīvenā^eb^ti na sammāājīvena. ^b^ayaṃ vuccati anācāro^eb^ti ayaṃ sabbopi ``anācāro''ti kathīyati. ācāraniddeso vuttapaṭipakkhanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] gocaraniddesepi paṭhamaṃ agocarassa vacane kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^gocaro^eb^ti piṇḍapātādīnaṃ atthāya upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhānaṃ. ayuttaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^agocaro^eb^. vesiyā gocaro assāti ^b^vesiyāgocaro,^eb^ mittasanthavavasena upasaṅkamitabbaṭṭhānanti attho. vesiyā nāma rūpūpajīviniyo, tā mittasanthavavasena na upasaṅkamitabbā, samaṇabhāvassa antarāyakarattā, parisuddhāsayassāpi garahahetuto, tasmā dakkhiṇādānavasena satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāva upasaṅkamitabbā. ^b^vidhavā^eb^ vuccanti matapatikā, pavutthapatikā vā. ^b^thullakumārikā^eb^ti mahallikā aniviṭṭhakumāriyo, ^b^paṇḍakā^eb^ti napuṃsakā. te hi ussannakilesā avūpasantapariḷāhā lokāmisasannissitakathābahulā, tasmā na upasaṅkamitabbā. ^b^bhikkhuniyo^eb^ nāma ussannabrahmacariyā. tathā bhikkhūpi. tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ visabhāgavatthubhāvato santhavavasena upasaṅkamane katipāheneva brahmacariyantarāyo siyā, tasmā na upasaṅkamitabbā. gilānapucchanādivasena upasaṅkamane satokārinā bhavitabbaṃ. ^b^pānāgāra^eb^nti surāpānagharaṃ. taṃ soṇḍajanehi ^a^V1.0040^ea^ avivittaṃ hoti. tattha tehi soṇḍatādivasena na upasaṅkamitabbaṃ brahmacariyantarāyakarattā. ^b^saṃsaṭṭho viharati rājūhī^eb^tiādīsu ^b^rājāno^eb^ nāma ye rajjamanusāsanti. ^b^rājamahāmattā^eb^ rājissariyasadisāya issariyamattāya samannāgatā. ^b^titthiyā^eb^ti viparītadassanā bāhirakaparibbājakā. ^b^titthiyasāvakā^eb^ti tesu daḷhabhattā paccayadāyakā. ^b^ananulomikena saṃsaggenā^eb^ti tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ ananulomikena paccanīkabhūtena saṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho viharati, yena brahmacariyantarāyaṃ vā sallekhaparihāniṃ vā pāpuṇāti.

[03] idāni aparenapi pariyāyena agocaraṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``yāni vā pana tānī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^assaddhānī^eb^ti buddhādīsu saddhāvirahitāni. tato eva ^b^appasannāni,^eb^ kammakammaphalasaddhāya vā abhāvena ^b^assaddhāni^eb^. ratanattayappasādābhāvena ^b^appasannāni. akkosakaparibhāsakānī^eb^ti akkosavatthūhi ^a^M1.0043^ea^ akkosakāni ceva bhayadassanena santajjanakāni ca. atthaṃ na icchanti anatthameva icchantīti ^b^anatthakāmāni^eb^. hitaṃ na icchanti ahitameva icchantīti ^b^ahitakāmāni^eb^. phāsu na icchanti aphāsuṃyeva icchantīti ^b^aphāsukakāmāni^eb^. yogakkhemaṃ nibbhayaṃ na icchanti, ayogakkhemameva icchantīti ^b^ayogakkhemakāmāni. bhikkhūna^eb^nti ettha sāmaṇerānampi saṅgaho. ^b^bhikkhunīna^eb^nti ettha sikkhamānasāmaṇerīnaṃ. sabbesaṃ hi sāsanikānaṃ anatthakāmatādīpanapadamidaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^tathārūpāni kulānī^eb^ti tādisāni khattiyakulādīni. ^b^sevatī^eb^ti nissāya jīvati. ^b^bhajatī^eb^ti upasaṅkamati. ^b^payirupāsatī^eb^ti punappunaṃ upagacchati. ^b^ayaṃ vuccatī^eb^ti ayaṃ vesiyādiko, rājādiko, assaddhakulādiko ca taṃ taṃ sevantassa tippakāropi ayutto gocaroti ^b^agocaro^eb^. ettha hi vesiyādiko pañcakāmaguṇanissayato ^b^agocaro^eb^. yathāha ``ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno agocaro paravisayo? yadidaṃ pañca kāmaguṇā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.372). rājādiko samaṇadhammassa anupanissayato, lābhasakkārāsanivicakkanippothanadiṭṭhivipattihetuto ca. assaddhakulādiko saddhāhānicittasantāsāvahato ^b^agocaro^eb^.

[03] gocaraniddese ``na vesiyāgocaro''tiādīni vuttapaṭipakkhavasena veditabbāni. ^b^opānabhūtānī^eb^ti udapānabhūtāni bhikkhusaṅghassa, bhikkhunīsaṅghassa ca catumahāpathe khatapokkharaṇī viya yathāsukhaṃ ogāhanakkhamāni. ^b^kāsāvapajjotānī^eb^ti bhikkhūnaṃ, bhikkhunīnañca nivatthapārutakāsāvānaṃyeva pabhāhi ekobhāsāni. ^b^isivātapaṭivātānī^eb^ti gehaṃ pavisantānaṃ ^a^V1.0041^ea^, nikkhamantānañca bhikkhubhikkhunīsaṅkhātānaṃ isīnaṃ cīvaravātena ceva samiñjanapasāraṇādijanitasarīravātena ca paṭivātāni pavāyitāni viniddhutakibbisāni vā.

[03] idāni niddese āgatanayenāpi ācāragocare dassetuṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ pātimokkhasīlaniddese. ^b^imināpi nayenā^eb^ti idāni vuccamānavidhināpi. ^b^saṅghagato^eb^ti saṅghasannipātaṃ gato. ^b^acittīkārakato^eb^ti akatacittīkāro, akatagāravoti attho. ^b^ghaṭṭayanto^eb^ti sarīrena, cīvarena vā ghaṃsanto. puratopi tiṭṭhati acittīkārakatoti ^a^M1.0044^ea^ sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^ṭhitakopī^eb^ti upari tiṭṭhanto viya āsannataraṭṭhāne ṭhitakopi bhaṇati. ^b^bāhāvikkhepako^eb^ti bāhuṃ vikkhipanto. ^b^anupāhanāna^eb^nti anādare sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^saupāhano^eb^ti upāhanāruḷho. ^b^there bhikkhū anupakhajjā^eb^ti therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ anupavisitvā tesaṃ āsannataraṭṭhānaṃ upagantvā. ^b^kaṭṭhaṃ pakkhipati^eb^ aggikuṇḍe. ^b^vokkammā^eb^ti passato atikkamitvā. ^b^gūḷhāni^eb^ sabhāvato paṭicchannāni sāṇipākārādinā paṭicchāditāni. ^b^anāpucchā^eb^ti anāpucchitvā. ^b^assā^eb^ti anācārassa.

[03] ^b^apica bhikkhū^eb^tiādi sabbasseva bhikkhuno ācāradassanavasena pavattaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ, na niddesapāḷi. saddhāsīlasutacāgādiguṇahetuko garubhāvo garukaraṇaṃ vā gāravo, saha gāravenāti ^b^sagāravo^eb^. garuṭṭhāniyesu gāravasārajjādivasena paṭissāyanā patissā, sappatissavapaṭipatti. saha patissāyāti ^b^sappatisso^eb^. savisesaṃ hirimanatāya, ottappibhāvena ca ^b^hirottappasampanno^eb^. sekhiyadhammapāripūrivasena ^b^sunivattho supāruto. pāsādikenā^eb^ti pasādāvahena, itthambhūtalakkhaṇe cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. eseva nayo ito paresupi chasu padesu. ^b^abhikkantenā^eb^ti abhikkamena. ^b^iriyāpathasampanno^eb^ti sampannairiyāpatho. tena sesairiyāpathānampi pāsādikatamāha. ^b^indriyesu guttadvāro^eb^ti cakkhundriyādīsu chasu dvāresu susaṃvihitārakkho. ^b^bhojane mattaññū^eb^ti paribhuñjitabbato bhojanasaññite catubbidhepi paccaye pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogādivasena sabbaso pamāṇaññū. ^b^jāgariyamanuyutto^eb^ti pubbarattāpararattaṃ bhāvanāmanasikārasaṅkhātaṃ jāgariyaṃ sātaccakāritāvasena anu anu yutto tattha yuttapayutto. ^b^satisampajaññena samannāgato^eb^tiādi yathāvuttassa ācārassa sambhāradassanaṃ. tattha ^b^appiccho^eb^ti nīccho. ^b^santuṭṭho^eb^ti yathālābhādivasena santosena tuṭṭho. ^b^sakkaccakārī^eb^ti ādarakārī. ^b^garucittīkārabahulo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0042^ea^ garuṭṭhāniyesu garukaraṇabahulo. ^b^ayaṃ vuccati ācāro^eb^ti ayaṃ sagāravatādi atthakāmehi ācaritabbato ācāro.

[03] sīlādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ upanissayabhūto ^b^upanissayagocaro^eb^. satisaṅkhāto cittassa ārakkhabhūto eva gocaro ^b^ārakkhagocaro^eb^. kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāto cittassa upanibandhanaṭṭhānabhūto gocaro ^b^upanibandhagocaro^eb^. appicchatādīhi ^a^M1.0045^ea^ dasahi vivaṭṭanissitāya kathāya vatthubhūtehi guṇehi samannāgato ^b^dasakathāvatthuguṇasamannāgato^eb^. tato eva kalyāṇo sundaro mittoti ^b^kalyāṇamitto^eb^. tassa lakkhaṇaṃ parato āgamissati. ^b^assutaṃ^eb^ suttageyyādiṃ. ^b^suṇātī^eb^ti sutamayaṃ ñāṇaṃ uppādeti. ^b^sutaṃ pariyodāpetī^eb^ti tameva yathāsutaṃ avisadatāya apariyodātaṃ punappunaṃ paripucchanādinā visodheti nijjaṭaṃ nigumbaṃ karoti. tattha ca ye kaṅkhaṭṭhāniyā dhammā, tesu saṃsayaṃ chindanto ^b^kaṅkhaṃ vitarati^eb^. kammakammaphalesu, ratanattaye ca sammādiṭṭhiyā ujukaraṇena ^b^diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karoti^eb^. tato eva ca duvidhāyapi saddhāsampadāya ^b^cittaṃ pasādeti^eb^. atha vā yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ pariyodapetvā tatthāgate rūpārūpadhamme pariggahetvā sapaccayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pariggaṇhanto sattadiṭṭhivaṅkavidhamanena ^b^diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karoti^eb^. dhammānaṃ paccayapaccayuppannatāmattadassanena tīsupi addhāsu ^b^kaṅkhaṃ vitarati^eb^. tato paraṃ ca udayabbayañāṇādivasena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyabhūmiṃ okkamanto aveccapasādena ratanattaye ^b^cittaṃ pasādeti^eb^. tathābhūtova tassa kalyāṇamittassa anusikkhanena saddhādīhi guṇehi na hāyati, aññadatthu vaḍḍhateva. tenāha ^b^``yassa vā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ^b^antaraghara^eb^nti antare antare gharāni ettha, taṃ etassāti vā ``antaraghara''nti laddhanāmaṃ gocaragāmaṃ paviṭṭho. tattha ghare ghare bhikkhāpariyesanāya vīthiṃ paṭipanno. ^b^okkhittacakkhū^eb^ti heṭṭhākhittacakkhu. kittakena pana okkhittacakkhu hotīti āha ^b^``yugamattadassāvī''^eb^ti. ^b^susaṃvuto^eb^ti saṃyato. yathā panettha susaṃvuto nāma hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``na hatthiṃ olokento''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.
[03] ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yesu satipaṭṭhānesu. ^b^cittaṃ^eb^ bhāvanācittaṃ. ^b^upanibandhatī^eb^ti upanetvā nibandhati. vuttañhetaṃ --
[21] ``yathā ^a^V1.0043^ea^ thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṃ damaṃ naro idha.
[22] bandheyyevaṃ sakaṃ cittaṃ, satiyārammaṇe daḷha''nti.. (visuddhi0 1.217; dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.374; ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.107; pārā0 aṭṭha0 2.165; paṭi0 ma0 aṭṭha0 2.1.163).
[03] satipaṭṭhānānaṃ upanibandhagocarabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``vuttañheta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sako pettiko visayo^eb^ti attano pitu sammāsambuddhassa santako, tena diṭṭho dassito ca visayo.

[03] ^b^aṇuppamāṇesū^eb^ti ^a^M1.0046^ea^ paramāṇuppamāṇesu. ^b^asañciccāapannasekhiyākusalacittuppādādibhedesū^eb^ti asañcicca āpannasekhiyesu akusalacittuppādādibhedesūti evaṃ asañciccaggahaṇaṃ sekhiyavisesanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. sekhiyaggahaṇena cettha ^b^vattakkhandhakādīsu^eb^ (cūḷava0 356 ādayo) āgatavattādīnampi gahaṇaṃ. tepi hi sikkhitabbaṭṭhena ``sekhiyā''ti icchitā. tathā hi ^b^mātikāyaṃ^eb^ pārājikādīnaṃ viya sekhiyānaṃ paricchedo na kato. evañca katvā ``asañcicca āpannasekhiyā''ti asañciccaggahaṇaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. na hi ^b^mātikāyaṃ^eb^ āgatesu pañcasattatiyā sekhiyesu nosaññāvimokkho nāma atthi, asañciccaggahaṇeneva cettha asatiajānanānampi saṅgaho kato. keci panettha asiñcicca āpannaggahaṇena acittakāpattiyo gahitāti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ, garukāpattīsupi kāsañci acittakabhāvasabbhāvato, adhiṭṭhānāvikammassa, desanāvikammasseva vā sabbalahukassa vajjassa idhādhippetattā. tenāha ``yāni tāni vajjāni appamattakāni oramattakāni lahukāni lahusammatānī''tiādi. ādisaddena pātimokkhasaṃvaravisuddhatthaṃ anatikkamanīyānaṃ anāpattigamanīyānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^bhayadassanasīlo^eb^ti paramāṇumattaṃ vajjaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhiyojanasatasahassubbedhasinerupabbatasadisaṃ katvā dassanasabhāvo, sabbalahukaṃ vā dubbhāsitamattaṃ pārājikasadisaṃ katvā dassanasabhāvo. ^b^yaṃ kiñcī^eb^ti mūlapaññattianupaññattisabbatthapaññattipadesapaññattiādibhedaṃ yaṃ kiñci sikkhitabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ pūretabbaṃ sīlaṃ. ^b^sammā ādāyā^eb^ti sammadeva sakkaccaṃ, sabbaso ca ādiyitvā. ayaṃ pana ācāragocarasampadā kiṃ pātimokkhasīle pariyāpannā, udāhu apariyāpannāti? pariyāpannā. yadi evaṃ kasmā puna vuttāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``ettha cā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ ^a^V1.0044^ea^ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlassa sambhārabhūtaṃ, tasmiṃ satiyeva icchitabbanti vuttaṃ ^b^``soti pātimokkhasaṃvarasīle ṭhito bhikkhū''^eb^ti. sampādite hi etasmiṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlaṃ suguttaṃ surakkhitameva hoti, susaṃvihitakaṇṭakavati viya sassanti. ^b^kāraṇavasenā^eb^ti asādhāraṇakāraṇassa vasena. asādhāraṇakāraṇavasena ^a^M1.0047^ea^ hi phalaṃ apadisīyati, yathā yavaṅkuro bherisaddoti. nissayavohārena vā etaṃ nissitavacanaṃ, yathā mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontīti. ^b^rūpa^eb^nti rūpāyatanaṃ. ^b^cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā^eb^ti ettha yadi cakkhu rūpaṃ passeyya, aññaviññāṇasamaṅginopi passeyyuṃ, na cetaṃ atthi, kasmā? acetanattā cakkhussa. tenāha ^b^``cakkhu rūpaṃ na passati acittakattā''^eb^ti. atha viññāṇaṃ rūpaṃ passeyya, tirokuṭṭādigatampi naṃ passeyya appaṭighabhāvato, idampi natthi sabbassa viññāṇassa dassanābhāvato. tenāha ^b^``cittaṃ na passati acakkhukattā''^eb^ti. tattha yathā cakkhusannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ passati, na yaṃ kiñci. tañca kenaci kuṭṭādinā antarite na uppajjati, yattha ālokassa vibandho. yattha pana na vibandho phalikagabbhapaṭalādike, tattha antaritepi uppajjateva. evaṃ viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ cakkhu passati, na yaṃ kiñcīti viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ cakkhuṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^``cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^dvārārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭe^eb^ti dvārassa ārammaṇena saṅghaṭṭe sati, cakkhussa rūpārammaṇe āpāthagateti adhippāyo. ^b^pasādavatthukena cittenā^eb^ti cakkhupasādavatthukena tannissāya pavattena viññāṇena, yaṃ ``cakkhuviññāṇa''nti vuccati. ^b^passatī^eb^ti oloketi. cakkhupasādasannissaye hi viññāṇe ālokānuggahitaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ sannissayaguṇena obhāsente taṃsamaṅgipuggalo ``rūpaṃ passatī''ti vuccati. obhāsanañcettha ārammaṇassa yathāsabhāvato vibhāvanaṃ, yaṃ ``paccakkhato gahaṇa''nti vuccati. usunā lakkhassa vedhe sijjhante tassa sambhārabhūtena dhanunā vijjhatīti vacanaṃ viya viññāṇena rūpadassane sijjhante cakkhunā rūpaṃ passatīti ^b^īdisī sasambhārakathā nāmesā hoti^eb^. sasambhārā kathā ^b^sasambhārakathā,^eb^ dassanassa kāraṇasahitāti attho. sasambhārassa vā dassanassa kathā ^b^sasambhārakathā. tasmā^eb^ti yasmā kevalena cakkhunā, kevalena vā viññāṇena rūpadassanaṃ natthi, tasmā.

[03] ^b^itthipurisanimittaṃ vā^eb^ti ettha itthisantānanissitarūpamukhena gayhamānaṃ saṇṭhānaṃ thanamaṃsāvisadatā ^a^V1.0045^ea^ nimmassumukhatā kesabandhanavatthaggahaṇaṃ avisadaṭṭhānagamanādi ca sabbaṃ ``itthī''ti sañjānanassa kāraṇabhāvato ^b^itthinimittaṃ^eb^. vuttavipariyāyato ^b^purisanimittaṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ. ^b^subhanimittādikaṃ vā^eb^ti ettha rāguppattihetubhūto iṭṭhākāro ^b^subhanimittaṃ. ādi^eb^-saddena paṭighanimittādīnaṃ ^a^M1.0048^ea^ saṅgaho. so pana dosuppattiādihetubhūto aniṭṭhādiākāro veditabbo. kāmañcettha pāḷiyaṃ abhijjhādomanassāva sarūpato āgatā, upekkhānimittassāpi pana saṅgaho icchitabbo, asamapekkhanena uppajjanakamohassāpi asaṃvarabhāvato. tathā hi vakkhati ``muṭṭhasaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā''ti. ^b^upekkhānimitta^eb^nti cettha aññāṇupekkhāya vatthubhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, tañcassa asamapekkhanavasena veditabbaṃ. evaṃ saṅkhepato rāgadosamohānaṃ kāraṇaṃ ``subhanimittādika''nti vuttaṃ. tenāha ^b^``kilesavatthubhūtaṃ nimitta''^eb^nti. ^b^diṭṭhamatteyeva saṇṭhātī^eb^ti ``diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī''ti (udā0 10) sutte vuttanayena vaṇṇāyatane cakkhuviññāṇena, vīthicittehi ca gahitamatteyeva tiṭṭhati, na tato paraṃ kiñci subhādiākāraṃ parikappeti. ^b^pākaṭabhāvakaraṇato^eb^ti paribyattabhāvakaraṇato vibhūtabhāvakaraṇato. visabhāgavatthuno hi hatthādiavayavesu subhādito parikappentassa aparāparaṃ tattha uppajjamānā kilesā paribyattā hontīti te tesaṃ ^b^anubyañjanā^eb^ nāma. te pana yasmā tathā tathā sanniviṭṭhānaṃ bhūtupādāyarūpānaṃ sannivesākāro. na hi taṃ muñcitvā paramatthato hatthādi nāma koci atthi. tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``hatthapāda...pe0... ākāraṃ na gaṇhātī''^eb^ti. kiṃ pana gaṇhātīti āha ^b^``yaṃ tattha bhūtaṃ, tadeva gaṇhātī''^eb^ti. yaṃ tasmiṃ sarīre vijjamānaṃ kesalomādi bhūtupādāyamattaṃ vā, tadeva yāthāvato gaṇhāti. tattha asubhākāragahaṇassa nidassanaṃ dassento ^b^``cetiyapabbatavāsī''^eb^tiādinā mahātissattheravatthuṃ āhari.

[03] tattha ^b^sumaṇḍitapasādhitā^eb^ti suṭṭhu maṇḍitā pasādhitā ca. ābharaṇādīhi āhārimehi maṇḍanaṃ. sarīrassa ucchādanādivasena paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ pasādhananti vadanti, ābharaṇehi, pana vatthālaṅkārādīhi ca alaṅkaraṇaṃ pasādhanaṃ. ūnaṭṭhānapūraṇaṃ maṇḍanaṃ. ^b^vipallatthacittā^eb^ti rāgavasena viparītacittā. ^b^olokento^eb^ti thero kammaṭṭhānamanasikāreneva gacchanto saddakaṇṭakattā pubbabhāgamanasikārassa hasitasaddānusārena ``kimeta''nti olokento. ^b^asubhasañña^eb^nti aṭṭhikasaññaṃ. aṭṭhikakammaṭṭhānaṃ hi thero tadā pariharati. ^b^arahattaṃ pāpuṇī^eb^ti thero ^a^M1.0049^ea^ kira tassā hasantiyā dantaṭṭhidassaneneva pubbabhāgabhāvanāya subhāvitattā paṭibhāganimittaṃ, sātisayañca upacārajjhānaṃ labhitvā yathāṭhitova tattha paṭhamajjhānaṃ adhigantvā taṃ pādakaṃ katvā ^a^V1.0046^ea^ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggaparamparāya āsavakkhayaṃ pāpuṇi. ^b^pubbasaññaṃ anussarī^eb^ti pubbakaṃ yathāraddhaṃ kālena kālaṃ anuyuñjiyamānaṃ aṭṭhikakammaṭṭhānaṃ anussari samannāhari. ^b^anumagga^eb^nti anupathaṃ tassā padānupadaṃ. therassa kira bhāvanāya paguṇabhāvato dantaṭṭhidassaneneva tassā sakalasarīraṃ aṭṭhikasaṅghātabhāvena upaṭṭhāsi. na taṃ ``itthī''ti vā ``puriso''ti vā sañjāni. tenāha ^b^``nābhijānāmi...pe0... mahāpathe''^eb^ti.

[01] ^b^``yassa cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetū''^eb^ti vatvā puna ^b^``tassa cakkhundriyassa satikavāṭena pidahanatthāyā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, na asaṃvarassāti. yadidaṃ yaṃ cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetu abhijjhādianvāssavanaṃ dassitaṃ, taṃ asaṃvutacakkhundriyasseva hetu pavattaṃ dassitanti katvā vuttaṃ. cakkhudvārikassa hi abhijjhādianvāssavanassa taṃdvārikaviññāṇassa viya cakkhundriyaṃ padhānakāraṇaṃ. cakkhundriyassa asaṃvutatte sati te anvāssavantīti asaṃvariyamānacakkhundriyahetuko so asaṃvaro tathā vuttoti. yatvādhikaraṇanti hi yassa cakkhundriyassa kāraṇāti attho. kīdisassa ca kāraṇāti? asaṃvutassa, kiñca asaṃvutaṃ? yassa cakkhundriyāsaṃvarassa hetu abhijjhādayo anvāssavanti, ^b^tassa saṃvarāyā^eb^ti ayamettha yojanā.

[03] ^b^javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā^eb^tiādi puna avacanatthaṃ idheva sabbaṃ vuttanti chasu dvāresu yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbaṃ. na hi pañcadvāre kāyavacīduccaritasaṅkhātaṃ dussīlyaṃ atthi, tasmā dussīlyāsaṃvaro manodvāravasena, sesāsaṃvaro chadvāravasena yojetabbo. muṭṭhasaccādīnaṃ hi satipaṭipakkhākusaladhammādibhāvato siyā pañcadvāre uppatti, na tveva kāyikavācasikavītikkamabhūtassa dussīlyassa tattha uppatti, pañcadvārikajavanānaṃ aviññattijanakattā. dussīlyādayo cettha pañca asaṃvarā sīlasaṃvarādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ saṃvarānaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvena vuttā. ^b^tasmiṃ satī^eb^ti tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati.

[03] ^b^yathā^eb^ ^a^M1.0050^ea^ ^b^ki^eb^nti yena pakārena javane uppajjamāno asaṃvaro ``cakkhundriye asaṃvaro''ti vuccati, taṃ nidassanaṃ kinti attho. ^b^yathā^eb^tiādinā nagaradvāre asaṃvare sati taṃsambandhānaṃ gharādīnaṃ asaṃvutatā viya javane asaṃvare sati taṃsambandhānaṃ dvārādīnaṃ asaṃvutatāti evaṃ aññāsaṃvare aññāsaṃvutatā sāmaññameva nidasseti, na pubbāparasāmaññaṃ, antobahisāmaññaṃ vā. sati vā dvārabhavaṅgādike puna uppajjamānaṃ javanaṃ bāhiraṃ viya katvā nagaradvārasamānaṃ vuttaṃ ^a^V1.0047^ea^, itarañca antonagare gharādisamānaṃ. paccayabhāvena hi purimanipphannaṃ javanakāle asantampi bhavaṅgādi cakkhādi viya phalanipphattiyā santaṃyeva nāma hoti. na hi dharamānaṃyeva ``santa''nti vuccati. ``bāhiraṃ viya katvā''ti ca paramatthato javanassa bāhirabhāve, itarassa ca abbhantarabhāve asatipi ``pabhassaramidaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, tañca kho āgantukehi upakkiliṭṭha''ntiādi (a0 ni0 1.49) vacanato āgantukabhūtassa kadāci kadāci uppajjamānassa javanassa bāhirabhāvo, tabbidhurasabhāvassa itarassa abbhantarabhāvo ekena pariyāyena hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. javane vā asaṃvare uppanne tato paraṃ dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṃ asaṃvarahetubhāvāpattito. asaṃvarassa hi uppattiyā dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṃ tassa hetubhāvo paññāyatīti. nagaradvārasadisena javanena pavisitvā dussīlyādicorānaṃ dvārabhavaṅgādīsu musanaṃ kusalabhaṇḍavināsanaṃ kathitaṃ. yasmiṃ hi dvāre asaṃvaro uppajjati, so tattha dvārādīnaṃ saṃvarūpanissayabhāvaṃ upacchindantoyeva pavattatīti. dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṃ javanena saha sambandho ekasantatipariyāpannato daṭṭhabbo.

[03] ettha ca cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe āpāthagate niyamitādivasena kusalākusalajavane sattakkhattuṃ uppajjitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇe tadanurūpameva manodvārikajavane tasmiṃyevārammaṇe sattakkhattuṃyeva uppajjitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇe puna tasmiṃyeva dvāre tadevārammaṇaṃ nissāya ``itthī puriso''tiādinā vavatthapentaṃ pasādarajjanādivasena sattakkhattuṃ javanaṃ javati. evaṃ pavattamānaṃ javanaṃ sandhāya ^b^``javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi agutta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^tasmiṃ^eb^ pana javane. ^b^sīlādīsū^eb^ti sīlasaṃvarasatisaṃvarañāṇasaṃvarakhantisaṃvaravīriyasaṃvaresu ^b^uppannesu^eb^. yathā hi pageva satiārakkhaṃ anupaṭṭhapentassa ^a^M1.0051^ea^ dussīlyādīnaṃ uppatti, evaṃ pageva satiārakkhaṃ upaṭṭhapentassa sīlādīnaṃ uppatti veditabbā. saddādīsupi yathārahaṃ nimittānubyañjanāni veditabbāni. sotaviññāṇena hi saddaṃ sutvā ``itthisaddo''ti vā ``purisasaddo''ti vā iṭṭhāniṭṭhādikaṃ vā kilesavatthubhūtaṃ nimittaṃ na gaṇhāti, sutamatte eva saṇṭhāti. yo ca gītasaddādikassa kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanato ``anubyañjana''nti laddhavohāro mandatārādivasena vavatthito chajjādibhedabhinno ākāro, tampi na gaṇhātīti. evaṃ gandhādīsupi yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ. manodvāre pana sāvajjanabhavaṅgaṃ manodvāraṃ tasmiṃ dvāre dhammārammaṇe ^a^V1.0048^ea^ āpāthagate taṃ javanamanasāva viññāya vijānitvātiādinā yojetabbaṃ. kileso anubandho etassāti kilesānubandho, so eva nimittādigāho, tato parivajjanalakkhaṇaṃ ^b^kilesānubandhanimittādiggāhaparivajjanalakkhaṇaṃ. ādi^eb^-saddena anubyañjanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ ^b^vutte^eb^ti idheva uddesavasena pubbe vutte. tathā hi ``ājīvahetu paññattānaṃ channaṃ sikkhāpadāna''nti paduddhāraṃ katvā tāni pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ ^b^``yāni tānī''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha yāni tāni evaṃ paññattāni cha sikkhāpadānīti sambandho. ^b^ājīvahetū^eb^ti jīvikanimittaṃ, ``evāhaṃ paccayehi akilamanto jīvissāmī''ti adhippāyena. ^b^ājīvakāraṇā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^pāpiccho^eb^ti pāpikāya asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya samannāgato. ^b^icchāpakato^eb^ti icchāya apakato upadduto, abhibhūto vā. ^b^asanta^eb^nti avijjamānaṃ. ^b^abhūta^eb^nti anuppannaṃ. anuppannattā hi tassa taṃ asantanti purimassa pacchimaṃ kāraṇavacanaṃ. ^b^uttarimanussadhamma^eb^nti uttarimanussānaṃ ukkaṭṭhapurisānaṃ dhammaṃ, manussadhammato vā uttari ukkaṭṭhaṃ. ^b^ullapatī^eb^ti uggatāyuko lapati. sīlaṃ hi bhikkhuno āyu, taṃ tassa tathālapanasamakālameva vigacchati. tenāha ^b^``āpatti pārājikassā''^eb^ti pārājikasaṅkhātā āpatti assa, pārājikasaññitassa vā vītikkamassa āpajjanaṃ ullapananti attho. ^b^sañcarittaṃ samāpajjatī^eb^ti sañcaraṇabhāvaṃ āpajjati, itthiyā vā purisamatiṃ, purisassa vā itthimatiṃ ārocetīti adhippāyo. ``imesaṃ channaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ vītikkamassa vasenā''ti sambandho heṭṭhā dassito eva.
[03] ^b^kuhanātiādīsū^eb^ti ^a^M1.0052^ea^ heṭṭhā uddiṭṭhapāḷiyāva paduddhāro. ^b^ayaṃ pāḷī^eb^ti ayaṃ ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ (vibha0 861) āgatā niddesapāḷi.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ cīvarādipaccayā labbhantīti lābhā. te eva sakkaccaṃ ādaravasena diyyamānā sakkārā. patthaṭayasatā kittisaddo. taṃ ^b^lābhañca sakkārañca kittisaddañca. sannissitassā^eb^ti ettha taṇhānissayo adhippetoti āha ^b^``patthayantassā''^eb^ti. ^b^asantaguṇadīpanakāmassā^eb^ti asante attani avijjamāne saddhādiguṇe sambhāvetukāmassa. asantaguṇasambhāvanatālakkhaṇā, paṭiggahaṇe ^a^V1.0049^ea^ ca amattaññutālakkhaṇā hi pāpicchatā. ^b^icchāya apakatassā^eb^ti pāpikāya icchāya sammāājīvato apeto katoti apakato. tathābhūto ca ājīvūpaddavena upaddutoti katvā āha ^b^``upaddutassāti attho''^eb^ti.

[03] kuhanameva paccayuppādanassa vatthūti ^b^kuhanavatthu. tividhampetaṃ^eb^ tattha āgataṃ tassa nissayabhūtāya imāya pāḷiyā ^b^dassetu^eb^nti evamattho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^tadatthikassevā^eb^ti tehi cīvarādīhi atthikasseva. ^b^paṭikkhipanenā^eb^ti cīvarādīnaṃ paṭikkhipanahetu. ^b^assā^eb^ti bhaveyya. ^b^paṭiggahaṇena cā^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-saddena pubbe vuttaṃ paṭikkhipanaṃ samuccinoti.

[03] ^b^bhiyyokamyata^eb^nti bahukāmataṃ. ^b^ya^eb^nti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ, tasmā ``dhāreyyā''ti ettha yadetaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhāraṇaṃ, etaṃ samaṇassa sāruppanti yojanā. ^b^pāpaṇikānī^eb^ti āpaṇato chaḍḍitāni. ^b^nantakānī^eb^ti antarahitāni coḷakhaṇḍāni. ^b^uccinitvā^eb^ti uñchanena cinitvā saṅgahetvā. ^b^uñchācariyāyā^eb^ti uñchācariyāya laddhena. gilānassa paccayabhūtā bhesajjasaṅkhātā jīvitaparikkhārā ^b^gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā. pūtimutta^eb^nti purāṇassa, apurāṇassa ca sabbassa gomuttassetaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^pūtimuttenā^eb^ti pūtibhāvena muttena parehi chaḍḍitena, pūtibhūtena vā gomuttena. ^b^dhutavādo^eb^ti paresampi dhutaguṇavādī. ^b^sammukhībhāvā^eb^ti sammukhato vijjamānattā, labbhamānatāyāti attho.

[01] attānaṃ uttarimanussadhammādhigamassa sāmante katvā jappanaṃ ^b^sāmantajappanaṃ. mahesakkho^eb^ti mahānubhāvo, uttarimanussadhammādhigamenāti adhippāyo. ``mitto''ti sāmaññato vatvā puna taṃ viseseti ``sandiṭṭho sambhatto''ti ^a^M1.0053^ea^. diṭṭhamatto hi mitto ^b^sandiṭṭho^eb^. daḷhabhattiko ^b^sambhatto. sahāyo^eb^ti saha āyanako, sakhāti attho. sattapadino hi ``sakhā''ti vuccanti. ^b^vihāro^eb^ pākāraparicchinno sakalo āvāso. ^b^aḍḍhayogo^eb^ dīghapāsādo, garuḷasaṇṭhānapāsādotipi vadanti. ^b^pāsādo^eb^ caturassapāsādo. ^b^hammiyaṃ^eb^ muṇḍacchadanapāsādo. ^b^kūṭāgāraṃ^eb^ dvīhi kaṇṇikāhi kattabbapāsādo. ^b^aṭṭo^eb^ paṭirājūnampi paṭibāhanayogyo catupañcabhūmako paṭissayaviseso. ^b^māḷo^eb^ ekakūṭasaṅgahito anekakoṇavanto paṭissayaviseso. ^b^uddaṇḍo^eb^ agabbhikā ekadvārā dīghasālāti vadanti. apare pana bhaṇanti -- ^b^vihāro^eb^ nāma dīghamukhapāsādo. ^b^aḍḍhayogo^eb^ ekapassena chadanakasenāsanaṃ. tassa kira ekapasse bhitti uccatarā hoti, itarapasse nīcā, tena taṃ ekapassachadanakaṃ ^a^V1.0050^ea^ hoti. ^b^pāsādo^eb^ āyatacaturassapāsādo. ^b^hammiyaṃ^eb^ muṇḍacchadanaṃ candikaṅgaṇayuttaṃ. ^b^guhā^eb^ kevalā pabbataguhā. ^b^leṇaṃ^eb^ dvārabaddhaṃ. ^b^kūṭāgāraṃ^eb^ yo koci kaṇṇikābaddhapāsādo. ^b^aṭṭo^eb^ bahalabhittigehaṃ. yassa gopānasiyo aggahetvā iṭṭhakāhi eva chadanaṃ hoti. aṭṭālakākārena karīyatītipi vadanti. ^b^māḷo^eb^ vaṭṭākārena katasenāsanaṃ. ^b^uddaṇḍo^eb^ eko paṭissayaviseso. yo ``bhaṇḍasālā, udosita''ntipi vuccati. ^b^upaṭṭhānasālā^eb^ sannipatanaṭṭhānaṃ.

[03] kucchitarajabhūtāya pāpicchatāya niratthakaṃ kāyavacīvipphandaniggaṇhanaṃ korajaṃ, taṃ etassa atthīti korajiko, kohaññena saṃyatakāyo, ativiya, abhiṇhaṃ vā korajiko ^b^korajikakorajiko^eb^. atiparisaṅkitoti keci. ativiya kuho ^b^kuhakakuhako,^eb^ sātisayavimhāpakoti attho. ativiya lapo lapanako ^b^lapakalapako. mukhasambhāviko^eb^ti korajikakorajikādibhāvena pavattavacanehi attano mukhamattena aññehi sambhāviko. so evarūpo evarūpatāya eva attānaṃ paraṃ viya katvā ^b^``ayaṃ samaṇo''^eb^tiādīni katheti. ^b^gambhīra^eb^ntiādi tassā kathāya uttarimanussadhammapaṭibaddhatāya vuttaṃ.

[01] ^b^sambhāvanādhippāyakatenā^eb^ti ``kathaṃ nu kho maṃ jano `ariyo'ti vā `visesalābhī'ti vā sambhāveyyā''ti iminā adhippāyena katena. ^b^gamanaṃ saṇṭhapetī^eb^ti visesalābhīnaṃ gamanaṃ viya attano gamanaṃ sakkaccaṃ ṭhapeti ^a^M1.0054^ea^, sato sampajānova gacchanto viya hoti. ^b^paṇidhāyā^eb^ti ``arahāti maṃ jānantū''ti cittaṃ saṇṭhapetvā, patthetvā vā. ^b^samāhito viyā^eb^ti jhānasamādhinā samāhito viya. ^b^āpāthakajjhāyī^eb^ti manussānaṃ āpāthaṭṭhāne samādhisamāpanno viya nisīdanto āpāthake janassa pākaṭaṭṭhāne jhāyī. ^b^iriyāpathasaṅkhāta^eb^nti iriyāpathasaṇṭhapanasaṅkhātaṃ.

[03] ^b^paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātenā^eb^ti ayoniso uppāditānaṃ paccayānaṃ paṭisevananti evaṃ kathitena, tena vā paccayapaṭisevanena saṅkhātabbena kathitabbena. aññaṃ viya katvā attano samīpe bhaṇanaṃ ^b^sāmantajappitaṃ^eb^. ā-kārassa rassattaṃ katvā ^b^``aṭṭhapanā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. kuhanaṃ kuho, tassa ayanā pavatti ^b^kuhāyanā,^eb^ kuhassa vā puggalassa ayanā gati kiriyā ^b^kuhāyanā^eb^. kuheti, kuhena vā itoti ^b^kuhito,^eb^ kuhako.
[03] ^b^puṭṭhassā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0051^ea^ ``ko tisso, ko rājapūjito''ti puṭṭhassa. ^b^uddhaṃ katvā^eb^ti ukkhipitvā vibhavasampattiādinā paggahetvā.

[01] ^b^unnahanā^eb^ti uddhaṃ uddhaṃ bandhanā paliveṭhanā. dve kira bhikkhū ekaṃ gāmaṃ pavisitvā āsanasālāya nisīditvā ekaṃ kumārikaṃ pakkosiṃsu. tāya āgatāya tatreko ekaṃ pucchi ``ayaṃ, bhante, kassa kumārikā''ti? ``amhākaṃ upaṭṭhāyikāya telakandarikāya dhītā, imissā mātā mayi gehaṃ gate sappiṃ dadamānā ghaṭeneva deti, ayampi mātā viya ghaṭena detī''ti (vibha0 aṭṭha0 862) ukkācesi. imaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^``telakandarikavatthu cettha vattabba''^eb^nti.

[03] ^b^dhammānurūpā vā^eb^ti mattāvacanānurūpaṃ vā. mattāvacanaṃ hi ``dhammo''ti vuccati. yathāha ``subhāsitaṃ uttamamāhu santo, dhammaṃ bhaṇe nādhammaṃ taṃ dutiya''nti (saṃ0 ni0 1.213; su0 ni0 452). tena bahuṃ vippalapanamāha, saccato vā aññā subhāsitā vācā ``dhammo''ti veditabbo. muggasūpasadisakammo puggalo muggasūpyo. tenāha ^b^``ayaṃ puggalo muggasūpyoti vuccatī''^eb^ti. paribhaṭassa kammaṃ pāribhaṭyaṃ, tadeva ^b^pāribhaṭyatā^eb^.

[03] nimittena caranto, jīvanto vā nimittako, tassa bhāvo ^b^nemittikatā^eb^. attano icchāya pakāsanaṃ ^b^obhāso^eb^. ko pana soti ^a^M1.0055^ea^? ``ajja bhikkhūnaṃ paccayā dullabhā jātā''tiādikā ^b^paccayapaṭisaṃyuttakathā^eb^. icchitavatthussa samīpe kathanaṃ ^b^sāmantajappā^eb^.

[03] akkosanabhayenāpi dadeyyāti ^b^dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosanaṃ^eb^. tathā ^b^vambhanā^eb^dayo. ^b^upekkhanā^eb^ upāsakānaṃ dāyakādibhāvato bahi chaḍḍanā. ^b^khipanā^eb^ti khepavacanaṃ. taṃ pana avahasitvā vacanaṃ hotīti āha ^b^``uppaṇḍanā''^eb^ti. ^b^pāpanā^eb^ti adāyakattassa, avaṇṇassa vā patiṭṭhāpanaṃ. paresaṃ piṭṭhimaṃsakhādanasīlo parapiṭṭhimaṃsiko, tassa bhāvo ^b^parapiṭṭhimaṃsikatā. abbhaṅga^eb^nti abbhañjanaṃ. ^b^nipisitvā gandhamagganā viyā^eb^ti anippisite alabbhamānassa gandhassa nipisane lābho viya paraguṇe anippisite alabbhamānānaṃ paccayānaṃ nipisanena lābho daṭṭhabboti.
[03] nikattuṃ ^a^V1.0052^ea^ appena lābhena bahukaṃ vañcetvā gahetuṃ icchanaṃ nijigīsanaṃ, tassa bhāvo ^b^nijigīsanatā^eb^. tasseva icchanassa pavattiākāro, taṃsahajātaṃ vā gavesanakammaṃ.

[01] ^b^aṅga^eb^nti hatthapādādiaṅgāni uddissa pavattaṃ vijjaṃ. ^b^nimitta^eb^nti nimittasatthaṃ. ^b^uppāta^eb^nti ukkāpātadisāḍāha-bhūmicālādiuppātapaṭibaddhavijjaṃ. ^b^supina^eb^nti supinasatthaṃ. ^b^lakkhaṇa^eb^nti itthipurisānaṃ lakkhaṇajānanasatthaṃ. ^b^mūsikacchinna^eb^nti vatthādīnaṃ asukabhāge mūsikacchede sati idaṃ nāma phalaṃ hotīti jānanakasatthaṃ. palāsaggiādīsu iminā nāma agginā hute idaṃ nāma hotīti aggivasena homavidhānaṃ ^b^aggihomaṃ^eb^. iminā nayena ^b^dabbihomaṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena thusahomādīnaṃ, aññesañca sutte āgatānaṃ micchājīvānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. vīriyasādhanattā ājīvapārisuddhisīlassa ``paccayapariyesanavāyāmo''ti vuttaṃ. tassa ^b^pārisuddhi^eb^ anavajjabhāvo, yena dhammena samena paccayalābho hoti. na hi alaso ñāyena paccaye pariyesituṃ sakkotīti.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ ^b^paṭisaṅkhā^eb^ti ayaṃ ``sayaṃ abhiññā''tiādīsu (mahāva0 11) viya ya-kāralopena niddeso. ^b^yoniso^eb^ti cettha upāyattho yoniso-saddoti dassento āha ^b^``upāyena pathenā''^eb^ti. ^b^``paṭisaṅkhāya ñatvā''^eb^ti ^a^M1.0056^ea^ vatvā tayidaṃ paṭisaṅkhānaṃ paccavekkhaṇanti dassetuṃ ^b^``paccavekkhitvāti attho''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. yathā hi ^b^paccavekkhitvā^eb^ti sītapaṭighātādikaṃ taṃ taṃ payojanaṃ pati pati avekkhitvā, ñāṇena passitvāti attho, evaṃ ^b^paṭisaṅkhāyā^eb^ti tadeva payojanaṃ pati pati saṅkhāya, jānitvāti attho. ñāṇapariyāyo hi idha saṅkhā-saddoti. ettha ca ``paṭisaṅkhā yoniso''tiādi kāmaṃ paccayaparibhogakālena vuccati, dhātuvasena pana paṭikūlavasena vā paccavekkhaṇāya paccayasannissitasīlaṃ sujjhatīti apare. bhijjatīti keci. eke pana paṭhamaṃ eva pariyattanti vadanti, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. ``cīvara''nti ekavacanaṃ ekattamattaṃ vācakanti adhippāyena ^b^``antaravāsakādīsu yaṃ kiñcī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, jātisaddatāya pana tassa pāḷiyaṃ ekavacananti yattakāni cīvarāni yoginā pariharitabbāni, tesaṃ sabbesaṃ ekajjhaṃ gahaṇanti sakkā viññātuṃ, ^b^yaṃ kiñcī^eb^ti vā anavasesapariyādānametaṃ, na aniyamavacanaṃ. ``nivāseti vā pārupati vā''ti vikappanaṃ pana paṭisevanapariyāyassa paribhogassa ^a^V1.0053^ea^ vibhāgadassananti taṃ paññapetvā sayananisīdana-cīvarakuṭikaraṇādivasenāpi paribhogassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

[03] payojanānaṃ mariyādā payojanāvadhi, tassa paricchindanavasena yo niyamo, tassa vacanaṃ ^b^payojanā...pe0... vacanaṃ^eb^. idāni taṃ niyamaṃ vivaritvā dassetuṃ ^b^``ettakameva hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha avadhāraṇena līḷāvibhūsāvilambanānaṭambarādivasena vatthaparibhogaṃ nisedheti. tenāha ^b^``na ito bhiyyo''^eb^ti. līḷāvasena hi ekacce sattā vatthāni paridahanti ceva upasaṃviyanti ca. yathā taṃ yobbane ṭhitā nāgarikamanussā. ekacce vibhūsanavasena, yathā taṃ rūpūpajīviniādayo. vilambanavasena vilambakā. naṭambaravasena bhojādayo. ^b^ajjhattadhātukkhobho^eb^ sītarogādiuppādako. ^b^utupariṇāmanavasenā^eb^ti utuno parivattanavasena visabhāgasītautusamuṭṭhānena. ^b^vā^eb^-saddena hemantādīsu himapātādivasena pavattassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo, na uppādeti sītanti adhippāyo. yadatthaṃ pana taṃ vinodanaṃ, taṃ matthakappattaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``sītabbhāhate''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti ``uṇhassa paṭighātāyā''tiādīsu sabbesu sesapayojanesu. yadipi sūriyasantāpopi uṇhova, tassa pana ātapaggahaṇena gahitattā ``aggisantāpassā''ti ^a^M1.0057^ea^ vuttaṃ. ekacco dāvaggisantāpo kāyaṃ cīvarena paṭicchādetvā sakkā vinodetunti āha ^b^``tassa vanadāhādīsu sambhavo veditabbo''^eb^ti. ^b^ḍaṃsā^eb^ti piṅgalamakkhikā. te pana yasmā ḍaṃsanasīlā, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``ḍaṃsanamakkhikā''^eb^ti. ^b^sappādayo^eb^ti sappasatapadiuṇṇanābhisarabūvicchikādayo. ^b^phuṭṭhasamphasso^eb^ti phuṭṭhavisamāha. tividhā hi sappā -- daṭṭhavisā phuṭṭhavisā diṭṭhavisā. tesu purimakā dve eva gahitā. satapadiādīnampi tādisānaṃ saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ. ^b^niyatapayojanaṃ^eb^ ekantikaṃ, sabbakālikañca payojanaṃ. ^b^hirī kuppati^eb^ nillajjatā saṇṭhāti. tenāha ^b^``vinassatī''^eb^ti. kūpāvataraṇaṃ vā paṭicchādanaṃ arahatīti kopinaṃ. hiriyitabbaṭṭhena hirī ca taṃ kopinañcāti ^b^hirikopina^eb^nti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^tassa cā^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-saddo pubbe vuttapayojanānaṃ sampiṇḍanattho.

[03] ^b^yaṃ kiñci āhāra^eb^nti khādanīyabhojanīyādibhedaṃ yaṃ kiñci āharitabbavatthuṃ. piṇḍāya bhikkhāya ulatīti piṇḍolo, tassa kammaṃ piṇḍolyaṃ. tena ^b^piṇḍolyena^eb^ bhikkhācariyāya. ^b^patitattā^eb^ti pakkhipitattā. ^b^piṇḍapāto^eb^ patte pakkhittabhikkhāhāro. ^b^piṇḍānaṃ vā pāto^eb^ti ghare ghare laddhabhikkhānaṃ sannipāto. ``natthi davā''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 3.305) sahasā kiriyāpi ^a^V1.0054^ea^ ``davā''ti vuccati, tato visesanatthaṃ ^b^``davatthaṃ, kīḷānimittanti vuttaṃ hotī''^eb^ti āha. ^b^muṭṭhikamallā^eb^ muṭṭhiyuddhayujjhanakā. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena nibuddhayujjhanakādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. ^b^balamadanimitta^eb^nti balaṃ nissāya uppajjanakamado balamado. taṃ nimittaṃ, balassa uppādanatthanti attho. ^b^porisamadanimitta^eb^nti porisamado vuccati purisamāno ``ahaṃ puriso''ti uppajjanakamāno. asaddhammasevanāsamatthataṃ nissāya pavatto māno, rāgo eva vā porisamadoti keci. taṃ nimittaṃ. ^b^antepurikā^eb^ rājorodhā. sabbesaṃ sannivesayogyatāya ^b^vesiyo^eb^ rūpūpajīviniyo. ^b^maṇḍanaṃ^eb^ nāma idhāvayavapāripūrīti āha ^b^``aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ pīṇabhāvanimitta''^eb^nti, paribrūhanahetūti attho. ^b^naṭā^eb^ nāma raṅganaṭā. ^b^naccakā^eb^ laṅghakādayo. ^b^vibhūsanaṃ^eb^ sobhāsamuppādananti āha ^b^``pasannacchavivaṇṇatānimitta''^eb^nti.

[03] ^b^etaṃ^eb^ padaṃ. ^b^mohūpanissayappahānattha^eb^nti mohassa upanissayatāpahānāya. davā hi mohena hoti, mohañca vaḍḍhetīti tassā vajjanena mohassa anupanissayatā. ^b^dosūpanissayappahānattha^eb^nti idaṃ balamadassa, purisamadassa ^a^M1.0058^ea^ ca dosahetuno vasena vuttaṃ, itarassa pana vasena ``rāgūpanissayappahānattha''nti vattabbaṃ. maṇḍanavibhūsanapaṭikkhepo siyā mohūpanissayappahānāyapi, rāgūpanissayatāya pana ujupaṭipakkhoti vuttaṃ ^b^``rāgūpanissayappahānattha''^eb^nti. yadipi ekaccassa davamade ārabbha parassa paṭighasaṃyojanādīnaṃ uppatti hotiyeva manopadosikadevādīnaṃ viya, attano pana davamade ārabbha yesaṃ savisesaṃ rāgamohamānādayo pāpadhammā uppajjanti. te sandhāya ^b^``attano saṃyojanuppattipaṭisedhanattha''^eb^nti vatvā maṇḍanavibhūsanāni paṭicca savisesaṃ parassapi rāgamohādayo pavattantīti ^b^``parassapi saṃyojanuppattipaṭisedhanattha''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^ayoniso paṭipattiyā^eb^ti ettha kāmasukhallikānuyogaṃ muñcitvā sabbāpi micchāpaṭipatti ayoniso paṭipatti. purimehi dvīhi padehi ayoniso paṭipattiyā, pacchimehi dvīhi kāmasukhallikānuyogassa pahānaṃ vuttanti vadanti. ^b^``catūhipi cetehī''^eb^ti pana vacanato sabbehi ubhinnampi pahānaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. kāmakīḷāpi davantogadhā hotiyeva, purisamadopi kāmasukhallikānuyogassa hetuyevāti.

[03] ^b^cātumahābhūtikassā^eb^ti catumahābhūte sannissitassa. ^b^rūpakāyassā^eb^ti catusantatirūpasamūhassa. ^b^ṭhitiyā^eb^ti ṭhitatthaṃ. sā panassa ṭhiti pabandhavasena icchitāti āha ^b^``pabandhaṭṭhitattha''^eb^nti. ^b^pavattiyā^eb^ti jīvitindriyappavattiyā. tathā hi jīvitindriyaṃ ``yāpanā vattanā''ti ^a^V1.0055^ea^ (dha0 sa0 19, 634) ca niddiṭṭhaṃ. tassā ca avicchedo āhārūpayogena hoti. kāyassa cirataraṃ yāva āyukappo, tāva avatthānaṃ yāpanāti dassento ^b^``cirakālaṭṭhitatthaṃ vā''^eb^ti āha. idāni vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^``gharūpatthambhamivā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tatthāyaṃ yojanā -- yathā jiṇṇagharasāmiko gharassa upatthambhanaṃ karoti tassa apatanatthaṃ, yathā ca sākaṭiko akkhabbhañjanaṃ karoti tassa sampavattanatthaṃ, evamesa yogī kāyassa ṭhitatthaṃ, yāpanatthañca piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevati paribhuñjatīti. etena ṭhiti nāma apatanaṃ yāpanā pavattīti dasseti. ^b^na davamadamaṇḍanavibhūsanattha^eb^nti idaṃ ``yāvadevā''ti avadhāraṇena nivattitatthadassanaṃ. tiṭṭhanti upādinnadhammā etāyāti ^b^ṭhiti,^eb^ āyūti āha ^b^``ṭhitīti jīvitindriyassetaṃ adhivacana''^eb^nti. tathā hi taṃ āyu ``ṭhitī''ti niddiṭṭhaṃ, ^b^ṭhitiyā yāpanāyā^eb^ti kāyassa ^a^M1.0059^ea^ ṭhitihetutāya ``ṭhitī''ti laddhavohārassa jīvitindriyassa pavattanatthanti attho. tenāha ^b^``jīvitindriyapavattāpanattha''^eb^nti. ^b^ābādhaṭṭhenā^eb^ti vibādhanaṭṭhena, rogaṭṭhena vā. jighacchāparamā hi rogā. ^b^uparamattha^eb^nti vūpasamatthaṃ. ^b^vaṇālepanamiva^eb^ vaṇiko. uṇhasītādīsu abhibhavantesu tappaṭikāraṃ sītuṇhaṃ viya paṭisevatīti sambandho. maggabrahmacariyaṃ ṭhapetvā sikkhattayasaṅgahā sāsanāvacaritabbā anusāsanī sāsanabrahmacariyanti āha ^b^``sakalasāsanabrahmacariyassa ca maggabrahmacariyassa cā''^eb^ti. ^b^anuggahaṇattha^eb^nti anu anu gaṇhanatthaṃ sampādanatthaṃ. ^b^kāyabalaṃ nissāyā^eb^ti yathāsamāraddhaṃ guṇavisesapāripūrihetubhūtaṃ kāyabalamattaṃ nissāya. tenāha ^b^``sikkhattayānuyogavasenā''^eb^tiādi. kantāranittharaṇatthikā jāyampatikā, ^b^nadīsamuddanittharaṇatthikā^eb^ ca puttamaṃsādīni yathā agiddhā amucchitā kevalaṃ taṃ taṃ atthasiddhimeva avekkhantā paṭisevanti tehi vinā asijjhanato, evamayampi kevalaṃ bhavakantāranittharaṇatthiko agiddho amucchito tena vinā asijjhanato piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevatīti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ.

[03] ^b^itī^eb^ti pakāratthe nipātapadaṃ. tena paṭiseviyamānassa piṇḍapātassa paṭisevanākāro gayhatīti āha ^b^``evaṃ iminā piṇḍapātapaṭisevanenā''^eb^ti. ^b^purāṇa^eb^nti bhojanato purimakālikattā purātanaṃ. ^b^paṭihaṅkhāmī^eb^ti paṭihanissāmi. ^b^navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmī^eb^ti paṭisevatīti yojanā. kīdisaṃ, kathañcāti āha ^b^``aparimita...pe0... aññataro viyā''^eb^ti. aparimitaṃ aparimāṇaṃ bhojanaṃ paccayo etissāti aparimitabhojanapaccayā, taṃ ^b^aparimitabhojanapaccayaṃ^eb^ attano gahaṇītejapamāṇato atikkantapamāṇabhojanahetukanti attho. yo bahuṃ bhuñjitvā attano ^a^V1.0056^ea^ dhammatāya uṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto ``āhara hattha''nti vadati, ayaṃ ^b^āharahatthako^eb^. yo bhuñjitvā accuddhumātakucchitāya uṭṭhitopi sāṭakaṃ nivāsetuṃ na sakkoti, ayaṃ ^b^alaṃsāṭako^eb^. yo bhuñjitvā uṭṭhātuṃ asakkonto tattheva parivattati, ayaṃ ^b^tatravaṭṭako^eb^. yo yathā kākehi āmasituṃ sakkā, evaṃ yāva mukhadvāraṃ āhāreti, ayaṃ ^b^kākamāsako^eb^. yo bhuñjitvā mukhe sandhāretuṃ asakkonto tattheva vamati, ayaṃ ^b^bhuttavamitako^eb^. etesaṃ aññataro viya. atha vā ^b^purāṇavedanā^eb^ nāma abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanā. taṃ ``paṭihanissāmī''ti ^a^M1.0060^ea^ paṭisevati. ^b^navavedanā^eb^ nāma atibhuttapaccayena uppajjanakavedanā. taṃ ``na uppādessāmī''ti paṭisevati. atha vā ^b^navavedanā^eb^ nāma abhuttapaccayena uppajjanakavedanā, tassā anuppannāya anuppajjanatthameva paṭisevati. abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakāti cetaṃ khuddāya visesanaṃ. yassā appavatti bhojanena kātabbā, tassā dassanatthaṃ. abhuttapaccayena, bhuttapaccayena ca uppajjanakānuppajjanakavedanāsu purimā yathāpavattā jighacchānimittā vedanā. sā hi abhuñjantassa bhiyyopavaḍḍhanavasena uppajjati. pacchimāpi khuddānimittāva aṅgadāhasūlādivedanā pavattā. sā hi bhuttapaccayā pubbe anuppannāva nuppajjissatīti ayametāsaṃ viseso. vihiṃsānimittatā cetāsaṃ vihiṃsāya viseso.

[03] ^b^yā^eb^ vedanā. ^b^adhunā^eb^ti etarahi. ^b^asappāyāparimitabhojanaṃ nissāyā^eb^ti asappāyāparimitassa āhārassa bhuñjanapayogaṃ āgamma uppajjatīti attho. ^b^purāṇakammapaccayavasenā^eb^ti pubbe purimajātiyaṃ katattā purāṇassa kammassa paccayatāvasena payogavipattiṃ āgamma uppajjanārahatāya taṃ vajjetvā payogasampattiyā upaṭṭhāpanaṃ dukkhavedanāpaccayaghāto, paṭihananañca hotīti āha ^b^``tassā paccayaṃ vināsento taṃ purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmī''^eb^ti. ^b^ayuttaparibhogo^eb^ paccaye apaccavekkhitvā paribhogo. so eva katūpacitakammatāya ^b^kammūpacayo^eb^. taṃ ^b^nissāya^eb^ paṭicca ^b^āyatiṃ^eb^ anāgate kāle uppajjanato yā cāyaṃ ``navavedanā''ti vuccatīti yojanā. ^b^yuttaparibhogavasenā^eb^ti paccavekkhitvā paccayānaṃ paribhogavasena, tassā navavedanāya mūlaṃ ayuttaparibhogakammaṃ anibbattento sabbena sabbaṃ anuppādento. ^b^ettāvatā^eb^ti ``iti purāṇa''ntiādinā vuttena padadvayena. ``vihiṃsūparatiyā''tiādinā vā padacatukkena ^b^yuttaparibhogasaṅgaho^eb^ pabbajitānucchavikassa paccayaparibhogassa vuttattā. ^b^attakilamathānuyogappahānaṃ^eb^ jighacchādidukkhapaṭighātassa bhāsitattā. jhānasukhādīnaṃ ^a^V1.0057^ea^ paccayabhūtassa kāyasukhassa avissajjanato ^b^dhammikasukhāpariccāgo^eb^ ca dīpito hoti.

[03] asappāyāparimitūpayogena jīvitindriyupacchedako, iriyāpathabhañjanako vā siyā parissayo, sappāyaparimitūpayogena pana so na hoti. tathā sati cirakālappavattisaṅkhātā sarīrassa ^b^yātrā^eb^ ^a^M1.0061^ea^ yāpanā bhavissatīti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^``parimitaparibhogena...pe0... bhavissatī''^eb^ti āha. yo rogo sāddho asāddho ca na hoti, so yāpyarogo, so etassa atthīti ^b^yāpyarogī^eb^. so hi niccakālaṃ bhesajjaṃ upasevati, tathā ayampīti. yadi yātrāpi yāpanā, pubbepi ``yāpanāyā''ti vuttaṃ, ko ettha visesoti? pubbe ``yāpanāyā''ti jīvitindriyayāpanā adhippetā, idha pana catunnampi iriyāpathānaṃ avicchedasaṅkhātā yāpanā yātrāti ayamettha viseso. buddhapaṭikuṭṭhena micchājīvena paccayapariyesanā ^b^ayuttapariyesanā^eb^. dāyakadeyyadhammānaṃ, attano ca pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā paṭiggahaṇaṃ, saddhādeyyavinipātanatthaṃ vā paṭiggahaṇaṃ ^b^ayuttapaṭiggahaṇaṃ,^eb^ yena vā āpattiṃ āpajjati. apaccavekkhitvā paribhogo ^b^ayuttaparibhogo^eb^. tesaṃ parivajjanaṃ dhammena samena paccayuppādanādivasena veditabbaṃ. dhammena hi paccaye pariyesitvā dhammena paṭiggahetvā paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanaṃ ^b^anavajjatā^eb^ nāma.

[03] ^b^aratī^eb^ti ukkaṇṭhā. pantasenāsanesu, adhikusaladhammesu ca anabhirati. ^b^tandī^eb^ti pacalāyikā niddā. ^b^vijambhitā^eb^ti thinamiddhābhibhavena kāyassa vijambhanā. viññūhi garahā ^b^viññūgarahā^eb^. ekacco hi anavajjaṃyeva sāvajjaṃ karoti, ``laddhaṃ me''ti pamāṇādhikaṃ bhuñjitvā taṃ jīrāpetuṃ asakkonto uddhaṃvirecanādhovirecanādīhi kilamati, sakalavihāre bhikkhū tassa sarīrapaṭijagganabhesajjapariyesanāpasutā honti. aññe te ``kiṃ ida''nti pucchitvā ``asukassa udaraṃ uddhumāta''ntiādīni sutvā ``niccakālamesa evaṃpakatiko attano kucchipamāṇaṃ nāma na jānātī''ti nindanti, evaṃ anavajjaṃyeva sāvajjaṃ karoti. evaṃ akatvā ``anavajjatā ca bhavissatī''ti paṭisevati. attano hi pakatiaggibalādiṃ jānitvā ``evaṃ me aratiādīnaṃ abhāvena kāyasukhatā, agarahitabbatā ca bhavissatī''ti pamāṇayuttameva paṭisevati. yāvatako bhojanena attho, tassa sādhanena yāvadatthaṃ udarassa paripūraṇena udarāvadehakaṃ bhojanaṃ ^b^yāvadatthaudarāvadehakabhojanaṃ,^eb^ tassa ^b^parivajjanena^eb^. seyyāya sayanena laddhabbasukhaṃ seyyasukhaṃ, ubhohi passehi ^a^M1.0062^ea^ samparivattanakaṃ sayantassa uppajjanasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ ^a^V1.0058^ea^, middhena niddāyanena uppajjanasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ, tesaṃ ^b^seyya...pe0... sukhānaṃ pahānato^eb^ catunnaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ yogyabhāvassa paṭipādanaṃ kāyassa ^b^catuiriyāpathayogyabhāvapaṭipādanaṃ,^eb^ tato. sukho iriyāpathavihāro ^b^phāsuvihāro^eb^. pacchime vikappe, sabbavikappesu vā vuttaṃ phāsuvihāralakkhaṇaṃ āgamena samatthetuṃ ^b^``vuttampi heta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tīsupi vikappesu āhārassa ūnaparibhogavaseneva hi phāsuvihāro vuttoti.

[03] ^b^ettāvatā^eb^ti ``yātrā''tiādinā vuttena padattayena. ``yātrā ca me bhavissatī''ti payojanapariggahadīpanā. yātrā hi naṃ āhārūpayogaṃ payojetīti. dhammikasukhāpariccāgahetuko phāsuvihāro ^b^majjhimā paṭipadā^eb^ antadvayaparivajjanato. imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne aṭṭha aṅgāni samodhānetabbāni -- ``neva davāyā''ti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, ``na madāyā''ti ekaṃ, ``na maṇḍanāyā''ti ekaṃ, ``na vibhūsanāyā''ti ekaṃ, ``yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā yāpanāyā''ti ekaṃ, ``vihiṃsūparatiyā brahmacariyānuggahāyā''ti ekaṃ, ``iti purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmi, navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmī''ti ekaṃ, ``yātrā ca me bhavissatī''ti ekaṃ. ``anavajjatā ca phāsuvihāro cā''ti ayamettha bhojanānisaṃso. ^b^mahāsivatthero^eb^ panāha ``heṭṭhā cattāri aṅgāni paṭikkhepo nāma, upari pana aṭṭhaṅgāni samodhānetabbānī''ti. tattha ``yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā''ti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, ``yāpanāyā''ti ekaṃ, ``vihiṃsūparatiyā''ti ekaṃ, ``brahmacariyānuggahāyā''ti ekaṃ, ``iti purāṇañca vedanaṃ paṭihaṅkhāmī''ti ekaṃ, ``navañca vedanaṃ na uppādessāmī''ti ekaṃ, ``yātrā ca me bhavissatī''ti ekaṃ, ``anavajjatā cā''ti ekaṃ. phāsuvihāro pana bhojanānisaṃsoti. evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ āhārento paṭisaṅkhā yoniso piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevati nāma.

[03] ^b^yattha yatthā^eb^ti bhummaniddesena ^b^sena^eb^-saddassa adhikaraṇatthavuttimāha. tathā ^b^āsana^eb^-saddassāti. ^b^aḍḍhayogādimhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena pāsādādiṃ, mañcādiñca saṅgaṇhāti. yattha yattha vihāre vā aḍḍhayogādimhi vā āsatīti vihārāḍḍhayogādike ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. idha ^b^ādi-^eb^saddena pīṭhasanthatādīnampi saṅgaho veditabbo. ^b^parisahanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti abhibhavanaṭṭhena, vibādhanaṭṭhenāti attho. ^b^utuyeva utuparissayo^eb^ti sītuṇhādiutuyeva ^a^M1.0063^ea^ asappāyo vuttanayena utuparissayo. tassa utuparissayassa vinodanatthaṃ, anuppannassa anuppādanatthaṃ, uppannassa vūpasamanatthañcāti attho. nānārammaṇato ^a^V1.0059^ea^ paṭisaṃharitvā kammaṭṭhānabhūte ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe cittassa sammadeva layanaṃ paṭisallānaṃ, tattha ārāmo abhirati ^b^paṭisallānārāmo,^eb^ tadatthaṃ. senāsanaṃ hi vivittaṃ yogino bhāvanānukūlaṃ suññāgārabhāvato. taṃ panetaṃ atthadvayaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``yo sarīrābādhacittavikkhepakaro''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^ekībhāvasukhattha^eb^nti ekībhāvahetukaṃ sukhaṃ ekībhāvasukhaṃ, tadatthaṃ. gaṇasaṅgaṇikakilesasaṅgaṇikābhāvena uppajjanakasukhaṃ.

[03] yadi utuyeva utuparissayo, ``utu ca sītuṇha''nti sītuṇhapaṭighātaṃ vatvā utuparissayavinodanaṃ kasmā vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``kāmañcā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ``niyataṃ utuparissayavinodana''nti etena ``sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāyā''ti ettha vuttaṃ sītuṇhaṃ aniyataṃ kadāci kadāci uppajjanakaṃ, utuparissayo pana ^b^sabbadābhāvī^eb^ adhippetoti dasseti. ^b^vuttappakāro^eb^ti ``sītādiko, asappāyo''ti ca evaṃ vuttappakāro vivaṭaṅgaṇarukkhamūlādīsu nisinnassa apariguttiyā asaṃvutadvārāditāya ^b^pākaṭaparissayā,^eb^ asappāyarūpadassanādinā ^b^apākaṭaparissayā^eb^ ca bhikkhussa kāyacittānaṃ ^b^ābādhaṃ^eb^ kareyyuṃ. ^b^yattha^eb^ gutte senāsane ^b^ābādhaṃ na karonti. evaṃ jānitvā^eb^ti ubhayaparissayarahitanti evaṃ ñatvā paṭisevanto bhikkhu veditabboti sambandho.

[03] dhātukkhobhalakkhaṇassa, taṃhetukadukkhavedanālakkhaṇassa vā ^b^rogassa^eb^ paṭipakkhabhāvo ^b^paṭiayanaṭṭho^eb^. tenāha ^b^``paccanīkagamanaṭṭhenāti attho''^eb^ti, vūpasamanaṭṭhenāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^yassa kassacī^eb^ti sappiādīsu yassa kassaci. ^b^sappāyassā^eb^ti hi tassa vikāravūpasamenāti adhippāyo. ^b^bhisakkassa kammaṃ^eb^ tena vidhātabbato. tenāha ^b^``tena anuññātattā''^eb^ti. ^b^nagaraparikkhārehī^eb^ti nagaraṃ parivāretvā rakkhaṇakehi. vivaṭaparikkhepo parikkhā uḍḍāpo pākāro esikā paligho pākārapatthaṇḍilanti satta ``nagaraparikkhārā''ti vadanti. ^b^sīlaparikkhāro^eb^ti suvisuddhasīlālaṅkāro ^a^M1.0064^ea^. ariyamaggo hi idha ``ratho''ti adhippeto. tassa ca sammāvācādayo alaṅkāraṭṭhena ``parikkhāro''ti vuttā. ^b^jīvitaparikkhārā^eb^ti jīvitassa pavattikāraṇāni. ^b^samudānetabbā^eb^ti sammā uddhaṃ uddhaṃ ānetabbā pariyesitabbā. ^b^parivāropi hoti^eb^ antarāyānaṃ parito vāraṇato. tenāha ^b^``jīvita...pe0... rakkhaṇato''^eb^ti.

[03] tattha ^b^antara^eb^nti vivaraṃ, okāsoti attho. verikānaṃ antaraṃ adatvā attano sāmikānaṃ ^a^V1.0060^ea^ parivāretvā ṭhitasevakā viya ^b^rakkhaṇato. assā^eb^ti jīvitassa. ^b^kāraṇabhāvato^eb^ti cirappavattiyā kāraṇabhāvato. rasāyanabhūtaṃ hi bhesajjaṃ sucirampi kālaṃ jīvitaṃ pavattetiyeva. yadipi anuppannā eva dukkhavedanā bhesajjaparibhogena paṭihaññanti, na uppannā tāsaṃ saraseneva bhijjanato, uppannasadisā pana ``uppannā''ti vuccanti. bhavati hi taṃsadisesu tabbohāro, yathā sā eva tittiri, tāniyeva osadhānīti. tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``uppannānanti jātānaṃ bhūtānaṃ nibbattāna''^eb^nti. sañcayato paṭṭhāya so dhātukkhobho samuṭṭhānaṃ etesanti ^b^taṃsamuṭṭhānā. ``dukkhavedanā''^eb^ti vatvā sā akusalasabhāvāpi atthīti tato visesetuṃ ^b^``akusalavipākavedanā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. byābādhanaṭṭhena byābādho, byābādhova byābajjhaṃ, dukkhanti attho. natthi ettha byābajjhanti ^b^abyābajjhaṃ,^eb^ niddukkhatā. tenāha ^b^``abyābajjhaparamatāyā''^eb^ti ^b^niddukkhaparamatāyā^eb^ti. ^b^taṃ dukkha^eb^nti roganimittakaṃ dukkhaṃ.

[03] cīvarādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ nissayanaṃ paribhogo evāti dassetuṃ ^b^``te paṭicca nissāyā''^eb^ti vatvā ^b^``paribhuñjamānā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^pavattantī^eb^ti jīvanti. jīvanampi hi pavattanaṃ, yato jīvitindriyaṃ ``pavattanarasa''nti vuccati.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ evaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarādibhedena niddiṭṭhaṃ sīlaṃ puna sādhanavibhāgena dassetuṃ ^b^``evametasmi''^eb^ntiādimāraddhaṃ. tattha sādhīyati sampādiyati etenāti sādhanaṃ, saddhā sādhanaṃ etassāti ^b^saddhāsādhano^eb^. nanu ca vīriyasatipaññāhipi vinā pātimokkhasaṃvaro na sijjhatīti? saccaṃ na sijjhati, saddhāya pana visesahetubhāvaṃ sandhāya evaṃ vuttanti dassento āha

[03] ^b^``sāvakavisayātītattā^eb^ ^a^M1.0065^ea^ ^b^sikkhāpadapaññattiyā''^eb^ti. garukalahukādibhede otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ tassa tassa aparādhassa anurūpaṃ sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ nāma sāvakānaṃ avisayo, buddhānaṃ eva visayo. sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṃ tāva tiṭṭhatu, tassa kālopi nāma sāvakānaṃ avisayo, buddhānaṃ eva visayoti dassento ^b^``sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanapaṭikkhepo cettha nidassana''^eb^nti āha. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``āgamehi tvaṃ sāriputta, āgamehi tvaṃ sāriputta, tathāgatova tattha kālaṃ ^a^V1.0061^ea^ jānissatī''ti (pārā0 21). tattha ^b^ca-^eb^saddo samuccayattho. tena ``apaññattaṃ na paññapema, paññattaṃ na samucchindāma, yathāpaññattesu sikkhāpadesu samādāya vattāmā''ti (pārā0 565) evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^saddhāyā^eb^ti saddahanena satthari, dhamme ca saddhāya paccupaṭṭhāpanena. ^b^jīvitepi^eb^ pageva jīvitaparikkhāreti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^kikīva aṇḍa^eb^nti kikīsakuṇikā viya attano aṇḍaṃ. sā kira jīvitampi pariccajitvā aṇḍameva rakkhati. ^b^camarīva vāladhi^eb^nti camarīmigo viya attano vāladhiṃ. camarīmigā kira byādhena paripātiyamānā jīvitampi pariccajitvā kaṇḍakagumbādīsu laggaṃ attano vālameva rakkhanti. ^b^piyaṃva puttaṃ ekaka^eb^nti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. yathā hi ekaputtako kuṭumbiko taṃ ekaputtaṃ, ekanayano ca taṃ ekanayanaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ rakkhati. ^b^tatheva sīlaṃ anurakkhamānakā^eb^ti anukampanavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^supesalā^eb^ti suṭṭhu piyasīlā. ^b^sadā^eb^ sabbakālaṃ daharamajjhimatherakālesu. channampi gāravānaṃ vasena ^b^sagāravā,^eb^ garukāravantoti attho.

[03] ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti yathā mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātikkamati, evameva. ^b^mama sāvakā^eb^ti ariyasāvake sandhāyāha. te hi dhuvasīlā. ^b^imasmiṃ atthe^eb^ti jīvitahetupi sīlassa avītikkamane.
[03] ^b^mahāvattaniaṭavī^eb^ nāma viñjhāṭavī. himavantapasse aṭavīti keci. ^b^thera^eb^nti nāmagottavasena apaññātaṃ ekaṃ ^b^theraṃ. nipajjāpesuṃ^eb^ gantvā kassaci mā āroceyyāti.

[03] ^b^pūtilatāyā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0066^ea^ gaḷocilatāya. ^b^samasīsī^eb^ti jīvitasamasīsī. yassa hi kilesasīsaṃ avijjaṃ maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattamaggo pariyādiyati, tato ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgottaraṇe vaṭṭasīsaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ cuticittaṃ pariyādiyati, so imāya vārasamatāya ``jīvitasamasīsī''ti vuccati. so ca thero tathā parinibbāyi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyī''^eb^ti. ^b^abhayatthero^eb^ kira mahābhiñño. tasmā cetiyaṃ kārāpesīti vadanti. ^b^appevā^eb^ti appeva nāma attano jīvitampi jaheyya, ^b^na bhinde^eb^ti na bhindeyya, na vītikkameyya.

[03] ^b^satiyā^eb^ ^a^V1.0062^ea^ ^b^adhiṭṭhitāna^eb^nti pageva upaṭṭhitāya satiyā ārakkhavasena adhiṭṭhitānaṃ indriyānaṃ. ^b^ananvāssavanīyato^eb^ti dvārabhāvena abhijjhādīhi ananubandhitabbato. ^b^vara^eb^nti seṭṭhaṃ. ^b^tattāyā^eb^ti uṇhāya. ^b^ādittāyā^eb^ti ādito paṭṭhāya dittāya. ^b^sampajjalitāyā^eb^ti samantato jalantiyā. ^b^sajotibhūtāyā^eb^ti ekajālībhūtāya. ^b^sampalimaṭṭha^eb^nti sabbaso āmaṭṭhaṃ, añcitanti attho. ^b^na tveva vara^eb^nti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^rūpesū^eb^ti rūpārammaṇesu. ^b^anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho^eb^ti kilesānaṃ anu anu byañjanavasena uppādanena pākaṭīkaraṇavasena subhādinimittaggāho, atha vā ^b^anubyañjanaso^eb^ti hatthapādādianubyañjanato, ^b^nimittaggāho^eb^ti itthipurisādisubhādinimittaggahaṇaṃ. ^b^cakkhudvārādipavattassā^eb^ti cakkhudvārādīhi pavattassa. ^b^viññāṇassā^eb^ti javanaviññāṇassa. nimittādiggāhaṃ nisedhentena sampādetabboti sambandho. ^b^asaṃvihitasākhāparivāra^eb^nti sammā avihitavatiparikkhepaṃ. ^b^parassahārīhī^eb^ti parasantakāvahārakehi corehi. ^b^samativijjhatī^eb^ti sabbaso ativijjhati anupavisati.

[03] ^b^rūpesū^eb^ti rūpahetu rūpanimittaṃ. uppajjanakānatthato ^b^rakkha indriya^eb^nti sambandho. evaṃ sesesu. ^b^ete hi dvārā^eb^ti ete cakkhādidvārā. satikavāṭena asaṃvutattā ^b^vivaṭā^eb^. tato eva ^b^arakkhitā^eb^. kilesuppattiyā hetubhāvena taṃsamaṅginaṃ ^b^hanantī^eb^ti kāraṇūpacāreneva vuttaṃ. ^b^ete^eb^ vā rūpādayo. kilesānaṃ ārammaṇabhūtā dvārā cakkhādidvārā. te kīdisā vivaṭā arakkhitā asaṃvutacakkhādihetuṃ taṃsamaṅginaṃ hanantīti kāraṇūpacāreneva vuttaṃ. ^b^agāra^eb^nti gehaṃ. ^b^ducchanna^eb^nti na sammā chāditaṃ. ^b^abhāvita^eb^nti lokuttarabhāvanārahitaṃ.

[03] ^b^sampādite^eb^tiādissa ^a^M1.0067^ea^ vodānapakkhassa attho vuttavipariyāyena veditabbo. ^b^ayaṃ pana^eb^ sabbaso kilesānaṃ anuppādo ^b^atiukkaṭṭhadesanā^eb^ maggenāgatasadisattā. ^b^sampādetabbo^eb^ti ``na punevaṃ karissa''nti adhiṭṭhānasuddhiyā sampādetabbo.

[03] ^b^adhunāpabbajitenā^eb^ti na cirapabbajitena, navapabbajitenāti attho. ^b^kāmarāgena ḍayhāmī^eb^ti kāmarāgagginā pariḍayhāmi. so ca pana dāho idāni cittagatoti dassento āha ^b^``cittaṃ me pariḍayhatī''^eb^ti. ^b^sādhū^eb^ti āyācanā. ^b^nibbāpana^eb^nti tassa nibbāpanupāyaṃ. ^b^gotamā^eb^ti theraṃ gottena ālapati.

[03] ^b^saññāya^eb^ ^a^V1.0063^ea^ ^b^vipariyesā^eb^ti ``asubhe subha''nti pavattasaññāvipariyesahetu viparītasaññānimittaṃ. ^b^nimittaṃ parivajjehi^eb^ kīdisaṃ? ^b^rāgūpasañhitaṃ^eb^ rāguppattihetubhūtaṃ subhanimittaṃ parivajjehi na manasi karohi. na kevalaṃ subhanimittassāmanasikāro eva, atha kho ^b^asubha^eb^bhāvanāya attano ^b^cittaṃ bhāvehi^eb^. kathaṃ? ^b^ekaggaṃ susamāhitaṃ^eb^ yathā taṃ asubhārammaṇe vikkhepābhāvena ekaggaṃ, suṭṭhu appitabhāvena susamāhitañca hoti, evaṃ bhāvehīti. evaṃ samathabhāvanāya kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanaṃ dassetvā idāni samucchedanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``saṅkhāre''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^saṅkhāre parato passā^eb^ti sabbepi saṅkhāre avidheyyakatāya ``pare''ti passa. aniccatāya pana udayabbayapaṭipīḷitattā ^b^dukkhato,^eb^ anattasabhāvattā, attavirahato ca ^b^no attato^eb^ passa. evaṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhento maggapaṭipāṭiyā catutthamaggena sabbaso ^b^nibbāpehi mahārāgaṃ^eb^ tebhūmakassa abhibhavanato mahāvisayatāya mahārāgaṃ vūpasamehi. yathā etarahi, evaṃ ^b^mā ḍayhittho punappuna^eb^nti daḷhataraṃ rāgavinodane niyojesi.

[03] evaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlassa sampādane vidhiṃ dassetvā evaṃ taṃ susampāditaṃ hotīti nayaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādinā tattha paripūrakārino there nidasseti. tattha ^b^``leṇaṃ na ullokitapubba''^eb^nti idaṃ sabbattheva therassa yugamattadassitāya vuttaṃ. kiṃ pana thero senāsanaṃ na sodheti ^a^M1.0068^ea^? ``ullokā paṭhamaṃ ohāretabba''nti hi vuttaṃ, antevāsikādayo eva kirassa senāsanaṃ sodhenti. ^b^assa^eb^ nāgarukkhassa.

[03] ^b^tasmiṃ gāme^eb^ti mahāgāme. taruṇā thaññapivanakā puttadhītaro yāsaṃ tā ^b^taruṇaputtā,^eb^ tāsaṃ. ^b^lañjāpesī^eb^ti thanapaṭṭikāya thane bandhāpetvā rājamuddikāya lañjāpesi. rājā theraṃ cirataraṃ daṭṭhuṃ kālavikkhepaṃ karonto ``sve sīlāni gaṇhissāmī''ti āha. thero rañño ca deviyā ca vandanakāle sattākāramattaṃ gaṇhāti. itthī purisoti pana ^b^vivekaṃ^eb^ na karoti. tenāha ^b^``vavatthānaṃ na karomī''^eb^ti. ``aho suparisuddhasīlo vatāyaṃ ayyo''ti daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi. ^b^atiparisuddhaṃ pākaṭa^eb^nti sappāyalābhena kammaṭṭhānaṃ ativiya parisuddhaṃ vibhūtaṃ ahosi. ^b^sakalaṃ pabbataṃ unnādayanto^eb^ti pathavikampanena sakalaṃ pabbataṃ ekaṃ ninnādaṃ karonto. tannivāsidevatānaṃ sādhukāradānenāti keci. ^b^bhanto^eb^ti anavaṭṭhito. ^b^bālo^eb^ti taruṇadārako. ^b^utrasto^eb^ti ñātakehi vinābhāvena santrasto.

[03] ^b^visagaṇḍakarogo^eb^ti ^a^V1.0064^ea^ thanakandaḷarogamāha. māsarogādikopi visagaṇḍakarogoti vadanti. ^b^yato pabbajito, tato paṭṭhāya^eb^ pabbajitakālato pabhutīti attho. ^b^indriyānī^eb^ti indriyasaṃvarasīlāni. tesu hi bhinnesu indriyānipi bhinnānīti vuccanti ārakkhābhāvato, indriyāneva vā nimittānubyañjanaggāhassa dvārabhūtāni bhinnāni nāma taṃsamaṅgino anatthuppattito, vipariyāyato abhinnānīti veditabbāni. indriyānaṃ vā ayoniso upasaṃhāro bhedanaṃ, yoniso upasaṃhāro abhedananti apare. ^b^mittattherovā^eb^ti mahāmittatthero viya. ^b^vare^eb^ti seṭṭhe.

[03] ^b^tathā vīriyenā^eb^ti ^b^tathā^eb^-saddena vīriyaṃ viseseti. yathā sati anavajjalakkhaṇāva indriyasaṃvarasādhanaṃ, tathā vīriyaṃ anavajjalakkhaṇaṃ ājīvapārisuddhisādhananti. vīriyāpekkhameva visesanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. tenevāha ^b^``sammāāraddhavīriyassā''^eb^ti. ayuttā esanā anesanā, yathāvuttamicchājīvasaṅgahā. sā eva satthusāsanassa na patirūpāti appatirūpaṃ, taṃ ^b^anesanaṃ appatirūpaṃ^eb^. atha vā patirūpavirodhinī appatirūpā, pariggahitadhutaṅgassa ^a^M1.0069^ea^ dhutaṅganiyamavirodhinī yassa kassaci sallekhavikopinī paṭipatti. imasmiṃ pakkhe ca-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho, anesanaṃ, appatirūpañca pahāyāti. paṭisevamānena parivajjayatā sampādetabbāti sambandho. ``parisuddhuppāde''ti imināva dhammadesanādīnaṃ parisuddhāya samuṭṭhānatā dīpitā hotīti ^b^``dhammadesanādīhi cassa guṇehi pasannāna''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena bāhusaccavattaparipūraṇairiyāpathasampattiādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^dhutaguṇe cassa pasannāna^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^piṇḍapātacariyādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena mittasuhajjapaṃsukūlacariyādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^dhutaṅganiyamānulomenā^eb^ti taṃtaṃdhutaṅganiyatāya paṭipattiyā anulomavasena, avikopanavasenāti attho. mahicchasseva micchājīvena jīvikā, na appicchassa. appicchatāya ukkaṃsagatāya micchājīvassa asambhavo evāti dassetuṃ ^b^``ekabyādhivūpasamattha''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^pūtiharitakī^eb^ti pūtimuttaparibhāvitaṃ, pūtibhāvena vā chaḍḍitaṃ haritakaṃ. ariyavaṃso etassa atthīti, ariyavaṃse vā niyuttoti ariyavaṃsiko, paccayagedhassa dūrasamussāritattā uttamo ca so ariyavaṃsiko cāti ^b^uttamāriyavaṃsiko. yassa kassacī^eb^ti pariggahitāpariggahitadhutaṅgesu yassa kassaci.

[03] ^b^nimittaṃ^eb^ nāma paccaye uddissa yathā adhippāyo ñāyati evaṃ nimittakammaṃ. ^b^obhāso^eb^ nāma ^a^V1.0065^ea^ ujukameva akathetvā yathā adhippāyo vibhūto hoti, evaṃ obhāsanaṃ. ^b^parikathā^eb^ nāma pariyāyena kathanaṃ. ^b^tathā uppanna^eb^nti nimittādivasena uppannaṃ.

[03] ^b^dvāraṃ dinna^eb^nti rogasīsena paribhogassa dvāraṃ dinnaṃ. tasmā arogakālepi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, āpatti na hotīti attho. tenāha ^b^``kiñcāpi āpatti na hotī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti sallekhapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa na vaṭṭati, sallekhaṃ kopetīti adhippāyo. ``ājīvaṃ pana kopetī''ti imināva senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttadhutaṅgadharassa nimittādayo na vaṭṭantīti vadanti. tadaññadhutaṅgadharassāpi na vaṭṭantiyevāti apare. ^b^akaronto^eb^ti yathāsakaṃ anuññātavisayepi akaronto. ^b^aññatrevā^eb^ti ṭhapetvā eva.

[03] gaṇavāsaṃ ^a^M1.0070^ea^ pahāya araññāyatane paṭippassaddhivivekassa muddhabhūtāya aggaphalasamāpattiyā viharanto mahāthero ^b^``pavivekaṃ brūhayamāno''^eb^ti vutto. udarasannissito vātābādho ^b^udaravātābādho^eb^. asambhinnaṃ khīraṃ etassāti asambhinnakhīraṃ, tadeva pāyāsanti ^b^asambhinnakhīrapāyāsaṃ,^eb^ udakena asammissakhīrena pakkapāyāsanti attho. ^b^tassā^eb^ti pāyāsassa. ^b^uppattimūla^eb^nti ``gihikāle me, āvuso, mātā sappimadhusakkarādīhi yojetvā asambhinnakhīrapāyāsaṃ adāsi, tena me phāsu ahosī''ti attano vacīnicchāraṇasaṅkhātaṃ uppattihetuṃ. ^b^``aparibhogāraho piṇḍapāto''^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu therassa obhāsanādicittuppattiyeva natthīti? saccaṃ natthi, ajjhāsayaṃ pana ajānantā ekacce puthujjanā tathā maññeyyuṃ, anāgate ca sabrahmacārino evaṃ mama diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjeyyunti paṭikkhipi. apica mahātherassa paramukkaṃsagatā sallekhapaṭipatti. tathā hi daharabhikkhuno ``kassa sampannaṃ na manāpa''nti (pāci0 209, 257, 612, 1228, 1234; cūḷava0 343) vacanaṃ nissāya yāva parinibbānā piṭṭhakhādanīyaṃ na khādati.

[03] ^b^vacīviññattivipphārā^eb^ti vacīnicchāraṇahetu. atthaviññāpanavasena pavattamāno hi saddo asatipi viññattiyā tassa kenaci paccayena paccayabhāve vacīviññattivaseneva pavattatīti ``vacīviññattivipphāro''ti vuccati. ^b^bhutto^eb^ti bhuttavā ^b^sace bhaveyyaṃ ahaṃ. sā^eb^ti assa. akāralopena hi niddeso ``evaṃsa te''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.23; a0 ni0 6.58; 8.7) viya. ^b^antaguṇa^eb^nti antabhogo. ^b^bahi care^eb^ti āsayato nikkhamitvā gocaraggahaṇavasena ^a^V1.0066^ea^ bahi yadi vicareyya. paramappicchaṃ dassetuṃ lokavohārenevamāha. loke hi ayuttabhojanaṃ odariyaṃ garahantā evaṃ vadanti ``kiṃsu nāma tassa antāni bahi carantī''ti. ^b^ārādhemī^eb^ti ādito paṭṭhāya rādhemi, vase vattemīti attho.

[03] ^b^mahātissatthero^eb^ kira dubbhikkhakāle maggaṃ gacchanto bhattacchedena, maggakilamathena ca kilantakāyo dubbalo aññatarassa phalitassa ambassa mūle nipajji, bahūni ambaphalāni tahaṃ tahaṃ patitāni honti. tattheko vuḍḍhataro upāsako therassa santikaṃ upagantvā parissamaṃ ñatvā ^a^M1.0071^ea^ ambapānaṃ pāyetvā attano piṭṭhiṃ āropetvā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ neti. thero --
[21] ``na pitā napi te mātā, na ñāti napi bandhavo.
[22] karotetādisaṃ kiccaṃ, sīlavantassa kāraṇā''ti.. (visuddhi0 1.20) --

[25] attānaṃ ovaditvā sammasanaṃ ārabhitvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tassa piṭṭhigato eva maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi. imaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^``ambakhādakamahātissattheravatthupi cettha kathetabba''^eb^nti. ^b^sabbathāpī^eb^ti sabbappakārenapi anesanavasena, cittuppattivasenapi, pageva kāyavacīvipphanditavasenāti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``anesanāyā''^eb^tiādi.

[01] apaccavekkhitaparibhoge iṇaparibhogāapattiādīnavassa, tabbipariyāyato paccavekkhitaparibhoge ānisaṃsassa ca dassanaṃ ^b^ādīnavānisaṃsadassanaṃ^eb^. tassa pana paccayādhikārattā vuttaṃ ``paccayesū''ti. kāraṇakāraṇampi hi kāraṇabhāvena vuccati yathā tiṇehi bhattaṃ siddhanti. yena kāraṇena bhikkhuno apaccavekkhitaparibhogo nāma siyā, tasmiṃ vajjite paccayasannissitasīlaṃ sijjhati, visujjhati cāti dassetuṃ ^b^``tasmā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^paccayagedha^eb^nti gedhaggahaṇeneva sammohopi gahitoti daṭṭhabbo tena saha pavattanato, tadupanissayato ca. ^b^dhammena samena uppanne^eb^ti idaṃ paccayānaṃ āgamanasuddhidassanaṃ, na paccayasannissitasīlavisuddhidassanaṃ. paccayānaṃ hi idamatthitaṃ upadhāretvā paribhuñjanaṃ paccayasannissitasīlaṃ. yasmā pana te paccayā ñāyādhigatā eva bhikkhunā paribhuñjitabbā, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``dhammena samena uppanne paccaye''^eb^ti. ^b^yathāvuttena vidhinā^eb^ti ``sītassa paṭighātāyā''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.23; a0 ni0 6.58; mahāni0 206) vuttavidhinā.

[03] ^b^dhātuvasena^eb^ ^a^V1.0067^ea^ ^b^vā^eb^ti ``yathāpaccayaṃ vattamānaṃ dhātumattamevetaṃ, yadidaṃ cīvarādi, tadupabhuñjako ca puggalo''ti evaṃ dhātumanasikāravasena vā. ^b^paṭikūlavasena vā^eb^ti piṇḍapāte tāva āhāre paṭikūlasaññāvasena, ``sabbāni pana imāni cīvarādīni ajigucchanīyāni, imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ patvā ativiya jigucchanīyāni jāyantī''ti evaṃ paṭikūlamanasikāravasena vā. ^b^tato uttarī^eb^ti paṭilābhakālato upari. ^b^anavajjova^eb^ ^b^paribhogo^eb^ ^a^M1.0072^ea^ āditova paññāya parisodhitattā adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitapattacīvarānaṃ viyāti. paccavekkhaṇāya ādisuddhidassanaparametaṃ, na paribhogakāle paccavekkhaṇapaṭikkhepaparaṃ. tenāha ^b^``paribhogakālepī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ paribhogakāle paccavekkhaṇe. ^b^sanniṭṭhānakaro^eb^ti asandehakaro ekantiko.

[03] ^b^theyyaparibhogo^eb^ nāma anarahassa paribhogo. bhagavatāpi attano sāsane sīlavato paccayā anuññātā, na dussīlassa. dāyakānampi sīlavato eva pariccāgo, na dussīlassa. attano kārānaṃ mahapphalabhāvassa paccāsīsanato. iti satthārā ananuññātattā, dāyakehi ca apariccattattā dussīlassa paribhogo theyyāya paribhogo ^b^theyyaparibhogo^eb^. iṇavasena paribhogo ^b^iṇaparibhogo,^eb^ paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā abhāvato iṇaṃ gahetvā paribhogo viyāti attho. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti ``sīlavato''tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati. cīvaraṃ kāyato mocetvā paribhoge paribhoge purebhatta...pe0... pacchimayāmesu paccavekkhitabbanti sambandho. tathā asakkontena yathāvuttakālavisesavasena ekadivase catukkhattuṃ tikkhattuṃ dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃyeva vā paccavekkhitabbaṃ. sace aruṇaṃ uggacchati, ^b^iṇaparibhogaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati^eb^. hiyyo yaṃ mayā cīvaraṃ paribhuttaṃ, taṃ yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāya...pe0... hirikopīnapaṭicchādanatthaṃ. hiyyo yo mayā piṇḍapāto paribhutto, so ``neva davāyā''tiādinā sace atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇaṃ na kareyyāti vadanti, taṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ. ^b^senāsanampi paribhoge paribhoge^eb^ti pavese pavese. ^b^satipaccayatā^eb^ti satiyā paccayabhāvo paṭiggahaṇassa, paribhogassa ca paccavekkhaṇasatiyā paccayabhāvo yujjati, paccavekkhitvāva paṭiggahetabbaṃ, paribhuñjitabbañcāti attho. tenevāha ^b^``satiṃ katvā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^evaṃ santepī^eb^ti yadipi dvīsupi ṭhānesu paccavekkhaṇā yuttā, evaṃ santepi. apare panāhu -- ^b^sati paccayatā^eb^ti sati bhesajjaparibhogassa paccayabhāve, sati paccayeti attho. ^b^evaṃ santepī^eb^ti paccaye satipīti. taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. tathā hi paccayasannissitasīlaṃ paccavekkhaṇāya visujjhati, na paccayassa bhāvamattena.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V1.0068^ea^ paccayasannissitasīlassa visuddhiṃ dassetvā teneva pasaṅgena sabbāpi visuddhiyo dassetuṃ ^b^``catubbidhā hi suddhī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha sujjhati ^a^M1.0073^ea^ etāyāti suddhi, yathādhammaṃ desanāva suddhi ^b^desanāsuddhi^eb^. vuṭṭhānassāpi cettha desanāya eva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. chinnamūlāpattīnaṃ pana abhikkhutāpaṭiññāva desanā. adhiṭṭhānavisiṭṭho saṃvarova suddhi ^b^saṃvarasuddhi^eb^. dhammena samena paccayānaṃ pariyeṭṭhi eva suddhi ^b^pariyeṭṭhisuddhi^eb^. catūsupi paccayesu vuttavidhinā paccavekkhaṇāva suddhi ^b^paccavekkhaṇasuddhi^eb^. esa tāva suddhīsu samāsanayo. suddhimantesu pana desanā suddhi etassāti ^b^desanāsuddhi^eb^. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^suddhi^eb^-saddo pana vuttanayova. ^b^eva^eb^nti saṃvarabhedaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^pahāyā^eb^ti vajjetvā, akatvāti attho.

[03] dātabbaṭṭhena dāyaṃ, taṃ ādiyantīti ^b^dāyādā^eb^. ananuññātesu sabbena sabbaṃ paribhogābhāvato, anuññātesu eva ca paribhogasambhavato bhikkhūhi paribhuñjitabbapaccayā ^b^bhagavato santakā^eb^. ``dhammadāyādā me, bhikkhave, bhavatha mā āmisadāyādā. atthi me tumhesu anukampā `kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ no āmisadāyādā'''ti (ma0 ni0 1.29) evaṃ pavattaṃ ^b^dhammadāyādasuttañca^eb^ ettha etasmiṃ atthe ^b^sādhakaṃ^eb^.

[03] avītarāgānaṃ taṇhāparavasatāya paccayaparibhoge sāmibhāvo natthi, tadabhāvena vītarāgānaṃ tattha sāmibhāvo yathāruciparibhogasambhavato. tathā hi te paṭikūlampi appaṭikūlākārena, appaṭikūlampi paṭikūlākārena, tadubhayampi vajjetvā ajjhupekkhanākārena paccaye paribhuñjanti, dāyakānañca manorathaṃ paripūrenti. tenāha ^b^``te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṃ atītattā sāmino hutvā paribhuñjantī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^sabbesa^eb^nti ariyānaṃ, puthujjanānañca. kathaṃ puthujjanānaṃ ime paribhogā sambhavanti? upacāravasena. yo hi puthujjanassāpi sallekhapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitassa paccayagedhaṃ pahāya tattha tattha anupalittena cittena paribhogo, so ^b^sāmiparibhogo^eb^ viya hoti. ^b^sīlavato^eb^ pana paccavekkhitaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo viya hoti, dāyakānaṃ manorathassa avirādhanato. tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^``dāyajjaparibhogeyeva vā saṅgahaṃ gacchatī''^eb^ti. kalyāṇaputhujjanassa paribhoge vattabbameva natthi, tassa sekkhasaṅgahato. ^b^sekkhasuttaṃ^eb^ (saṃ0 ni0 5.13) hetassatthassa sādhakaṃ. tenāha ^b^``sīlavāpi^eb^ ^a^M1.0074^ea^ ^b^hī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^paccanīkattā^eb^ti yathā iṇāyiko attano ruciyā icchitadesaṃ gantuṃ na ^a^V1.0069^ea^ labhati, evaṃ iṇaparibhogayutto lokato nissarituṃ na labhatīti tappaṭipakkhattā sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo āṇaṇyaparibhogoti āha ^b^``āṇaṇyaparibhogo vā''^eb^ti. etena nippariyāyato catuparibhogavinimutto visuṃyevāyaṃ paribhogoti dasseti. ^b^imāya sikkhāyā^eb^ti sīlasaṅkhātāya sikkhāya. ^b^kiccakārī^eb^ti paṭiññānurūpaṃ paṭipajjanato yuttapattakārī.

[03] idāni tameva kiccakāritaṃ suttapadena vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``vuttampi ceta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^vihāra^eb^nti patissayaṃ. ^b^sayanāsana^eb^nti mañcādiṃ. ubhayenapi senāsanameva vuttaṃ. ^b^āpa^eb^nti udakaṃ. ^b^saṅghāṭirajūpavāhana^eb^nti paṃsumalādino saṅghāṭigatarajassa dhovanaṃ. ^b^sutvāna dhammaṃ sugatena desita^eb^nti cīvarādīsu ``paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṃ paṭisevati sītassa paṭighātāyā''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.23; a0 ni0 6.58; mahāni0 206) nayena bhagavatā desitaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā. ^b^saṅkhāya seve varapaññasāvako^eb^ti ``piṇḍa''nti vuttaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ, vihārādipadehi vuttaṃ senāsanaṃ, ``pipāsāgelaññassa vūpasamanato pānīyampi gilānapaccayo''ti āpamukhena dassitaṃ gilānapaccayaṃ, saṅghāṭiyādicīvaranti catubbidhaṃ paccayaṃ saṅkhāya ``yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.23; 2.24; 3.75; saṃ0 ni0 4.120; a0 ni0 6.58; 8.9; dha0 sa0 1355) nayena paccavekkhitvā. ^b^seve^eb^ sevituṃ sakkuṇeyya uttamapaññassa bhagavato sāvako sekho vā puthujjano vā.

[03] yasmā ca saṅkhāya sevī varapaññasāvako, ^b^tasmā hi piṇḍe...pe0... pokkhare vāribindu,^eb^ tathā hoti. ^b^kālenā^eb^ti ariyānaṃ bhojanakāle. ^b^laddhā^eb^ti labhitvā. ^b^parato^eb^ti aññato dāyakato. ^b^anuggahā^eb^ti anukampāya bahumhi upanīte ^b^mattaṃ^eb^ so ^b^jaññā^eb^ jāneyya ^b^satataṃ^eb^ sabbakālaṃ ^b^upaṭṭhito^eb^ upaṭṭhitassati. ^b^ālepanarūhane yathā^eb^ti bhesajjalepanena vaṇassa ruhane viya, mattaṃ jāneyyāti yojanā. ^b^āhare^eb^ti āhareyya. ``āhareyyāhāra''nti vā pāṭho. ^b^yāpanattha^eb^nti sarīrassa yāpanāya. ^b^amucchito^eb^ti taṇhāmucchāya amucchito gedhaṃ taṇhaṃ anāpanno.

[03] attano ^a^M1.0075^ea^ mātulassa saṅgharakkhitattherasseva nāmassa gahitattā ^b^bhāgineyyasaṅgharakkhitasāmaṇero. sālikūra^eb^nti sālibhattaṃ. ^b^sunibbuta^eb^nti susītalaṃ. ^b^asaññato^eb^ti apaccavekkhaṇaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^sabbāsavaparikkhīṇo^eb^ti parikkhīṇasabbāsavo.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ pariyanto ^a^V1.0070^ea^ etesaṃ atthīti pariyantāni, pariyantāni sikkhāpadāni yesaṃ te pariyantasikkhāpadā, tesaṃ ^b^pariyantasikkhāpadānaṃ. upasampannāna^eb^nti ṭhapetvā kalyāṇaputhujjanasekkhāsekkhe tadaññesaṃ upasampannānaṃ. sāmaññajotanāpi hi visese tiṭṭhati. ^b^kusaladhamme yuttāna^eb^nti vipassanācāre yuttapayuttānaṃ. sekkhadhammā pariyantā paramā mariyādā etassāti ^b^sekkhapariyanto^eb^. nāmarūpaparicchedato, kusaladhammasamādānato vā pana paṭṭhāya yāva gotrabhū, tāva pavattakusaladhammappabandho sekkhadhamme āhacca ṭhito sekkhapariyanto. sekkhadhammānaṃ vā heṭṭhimantabhūtā sikkhitabbā lokiyā tisso sikkhā sekkhapariyanto, tasmiṃ ^b^sekkhapariyante. paripūrakārīna^eb^nti kiñcipi sikkhaṃ ahāpetvā pūrentānaṃ. uparivisesādhigamatthaṃ ^b^kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhānaṃ^eb^. tato eva sīlapāripūriatthaṃ ^b^pariccattajīvitānaṃ^eb^. diṭṭhisaṃkilesena aparāmasanīyato pārisuddhivantaṃ sīlaṃ ^b^aparāmaṭṭhapārisuddhisīlaṃ^eb^. kilesānaṃ sabbaso paṭippassaddhiyā pārisuddhivantaṃ sīlaṃ ^b^paṭippassaddhipārisuddhisīlaṃ^eb^.

[03] anupasampannānaṃ asekkhānaṃ, sekkhānaṃ, kalyāṇaputhujjanānañca sīlaṃ mahānubhāvatāya ānubhāvato apariyantamevāti āha ^b^``gaṇanavasena sapariyantattā''^eb^ti. kāyavācānaṃ saṃvaraṇato, vinayanato ca ^b^saṃvaravinayā. peyyālamukhena niddiṭṭhā^eb^ti tattha tattha satthārā desitavitthāranayena yathāvuttagaṇanato niddiṭṭhā. ^b^sikkhā^eb^ti sīlasaṅkhātā sikkhā. ^b^vinayasaṃvare^eb^ti vinayapiṭake. gaṇanavasena sapariyantampi upasampannānaṃ sīlanti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. yaṃ kiñci hi upasampannena sikkhitabbaṃ sīlaṃ nāma, tattha kassacipi anavasesato ^b^anavasesavasena^eb^ ^a^M1.0076^ea^. ^b^samādānabhāva^eb^nti samādānasabbhāvaṃ. ^b^lābha...pe0... vasena adiṭṭhapariyantabhāvo^eb^ lābhādihetu sīlassa avītikkamo.

[03] ^b^dhanaṃ caje aṅgavarassa hetu^eb^ pāripanthikacorādīhi upadduto. ^b^aṅgaṃ caje jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno^eb^ sappadaṭṭhādikāle. ^b^aṅgaṃ dhanaṃ jīvitañcāpi sabbaṃ, caje naro dhammamanussaranto^eb^ sutasomamahābodhisattādayo viya. tenāha ^b^``imaṃ sappurisānussatiṃ avijahanto''^eb^ti. jighacchāparissamena ^b^jīvitasaṃsaye^eb^ satipi. ^b^sikkhāpadaṃ avītikkammā^eb^ti assāmikesu ambaphalesu ^a^V1.0071^ea^ bhūmiyaṃ patitesu samīpeyeva santesupi paṭiggāhakābhāvena aparibhuñjanto ^b^paṭiggahaṇasikkhāpadaṃ^eb^ avītikkamitvā.

[03] ^b^sīlavantassā^eb^ti sīlavantabhāvassa ^b^kāraṇā,^eb^ sīlavantassa vā tuyhaṃ etādisaṃ aṃsena vāhaṇādikaṃ kiccaṃ karoti, kāraṇā sīlassāti adhippāyo. ^b^sudhotajātimaṇi viyā^eb^ti catūsu pāsāṇesu sammadeva dhotajātimaṇi viya. ^b^mahāsaṅgharakkhitabhāgineyyasaṅgharakkhitattherānaṃ viyā^eb^ti mahāsaṅgharakkhitattherassa, tasseva bhāgineyyasaṅgharakkhitattherassa viya ca. ``kimatthaṃ mayaṃ idhāgatā''ti mahājanassa vippaṭisāro bhavissatīti adhippāyo. ^b^accharikāyā^eb^ti aṅguliphoṭanena. ^b^asatiyā^eb^ti satisammosena. ^b^aññāṇapakata^eb^nti aññāṇena aparajjhitvā kataṃ, ajānitvā katanti attho.

[03] ^b^appassutopi ce hotī^eb^ti suttageyyādisutarahito hoti ce. ^b^sīlesu asamāhito^eb^ti pātimokkhasaṃvarādisīlesupi na sammā patiṭṭhito hoti ce. ^b^nāssa sampajjate suta^eb^nti assa sīlarahitassa puggalassa sutaṃ attano, paresañca katthaci bhavasampattiāvahaṃ na hoti. ``dussīloyaṃ purisapuggalo''ti hi sikkhākāmā na tassa santikaṃ upasaṅkamanti. ^b^bahussutopi ce^eb^ti ettha ^b^ce^eb^-ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^pasaṃsito^eb^ti pasaṃsito eva nāma.

[03] rāgavasena aparāmaṭṭhagahaṇena taṇhāparāmāsābhāvamāha. ^b^tathārūpa^eb^nti rāgavasena aparāmaṭṭhaṃ. ^b^bhinditvā^eb^ti hanitvā. ^b^saññapessāmī^eb^ti saññattiṃ ^a^M1.0077^ea^ karissāmi, appakaṃ velaṃ maṃ vissejjetunti adhippāyo. ^b^aṭṭiyāmī^eb^ti jigucchāmi. ^b^harāyāmī^eb^ti lajjāmi.

[03] ^b^palipanno^eb^ti sīdanto, sammakkhito vā. ^b^sīleneva saddhiṃ marissāmī^eb^ti sīlaṃ avināsento tena saheva marissāmi, na idāni kadācipi taṃ pariccajissāmi. sati hi bhavādāne sīlena viyogo siyā, bhavameva nādiyissāmīti adhippāyo. ^b^rogaṃ sammasanto^eb^ti rogabhūtaṃ vedanaṃ vedanāmukhena sesārūpadhamme, rūpadhamme ca pariggahetvā vipassanto.

[03] ^b^ruppato^eb^ti vikāraṃ āpādiyamānasarīrassa. ^b^parisussatī^eb^ti samantato sussati. yathā kiṃ? ^b^pupphaṃ yathā paṃsuni ātape kataṃ^eb^ sūriyātapasantatte paṃsuni ṭhapitaṃ sirīsādipupphaṃ viyāti ^a^V1.0072^ea^ attho. ^b^ajañña^eb^nti amanuññaṃ jigucchanīyaṃ. ^b^jaññasaṅkhāta^eb^nti bālehi ``jañña''nti evaṃ kittitaṃ. ^b^jaññarūpaṃ apassato^eb^ti yathābhūtaṃ appassato aviddasuno ``jañña''nti pasaṃsitaṃ. ^b^dhiratthuma^eb^nti dhi atthu imaṃ, dhi-saddayogena sabbattha upayogavacanaṃ, imassa pūtikāyassa dhikāro hotūti attho. ^b^duggandhiya^eb^nti duggandhikaṃ duggandhavantaṃ. ^b^yattha^eb^ yathāvutte pūtikāye rāgahetu ^b^pamattā^eb^ pamādaṃ āpannā. ^b^pajā^eb^ti sattā. ^b^hāpenti maggaṃ sugatūpapattiyā^eb^ti sugatūpapattiyā maggaṃ, sīlampi hāpenti, pageva jhānādinti adhippāyo. kevalaṃ ``arahanto''ti vattabbā sāvakakhīṇāsavā, itare pana paccekabuddhā sammāsambuddhāti saha visesanenāti āha ^b^``arahantādīna''^eb^nti. ^b^sabbadarathappaṭippassaddhiyā^eb^ti sabbakilesadarathappaṭippassaddhiyā.

[03] ^b^pāṇātipātādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena adinnādānādīnaṃ aggamaggavajjhakilesapariyosānānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^pahānādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena veramaṇiādīnaṃ catunnaṃ. kesuci potthakesu ``pahānavasenā''ti likhanti, sā pamādalekhā. ^b^pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃ sīla^eb^nti hirottappakaruṇālobhādipamukhena yena kusalacittuppādena pāṇātipāto pahīyati, taṃ pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃ sīlanaṭṭhena sīlaṃ. tathā pāṇātipātā ^a^M1.0078^ea^ virati ^b^veramaṇī sīlaṃ^eb^. pāṇātipātassa paṭipakkhacetanā ^b^cetanā sīlaṃ^eb^. pāṇātipātassa saṃvaraṇaṃ pavesadvārapidhānaṃ ^b^saṃvaro sīlaṃ^eb^. pāṇātipātassa avītikkamanaṃ ^b^avītikkamo sīlaṃ. adinnādānassā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^abhijjhā^eb^dīnaṃ pana anabhijjhādivasena pahānaṃ veditabbaṃ. veramaṇī cetanā taṃsampayuttā saṃvarāvītikkamā tappamukhā dhammā.

[03] evaṃ dasakusalakammapathavasena pahānasīlādīni dassetvā idāni saupāyānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ, aṭṭhārasannaṃ mahāvipassanānaṃ, ariyamaggānañca vasena tāni dassetuṃ ^b^``nekkhammenā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^nekkhammenā^eb^ti alobhappadhānena kusalacittuppādena. kusalā hi dhammā kāmapaṭipakkhā idha ``nekkhamma''nti adhippetā. tenāha ^b^``kāmacchandassa pahānaṃ sīla''^eb^ntiādi. tattha ^b^pahānasīlā^eb^dīni heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. visesameva vakkhāma. ^b^abyāpādenā^eb^ti mettāya. ^b^ālokasaññāyā^eb^ti vibhūtaṃ katvā manasikaraṇena upaṭṭhitāalokasañjānanena ^a^V1.0073^ea^. ^b^avikkhepenā^eb^ti samādhinā. ^b^dhammavavatthānenā^eb^ti kusalādidhammānaṃ yāthāvanicchayena. sapaccayanāmarūpavavatthānenātipi vadanti.

[01] evaṃ kāmacchandādinīvaraṇappahānena ``abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā''tiādinā (vibha0 538) vuttāya paṭhamajjhānādhigamassa upāyabhūtāya pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya vasena pahānasīlādīni dassetvā idāni saupāyānaṃ aṭṭhasamāpattiādīnaṃ vasena dassetuṃ ^b^``ñāṇenā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. nāmarūpapariggahakaṅkhāvitaraṇānaṃ hi vibandhabhūtassa mohassa dūrīkaraṇena ñātapariññāya ṭhitassa aniccasaññādayo sijjhanti. tathā jhānasamāpattīsu abhiratinimittena pāmojjena. tattha anabhiratiyā vinoditāya jhānādīnaṃ samadhigamoti samāpattivipassanānaṃ arativinodanāvijjāpadālanādinā upāyoti vuttaṃ ^b^``ñāṇena avijjāya, pāmojjena aratiyā''^eb^ti. uppaṭipāṭiniddeso pana nīvaraṇasabhāvāya avijjāya heṭṭhānīvaraṇesupi saṅgahadassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
