[03] ^b^``paṭhamena^eb^ ^a^M1.0079^ea^ ^b^jhānena nīvaraṇāna''^eb^ntiādīsu kathaṃ jhānānaṃ sīlabhāvo, kathaṃ vā tattha viratiyā sambhavo. suvisuddhakāyakammādikassa hi cittasamādānavasena imāni jhānāni pavattanti, na parittakusalāni viya kāyakammādivisodhanavasena, nāpi maggaphaladhammā viya duccaritadurājīvasamucchedapaṭippassambhanavasenāti? saccametaṃ. mahaggatadhammesu nippariyāyena natthi sīlanaṭṭho, kuto viramaṇaṭṭho. pariyāyena panetaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ko pana so pariyāyo? yadaggena mahaggatā kusaladhammā paṭipakkhe pajahanti, tadaggena tato oratā. te ca yathā cittaṃ nārohanti, evaṃ saṃvutā nāma honti. pariyuṭṭhānasaṅkhāto manodvāre vītikkamo natthi etesūti avītikkamāti ca vuccanti, cetanā pana taṃsampayuttāti. soyamattho parato āgamissati. evañca katvā vitakkādipahānavacanampi samatthitaṃ hoti. na hi nippariyāyato sīlaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ pahāyakaṃ yujjati, na cettha akusalavitakkādayo adhippetā. kiñcāpi paṭhamajjhānūpacāreyeva dukkhassa, catutthajjhānūpacāre ca sukhassa pahānaṃ hoti, atisayapahānaṃ pana sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^``catutthena jhānena sukhadukkhānaṃ pahāna''^eb^nti. ^b^``ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā''^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^āruppakathāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi0 1.275 ādayo) āgamissati.

[03] aniccassa, aniccanti vā anupassanā ^b^aniccānupassanā^eb^. tebhūmikadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ gahetvā ^a^V1.0074^ea^ pavattāya vipassanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^niccasaññāyā^eb^ti ``saṅkhatadhammā niccā sassatā''ti evaṃ pavattāya micchāsaññāya, saññāggahaṇeneva diṭṭhicittānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. esa nayo ito parāsupi. ^b^nibbidānupassanāyā^eb^ti saṅkhāresu nibbindanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya. ^b^nandiyā^eb^ti sappītikataṇhāya. ^b^virāgānupassanāyā^eb^ti virajjanākārena pavattāya anupassanāya. ^b^rāgassā^eb^ti saṅkhāresu rāgassa. ^b^nirodhānupassanāyā^eb^ti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhassa anupassanāya. yathā vā saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva, āyatiṃ punabbhavavasena na uppajjanti, evaṃ anupassanā nirodhānupassanā. tenevāha ``nirodhānupassanāya nirodheti no samudetī''ti (paṭi0 ma0 1.83). muñcitukāmatāya hi ayaṃ balappattā. saṅkhārānaṃ paṭinissajjanākārena pavattā anupassanā ^b^paṭinissaggānupassanā^eb^. paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā hi ayaṃ ^a^M1.0080^ea^. ^b^ādānassā^eb^ti niccādivasena gahaṇassa. santatisamūhakiccārammaṇavasena ekattagahaṇaṃ ghanasaññā, tassā ^b^ghanasaññāya. āyūhanassā^eb^ti abhisaṅkharaṇassa. saṅkhārānaṃ avatthādivisesāpatti ^b^vipariṇāmo. dhuvasaññāyā^eb^ti thirabhāvagahaṇassa. ^b^nimittassā^eb^ti samūhādighanavasena sakiccaparicchedatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ saviggahatāya. ^b^paṇidhiyā^eb^ti rāgādipaṇidhiyā, taṇhāvasena saṅkhāresu ninnatāyāti attho. ^b^abhinivesassā^eb^ti attānudiṭṭhiyā. aniccadukkhādivasena sabbatebhūmakadhammatiraṇā ^b^adhipaññādhammavipassanā. sārādānābhinivesassā^eb^ti asāresu sāragahaṇavipallāsassa. ^b^yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ^eb^ thirabhāvapattā aniccādianupassanāva. udayabbayañāṇanti keci. sappaccayanāmarūpadassananti apare. ``issarakuttādivasena loko samuppanno''ti abhiniveso ^b^sammohābhiniveso^eb^. ucchedasassatābhinivesoti keci. ``ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna''ntiādinayappavattā (ma0 ni0 1.18; saṃ0 ni0 2.20; mahāni0 174) saṃsayāpatti sammohābhinivesoti apare. saṅkhāresu tāṇaleṇabhāvagahaṇaṃ ^b^ālayābhiniveso^eb^. ``ālayaratā ālayasammuditā''ti (dī0 ni0 2.67; ma0 ni0 1.281; 2.337; saṃ0 ni0 1.172; mahāva0 7-8) vacanato ālayo taṇhā. sā eva cakkhādīsu, rūpādīsu ca abhinivisanavasena pavattiyā ālayābhinivesoti apare. ``evaṃ ṭhitā te saṅkhārā paṭinissajjīyantī''ti pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ ^b^paṭisaṅkhānupassanā. appaṭisaṅkhā^eb^ paṭisaṅkhāya paṭipakkhabhūtā mohappadhānā akusaladhammā. vaṭṭato vigatattā vivaṭṭaṃ nibbānaṃ, tattha ninnabhāvasaṅkhātena anupassanena pavatti ^b^vivaṭṭānupassanā,^eb^ saṅkhārupekkhā ceva anulomañāṇañca. ^b^saññogābhiniveso^eb^ saṃyujjanavasena saṅkhāresu abhinivisanaṃ.

[03] ^b^diṭṭhekaṭṭhāna^eb^nti ^a^V1.0075^ea^ diṭṭhiyā sahajekaṭṭhānañca pahānekaṭṭhānañca. ^b^oḷārikāna^eb^nti uparimaggavajjhe kilese upādāya vuttaṃ. aññathā dassanena pahātabbāpi dutiyamaggavajjhehi oḷārikā. ^b^aṇusahagatāna^eb^nti aṇubhūtānaṃ, idaṃ heṭṭhimamaggavajjhe upādāya vuttaṃ. ^b^sabbakilesāna^eb^nti avasiṭṭhasabbakilesānaṃ. na hi paṭhamamaggādīhi pahīnā kilesā puna pahīyanti.

[03] ^b^``cittassa^eb^ ^a^M1.0081^ea^ ^b^avippaṭisārāya saṃvattantī''^eb^tiādīsu saṃvaro avippaṭisāratthāya. ``avippaṭisāratthāni kho, ānanda, kusalāni sīlānī''ti (a0 ni0 10.1) vacanato cetaso avippaṭisāratthāya bhavanti. avippaṭisāro pāmojjatthāya. ``yoniso manasi karoto pāmojjaṃ jāyatī''ti (dī0 ni0 3.359) vacanato ^b^pāmojjāya saṃvattanti^eb^. pāmojjaṃ pītiyā. ``pamuditassa pīti jāyatī''ti (dī0 ni0 1.466; 3.359; a0 ni0 3.96; 6.10; 11.12) vacanato ^b^pītiyā saṃvattanti^eb^. pīti passaddhatthāya. ``pītimanassa kāyo passambhatī''ti (dī0 ni0 1.466; 3.359; a0 ni0 3.96; 6.10; 11.12) vacanato ^b^passaddhiyā saṃvattanti^eb^. passaddhi sukhatthāya. ``passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedetī''ti (dī0 ni0 1.466; 3.359; a0 ni0 3.96; 6.10; 11.12) vacanato ^b^somanassāya saṃvattantī^eb^ti. ``sukhatthāya sukhaṃ vedetī''ti cettha somanassaṃ ``sukha''nti vuttaṃ. ^b^āsevanāyā^eb^ti samādhissa āsevanāya. nirāmise hi sukhe siddhe ``sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī''ti (dī0 ni0 1.466; 3.359; a0 ni0 3.96; 6.10; 11.12) vacanato samādhi siddhoyeva hoti, tasmā samādhissa āsevanāya paguṇabalavabhāvāya saṃvattantīti attho. ^b^bhāvanāyā^eb^ti tasseva samādhissa vaḍḍhiyā. ^b^bahulīkammāyā^eb^ti punappunaṃ kiriyāya. ^b^alaṅkārāyā^eb^ti tasseva samādhissa pasādhanabhūtasaddhindriyādinipphattiyā alaṅkārāya ^b^saṃvattanti. parikkhārāyā^eb^ti avippaṭisārādikassa samādhisambhārassa siddhiyā tasseva samādhissa parikkhārāya saṃvattanti. sambhārattho hi idha parikkhāra-saddo. ``ye ca kho ime pabbajitena jīvitaparikkhārā samudānetabbā''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.191) viya sambhāroti ca paccayo veditabbo. kāmañcāyaṃ parikkhāra-saddo ``ratho sīlaparikkhāro''tiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 5.4) alaṅkārattho. ``sattahi nagaraparikkhārehi suparikkhattaṃ hotī''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 7.67) parivārattho vutto. idha pana alaṅkāraparivārānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā ``sambhārattho''ti vuttaṃ ^a^V1.0076^ea^. ^b^parivārāyā^eb^ti mūlakāraṇabhāveneva samādhissa parivārabhūtasativīriyādidhammavisesasādhanena parivārasampattiyā saṃvattanti. ^b^pāripūriyā^eb^ti vasībhāvasampāpanena, vipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhāvāpādanena ca paripuṇṇabhāvasādhanato samādhissa pāripūriyā ^b^saṃvattanti^eb^.

[03] evaṃ suparisuddhasīlamūlakaṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ samādhiṃ dassetvā idāni ``samāhito pajānāti passati, yathābhūtaṃ jānaṃ passaṃ nibbindati, nibbindaṃ virajjati ^a^M1.0082^ea^, virāgā vimuccatī''ti (a0 ni0 10.2; sa0 ni0 3.14) vacanato sīlamūlakāni samādhipadaṭṭhānāni payojanāni dassetuṃ ^b^``ekantanibbidāyā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. nibbidāya hi dassitāya tassā padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṃ dassitameva hoti, tasmiṃ asati nibbidāya asijjhanato. nibbidādayo atthato vibhattā eva. yathābhūtañāṇadassananti panettha sappaccayanāmarūpadassanaṃ adhippetaṃ. evamettha amatamahānibbānapariyosānaṃ sīlassa payojanaṃ dassitanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] idāni pahānādīsu sīlatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``ettha cā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha pajahanaṃ anuppādanirodho ^b^pahāna^eb^nti tassa bhāvasādhanataṃ sandhāya ^b^``pahānanti koci dhammo nāma natthī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yathā panassa dhammabhāvo sambhavati, tathā heṭṭhā saṃvaṇṇitameva. evaṃ hissa sīlabhāvo suṭṭhu yujjati. ^b^taṃ taṃ pahāna^eb^nti ``pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃ, adinnādānassa pahāna''nti evaṃ vuttaṃ taṃ taṃ pahānaṃ. ^b^tassa tassa kusaladhammassā^eb^ti pāṇātipātassa pahānaṃ mettādikusaladhammassa, adinnādānassa pahānaṃ cāgādikusaladhammassāti evaṃ tassa tassa kusaladhammassa. ^b^patiṭṭhānaṭṭhenā^eb^ti patiṭṭhānabhāvena. pahānaṃ hi tasmiṃ sati hoti, asati na hoti, tassa ``patiṭṭhāna''nti vattabbataṃ labhatīti katvā yasmiṃ santāne pāṇātipātādayo tassa pakampahetavoti tappahānaṃ ^b^vikampābhāvakaraṇena ca samādhānaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ. evaṃ sesapahānesupi vattabbaṃ. ^b^samādhānaṃ^eb^ saṇṭhapanaṃ, saṃyamanaṃ vā. ^b^itare cattāro^eb^ti veramaṇiādayo cattāro dhammā na pahānaṃ viya vohāramattanti adhippāyo. ^b^tato tato^eb^ti tamhā tamhā pāṇātipātādito. ^b^tassa tassā^eb^ti pāṇātipātādikassa saṃvaraṇavasena, tassa tassa vā saṃvarassa vasena. ^b^tadubhayasampayuttacetanāvasenā^eb^ti veramaṇīhi, saṃvaradhammehi ca sampayuttāya cetanāya vasena. ^b^taṃ taṃ avītikkamantassā^eb^ti taṃ taṃ pāṇātipātādiṃ avītikkamantassa puggalassa, dhammasamūhassa vā vasena ^b^cetaso pavattisabbhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttā^eb^. tasmā ekakkhaṇepi labbhantīti adhippāyo.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ saṃkilissati ^a^M1.0083^ea^ ^a^V1.0077^ea^ tenāti ^b^saṃkileso^eb^. ko pana soti āha ^b^``khaṇḍādibhāvo sīlassa saṃkileso''^eb^ti. vodāyati visujjhati etenāti ^b^vodānaṃ, akhaṇḍādibhāvo. lābhayasādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ñātiaṅgajīvitādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā vemajjhe^eb^ti ca idaṃ tesaṃ uddesādipāḷivasena vuttaṃ. na hi añño koci āpattikkhandhānaṃ anukkamo atthi. ^b^khaṇḍa^eb^nti khaṇḍavantaṃ, khaṇḍitaṃ vā. ^b^chidda^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^pariyante chinnasāṭako viyā^eb^ti vatthante, dasante vā chinnavatthaṃ viya.

[03] ^b^eva^eb^nti idāni vuccamānākārena. ^b^methunasaṃyogavasenā^eb^ti rāgapariyuṭṭhānena sadisabhāvāpattiyā mithunānaṃ idanti methunaṃ, nibandhanaṃ. methunavasena samāyogo methunasaṃyogo. idha pana methunasaṃyogo viyāti methunasaṃyogo, tassa vasena. ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ loke. ^b^ekacco^eb^ti eko. ^b^samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā^eb^ti pabbajjāmattena samaṇo vā jātimattena brāhmaṇo vā. ^b^dvayaṃdvayasamāpatti^eb^nti dvīhi dvīhi samāpajjitabbaṃ, methunanti attho. ^b^na heva kho samāpajjatī^eb^ti sambandho. ^b^ucchādanaṃ^eb^ ubbattanaṃ. ^b^sambāhanaṃ^eb^ parimaddanaṃ. ^b^sādiyatī^eb^ti adhivāseti. ^b^tadassādetī^eb^ti taṃ ucchādanādiṃ abhiramati. ^b^nikāmetī^eb^ti icchati. ^b^vitti^eb^nti tuṭṭhiṃ. ^b^idampi kho^eb^ti ettha ^b^ida^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ sādiyanādiṃ khaṇḍabhāvādivasena ekaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^pi^eb^-saddo vakkhamānaṃ upādāya samuccayattho. ^b^kho^eb^-saddo avadhāraṇattho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yadetaṃ brahmacārīpaṭiññassa asatipi dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiyaṃ mātugāmassa ucchādananhāpanasambāhanasādiyanādi, idampi ekaṃsena tassa brahmacariyassa khaṇḍādibhāvāpādanato khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi kammāsampīti. evaṃ pana khaṇḍādibhāvāpattiyā so aparisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carati, na parisuddhaṃ, saṃyutto methunasaṃyogena, na visaṃyutto. tato cassa na jātiādīhi parimuttīti dassento ^b^``ayaṃ vuccatī''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] ^b^sañjagghatī^eb^ti kilesavasena mahāhasitaṃ hasati. ^b^saṃkīḷatī^eb^ti kāyasaṃsaggavasena kīḷati. ^b^saṃkelāyatī^eb^ti sabbaso mātugāmaṃ kelāyanto ^a^M1.0084^ea^ viharati. ^b^cakkhunā^eb^ti attano cakkhunā. ^b^cakkhu^eb^nti mātugāmassa cakkhuṃ. ^b^upanijjhāyatī^eb^ti upecca nijjhāyati oloketi. ^b^tirokuṭṭā^eb^ti kuṭṭassa ^a^V1.0078^ea^ parato. tathā ^b^tiropākārā^eb^. mattikāmayā bhitti kuṭṭaṃ, iṭṭhakāmayā pākāroti vadanti. yā kāci vā bhitti porisato diyaḍḍharatanuccappamāṇā kuṭṭaṃ, kuṭṭato adhiko pākāro.

[03] ^b^assā^eb^ti brahmacārīpaṭiññassa. ^b^pubbe^eb^ti vatasamādānato pubbe. ^b^kāmaguṇehī^eb^ti kāmakoṭṭhāsehi. ^b^samappita^eb^nti suṭṭhu appitaṃ sahitaṃ. ^b^samaṅgībhūta^eb^nti samannāgataṃ. ^b^paricārayamāna^eb^nti kīḷantaṃ, upaṭṭhahiyamānaṃ vā. ^b^paṇidhāyā^eb^ti patthetvā. ^b^sīlenā^eb^tiādīsu yamaniyamādisamādānavasena ^b^sīlaṃ^eb^. avītikkamavasena ^b^vataṃ^eb^. ubhayampi ^b^sīlaṃ^eb^. dukkaracariyavasena pavattitaṃ ^b^vataṃ^eb^. taṃtaṃakiccasammatato vā nivattilakkhaṇaṃ ^b^sīlaṃ^eb^. taṃtaṃsamādānavato vesabhojanakiccakaraṇādivisesapaṭipatti ^b^vataṃ^eb^. sabbathāpi dukkaracariyā ^b^tapo^eb^. methunavirati ^b^brahmacariyaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^sabbaso^eb^ti anavasesato, sabbesaṃ vā. ^b^abhedenā^eb^ti avītikkamena. aparāya ca pāpadhammānaṃ anuppattiyā, guṇānaṃ uppattiyā saṅgahitoti yojanā. tattha kujjhanalakkhaṇo ^b^kodho^eb^. upanandhanalakkhaṇo ^b^upanāho^eb^. paresaṃ guṇamakkhanalakkhaṇo ^b^makkho^eb^. yugaggāhalakkhaṇo ^b^paḷāso^eb^. parasampattiusūyanalakkhaṇā ^b^issā^eb^. attasampattinigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ ^b^macchariyaṃ^eb^. santadosapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā ^b^māyā^eb^. asantaguṇasambhāvanalakkhaṇaṃ ^b^sāṭheyyaṃ^eb^. cittassa thaddhabhāvalakkhaṇo ^b^thambho^eb^. karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇo ^b^sārambho^eb^. unnatilakkhaṇo ^b^māno^eb^. abbhunnatilakkhaṇo ^b^atimāno^eb^. majjanalakkhaṇo ^b^mado^eb^. cittavosaggalakkhaṇo ^b^pamādo. ādi^eb^-saddena lobhamohaviparītamanasikārādīnaṃ saṅgaho.

[03] idāni ``akhaṇḍādibhāvo panā''tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^``yāni hī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^anupahatānī^eb^ti anupaddutāni. vivaṭṭūpanissayatāya taṇhādāsabyato mocanena ^b^bhujissabhāvakaraṇaṃ^eb^. aviññūnaṃ appamāṇattā vuttaṃ ^b^``viññūhi pasatthattā''^eb^ti. samādhisaṃvattanaṃ vā etesaṃ payojanaṃ, samādhisaṃvattane vā niyuttānīti ^b^samādhisaṃvattanikāni^eb^. niddānena sassasampatti viya paṭipakkhavigamena sīlasampadā, sā ca tattha ^a^M1.0085^ea^ sati dosadassaneti āha ^b^``sīlavipattiyā ca ādīnavadassanenā''^eb^ti. nisammakārīnaṃ payojanagarukatāya diṭṭhaguṇeyeva sammāpaṭipattīti vuttaṃ ^b^``sīlasampattiyā ca ānisaṃsadassanenā''^eb^ti.

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0079^ea^ sīlavipattiyā ādīnavo sīlasampadāya heṭṭhā dassitāanisaṃsapaṭipakkhato veditabbo, taṃ suviññeyyanti avitthāretvā pakārantarehi dassetuṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^ti āraddhaṃ. tattha yathā sīlasampadā sattānaṃ manuññabhāvakāraṇaṃ, evaṃ sīlavipatti amanuññabhāvakāraṇanti āha ^b^``dussīlo...pe0... devamanussāna''^eb^nti. ^b^ananusāsanīyo^eb^ jigucchitabbato. ^b^dukkhito^eb^ti sañjātadukkho. ^b^vippaṭisārī^eb^ti ``akataṃ vata me kalyāṇa''ntiādinā paccānutāpī. ^b^dubbaṇṇo^eb^ti guṇavaṇṇena, kāyavaṇṇena ca virahito. ^b^assā^eb^ti dussīlassa. samphassitānaṃ dukkho dukkhāvaho samphasso etassāti ^b^dukkhasamphasso^eb^. guṇānubhāvābhāvato appaṃ agghatīti ^b^appaggho. anekavassagaṇikagūthakūpo viyā^eb^ti anekavassasamūhe sañcitukkārāvāṭo viya. ^b^dubbisodhano^eb^ sodhetuṃ asakkuṇeyyo. ^b^chavālātaṃ^eb^ chavaḍāhe santajjanummukkaṃ. ^b^ubhato paribāhiro^eb^ti sāmaññato, gihibhogato ca parihīno. sabbesaṃ verī, sabbe vā verī etassāti sabbaverī, so eva ^b^sabbaveriko, puriso^eb^. saṃvāsaṃ nārahatīti ^b^asaṃvāsāraho. saddhamme^eb^ti paṭipattisaddhamme, paṭivedhasaddhamme ca.

[03] ``aggikkhandhapariyāye vuttadukkhabhāgitāyā''ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^``dussīlānañhī''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. pañcakāmaguṇaparibhogasukhe, parehi kayiramānavandanamānanādisukhe ca assādena gadhitacittā ^b^pañcakāma...pe0... gadhitacittā,^eb^ tesaṃ. te yathāvuttasukhassādā paccayā etassāti ^b^tappaccayaṃ^eb^. dukkhanti sambandho.

[03] ^b^passatha no^eb^ti passatha nu, api passatha. ^b^mahanta^eb^nti vipulaṃ. ^b^aggikkhandha^eb^nti aggisamūhaṃ. ^b^āditta^eb^nti padittaṃ. ^b^sampajjalita^eb^nti samantato pajjalitaṃ acchivipphuliṅgāni muccantaṃ. ^b^sajotibhūta^eb^nti sapabhaṃ samantato uṭṭhitāhi jālāhi ekappabhāsamudayabhūtaṃ. ^b^taṃ kiṃ maññathā^eb^ti taṃ idāni mayā vuccamānamatthaṃ kiṃ maññathāti anumatigahaṇatthaṃ pucchati. ^b^āliṅgetvā^eb^ti upagūhitvā. ^b^upanisīdeyyā^eb^ti teneva āliṅganena upecca nisīdeyya. yadatthamettha satthā aggikkhandhāliṅganaṃ, kaññāliṅganañca ānesi, tamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``ārocayāmī''^eb^tiādimāha ^a^M1.0086^ea^. tattha ^b^ārocayāmī^eb^ti āmantemi. ^b^vo^eb^ti tumhe. ^b^paṭivedayāmī^eb^ti pabodhemi. ^b^dussīlassā^eb^ti nissīlassa sīlavirahitassa. ^b^pāpadhammassā^eb^ti dussīlattā eva hīnajjhāsayatāya lāmakasabhāvassa. ^b^asucisaṅkassarasamācārassā^eb^ti aparisuddhakāyasamācārāditāya asucissa hutvā saṅkāya saritabbasamācārassa. dussīlo hi kiñcideva asāruppaṃ disvā ``idaṃ ^a^V1.0080^ea^ asukena kataṃ bhavissatī''ti paresaṃ āsaṅkanīyova hoti, kenacideva vā karaṇīyena mantayante bhikkhū disvā ``kacci nu kho ime mayā kataṃ kammaṃ jānitvā mantentī''ti attanoyeva saṅkāya saritabbasamācāroti. ^b^paṭicchannakammantassā^eb^ti lajjitabbatāya paṭicchādetabbakammantassa. ^b^assamaṇassā^eb^ti na samaṇassa. salākaggahaṇādīsu ``ahampi samaṇo''ti micchāpaṭiññāya ^b^samaṇapaṭiññassa^eb^. aseṭṭhacāritāya ^b^abrahmacārissa^eb^. uposathādīsu ``ahampi brahmacārī''ti micchāpaṭiññāya ^b^brahmacāripaṭiññassa^eb^. pūtinā kammena sīlavipattiyā anto anupaviṭṭhattā ^b^antopūtikassa^eb^. chahi dvārehi rāgādikilesānuvassanena tintattā ^b^avassutassa^eb^. sañjātarāgādikacavarattā, sīlavantehi chaḍḍetabbattā ca ^b^kasambujātassa. aggikkhandhūpamāya^eb^ hīnūpamabhūtāyāti attho. tenāha bhagavā -- ``etadeva tassa vara''nti. bhagavā dukkhaṃ dassetvā dukkhaṃ dassetīti sambandho.

[03] ^b^vāḷarajjuyā^eb^ti vāḷehi katarajjuyā. sā hi kharatarā hoti. ^b^ghaṃseyyā^eb^ti padhaṃsanavasena ghaṃseyya. ^b^teladhotāyā^eb^ti telena nisitāya. ^b^paccorasmi^eb^nti patiurasmiṃ urābhimukhaṃ, uramajjheti adhippāyo. ^b^ayosaṅkunā^eb^ti saṇḍāsena. ^b^pheṇuddehaka^eb^nti pheṇaṃ uddehetvā, anekavāraṃ pheṇaṃ uṭṭhapetvāti attho.

[03] aggikkhandhāliṅganadukkhatopi adhimattadukkhatāya kaṭukabhūtaṃ dukkhaṃ phalaṃ etassāti ^b^aggikkhandhāliṅganadukkhādhikadukkhakaṭukaphalaṃ^eb^. kāmasukhaṃ avijahato ^b^bhinnasīlassa^eb^ dussīlassa ^b^kuto^eb^ tassa ^b^sukhaṃ^eb^ natthevāti adhippāyo. ^b^sādane^eb^ti sādiyane. ^b^ya^eb^nti añjalikammasādanaṃ. ^b^asīlino^eb^ti dussīlassa. ^b^upahata^eb^nti sīlabyasanena upaddutaṃ. ^b^khata^eb^nti kusalamūlānaṃ khaṇanena khataṃ, khaṇitaṃ vā guṇaṃ sarīreti adhippāyo. ^b^sabbabhayehī^eb^ti attānuvādādisabbabhayehi. upacārajjhānaṃ upādāya ^b^sabbehi adhigamasukhehi^eb^.

[03] ^b^vuttappakāraviparītato^eb^ti ^a^M1.0087^ea^ sīlavipattiyaṃ vuttākārapaṭipakkhato ``manāpo hoti devamanussāna''ntiādinā. ^b^kāyagandhopi pāmojjaṃ, sīlavantassa bhikkhuno. karoti api devāna^eb^nti ettha ``gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitāna''ntiādikā (jā0 2.17.55) gāthā vitthāretabbā. ^b^avighātī^eb^ti appaṭighātī. vadhabandhādiparikilesā ^b^diṭṭhadhammikā āsavā^eb^ upaddavā. ^b^samparāyikadukkhānaṃ mūlaṃ^eb^ nāma dussīlyaṃ. antamatikkantaṃ accantaṃ, accantaṃ santā ^b^accantasantā^eb^ ^a^V1.0081^ea^ kilesapariḷāhasaṅkhātadarathānaṃ abhāvena sabbadā santā. ^b^ubbijjitvā^eb^ti ñāṇutrāsena uttasitvā. ^b^vodāpetabba^eb^nti visodhetabbaṃ.
[06] sīlaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti paṭhamaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ appā ^a^M1.0088^ea^ ^a^V1.0082^ea^ icchā etassāti appiccho, paccayagedharahito. tassa bhāvo ^b^appicchatā,^eb^ alobhajjhāsayatāti attho. samaṃ tuṭṭhi, santena, sakena vā tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi, santuṭṭhi eva ^b^santuṭṭhitā,^eb^ aññaṃ apatthetvā yathāladdhehi itarītarehi paccayehi paritussanā. ^b^santuṭṭhitādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ta^eb^-kāro vā padasandhikaro. ``santuṭṭhiādīhī''ti vā pāṭho. ^b^te guṇe^eb^ti te sīlavodānassa hetubhūte appicchatādiguṇe. ^b^sampādetu^eb^nti sampanne kātuṃ. te hi sīlavisuddhiyā paṭiladdhamattā hutvā dhutadhammehi sampannatarā honti. ^b^dhutaṅgasamādāna^eb^nti kilesānaṃ dhunanakāṅgānaṃ viddhaṃsanakāraṇānaṃ sammadeva ādānaṃ. ^b^eva^eb^nti evaṃ sante, dhutaṅgasamādāne kateti attho. ^b^assa^eb^ yogino. ^b^sallekho^eb^ kilesānaṃ sammadeva likhanā chedanā tanukaraṇaṃ. ^b^paviveko^eb^ cittavivekassa upāyabhūtā vivekaṭṭhakāyatā. ^b^apacayo^eb^ yathā paṭipajjanato kilesā naṃ apacinanti na ācinanti, tathā paṭipajjanā. ^b^vīriyārambho^eb^ anuppannānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ anuppādanādivasena āraddhavīriyatā. ^b^subharatā^eb^ yathāvuttāppicchabhāvādisiddhā upaṭṭhakānaṃ sukhabharaṇīyatā suposatā. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena appakiccatāsallahukavuttiādike saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^sīlañceva^eb^ yathāsamādinnaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrībhāvena ^b^suparisuddhaṃ bhavissati. vatāni ca^eb^ dhutadhammā ca ^b^sampajjissanti^eb^ sampannā bhavissanti, nipphajjissanti vā. yā thirabhūtā itarītaracīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanasantuṭṭhi porāṇānaṃ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ paveṇibhāvena ṭhitā, tattha patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``porāṇe ariyavaṃsattaye patiṭṭhāyā''^eb^ti. bhāvanā āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti bhāvanārāmo, tabbhāvo ^b^bhāvanārāmatā,^eb^ samathavipassanābhāvanāsu yuttappayuttatā. yasmā adhigamāraho bhavissati, ^b^tasmā^eb^ti sambandho.

[03] lābhasakkārādi taṇhāya āmasitabbato, lokapariyāpannatāya ca ^b^lokāmisaṃ^eb^. nibbānādhigamassa anulomato ^b^anulomapaṭipadā^eb^ vipassanābhāvanā. ^b^atthato^eb^ti vacanatthato. ^b^pabhedato^eb^ti ^a^V1.0083^ea^ vibhāgato. ^b^bhedato^eb^ti vināsato. ^b^dhutādīna^eb^nti dhutadhutavādadhutadhammadhutaṅgānaṃ. ^b^samāsabyāsato^eb^ti saṅkhepavitthārato.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ ^b^rathikā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0089^ea^ racchā. ^b^saṅkārakūṭādīna^eb^nti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^abbhuggataṭṭhenā^eb^ti ussitaṭṭhena. ``nadiyā kūla''ntiādīsu viya samussayattho ^b^kūla^eb^-saddoti āha ^b^``paṃsukūlamiva paṃsukūla''^eb^nti. ^b^ku^eb^-saddo kucchāyaṃ ^b^ula^eb^-saddo gatiatthoti āha ^b^``kucchitabhāvaṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ hotī''^eb^ti, paṃsu viya kucchitaṃ ulati pavattatīti vā ^b^paṃsukūlaṃ^eb^. paṃsukūlassa dhāraṇaṃ ^b^paṃsukūlaṃ^eb^ uttarapadalopena, taṃ sīlamassāti paṃsukūliko, yathā ``āpūpiko''ti. aṅgati attano phalaṃ paṭicca hetubhāvaṃ gacchatīti ^b^aṅgaṃ,^eb^ kāraṇaṃ. yena puggalo ``paṃsukūliko''ti vuccati, so samādānacetanāsaṅkhāto dhammo paṃsukūlikassa aṅganti ^b^paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ^eb^. tenāha ^b^``paṃsukūlikassā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^tassā^eb^ti samādānassa. samādiyati etenāti ^b^samādānaṃ,^eb^ cetanā.

[03] ^b^eteneva nayenā^eb^ti yathā paṃsukūladhāraṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ, taṃsīlo paṃsukūliko, tassa aṅgaṃ samādānacetanā ``paṃsukūlikaṅga''nti vuttaṃ, evaṃ eteneva vacanatthanayena ticīvaradhāraṇaṃ ticīvaraṃ, taṃsīlo tecīvariko, tassa aṅgaṃ samādānacetanā ^b^``tecīvarikaṅga''^eb^nti veditabbaṃ. saṅghāṭiādīsu eva tīsu cīvaresu ticīvarasamaññā, na kaṇḍupaṭicchādivassikasāṭikādīsūti tāni sarūpato dassento ^b^``saṅghāṭiuttarāsaṅgāntaravāsakasaṅkhāta''^eb^nti āha.

[03] ^b^taṃ piṇḍapāta^eb^nti parehi diyyamānānaṃ piṇḍānaṃ patte patanasaṅkhātaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ, taṃ uñchatīti ^b^piṇḍapātiko,^eb^ yathā bādariko sāmākiko. piṇḍapāti eva piṇḍapātiko, yathā bhaddo eva bhaddako. ^b^avakhaṇḍanaṃ^eb^ vicchindanaṃ nirantaramappavatti. tappaṭikkhepato ^b^anavakhaṇḍanaṃ^eb^ avicchindanaṃ nirantarappavatti. ^b^saha apadānenā^eb^ti saha anavakhaṇḍanena. ^b^sapadāna^eb^nti padassa kiriyāvisesanabhāvaṃ, yattha ca taṃ anavakhaṇḍanaṃ, tañca dassetuṃ ^b^``avakhaṇḍanarahitaṃ anugharanti vuttaṃ hotī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^ekāsane^eb^ti iriyāpathantarena anantaritāya ekāyayeva nisajjāya. ^b^patte piṇḍo^eb^ti ettha vatthubhedo idhādhippeto, na sāmaññaṃ. eva-kāro ca luttaniddiṭṭhoti dassento ^b^``kevalaṃ ekasmiṃyeva patte''^eb^ti āha. uttarapadalopaṃ katvā ayaṃ niddesoti dassento ^b^``pattapiṇḍagahaṇe pattapiṇḍasaññaṃ katvā''^eb^ti āha. esa nayo ito paresupi.

[01] ^b^pacchābhattaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0090^ea^ ^a^V1.0084^ea^ nāma pavāraṇato pacchā laddhabhattaṃ eva. ^b^khalu^eb^-saddassa paṭisedhatthavācakattā tena samānatthaṃ na-kāraṃ gahetvā āha ^b^``na pacchābhattiko''^eb^ti. sikkhāpadassa visayo sikkhāpadeneva paṭikkhitto. yo tassa avisayo, so eva samādānassa visayoti āha ^b^``samādānavasena paṭikkhittātirittabhojanassā''^eb^ti. abbhokāse nivāso ^b^abbhokāso^eb^. susāne nivāso ^b^susānaṃ,^eb^ taṃ sīlaṃ assātiādinā sabbaṃ vattabbanti āha ^b^``eseva nayo''^eb^ti. yathāsanthataṃ viya ^b^yathāsanthataṃ,^eb^ ādito yathāuddiṭṭhaṃ. taṃ hesa ``idaṃ bahumaṅkuṇaṃ duggandhapavāta''ntiādivasena appaṭikkhipitvāva sampaṭicchati. tenevāha ^b^``idaṃ tuyha''^eb^ntiādi. ^b^sayana^eb^nti nipajjanamāha. ^b^tena tena samādānenā^eb^ti tena tena paṃsukūlikaṅgādikassa samādānena ^b^dhutakilesattā^eb^ti viddhaṃsitakilesattā, tadaṅgavasena pahīnataṇhupādānādipāpadhammattāti attho. yehi taṃ kilesadhunanaṃ, tāniyeva idha dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgānīti adhippetāni, na aññāni yāni kānici, aññena vā dhutassāti ayamattho atthato āpanno. ``ñāṇaṃ aṅgaṃ etesa''nti iminā ñāṇapubbakataṃ tesaṃ samādānassa vibhāveti. ^b^paṭipattiyā^eb^ti sīlādisammāpaṭipattiyā. samādiyati etenāti samādānaṃ, samādānavasena pavattā cetanā, taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etesanti ^b^samādānacetanālakkhaṇāni^eb^. vuttampi cetaṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ --
[21] ``samādānakiriyāya, sādhakatamabhāvato.
[22] sampayuttadhammā yenāti, karaṇabhāvena dassitā''ti..

[03] samādānacetanāya gahaṇaṃ taṃmūlakattā pariharaṇacetanāpi dhutaṅgameva. attanā, parammukhena ca kusalabhaṇḍassa bhusaṃ viluppanaṭṭhena ^b^loluppaṃ^eb^ taṇhācāro, tassa viddhaṃsanakiccattā ^b^loluppaviddhaṃsanarasāni^eb^. tato eva nilloluppabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhanti, taṃ vā paccupaṭṭhāpentīti ^b^nilloluppabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānāni. ariyadhammapadaṭṭhānānī^eb^ti parisuddhasīlādisaddhammapadaṭṭhānāni.

[03] ^b^bhagavatova santike samādātabbānī^eb^ti idaṃ antarā avicchedanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, rañño santike paṭiññātārahassa atthassa tadupajīvino ekaṃsato avisaṃvādanaṃ viya. sesānaṃ santike samādānepi eseva nayo. ^b^ekasaṅgītikassā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0091^ea^ pañcasu dīghanikāyādīsu nikāyesu ekanikāyikassa. ^b^aṭṭhakathācariyassā^eb^ti yassa aṭṭhakathātantiyeva visesato paguṇā, tassa. ^b^etthā^eb^ti attanāpi samādānassa ruhane. ^b^jeṭṭhakabhātu dhutaṅgappicchatāya vatthū^eb^ti so kira thero nesajjiko ^a^V1.0085^ea^, tassa taṃ na koci jānāti. athekadivasaṃ rattiyā sayanapiṭṭhe nisinnaṃ vijjulatobhāsena disvā itaro pucchi ``kiṃ, bhante, tumhe nesajjikā''ti. thero dhutaṅgappicchatāya tāvadeva nipajjitvā pacchā samādiyīti evamāgataṃ vatthu.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ ^b^gahapatidānacīvara^eb^nti ettha dāyakabhāvena samaṇāpi ukkaṭṭhassa gahapatipakkhaṃyeva paviṭṭhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ``pabbajito gaṇhissatī''ti ṭhapitakaṃ siyā gahapaticīvaraṃ, na pana gahapatidānacīvaranti tādisaṃ nivattetuṃ ^b^dāna^eb^ggahaṇaṃ. ^b^aññatarenā^eb^ti ettha samādānavacanena tāva samādinnaṃ hotu, paṭikkhepavacanena pana kathanti? atthato āpannattā. yathā ``devadatto divā na bhuñjatī''ti vutte ``rattiyaṃ bhuñjatī''ti atthato āpannameva hoti, tassa āhārena vinā sarīraṭṭhiti natthīti, evamidhāpi bhikkhuno gahapatidānacīvare paṭikkhitte tadaññacīvarappaṭiggaho atthato āpanno eva hoti, cīvarena vinā sāsane ṭhiti natthīti.

[01] ^b^evaṃ samādinnadhutaṅgenā^eb^tiādividhānaṃ paṃsukūlikaṅge paṭipajjanavidhi. susāne laddhaṃ ^b^sosānikaṃ^eb^. taṃ pana yasmā tattha kenaci chaḍḍitattā patitaṃ hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``susāne patitaka''^eb^nti. evaṃ ^b^pāpaṇika^eb^mpi daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^tālaveḷimaggo^eb^ nāma mahāgāme ekā vīthi. anurādhapureti ca vadanti. ḍaḍḍho padeso etassāti ^b^ḍaḍḍhappadesaṃ,^eb^ vatthaṃ. magge patitakaṃ bahudivasātikkantaṃ gahetabbanti vadanti. ``dvattidivasātikkanta''nti apare. ^b^thokaṃ rakkhitvā^eb^ti katipayaṃ kālaṃ āgametvā. vātāhatampi sāmikānaṃ satisammosena patitasadisanti ^b^``sāmike apassantena gahetuṃ vaṭṭatī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tasmā thokaṃ āgametvā gahetabbaṃ.

[03] ``saṅghassa demā''ti dinnaṃ, coḷakabhikkhāvasena laddhañca laddhakālato paṭṭhāya ``samaṇacīvaraṃ siyā nu kho, no''ti āsaṅkaṃ nivattetuṃ ^b^``na taṃ paṃsukūla''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. na hi taṃ tevīsatiyā uppattiṭṭhānesu katthaci pariyāpannaṃ. idāni imināva pasaṅgena yaṃ bhikkhudattiye lakkhaṇapattaṃ ^a^M1.0092^ea^ paṃsukūlaṃ, tassa ca ukkaṭṭhānukkaṭṭhavibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``bhikkhudattiyepī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^gāhetvā vā dīyatī^eb^ti saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā dentehi yaṃ cīvaraṃ vassaggena pāpetvā bhikkhūnaṃ dīyati. ^b^senāsanacīvara^eb^nti senāsanaṃ kāretvā ``etasmiṃ senāsane vasantā paribhuñjantū''ti ^a^V1.0086^ea^ dinnacīvaraṃ. ^b^na taṃ paṃsukūla^eb^nti apaṃsukūlabhāvo pubbe vuttakāraṇato, gāhetvā dinnattā ca. tenāha ^b^``no gāhāpetvā dinnameva paṃsukūla''^eb^nti. ^b^tatrapī^eb^ti yaṃ gāhetvā na dinnaṃ bhikkhudattiyaṃ, tatrapi yena bhikkhunā cīvaraṃ dīyati, tassa lābhe, dāne ca visuṃ visuṃ ubhayattha ādaragāravānaṃ sabbhāvato, tadabhāvato ca bhikkhudattiyassa ekatosuddhi ubhatosuddhi anukkaṭṭhatā hontīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``yaṃ dāyakehī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, pādamūle ṭhapetvā dinnakaṃ samaṇenāti adhippāyo. ^b^yassa kassacī^eb^ti ukkaṭṭhādīsu yassa kassaci. ^b^ruciyā^eb^ti chandena. ^b^khantiyā^eb^ti nijjhānakkhantiyā.

[01] ^b^nissayānurūpapaṭipattisabbhāvo^eb^ti upasampannasamanantaraṃ ācariyena vuttesu catūsu nissayesu attanā yathāpaṭiññātadutiyanissayānurūpāya paṭipattiyā vijjamānatā. ^b^ārakkhadukkhābhāvo^eb^ti cīvarārakkhanadukkhassa abhāvo paṃsukūlacīvarassa alobhanīyattā. ^b^paribhogataṇhāya abhāvo^eb^ savisesalūkhasabhāvattā. ^b^pāsādikatā^eb^ti paresaṃ pasādāvahatā. ^b^appicchatādīnaṃ phalanipphatti^eb^ dhutaṅgapariharaṇassa appicchatādīhiyeva nipphādetabbato. dhutadhamme samādāya vattanaṃ yāvadeva upari sammāpaṭipattisampādanāyāti vuttaṃ ^b^``sammāpaṭipattiyā anubrūhana''^eb^nti. ^b^mārasenavighātāyā^eb^ti mārassa, mārasenāya ca vihananāya viddhaṃsanāya. kāyavācācittehi yato saṃyatoti ^b^yati,^eb^ bhikkhu. ^b^dhāritaṃ yaṃ lokagarunā paṃsukūlaṃ, taṃ ko na dhāraye,^eb^ yasmā vā ^b^lokagarunā paṃsukūlaṃ dhāritaṃ,^eb^ tasmā ^b^ko taṃ na dhāraye^eb^ti yojanā yaṃtaṃsaddānaṃ ekantasambandhibhāvato. ^b^paṭiññaṃ samanussara^eb^nti upasampadamāḷe ``āma bhante''ti ācariyapamukhassa saṅghassa sammukhā dinnaṃ paṭiññaṃ samanussaranto.
[06] iti paṃsukūlikaṅgakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ ^b^catutthakacīvara^eb^nti ^a^M1.0093^ea^ nivāsanapārupanayogyaṃ catutthakacīvaranti adhippāyo, aṃsakāsāvassa appaṭikkhipitabbato. ^b^aññataravacanenā^eb^ti ettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. yāva na sakkoti, yāva na labhati, yāva na sampajjatīti paccekaṃ ^b^yāva^eb^-saddo sambandhitabbo. ^b^na sampajjatī^eb^ti na sijjhati. ^b^nikkhittapaccayā doso natthī^eb^ti nicayasannidhidhutaṅgasaṃkilesadoso ^a^V1.0087^ea^ natthi. ^b^āsanne^eb^ti cīvarassa āsanne ṭhāne. rajanakkhaṇe paribhuñjanakāsāvaṃ ^b^rajanakāsāvaṃ. tatraṭṭhakapaccattharaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma attano, parassa vā santakaṃ senāsane paccattharaṇavasena adhiṭṭhitaṃ. ``aṃsakāsāvaṃ parikkhāracoḷaṃ hoti, iti paccattharaṇaṃ, aṃsakāsāvanti imāni dvepi atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitānipi dhutaṅgabhedaṃ na karontī''ti ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ vuttanti vadanti. ^b^pariharituṃ pana na vaṭṭatī^eb^ti rajanakāle eva anuññātattā niccaparibhogavasena na vaṭṭati tecīvarikassa. ^b^aṃsakāsāva^eb^nti khandhe ṭhapetabbakāsāvaṃ. ^b^kāyaparihārikenā^eb^ti vātātapādiparissayato kāyassa pariharaṇamattena. ^b^samādāyevā^eb^ti gahetvā eva. ^b^appasamārambhatā^eb^ti appakiccatā. ^b^kappiye mattakāritāyā^eb^ti nisīdanādivasena, parikkhāracoḷavasena ca bahūsu cīvaresu anuññātesupi ticīvaramatte ṭhitattā. saha pattacaraṇāyāti ^b^sapattacaraṇo. pakkhī^eb^ sapakkhako.
[06] iti tecīvarikaṅgakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ ^b^atirekalābha^eb^nti ``piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāyā''ti (mahāva0 73, 128) evaṃ vuttabhikkhāhāralābhato atirekalābhaṃ, saṅghabhattādinti attho. sakalassa saṅghassa dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^saṅghabhattaṃ^eb^. katipaye bhikkhū uddisitvā dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^uddesabhattaṃ^eb^. ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekadivasaṃ dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^pakkhikaṃ^eb^. uposathe uposathe dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^uposathikaṃ^eb^. paṭipadadivase dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^pāṭipadikaṃ^eb^. vihāraṃ uddissa dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^vihārabhattaṃ^eb^. dhuragehe eva ṭhapetvā dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^dhurabhattaṃ^eb^. gāmavāsīādīhi vārena dātabbabhattaṃ ^a^M1.0094^ea^ ^b^vārakabhattaṃ. ``saṅghabhattaṃ gaṇhathātiādinā''^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena uddesabhattādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^sādituṃ vaṭṭantī^eb^ti bhikkhāpariyāyena vuttattā. bhesajjādipaṭisaṃyuttā ^b^nirāmisasalākā^eb^. yāvakālikavajjāti ca vadanti. ^b^vihāre pakkabhattampī^eb^ti upāsakā idheva bhattaṃ pacitvā ``sabbesaṃ ayyānaṃ dassāmā''ti vihāreyeva bhattaṃ sampādenti, taṃ piṇḍapātikānampi vaṭṭati. ^b^āharitvā^eb^ti pattaṃ gahetvā gehato ānetvā. ^b^taṃ divasaṃ nisīditvā^eb^ti ``mā, bhante, piṇḍāya carittha, vihāreyeva bhikkhā ānīyatī''ti vadantānaṃ sampaṭicchanena taṃ divasaṃ nisīditvā. ^b^serivihārasukha^eb^nti aparāyattavihāritāsukhaṃ ^a^V1.0088^ea^. ^b^ariyavaṃso^eb^ti ^b^ariyavaṃsasutta^eb^paṭisaṃyuttā (dī0 ni0 3.309; a0 ni0 4.28) dhammakathā. ^b^dhammarasa^eb^nti dhammūpasañhitaṃ pāmojjādirasaṃ.

[03] jaṅghabalaṃ nissāya piṇḍapariyesanato ^b^kosajjanimmaddanatā^eb^. ``yathāpi bhamaro puppha''ntiādinā (dha0 pa0 49; netti0 123) vuttavidhinā āhārapariyesanato ^b^parisuddhājīvatā^eb^. niccaṃ antaragharaṃ pavisantasseva suppaṭicchannagamanādayo sekhiyadhammā sampajjantīti ^b^sekhiyapaṭipattipūraṇaṃ^eb^. paṭiggahaṇe mattaññutāya, saṃsaṭṭhavihārābhāvato ca ^b^aparapositā^eb^. kule kule appakāppakapiṇḍagahaṇena ^b^parānuggahakiriyā^eb^. antimāya jīvikāya avaṭṭhānena ^b^mānappahānaṃ^eb^. vuttañhetaṃ ``antamidaṃ, bhikkhave, jīvikānaṃ, yadidaṃ piṇḍolya''ntiādi (itivu0 91; saṃ0 ni0 3.80). missakabhattena yāpanato ^b^rasataṇhānivāraṇaṃ^eb^. nimantanāsampaṭicchanato gaṇabhojanādisikkhāpadehi ^b^anāpattitā^eb^.

[03] appaṭihatavuttitāya catūsupi disāsu vattanaṭṭhena ^b^cātuddiso. ājīvassa visujjhatī^eb^ti ājīvo assa visujjhati. ^b^attabharassā^eb^ti appānavajjasulabharūpehi paccayehi attano bharaṇato attabharassa. tato eva ekavihāritāya saddhivihārikādīnampi aññesaṃ aposanato ^b^anaññaposino^eb^. padadvayenāpi kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena vicaraṇato sallahukavuttitaṃ, subharataṃ, paramāppicchataṃ, santuṭṭhiñca dasseti. ^b^devāpi pihayanti tādino^eb^ti tādisassa bhusaṃ ativiya santakāyavacīmanokammatāya upasantassa paramena satinepakkena samannāgamato sabbakālaṃ satimato piṇḍapātikassa bhikkhussa sakkādayo ^a^M1.0095^ea^ devāpi pihayanti patthenti. tassa sīlādiguṇesu bahumānaṃ uppādentā ādaraṃ janenti, pageva manussā. sace so ^b^lābhasakkārasilokasannissito^eb^ na hoti, tadabhikaṅkhī na hotīti attho.
[06] iti piṇḍapātikaṅgakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ ^b^iminā^eb^ti sapadānacārikena. ^b^kālatara^eb^nti kālasseva. ^b^aphāsukaṭṭhāna^eb^nti saparissayādivasena ^a^V1.0089^ea^ duppavesanaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^purato^eb^ti vīthiyaṃ gacchantassa purato gharaṃ apaviṭṭhasseva. ^b^pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhāna^eb^nti pesakāravīthiyaṃ pesakārabhāvaṃ nimminitvā ṭhitassa sakkassa gharadvāre pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ. ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātiko taṃ divasaṃ na bhikkhaṃ āgamayamāno nisīdati, tasmā taṃ ^b^anulometi^eb^. katthacipi kule nibaddhaṃ upasaṅkamanābhāvato paricayābhāvena ^b^kulesu niccanavakatā^eb^. sabbattha alaggamānasatāya ca sommabhāvena ca ^b^candūpamatā. kulesu^eb^ pariggahacittābhāvena tattha ^b^maccherappahānaṃ^eb^. hitesitāya vibhāgābhāvato ^b^samānukampitā^eb^. kulānaṃ saṅgaṇhanasaṃsaṭṭhatādayo ^b^kulūpakādīnavā. avhānānabhinandanā^eb^ti nimantanavasena avhānassa asampaṭicchanā. ^b^abhihārenā^eb^ti bhikkhābhihārena. ^b^sericāra^eb^nti yathāruci vicaraṇaṃ.
[06] iti sapadānacārikaṅgakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ ^b^nānāsanabhojana^eb^nti anekasmiṃ āsane bhojanaṃ, ekanisajjāya eva abhuñjitvā visuṃ visuṃ nisajjāsu āhāraparibhoganti attho. ^b^patirūpa^eb^nti yuttarūpaṃ anuṭṭhāpanīyaṃ. ^b^vattaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī^eb^ti vattaṃ kātuṃ yujjati. vattaṃ nāma garuṭṭhānīye kattabbameva. tattha pana paṭipajjanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ yaṃ theravādaṃ āha ^b^``āsanaṃ vā rakkheyya bhojanaṃ vā''^eb^tiādi. tassattho -- ekāsanikaṃ bhikkhuṃ bhuñjantaṃ āsanaṃ vā rakkheyya, dhutaṅgabhedato yāva bhojanapariyosānā na vuṭṭhātabbanti vuttaṃ hoti ^a^M1.0096^ea^. bhojanaṃ vā rakkheyya dhutaṅgabhedato, abhuñjiyamānaṃ yāva bhuñjituṃ nārabhati, tāva vuṭṭhātabbanti attho. yasmā tayidaṃ dvayaṃ idha natthi, tasmā vattakaraṇaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ na rakkhatīti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``ayañcā''^eb^tiādi. ``bhesajjatthamevā''ti iminā bhesajjaparibhogavaseneva sappiādīnipi vaṭṭantīti dasseti. ^b^appābādhatā^eb^ti arogatā. ^b^appātaṅkatā^eb^ti akicchajīvitā sarīradukkhābhāvo. ^b^lahuṭṭhāna^eb^nti kāyassa lahuparivattitā. ^b^bala^eb^nti sarīrabalaṃ. ^b^phāsuvihāro^eb^ti sukhavihāro. sabbametaṃ bahukkhattuṃ bhuñjanapaccayā uppajjanavikārapaṭikkhepapadaṃ. ^b^rujā^eb^ti rogā. ^b^na kammamattano^eb^ti attano yogakammaṃ purebhattaṃ, pacchābhattañca na parihāpeti, bahuso bhojane abyāvaṭabhāvato, arogabhāvato cāti adhippāyo.
[06] iti ekāsanikaṅgakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ ^b^appaṭikūlaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0090^ea^ ^b^katvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati^eb^ paṭikūlassa bhuttassa agaṇhanampi siyāti adhippāyo. ^b^pamāṇayuttameva gaṇhitabba^eb^nti ``ekabhājanameva gaṇhāmī''ti bahuṃ gahetvā na chaḍḍetabbaṃ. ^b^nānārasataṇhāvinodana^eb^nti nānārasabhojane taṇhāya vinodanaṃ. atra atra nānābhājane ṭhite nānārase icchā etassāti atriccho, tassa bhāvo atricchatā, tassā ^b^atricchatāya pahānaṃ. āhāre payojanamattadassitā^eb^ti asambhinnanānārase gedhaṃ akatvā āhāre satthārā anuññātapayojanamattadassitā. visuṃ visuṃ bhājanesu ṭhitāni byañjanāni gaṇhato tattha tattha sābhogatāya siyā vikkhittabhojitā, na tathā imassa ekapattagatasaññinoti vuttaṃ ^b^``avikkhittabhojitā''^eb^ti. ^b^okkhittalocano^eb^ti pattasaññitāya heṭṭhākhittacakkhu. ^b^paribhuñjeyyā^eb^ti paribhuñjituṃ sakkuṇeyya.
[06] iti pattapiṇḍikaṅgakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ bhuñjantassa ^a^M1.0097^ea^ yaṃ upanītaṃ, tassa paṭikkhepena taṃ atirittaṃ bhojananti ^b^atirittabhojanaṃ. puna bhojanaṃ kappiyaṃ kāretvā na bhuñjitabbaṃ,^eb^ tabbisayattā imassa dhutaṅgassa. tenāha ^b^``idamassa vidhāna''^eb^nti. ^b^yasmiṃ bhojane^eb^ti yasmiṃ bhuñjiyamāne bhojane. ^b^tadeva bhuñjati,^eb^ na aññaṃ. anatirittabhojanapaccayā āpatti ^b^anatirittabhojanāpatti,^eb^ tato dūrībhāvo anāpajjanaṃ. ^b^odarikattaṃ^eb^ ghasmarabhāvo kucchipūrakatā, tassa abhāvo ekapiṇḍenāpi yāpanato. ^b^nirāmisasannidhitā^eb^ nihitassa abhuñjanato. puna pariyesanavasena ^b^pariyesanāya khedaṃ na yāti^eb^. abhisallekhakānaṃ santosaguṇādīnaṃ vuddhiyā sañjananaṃ ^b^santosaguṇādivuḍḍhisañjananaṃ. ida^eb^nti khalupacchābhattikaṅgaṃ.
[06] iti khalupacchābhattikaṅgakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ ^b^gāmantasenāsanaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0091^ea^ ^b^pahāya araññe aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpetabba^eb^nti ettha gāmantaṃ, araññañca sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^``tattha saddhiṃ upacārenā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha gāmapariyāpannattā gāmantasenāsanassa ^b^``gāmoyeva gāmantasenāsana''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. yo koci satthopi gāmo nāmāti sambandho. ^b^indakhīlā^eb^ti ummārā. ^b^tassā^eb^ti leḍḍupātassa. vinayapariyāyena araññalakkhaṇaṃ ^b^adinnādānapārājike^eb^ (pārā0 92) āgataṃ. tattha hi ``gāmā vā araññā vā''ti anavasesato avahāraṭṭhānapariggahe tadubhayaṃ asaṅkarato dassetuṃ ^b^``ṭhapetvā gāmañcā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. gāmūpacāro hi loke gāmasaṅkhameva gacchatīti. nippariyāyato pana gāmavinimuttaṃ ṭhānaṃ araññameva hotīti ^b^abhidhamme^eb^ (vibha0 529) gāmā ^b^``nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā, sabbametaṃ arañña''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^suttantikapariyāyena^eb^ āraññakasikkhāpade (pārā0 654) ``pañcadhanusatikaṃ pacchima''nti āgataṃ āraññikaṃ bhikkhuṃ sandhāya. na hi so vinayapariyāyike ``araññe vasanato āraññiko pantasenāsano''ti sutte vutto. ayañca suttasaṃvaṇṇanāti idha sabbattha suttantakathāva ^a^M1.0098^ea^ pamāṇaṃ. tasmā tattha āgatameva lakkhaṇaṃ gahetabbanti dassento ^b^``taṃ āropitena ācariyadhanunā''^eb^tiādinā minanavidhiṃ āha. teneva hi majjhimaṭṭhakathānayova (ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.296) ^b^idamettha pamāṇa^eb^nti ca vutto.

[01] ^b^tato tato magga^eb^nti tattha tattha khuddakamaggaṃ ^b^pidahati. dhutaṅgasuddhikena^eb^ dhutaṅgasodhanapasutena. ^b^yathāparicchinne kāle^eb^ti ukkaṭṭhassa tayopi utū, majjhimassa dve, mudukassa eko utu. tatthapi ^b^dhutaṅgaṃ na bhijjati^eb^ saussāhattā. ^b^nipajjitvā gamissāmā^eb^ti cittassa sithilabhāvena dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjatīti vuttaṃ. ^b^araññasaññaṃ manasi karonto^eb^ti ``ahaṃ vivekavāsaṃ vasissāmi, yathāladdhova kāyaviveko sātthako kātabbo''ti manasikārasabbhāvato ^b^``bhabbo...pe0... rakkhitu''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^assa^eb^ āraññikassa ^b^cittaṃ na vikkhipanti^eb^ āpāthamanupagamanato. ^b^vigatasantāso hoti^eb^ vivekaparicayato. ^b^jīvitanikantiṃ jahati^eb^ bahuparissaye araññe nivāseneva maraṇabhayassa dūrīkaraṇato. ^b^pavivekasukharasaṃ assādeti^eb^ anubhavati janasaṃsaggābhāvato. ^b^ārādhayanto^eb^ti anunayanto. yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiyā vivekassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato āraññikaṅgayogino vāhanasadisanti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``avasesadhutāyudho''^eb^ti, avasiṭṭhadhutadhammāyudhoti attho.
[06] iti āraññikaṅgakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ ^b^channa^eb^nti ^a^V1.0092^ea^ iṭṭhakāchadanādīhi chāditaṃ, āvasathanti attho. ^b^sīmantarikarukkho^eb^ti dvinnaṃ rājūnaṃ rajjasīmāya ṭhitarukkho. tattha hi tesaṃ rājūnaṃ balakāyo upagantvā antarantarā yuddhaṃ kareyya, corāpi pāripanthikā samosarantā bhikkhussa sukhena nisīdituṃ na denti. ^b^cetiyarukkho^eb^ ``devatādhiṭṭhito''ti manussehi sammatarukkho pūjetuṃ upagatehi manussehi avivitto hoti. ^b^niyyāsarukkho^eb^ sajjarukkhādi. ^b^vaggulirukkho^eb^ vaggulinisevito. sīmantarikarukkhādayo saparissayā, dullabhavivekā cāti āha ^b^``ime rukkhe vivajjetvā''^eb^ti. ^b^paṇṇasaṭa^eb^nti ^a^M1.0099^ea^ rukkhato patitapaṇṇaṃ. ^b^paṭicchanne ṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ^eb^ rukkhamūlikabhāvassa paṭicchādanatthaṃ. ^b^channe^eb^ vāsakappanā dhammassavanādīnamatthāyapi hoti. tasmā ^b^``jānitvā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpitamatte''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^abhiṇhaṃ tarupaṇṇavikāradassanenā^eb^ti abhikkhaṇaṃ tarūsu, tarūnaṃ vā paṇṇesu vikārassa khaṇabhaṅgassa dassanena. ^b^senāsanamaccherakammārāmatāna^eb^nti āvāsamacchariyanavakammaratabhāvānaṃ. ^b^devatāhī^eb^ti rukkhadevatāhi. tāpi hi rukkhaṭṭhavimānesu vasantiyo rukkhesu vasanti. ayampi rukkheti ^b^sahavāsitā. vaṇṇito^eb^ti ``appāni cevā''tiādinā pasaṃsito. ``rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ nissāya pabbajjā''ti (mahāva0 73, 128) evaṃ ^b^nissayoti ca bhāsito. abhirattāni^eb^ taruṇakāle, ^b^nīlāni^eb^ majjhimakāle, ^b^paṇḍūni^eb^ jiṇṇakāle. ^b^patitāni^eb^ milāyanavasena. evaṃ ^b^passanto tarupaṇṇāni^eb^ paccakkhato eva niccasaññaṃ ^b^panūdati^eb^ pajahati, aniccasaññā evassa saṇṭhāti. yasmā bhagavato jātibodhidhammacakkapavattanaparinibbānāni rukkhamūleyeva jātāni, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``buddhadāyajjaṃ rukkhamūla''^eb^nti.
[06] iti rukkhamūlikaṅgakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ ``rukkhamūlaṃ paṭikkhipāmī''ti ettake vutte channaṃ appaṭikkhittameva hotīti ^b^``channañca^eb^ ^a^V1.0093^ea^ ^b^rukkhamūlañca paṭikkhipāmī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. dhutaṅgassa sabbaso paṭiyogipaṭikkhepena hi samādānaṃ ijjhati, no aññathāti. ``dhammassavanāyā''ti imināva dhammaṃ kathentenāpi uposathadivasādīsu suṇantānaṃ cittānurakkhaṇatthaṃ tehi yācitena channaṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati, dhammaṃ pana kathetvā abbhokāsova gantabbo. rukkhamūlikassāpi eseva nayo. ^b^uposathatthāyā^eb^ti uposathakammāya. ^b^uddisantenā^eb^ti paresaṃ uddesaṃ dentena. ^b^uddisāpentenā^eb^ti sayaṃ uddesaṃ gaṇhantena. ^b^maggamajjhe ṭhitaṃ sāla^eb^nti sīhaḷadīpe viya maggā anokkamma ujukameva pavisitabbasālaṃ. ^b^vegena gantuṃ na vaṭṭati^eb^ asāruppattā. ^b^yāva vassūparamā ṭhatvā gantabbaṃ,^eb^ na tāva dhutaṅgabhedo hotīti adhippāyo.

[01] ^b^rukkhassa^eb^ ^a^M1.0100^ea^ ^b^anto^eb^ nāma rukkhamūlaṃ. pabbatassa pana pabbhārasadiso ^b^pabbata^eb^padeso. ^b^acchannamariyāda^eb^nti yathā vassodakaṃ anto na pavisati, evaṃ chadanasaṅkhepena upari akatamariyādaṃ. anto pana pabbhārassa vassodakaṃ pavisati ce, abbhokāsasaṅkhepamevāti tattha pavisituṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^sākhāmaṇḍapo^eb^ti rukkhasākhāhi viraḷacchannamaṇḍapo. ^b^pīṭhapaṭo^eb^ khalitthaddhasāṭako.

[03] ^b^paviṭṭhakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati^eb^ yathāvuttapabbhārādike ṭhapetvāti adhippāyo. ^b^jānitvā^eb^ti dhammassavanādiatthaṃ channaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ pavisitvā nisinno ``idāni aruṇo uṭṭhahatī''ti jānitvā. rukkhamūlepi katthaci attheva nivāsaphāsukatāti siyā tattha āsaṅgapubbako āvāsapalibodho, na pana abbhokāseti idheva ^b^āvāsapalibodhupacchedo^eb^ ānisaṃso vutto. ^b^pasaṃsāyānurūpatāti aniketā^eb^ti vuttapasaṃsāya anālayabhāvena anucchavikatā. ^b^nissaṅgatā^eb^ti āvāsapariggahābhāveneva tattha nissaṅgatā. asukadisāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ natthi, tasmā tattha gantuṃ neva sakkāti edisassa parivitakkassa abhāvato ^b^cātuddiso. migabhūtenā^eb^ti pariggahābhāvena migassa viya bhūtena. ^b^sito^eb^ti nissito. ^b^vindatī^eb^ti labhati.
[06] iti abbhokāsikaṅgakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ ^b^na^eb^ ^a^V1.0094^ea^ ^b^susāna^eb^nti asusānaṃ. aññattho ^b^na^eb^-kāro, susānalakkhaṇarahitaṃ vasanaṭṭhānanti adhippāyo. ^b^na tatthā^eb^ti ``susāna''nti vavatthapitamatte ṭhāne na ^b^vasitabbaṃ^eb^. na hi nāmamattena susānalakkhaṇaṃ sijjhati. tenāha ^b^``na hī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^jhāpitakālato pana paṭṭhāya...pe0... susānameva^eb^ chavena sayitamattāya susānalakkhaṇappattito. chavasayanaṃ hi ``susāna''nti vuccati.

[03] sosānikena nāma appakiccena sallahukavuttinā bhavitabbanti dassetuṃ ^b^``tasmiṃ pana vasantenā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^garuka^eb^nti dupparihāraṃ. tameva hi dupparihārabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``tasmā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^uppannaparissayavighātatthāyā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0101^ea^ ``susānaṃ nāma manussarāhasseyyaka''nti corā katakammāpi akatakammāpi osaranti, tattha coresu bhaṇḍasāmike disvā bhikkhusamīpe bhaṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā palātesu manussā bhikkhuṃ ``coro''ti gahetvā potheyyuṃ, tasmā vihāre ^b^saṅghattheraṃ vā^eb^ gocaragāme raññā niyuttaṃ ^b^rājayuttakaṃ vā^eb^ attano sosānikabhāvaṃ ^b^jānāpetvā^eb^ yathā tādiso, añño vā parissayo na hoti, tathā ^b^appamattena vasitabbaṃ^eb^. caṅkamantassa yadā āḷahanaṃ abhimukhaṃ na hoti, tadāpi saṃvegajananatthaṃ tattha diṭṭhi vissajjetabbāti dassetuṃ ^b^``addhakkhikena āḷahanaṃ olokentenā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^uppathamaggena gantabbaṃ^eb^ attano sosānikabhāvassa apākaṭabhāvatthaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇa^eb^nti tasmiṃ susāne ``ayaṃ vammiko, ayaṃ rukkho, ayaṃ khāṇuko''tiādinā ^b^divāyeva ārammaṇaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ. bhayānaka^eb^nti bhayajanakaṃ vammikādiṃ. ^b^kenaci^eb^ leḍḍupāsāṇādinā āsanne vicarantīti ^b^na paharitabbā. tilapiṭṭhaṃ^eb^ vuccati palalaṃ. māsamissaṃ bhattaṃ ^b^māsabhattaṃ. guḷādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena tilasaṃguḷikādighanapūvañca saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^kulagehaṃ na pavisitabba^eb^nti petadhūmena vāsitattā, pisācānubandhattā ca kulagehassa abbhantaraṃ na pavisitabbaṃ. devasikaṃ chavaḍāho ^b^dhuvaḍāho^eb^. matañātakānaṃ tattha gantvā devasikaṃ rodanaṃ ^b^dhuvarodanaṃ. vuttanayenā^eb^ti ``jhāpitakālato pana paṭṭhāyā''ti vuttanayena. ``pacchimayāme paṭikkamituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti icchitattā ^b^``susānaṃ agatadivase''^eb^ti ^b^aṅguttarabhāṇakā^eb^.

[03] susāne niccakālaṃ sivathikadassanena ^b^maraṇassatipaṭilābho^eb^. tato eva ^b^appamādavihāritā^eb^ ^a^V1.0095^ea^. tattha chaḍḍitassa matakaḷevarassa dassanena ^b^asubhanimittādhigamo^eb^. tato eva ^b^kāmarāgavinodanaṃ^eb^. bahulaṃ sarīrassa asuciduggandhajegucchabhāvasallakkhaṇato ^b^abhiṇhaṃ kāyasabhāvadassanaṃ^eb^. tato maraṇassatipaṭilābhato ca ^b^saṃvegabahulatā^eb^. byādhikānaṃ, jarājiṇṇānañca matānaṃ tattha dassanena ^b^ārogya^eb^yobbanajīvita^b^madappahānaṃ^eb^. khuddakassa, mahato ca bhayassa abhibhavanato ^b^bhayabheravasahanatā^eb^. saṃviggassa yoniso padahanaṃ sambhavatīti ^b^amanussānaṃ garubhāvanīyatā. niddāgatampī^eb^ti suttampi, supinantepīti adhippāyo.
[06] iti sosānikaṅgakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ senāsanagāhaṇe ^a^M1.0102^ea^ pare uṭṭhāpetvā gahaṇaṃ, ``idaṃ sundaraṃ, idaṃ na sundara''nti paritulayitvā pucchanā, olokanā ca ^b^senāsanaloluppaṃ. tuṭṭhabba^eb^nti tussitabbaṃ. vihārassa pariyantabhāvena ^b^dūre^eb^ti vā bahūnaṃ sannipātaṭṭhānādīnaṃ ^b^accāsanneti vā pucchituṃ na labhati,^eb^ pucchanenapissa dhutaṅgassa saṃkilissanato. ^b^oloketu^eb^nti loluppavasena passituṃ. ^b^sacassa taṃ na ruccatī^eb^ti assa yathāsanthatikassa taṃ yathāgāhitaṃ senāsanaṃ aphāsukabhāvena sace na ruccati, mudukassa asati roge yathāgāhitaṃ pahāya aññassa senāsanassa gahaṇaṃ loluppaṃ, majjhimassa gantvā olokanā, ukkaṭṭhassa pucchanā. sabbesampi uṭṭhāpetvā gahaṇe vattabbameva natthi.

[03] upaṭṭhāpanīyānampi anuṭṭhāpanena ^b^sabrahmacārīnaṃ hitesitā^eb^. tāya karuṇāvihārānuguṇatā. sundarāsundaravibhāgākaraṇato ^b^hīnapaṇītavikappapariccāgo^eb^. tena tādilakkhaṇānuguṇatā. tato eva ^b^anurodhavirodhappahānaṃ. dvārapidahanaṃ^eb^ okāsādānato. ^b^yathāsanthatarāmata^eb^nti yathāgāhite yathāniddiṭṭhe senāsane abhiratabhāvaṃ.
[06] iti yathāsanthatikaṅgakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ ^b^seyya^eb^nti ^a^V1.0096^ea^ iriyāpathalakkhaṇaṃ seyyaṃ. tappaṭikkhepeneva hi tadatthā ``mañco bhisī''ti evamādikā (cūḷava0 321, 322) seyyā paṭikkhittā eva honti. ``nesajjiko''ti ca sayanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjāya eva viharituṃ sīlamassāti imassa atthassa idha adhippetattā seyyā evettha paṭiyoginī, na itare tathā aniṭṭhattā, asambhavato ca. kosajjapakkhiyo hi iriyāpatho idha paṭiyogibhāvena icchito, na itare. na ca sakkā ṭhānagamanehi vinā nisajjāya eva yāpetuṃ tathā pavattetunti seyyāvettha paṭiyoginī. tenāha ^b^``tena panā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^caṅkamitabbaṃ^eb^ na ``nesajjiko aha''nti sabbarattiṃ nisīditabbaṃ. iriyāpathantarānuggahito hi kāyo manasikārakkhamo hoti.

[03] cattāro ^a^M1.0103^ea^ pādā, piṭṭhiapassayo cāti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi ^b^pañcaṅgo^eb^. catūhi aṭṭanīhi, piṭṭhiapassayena ca pañcaṅgoti apare. ^b^ubhosu passesu^eb^ piṭṭhipasse ca yathāsukhaṃ apassāya viharato nesajjikassa ``anesajjikato ko viseso''ti gāhaṃ nivāretuṃ ^b^abhayatthero^eb^ nidassito ^b^``thero anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyī''^eb^ti.

[03] upacchedīyati etenāti ^b^upacchedana^eb^nti vinibandhupacchedassa sādhakatamabhāvo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^sabbakammaṭṭhānānuyogasappāyatā^eb^ alīnānuddhaccapakkhikattā nisajjāya. tato eva ^b^pāsādikairiyāpathatā. vīriyārambhānukūlatā^eb^ vīriyasamatāyojanassa anucchavikatā. tato eva ^b^sammāpaṭipattiyā anubrūhanatā. paṇidhāyā^eb^ti ṭhapetvā. ^b^tanu^eb^nti uparimakāyaṃ. ^b^vikampetī^eb^ti cāleti, icchāvighātaṃ karotīti adhippāyo. ^b^vata^eb^nti dhutaṅgaṃ.
[06] iti nesajjikaṅgakathāvaṇṇanā.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ sekkhaputhujjanānaṃ vasena ^b^siyā kusalāni,^eb^ khīṇāsavānaṃ vasena ^b^siyā abyākatāni^eb^ ^a^V1.0097^ea^. tattha sekkhaputhujjanā paṭipattipūraṇatthaṃ, khīṇāsavā phāsuvihāratthaṃ dhutaṅgāni pariharanti. ^b^akusalampi dhutaṅga^eb^nti akusalacittenāpi dhutaṅgasevanā atthīti adhippāyo. taṃ na yuttaṃ, yena akusalacittena pabbajitassa āraññikattaṃ, taṃ dhutaṅgaṃ nāma na hoti. kasmā? lakkhaṇābhāvato. yaṃ hidaṃ kilesānaṃ dhunanato dhutassa puggalassa, ñāṇassa, cetanāya vā aṅgattaṃ, na taṃ akusaladhammesu sambhavati. tasmā araññavāsādimattena āraññikādayo tāva hontu, āraññikaṅgādīni pana na hontīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``na maya''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^imānī^eb^ti dhutaṅgāni. ^b^vuttaṃ^eb^ heṭṭhā vacanatthaniddese. ^b^na ca akusalena koci dhuto nāma hoti,^eb^ kilesānaṃ dhunanaṭṭhenāti adhippāyo. ^b^yassa^eb^ bhikkhuno ^b^etāni^eb^ samādānāni ^b^aṅgāni,^eb^ etena paṭhamenāpi atthavikappena ``natthi akusalaṃ dhutaṅga''nti dasseti. ^b^na ca akusalaṃ kiñci dhunātī^eb^ti akusalaṃ kiñci pāpaṃ na ca dhunāti eva appaṭipakkhato. ^b^yesaṃ^eb^ samādānānaṃ ^b^taṃ^eb^ akusalaṃ ñāṇaṃ viya ^a^M1.0104^ea^ aṅganti katvā tāni ^b^dhutaṅgānīti vucceyyuṃ^eb^. iminā dutiyenāpi atthavikappena ``natthi akusalaṃ dhutaṅga''nti dasseti. ^b^nāpi akusala^eb^ntiādi tatiyātthavikappavasena yojanā. ^b^tasmā^eb^tiādi vuttassevatthassa nigamanaṃ.

[03] ^b^yesa^eb^nti abhayagirivāsike sandhāyāha. te hi dhutaṅgaṃ nāma paññattīti vadanti. tathā sati tassa paramatthato avijjamānattā kilesānaṃ dhunanaṭṭhopi na siyā, samādātabbatā cāti tesaṃ vacanaṃ pāḷiyā virujjhatīti dassetuṃ ^b^``kusalattikavinimutta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā paññattipakkhe ete dosā dunnivārā, tasmā ^b^taṃ^eb^ tesaṃ vacanaṃ ^b^na gahetabbaṃ,^eb^ vuttanayo cetanāpakkhoyeva gahetabboti attho. yasmā ete dhutaguṇā kusalattike paṭhamatatiyapadasaṅgahitā, tasmā siyā sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā, siyā vipākadhammadhammā, siyā nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammā, siyā anupādinnupādāniyā, siyā asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikāti evaṃ sesatikadukapadehipi nesaṃ yathārahaṃ saṅgaho vibhāvetabbo.

[03] kāmaṃ sabbopi arahā dhutakileso, idha pana dhutaṅgasevanāmukhena kilese vidhunitvā ṭhito khīṇāsavo ^b^``dhutakileso puggalo''^eb^ti adhippeto. tathā sabbopi ariyamaggo nippariyāyena ^b^kilesadhunano dhammo,^eb^ visesato aggamaggo. pariyāyena pana vipassanāñāṇādi. heṭṭhimaparicchedena dhutaṅgacetanāsampayuttañāṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. evaṃ dhutaṃ dassetvā dhutavāde dassetabbe yasmā dhutavādabhedena ^a^V1.0098^ea^ dhuto viya dhutabhedena dhutavādopi duvidho, tasmā tesaṃ, tadubhayapaṭikkhepassa ca vasena catukkamettha sambhavatīti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``atthi dhuto''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^tayida^eb^nti nipāto, tassa ``so aya''nti attho. ^b^dhutadhammā nāmā^eb^ti dhutaṅgasevanāya paṭipakkhabhūtānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ dhunanavasena pavattiyā ``dhuto''ti laddhanāmāya dhutaṅgacetanāya upakārakā dhammāti katvā dhutadhammā nāma. asampattasampattesu paccayesu alubbhanākārena pavattanato ^b^appicchatā santuṭṭhitā^eb^ ca atthato alobho. paccayagedhādihetukānaṃ lolatādīnaṃ saṃkilesānaṃ sammadeva likhanato ^a^M1.0105^ea^ chedanato gaṇasaṅgaṇikādibhedato saṃsaggato cittassa vivecanato ^b^sallekhatā pavivekatā^eb^ ca alobho amohoti imesu ^b^dvīsu dhammesu anupatanti^eb^ tadantogadhā tappariyāpannā honti, tadubhayasseva pavattivisesabhāvato. imehi kusaladhammehi atthī idamatthī, yena ñāṇena pabbajitena nāma paṃsukūlikaṅgādīsu patiṭṭhitena bhavitabbanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ dhutaguṇe samādiyati ceva pariharati ca, taṃ ñāṇaṃ idamatthitā. tenāha ^b^``idamatthitā ñāṇamevā''^eb^ti. ^b^paṭikkhepavatthūsū^eb^ti gahapaticīvarādīsu tehi tehi dhutaṅgehi paṭikkhipitabbavatthūsu. ^b^lobha^eb^nti taṇhaṃ. ^b^tesveva vā^eb^ti paṭikkhepavatthūsu eva. ^b^ādīnavapaṭicchādaka^eb^nti ārakkhadukkhaparādhīnavutticorabhayādiādīnavapaṭicchādakaṃ. ^b^anuññātāna^eb^nti satthārā nicchandarāgaparibhogavasena anuññātānaṃ sukhasamphassāttharaṇapāvuraṇādīnaṃ. ^b^paṭisevanamukhenā^eb^ti paṭisevanadvārena, tena lesenāti attho. ^b^atisallekhamukhenā^eb^ti ativiya sallekhapaṭipattimukhena, ukkaṭṭhassa vattanakānampi paṭikkhipanavasenāti attho.

[03] sukhumakaraṇasannissayo rāgo dukkhāya paṭipattiyā patiṭṭhaṃ na labhatīti āha ^b^``dukkhāpaṭipadañca nissāya rāgo vūpasammatī''^eb^ti. sallekho nāma sampajānassa hoti, satisampajaññe moho apatiṭṭhova appamādasambhavatoti vuttaṃ ^b^``sallekhaṃ nissāya appamattassa moho pahīyatī''^eb^ti. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etesu dhutaṅgesu. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti araññarukkhamūlesu.

[03] ^b^sīsaṅgānī^eb^ti sīsabhūtāni aṅgāni, paresampi kesañci nānantarikatāya, sukaratāya ca saṅgaṇhanato uttamaṅgānīti attho. ^b^asambhinnaṅgānī^eb^ti kehici sambhedarahitāni, visuṃyeva aṅgānīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^kammaṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhati^eb^ rāgacaritassa mohacaritassa dosacaritassāpi, taṃ ekaccaṃ ^a^V1.0099^ea^ ^b^dhutaṅgaṃ sevantassā^eb^ti adhippāyo. ^b^hāyati^eb^ kammaṭṭhānaṃ sukumārabhāvenalūkhapaṭipattiṃ asahantassa. ^b^vaḍḍhateva^eb^ mahāpurisajātikassāti adhippāyo. ^b^na vaḍḍhati^eb^ kammaṭṭhānaṃ upanissayarahitassa. ^b^ekameva hi dhutaṅgaṃ^eb^ yathā kilesadhunanaṭṭhena, evaṃ cetanāsabhāvattā. tenāha ^b^``samādānacetanā''^eb^ti.

[01] terasāpi ^a^M1.0106^ea^ dhutaṅgāni samādāya pariharantānaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena ^b^``dvācattālīsa hontī''^eb^ti vatvā bhikkhūnaṃ terasannampi pariharaṇassa ekajjhaṃyeva sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``sace hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^``ekappahārena sabbadhutaṅgāni paribhuñjituṃ sakkotī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. kathaṃ abbhokāse viharantassa rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ? ``channaṃ paṭikkhipāmi, rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ samādiyāmī''ti (visuddhi0 1.32) vacanato channe aruṇaṃ uṭṭhāpitamatte dhutaṅgaṃ bhijjati, na abbhokāse, tasmā bhedahetuno abhāvena tampi arogameva. tathā senāsanaloluppassa abhāvena yathāsanthatikaṅganti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^āraññikaṅgaṃ^eb^ gaṇamhā ^b^ohīyanasikkhāpadena^eb^ (pāci0 691-692) paṭikkhittaṃ, ^b^khalupacchābhattikaṅgaṃ^eb^ anatirittabhojanasikkhāpadena (pāci0 238-240). pavāritāya hi bhikkhuniyā atirittaṃ katvā bhuñjituṃ na labbhati. kappiye ca vatthusmiṃ lolatāpahānāya dhutaṅgasamādānaṃ, na akappiye, sikkhāpadeneva paṭikkhittattā. ^b^aṭṭheva honti^eb^ bhikkhuniyā saṃkaccikacīvarādīhi saddhiṃ pañcapi ticīvarasaṅkhameva gacchantīti katvā. ^b^yathāvuttesū^eb^ti bhikkhūnaṃ vuttesu terasasu ticīvarādhiṭṭhānavinayakammābhāvato ^b^ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅgaṃ dvādasa sāmaṇerānaṃ. sattā^eb^ti bhikkhunīnaṃ vuttesu aṭṭhasu ekaṃ pahāya satta ticīvarādhiṭṭhānavinayakammābhāvato. ``ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅga''nti hi imaṃ anuvattamānameva katvā ^b^``satta sikkhamānasāmaṇerīna''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^patirūpānī^eb^ti upāsakabhāvassa anucchavikāni.
[06] dhutaṅganiddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti dutiyaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ ^b^appicchatādīhī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0107^ea^ ^a^V1.0100^ea^ appicchatāsantuṭṭhisallekhapavivekāpacayavīriyārambhādīhi. ^b^pariyodāte^eb^ti suvisuddhe nirupakkilese. ^b^imasmiṃ sīle^eb^ti yathāvutte catupārisuddhisīle. ``cittaṃ bhāvaya''nti imameva desanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``atisaṅkhepadesitattā''^eb^ti. ^b^ko samādhī^eb^ti sarūpapucchā. ^b^kenaṭṭhena samādhī^eb^ti kena atthena samādhīti vuccati, ``samādhī''ti padaṃ kaṃ abhidheyyatthaṃ nissāya pavattanti attho. ^b^katividho^eb^ti pabhedapucchā.

[03] ``ko samādhī''ti kāmañcāyaṃ sarūpapucchā, vibhāgavantānaṃ pana sarūpavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanamukheneva hotīti vibhāgo tāva anavasesato dassetabbo. taṃdassane ca ayamādīnavoti dassetuṃ ^b^``samādhi bahuvidho''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^bahuvidho^eb^ti kusalādivasena anekavidho. ^b^nānappakārako^eb^ti ālambanamanasikārachandapaṇidhiadhimokkhābhinīhārasaññānānattādinānappakāro. ^b^na sādheyyā^eb^ti lokiyasamādhissa bhāvanā idha adhippetattho, tañca na sādheyya. jhānavimokkhādīsu hi samādhiṃ uddharitvā tassa labbhamānehi vibhāgehi vissajjane kariyamāne ^b^jhānavibhaṅgādīsu^eb^ (vibha0 508 ādayo) āgato sabbo samādhipabhedo vissajjetabbo siyā. tathā ca sati yvāyaṃ lokiyasamādhissa bhāvanāvidhi adhippeto, tassa vissajjanāya okāsova na bhaveyya. kiñca yenassa tikacatukkajhānikena hīnādibhedabhinnena pavattivibhāgena brahmapārisajjādivasena navavidho, pañcamajjhānikena vehapphalādivasena dasavidho vā ekādasavidho vā bhavappabhedo nippajjati. svāssa pavattivibhāgo ayaṃ soti niddhāretvā vuccamāno vikkhepāya siyā, yathā taṃ avisaye. tenāha ^b^``uttari ca vikkhepāya saṃvatteyyā''^eb^ti. ^b^kusalacittekaggatā^eb^ti ^b^kusalā^eb^ anavajjasukhavipākalakkhaṇā ^b^cittekaggatā^eb^.

[03] cittacetasikānaṃ samaṃ avisāravasena sampiṇḍentassa viya ādhānaṃ ^b^samādhānaṃ^eb^. avisāralakkhaṇo ^a^V1.0101^ea^ hi samādhi, sampiṇḍanaraso ca. sammā avikkhipanavasena ādhānaṃ samādhānaṃ. avikkhepalakkhaṇo vā hi ^a^M1.0108^ea^ samādhi, vikkhepaviddhaṃsanaraso cāti. svāyaṃ yasmā ekārammaṇe cittassa ṭhitihetu, tasmā ^b^``ṭhapananti vuttaṃ hotī''^eb^ti āha. tathā hesa ``cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitī''ti (dha0 sa0 15) niddiṭṭho. ekārammaṇaggahaṇañcettha samādhissa santānaṭṭhitibhāvadassanatthaṃ. tathā hissa ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ dīpacciṭṭhiti nidassitā. ^b^ānubhāvenā^eb^ti balena, paccayabhāvenāti attho. ^b^avikkhipamānā^eb^ti na vikkhipamānā vūpasamamānā. upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno hi samādhi. etenassa vikkhepapaṭipakkhataṃ dasseti. ^b^avippakiṇṇā^eb^ti avisaṭā. etena avisāralakkhaṇataṃ.

[03] sayaṃ na vikkhipati, sampayuttā vā na vikkhipanti etenāti avikkhepo, so lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^avikkhepalakkhaṇo^eb^. vikkhepaṃ viddhaṃseti, tathā vā sampajjatīti ^b^vikkhepaviddhaṃsanaraso^eb^. uddhacce avikampanavasena paccupatiṭṭhati, sampayuttānaṃ vā taṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti ^b^avikampanapaccupaṭṭhāno. sukha^eb^nti nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ avikkhepalakkhaṇaṃ nāma samādhissa āveṇiko sabhāvo, na tenassa koci vibhāgo labbhatīti āha ^b^``avikkhepalakkhaṇena tāva ekavidho''^eb^ti. sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe appento viya pavattatīti vitakko ^b^appanā^eb^. tathā hi so ``appanā byappanā''ti (dha0 sa0 7) niddiṭṭho. tappamukhatāvasena pana sabbasmiṃ mahaggatānuttare jhānadhamme ``appanā''ti ^b^aṭṭhakathā^eb^vohāro. tathā tassa anuppattiṭṭhānabhūte parittajhāne upacāravohāro. gāmādīnaṃ samīpaṭṭhāne gāmūpacārādisamaññā viyāti āha ^b^``upacārappanāvasena duvidho''^eb^ti. idha pana samādhivasena veditabbaṃ. lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti vuccati vaṭṭaṃ, tappariyāpannatāya loke niyutto, tattha vā viditoti ^b^lokiyo^eb^. tattha apariyāpannatāya lokato uttaro uttiṇṇoti ^b^lokuttaro^eb^. kāmañcettha lokiyasamādhi bhāvetabbabhāvena gayhati, ubhayaṃ pana ekajjhaṃ gahetvā tato itaraṃ niddhāretuṃ ^b^``lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidho''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^sappītikanippītikavasenā^eb^ti saha pītiyā vattatīti sappītiko, pītisampayutto. natthi etassa pītīti nippītiko, pītivippayutto. tesaṃ vasena. sukhena saha ekuppādādibhāvaṃ gatoti ^b^sukhasahagato^eb^ ^a^M1.0109^ea^, sukhasampayuttoti attho. ^b^upekkhāsahagate^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^upekkhā^eb^ti cettha adukkhamasukhavedanā adhippetā. sā hi sukhadukkhākārapavattiṃ upekkhati majjhattākārasaṇṭhitattā. sukhasahagata-padena ^a^V1.0102^ea^ cettha sappītiko, nippītikekadeso ca saṅgahito, upekkhāsahagata-padena pana nippītikekadesovāti ayametesaṃ padānaṃ viseso.

[03] sabhāvato, paccayato, phalato ca majjhimapaṇītehi nihīno, tesaṃ vā guṇehi parihīnoti ^b^hīno,^eb^ attano paccayehi padhānabhāvaṃ nīto ^b^paṇīto,^eb^ ubhinnaṃ majjhe bhavo ^b^majjhimo^eb^. sampayogavasena pavattamānena saha vitakkena savitakko, saha vicārena savicāro, savitakko ca so savicāro cāti ^b^savitakkasavicāro. ādi^eb^-saddena avitakkavicāramatto, avitakkāvicāro ca gahito. tattha vicārato uttari vitakkena sampayogābhāvato avitakko ca so vicāramatto cāti ^b^avitakkavicāramatto^eb^. visesanivattiattho vā ^b^matta^eb^-saddo. savitakkasavicāro hi samādhi vitakkavisiṭṭhena vicārena savicāro, ayaṃ pana vicāramattena vitakkasaṅkhātavisesarahitena, tasmā avitakkavicāramatto. atha vā bhāvanāya pahīnattā vitakkābhāvenāyaṃ vicāramatto, na vicārato aññassa attano sampayuttadhammassa kassaci abhāvāti dassetuṃ avitakka-vacanena vicāramatta-padaṃ visesetvā vuttaṃ. ubhayarahito ^b^avitakkāvicāro. pītisahagatādivasenā^eb^ti pītisahagatasukhasahagataupekkhāsahagatavasena. yadettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ sukhasahagataduke vuttanayameva. paṭipakkhehi samantato khaṇḍitattā ^b^paritto^eb^. parittanti vā appamattakaṃ vuccati, ayampi appānubhāvatāya paritto viyāti ^b^paritto^eb^. kilesavikkhambhanato, vipulaphalato, dīghasantānato ca mahantabhāvaṃ gato, mahantehi vā uḷāracchandādīhi gato paṭipannoti ^b^mahaggato^eb^. ārammaṇakaraṇavasenāpi natthi etassa pamāṇakaradhammā, tesaṃ vā paṭipakkhoti ^b^appamāṇo^eb^.

[03] paṭipajjati jhānaṃ etāyāti paṭipadā, pubbabhāgabhāvanā. dukkhā kicchā paṭipadā etassāti ^b^dukkhāpaṭipado^eb^. pakatipaññāya abhivisiṭṭhattā abhiññā nāma appanāvahā bhāvanāpaññā, dandhā mandā abhiññā etassāti ^b^dandhābhiñño^eb^. dukkhāpaṭipado ca so dandhābhiñño cāti ^b^dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiñño^eb^ ^a^M1.0110^ea^, samādhi. tadādivasena. ^b^catujhānaṅgavasenā^eb^ti catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ aṅgabhāvavasena, catukkanayavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^hānabhāgiyādivasenā^eb^ti hānakoṭṭhāsikādivasena.

[03] ^b^channaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0103^ea^ ^b^anussatiṭṭhānāna^eb^nti buddhānussatiādīnaṃ channaṃ anussatikammaṭṭhānānaṃ. ^b^imesaṃ vasenā^eb^ti imesaṃ dasannaṃ kammaṭṭhānānaṃ vasena. ``pubbabhāge ekaggatā''ti iminā appanāya upakārakanānāvajjanupacārassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo, na ekāvajjanasseva. ^b^appanāsamādhīna^eb^nti upakattabbaupakārakasambandhe sāmivacanaṃ ``purisassa attho''tiādīsu viya. ^b^parikamma^eb^nti gotrabhu. aparitto samādhīti dassetuṃ ^b^``paṭhamassa jhānassā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^tīsu bhūmīsū^eb^ti kāmarūpārūpabhūmīsu. kusalacittekaggatāya adhippetattā ^b^``ariyamaggasampayuttā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^siyā sappītiko, siyā nippītiko^eb^ti aniyamavacanaṃ upacārasamādhisāmaññena sabbesampi vā jhānānaṃ nānāvajjanavīthiyaṃ upacārasamādhi siyā sappītiko, siyā nippītiko. ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ pana ādito dukatikajjhānānaṃ upacārasamādhi sappītikova, itaresaṃ nippītikova, visabhāgavedanassa cittassa āsevanapaccayatābhāvato, ekavīthiyaṃ vedanāparivattanābhāvato ca. ^b^siyā sukhasahagato, siyā upekkhāsahagato^eb^ti etthāpi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. tattha pana ``dukatikajjhānāna''nti vuttaṃ, idha ``tikacatukkajjhānāna''nti vattabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^paṭiladdhamatto^eb^ti adhigatamatto anāsevito abahulīkato. so hi paridubbalabhāvena hīno hoti. ^b^nātisubhāvito^eb^ti ativiya paguṇabhāvaṃ apāpito. ^b^subhāvito^eb^ti suṭṭhu bhāvito sammadeva paguṇataṃ upanīto. tenāha ^b^``vasippatto''^eb^ti. chandādīnaṃ hīnatādivasenāpi imesaṃ hīnāditā veditabbā. tathā hi uḷārapuññaphalakāmatāvasena pavattito ^b^hīno,^eb^ lokiyābhiññāsampādanāya pavattito ^b^majjhimo,^eb^ vivekakāmatāya ariyabhāve ṭhitena pavattito ^b^paṇīto^eb^ ^a^M1.0111^ea^. attahitāya bhavasampattiatthaṃ pavattito vā ^b^hīno,^eb^ kevalaṃ alobhajjhāsayena pavattito ^b^majjhimo,^eb^ parahitāya pavattito ^b^paṇīto^eb^. vaṭṭajjhāsayena vā pavattito ^b^hīno,^eb^ vivekajjhāsayena pavattito ^b^majjhimo,^eb^ vivaṭṭajjhāsayena lokuttarapādakatthaṃ pavattito ^b^paṇīto^eb^.

[03] ^b^saddhiṃ upacārasamādhinā^eb^ti sabbesampi jhānānaṃ upacārasamādhinā saha. ^b^vitakkamatteyeva ādīnavaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0104^ea^ ^b^disvā^eb^ti vitakkeyeva oḷārikato upaṭṭhahante ``cittassa khobhakaradhammo aya''nti ādīnavaṃ disvā vicārañca santato manasi karitvā. tenāha ^b^``vicāre adisvā''^eb^ti. ^b^taṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti taṃ evaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ samādhiṃ sandhāya. ^b^etaṃ^eb^ ``avitakkavicāramatto samādhī''ti dutiyapadaṃ ^b^vuttaṃ. tīsū^eb^ti ādito tīsu.

[03] ^b^tesvevā^eb^ti tesu eva catukkapañcakanayesu. ^b^tatiye catutthe^eb^ti catukkanaye tatiye, pañcakanaye catuttheti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^avasāne^eb^ti dvīsupi nayesu pariyosānajjhāne. yathākkamaṃ catutthe, pañcame vā. ^b^pītisukhasahagato vā^eb^ti etthāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. ettha ca satipi pītisahagatassāpi samādhissa sukhasahagatatte tīṇipi padāni asaṅkarato dassetuṃ nippītikasukhato sappītikasukhassa visesadassanatthaṃ satthu pītitikadesanāti nippītikasseva sukhassa vasena sukhasahagato samādhi gahitoti daṭṭhabbo.

[03] ^b^upacārabhūmiya^eb^nti upacārajjhānasampayuttacittuppāde. cittuppādo hi sahajātadhammānaṃ uppattiṭṭhānatāya ``bhūmī''ti vuccati ``sukhabhūmiyaṃ kāmāvacare''tiādīsu (dha0 sa0 988) viya. ^b^paritto samādhi^eb^ kāmāvacarabhāvato.

[03] ^b^paṭhamasamannāhāro^eb^ bhāvanaṃ ārabhantassa ``pathavī pathavī''tiādinā kammaṭṭhāne paṭhamābhiniveso. ^b^tassa tassa jhānassa upacāra^eb^nti nīvaraṇavitakkavicāranikantiādīnaṃ vūpasame thirabhūtaṃ kāmāvacarajjhānaṃ. ``yāva appanā''ti iminā pubbabhāgapaññāya eva abhiññābhāvo vutto viya dissatīti vadanti ^a^M1.0112^ea^. appanāpaññā pana ^b^abhiññāva^eb^. yadaggena hi pubbabhāgapaññāya dandhasīghatā, tadaggena appanāpaññāyapīti. ^b^samudācāragahaṇatāyā^eb^ti samudācārassa gahaṇabhāvena, pavattibāhullatoti attho. ^b^asukhāsevanā^eb^ti kasirabhāvanā.

[03] ^b^palibodhupacchedādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena bhāvanāvidhānāparihāpanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^asappāyasevī^eb^ti upacārādhigamato pubbe asappāyasevitāya ^b^dukkhā paṭipadā^eb^. pacchā asappāyasevitāya ^b^dandhā abhiññā hoti. sappāyasevino^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^pubbabhāge^eb^ti upacārajjhānādhigamato ^a^V1.0105^ea^ orabhāge. ^b^aparabhāge^eb^ti tato uddhaṃ. ^b^tassa vomissakatā^eb^ti yo pubbabhāge asappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge sappāyasevī, tassa dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā. itarassa sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā hoti. evaṃ paṭhamacatutthānaṃ vomissakatāya dutiyatatiyāti attho. akatapalibodhupacchedassa saparipanthatāya paṭipadā dukkhā hoti, itarassa sukhā. asampāditāppanākosallassa ñāṇassa avisadatāya ^b^dandhā abhiññā hoti,^eb^ visadatāya ^b^khippā abhiññā^eb^.

[01] ^b^taṇhāavijjāvasenā^eb^ti taṇhāavijjānaṃ abhibhavānabhibhavavasena. ^b^samathavipassanādhikāravasenā^eb^ti samathavipassanāsu asato, sato ca adhikārassa vasena. taṇhāya samādhissa ujupaṭipakkhattā sā samathapaṭipadāya paripanthinīti āha ^b^``taṇhābhibhūtassa hi dukkhā paṭipadā hotī''^eb^ti. abhibhavo cassā itarakilesehi adhikatāya ^b^anabhibhūtassa^eb^ taṇhāyāti adhikārato veditabbaṃ. tathā avijjā paññāya ujupaṭipakkhāti tadabhibhūtassa dandhābhiññatā vuttā. ^b^akatādhikāro^eb^ti bhavantare akataparicayo yathā paguṇaṃ katvā vissaṭṭhagantho appamattakena payogena suppavatti vācuggatova hoti, evaṃ pubbe kataparicayassa bhāvanā appakasireneva ijjhatīti āha ^b^``katādhikārassa sukhā''^eb^ti. svāyaṃ akato, kato ca adhikāro samathanissito paṭipadāyaṃ vutto samādhippadhānattā paṭipadāya. vipassanānissito abhiññāyaṃ ñāṇappadhānattā appanāya. ^b^kilesindriyavasenā^eb^ti tikkhātikkhānaṃ kilesindriyānaṃ vasena. tenāha ^b^``tibbakilesassā''^eb^tiādi ^a^M1.0113^ea^. tattha ^b^kilesā^eb^ kāmacchandādayo, ^b^indriyāni^eb^ saddhādīni.

[03] yathāvuttā paṭipadābhiññā puggalādhiṭṭhānāti dhammaniddesampi puggalādhiṭṭhānamukhena dassetuṃ ^b^``yo puggalo''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^appaguṇo^eb^ti na subhāvito vasībhāvaṃ apāpito. tenāha ^b^``uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkotī''^eb^ti. ^b^ayaṃ paritto^eb^ti ayaṃ samādhi appānubhāvatāya paritto. ^b^avaḍḍhite^eb^ti ekaṅguladvaṅgulamattampi na vaḍḍhite yathāupaṭṭhite ārammaṇe. ekaṅgulamattampi hi vaḍḍhitaṃ appamāṇamevāti vadanti. ``paguṇo subhāvito''ti vatvā ``uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ sakkotī''ti iminā yathā paguṇopi uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ asakkonto samādhi parittoyeva hoti, na appamāṇo, evaṃ ñāṇuttarassa ekāsaneneva uparijhānanibbattanenāti subhāvitopi uparijhānassa paccayabhāvasaṅkhātāya subhāvitakiccasiddhiyā ^b^``appamāṇo''^eb^tveva vuccati. apare pana sace subhāvito paguṇo vasībhāvaṃ patto ^a^V1.0106^ea^ uparijhānassa paccayo ahontopi appamāṇo eva, pamāṇakarānaṃ rāgādipaṭipakkhānaṃ suvidūrabhāvatoti vadanti. ^b^vuttalakkhaṇavomissatāyā^eb^ti yo appaguṇo uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti, vaḍḍhite ārammaṇe pavatto, ayaṃ paritto appamāṇārammaṇo. yo pana paguṇo uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti, avaḍḍhite ārammaṇe pavatto, ayaṃ appamāṇo parittārammaṇoti evaṃ paṭhamacatutthasamādhīnaṃ vuttalakkhaṇassa vomissakabhāvena dutiyatatiyasamādhisaṅgāhako vomissakanayo veditabbo.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ti tato paṭhamajjhānato uddhaṃ. ^b^virattapītika^eb^nti atikkantapītikaṃ vā jigucchitapītikaṃ vā. avayavo samudāyassa aṅganti vuccati, ``senaṅgaṃ rathaṅga''ntiādīsu viyāti āha ^b^``catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ aṅgabhūtā cattāro samādhī''^eb^ti.

[03] hānaṃ bhajatīti ^b^hānabhāgiyo,^eb^ hānabhāgo vā etassa atthīti ^b^hānabhāgiyo,^eb^ parihānakoṭṭhāsikoti attho. ālayassa apekkhāya apariccajanato ṭhitiṃ bhajatīti ^b^ṭhitibhāgiyo^eb^. visesaṃ bhajatīti ^b^visesabhāgiyo. paccanīkasamudācāravasenā^eb^ti tassa tassa ^a^M1.0114^ea^ jhānassa paccanīkānaṃ nīvaraṇavitakkavicārādīnaṃ pavattivasena. ^b^tadanudhammatāyā^eb^ti tadanurūpabhūtāya satiyā. ^b^saṇṭhānavasenā^eb^ti saṇṭhahanavasena patiṭṭhānavasena. ``sā pana tadassādasaṅkhātā, tadassādasampayuttakkhandhasaṅkhātā vā micchāsatī''ti ^b^sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ (vibha0 aṭṭha0 799) vuttaṃ. tattha sāpekkhassa upari visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā avigatanikantikā taṃtaṃpariharaṇasatītipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati. evañca katvā ``satiyā vā nikantiyā vā''ti vikappavacanañca yuttaṃ hoti. ^b^visesādhigamavasenā^eb^ti visesādhigamassa paccayabhāvavasena, visesaṃ vā adhigacchati etenāti visesādhigamo, tassa vasena. ^b^nibbidāsahagatasaññāmanasikārasamudācāravasenā^eb^ti ādīnavadassanapubbaṅgamanibbindanañāṇasampayuttasaññāya ca ābhogassa ca pavattivasena. ^b^nibbedhabhāgiyatā^eb^ti saccānaṃ nibbijjhanapakkhikatā vipassanāya saṃvattatīti attho.

[03] ^b^kāmasahagatā^eb^ti kāmārammaṇā, kāmasaññāhi vā vokiṇṇā. ^b^avitakkasahagatā^eb^ti ``kathaṃ nu kho me avitakkaṃ jhānaṃ bhaveyyā''ti evaṃ avitakkārammaṇā avitakkavisayā. kāmañcāyaṃ ``paṭhamassa jhānassā''tiādiko pāṭho paññāvasena āgato, samādhissāpi panettha saṅgaho ^a^V1.0107^ea^ atthevāti udāharaṇassa sātthakataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``tāya pana paññāya sampayuttā samādhīpi cattāro hontī''^eb^ti tesaṃ vasena evaṃ vuttanti attho.

[03] bhāvanāmayassa samādhissa idhādhippetattā upacārekaggatā ^b^``kāmāvacaro samādhī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^adhipatiṃ karitvā^eb^ti ``chandavato ce samādhi hoti, mayhampi evaṃ hotī''ti chandaṃ adhipatiṃ, chandaṃ dhuraṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā. ^b^labhati samādhi^eb^nti evaṃ yaṃ samādhiṃ labhati, ^b^ayaṃ vuccati chandasamādhi,^eb^ chandādhipatisamādhīti attho. evaṃ vīriyasamādhiādayopi veditabbā.

[03] ^b^catukkabhede^eb^ti catukkavasena samādhippabhedaniddese. aññattha sampayogavasena vicārena saha vattamāno vitakko pañcakanaye dutiyajjhāne viyojitopi na suṭṭhu viyojitoti, tena saddhiṃyeva vicārasamatikkamaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ ^b^``vitakkavicārātikkamena tatiya''^eb^nti. dvidhā ^a^M1.0115^ea^ bhinditvā catukkabhede vuttaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānanti yojanā. ^b^pañcajhānaṅgavasenā^eb^ti pañcannaṃ jhānānaṃ aṅgabhāvavasena samādhissa pañcavidhatā veditabbā.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ti ñāṇavibhaṅge. tattha hi ``jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattīnaṃ saṃkilesavodāna''nti, ettha ^b^``saṃkilesa''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^hānabhāgiyo dhammo^eb^ti apaguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ kāmādianupakkhandanaṃ. ^b^visesabhāgiyo dhammo^eb^ti paguṇehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi vuṭṭhitassa saññāmanasikārānaṃ dutiyajjhānādianupakkhandanaṃ. tenāha ^b^``paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhi''^eb^ntiādi. tassattho (vibha0 aṭṭha0 828) -- apaguṇassa paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhīnaṃ tato vuṭṭhitaṃ ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā ^b^saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti^eb^ codenti tudanti, tassa kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena sā paṭhamajjhānapaññā hāyati, tasmā ^b^hānabhāginī paññā. avitakkasahagatā^eb^ti avitakkaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ santato paṇītato manasi karoto ārammaṇavasena ^b^avitakkasahagatā samudācaranti^eb^ paguṇapaṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhitaṃ dutiyajjhānādhigamatthāya codenti tudanti, tassa dutiyajjhānānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena paṭhamajjhānapaññā visesabhūtassa dutiyajjhānassa uppattiyā padaṭṭhānatāya ^b^visesabhāginī paññā^eb^. taṃsampayutto samādhi idhādhippeto. ^b^iminā nayenā^eb^ti iminā paṭhamajjhāne vuttena vidhinā dutiyajjhānādīsupi hānabhāgiyadhammo, visesabhāgiyadhammo ca veditabbo.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ ^b^ariyamaggasampayutto^eb^ti ^a^V1.0108^ea^ lokuttarāppamāṇāpariyāpannaggahaṇena lokiyehi asādhāraṇato, sappītikādiggahaṇena sādhāraṇato ca ariyamaggasampayutto ^b^samādhi vutto. bhāvito hoti^eb^ saññāya sampayuttattā. ^b^ta^eb^nti ariyamaggasamādhiṃ. ^b^visu^eb^nti paññābhāvanāya visuṃ katvā ^b^na vadāma^eb^.

[03] kammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ ^a^M1.0116^ea^ paribundheti uparodheti pavattituṃ na detīti ^b^palibodho^eb^ ra-kārassa la-kāraṃ katvā, paripanthoti attho. ^b^upacchinditvā^eb^ti samāpanena, saṅgahaṇena vā uparundhitvā, apalibodhaṃ katvāti attho.

[03] āvasanti etthāti ^b^āvāso^eb^. paricchedavasena veṇiyati dissatīti pariveṇaṃ. vihāre bhikkhūnaṃ taṃ taṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^svāyaṃ^eb^ āvāso. ^b^navakammādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena āvāsassa tadaññaṃ abhivuddhikāraṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^kāraṇenā^eb^ti ``chāyūdakasampannaṃ sulabhabhikkha''ntiādinā kāraṇena. ^b^apekkhavā^eb^ti sālayo.

[03] ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ palibodhābhāve. ^b^pācīnakhaṇḍarāji^eb^nti puratthimadisāyaṃ pabbatakhaṇḍānaṃ antare vanarājiṭṭhānaṃ. ``nāmā''ti iminā tassa padesassa ayaṃ samaññāti dasseti. ^b^paṭisāmitamevā^eb^ti niccakālaṃ paṭisāmetvāva vihārato nikkhamāmīti dasseti. ^b^dhātunidhānaṭṭhāna^eb^nti kāyabandhanadhammakaraṇanhānasāṭikākkhakadhātusaṅkhātānaṃ paribhogasarīradhātūnaṃ nidahitaṭṭhānaṃ. īdisassa ayaṃ thero viya alaggacittassa. etena ``bhikkhunā nāma āvāse evarūpena bhavitabba''nti ovādo dinno hoti. ito paresupi vatthūsu eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^kula^eb^nti kulaggahaṇena kulamanussānaṃ gahaṇaṃ gāmaggahaṇena gāmavāsīnaṃ viya. ^b^upaṭṭhākakulampī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena pageva ñātikulanti dasseti. ^b^uddesattha^eb^nti uddisāpanatthaṃ, pāṭhaṃ uddisāpetvā sajjhāyitunti attho. ^b^idhevā^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva padese, yattha katthaci vihāreti attho. ^b^taṃ vihāra^eb^nti taṃ koraṇḍakavihāraṃ.

[03] ^b^upagato^eb^ti ^a^V1.0109^ea^ vassaṃ upagato. ^b^sadā^eb^ti gatakālato pabhuti visesato pavāritadivasato paṭṭhāya sabbadā divase divase. ^b^paridevamānā^eb^ti taṃtaṃvilapanavasena vividhaṃ paridevantī. ^b^sabbaṃ pavatti^eb^nti attanā tattha diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya pacchā samāgamapariyosānaṃ daharassa sabbaṃ pavattiṃ.

[03] ^b^kāyasakkhi^eb^nti ^a^M1.0117^ea^ ``passa ima''nti mukhapaṭiggāhakaṃ katvā. ^b^rathavinītapaṭipada^eb^nti dasakathāvatthukittanapubbikaṃ rathavinītūpamāhi vibhāvitaṃ ^b^rathavinītasutte^eb^ (ma0 ni0 1.252) āgataṃ sattavisuddhipaṭipadaṃ. ^b^nālakapaṭipada^eb^nti ``moneyyaṃ te upaññissa''ntiādinā (su0 ni0 706) satthārā ^b^nālakattherassa^eb^ desitapaṭipadaṃ. ^b^tuvaṭakapaṭipada^eb^nti ``mūlaṃ papañcasaṅkhāyā''tiādinā (su0 ni0 922) bhagavatā desitapaṭipadaṃ. tattha hi yathākkamaṃ --
[21] ``na munī gāmamāgamma, kulesu sahasā care.
[22] ghāsesanaṃ chinnakatho, na vācaṃ payutaṃ bhaṇe''.. (su0 ni0 716).
[22] ``gāme ca nābhisajjeyya, lābhakamyā janaṃ na lapayeyyā''ti.. (su0 ni0 935) --
[25] evamādikā paramappicchakathā āgatā. ^b^catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmatādīpaka^eb^nti cīvarādīsu catūsu paccayesu santosassa, bhāvanārāmatāya ca pakāsakaṃ.

[03] labbhatīti ^b^lābho^eb^. tenāha ^b^``cattāro paccayā''^eb^ti. ^b^mahāparivāre^eb^ti vipulaparivāre. piṇḍapātaṃ tāva dentā buddhapūjāpattacīvarādīni tassa parivārāni katvā denti, tathā cīvarādidānepi. ^b^bāhullikapiṇḍapātikā^eb^ti piṇḍapātikā hutvā paccayabāhullikā. ^b^vadantī^eb^ti purimadivase bhikkhāya āhiṇḍanakāle yathāsutaṃ vadanti. ^b^niccabyāvaṭo^eb^ upāsakādīnaṃ saṅgaṇhane.

[03] ^b^tassā^eb^ti gaṇassa. ^b^so^eb^ti gaṇapalibodho. ^b^eva^eb^nti idāni vuccamānākārena gaṇavācakassa pariyesanampi lahukameva icchitabbanti āha ^b^``yojanato paraṃ agantvā''^eb^ti. ^b^attano kamma^eb^nti samaṇadhammamāha.

[03] ^b^katākate^eb^ti ^a^V1.0110^ea^ kate ca akate ca kamme jānanavasena ^b^ussukkaṃ āpajjitabbaṃ, katākate^eb^ti vā appake ca mahante ca kate, yathā ``phalāphale''ti. sace bahuṃ avasiṭṭhanti sambandho. ^b^bhārahārā^eb^ saṅghakiccapariṇāyakā.

[03] ^b^pabbajjāpekkho^eb^ti ^a^M1.0118^ea^ sīhaḷadīpe kira kuladārakānaṃ pabbajjā āvāhavivāhasadisā, tasmā taṃ paricchinnadivasaṃ atikkametuṃ na sakkā. ^b^``sace taṃ alabhanto na sakkoti adhivāsetu''^eb^ntiādinā samāpanena palibodhupacchedo vutto, byatirekato pana ``sace taṃ alabhanto sakkoti adhivāsetuṃ, araññaṃ pavisitvā samaṇadhammova kātabbo''ti ayamattho dassitoti saṅgahaṇena palibodhupacchedo veditabbo. esa nayo sesesupi.
[03] ^b^tathā^eb^ti yathā upajjhāyo gilāno yāvajīvaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo, tathā upasampāditāntevāsiko attano kammavācaṃ vatvā upasampādito.
[03] ^b^yo koci rogo^eb^ti mūlabhūto, anubandho vā attano uppanno. ^b^anamatagge^eb^ti anu anu amatagge anādimati.

[03] ``gantho''ti iminā ganthapalibodho idha vuttoti āha ^b^``pariyattiharaṇa''^eb^nti. ^b^sajjhāyādīhī^eb^ti sajjhāyadhāraṇaparicayapucchādīhi. ^b^itarassā^eb^ti abyāvaṭassa. yassa ganthadhuraṃ vissajjetvā ṭhitassāpi gantho vattateva, na tassa gantho palibodho. yathā tamhi tamhi vatthumhi āgatattherānaṃ, nāpi sabbena sabbaṃ aganthapasutassa. ^b^majjhimapaṇṇāsako āgacchati,^eb^ suttapadesānaṃ vārānañca sadisatāya byāmuyhanato. ^b^puna na olokessāmī^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ganthadhuraṃ vissajjemīti attho.

[03] ^b^gāmavāsikattherehī^eb^ti anurādhapuravāsīhi. ^b^anuggahetvā^eb^ti aggahetvā tattha paricayaṃ akatvā. ^b^pañcanikāyamaṇḍale^eb^ti dīghāgamādike pañcapi nikāye sikkhitaparisāya. ^b^parivattessāmī^eb^ti vaṇṇayissāmi. ^b^suvaṇṇabheri^eb^nti seṭṭhabheriṃ. ^b^katamācariyānaṃ uggaho^eb^ti katamesaṃ ācariyānaṃ uggaho, kena parivattīyatīti adhippāyo. ^b^ācariyamaggo^eb^ti ācariyānaṃ kathāmaggo. ^b^attano ācariyāna^eb^nti attano kathetuṃ yuttānaṃ ācariyānaṃ. suvinicchitā sabbā tipiṭakapariyatti ^a^V1.0111^ea^ etasmiṃ atthīti ^b^sabbapariyattiko,^eb^ tepiṭakoti attho. pīṭhe nisinno tato otaritvā bhūmiyaṃ ^b^taṭṭikāya nisīditvā. gatakassā^eb^ti paṭipattigamanena gatassa diṭṭhasaccassa. ^b^cīvaraṃ pārupitvā^eb^ti ācariyassa apacitidassanatthaṃ ^a^M1.0119^ea^ parimaṇḍalaṃ cīvaraṃ pārupitvā. sāṭheyyābhāvato ^b^uju^eb^. kāraṇākāraṇassa ājānanato ^b^ājānīyo^eb^.

[03] ^b^pothujjanikā^eb^ti puthujjane bhavā. ^b^dupparihārā^eb^ bahuparissayatāya. tathā hissā ^b^uttānaseyyakadārako, taruṇasassa^eb^ñca nidassitaṃ. ^b^vipassanāya palibodho^eb^ samathayānikassa, na vipassanāyānikassa. yebhuyyena hi jhānalābhī samathayānikova hoti vipassanāsukhato. ^b^itarenā^eb^ti samathatthikena. ^b^avasesā^eb^ nava palibodhā.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ kammaṭṭhāne niyutto kammaṭṭhāniko, bhāvanamanuyuñjanto. tena ^b^kammaṭṭhānikena. paricchinditvā^eb^ti ``imasmiṃ vihāre sabbe bhikkhū''ti evaṃ paricchinditvā. ^b^sahavāsīnaṃ^eb^ bhikkhūnaṃ. ^b^muducittata^eb^nti attani muducittataṃ ^b^janeti,^eb^ ayañca sahavāsīnaṃ cittamaddavajananādiattho ``manussānaṃ piyo hotī''tiādinayappavattena ^b^mettānisaṃsasuttena^eb^ (a0 ni0 11.15; paṭi0 ma0 2.22; mi0 pa0 4.4.6) dīpetabbo. ^b^anolīnavuttiko hoti^eb^ sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ. ^b^dibbānipi ārammaṇāni^eb^ pageva itarāni. ^b^sabbattha^eb^ sabbasmiṃ samaṇakaraṇīye, sabbasmiṃ vā kammaṭṭhānānuyoge. pubbāsevanavasena ^b^atthayitabbaṃ^eb^. yogassa bhāvanāya anuyuñjanaṃ yogānuyogo, tadeva karaṇīyaṭṭhena kammaṃ, tassa ^b^yogānuyogakammassa ṭhānaṃ^eb^ nipphattihetu.
