[03] ^b^assā^eb^ti cittassa. ^b^alīna^eb^ntiādīsu kosajjapakkhiyānaṃ dhammānaṃ anadhimattatāya alīnaṃ. uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ dhammānaṃ anadhimattatāya ^b^anuddhataṃ^eb^. paññāpayogasampattiyā, upasamasukhādhigamena ca ^b^anirassādaṃ^eb^. pubbenāparaṃ savisesaṃ tato eva ārammaṇe ^b^samappavattaṃ, samathavīthipaṭipanna^eb^ñca. tattha alīnatāya paggahe, anuddhatatāya niggahe, anirassādatāya sampahaṃsane ^b^na byāpāraṃ āpajjati^eb^. alīnānuddhatatāya hi ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ anirassādatāya samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ. samappavattiyā vā alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ, samathavīthipaṭipattiyā anirassādanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^nekkhammapaṭipada^eb^nti jhānapaṭipattiṃ. ^b^samādhiadhimuttatā^eb^ti samādhinibbattane jhānādhigame yuttappayuttatā. sā pana yasmā samādhiṃ garuṃ katvā tattha ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena ^a^M1.0160^ea^ pavattiyā hoti, tasmā ^b^``samādhigarū''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ paṭiladdhe nimittasmiṃ evaṃ hi sampādayato appanākosallaṃ imaṃ appanā sampavattatīti sambandho. ^b^sā^eb^ti appanā. ^b^hitvā hī^eb^ti ^b^hi^eb^-saddo hetuattho. yasmā ^b^ṭhānametaṃ na vijjati,^eb^ tasmā ^b^cittappavattiākāraṃ^eb^ bhāvanācittassa līnuddhatādivasena pavattiākāraṃ ^b^sallakkhayaṃ^eb^ upadhārento. ^b^samataṃ vīriyasseva^eb^ vīriyassa samādhinā samarasataṃyeva ^b^yojayetha^eb^. kathaṃ pana yojayethāti āha ^b^``īsakampī''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^laya^eb^nti līnabhāvaṃ, saṅkocanti attho. ^b^yanta^eb^nti gacchantaṃ ^a^V1.0150^ea^, ^b^paggaṇhetheva^eb^ samabhāvāyāti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``accāraddhaṃ nisedhetvā samameva pavattaye''^eb^ti. kathaṃ pana samameva pavattayeti āha ^b^``reṇumhī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^yathā^eb^ti reṇuādīsu yathā madhukarādīnaṃ ^b^pavatti^eb^ upamābhāvena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^b^sammavaṇṇitā, evaṃ līnuddhatabhāvehi mocayitvā^eb^ vīriyasamatāyojanena ^b^nimittābhimukhaṃ mānasaṃ paṭipādaye^eb^ paṭibhāganimittābhimukhaṃ bhāvanācittaṃ sampādeyyāti attho.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ ``reṇumhī''tiādinā vuttagāthādvaye. ^b^atthadīpanā^eb^ upamūpameyyatthavibhāvanā. ^b^acheko^eb^ti akusalo. ^b^pakkhando^eb^ti dhāvituṃ āraddho. vikasanakkhaṇeyeva sarasaṃ kusumaparāgaṃ hoti, pacchā vātādīhi paripatati, virasaṃ vā hoti. tasmā nivattane reṇu khīyatīti āha ^b^``khīṇe reṇumhi sampāpuṇātī''^eb^ti. ^b^puppharāsi^eb^nti rukkhasākhāsu nissitaṃ pupphasañcayaṃ.

[03] ^b^sallakattāntevāsikesū^eb^ti sallakattāacariyassa antevāsikesu. ^b^udakathālagate^eb^ti udakathāliyaṃ ṭhapite. ^b^satthakamma^eb^nti sirāvedhanādisatthakammaṃ. phusitumpi uppalapattanti sambandho. ^b^samenā^eb^ti purimakā viya garuṃ, mandañca payogaṃ akatvā samappamāṇena payogena. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti uppalapatte. ^b^pariyodātasippo^eb^ti suvisuddhasippo nipphannasippo.

[01] ^b^makkaṭakasutta^eb^nti ^a^M1.0161^ea^ lūtasuttaṃ. ^b^niyāmako^eb^ nāvāsārathī. ^b^laṅkāra^eb^nti kilañjādimayaṃ nāvākaṭasārakaṃ. ^b^telena achaḍḍento nāḷiṃ pūretī^eb^ti sarāvādigatena telena achaḍḍento sukhumacchiddakaṃ telanāḷiṃ pūreti. ^b^evamevā^eb^ti yathā te ādito vuttamadhukarasallakattāntevāsisuttākaḍḍhakaniyāmakatelapūrakā vegena payogaṃ karonti, evameva yo bhikkhu ``sīghaṃ appanaṃ pāpuṇissāmī''ti gāḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ karoti, yo majjhe vuttamadhukarādayo viya vīriyaṃ na karoti, ime dvepi vīriyasamatābhāvena appanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkonti. yo pana avasāne vuttamadhukarādayo viya samappayogo, ayaṃ appanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ sakkoti vīriyasamatāyogatoti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``eko bhikkhū''^eb^tiādi. ^b^līnaṃ^eb^ bhāvanācittanti adhippāyo.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ ^b^eva^eb^nti ^a^V1.0151^ea^ vuttappakārena. vīriyasamatāyojanavasena vīthipaṭipannaṃ bhāvanā^b^mānasaṃ^eb^ paṭibhāganimitteyeva ṭhapanavasena ^b^nimittābhimukhaṃ paṭipādayato assa^eb^ yogino. ^b^ijjhissatī^eb^ti samijjhissati, uppajjissatīti attho. ^b^anuyogavasenā^eb^ti bhāvanāvasena. ^b^sesānī^eb^ti sesāni tīṇi, cattāri vā. ^b^pakaticittehī^eb^ti pākatikehi kāmāvacaracittehi. ^b^balava...pe0... cittekaggatāni^eb^ bhāvanābalena paṭutarasabhāvappattiyā. ^b^parikammattā^eb^ti paṭisaṅkhārakattā. yadi āsannattā upacāratā, gotrabhuno eva upacārasamaññā siyāti āha ^b^``samīpacārittā vā''^eb^ti. anaccāsannopi hi nātidūrapavattī samīpacārī nāma hoti. appanaṃ upecca carantīti ^b^upacārāni. ito pubbe parikammāna^eb^nti nānāvajjanavīthiyaṃ parikammānaṃ. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etesu parikammupacārānulomasaññitesu. ^b^sabbantima^eb^nti tatiyaṃ, catutthaṃ vā. ^b^parittagottābhibhavanato^eb^ti parittassa gottassa abhibhavanato. gaṃtāyatīti hi gottaṃ, ``paritta''nti pavattamānaṃ abhidhānaṃ, buddhiñca ekaṃsikavisayatāya rakkhatīti ^b^parittagottaṃ^eb^. yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na pavattati, evaṃ abhidhānaṃ abhidheyyabhūtena. tasmā so tāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati. taṃ pana mahaggatānuttaravidhuraṃ kāmataṇhāya gocarabhūtaṃ kāmāvacaradhammānaṃ āveṇikarūpaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. mahaggatagottepi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. ^b^bhāvanato^eb^ti uppādanato.

[03] avisesena ^a^M1.0162^ea^ sabbesaṃ sabbā samaññāti paṭhamanayo gahitaggahaṇaṃ hotīti āha ^b^``aggahitaggahaṇenā''^eb^tiādi. nānāvajjanaparikammameva parikammanti adhippāyena ^b^``paṭhamaṃ vā upacāra''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^catutthaṃ appanācittaṃ, pañcamaṃ vā appanācittaṃ^eb^ pubbe vuttanayena sace catutthaṃ gotrabhu hotīti attho. ^b^pañcamaṃ vā^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddo aniyame. svāyaṃ aniyamo iminā kāraṇenāti dassetuṃ ^b^``tañca kho khippābhiññadandhābhiññavasenā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tattha khippābhiññassa catutthaṃ appeti, dandhābhiññassa pañcamaṃ. kasmā pana catutthaṃ, pañcamaṃ vā appeti, na tato paranti āha ^b^``tato paraṃ javanaṃ patatī''^eb^ti. tato pañcamato paraṃ chaṭṭhaṃ, sattamañca javanaṃ patantaṃ viya hoti parikkhīṇajavattāti adhippāyo.

[03] yathā aladdhāsevanaṃ paṭhamajavanaṃ dubbalattā gotrabhuṃ na uppādeti, laddhāsevanaṃ pana balavabhāvato ^a^V1.0152^ea^ dutiyaṃ, tatiyaṃ vā gotrabhuṃ uppādeti, evaṃ laddhāsevanatāya balavabhāvato chaṭṭhaṃ, sattamampi appetīti therassa adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``tasmā chaṭṭhepi sattamepi appanā hotī''^eb^ti. ^b^ta^eb^nti therassa vacanaṃ. suttasuttānulomāacariyavādehi anupatthambhitattā vuttaṃ ^b^``attanomatimatta''^eb^nti. ``purimā purimā kusalā dhammā''ti (paṭṭhā0 1.1.12) pana suttapadamakāraṇaṃ āsevanapaccayalābhassa balavabhāve anekantikattā. tathā hi aladdhāsevanāpi paṭhamacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā hoti, laddhāsevanā dutiyacetanā yāva chaṭṭhacetanā aparāpariyavedanīyā. ^b^catutthapañcamesuyevā^eb^tiādi vuttassevatthassa yuttidassanamukhena nigamanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. tattha yadi chaṭṭhasattamaṃ javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hoti parikkhīṇajavattā, kathaṃ sattamajavanacetanā upapajjavedanīyā, ānantariyā ca hotīti? nāyaṃ viseso āsevanapaccayalābhena balappattiyā. kiñcarahi kiriyāvatthāvisesato. kiriyāvatthā hi ārambhamajjhapariyosānavasena tividhā. tattha ca pariyosānāvatthāya sanniṭṭhāpakacetanābhāvena upapajjavedanīyāditā hoti, na balavabhāvenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. paṭisandhiyā anantarapaccayabhāvino vipākasantānassa anantarapaccayabhāvena tathā abhisaṅkhatattāti ca vadanti. tasmā chaṭṭhasattamānaṃ papātābhimukhatāya parikkhīṇajavatā na sakkā nivāretuṃ. tathā hi ^b^``yathā hi puriso''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[01] ^b^sā^eb^ ^a^M1.0163^ea^ ^b^ca pana^eb^ appanā. ^b^addhānaparicchedo^eb^ti kālaparicchedo. so panettha sattasu ṭhānesu katthaci aparimāṇacittakkhaṇatāya, katthaci atīttarakhaṇatāya ^b^natthī^eb^ti vutto. na hettha sampuṇṇajavanavīthi addhā labbhati. tenevāha ^b^``ettha maggānantaraphala''^eb^ntiādi. ^b^sesaṭṭhānesū^eb^ti paṭhamappanā, lokiyābhiññā, maggakkhaṇo, nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa phalakkhaṇoti etesu catūsu ṭhānesu.

[03] ^b^ettāvatā^eb^ti ettakena bhāvanākkamena ^b^esa^eb^ yogāvacaro ^b^paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. evaṃ^eb^ viharatā ca ^b^anena^eb^ tadeva ^b^paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇa^eb^nti sambandho.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ jhānapāṭhe. ^b^viviccitvā^eb^ti visuṃ hutvā. tenāha ^b^``vinā hutvā apakkamitvā''^eb^ti, pajahanavasena apasakkitvāti attho. ^b^vivicceva kāmehī^eb^ti ettha ^b^``viviccā''^eb^ti iminā vivecanaṃ jhānakkhaṇe kāmānaṃ abhāvamattaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^``viviccevā''^eb^ti pana iminā ekaṃsato kāmānaṃ vivecetabbatādīpanena tappaṭipakkhatā jhānassa, kāmavivekassa ca jhānādhigamūpāyatā ^a^V1.0153^ea^ dassitā hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ``paṭhamaṃ jhāna''ntiādiṃ vatvā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^``katha''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^``andhakāre sati padīpobhāso viyā''^eb^ti etena yathā padīpobhāsābhāvena rattiyaṃ andhakārābhibhavo, evaṃ jhānābhāvena sattasantatiyaṃ kāmābhibhavoti dasseti.

[03] ^b^eta^eb^nti pubbapadeyeva avadhāraṇavacanaṃ. ^b^na kho pana evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ^eb^ ``kāmehi evā''ti avadhāraṇassa akatattā. nissaranti niggacchanti etena, ettha vāti ^b^nissaraṇaṃ^eb^. ke niggacchanti? kāmā, tesaṃ kāmānaṃ nissaraṇaṃ pahānaṃ ^b^tannissaraṇaṃ,^eb^ tato. kathaṃ pana samāne vikkhambhane kāmānamevetaṃ nissaraṇaṃ, na byāpādādīnanti codanaṃ yuttito, āgamato ca sodhetuṃ ^b^``kāmadhātū''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^kāmadhātusamatikkamanato^eb^ti sakalassapi kāmabhavassa samatikkamapaṭipadābhāvato. tena imassa jhānassa kāmapariññābhāvamāha. ^b^kāmarāgapaṭipakkhato^eb^ti vakkhamānavibhāgassa kilesakāmassa paccatthikabhāvato. tena yathā mettā byāpādassa, karuṇā vihiṃsāya, evamidaṃ jhānaṃ kāmarāgassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtanti dasseti. evamattano pavattiyā, vipākappavattiyā ca kāmarāgato, kāmadhātuto ^a^M1.0164^ea^ ca vinivattasabhāvattā idaṃ jhānaṃ visesato kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ. svāyamattho pāṭhagato evāti āha ^b^``yathāhā''^eb^tiādi. kāmañcetamatthaṃ dīpetuṃ purimapadeyeva avadhāraṇaṃ gahitaṃ, uttarapadepi pana taṃ gahetabbameva tathā atthasambhavatoti dassetuṃ ^b^``uttarapadepī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^ito^eb^ti kāmacchandato. ^b^esa^eb^ niyamo. ^b^sādhāraṇavacanenā^eb^ti avisesavacanena. tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedappaṭipassaddhinissaraṇavivekā ^b^tadaṅgavivekādayo^eb^. cittakāyaupadhivivekā ^b^cittavivekādayo. tayo eva idha^eb^ jhānakathāyaṃ ^b^daṭṭhabbā^eb^ samucchedavivekādīnaṃ asambhavato.

[03] ^b^niddese^eb^ti mahāniddese (mahāni0 1, 7). tattha hi ``uddānato dve kāmā -- vatthukāmā kilesakāmā cā''ti uddisitvā ``tattha katame vatthukāmā? manāpiyā rūpā...pe0... manāpiyā phoṭṭhabbā''tiādinā vatthukāmā niddiṭṭhā. te pana kāmīyantīti ^b^kāmā^eb^ti veditabbā. ^b^tatthevā^eb^ti niddese eva. ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ti jhānavibhaṅge (vibha0 564). patthanākārena pavatto dubbalo lobho chandanaṭṭhena ^b^chando,^eb^ tato balavā rañjanaṭṭhena ^b^rāgo,^eb^ tatopi balavataro bahalarāgo ^b^chandarāgo^eb^. nimittānubyañjanāni saṅkappeti etenāti ^b^saṅkappo,^eb^ tathāpavatto lobho, tato balavā rañjanaṭṭhena ^b^rāgo,^eb^ saṅkappanavaseneva pavatto tatopi balavataro ^b^saṅkapparāgo^eb^ti. svāyaṃ ^a^V1.0154^ea^ pabhedo ekasseva lobhassa pavattiākāravasena, avatthābhedavasena ca veditabbo yathā ``vaccho dammo balībaddo''ti. ime ^b^kilesakāmā^eb^. kāmentīti kāmā, kāmenti etehīti vā.

[03] ^b^evañhi satī^eb^ti evaṃ ubhayesampi kāmānaṃ saṅgahe sati. ^b^vatthukāmehipī^eb^ti ``vatthukāmehi viviccevā''tipi attho yujjatīti evaṃ yujjamānatthantarasamuccayattho ^b^pi^eb^-saddo, na kilesakāmasamuccayattho. kasmā? imasmiṃ atthe kilesakāmehi vivekassa dutiyapadena vuttattā. ^b^tenā^eb^ti vatthukāmavivekena. ^b^kāyaviveko vutto hoti^eb^ puttadārādipariggahavivekadīpanato. ^b^purimenā^eb^ti kāyavivekena. ^b^etthā^eb^ti ``vivicceva kāmehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehī''ti etasmiṃ padadvaye, ito vā niddhārite vivekadvaye. akusala-saddena yadipi ^a^M1.0165^ea^ kilesakāmā, sabbākusalāpi vā gahitā, sabbathā pana kilesakāmehi viveko vuttoti āha ^b^``dutiyena kilesakāmehi vivekavacanato''^eb^ti. ^b^dutiyenā^eb^ti ca cittavivekenāti attho. ^b^etesa^eb^nti yathāvuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ, niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. taṇhādisaṃkilesānaṃ vatthuno pahānaṃ ^b^saṃkilesavatthuppahānaṃ. lolabhāvo^eb^ nāma tattha tattha rūpādīsu taṇhuppādo, tassa ^b^hetu^eb^ vatthukāmā eva veditabbā. ^b^bālabhāvo^eb^ avijjā, duccintitacintitādi vā, tassa ayonisomanasikāro, sabbepi vā akusalā dhammā ^b^hetu^eb^. kāmaguṇādhigamahetupi pāṇātipātādiasuddhapayogo hotīti tabbivekena ^b^payogasuddhi^eb^ vibhāvitā. taṇhāsaṃkilesasodhanena, vivaṭṭūpanissayasaṃvaḍḍhanena ca ajjhāsayavisodhanaṃ ^b^āsayaposanaṃ. kāmesū^eb^ti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ.

[03] ^b^anekabhedo^eb^ti kāmāsavakāmarāgasaṃyojanādivasena, rūpataṇhādivasena ca anekappabhedo. ^b^kāmacchandoyevā^eb^ti kāmasabhāvoyeva chando, na kattukamyatāchando, nāpi kusalacchandoti adhippāyo. ^b^jhānapaṭipakkhato^eb^ti jhānassa paṭipakkhabhāvato taṃhetu tannimittaṃ ^b^visuṃ vutto^eb^. akusalabhāvasāmaññena aggahetvā visuṃ sarūpena gahito. yadi kilesakāmova purimapade vutto, kathaṃ bahuvacananti āha ^b^``anekabhedato''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ^b^aññesampi^eb^ diṭṭhimānāhirikānottappādīnaṃ, taṃsahitaphassādīnañca. upari vuccamānāni jhānaṅgāni ^b^uparijhānaṅgāni,^eb^ tesaṃ attano paccanīkānaṃ ^b^paṭipakkhabhāvadassanato^eb^ tappaccanīkanīvaraṇavacanaṃ. ^b^nīvaraṇāni hi jhānaṅgapaccanīkāni^eb^ tesaṃ pavattinivāraṇato. ^b^samādhi kāmacchandassa^eb^ ^a^V1.0155^ea^ ^b^paṭipakkho^eb^ rāgappaṇidhiyā ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato, nānārammaṇehi palobhitassa paribbhamantassa cittassa samādhānato ca. ^b^pīti byāpādassa^eb^ paṭipakkhā pāmojjena samānayogakkhemattā. ^b^vitakko thinamiddhassa^eb^ paṭipakkho yoniso saṅkappanavasena savipphārapavattito. ^b^sukhaṃ^eb^ avūpasamānutāpasabhāvassa ^b^uddhaccakukkuccassa^eb^ paṭipakkhaṃ vūpasantasītalasabhāvattā. ^b^vicāro vicikicchāya^eb^ paṭipakkho ārammaṇe anumajjanavasena paññāpaṭirūpasabhāvattā. ^b^mahākaccānattherena^eb^ desitaṃ piṭakānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā peṭakaṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^peṭake^eb^.

[03] ^b^pañcakāmaguṇabhedavisayassā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0166^ea^ rūpādipañcakāmaguṇavisesavisayassa. ^b^āghātavatthubhedādivisayāna^eb^nti byāpādavivekavacanena ``anatthaṃ me acarī''ti (dī0 ni0 3.340; a0 ni0 9.29; vibha0 960) ādiāghātavatthubhedavisayassa dosassa, mohādhikehi thinamiddhādīhi vivekavacanena paṭicchādanavasena dukkhādipubbantādibhedavisayassa mohassa vikkhambhanaviveko vutto. kāmarāgabyāpādatadekaṭṭhathinamiddhādivikkhambhakañcetaṃ sabbākusalapaṭipakkhasabhāvattā. sabbakusalānaṃ tena sabhāvena sabbākusalappahāyakaṃ hoti, hontampi kāmarāgādivikkhambhanasabhāvameva hoti taṃsabhāvattāti avisesetvā nīvaraṇākusalamūlādīnaṃ ^b^``vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hotī''^eb^ti āha.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ natthi kāci vasavattitāti vasavattibhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ ^b^``vitakkanaṃ vitakko''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tayidaṃ ``vitakkanaṃ īdisamida''nti ārammaṇassa parikappananti āha ^b^``ūhananti vuttaṃ hotī''^eb^ti. yasmā cittaṃ vitakkabalena ārammaṇaṃ abhiniruḷhaṃ viya hoti, tasmā so ^b^ārammaṇābhiniropanalakkhaṇo^eb^ vutto. yathā hi koci rājavallabhaṃ, taṃsambandhinaṃ mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ ārohati anupavisati, evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati. yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti? vitakkabaleneva. yathā hi so puriso paricayena tena vināpi nirāsaṅko rājagehaṃ pavisati, evaṃ paricayena vitakkena vināpi avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati. ^b^paricayenā^eb^ti ca santāne pavattavitakkabhāvanāsaṅkhātena paricayena. vitakkassa hi santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattassa vasena cittassa ārammaṇābhiruhaṇaṃ ciraparicitaṃ. tena taṃ kadāci vitakkena vināpi tattha pavattateva. yathā taṃ ñāṇasahitaṃ hutvā sammasanavasena ciraparicitaṃ kadāci ñāṇavirahitampi sammasanavasena pavattati, yathā vā kilesasahitaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ sabbaso ^a^V1.0156^ea^ kilesarahitampi paricayena kilesavāsanāvasena pavattati, evaṃsampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ādito, abhimukhaṃ vā hananaṃ ^b^āhananaṃ^eb^. parito, parivattetvā vā āhananaṃ ^b^pariyāhananaṃ^eb^. ``rūpaṃ rūpaṃ, pathavī pathavī''ti ākoṭentassa viya pavatti ^b^``āhananaṃ, pariyāhanana''^eb^nti ca veditabbaṃ. ^b^ānayanaṃ^eb^ cittassa ārammaṇe upanayanaṃ, ākaḍḍhanaṃ vā.

[03] ^b^anusañcaraṇaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0167^ea^ anuparibbhamanaṃ. svāyaṃ viseso santānamhi labbhamāno eva santāne pākaṭo hotīti daṭṭhabbo. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^anumajjanaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇe cittassa anumasanaṃ, parimajjananti attho. tathā hi vicāro ``parimajjanahattho viya, sañcaraṇahattho viyā''ti ca vutto. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti ārammaṇe. sahajātānaṃ anuyojanaṃ ārammaṇe anuvicāraṇasaṅkhātānumajjanavaseneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^anuppabandhanaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇe cittassa avicchinnassa viya pavatti. tathā hi so ``anusandhānatā''ti (dha0 sa0 8) niddiṭṭho. teneva ca ``ghaṇḍānuravo viya, paribbhamanaṃ viyā''ti ca vutto.

[03] ^b^katthacī^eb^ti paṭhamajjhāne, parittacittuppādesu ca. vicārato ^b^oḷārikaṭṭhena,^eb^ vicārasseva ca ^b^pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena^eb^ anuravato oḷāriko, tassa ca pubbaṅgamo ^b^ghaṇḍābhighāto viya vitakko^eb^. yathā hi ghaṇḍābhighāto paṭhamābhinipāto hoti, evaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhaniropanaṭṭhena ^b^vitakko cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto^eb^ hoti. ^b^abhighāta^eb^-ggahaṇena cettha abhighātajo saddo gahitoti veditabbo. ^b^vipphāravā^eb^ti vicalanayutto saparipphando. ^b^paribbhamanaṃ viya^eb^ parissayābhāvavīmaṃsanatthaṃ. ^b^anuppabandhena pavattiya^eb^nti upacāre vā appanāyaṃ vā santānena pavattiyaṃ. tattha hi vitakko niccalo hutvā ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya pavattati, na paṭhamābhinipāte. ^b^pākaṭo hotī^eb^ti vitakkassa viseso abhiniropanākāro oḷārikattā paṭhamajjhāne pākaṭo hoti, tadabhāvato pañcakanaye dutiyajjhāne vicārassa viseso anumajjanākāro pākaṭo hoti.

[01] ^b^vālaṇḍupakaṃ^eb^ eḷakalomādīhi katacumbaṭakaṃ. ^b^uppīḷanahattho^eb^ti piṇḍassa uppīḷanahattho. tasseva ito cito ca ^b^sañcaraṇahattho. maṇḍala^eb^nti kaṃsabhājanādīsu kiñci maṇḍalaṃ vaṭṭalekhaṃ karontassa. yathā pupphaphalasākhādiavayavavinimutto avijjamānopi rukkho ``sapuppho saphalo''ti voharīyati, evaṃ vitakkādiaṅgavinimuttaṃ avijjamānampi jhānaṃ ``savitakkaṃ savicāra''nti voharīyatīti dassetuṃ ^b^``rukkho viyā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. jhānabhāvanāya puggalavasena desetabbattā ^a^V1.0157^ea^ ``idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī''tiādinā puggalādhiṭṭhānena jhānāni uddiṭṭhānīti. yadipi ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā katā, ^b^attho pana tatrāpi^eb^ vibhaṅgepi yathā idha ``iminā ^a^M1.0168^ea^ ca vitakkenā''tiādinā dhammavasena vutto, ^b^evameva daṭṭhabbo,^eb^ paramatthato puggalasseva abhāvatoti adhippāyo. ^b^attho...pe0... daṭṭhabbo^eb^ jhānasamaṅgino vitakkavicārasamaṅgitādassanena, jhānasseva ca savitakkasavicāratāya vuttattāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03] ^b^vivekā^eb^ti vivekā hetubhūtāti viveka-saddassa bhāvasādhanataṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^viveke^eb^ti kattusādhanataṃ, kammasādhanataṃ vā. ``vivitto''ti hi iminā nīvaraṇehi vinābhūto tehi vivecitoti ca sādhanadvayampi saṅgahitamevāti.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ ^b^pīṇayatī^eb^ti tappeti, vaḍḍheti vā. ^b^sampiyāyanalakkhaṇā^eb^ti paritussanalakkhaṇā. ^b^pīṇanarasā^eb^ti paribrūhanarasā. ^b^pharaṇarasā^eb^ti paṇītarūpehi kāyassa byāpanarasā. udaggabhāvo ^b^odagyaṃ. khuddikā^eb^ lahuṃ lomahaṃsanamattaṃ katvā bhinnā na puna uppajjati. ^b^khaṇikā^eb^ bahulaṃ uppajjati. ubbegato ^b^pharaṇā^eb^ niccalattā, ciraṭṭhitikattā ca paṇītatarā. ^b^cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā^eb^ti puṇṇavallikavihāre cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā. ^b^pakatiyā diṭṭhārammaṇavasenā^eb^ti pubbe mahācetiyaṃ gahitārammaṇavasena. ^b^citrageṇḍuko^eb^ vicitrākārena katageṇḍuko. ^b^upanissaye^eb^ti samīpe, tassa vā vihārassa nissayabhūte, gocaraṭṭhānabhūteti attho.

[03] ^b^gharājire^eb^ti gehaṅgaṇe. pabbatasikhare katacetiyaṃ ^b^``ākāsacetiya''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^gahitanimittenevā^eb^ti cetiyavandanaṃ, dhammassavanañca uddissa ``dhaññā vatime''tiādinā gahitakusalanimitteneva kāraṇabhūtena. gahitaṃ vā nimittaṃ etenāti gahitanimittaṃ, vuttākārena pavattacittaṃ, tena gahitanimitteneva cittena saha. ^b^pakkhanda^eb^nti anupaviṭṭhaṃ. ^b^anuparipphuṭa^eb^nti anu anu samantato phuṭaṃ, sabbaso anuvisaṭanti attho.

[03] passaddhiyā nimittabhāvena ^b^gabbhaṃ gaṇhantī^eb^. paripācanavasena ^b^paripākaṃ gacchantī^eb^. appanāsampayuttāva pīti appanāsamādhipūrikā. khaṇikasamādhipūrikā ca upacārasamādhipūrikā ca appanāsamādhissa vidūratarāti tadubhayaṃ anāmasanto ^b^``tāsu yā appanāsamādhissā''^eb^tiādimāha ^a^V1.0158^ea^. ^b^samādhisampayogaṃ gatā^eb^ti pubbe upacārasamādhinā sampayuttā hutvā anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā appanāsamādhinā sampayogaṃ gatā.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ sukhayatīti ^a^M1.0169^ea^ ^b^sukhaṃ,^eb^ attanā sampayuttadhamme laddhassāde karotīti attho. svāyaṃ kattuniddeso pariyāyaladdho dhammato aññassa kattu nivattanattho, nippariyāyena pana bhāvasādhanameva labbhatīti ^b^``sukhanaṃ sukha''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. iṭṭhasabhāvattā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ, sampayuttadhamme vā attani sādayatīti ^b^sātaṃ^eb^ da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā. sātaṃ ``madhura''nti vadanti. sātaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti ^b^sātalakkhaṇaṃ. upabrūhanaṃ^eb^ sampayuttadhammānaṃ saṃvaḍḍhanaṃ. dukkhaṃ viya avissajjetvā adukkhamasukhā viya anajjhupekkhitvā anu anu gaṇhanaṃ, upakāritā vā ^b^anuggaho. katthaci^eb^ paṭhamajjhānādike. ^b^paṭilābhatuṭṭhī^eb^ti paṭilābhavasena uppajjanakatuṭṭhi. ^b^paṭiladdharasānubhavana^eb^nti paṭiladdhassa ārammaṇarasassa anubhavananti sabhāvato pītisukhāni vibhajitvā dasseti. ^b^yattha pīti, tattha sukha^eb^nti vitakkassa viya itarena pītiyā sukhena accantasaṃyogamāha. ``yattha sukhaṃ, tattha na niyamato pītī''ti vicārassa viya vitakkena sukhassa pītiyā anaccantasaṃyogaṃ. tena accantānaccantasaṃyogitāya pītisukhānaṃ visesaṃ dasseti. kaṃ tārenti etthāti ^b^kantāraṃ,^eb^ nirudakamaruṭṭhānaṃ. vanameva ^b^vanantaṃ. tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samaye^eb^ti iṭṭhārammaṇassa paṭilābhasamaye, paṭiladdhassa rasānubhavanasamaye, vanacchāyādīnaṃ savanadassanasamaye, pavesaparibhogasamaye ca. ^b^pākaṭabhāvato^eb^ti yathākkamaṃ pītisukhānaṃ vibhūtabhāvato.

[03] ^b^vivekajaṃ pītisukha^eb^nti ettha purimasmiṃ atthe ^b^vivekaja^eb^nti jhānaṃ vuttaṃ. pītisukhasaddato ca atthiatthavisesato ``assa jhānassa, asmiṃ vā jhāne''ti ettha ^b^a^eb^-kāro daṭṭhabbo. dutiye pītisukhameva vivekajaṃ. ``vivekajaṃpītisukha''nti ca aññapadatthasamāso, paccattaniddesassa ca alopo kato. lope vā sati ``vivekajapītisukha''nti pāṭhoti ayaṃ viseso.

[03] ^b^upasampajjā^eb^ti ettha ^b^upa-saṃ^eb^-saddā ``upalabbhati, saṃbhuñjatī''tiādīsu viya niratthakāti dassetuṃ ``upagantvā''tiādiṃ vatvā puna tesaṃ sātthakabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``upasampādayitvā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, tasmā patvā, sādhetvāti vā attho. ^b^iriya^eb^nti kiriyaṃ. ^b^vutti^eb^ādīni tasseva vevacanāni. ^b^pālanā^eb^ti hi ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ iriyāpathantarehi rakkhaṇā.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ pañca ^a^M1.0170^ea^ ^a^V1.0159^ea^ aṅgāni vikkhambhanavasena pahīnāni etassāti ^b^pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ^eb^. ``agyāhito''ti ettha āhita-saddassa viya vippahīna-saddassettha paravacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, pañcahi aṅgehi vippahīnanti vā ^b^pañcaṅgavippahīnaṃ^eb^. nanu aññepi akusalā dhammā iminā jhānena pahīyanti, atha kasmā pañcaṅgavippahīnatāva vuccatīti āha ^b^``kiñcāpī''^eb^tiādi. jhānalābhinopi ajhānasamaṅgikāle jhānapaṭipakkhalobhacittādīnaṃ pavattisabbhāvato ^b^``jhānakkhaṇe''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^pahīyantī^eb^ti vigacchanti, nappavattantīti attho. ^b^ekattārammaṇe^eb^ti pathavīkasiṇādivasena ekasabhāve, ekaggatāsaṅkhāte ekattāvahe vā ārammaṇe. ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ nānāvisayapalobhitaṃ cittaṃ. ^b^kāmadhātuppahānāyā^eb^ti nānāvisayasamūpabyūḷhāya kāmadhātuyā pahānāya samatikkamāya paṭipadaṃ jhānaṃ nappaṭipajjati. ^b^nirantara^eb^nti vikkhepena anantaritaṃ, sahitanti attho. ^b^akammañña^eb^nti akammanīyaṃ, bhāvanākammassa ayogyanti attho. ^b^uddhaccakukkuccapareta^eb^nti uddhaccakukkuccena abhibhūtaṃ. ^b^paribbhamati^eb^ anavaṭṭhānato, avaṭṭhānassa samādhānassa abhāvatoti attho. ^b^vicikicchāya upahata^eb^nti sātisayassa vicārassa abhāvato ``sammāsambuddho nu kho bhagavā, na nu kho''ti, ``pathavī pathavī''tiādinā manasikārena, ``jhānaṃ siyā nu kho, na nu kho''tiādinā ca pavattāya vicikicchāya upahataṃ. ^b^nārohati^eb^ appaṭipattinimittattā. ^b^visesena jhānantarāyakarattā^eb^ti samādhiādīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvena jhānādhigamassa antarāyakaraṇato.

[03] ^b^tehī^eb^ti jhānādhigamassa paccayabhūtehi vitakkavicārehi. ^b^avikkhepāya sampāditappayogassā^eb^ti tato evaṃ samādhānāya nipphāditabhāvanāpayogassa. ^b^cetaso payogasampattisambhavā^eb^ti yathāvuttabhāvanāpayogasampattisamuṭṭhānā. ^b^pīti pīṇanaṃ^eb^ bhāvanāvasena tappanaṃ. ^b^upabrūhanaṃ^eb^ bhāvanāvasena parivuddhiṃ cetaso ^b^karotī^eb^ti sambandho. ^b^na^eb^nti cittaṃ. ^b^sasesasampayuttadhamma^eb^nti avasiṭṭhaphassādidhammasahitaṃ, samaṃ sammā ca ādhiyatīti sambandho. indriyasamatāvasena ^b^samaṃ,^eb^ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ. dūrībhāve līnuddhaccābhāvena ^b^sammā^eb^ ca ṭhapetīti attho. ekaggatā hi samādhānakiccena cittaṃ, sampayuttadhamme ca attānaṃ anuvattāpentī jhānakkhaṇe sātisayaṃ samāhite karotīti. ^b^uppattivasenā^eb^ti yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjanavasena ^a^M1.0171^ea^. etesu ^a^V1.0160^ea^ vitakkādīsu jhānaṃ ^b^uppannaṃ nāma^eb^ hoti tattheva jhānavohārato. tenāha ^b^``tasmā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^``yathā panā''^eb^tiādināpi upamāvasena tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ karoti.

[03] ^b^pakaticittato^eb^ti pākatikakāmāvacaracittato. ^b^suvisadenā^eb^ti suṭṭhu visadena, paṭutarenāti attho. ^b^sabbāvanta^eb^nti sabbāvayavavantaṃ, anavasesanti attho. ^b^apphuṭa^eb^nti asamphuṭṭhaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇesu phusitā^eb^ti appanāvasena pavattamānā cittekaggatā samantato ārammaṇaṃ pharantī viya hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. kasmā panettha jhānapāṭhe aggahitā cittekaggatā gahitāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya ^b^``tattha cittekaggatā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tesu jhānaṅgesu. ^b^na niddiṭṭhā^eb^ti sarūpato na niddiṭṭhā, sāmaññato pana jhānaggahaṇena gahitā. ^b^evaṃ vuttattā^eb^ti sarūpeneva vuttattā, aṅgameva cittekaggatāti sambandho. ^b^yena adhippāyenā^eb^ti yena vitakkādīhi saha vattantaṃ dhammaṃ dīpetuṃ tassa pakāsanādhippāyena ``savitakkaṃ savicāra''ntiādinā ^b^uddeso kato. so eva^eb^ adhippāyo ^b^tena^eb^ bhagavatā ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ ``cittekaggatā''ti niddisantena ^b^pakāsito^eb^. tasmā sā jhānapāṭhe aggahitāti na cintetabbaṃ.
[03] 75^b^.^eb^ ^b^ādimajjhapariyosānavasenā^eb^ti jhānassa ādimajjhapariyosānavasena. ^b^lakkhaṇavasenā^eb^ti tesaṃyeva appanāyaṃ lakkhitabbabhāvavasena.

[03] ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ kalyāṇatālakkhaṇānaṃ vibhāvane. ^b^paṭipadāvisuddhī^eb^ti paṭipajjati jhānaṃ etāyāti paṭipadā, gotrabhupariyosāno pubbabhāgiyo bhāvanānayo. paripanthato visujjhanaṃ visuddhi, paṭipadāya visuddhi ^b^paṭipadāvisuddhi^eb^. sā panāyaṃ yasmā jhānassa uppādakkhaṇe labbhati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``paṭipadāvisuddhi ādī''^eb^ti. ^b^upekkhānubrūhanā^eb^ti visodhetabbatādīnaṃ abhāvato jhānapariyāpannāya tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccanipphattiyā anubrūhanā. sā panāyaṃ visesato jhānassa ṭhitikkhaṇe labbhati. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``upekkhānubrūhanā majjhe''^eb^ti. ^b^sampahaṃsanā^eb^ti tattha dhammānaṃ anativattanādisādhakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena pariyodapanā. sā pana yasmā jhānassa osānakkhaṇe pākaṭā hoti ^a^M1.0172^ea^, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``sampahaṃsanā pariyosāna''^eb^nti. ^b^imāni tīṇi lakkhaṇānī^eb^ti paripanthato cittassa visujjhanākāro ^a^V1.0161^ea^, majjhimassa samathanimittassa paṭipajjanākāro, tattha pakkhandanākāroti imāni tīṇi jhānassa ādito uppādakkhaṇe appanāpattilakkhaṇāni tehi ākārehi vinā appanāpattiyā abhāvato, asati ca appanāya tadabhāvato. ^b^ādikalyāṇañceva^eb^ visuddhipaṭipadattā. yathāvuttehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgatattā, sampannalakkhaṇattā ca ^b^tilakkhaṇasampannañca^eb^. iminā nayena majjhapariyosānalakkhaṇānañca yojanā veditabbā.

[03] sambharīyati jhānaṃ etenāti sambhāro, nānāvajjanaparikammaṃ. saha sambhārenāti sasambhāro, so eva ^b^sasambhāriko. upacāro^eb^ti ekāvajjanūpacāramāha. paggahādikiccassa pubbabhāge bhāvanāya eva sādhitattā yā tattha ekāvajjanūpacāre siddhā ajjhupekkhanā, sā jhānakkhaṇe paribrūhitā nāma hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``upekkhānubrūhanā nāma appanā''^eb^ti. yathādhigataṃ jhānaṃ nissāya yo pahaṭṭhākāro cittassa paritoso, taṃ paccavekkhaṇāvasena pavattaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``sampahaṃsanā nāma paccavekkhaṇā''^eb^ti. ^b^eke^eb^ti abhayagirivāsino. te hi evaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhiādike vaṇṇayanti, tadayuttaṃ. tathā hi sati ajjhānadhammehi jhānassa guṇasaṃkittanaṃ nāma kataṃ hoti. na hi bhūmantaraṃ bhūmantarapariyāpannaṃ hoti. pāḷiyā cetaṃ viruddhanti dassetuṃ ^b^``yasmā panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^ekattagataṃ citta^eb^nti indriyānaṃ ekarasabhāvena, ekaggatāya ca sikhāppattiyā tadanuguṇaṃ ekattaṃ gatanti ekattagataṃ, sasampayuttaṃ appanāpattacittaṃ. tasseva paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhandatādi anantarameva vuccati. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ekasmiṃyeva appanācittakkhaṇe paṭipadāvisuddhiādi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā ^b^āgamanavasenā^eb^ti parikammāgamanavasena. ^b^anativattanādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena indriyekarasatātadupagavīriyavāhanāsevanāni saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^pariyodāpakassā^eb^ti parisodhakassa pabhassarabhāvakarassa. ^b^anativattanādibhāvasādhana^eb^meva cettha ñāṇassa kiccanipphatti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^tasmi^eb^nti tasmiṃ vāre, catupañcacittaparimāṇāya appanāvīthiyanti attho. ^b^tato^eb^ paripanthato. ^b^cittaṃ visujjhatī^eb^ti yadipi āgamanaṃ gahetuṃ avisesena viya vuttaṃ, parikammavisuddhito pana appanāvisuddhi sātisayāva. tenāha ^b^``visuddhattā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^āvaraṇavirahitaṃ hutvā^eb^ti yenāvaraṇena ^a^M1.0173^ea^ āvaṭattā cittaṃ tato pubbe majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjituṃ na sakkoti, tena vivittaṃ hutvā, taṃ vikkhambhetvāti attho. līnuddhaccasaṅkhātānaṃ ubhinnaṃ antānaṃ anupagamanena majjhimo, savisesaṃ paccanīkadhammānaṃ vūpasamanato ^a^V1.0162^ea^ samatho, yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato nimittañcāti ^b^majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ^eb^. tenāha ^b^``samappavatto appanāsamādhiyevā''^eb^ti. ^b^tadanantaraṃ pana purimacitta^eb^nti tassa appanācittassa anantarapaccayabhūtaṃ purimaṃ cittaṃ, gotrabhucittanti attho. ^b^ekasantatipariṇāmanayenā^eb^ti yathā ``tadeva khīraṃ dadhisampanna''nti, evaṃ satipi parittamahaggatabhāvabhede, paccayapaccayuppannabhāvabhede ca ekissā eva santatiyā pariṇāmūpagamananayena ekattanayavasena. ^b^tathatta^eb^nti tathabhāvaṃ appanāsamādhivasena samāhitabhāvaṃ. ^b^evaṃ paṭipannattā^eb^ti vuttākārena paṭipajjamānattā. yasmiñhi khaṇe tathattaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati, tasmiṃyeva khaṇe ^b^tathattupagamanena^eb^ appanāsamādhinā samāhitabhāvūpagamanena ^b^tattha pakkhandati nāma. purimacitte^eb^ti appanācittassa purimasmiṃ citte gotrabhucitte. ^b^vijjamānākāranipphādikā^eb^ti tasmiṃ citte vijjamānānaṃ paripanthavisuddhimajjhimasamathapaṭipattipakkhandanākārānaṃ nipphādikā, tenākārena nipphajjamānāti attho. teyeva hi ākārā paccayavisesato jhānakkhaṇe nipphajjamānā ``paṭipadāvisuddhī''ti laddhasamaññā jhānassa taṃ visesaṃ nipphādentā viya vuttā. ^b^uppādakkhaṇeyevā^eb^ti attalābhavelāyameva. yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ te ākārā nipphajjantīti āha ^b^``āgamanavasenā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^tassā^eb^ti cittassa. ``visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhatī''ti ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (paṭi0 ma0 1.158) puggalādhiṭṭhānena āgatāti ^b^``byāpāraṃ akaronto''^eb^ti āha. samathapaṭipattitathattupagamanañca idha samathabhāvāpattiyevāti āha ^b^``samathabhāvūpagamanenā''^eb^ti. ^b^kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekattena upaṭṭhitassā^eb^ti pubbe ``kathaṃ nu kho kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pajaheyya''nti paṭipannassa idāni samathapaṭipattiyā tassa pahīnattā kilesasaṅgaṇikābhāvena ekattena upaṭṭhitassa jhānacittassa. paripanthavisuddhimajjhimasamathapaṭipattipakkhandanehi vuddhippattiyā anubrūhite jhānacitte laddhokāsā tatramajjhattupekkhā sampayuttesu samavāhitabhāvena pavattamānā te anubrūhentī viya hotīti āha ^b^``tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccavasena upekkhānubrūhanā veditabbā''^eb^ti.

[03] ye ^a^M1.0174^ea^ panete yuganaddhadhammāti sambandho. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ jhānacitte. aññamaññānativattanavasena kiccakaraṇato yuge naddhā baddhā viya ^b^yuganaddhā. vimuttirasenā^eb^ti vimuccanakiccena, vimuccanasampattiyā vā. ^b^esa^eb^ yogī. ^b^vāhayatī^eb^ti pavatteti. ^b^assā^eb^ti jhānacittassa. ^b^tasmiṃ khaṇe^eb^ti bhaṅgakkhaṇe. uppādakkhaṇe atīte hi ṭhitikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya ^b^āsevanā^eb^ ^a^V1.0163^ea^ pavattati nāma. ^b^te ākārā^eb^ti aññamaññānativattanādayo tattha dhammānaṃ pavattiākārā. āsevanāpi hi āsevanapaccayabhāvīnaṃ dhammānaṃ pavattiākāroyeva. ^b^saṃkilesavodānesū^eb^ti samādhipaññānaṃ samarasatāya akaraṇaṃ bhāvanāya saṃkileso, karaṇaṃ vodānaṃ. tathā sesesupi. evametesu saṃkilesavodānesu ^b^taṃ taṃ ādīnavaṃ^eb^ dosaṃ ^b^ānisaṃsaṃ^eb^ guṇaṃ puretaraṃ pāṭihāriyañāṇena ^b^disvā^eb^ yathā aññamaññānativattanādayo honti, ^b^tathā^eb^ bhāvanāya ^b^sampahaṃsitattā^eb^ teneva ñāṇena ^b^visodhitattā^eb^. visodhanaṃ hettha sampahaṃsanaṃ. te ākārā yasmā nipphannā, tasmā ^b^``dhammānaṃ...pe0... veditabbāti vutta''^eb^nti lakkhaṇasaṃvaṇṇanāya ādimhi vuttaṃ nigamanavasena dasseti.

[03] ``yasmā upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotī''ti ko sambandho. kasmā sampahaṃsanāva pariyosānanti vuttā, na upekkhānubrūhanāti codanaṃ sandhāya ^b^``tattha yasmā upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ bhāvanācitte. ^b^upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotī^eb^ti appanākāle bhāvanāya samappavattiyā, paṭipakkhassa ca pahānato paggahādīsu byāpārassa akātabbato ajjhupekkhanāva hoti. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``samaye cittassa ajjhupekkhanā, visuddhaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhatī''ti ca ādi. sā panāyaṃ ajjhupekkhanā ñāṇassa kiccasiddhiyā hoti, visesato ñāṇasādhanattā appanābyāpārassāti phalena kāraṇānumānañāyena. yasmā upekkhāvasena ñāṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, tasmā ñāṇakiccabhūtā sampahaṃsanā pariyosānanti vuttāti sambandho.

[03] idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pāḷiyā samatthetuṃ ^b^``yathāhā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^tathāpaggahitaṃ citta^eb^nti yathā bhāvanācittaṃ kosajjapakkhe na patati, tathā vīriyasambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyānaṃ dhammānaṃ bahulīkāravasena paggahitaṃ. ^b^sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhatī^eb^ti paggaṇhantenāpi samādhissa vīriyasamatāyojanavasena paggahitattā sakkaccaṃ ajjhupekkhati, tatramajjhattupekkhā okāsaṃ ^a^M1.0175^ea^ labhati. taṃ pana ajjhupekkhanaṃ upekkhāvasena pubbe pavattapārihāriyapaññāvasena appanāpaññāya kiccādhikatāti āha ^b^``paññāvasena paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotī''^eb^ti. tassa adhimattattā eva ajjhupekkhantasseva nānāsabhāvehi nīvaraṇapamukhehi kilesehi appanā^b^cittaṃ vimuccati. vimokkhavasena^eb^ vimuccanavasena. ^b^paññāvasenā^eb^ti pubbe pavattapārihāriyapaññāvasena. ^b^vimuttattā^eb^ti nānākilesehi vimuttattā eva. ^b^te dhammā^eb^ saddhādayo, visesato saddhāpaññāvīriyasamādhayo ^a^V1.0164^ea^ ca ^b^ekarasā^eb^ samānakiccā ^b^honti^eb^. evamayaṃ indriyānaṃ ekarasaṭṭhena bhāvanā nipphajjamānā ñāṇabyāpāroti āha ^b^``ñāṇakiccabhūtā sampahaṃsanā pariyosāna''^eb^nti. evaṃ tividhāya paṭipadāvisuddhiyā laddhavisesāya tividhāya upekkhānubrūhanāya sātisayaṃ paññindriyassa adhimuttabhāvena catubbidhāpi sampahaṃsanā sijjhatīti āgamanupekkhā ñāṇakiccavasena dasapi ākārā jhāne eva veditabbā.

[03] ^b^gaṇanānupubbatā^eb^ti gaṇanānupubbatāya, gaṇanānupubbatāmattaṃ vā paṭhamanti idanti attho. tena desanākkamaṃ ulliṅgeti. ^b^``paṭhamaṃ uppannanti paṭhama''^eb^nti iminā paṭipattikkamaṃ, uppannanti hi adhigatanti attho. ``paṭhamaṃ samāpajjitabbanti paṭhama''nti idaṃ pana na ekantalakkhaṇanti ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 160) paṭisiddhattā idha na gahitaṃ. ārammaṇūpanijjhānaṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānanti duvidhe jhāne idhādhippetajjhānameva dassetuṃ ^b^``ārammaṇūpanijjhānato''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. pathavīkasiṇasaṅkhātassa attano attano ārammaṇassa rūpaṃ viya cakkhunā upanijjhāyanato. ^b^paccanīkajhāpanato^eb^ti nīvaraṇādīnaṃ paccanīkadhammānaṃ dahanato vikkhambhanavasena pajahanato. ^b^sakalaṭṭhenā^eb^ti heṭṭhā vuttanayena kate vā akate vā paricchijja gahite pathavībhāge pathavīmaṇḍale sakalārammaṇakaraṇaṭṭhena. na hi tassa ekadesamārammaṇaṃ karīyati. pathavīkasiṇasannissayatāya nimittaṃ ^b^pathavīkasiṇaṃ^eb^ yathā ``mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī''ti. taṃsahacaraṇato jhānaṃ ^b^pathavīkasiṇaṃ^eb^ yathā ``kuntā pacarantī''ti.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ lakkhaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ sarena vālaṃ vijjhatīti vālavedhī. idha pana anekadhā bhinnassa vālassa aṃsuṃ vijjhanto ``vālavedhī''ti adhippeto. ^b^tena^eb^ ^a^M1.0176^ea^ ^b^vālavedhinā. sūdenā^eb^ti bhattakārena. ^b^``ākārā pariggahetabbā''^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^``yathā hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sukusalo^eb^ti suṭṭhu cheko. ^b^dhanuggaho^eb^ti issāso. ^b^kamma^eb^nti yogyaṃ. ^b^akkantapadāna^eb^nti vijjhanakāle akkamanavasena pavattapadānaṃ. ^b^ākāra^eb^nti dhanujiyāsarānaṃ gahitākāraṃ. ^b^pariggaṇheyyā^eb^ti upadhāreyya. ^b^bhojanasappāyādayo^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddo avuttākārānampi saṅgāhako daṭṭhabbo. tena utubhāvanānimittādīnampi pariggaṇhanaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^tasmi^eb^nti tasmiṃ taruṇasamādhimhi.

[03] ^b^bhattāra^eb^nti ^a^V1.0165^ea^ sāminaṃ, bhattavetanādīhi posakanti attho. ^b^parivisanto^eb^ti bhojento. tassa ruccitvā bhuñjanākāraṃ sallakkhetvā tassa upanāmentoti yojanā. ^b^ayampi^eb^ yogī. ^b^adhigatakkhaṇe bhojanādayo ākāre^eb^ti pubbe jhānassa adhigatakkhaṇe kiccasādhake bhojanādigate ākāre. ^b^gahetvā^eb^ti pariggahetvā sallakkhetvā. ^b^naṭṭhe naṭṭhe^eb^ samādhimhi ^b^punappunaṃ appanāya^eb^.

[03] mahānasavijjāparicayena ^b^paṇḍito^eb^. tattha visadañāṇatāya ^b^byatto^eb^. ṭhānuppattikakaosallayogena ^b^kusalo. nānaccayehī^eb^ti nānaccayehi nānāsabhāvehi, nānārasehīti attho. tenāha ^b^``ambilaggehī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^sūpehī^eb^ti byañjanehi. ^b^ambilaggehī^eb^ti ambilakoṭṭhāsehi, ye vā ambilarasā hutvā aggabhūtā, tehi caturambilādimissehi. esa nayo ^b^tittakaggā^eb^dīsupi. ^b^khārikehī^eb^ti vātiṅgaṇakaḷīrādimissehi. ^b^nimitta^eb^nti ākāraṃ ruccanavasena bhuñjanākāraṃ. ^b^uggaṇhātī^eb^ti uparūpari gaṇhāti upadhāreti. ^b^imassa vā^eb^ sūpeyyassa atthāya hatthaṃ ^b^abhiharati. abhihārāna^eb^nti abhimukhena haritabbānaṃ paṇṇākārānaṃ, pūjābhihārānaṃ vā. ^b^nimittaṃ uggaṇhātī^eb^ti ``evaṃ me cittaṃ samāhitaṃ ahosī''ti nimittaṃ gaṇhāti sallakkheti.

[03] ^b^samādhiparipanthāna^eb^nti samādhissa paripanthabhūtānaṃ. ^b^dhammāna^eb^nti kāmacchandādinīvaraṇadhammānaṃ. ^b^suvisodhitattā^eb^ti suṭṭhu visodhitattā, vikkhambhanavaseneva sammadeva pahīnattāti attho. ^b^kāmādīnavapaccavekkhaṇādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena asubhamanasikāranekkhammānisaṃsapaccavekkhaṇādīni saṅgaṇhāti. nekkhammaguṇadassanenāpi ^a^M1.0177^ea^ hi tassa vibandhabhūte kāmacchande ādīnavo visesato pākaṭo hotīti. ^b^kāyaduṭṭhulla^eb^nti kāyadarathaṃ sāraddhakāyataṃ. tena kāyacittānaṃ sārambhanimittassa byāpādanīvaraṇassa na visodhanamāha. ^b^ārambhadhātumanasikārādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena vīriyasambojjhaṅganimittānaṃ, ālokasaññādīnañca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^samathanimittamanasikārādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena samādhisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^aññepi samādhiparipanthe^eb^ti vicikicchāṭṭhāniye, madamānādike ca sandhāyāha. ^b^āsaya^eb^nti vasanakasusiraṃ. ^b^suparisuddha^eb^nti āsaṅkanīyattābhāvena suṭṭhu parisuddhaṃ. etthāha -- nanu cāyaṃ pageva kāmādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā samathapaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno upacārakkhaṇeyeva jhānena nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāni, atha kasmā puna kāmādīnavapaccavekkhaṇādi gahitanti? saccametaṃ. taṃ pana pahānamattanti jhānassa ciraṭṭhitiyā atisayapahānatthaṃ puna gahitaṃ.

[03] ^b^uddhacca^eb^ ^a^V1.0166^ea^ ^b^middha^eb^nti kukkuccaṃ, thinañca tadekaṭṭhatāya gahitamevāti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^suddhantagato^eb^ti suparisuddhapariyantaṃ sabbaso visodhitakoṇapariyantaṃ uyyānaṃ gato. ^b^tahiṃ rame^eb^ti tasmiṃ jhāne rameyya divasabhāgampi jhānasamaṅgī eva bhaveyya.

[03] ^b^cittabhāvanāvepullattha^eb^nti samādhibhāvanāya vipulabhāvāya. yathā hi bhāvanāvasena nimittassa uppatti, evamassa bhāvanāvaseneva vaḍḍhanampi. tasmā ekaṅgulādivasena nimittaṃ vaḍḍhentassa punappunaṃ bahulīkārena jhānaṃ bhāvanāpi vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjati. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``cittabhāvanāvepullatthañca yathāladdhaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ vaḍḍhetabba''^eb^nti. ^b^tassā^eb^ti paṭibhāganimittassa.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrā^eb^ti sāmiatthe bhummavacanaṃ, tassāti attho. ^b^avaḍḍhetvā^eb^ti yathā kumbhakāro mattikāya pattaṃ karonto paṭhamaṃ aparicchinditvāva pattaṃ vaḍḍheti, evaṃ ^b^pattavaḍḍhanayogena^eb^ pattavaḍḍhanayuttiyā avaḍḍhetvā pūvikassa ^b^pūvavaḍḍhanaṃ^eb^. bhattassa upari bhattapakkhipanaṃ ^b^bhattavaḍḍhanaṃ^eb^. vatthassa tintassa añchanādi ^b^dussavaḍḍhanaṃ^eb^. paccekaṃ ^b^yoga^eb^-saddo yojetabbo. aparicchinditvā ^a^M1.0178^ea^ na vaḍḍhetabbaṃ saparicchede eva bhāvanāpavattito. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``sāntake no anantake''ti (visuddhi0 1.55).

[03] ^b^haṃsapotakā^eb^ti javanahaṃsapotakā. ^b^ukkūlaṃ^eb^ unnataṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^vikūlaṃ^eb^ ninnaṭṭhānaṃ. nadīsotena kataṃ viduggaṃ ^b^nadīviduggaṃ^eb^. visamākārena ṭhito pabbatapadeso ^b^pabbatavisamo^eb^.

[03] ^b^thūlāni hutvā upaṭṭhahanti^eb^ paccavekkhaṇābāhullena vibhūtabhāvato. ^b^dubbalāni hutvā upaṭṭhahanti^eb^ paguṇabalavabhāvassa anāpādikattā. ^b^upari ussukkanāyā^eb^ti bhāvanāya upari ārohanāya, dutiyajjhānādhigamāyāti attho.

[03] ^b^pabbateyyā^eb^ti pabbate bahulacārinī. ^b^akhettaññū^eb^ti agocaraññū. samādhiparipanthānaṃ visodhanānabhiññātāya ^b^bālo^eb^. jhānassa paguṇabhāvāpādanaveyyattiyassa abhāvena ^b^abyatto^eb^. uparijhānassa ^a^V1.0167^ea^ padaṭṭhānabhāvānavabodhena ^b^akhettaññū^eb^. sabbathāpi samāpattikosallābhāvena ^b^akusalo^eb^. samādhinimittassa vā anāsevanāya ^b^bālo^eb^. abhāvanāya ^b^abyatto^eb^. abahulīkārena ^b^akhettaññū^eb^. sammadeva anadhiṭṭhānato ^b^akusalo^eb^ti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^ubhato bhaṭṭho^eb^ti ubhayato jhānato bhaṭṭho. so hi appaguṇatāya na suppatiṭṭhitatāya saussāhopi vināsato, asāmatthiyato ca jhānadvayato parihīno. ^b^ciṇṇavasinā^eb^ti āsevitavasinā.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ vasanaṃ vasīti dhātuniddesatāya kiriyāniddesoti adhippāyenāha ^b^``vasiyo''^eb^ti, yathāruci pavattiyoti attho. āvajjanāya vasī, āvajjanāvasena vā vasī ^b^āvajjanavasī^eb^. jhānaṃ āvajjituṃ yattha yattha padese icchā ^b^yatthicchakaṃ^eb^. yadā yadā, yasmiṃ yasmiṃ vā jhānaṅge icchā ^b^yadicchakaṃ^eb^. yāva yāva icchā ^b^yāvadicchakaṃ,^eb^ da-kāro padasandhikaro. ^b^``yāvā''^eb^ti ca idaṃ bahūnaṃ javanavārānaṃ nirantaraṃ viya tathāpavattanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na ekameva. so hi paricchinnacittakkhaṇoti. ^b^āvajjanāya dandhāyitattaṃ natthī^eb^ti vuttanayena yattha katthaci ṭhāne yadā yadā ^a^M1.0179^ea^ yaṃ kiñci jhānaṅgaṃ āvajjentassa yathicchitaṃ kālaṃ āvajjanāya āvajjanappavattiyā dandhāyitattaṃ vitthāyitattaṃ, cirāyitattaṃ vā natthi. evaṃ āvajjanavasī siddhā nāma hotīti attho. ^b^sesā^eb^ti vuṭṭhānādhiṭṭhānapaccavekkhaṇāvasiyo.

[03] aṅgasamudāyabhāvato jhānassa jhāne āvajjanavasiṃ nipphādetukāmena paṭipāṭiyā jhānaṅgāni āvajjetabbānīti āha ^b^``paṭhamaṃ vitakkaṃ āvajjayato''^eb^ti. yadipi āvajjanamevettha icchitaṃ āvajjanavasiyā adhippetattā, āvajjanāya pana uppannāya javanehi bhavitabbaṃ. tāni ca kho āvajjanatapparatāya cittābhinīhārassa yathāvajjitajhānaṅgārammaṇāni katipayāneva honti, na paripuṇṇānīti vuttaṃ ^b^``vitakkārammaṇāneva cattāri pañca vā javanāni javantī''^eb^ti. ^b^cattāri^eb^ tikkhindriyassa. ^b^pañca^eb^ nātitikkhindriyassāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^nirantara^eb^nti visabhāgehi nirantaraṃ. ^b^ayaṃ panā^eb^ti bhavaṅgadvayantaritā catujavanacittā yathāvuttā ^b^āvajjanavasī. aññesaṃ vā^eb^ dhammasenāpatiādīnaṃ. ^b^evarūpe kāle^eb^ti uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya lahutaraṃ āvajjanavasīnibbattanakāle. sā ca kho ittarā parittakālā, na satthu yamakamahāpāṭihāriye viya ^a^V1.0168^ea^ ciratarappabandhavatī. tathā hi taṃ sāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ. adhigamena samaṃ sasampayuttassa jhānassa sammā āpajjanaṃ paṭipajjanaṃ ^b^samāpajjanaṃ,^eb^ jhānasamaṅgitā.

[03] ^b^sīgha^eb^nti ettha samāpajjitukāmatānantaraṃ dvīsu bhavaṅgesu uppannesu bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ samāpajjanaṃ sīghaṃ ^b^samāpajjanasamatthatā^eb^. ayañca matthakappattā ^b^samāpajjanavasī^eb^ satthu dhammadesanāyaṃ labbhati. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``so kho ahaṃ, aggivessana, tassā eva kathāya pariyosāne tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṃ karomi samādahāmi yenassudaṃ niccakappaṃ viharāmī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.387). ito sīghatarā hi samāpajjanavasī nāma natthi. juṇhāya rattiyā navoropitehi kesehi kapotakandarāyaṃ viharantassa āyasmato sāriputtassa yakkhena mahantampi pabbatakūṭaṃ padāletuṃ samatthe pahāre sīse dinne samāpajjanampettha nidassetabbaṃ. tathā hi vakkhati ``tadā thero tassa paharaṇasamaye samāpattiṃ appesī''ti (visuddhi0 2.374). ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ pana ``aññataraṃ samādhiṃ samāpajjitvā nisinno''ti (udā0 34) vuttaṃ. ime pana therā ^a^M1.0180^ea^ ``samāpattito vuṭṭhānasamakālaṃ tena pahāro dinno''ti vadanti.

[03] ^b^accharāmatta^eb^nti aṅguliphoṭamattaṃ ^b^khaṇaṃ. ṭhapetu^eb^nti setu viya sīghasotāya nadiyā oghaṃ vegena pavattituṃ adatvā yathāvuttakkhaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ^b^ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā^eb^. abhibhuyya ṭhapanaṃ, adhiṭṭhānaṃ viyāti vā adhiṭṭhānaṃ. tattha vasī ^b^adhiṭṭhānavasī. tatheva lahuṃ vuṭṭhātu^eb^nti accharāmattaṃ vā dasaccharāmattaṃ vā lahuṃ khaṇaṃ jhānasamaṅgī hutvā jhānato vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā. bhavaṅgacittuppattiyeva hettha jhānato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma. ettha ca yathā ``ettakameva khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapessāmī''ti pubbaparikammavasena adhiṭṭhānasamatthatā ^b^adhiṭṭhānavasī,^eb^ evaṃ ``ettakameva khaṇaṃ jhānasamaṅgī hutvā jhānato vuṭṭhahissāmī''ti pubbaparikammavasena vuṭṭhānasamatthatā ^b^vuṭṭhānavasī^eb^ veditabbā, yā samāpatti ``vuṭṭhānakusalatā''ti vuccati. ^b^tadubhayadassanattha^eb^nti adhiṭṭhānavuṭṭhānavasīdassanatthaṃ.

[03] ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ nimmitapabbate tassa vivare. kiñcāpi ekaṃyeva taṃ abhiññācittaṃ yena pabbataṃ nimmineyya, abhiññāpādakassa pana jhānassa lahutaraṃ ṭhapanaṃ, vuṭṭhānañca idha nidassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ``ettakā iddhimantā ekaṃ upaṭṭhākaṃ garuḷato rakkhituṃ na sakkhiṃsū''ti gārayhā assāma.

[03] ^b^āvajjanānantarānī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0169^ea^ āvajjanavasībhāvāya yathākkamaṃ vitakkādīnaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ āvajjanāya parato yāni javanāni pavattāni, tāni tesaṃ paccavekkhaṇāni. yadaggena āvajjanavasīsiddhi, tadaggena paccavekkhaṇāvasīsiddhi veditabbā.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ nīvaraṇappahānassa tappaṭhamatāya ^b^āsannanīvaraṇapaccatthikā^eb^. thūlaṃ nāma vipulampi pheggu viya sukhabhañjanīyanti āha ^b^``oḷārikattā aṅgadubbalā''^eb^ti. ^b^santato manasi karitvā^eb^ti paṭhamajjhānaṃ viya anoḷārikaṅgattā, santadhammasamaṅgitāya ca ``santa''nti manasi katvā. ye hi dhammā dutiyajjhāne pītisukhādayo, kāmaṃ te paṭhamajjhānepi santi, tehi pana te santatarā ceva paṇītatarā ca bhavantīti. ^b^nikanti^eb^nti nikāmanaṃ, apekkhanti ^a^M1.0181^ea^ attho. ^b^pariyādāyā^eb^ti khepetvā. ^b^cattāri pañcā^eb^ti vā-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho. dutiyajjhānaṃ etassa atthīti dutiyajjhānikaṃ. ^b^vuttappakārānevā^eb^ti paṭhamajjhāne vuttappakārāniyeva, parikammādināmakānīti attho.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ ^b^vūpasamā^eb^ti vūpasamahetu, ^b^vūpasamo^eb^ti cettha pahānaṃ adhippetaṃ, tañca vitakkavicārānaṃ. atikkamo atthato dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe anuppādoti āha ^b^``samatikkamā''^eb^tiādi. katamesaṃ panettha vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo adhippeto, kiṃ paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ, udāhu dutiyajjhānikānanti. kiñcettha yadi paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ, natthi tesaṃ vūpasamo. na hi kadāci paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārarahitaṃ atthi. atha dutiyajjhānikānaṃ, evampi nattheva vūpasamo, sabbena sabbaṃ tesaṃ tattha abhāvatoti? vuccate -- yehi vitakkavicārehi paṭhamajjhānassa oḷārikatā, tesaṃ samatikkamā dutiyassa jhānassa samadhigamo, na sabhāvato anoḷārikānaṃ phassādīnaṃ samatikkamāti ayamattho ``vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā''ti etena dīpito. tasmā ``kiṃ paṭhamajjhānikānaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo idhādhippeto, udāhu dutiyajjhānikāna''nti edisī codanā anokāsāva. yasmā diṭṭhādīnavassa taṃtaṃjhānakkhaṇe anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ vūpasamanaṃ adhippetaṃ. vitakkādayo eva jhānaṅgabhūtā tathā karīyanti, na taṃsampayuttā phassādayo, tasmā vitakkādīnaṃyeva vūpasamādivacanaṃ ñāyāgataṃ. yasmā pana vitakkādīnaṃ viya taṃsampayuttadhammānampi etena ``etaṃ oḷārika''nti ādīnavadassanaṃ sutte āgataṃ, tasmā avisesena ^a^V1.0170^ea^ vitakkādīnaṃ, taṃsahagatānañca vūpasamādike vattabbe vitakkādīnaṃyeva vūpasamo vuccamāno adhikavacanaṃ aññaṃ atthaṃ bodhetīti katvā kiñci visesaṃ dīpetīti dassetuṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ``oḷārikassa panā''^eb^tiādi gahitanti idha ``yehi vitakkavicārehī''tiādi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ``pītiyā ca virāgā''tiādīsupi eseva nayo. tasmā vitakkavicārapītisukhasamatikkamavacanāni oḷārikoḷārikaṅgasamatikkamā dutiyādiadhigamadīpakānīti tesaṃ ekadesabhūtaṃ vitakkavicārasamatikkamavacanaṃ taṃdīpakaṃ vuttaṃ. visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitepi hi vitakkavicārasamatikkamavacanādike paheyyaṅganiddesatāsāmaññena cittena samūhato gahite vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanassa tadekadesatā daṭṭhabbā. ayañca attho ^a^M1.0182^ea^ avayavena samudāyopalakkhaṇanayena vutto. atha vā vitakkavicāravūpasamavacaneneva taṃsamatikkamā dutiyādhigamadīpakena pītivirāgādivacanānaṃ pītiādisamatikkamā tatiyādiadhigamadīpakatā dīpitā hotīti tassa taṃdīpakatā vuttā.

[03] ^b^niyakajjhattamadhippetaṃ^eb^ na ajjhattajjhattādi. tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^``vibhaṅge panā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^nīlavaṇṇayogato nīlavatthaṃ viyā^eb^ti nīlayogato vatthaṃ nīlaṃ viyāti adhippāyo. yena sampasādanena yogā jhānaṃ ^b^sampasādanaṃ^eb^. tasmiṃ dassite ``sampasādanaṃ jhāna''nti samānādhikaraṇaniddeseneva taṃyogā jhāne taṃsaddappavatti dassitāti avirodho yutto. ekodibhāve kathanti ekodimhi dassite ekodibhāvaṃ jhānanti samānādhikaraṇaniddeseneva jhānassa ekodivaḍḍhanatā vuttā hotīti ce? ``ekodibhāva''nti padaṃ uddharitvā ekodissa niddeso na kātabbo siyāti ekodibhāvasaddo eva samādhimhi pavatto sampasādanasaddo viya jhāne pavattatīti yuttaṃ. ^b^imasmiñca atthavikappe^eb^ti ``cetaso sampasādayatī''ti etasmiṃ pakkhe ``cetaso''ti ca upayogatthe sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^purimasmi^eb^nti ``sampasādanayogato jhānaṃ sampasādana''nti vuttapakkhe. ^b^cetaso^eb^ti sambandhe sāmivacanaṃ.

[01] ^b^seṭṭhopi loke ``eko''ti vuccati^eb^ ``yāva pare ekāhaṃ te karomī''tiādīsu. eko adutiyo ``ekākībhi khuddakehi jita''ntiādīsu asahāyatthopi eka-saddo diṭṭhoti āha ^b^``eko asahāyo hutvā''^eb^ti. saddhādayopi kāmaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ sādhāraṇato, asādhāraṇato ca paccayā hontiyeva, samādhi pana jhānakkhaṇe sampayuttadhammānaṃ avikkhepalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhakaraṇena sātisayaṃ paccayo hotīti dassento ^b^``sampayuttadhamme...pe0... adhivacana''^eb^nti āha.

[03] ``sampasādanaṃ ^a^V1.0171^ea^, cetaso ekodibhāva''nti visesanadvayaṃ jhānassa atisayavacanicchāvasena gahitaṃ. svāyamatisayo yathā imasmiṃ jhāne labbhati, na tathā paṭhamajjhāneti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``nanu cā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ārammaṇe āhananapariyāhananavasena, anumajjanānuyojanavasena ca pavattamānā dhammā satipi nīvaraṇappahānena kilesakālussiyāpagame ^a^M1.0183^ea^ sampayuttānaṃ kañci khobhaṃ karontā viya tehi ca te na sannisinnā hontīti vuttaṃ ^b^``vitakkavicārakkhobhena na suppasanna''^eb^nti. khuddikā ūmiyo ^b^vīciyo^eb^. mahatiyo ^b^taraṅgā^eb^. satipi indriyasamatte, vīriyasamatāya ca teneva khobhena, sampasādābhāvena ca ^b^samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo^eb^ bahale viya jale maccho. yathāvuttakkhobho eva ^b^palibodho. evaṃ vuttenā^eb^ti yassā saddhāya vasena sampasādanaṃ, yassā ca cittekaggatāya vasena ekodibhāvanti ca jhānaṃ vuttaṃ. tāsaṃ eva ``saddahanā''tiādinā pavattiākārassa visesavibhāvanāvasena vuttena. ^b^tena^eb^ vibhaṅgapāṭhena. ``sampasādanayogato, sampasādanato vā sampasādanaṃ, ekodiṃ bhāvetīti ekodibhāvanti jhānaṃ vutta''nti evaṃ pavattā ^b^ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā na virujjhati^eb^. yathā pana avirodho, so vutto eva.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ^b^santā^eb^ti samaṃ nirodhaṃ gatā. ^b^samitā^eb^ti bhāvanāya samaṃ gamitā nirodhitā. ^b^vūpasantā^eb^ti tato eva suṭṭhu upasantā. ^b^atthaṅgatā^eb^ti atthaṃ vināsaṃ gatā. ^b^abbhatthaṅgatā^eb^ti upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^appitā^eb^ti vināsaṃ gamitā. ^b^sositā^eb^ti pavattisaṅkhātassa santānassa abhāvena sosaṃ sukkhabhāvaṃ itā. ^b^byantikatā^eb^ti vigatantakatā.

[03] ^b^ayamattho^eb^ti bhāvanāya pahīnattā vitakkavicārānaṃ abhāvo. codakena vuttamatthaṃ sampaṭicchitvā pariharituṃ ``evametaṃ siddhovāyamattho''ti vatvā ^b^``na paneta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^eta^eb^nti ``vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā''ti etaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^tadatthadīpaka^eb^nti tassa vitakkavicārābhāvamattasaṅkhātassa atthassa dīpakaṃ. ayañhettha attho -- dutiyajjhānādiadhigamūpāyadīpakena ajjhattasampasādanatāya, cetaso ekodibhāvatāya ca hetudīpakena, avitakkāvicārabhāvahetudīpakena ca vitakkavicāravūpasamavacaneneva vitakkavicārābhāvo dīpitoti kiṃ puna avitakkāvicāravacanena katenāti? na, adīpitattā. na hi vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanena vitakkavicārānaṃ appavatti vuttā hoti. vitakkavicāresu hi taṇhāppahānaṃ etesaṃ vūpasamanaṃ, ye ca saṅkhāresu taṇhāppahānaṃ karonti, tesu maggesu, pahīnataṇhesu ^a^V1.0172^ea^ ca phalesu saṅkhārapavatti hoti eva ^a^M1.0184^ea^, evamevidhāpi vikkhambhitavitakkavicārataṇhassa dutiyajjhānassa vitakkavicārasampayogo purimena na nivārito siyāti taṃnivāraṇatthaṃ, āvajjitukāmatādiatikkamova tesaṃ vūpasamoti dassanatthañca ^b^``avitakkaṃ avicāra''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^paṭhamampī^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ jhānampi.

[03] ``dutiyaṃ uppannantipi dutiya''nti vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. ^b^na tathā imassa vitakkavicārā^eb^ti yathā paṭhamajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇe nīvaraṇāni pahīyanti, tathā imassa dutiyajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇe vitakkavicārā na pahīyanti asaṃkiliṭṭhasabhāvattā, upacārabhāvanāya ca te pahātuṃ asamatthabhāvato. yadipi tāya tesu taṇhā pahīyati, na pana savisesaṃ. savisesañhi tattha taṇhāppahānaṃ appanāya eva hoti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``appanākkhaṇeyevā''^eb^tiādi. pahānaṅgatāpi atisayappahānavaseneva veditabbā yathā nīvaraṇānaṃ paṭhamajjhānassa. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā tivaṅgamevetaṃ jhānaṃ, tasmā. ^b^ta^eb^nti vibhaṅge vacanaṃ. rathassa paṇḍukambalaṃ viya sampasādo jhānassa parikkhāro, na jhānaṅganti āha ^b^``saparikkhāraṃ jhānaṃ dassetu''^eb^nti.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ ^b^uppilāvita^eb^nti kāmañcāyaṃ pariggahesu apariccattapemassa anādīnavadassino taṇhāsahagatāya pītiyā pavattiākāro, idha pana dutiyajjhānapīti adhippetā. tathāpi sabbaso pītiyaṃ avirattaṃ, sāpi anubandheyyāti vuttaṃ. uppilāvitaṃ viyāti vā ^b^uppilāvitaṃ^eb^. ādīnavaṃ hi tattha pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ virajjanaṃ ^b^virāgo^eb^. taṃ pana virajjanaṃ nibbindanamukhena hīḷanaṃ vā tappaṭibaddharāgappahānaṃ vāti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``vuttappakārāya pītiyā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo vā''^eb^ti āha. ^b^vuttappakārāyā^eb^ti ``yadeva tattha pītī''tiādinā vuttappakārāya. ^b^sampiṇḍanaṃ^eb^ samuccayo.
[03] ^b^maggo^eb^ti upāyo. ^b^tadadhigamāyā^eb^ti tatiyamaggādhigamāya.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ ^b^upapattito^eb^ti ^a^V1.0173^ea^ samavāhitabhāvena patirūpato. jhānupekkhāpi samavāhitameva antonītaṃ katvā pavattatīti āha ^b^``samaṃ passatī''^eb^ti. ^b^visadāyā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0185^ea^ paribyattāya saṃkilesavigamena. ^b^vipulāyā^eb^ti mahatiyā sātisayaṃ mahaggatabhāvappattiyā. ^b^thāmagatāyā^eb^ti pītivigamena thirabhāvappattāya.
[03] ^b^parisuddhapakati^eb^ khīṇāsavapakati nikkilesatā. sattesu kammassakatādassanahetuko samabhāvadassanākāro majjhattākāro ^b^brahmavihārupekkhā^eb^.

[03] ^b^sahajātadhammāna^eb^nti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. samappavattiyā bhāvanāya vīthipaṭipannāya alīnānuddhatā nirassādatāya paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu byāpārābhāvato sampayuttadhammesu majjhattākārabhūtā ^b^bojjhaṅgupekkhā^eb^.

[03] ^b^upekkhānimitta^eb^nti ettha līnuddhaccapakkhapātarahitaṃ majjhattaṃ vīriyaṃ upekkhā. tadeva taṃ ākāraṃ gahetvā pavattetabbassa tādisassa vīriyassa nimittabhāvato upekkhānimittaṃ bhāvanāya samappavattikāle upekkhīyatīti upekkhā, vīriyameva upekkhā ^b^vīriyupekkhā^eb^.

[03] ``paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilābhatthāya nīvaraṇe...pe0... nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ paṭilābhatthāya ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇa''nti (paṭi0 ma0 1.57) evamāgatā imā ^b^aṭṭha samādhivasena uppajjanti^eb^. ``sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gatiṃ nibbattiṃ upapattiṃ jātiṃ jaraṃ byādhiṃ maraṇaṃ sokaṃ paridevaṃ upāyāsaṃ. sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ...pe0... arahattamaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya uppādaṃ...pe0... upāyāsaṃ...pe0... arahattaphalasamāpattatthāya suññatāvihārasamāpattatthāya animittavihārasamāpattatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gatiṃ nibbattiṃ upapattiṃ jātiṃ jaraṃ byādhiṃ maraṇaṃ sokaṃ paridevaṃ upāyāsaṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇa''nti evamāgatā imā ^b^dasa vipassanāvasena uppajjanti^eb^. ettha ca paṭhamajjhānādīhi vikkhambhitāni nīvaraṇavitakkavicārādīni paṭisaṅkhāya sabhāvato upaparikkhitvā sanniṭṭhānavasena tiṭṭhamānā ^b^nīvaraṇādipaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanā^eb^ diṭṭhādīnavattā tesaṃ ^b^gahaṇe^eb^ uppādane ajjhupekkhantī vipassanāpaññā gahaṇe ^b^majjhattabhūtā upekkhā^eb^.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0186^ea^ ^a^V1.0174^ea^ ^b^uppāda^eb^nti purimakammapaccayā khandhānaṃ idha uppattimāha. ^b^pavatta^eb^nti tathāuppannassa pavattiṃ. ^b^nimitta^eb^nti sabbampi tebhūmakasaṅkhāragataṃ nimittabhāvena upaṭṭhānato. ^b^āyūhana^eb^nti āyatiṃ paṭisandhihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ. ^b^paṭisandhi^eb^nti āyatiṃ uppattiṃ. ^b^gati^eb^nti yāya gatiyā sā paṭisandhi hoti. ^b^nibbatti^eb^nti khandhānaṃ nibbattanaṃ. ^b^upapatti^eb^nti ``samāpannassa vā upapannassa vā''ti (paṭi0 ma0 1.72) ettha ``upapannassā''ti vuttavipākappavattiṃ. ^b^jāti^eb^nti jarādīnaṃ paccayabhūtaṃ bhavapaccayā jātiṃ. ^b^jarābyādhimaraṇā^eb^dayo pākaṭā eva. ettha ca uppādādayo pañceva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa visayavasena vuttā, sesā tesaṃ vevacanavasena. ``nibbatti, jātī''ti idañhi dvayaṃ uppādassa ceva paṭisandhiyā ca vevacanaṃ, ``gati, upapatti cā''ti idaṃ dvayaṃ pavattassa, jarādayo nimittassāti veditabbaṃ. appaṇihitavimokkhavasena magguppattihetubhūtā catasso, tathā phalasamāpattiyā catasso, suññatavihārānimittavihāravasena dveti dasa saṅkhārupekkhā.

[03] ^b^yā^eb^ti vipassanāpaññā. ^b^yadatthī^eb^ti yaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇattayaṃ upalabbhati. ^b^yaṃ bhūta^eb^nti yaṃ paccayanibbattattā bhūtaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ. ^b^taṃ pajahatī^eb^ti aniccānupassanādīhi niccasaññādayo pajahanto sammadeva diṭṭhādīnavattā tappaṭibaddhacchandarāgappahānena pajahati, yathā āyatiṃ ādānaṃ na hoti, tathā paṭipattiyā pajahati. tathābhūto ca tattha ^b^upekkhaṃ paṭilabhati. vicinane^eb^ti aniccādivasena sammasanepi.

[03] sampayuttadhammānaṃ samappavattihetutāya ^b^samavāhitabhūtā^eb^. nīvaraṇavitakkavicārādisabbapaccanīkehi vimuttattā ^b^sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhā^eb^. tesaṃ vūpasantattā ^b^paccanīkavūpasamanepi abyāpārabhūtā^eb^ abyāpārabhāvena pavattā, abyāpārataṃ vā pattā.

[03] yadi atthato ekā, kathamayaṃ bhedoti āha ^b^``tena tenā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā satipi sabhāvato abhede yehi pana paccayavisesehi svāyamimāsaṃ avatthābhedo, tesaṃ ekajjhaṃ appavattito na tāsaṃ abhedo, ekajjhaṃ vā pavatti, tasmā. tenāha ^b^``yattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ^b^ekībhāvo^eb^ti ^a^M1.0187^ea^ ekatā. satipi majjhattābhāvasāmaññe visayabhedena panassā bhedo. yamatthaṃ ^a^V1.0175^ea^ sandhāya ^b^``kiccavasena dvidhā bhinnā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, taṃ vitthārato dassento ^b^``yathā hī''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^ayaṃ vipassanupekkhā^eb^. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ ``yadatthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ, taṃ pajahati, upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī''ti (ma0 ni0 3.71; a0 ni0 7.55). tattha ^b^yadatthi yaṃ bhūta^eb^nti khandhapañcakaṃ, taṃ muñcitukamyatāñāṇena pajahati. diṭṭhasovattikattayassa sabbalakkhaṇavicinane viya diṭṭhalakkhaṇattayassa bhūtassa saṅkhāralakkhaṇavicinane upekkhaṃ paṭilabhati. saṅkhārānaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇassa sudiṭṭhattā tesaṃ vicinane majjhattabhūtāya ^b^vipassanupekkhāya siddhāya^eb^ tathā diṭṭhādīnavānaṃ tesaṃ gahaṇepi ajjhupekkhanā ^b^siddhāva hoti,^eb^ sabbaso visaṅkhāraninnattā ajjhāsayassa.

[03] ^b^anābhogarasā^eb^ti paṇītasukhepi tasmiṃ avanatipaṭipakkhakiccāti attho. ^b^abyāpārapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^ti satipi sukhapāramippattiyaṃ tasmiṃ sukhe abyāvaṭā hutvā paccupatiṭṭhati, sampayuttānaṃ vā tattha abyāpāraṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti attho. sampayuttadhammānaṃ khobhaṃ, uppilavañca āvahantehi vitakkādīhi abhibhūtattā ^b^aparibyattaṃ. tattha^eb^ tatramajjhattatāya ^b^kiccaṃ^eb^. tadabhāvato ^b^idha paribyattaṃ^eb^.
[06] niṭṭhitā ``upekkhako ca viharatī''ti etassa
[06] sabbaso atthavaṇṇanā.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ ^b^``saratīti sato''^eb^ti padassa kattusādhanatamāha. ^b^sampajānātī^eb^ti sammadeva pajānāti. saraṇaṃ cintanaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ lakkhaṇametissāti ^b^saraṇalakkhaṇā^eb^. sammussanapaṭipakkho asammussanaṃ, taṃ kiccaṃ etissāti ^b^asammussanarasā^eb^. kilesehi ārakkhā hutvā paccupatiṭṭhati, tato vā ārakkhaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti ^b^ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^. asammuyhanaṃ sammadeva pajānanaṃ, sammohapaṭipakkho vā ^b^asammoho. tīraṇaṃ^eb^ kiccassa pāragamanaṃ. ^b^pavicayo^eb^ vīmaṃsā.

[03] kāmaṃ upacārajjhānādīni upādāya paṭhamadutiyajjhānānipi sukhumāneva, imaṃ pana uparijhānaṃ upādāya ^b^``oḷārikattā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. sā ca oḷārikatā vitakkādithūlaṅgatāya veditabbā. keci ``bahucetasikatāyā''ti ca vadanti ^a^M1.0188^ea^. ^b^gati sukhā hoti^eb^ tattha jhānesūti adhippāyo. ^b^abyattaṃ tattha satisampajaññakiccaṃ^eb^ ``idaṃ nāma dukkaraṃ karīyatī''ti vattabbassa abhāvato. ^b^oḷārikaṅgappahānena sukhumattā^eb^ti ayamattho kāmaṃ dutiyajjhānepi sambhavati, tathāpi yebhuyyena ^a^V1.0176^ea^ avippayogībhāvena vattamānesu pītisukhesu pītisaṅkhātassa oḷārikaṅgassa pahānena sukhumatāya idha sātisayo satisampajaññabyāpāroti vuttaṃ ^b^``purisassā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyyā^eb^ti hānabhāgiyaṃ jhānaṃ siyā dutiyajjhānameva sampajjeyyāti attho. tenāha ^b^``pītisampayuttameva siyā''^eb^ti. ^b^``idañca atimadhuraṃ sukha''^eb^nti tatiyajjhānasukhaṃ sandhāyāha. atimadhuratā cassa pahāsodagyasabhāvāya pītiyā abhāveneva veditabbā. ^b^ida^eb^nti ``sato, sampajāno''ti padadvayaṃ.

[01] ^b^tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento^eb^ti yasmā tassa jhānasamaṅgino yaṃ nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ, taṃ so paṭisaṃvedeyya. ^b^yaṃ vā ta^eb^nti atha vā yaṃ taṃ yathāvuttaṃ ^b^nāmakāyasampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ. taṃsamuṭṭhānena^eb^ tato samuṭṭhitena ^b^atipaṇītena rūpena assa^eb^ jhānasamaṅgino ^b^rūpakāyo yasmā phuṭo. yassa^eb^ rūpakāyassa ^b^phuṭattā jhānā vuṭṭhitopi^eb^ jhānasamaṅgī kāyikaṃ ^b^sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya^eb^. tasmā ^b^etaṃ^eb^ cetasikakāyikasukhapaṭisaṃvedanasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^atthaṃ^eb^ dassento ^b^``sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti āhā''^eb^ti yojanā. ayañhettha saṅkhepattho -- nāmakāyena cetasikasukhaṃ, kāyikasukhaheturūpasamuṭṭhāpanena kāyikasukhañca jhānasamaṅgī paṭisaṃvedetīti vuccati. ^b^phuṭattā^eb^ti byāpitattāti attho. yathā hi udakena phuṭasarīrassa tādise nātipaccanīke vātādiphoṭṭhabbe phuṭe sukhaṃ uppajjati, evametehi phuṭasarīrassāti. aparo nayo -- ^b^sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetī^eb^ti ettha kathamābhogena vinā sukhapaṭisaṃvedanāti codanāyaṃ ``kiñcāpi...pe0... evaṃ santepī''ti. yasmā tassa nāmakāyena sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ, tasmā sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetīti yojanā. idāni sahāpi ābhogena sukhapaṭisaṃvedanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``yaṃ vā ta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ ^b^ya^eb^nti hetuatthe nipāto, yasmāti attho. tenāha ^b^``yaṃjhānahetū''^eb^ti. ^b^``ācikkhantī''^eb^tiādīni padāni kittanatthānīti adhippāyenāha ^b^``pasaṃsantīti adhippāyo''^eb^ti. ^b^kintī^eb^ti pasaṃsanākārapucchā. edisesu ^a^M1.0189^ea^ ṭhānesu satiggahaṇeneva sampajaññampi gahitaṃ hotīti idha pāḷiyaṃ satiyā eva gahitattā evaṃ upaṭṭhitasatitāya ^b^``satimā''^eb^ icceva vuttaṃ, ``sampajāno''ti heṭṭhā vuttattā vā.

[01] jhānakkhaṇe cetasikasukhameva labbhatīti ^b^``sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedetī''^eb^ti ca vuttaṃ. ^b^tatiyanti^eb^ ^a^V1.0177^ea^ ^b^gaṇanānupubbatā^eb^ti ito paṭṭhāya dutiyatatiyajjhānakathāhi aviseso, viseso ca vuttoti.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ idāni nibbattitavisesaṃ dassento ^b^``ayaṃ pana viseso''^eb^ti vatvā ^b^``yasmā''^eb^tiādimāha. āsevanapaccayena paccayo na hoti, aniṭṭhe ṭhāne padantarasaṅgahitassa āsevanapaccayattābhāvato. ^b^adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya uppajjitabbaṃ^eb^ sātisayaṃ sukhavirāgabhāvanābhāvato. ^b^tānī^eb^ti appanāvīthiyaṃ javanāni sandhāyāha.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ ^b^``pubbevā''^eb^ti vuttattā kadā pana tesaṃ pahānaṃ hotīti codanāyaṃ āha ^b^``catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ upacārakkhaṇe''^eb^ti. evaṃ veditabbanti sambandho. ^b^pahānakkamo^eb^ nāma pahāyakadhammānaṃ uppattipaṭipāṭi. tena pana vuccamāne ``dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ sukhaṃ somanassa''nti vattabbaṃ siyā. kasmā ito aññathā vacananti āha ^b^``indriyavibhaṅge''^eb^tiādi. atha kasmā jhānesveva nirodho vuttoti sambandho.

[03] ^b^kattha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriya^eb^nti attano paccayehi uppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ. ^b^kattha ca aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī^eb^ti nirodhaṭṭhānaṃ pucchati. tena ^b^``katthā''^eb^ti pucchāyaṃ, ^b^``etthā''^eb^ti vissajjanepi hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. jhānānubhāvanimittaṃ hi anuppajjantaṃ ^b^``dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^atisayanirodho^eb^ suṭṭhu pahānaṃ ujupaṭipakkhena vūpasamo.

[03] ^b^nānāvajjane^eb^ti yena āvajjanena appanāvīthi, tato bhinnāvajjane, anekāvajjane vā. appanāvīthiyañhi upacāro ekāvajjano, itaro anekāvajjano anekakkhattuṃ pavattanato. visamanisajjāya uppannakilamatho ^b^visamāsanupatāpo. pītipharaṇenā^eb^ti pītiyā pharaṇarasattā, pītisamuṭṭhānānaṃ vā paṇītarūpānaṃ kāyassa byāpanato vuttaṃ. tenāha ^b^``sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hotī''^eb^ti. ^b^vitakkavicārapaccayepī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo ^a^M1.0190^ea^ aṭṭhānappayutto, so ``pahīnassā''ti ettha ānetvā sambandhitabbo ``pahīnassāpi domanassindriyassā''ti. etaṃ domanassindriyaṃ uppajjatīti sambandho. ``tassa mayhaṃ aticiraṃ vitakkayato vicārayato kāyopi kilamicittampi uhaññī''ti vacanato kāyacittakhedānaṃ vitakkavicārappaccayatā veditabbā ^a^V1.0178^ea^. ``vitakkavicārabhāve uppajjati domanassindriya''nti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^tatthassa siyā uppattī^eb^ti tattha dutiyajjhānūpacāre assa domanassassa uppatti bhaveyya.

[03] ettha ca yadeke ``tatthassa siyā uppattī''ti vadantena jhānalābhīnampi domanussuppatti atthīti dassitaṃ hoti. tena ca anīvaraṇasabhāvo lobho viya dosopi atthīti dīpeti. na hi dosena vinā domanassaṃ pavattati. na cettha ^b^paṭṭhānapāḷiyā^eb^ virodho cintetabbo. yasmā tattha parihīnaṃ jhānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānaṃ domanassaṃ dassitaṃ, aparihīnajjhānamārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjamānassa domanassassa asambhavato. jhānalābhīnaṃ sabbaso domanassaṃ nuppajjatīti ca na sakkā vattuṃ, aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino api tassa uppannattā. na heva kho so pahīnajjhāno ahosīti vadanti, taṃ ayuttaṃ anīvaraṇasabhāvassa dosassa abhāvato. yadi siyā, rūpārūpāvacarasattānampi uppajjeyya, na ca uppajjati. tathā hi ``arūpe kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇa''ntiādīsu byāpādakukkuccanīvaraṇāni anuddhaṭāni. na cettha nīvaraṇattā parihāro, kāmacchandādīnampi anīvaraṇānaṃyeva nīvaraṇasadisatāya nīvaraṇapariyāyassa vuttattā. yaṃ pana vuttaṃ ``aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino api tassa uppannattā''ti, tampi akāraṇaṃ uppajjamānena ca domanassena jhānato parihāyanato. lahukena pana paccayena parihīnaṃ tādisā appakasireneva paṭipākatikaṃ karontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ``tatthassa siyā uppattī''ti idaṃ pana parikappavacanaṃ upacārakkhaṇe domanassassa appahīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``na tveva antoappanāya''nti. yadi pana tadā domanassaṃ uppajjeyya, paṭhamajjhānampissa parihīnamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. pahīnampi somanassindriyaṃ pīti viya na dūreti katvā ^a^M1.0191^ea^ ^b^``āsannattā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. nānāvajjanūpacāre pahīnampi pahānaṅgaṃ paṭipakkhena avihatattā antarantarā uppajjeyya vāti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^``appanāppattāyā''^eb^tiādimāha. tādisāya āsevanāya icchitabbattā yathā ^b^maggavīthito pubbe dve tayo javanavārā sadisānupassanāva pavattanti,^eb^ evamidhāpi appanāvārato pubbe dve tayo javanavārā upekkhāsahagatāva pavattantīti vadanti.

[03] ^b^samāhaṭā^eb^ti samānītā, saṅgahetvā vuttāti attho. sukhadukkhāni viya anoḷārikattā avibhūtatāya ^b^sukhumā^eb^. tato eva anuminitabbasabhāvattā ^b^duviññeyyā. duṭṭhassā^eb^ti duṭṭhapayogassa, duddammassāti attho. ^b^sakkā hoti esā gāhayituṃ^eb^ aññāpohananayenāti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^adukkhamasukhāya^eb^ ^a^V1.0179^ea^ ^b^cetovimuttiyā^eb^ti idameva catutthajjhānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^paccayadassanattha^eb^nti adhigamassa upāyabhūtapaccayadassanatthaṃ. tenāha ^b^``dukkhappahānādayo hi tassā paccayā''^eb^ti. ^b^dukkhappahānādayo^eb^ti ca sopacārā paṭhamajjhānādayovettha adhippetā.
[03] ^b^pahīnāti vuttā^eb^ ``pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā''ti. ^b^etā^eb^ti sukhādayo vedanā.

[03] ^b^somanassaṃ rāgassa^eb^ paccayo. vuttañhi ``sukhāya kho, āvuso visākha, vedanāya rāgānusayo anusetī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.465). ^b^domanassaṃ dosassa^eb^ paccayo. vuttampi cetaṃ ``dukkhāya kho, āvuso visākha, vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetī''ti. ^b^sukhādighātenā^eb^ti sukhādīnaṃ pahānena. ^b^assa^eb^ jhānassa.

[03] na dukkhanti ^b^adukkhaṃ,^eb^ dukkhavidhuraṃ. yasmā tattha dukkhaṃ natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``dukkhābhāvenā''^eb^ti. ^b^asukha^eb^nti etthapi eseva nayo. ^b^etenā^eb^ti dukkhasukhapaṭikkhepavacanena. ^b^``paṭipakkhabhūta''^eb^nti idaṃ idha tatiyavedanāya dukkhādīnaṃ samatikkamavasena pattabbattā vuttaṃ, na kusalākusalānaṃ viya ujuvipaccanīkatāya. iṭṭhāniṭṭhaviparītassa majjhattārammaṇassa, iṭṭhāniṭṭhaviparītaṃ vā majjhattākārena anubhavanalakkhaṇā ^b^iṭṭhāniṭṭhaviparītānubhavanalakkhaṇā^eb^. tato eva ^b^majjhattarasā. avibhūtapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^ti sukhadukkhāni viya na vibhūtākārā ^a^M1.0192^ea^, piṭṭhipāsāṇe migagatamaggo viya tehi anumātabbā avibhūtākāropaṭṭhānā. sukhanirodho nāma idha catutthajjhānūpacāro, so padaṭṭhānaṃ etissāti ^b^sukhanirodhapadaṭṭhānā^eb^.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ ^b^``upekkhāsatipārisuddhi''^eb^nti purimapade uttarapadalopenetaṃ samāsapadanti āha ^b^``upekkhāya janitasatipārisuddhi''^eb^nti. sabbapaccanīkadhammaparisuddhāya paccanīkasamanepi abyāvaṭāya pārisuddhiupekkhāya vattamānāya catutthajjhāne sati sampahaṃsanapaññā viya suparisuddhā, suvisadā ca hotīti āha ^b^``yā ca tassā satiyā pārisuddhi, sā upekkhāya katā, na aññenā''^eb^ti. yadi tatramajjhattatā idha ``upekkhā''ti adhippetā, kathaṃ satiyeva ``parisuddhā''ti vuttāti āha ^b^``na kevala''^eb^ntiādi.

[03] evampi ^a^V1.0180^ea^ kasmā ayameva sati ``upekkhāsatipārisuddhī''ti vuttāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya ^b^``tattha kiñcāpī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha heṭṭhā tīsu jhānesu vijjamānāyapi tatramajjhattatāya paccanīkābhibhavato, sahāyapaccayavekallato ca apārisuddhi, tathā taṃsampayuttānaṃ. tadabhāvato idha pārisuddhīti imamatthaṃ rūpakavasena dassetuṃ ^b^``yathā panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^sūriyappabhābhibhavā^eb^ti sūriyappabhāya abhibhuyyamānattā. atikkhatāya candalekhā viya rattipi sommasabhāvā sabhāgāya rattiyameva ca candalekhā samujjalatīti sā tassā sabhāgāti dassento ^b^``sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā''^eb^ti āha.

[03] ^b^``ekavīthiya''^eb^nti idaṃ tattha somanassassa ekaṃsena abhāvato vuttaṃ, na tato purimataresu ekaṃsena bhāvato. yathā pana vitakkādayo dutiyādijjhānakkhaṇeyeva pahīyanti, na tesaṃ ekavīthiyaṃ purimajavanesu, na evametanti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^catukkajjhāne^eb^ti catukkanayavasena nibbattitajjhānacatukke.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatthā^eb^ti paṭhamajjhāne. ^b^catukkanayassa dutiyajjhāne viyā^eb^ti catukkanayasambandhini dutiyajjhāne viya. ^b^taṃ dvidhā bhinditvā^eb^ti catukkanaye dutiyaṃ ^a^M1.0193^ea^ ``avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ, avitakkaṃ avicāra''nti ca evaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā ^b^pañcakanaye dutiyañceva tatiyañca hoti^eb^ abhidhammeti (dha0 sa0 168) adhippāyo. suttantesu pana sarūpato pañcakanayo na gahito.

[03] kasmā panettha nayadvayavibhāgo gahitoti? abhidhamme nayadvayavasena jhānānaṃ desitattā. kasmā ca tattha tathā tāni desitāni? puggalajjhāsayato, desanāvilāsato ca. sannipatitadevaparisāya kira yesaṃ yathādesite paṭhamajjhāne vitakko eva oḷārikato upaṭṭhāsi, itare santato. tesaṃ ajjhāsayavasena ca caturaṅgikaṃ avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ jhānaṃ desitaṃ. yesaṃ vicāro, yesaṃ pīti, yesaṃ sukhaṃ oḷārikato upaṭṭhāsi, itare santato. tesaṃ tesaṃ ajjhāsayavasena tatiyādīni jhānāni desitāni. ayaṃ tāva puggalajjhāsayo.

[03] yassā pana dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā bhagavā yasmā desanāvilāsappatto, tasmā ñāṇamahantatāya ^a^V1.0181^ea^ desanāya sukusalo yaṃ yaṃ aṅgaṃ labbhati, tassa tassa vasena yathāruciṃ desanaṃ niyāmento catukkanayavasena, pañcakanayavasena ca. tattha ca pañcaṅgikaṃ paṭhamaṃ, caturaṅgikaṃ dutiyaṃ, tivaṅgikaṃ tatiyaṃ, duvaṅgikaṃ catutthaṃ, duvaṅgikameva pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ desesīti ayaṃ desanāvilāso. ettha ca pañcakanaye dutiyajjhānaṃ catukkanaye dutiyajjhānapakkhikaṃ katvā vibhattaṃ ``yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī''ti (dha0 sa0 168). kasmā? ekattakāyanānattasaññīsattāvāsaphalatāya dutiyajjhānena samānaphalattā, paṭhamajjhānasamādhito jātattā ca. paṭhamajjhānameva hi ``kāmehi akusalehi ca vivitta''nti tadabhāvā na idha ``vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehī''ti sakkā vattuṃ, nāpi ``vivekaja''nti. suttantadesanāsu ca pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyajjhānāni dutiyajjhānameva bhajanti vitakkavūpasamā vicāravūpasamā avitakkattā, avicārattā ca. evañca katvā suttantadesanāyapi pañcakanayo labbhatevāti siddhaṃ hoti. nanu suttante cattāriyeva jhānāni vibhattānīti pañcakanayo na labbhatīti? na, ``savitakkasavicāro samādhī''tiādinā (dī0 ni0 3.305) samādhittayāpadesena pañcakanayassa ^a^M1.0194^ea^ labbhamānattā. catukkanayanissito pana katvā pañcakanayo vibhattoti suttantadesanāyapi pañcakanayo niddhāretabbo. ``vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā''ti hi vitakkassa, vicārassa, vitakkavicārānañca ``vitakkavicārāna''nti sakkā vattuṃ. tathā ``avitakkaṃ, avicāra''nti ca vinā, saha ca vicārena vitakkappahānena avitakkaṃ, saha, vinā ca vitakkena vicārappahānena avicāranti avitakkaṃ, avicāraṃ, avitakkañca avicārañcāti vā tividhampi sakkā saṅgahetuṃ.

[03] ^b^dutiya^eb^nti ca vitakkarahite, vitakkavicāradvayarahite ca ñāyāgatā desanā dutiyaṃ adhigantabbattā, vicāramattarahitepi dvayappahānādhigatasamānadhammattā. evañca katvā pañcakanayaniddese dutiye vūpasantopi vitakko sahāyabhūtavicārāvūpasamena na sammā vūpasantoti vitakkavicāradvayarahite viya vicāravūpasameneva tadupasamaṃ, sesadhammānaṃ samānatañca dassentena ``vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī''ti tatiyaṃ catukkanaye dutiyena nibbisesaṃ vibhattaṃ. duvidhassāpi sahāyavirahena, aññathā ca vitakkappahānena avitakkattaṃ, samādhijaṃ pītisukhattañca samānanti samānadhammattāpi ^b^dutiya^eb^nti niddeso ^a^V1.0182^ea^. vicāramattampi hi vitakkavicāradvayarahitaṃ viya ``yasmiṃ samaye rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti avitakkaṃ vicāramattaṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharatī''ti (dha0 sa0 168) avitakkaṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhanti vibhattaṃ. paṭhamajjhāne vā sahacārīsu vitakkavicāresu ekaṃ atikkamitvā dutiyampi tatraṭṭhameva dosato disvā ubhayampi sahātikkamantassa pañcakanaye ^b^tatiyaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ, tatiyaṃ adhigantabbattā. paṭhamato anantarabhāvena panassa dutiyabhāvo ca uppajjatīti. kasmā panevaṃ sarūpato pañcakanayo na vibhattoti? vineyyajjhāsayato. yathānulomadesanā hi suttantadesanāti.
[06] pathavīkasiṇaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti catutthaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ yathāvitthāritassa ^a^M1.0195^ea^ ^a^V1.0183^ea^ atthassa atidesopi vitthāraṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatīti āha ^b^``vitthārakathā hotī''^eb^ti. ^b^āpokasiṇa^eb^nti āpokasiṇajjhānaṃ, āpokasiṇakammaṭṭhānaṃ vā. ^b^sabbaṃ vitthāretabba^eb^nti pathavīkasiṇakammaṭṭhāne vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṃ. ^b^ettakampī^eb^ti ``kate vā akate vāti sabbaṃ vitthāretabba''nti ettakampi avatvā. sāmuddikena loṇudakena bharito jalāsayo ^b^loṇī^eb^. nīlādivaṇṇasaṅkarapariharaṇatthaṃ ^b^``suddhavatthena gahita''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^añña^eb^nti bhūmiṃ sampattaṃ. ^b^tathārūpa^eb^nti yādisaṃ ākāsajaṃ udakaṃ, tādisaṃ. tenāha ^b^``vippasannaṃ anāvila''^eb^nti, yaṃ pana udakanti sambandho. ^b^``na vaṇṇo paccavekkhitabbo''^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ pathavīkasiṇakathāyaṃ vuttameva. ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ pana idha paggharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^vuttanayenevā^eb^ti pathavīkasiṇabhāvanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva. taraṅguṭṭhānādi, pheṇamissatādi ca idha ^b^kasiṇadoso. so^eb^ti yogāvacaro. ^b^tassā^eb^ti paṭibhāganimittassa.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ ^b^siniddhāni^eb^ sinehavantāni. ^b^sāradārūni^eb^ na pheggudārūni. jālāya ciraṭṭhitatthaṃ siniddhasāradāruggahaṇaṃ. ^b^ghaṭikaṃ ghaṭikaṃ katvā^eb^ti khandhaso karitvā. ^b^ālimpetvā^eb^ti jāletvā. ^b^ghanajālāyā^eb^ti aviraḷavasena pavattāggijālāyaṃ.
[03] ^b^patanasadisa^eb^nti patamānasadisaṃ. ^b^akate gaṇhantassā^eb^ti vuttanayena yathā kasiṇamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyati, evaṃ anabhisaṅkhate kevale tejasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhantassa.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ ^b^vuttañheta^eb^nti ^a^V1.0184^ea^ ettha ^b^hi^eb^-saddo hetuattho, yasmāti attho. tassa ``tasmā''ti iminā sambandho. ^b^ucchagga^eb^nti ucchukhette yathāṭhitānaṃ aggaṃ. ^b^erita^eb^nti ^a^M1.0196^ea^ vātena calitaṃ. ^b^samerita^eb^nti sabbaso calitaṃ. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ``vāyokasiṇaṃ...pe0... upalakkhetī''ti evaṃ vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ, tasmā. ^b^samasīsaṭṭhita^eb^nti upari pattānaṃ vasena samasīsaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ. ^b^veḷuṃ vā rukkhaṃ vā^eb^ti etthāpi ``samasīsaṃ ṭhitaṃ ghanapattaveḷuṃ vā ghanapattarukkhaṃ vā''ti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ. ekaṅgulādippamāṇesu kesesu rassabhāvato, dīghataresu olambanato, viraḷesu anuppavesato vātappahāro na paññāyatīti ^b^caturaṅgulappamāṇa^eb^ggahaṇaṃ, ^b^ghana^eb^ggahaṇañca kataṃ. ^b^etasmiṃ ṭhāne paharatīti satiṃ ṭhapetvā^eb^ti ucchaggādīnaṃ pacalanākāraggahaṇamukhena tesaṃ pahārake vātasaṅghāte satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā. ^b^tattha satiṃ ṭhapetvā^eb^ti tasmiṃ kāyapadesassa saṅghaṭṭanavasena pavatte vāyupiṇḍe saṅghaṭṭanākāraggahaṇamukhena satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā. ``usumavaṭṭisadisa''nti etena purimakasiṇassa viya imassāpi nimittassa saṃviggahataṃ dasseti. ``niccala''nti iminā niccalabhāvoyeva uggahanimittato imassa visesoti paṭibhāganimittassāpi usumavaṭṭisadisatāva vibhāvitā hoti.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ añjanarājivaṭṭādi ^b^vaṇṇadhātuyā vā. tathārūpaṃ mālāgaccha^eb^nti aviraḷavikasitanīlavaṇṇapupphasañchannaṃ pupphagacchaṃ. ^b^itarenā^eb^ti akatādhikārena. ^b^girikaṇṇika^eb^ggahanena nīlaṃ girikaṇṇikamāha. ^b^karaṇḍapaṭalaṃ^eb^ samuggapidhānaṃ. ^b^pattehiyevā^eb^ti nīluppalādīnaṃ kesaravaṇṭāni apanetvā kevalehi pattehiyeva. ^b^pūretabba^eb^nti nīlavaṇṇaṃ vatthaṃ gahetvā bhaṇḍikaṃ viya bandhitvā yathā nīlamaṇḍalaṃ hutvā paññāyati, tathā ^b^caṅkoṭakaṃ vā karaṇḍapaṭalaṃ vā pūretabbaṃ. mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ vā assā^eb^ti assa caṅkoṭakassa, karaṇḍapaṭalassa vā mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ^b^bandhitabbaṃ. maṇitālavaṇṭaṃ^eb^ indanīlamaṇimayaṃ tālavaṇṭaṃ.

[03] 95^b^.^eb^ pītakasiṇe ^b^mālāgaccha^eb^nti ikkaṭādimālāgacchaṃ. haritālaṃ, manosilā vā ^b^dhātu. pattaṅgapupphehī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0185^ea^ pattaṅganāmikā pītavaṇṇapupphā ekā gacchajāti, tassa pupphehi. ^b^āsanapūja^eb^nti cetiyaṅgaṇe kataṃ āsanapūjaṃ ^a^M1.0197^ea^. ^b^kaṇikārapupphādinā^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ākulikiṅkirātapupphādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
[03] 96^b^.^eb^ ^b^lohitamaṇi^eb^ lohitaṅgamaṇiādi. ^b^lohitadhātu^eb^ gerukajātihiṅgulikādi.
[03] 97^b^.^eb^ odātakasiṇe ^b^mālāgaccha^eb^nti nandiyāvattādimālāgacchaṃ. ^b^dhātu^eb^ kakkaṭimuttasetikādi.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ ^b^tathā asakkontenā^eb^ti yathā sūriyālokādivasena obhāsanimittuppādanaṃ vuttaṃ, tassa obhāsamaṇḍalassa na ciraṭṭhititāya tathā nimittuppādanaṃ kātuṃ asakkontena. ghaṭamukhena niggacchanakaobhāsassa mahantabhāvato ^b^``ghaṭamukhaṃ pidahitvā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^bhittimukha^eb^nti bhittiabhimukhaṃ. ^b^uṭṭhitamaṇḍalasadisa^eb^nti bhittiādīsu uṭṭhitapākatikāalokamaṇḍalasadisaṃ. ^b^ghanavippasannaṃ ālokapuñjasadisa^eb^nti bhagavato byāmappabhā viya bahalo, vippasanno ca hutvā puñjabhūto āloko atthi ce, taṃsadisoti attho.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ ^b^chiddasadisameva hotī^eb^ti yehi bhittipariyantādīhi paricchinnaṃ, taṃ chiddaṃ, taṃsadisaṃ, tenavākārena uggahanimittaṃ upaṭṭhātīti attho. ^b^``vaḍḍhiyamānampi na vaḍḍhatī''^eb^ti uggahanimittassa avaḍḍhanīyataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. sabbampi hi uggahanimittaṃ vaḍḍhiyamānaṃ na vaḍḍhatiyeva. satipi ca vaḍḍhetukāmatāyaṃ vaḍḍhanā na sambhavati bhāvanāya paridubbalattā. bhāvanāvasena hi nimittavaḍḍhanā ^a^V1.0186^ea^. paṭibhāganimittaṃ pana tasmiṃ uppanne bhāvanā thirāti katvā ^b^``vaḍḍhiyamānaṃ vaḍḍhatī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] kiñcāpi ^a^M1.0198^ea^ ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ ``pathavīkasiṇādīni rūpajhānārammaṇāni aṭṭheva kasiṇāni sarūpato āgatāni, odātakasiṇe pana ālokakasiṇaṃ, ākāsakasiṇe ca paricchinnākāsakasiṇaṃ antogadhaṃ katvā desanā katā''ti adhippāyenāha ^b^``iti kasiṇāni dasabalo, dasa yāni avocā''^eb^ti. ^b^pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyā^eb^ti pubbe viya asādhāraṇaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kasiṇe paṭiniyatameva atthaṃ aggahetvā asādhāraṇato, sādhāraṇato ca tattha tattha pakiṇṇakaṃ visaṭaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā pavattā pakiṇṇakakathāpi vijānitabbā.

[03] 100^b^.^eb^ ^b^ādibhāvo^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena yassa kassaci pathavīpakkhiyassa vatthuno nimmānādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^ṭhānanisajjādikappanaṃ vā^eb^ti etthāpi ``ākāse vā udake vā''ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^parittāppamāṇanayenā^eb^ti nīlādivaṇṇaṃ anāmasitvā parittāppamāṇanayeneva. ^b^evamādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena sarīrato udakadhārānimmānādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03] ^b^yadeva so icchati tassa ḍahanasamatthatā^eb^ti bahūsu kappāsapicusāradāruādīsu ekajjhaṃ rāsibhūtesu ṭhitesu yaṃ yadeva icchati, tassa tasseva ḍahanasamatthatā. idha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena andhakāravidhamanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
[03] vāyugatiyā gamanaṃ ^b^vāyugatigamanaṃ,^eb^ atisīghagamanaṃ. idha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena yadicchitadesantaraṃ pāpuṇanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
[03] ^b^suvaṇṇanti adhimuccanā^eb^ suvaṇṇabhāvādhiṭṭhānaṃ seyyathāpi āyasmā pilindavaccho (pārā0 619-620) tiṇaṇḍupagapāsādādīnaṃ. ^b^vuttanayenā^eb^ti suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇanayena.
[03] vaṇṇakasiṇesu ^a^V1.0187^ea^ tattha tattha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena nīlobhāsanimmānādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^pathavīpabbatādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena samuddādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
