[03] tattha sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ sassatucchedadiṭṭhīhi saṅgahitattā sabbepi diṭṭhigatikā sattā imā eva dve diṭṭhiyo sannissitā. yathāha ``dvayanissito khvāyaṃ, kaccāna, loko yebhuyyena atthitañca natthitañcā''ti ^a^V1.0226^ea^ (saṃ0 ni0 2.15). ^b^atthitā^eb^ti hi sassataggāho adhippeto, ^b^natthitā^eb^ti ucchedaggāho. ayaṃ tāva vaṭṭanissitānaṃ puthujjanānaṃ āsayo. vivaṭṭanissitānaṃ pana suddhasattānaṃ anulomikā khanti, yathābhūtañāṇanti duvidho āsayo.
[03] ^b^āsayaṃ jānātī^eb^ti catubbidhampi sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānāti. jānanto ca tesaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ, tesañca ñāṇānaṃ appavattikkhaṇepi jānāti. vuttañhetaṃ --

[02] ``kāmaṃ ^a^M1.0240^ea^ sevantaññeva jānāti `ayaṃ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto'ti, kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti `ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto'ti''ādi (paṭi0 ma0 1.113).

[01] appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayantīti ^b^anusayā,^eb^ anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantīti attho. etena nesaṃ kāraṇalābhe uppajjanārahataṃ dasseti. appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanti. ke pana te? rāgādayo satta anāgatā kilesā, atītā, paccuppannā ca taṃsabhāvattā tathā vuccanti. na hi dhammānaṃ kālabhedena sabhāvabhedo atthi. taṃ sattavidhaṃ anusayaṃ tassa tassa sattassa santāne paroparabhāvena pavattamānaṃ jānāti.

[03] ^b^carita^eb^nti sucaritaduccaritaṃ. taṃ hi ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ (vibha0 814, 817) caritaniddese niddiṭṭhaṃ. atha vā ^b^carita^eb^nti cariyā veditabbā. tā pana rāgadosamohasaddhābuddhivitakkavasena cha mūlacariyā, tāsaṃ apariyanto antarabhedo, saṃsaggabhedo pana tesaṭṭhividho. taṃ caritaṃ sabhāvato saṃkilesavodānato samuṭṭhānato phalato nissandatoti evamādinā pakārena ^b^jānāti^eb^.

[03] ^b^adhimutti^eb^ ajjhāsayadhātu. sā duvidhā hīnādhimutti paṇītādhimuttīti. yāya hīnādhimuttikā sattā hīnādhimuttikeyeva sevanti, paṇītādhimuttikā ca paṇītādhimuttikeyeva. sā ajjhāsayadhātu ajjhāsayasabhāvo adhimutti. taṃ ^b^adhimuttiṃ jānāti^eb^ ``imassa adhimutti hīnā, imassa paṇītā''ti, tatthāpi ``imassa mudu, imassa mudutarā, imassa mudutamā''tiādinā. indriyānaṃ hi tikkhamudubhāvādinā yathārahaṃ adhimuttiyā tikkhamudubhāvādiko veditabbo. tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^sammohavinodanīyaṃ^eb^ (vibha0 aṭṭha0 818, 820) ``heṭṭhā ^a^V1.0227^ea^ gahitāpi adhimutti idha sattānaṃ tikkhindriyamudindriyabhāvadassanatthaṃ puna gahitā''ti.

[03] apparajaṃ akkhaṃ etesanti apparajakkhā, appaṃ vā rajaṃ paññāmaye akkhimhi etesanti apparajakkhā, anussadarāgādirajā sattā, te ^b^apparajakkhe. mahārajakkhe^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ussadarāgādirajā mahārajakkhā.

[03] ^b^tikkhindriye^eb^ti ^a^M1.0241^ea^ tikhiṇehi saddhādīhi indriyehi samannāgate. ^b^mudindriye^eb^ti mudukehi saddhādīhi indriyehi samannāgate. upanissayaindriyāni nāma idhādhippetāni. ^b^svākāre^eb^ti sundarākāre kalyāṇapakatike, vivaṭṭajjhāsayeti attho. ^b^suviññāpaye^eb^ti sammattaniyāmaṃ viññāpetuṃ sukare saddhe, paññavante ca. ^b^bhabbe abhabbe^eb^ti ettha ^b^bhabbe^eb^ti kammāvaraṇakilesāvaraṇavipākāvaraṇarahite. vuttavipariyāyena ^b^dvākāraduviññāpayābhabbā^eb^ veditabbā. ettha ca ``imassa rāgarajo appo, imassa dosarajo appo''tiādinā apparajakkhesu jānanaṃ veditabbaṃ. sesesupi eseva nayo. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā bhagavā aparimāṇe satte āsayādito anavasesetvā jānāti, tasmā assa bhagavato sattalokopi sabbathā vidito.

[03] nanu ca sattesu pamāṇādipi jānitabbo atthīti? atthi. tassa pana jānanaṃ na nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāyāti idha na gahitaṃ, bhagavato pana tampi suviditaṃ suvavatthāpitameva, payojanābhāvā desanaṃ nāruḷhaṃ. tena vuttaṃ --

[02] ``atha kho bhagavā parittaṃ nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsuṃ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi `taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ -- yo vāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito, ayaṃ vā mahāpathavī'''tiādi (saṃ0 ni0 5.1121).

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ okāsalokopi sabbathā viditoti sambandho. ^b^cakkavāḷa^eb^nti lokadhātu. sā hi nemimaṇḍalasadisena cakkavāḷapabbatena samantato parikkhittattā ``cakkavāḷa''nti vuccati. ^b^catutiṃsasatāni cā^eb^ti catuadhikāni tiṃsasatāni, tīṇisahassāni, cattārisatāni cāti attho ^a^V1.0228^ea^. ^b^aḍḍhuḍḍhānī^eb^ti upaḍḍhacatutthāni, tīṇisatāni, paññāsañcāti attho. ^b^nahutānī^eb^ti dasasahassāni. ^b^saṅkhātā^eb^ti kathitā. ^b^saṇṭhitī^eb^ti heṭṭhā, uparito cāti sabbaso ṭhiti.

[03] ^b^evaṃ saṇṭhite^eb^ti evamavaṭṭhite. ^b^etthā^eb^ti cakkavāḷe. ^b^accuggato tāvadevā^eb^ti tattakameva caturāsīti yojanasahassāniyeva ubbedho ^a^M1.0242^ea^. na kevalaṃ cettha ubbedhova, atha kho āyāmavitthārāpissa tattakāyeva. vuttañhetaṃ --
[02] ``sineru, bhikkhave, pabbatarājā caturāsīti yojanasahassāni āyāmena, caturāsīti yojanasahassāni vitthārenā''ti (a0 ni0 7.66).

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ti sinerussa heṭṭhā, upari ca vuttappamāṇato. ^b^upaḍḍhupaḍḍhenā^eb^ti upaḍḍhena upaḍḍhena. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- dvācattālīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca upari uggato ^b^yugandharapabbato,^eb^ ekavīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca upari uggato ^b^īsadharo^eb^ pabbatoti iminā nayena sesesupi upaḍḍhupaḍḍhapamāṇatā veditabbā. yathā mahāsamuddo yāva cakkavāḷapādamūlā anupubbaninno, evaṃ yāva sinerupādamūlāti heṭṭhā sinerupamāṇato upaḍḍhapamāṇopi yugandharapabbato pathaviyaṃ suppatiṭṭhito, evaṃ īsadharādayopīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. vuttaṃ hetaṃ ``mahāsamuddo, bhikkhave, anupubbaninno anupubbapoṇo anupubbapabbhāro''ti (udā0 45; cūḷava0 384; a0 ni0 8.19). sineruyugandharādīnaṃ antare ^b^sīdantarasamuddā^eb^ nāma. te vitthārato yathākkamaṃ sineruādīnaṃ accuggatasamānaparimāṇāti vadanti. ^b^brahā^eb^ti mahanto.

[03] ^b^sinerussa samantato^eb^ti parikkhipanavasena sinerussa samantato ṭhitā. sineruṃ tāva parikkhipitvā ṭhito yugandharo, taṃ parikkhipitvā īsadharo. evaṃ taṃ taṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitā ``sinerussa samantato''ti vuttā.

[03] ^b^yojanānaṃ satānucco, himavā pañca pabbato^eb^ti himavā pabbato pañca yojanānaṃ satāni ucco ubbedho. ^b^nagavhayā^eb^ti ^b^naga^eb^-saddena avhātabbā rukkhābhidhānā. ^b^paññāsayojanakkhandhasākhāyāmā^eb^ti' ubbedhato paññāsayojanakkhandhāyāmā, ubbedhato, ^b^samantato^eb^ ca paññāsayojanasākhāyāmā ^a^V1.0229^ea^ ca. tato eva ^b^satayojanavitthiṇṇā, tāvadeva ca uggatā. yassānubhāvenā^eb^ti yassā mahantatā kappaṭṭhāyitādippakārena pabhāvena.
[03] ^b^garuḷānaṃ simbalirukkho^eb^ sinerussa dutiyaparibhaṇḍe patiṭṭhito.
[03] ^b^sirīsenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0243^ea^ paccatte karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^sattama^eb^nti liṅgavipallāsena vuttaṃ, sirīso bhavati sattamoti attho.

[03] tattha ^b^caṇḍamaṇḍalaṃ^eb^ heṭṭhā, ^b^sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ^eb^ upari. tassa āsannabhāvena candamaṇḍalaṃ attano chāyāya vikalabhāvena upaṭṭhāti. tāni yojanantarikāni yugandharaggapamāṇe ākāse vicaranti. ^b^asurabhavanaṃ^eb^ sinerussa heṭṭhā. ^b^avīci^eb^ jambudīpassa. ^b^jambudīpo^eb^ sakaṭasaṇṭhāno. ^b^aparagoyānaṃ^eb^ ādāsasaṇṭhāno. ^b^pubbavideho^eb^ addhacandasaṇṭhāno. ^b^uttarakuru^eb^ pīṭhasaṇṭhāno. taṃtaṃnivāsīnaṃ, taṃtaṃparivāradīpavāsīnañca manussānaṃ mukhampi taṃtaṃsaṇṭhānanti vadanti. ^b^tadantaresū^eb^ti tesaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antaresu. tiṇṇaṃ hi pattānaṃ aññamaññāasannabhāvena ṭhapitānaṃ antarasadise tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antare ekeko ^b^lokantaranirayo^eb^.

[03] ^b^anantānī^eb^ti aparimāṇāni, ``ettakānī''ti aññehi minituṃ asakkuṇeyyāni. ^b^bhagavā anantena buddhañāṇena avedi^eb^ ``ananto ākāso, ananto sattanikāyo, anantāni cakkavāḷānī''ti tividhampi anantaṃ buddhañāṇaṃ paricchindati sayampi anantattā. yāvatakaṃ hi ñeyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ. yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ. ñeyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ ñeyyanti. tena vuttaṃ ``anantena buddhañāṇena avedī''ti. anantatā cassa anantañeyyapaṭivijjhaneneva veditabbā tattha appaṭihatacārattā. nanu cettha vivaṭṭādīnampi viditatā vattabbāti? saccaṃ vattabbaṃ, sā pana parato abhiññākathāyaṃ āgamissatīti idha na gahitā.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ ^b^attanā^eb^ti nissakkavacanametaṃ. guṇehi attanā visiṭṭhatarassāti sambandho. ^b^tara^eb^-ggahaṇaṃ cettha ^b^``anuttaro''^eb^ti padassa atthaniddesatāya kataṃ, na visiṭṭhassa kassaci atthitāya. sadevake hi loke sadisakappopi nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi, kuto sadiso. visiṭṭhe pana kā ^a^V1.0230^ea^ kathā. ^b^kassacī^eb^ti kassacipi. ^b^abhibhavatī^eb^ti sīlasampadāya upanissayabhūtānaṃ hirottappamettākaruṇānaṃ, visesapaccayānaṃ saddhāsativīriyapaññānañca ukkaṃsappattiyā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya anaññasādhāraṇo savāsanapaṭipakkhassa pahīnattā ukkaṃsapāramippatto satthu sīlaguṇo. tena bhagavā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ aññadatthu abhibhuyya ^a^M1.0244^ea^ pavattati, na sayaṃ kenaci abhibhuyyatīti adhippāyo. evaṃ samādhiguṇādīsupi yathārahaṃ vattabbaṃ. sīlādayo cete lokiyalokuttaramissakā veditabbā. ^b^vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ^eb^ pana lokiyaṃ kāmāvacarameva.

[01] yadi evaṃ, kathaṃ tena sadevakaṃ lokaṃ abhibhavatīti? tassāpi ānubhāvato asadisattā. tampi hi visayato, pavattito, pavatti ākārato ca uttaritarameva. taṃ hi anaññasādhāraṇaṃ satthu vimuttiguṇaṃ ārabbha pavattati, pavattamānañca atakkāvacaraṃ paramagambhīraṃ saṇhasukhumaṃ savisayaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ suppahīnattā suṭṭhu pākaṭaṃ vibhūtataraṃ katvā pavattati, sammadeva ca vasībhāvassa pāpitattā, bhavaṅgaparivāsassa ca atiparittakattā lahuṃ lahuṃ pavattatīti.

[03] evaṃ sīlādiguṇehi bhagavato uttaritarassa abhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni sadisassāpi abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``asamo''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^asamo^eb^ti ekasmiṃ kāle natthi etassa sīlādiguṇena samā sadisāti asamo. tathā asamehi atītānāgatabuddhehi samo, asamā vā samā etassāti ^b^asamasamo^eb^. sīlādiguṇena natthi etassa paṭimāti ^b^appaṭimo^eb^. sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. tattha upamāmattaṃ paṭimā, sadisūpamā paṭibhāgo, yugaggāhavasena ṭhito paṭipuggalo veditabbo.

[03] ^b^na kho panāhaṃ samanupassāmī^eb^ti mama samantacakkhunā hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sabbalokaṃ passantopi tattha sadevake...pe0... pajāya attanā attato sīlasampannataraṃ sampannatarasīlaṃ kañci puggalaṃ na kho pana passāmi, tādisassa abhāvatoti adhippāyo. ^b^aggappasādasuttādīnī^eb^ti ettha --

[02] ``yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā arūpino vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññināsaññino vā, tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho. ye, bhikkhave, buddhe pasannā, agge ^a^V1.0231^ea^ te pasannā. agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hotī''ti (a0 ni0 4.34; 5.32; 10.15; itivu90) --
[03] idaṃ ^a^M1.0245^ea^ aggappasādasuttaṃ. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena --
[02] ``sadevake...pe0... sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī, tasmā `tathāgato'ti vuccatī''ti (a0 ni0 4.24; dī0 ni0 3.188) --
[25] evamādīni suttapadāni veditabbāni. ^b^ādikā gāthāyo^eb^ti ettha --
[21] ``ahaṃ hi arahā loke, ahaṃ satthā anuttaro.
[22] ekomhi sammāsambuddho, sītibhūtosmi nibbuto.. (mahāva0 11; ma0 ni0 1.285; 2.341).
[21] ``danto damayataṃ seṭṭho, santo samayataṃ isi.
[22] mutto mocayataṃ aggo, tiṇṇo tārayataṃ varo.. (itivu0 112).
[21] ``nayimasmiṃ loke parasmiṃ vā pana,
[27] buddhena seṭṭho sadiso ca vijjati.
[26] yamāhu dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ aggataṃ gato,
[22] puññatthikānaṃ vipulaphalesina''nti.. (vi0 va0 1047; kathā0 799) --
[25] evamādikā gāthā ^b^vitthāretabbā^eb^.

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ ^b^dametī^eb^ti sameti, kāyasamādīhi yojetīti attho. taṃ pana kāyasamādīhi yojanaṃ yathārahaṃ tadaṅgavinayādīsu patiṭṭhāpanaṃ hotīti āha ^b^``vinetīti vuttaṃ hotī''^eb^ti. ^b^dametuṃ yuttā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0232^ea^ damanārahā. ^b^amanussapurisā^eb^ti ettha na manussāti amanussā. taṃsadisatā ettha jotīyati, tena manussattamattaṃ natthi, aññaṃ samānanti yakkhādayo ``amanussā''ti adhippetā, na ye keci manussehi aññe. tathā hi tiracchānapurisānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kataṃ, yakkhādayo eva ca niddiṭṭhā. ^b^apalālo^eb^ himavantavāsī. ^b^cūḷodaramahodarā^eb^ nāgadīpavāsino. ^b^aggisikhadhūmasikhā^eb^ sīhaḷadīpavāsino. ^b^nibbisā katā^eb^ dosavisassa vinodanena. tenāha ^b^``saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpitā''^eb^ti. ^b^kūṭadantādayo^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ghoṭamukhaupāligahapatiādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^sakkadevarājādayo^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ajakalāpayakkhabakabrahmādīnaṃ ^a^M1.0246^ea^ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^idaṃ cettha sutta^eb^nti idaṃ kesisuttaṃ. ^b^vinītā vicitrehi vinayanūpāyehī^eb^ti etasmiṃ atthe vitthāretabbaṃ yathārahaṃ saṇhādīhi upāyehi vinayassa dīpanato.

[03] ^b^visuddhasīlādīnaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīnī^eb^ti ``visuddhasīlassa paṭhamajjhānaṃ, paṭhamajjhānalābhino dutiyajjhāna''ntiādinā tassa tassa uparūpari visesaṃ ācikkhantoti sambandho. ^b^sotāpannādīna^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^``dantepi dametiyevā''^eb^ti idaṃ pubbe ``sabbena sabbaṃ damathaṃ anupagatā purisadammā''ti vuttāti katvā vuttaṃ. ye pana vippakatadammabhāvā sabbathā dametabbataṃ nātivattā, te satte sandhāya ``dantepi dametiyevā''ti vuttaṃ. tepi hi purisadammā evāti, yato ne satthā dameti.

[03] ^b^atthapada^eb^nti atthābhibyañjakapadaṃ, vākyanti attho. vākyena hi atthābhibyatti, na nāmādipadamattena. ekapadabhāvena ca anaññasādhāraṇo satthu purisadammasārathibhāvo dassito hoti. tenāha ^b^``bhagavā hī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^aṭṭha disā^eb^ti aṭṭha samāpattiyo. tā hi aññamaññasambandhāpi asaṃkiṇṇabhāvena dissanti apadissantīti ^b^disā,^eb^ disā viyāti vā ^b^disā. asajjamānā^eb^ti na sajjamānā vasībhāvappattiyā nissaṅgacārā. ^b^dhāvanti^eb^ javanavuttiyogato. ^b^ekaṃyeva disaṃ dhāvati,^eb^ attano kāyaṃ aparivattentoti adhippāyo. satthārā pana damitā purisadammā ekiriyāpatheneva aṭṭha disā dhāvanti. tenāha ^b^``ekapallaṅkeneva nisinnā''^eb^ti. ^b^aṭṭha disā^eb^ti ca nidassanamattametaṃ, lokiyehi agatapubbaṃ nirodhasamāpattidisaṃ, amatadisañca pakkhandanato.

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvo, tattha niyuttoti diṭṭhadhammiko, idhalokattho ^a^V1.0233^ea^. kammakilesavasena samparetabbato sammā gantabbato samparāyo, paraloko, tattha niyuttoti samparāyiko, paralokattho. paramo uttamo attho paramattho, nibbānaṃ. tehi ^b^diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi. yathāraha^eb^nti yathānurūpaṃ. tesu atthesu yo yo puggalo yaṃ yaṃ arahati, tadanurūpaṃ. ^b^anusāsatī^eb^ti vineti tasmiṃ atthe patiṭṭhapeti, saha atthena vattatīti ^b^sattho,^eb^ bhaṇḍamūlena vāṇijjāya desantaraṃ gacchanto janasamūho. hitupadesādivasena paripāletabbo sāsitabbo so etassa ^a^M1.0247^ea^ atthīti ^b^satthā,^eb^ satthavāho. so viya bhagavāti āha ^b^``satthā viyāti satthā, bhagavā satthavāho''^eb^ti.

[01] idāni tamatthaṃ niddesapāḷinayena dassetuṃ ^b^``yathā satthavāho''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^satthe^eb^ti satthike jane. kaṃ tārenti etthāti ^b^kantāro,^eb^ nirudako araññappadeso. ruḷhīvasena pana itaropi araññappadeso tathā vuccati. ^b^corakantāra^eb^nti corehi adhiṭṭhitakantāraṃ. tathā ^b^vāḷakantāraṃ. dubbhikkhakantāra^eb^nti dullabhabhikkhaṃ kantāraṃ. ^b^tāretī^eb^ti akhemantaṭṭhānaṃ atikkāmeti. ^b^uttāretī^eb^tiādi upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vuttaṃ. atha vā ^b^uttāretī^eb^ti khemantabhūmiṃ upanento tāreti. ^b^nittāretī^eb^ti akhemantaṭṭhānato nikkhāmento tāreti. ^b^patāretī^eb^ti pariggahetvā tāreti, hatthena pariggahetvā viya tāretīti attho. sabbampetaṃ tāraṇuttāraṇādikhemaṭṭhāne ṭhapanamevāti āha ^b^``khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpetī''^eb^ti. ^b^satte^eb^ti veneyyasatte. mahāgahanatāya, mahānatthatāya, dunnittharaṇatāya ca jātiyeva kantāro jātikantāro, taṃ ^b^jātikantāraṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasenā^eb^ti ukkaṭṭhasattaparicchedavasena. devamanussā eva hi ukkaṭṭhasattā, na tiracchānādayo. ^b^bhabbapuggalaparicchedavasenā^eb^ti sammattaniyāmokkamanassa yogyapuggalassa paricchindanavasena. ^b^eta^eb^nti ``devamanussāna''nti etaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^bhagavato^eb^ti nissakkavacanaṃ yathā ``upajjhāyato ajjhetī''ti, bhagavato santiketi vā attho. ^b^upanissayasampatti^eb^nti tihetukapaṭisandhiādikaṃ maggaphalādhigamassa balavakāraṇaṃ.

[03] ^b^gaggarāyā^eb^ti gaggarāya nāma rañño deviyā, tāya vā kāritattā ``gaggarā''ti laddhanāmāya. ^b^sare nimittaṃ aggahesī^eb^ti ``dhammo eso vuccatī''ti dhammasaññāya sare nimittaṃ gaṇhi, gaṇhanto ca pasannacitto parisapariyante nipajji. ^b^sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsī^eb^ti tassa sīse daṇḍassa ṭhapitabhāvaṃ apassanto tattha daṇḍaṃ uppīḷetvā aṭṭhāsi. maṇḍūkopi daṇḍe ṭhapitepi ^a^V1.0234^ea^ uppīḷitepi dhammagatena pasādena vissaramakarontova kālamakāsi. devaloke nibbattasattānaṃ ayaṃ dhammatā, yā ``kutohaṃ idha nibbatto, tattha kiṃ nu kho kammamakāsi''nti āvajjanā. tasmā attano purimabhavassa diṭṭhattā āha ^b^``are ahampi nāma idha^eb^ ^b^nibbatto''^eb^ti ^a^M1.0248^ea^. ^b^bhagavato pāde vandi^eb^ kataññutāsaṃvaḍḍhitena pemagāravabahumānena.

[01] ^b^bhagavā jānantova^eb^ mahājanassa kammaphalaṃ, buddhānubhāvañca paccakkhaṃ kātukāmo ``ko me vandatī''ti gāthāya ^b^pucchi^eb^. tattha ^b^ko^eb^ti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu ko, katamoti attho. ^b^me^eb^ti mama. ^b^pādānī^eb^ti pāde. ^b^iddhiyā^eb^ti imāya evarūpāya deviddhiyā. ^b^``yasasā''^eb^ti iminā edisena parivārena, paricchedena ca. ^b^jala^eb^nti vijjotamāno. ^b^abhikkantenā^eb^ti ativiya kantena kamanīyena sundarena. ^b^vaṇṇenā^eb^ti chavivaṇṇena sarīravaṇṇanibhāya. ^b^sabbā obhāsayaṃ disā^eb^ti sabbā dasapi disā pabhāsento, cando viya, sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti attho.

[03] evaṃ pana bhagavatā pucchito devaputto attānaṃ pavedento ^b^``maṇḍūkohaṃ pure āsi''^eb^nti gāthamāha. tattha ^b^pure^eb^ti purimajātiyaṃ. ^b^``udake''^eb^ti idaṃ tadā attano uppattiṭṭhānadassanaṃ. ^b^``udake maṇḍūko''^eb^ti etena uddhamāyikādikassa thale maṇḍūkassa nivattanaṃ kataṃ hoti. gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, gunnaṃ ghāsesanaṭṭhānaṃ. idha pana gocaro viyāti gocaro, vāri udakaṃ gocaro etassāti ^b^vārigocaro^eb^. udakacārīpi hi koci kacchapādi avārigocaropi hotīti ``vārigocaro''ti visesetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^tava dhammaṃ suṇantassā^eb^ti brahmassarena karavīkarutamañjunā desentassa tava dhammaṃ ``dhammo eso vuccatī''ti sare nimittaggāhavasena suṇantassa. anādare cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^avadhi vacchapālako^eb^ti vacche rakkhanto gopāladārako mama samīpaṃ āgantvā daṇḍamolubbha tiṭṭhanto mama sīse daṇḍaṃ sannirumbhitvā maṃ māresīti attho.

[01] ^b^sitaṃ katvā^eb^ti ``tathā parittatarenāpi puññānubhāvena evaṃ ativiya uḷārā lokiyalokuttarā sampattiyo labbhantī''ti pītisomanassajāto bhāsurataradhavalavipphurantadassanakiraṇāvalīhi bhiyyoso mattāya taṃ padesaṃ obhāsento sitaṃ katvā. pītisomanassavasena hi so --
[21] ``muhuttaṃ ^a^M1.0249^ea^ cittapasādassa, iddhiṃ passa yasañca me.
[22] ānubhāvañca me passa, vaṇṇaṃ passa jutiñca me..
[21] ``ye ^a^V1.0235^ea^ ca te dīghamaddhānaṃ, dhammaṃ assosuṃ gotama.
[22] pattā te acalaṭṭhānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socare''ti.. (vi0 va0 859-860).
[25] imā dve gāthā vatvā pakkāmi.

[03] 141^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaṃ pana kiñcī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ya^eb^nti aniyamitavacanaṃ. tathā ^b^kiñcī^eb^ti. ^b^panā^eb^ti vacanālaṅkāramattaṃ. tasmā ^b^yaṃ kiñcī^eb^ti ñeyyassa anavasesapariyādānaṃ kataṃ hoti. ^b^panā^eb^ti vā visesatthadīpako nipāto. tena ``sammāsambuddho''ti iminā saṅkhepato, vitthārato ca satthu catusaccābhisambodho vutto. ``buddho''ti pana iminā tadaññassapi ñeyyassāvabodho. purimena vā satthu paṭivedhañāṇānubhāvo, pacchimena desanāñāṇānubhāvo. ^b^pī^eb^ti upari vuccamāno viseso jotīyati. sabbaso paṭipakkhehi vimuccatīti vimokkho, aggamaggo. tassa anto aggaphalaṃ, tattha bhavaṃ tasmiṃ laddhe laddhabbato ^b^vimokkhantikañāṇaṃ,^eb^ sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ sabbampi buddhañāṇaṃ. ^b^evaṃ pavatto^eb^ti ettha --

[02] ``sabbaññutāya buddho, sabbadassāvitāya buddho, anaññaneyyatāya buddho, visavitāya buddho, khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddho, nirupalepasaṅkhātena buddho, ekantavītarāgoti buddho, ekantavītadosoti buddho, ekantavītamohoti buddho, ekantanikkilesoti buddho, ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddho, eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddho, abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddho. buddhoti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kataṃ, na pitarā kataṃ, na bhātarā kataṃ, na bhaginiyā kataṃ, na mittāmaccehikataṃ, na ñātisālohitehi kataṃ, na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi kataṃ, na devatāhi kataṃ. vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho''ti (mahāni0 192) --

[25] ayaṃ ^a^M1.0250^ea^ ^b^niddesapāḷinayo^eb^. yasmā cettha tassā paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā bhedo natthi, tasmā dvīsu ekenāpi atthasiddhīti dassanatthaṃ ^b^``paṭisambhidānayo vā''^eb^ti aniyamattho ^b^vā^eb^-saddo vutto.

[03] tattha ^a^V1.0236^ea^ yathā loke avagantā ``avagato''ti vuccati, evaṃ ^b^bujjhitā saccānīti buddho^eb^ suddhakattuvasena. yathā paṇṇasosā vātā ``paṇṇasusā''ti vuccanti, evaṃ ^b^bodhetā pajāyāti buddho^eb^ hetukattuvasena, hetuattho cettha antonīto.

[03] ^b^sabbaññutāya buddho^eb^ti sabbadhammabujjhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti attho. ^b^sabbadassāvitāya buddho^eb^ti sabbadhammānaṃ ñāṇacakkhunā diṭṭhattā buddhoti attho. ^b^anaññaneyyatāya buddho^eb^ti aññena abodhanīto sayameva buddhattā buddhoti attho. ^b^visavitāya buddho^eb^ti nānāguṇavisavanato padumamiva vikasanaṭṭhena buddhoti attho. ^b^khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddho^eb^ti evamādīhi chahi pariyāyehi niddakkhayavibuddho puriso viya sabbakilesaniddakkhayavibuddhattā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddho^eb^ti gamanatthānaṃ buddhiatthatāya buddhiatthānampi gamanatthatā labbhatīti ekāyanamaggaṃ gatattā buddhoti vuccatīti attho. ^b^eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddho^eb^ti na parehi buddhattā buddho, atha kho sayameva anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhattā buddhoti attho. ^b^abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddho^eb^ti buddhi buddhaṃ bodhoti anatthantaraṃ. tattha yathā rattaguṇayogato ratto paṭo, evaṃ buddhaguṇayogato buddhoti ñāpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. tato paraṃ ^b^buddhoti netaṃ nāma^eb^ntiādi atthānugatāyaṃ paññattīti bodhanatthaṃ vuttanti evamettha imināpi kāraṇena bhagavā buddhoti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ ^b^assā^eb^ti bhagavato. ^b^guṇavisiṭṭhasabbasattuttamagarugāravādhivacana^eb^nti sabbehi sīlādiguṇehi visiṭṭhassa tato eva sabbasattehi uttamassa garuno gāravavasena vuttavacanamidaṃ bhagavāti. tathā hi lokanātho aparimitanirupamappabhāvasīlādiguṇavisesasamaṅgitāya sabbānatthaparihārapubbaṅgamāya ^a^M1.0251^ea^ niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā sadevamanussāya pajāya, accantupakāritāya ca aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamagāravaṭṭhānanti.

[03] ^b^bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭha^eb^nti seṭṭhavācakaṃ vacanaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato ``seṭṭha''nti vuttaṃ. atha vā vuccatīti vacanaṃ, attho. tasmā yo ``bhagavā''ti vacanena vacanīyo attho, so seṭṭhoti attho. ^b^bhagavāti vacanamuttama^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^gāravayutto^eb^ti garubhāvayutto garuguṇayogato, garukaraṇaṃ vā sātisayaṃ arahatīti gāravayutto, gāravārahoti attho.

[03] guṇavisesahetukaṃ ^a^V1.0237^ea^ ``bhagavā''ti idaṃ bhagavato nāmanti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato vibhajitukāmo nāmaṃyeva tāva atthuddhāravasena dassento ^b^``catubbidhaṃ vā nāma''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^āvatthika^eb^nti avatthāya viditaṃ taṃ taṃ avatthaṃ upādāya paññattaṃ voharitaṃ. tathā ^b^liṅgikaṃ^eb^ tena tena liṅgena voharitaṃ. ^b^nemittika^eb^nti nimittato āgataṃ. ^b^adhiccasamuppanna^eb^nti yadicchāya pavattaṃ, yadicchāya āgataṃ ^b^yadicchakaṃ^eb^. paṭhamena ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena bālo, yuvā, vuḍḍhoti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti, dutiyena muṇḍī, jaṭīti evamādiṃ, tatiyena bahussuto, dhammakathiko, jhāyīti evamādiṃ, catutthena aghamarisanaṃ pāvacananti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ``nemittika''nti vuttamatthaṃ byatirekavasena patiṭṭhāpetuṃ ^b^``na mahāmāyāyā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^``vimokkhantika''^eb^nti iminā idaṃ nāmaṃ ariyāya jātiyā jātakkhaṇeyeva jātanti dasseti. yadi vimokkhantikaṃ, atha kasmā aññehi khīṇāsavehi asādhāraṇanti āha ^b^``saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā''^eb^ti. buddhānañhi arahattaphalaṃ nipphajjamānaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi sabbehi buddhaguṇehi saddhiṃyeva nipphajjati. tena vuttaṃ ``vimokkhantika''nti. ^b^sacchikā paññattī^eb^ti sabbadhammānaṃ sacchikiriyānimittā paññatti. atha vā ^b^sacchikā paññattī^eb^ti paccakkhasiddhā paññatti. yaṃguṇanimittā hi sā, te satthu paccakkhabhūtāti guṇā viya sāpi sacchikatā eva nāma hoti, na paresaṃ vohāramattenāti adhippāyo.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ ^b^vadantī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0252^ea^ mahātherassa garubhāvato bahuvacanenāha, saṅgītikārehi vā katamanuvādaṃ sandhāya. issariyādibhedo bhago assa atthīti ^b^bhagī. akāsi bhagga^eb^nti rāgādipāpadhammaṃ bhaggaṃ akāsi, bhaggavāti attho. ^b^bahūhi ñāyehī^eb^ti kāyabhāvanādikehi anekehi bhāvanākkamehi. ^b^subhāvitattano^eb^ti sammadeva bhāvitasabhāvassa. paccatte cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
[03] ^b^niddese vuttanayenā^eb^ti etthāyaṃ niddesanayo --

[02] ``bhagavāti gāravādhivacanametaṃ. apica bhaggarāgoti bhagavā, bhaggadosoti bhagavā, bhaggamohoti bhagavā, bhaggamānoti bhagavā, bhaggadiṭṭhīti bhagavā, bhaggataṇhoti bhagavā, bhaggakilesoti bhagavā, bhaji vibhaji pavibhaji dhammaratananti bhagavā, bhavānaṃ antakaroti bhagavā, bhāvitakāyo bhāvitasīlo bhāvitacitto bhāvitapaññoti bhagavā, bhaji ^a^V1.0238^ea^ vā bhagavā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppānīti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānanti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa adhisīlassa adhicittassa adhipaññāyāti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ catunnaṃ appamaññānaṃ catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnanti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ navannaṃ anupubbavihārasamāpattīnanti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṃ saññābhāvanānaṃ dasannaṃ kasiṇasamāpattīnaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhissa asubhasamāpattiyāti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ pañcannaṃ balānaṃ sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassāti bhagavā, bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṃ tathāgatabalānaṃ catunnaṃ vesārajjānaṃ catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ channaṃ abhiññānaṃ channaṃ buddhadhammānanti bhagavā, bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ...pe0... sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ bhagavā''ti (mahāni0 83).

[03] ettha ^a^M1.0253^ea^ ca ^b^``gāravādhivacana''^eb^ntiādīni yadipi gāthāyaṃ āgatapadānukkamena na niddiṭṭhāni, yathārahaṃ pana tesaṃ sabbesampi niddesabhāvena veditabbāni. tattha ^b^gāravādhivacana^eb^nti garūnaṃ garubhāvavācakaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^bhajī^eb^ti bhāgaso kathesi. tenāha ^b^``vibhajī''^eb^ti. ^b^dhammaratana^eb^nti maggaphalādiariyadhammaratanaṃ. puna ^b^bhajī^eb^ti sevi. ^b^bhāgī^eb^ti bhāgadheyyavā. puna ^b^bhāgī^eb^ti bhajanasīlo. ^b^attharasassā^eb^ti atthasannissayassa rasassa. vimuttāyatanasīse hi ṭhatvā dhammaṃ kathentassa, suṇantassa ca tadatthaṃ ārabbha uppajjanakapītisomanassaṃ attharaso. dhammaṃ ārabbha ^b^dhammaraso^eb^. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``labhati atthavedaṃ, labhati dhammaveda''nti (a0 ni0 6.10). ^b^vimuttirasassā^eb^ti vimuttibhūtassa, vimuttisannissayassa vā rasassa. ^b^saññābhāvanāna^eb^nti aniccasaññādīnaṃ dasannaṃ saññābhāvanānaṃ. ^b^channaṃ buddhadhammāna^eb^nti cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni sandhāya vuttaṃ. tattha tattha ``bhagavā''ti saddasiddhi niruttinayena veditabbā.

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ yadipi ``bhāgyavā''tiādīhi padehi vuccamāno attho ``bhagī bhajī''ti niddesagāthāya saṅgahito eva, tathāpi padasiddhi atthavibhāgātthayojanādisahito saṃvaṇṇanānayo tato aññākāroti vuttaṃ ^b^``ayaṃ pana aparo nayo''^eb^ti. ^b^ādika^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena vaṇṇavikāro ^a^V1.0239^ea^, vaṇṇalopo, dhātuatthena niyojanañcāti imaṃ tividhaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^saddanayenā^eb^ti byākaraṇanayena. pisodarādīnaṃ saddānaṃ ākatigaṇabhāvato vuttaṃ ^b^``pisodarādipakkhepalakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā''^eb^ti. pakkhipanameva lakkhaṇaṃ. tappariyāpannatākaraṇaṃ hi pakkhipanaṃ. ^b^pārappatta^eb^nti paramukkaṃsagataṃ pāramibhāvappattaṃ. ^b^bhāgya^eb^nti kusalaṃ. tattha maggakusalaṃ lokuttarasukhanibbattakaṃ, itaraṃ lokiyasukhanibbattakaṃ, itarampi vā vivaṭṭūpanissayaṃ pariyāyato lokuttarasukhanibbattakaṃ siyā.

[01] lobhādayo ekakavasena gahitā. tathā viparītamanasikāro vipallāsabhāvasāmaññena, ahirikādayo dukavasena. lobhādayo ca puna ^b^``tividhākusalamūla''^eb^nti tikavasena gahitā. kāyaduccaritādi-taṇhāsaṃkilesādirāgamalādirāgavisamādikāmasaññādikāmavitakkāditaṇhāpapañcādayo ^b^tividhaduccaritā^eb^dayo. subhasaññādikā ^b^catubbidhavipariyesā^eb^. ``cīvarahetu vā bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjati, piṇḍapāta ^a^M1.0254^ea^, senāsana, itibhavābhavahetu vā''ti (a0 ni0 4.9) evamāgatā ^b^cattāro taṇhuppādā^eb^. ``buddhe kaṅkhati, dhamme, saṅghe, sikkhāya, sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khīlajāto''ti (dī0 ni0 3.319; ma0 ni0 1.185; a0 ni0 5.205; 9.71; vibha0 941) evamāgatāni ^b^pañca cetokhīlāni^eb^. ``kāme avītarāgo hoti, kāye avītarāgo, rūpe avītarāgo, yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati, aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī''ti (dī0 ni0 3.320; ma0 ni0 1.186) āgatā ^b^pañca vinibandhā^eb^. rūpābhinandanādayo ^b^pañcābhinandanā^eb^. kodho, makkho, issā, sāṭheyyaṃ, pāpicchatā, sandiṭṭhiparāmāsoti imāni ^b^cha vivādamūlāni^eb^. rūpataṇhādayo ^b^cha taṇhākāyā^eb^.

[03] kāmarāgapaṭighadiṭṭhivicikicchābhavarāgamānāvijjā ^b^sattānusayā^eb^. micchādiṭṭhiādayo ^b^aṭṭha micchattā^eb^. ``taṇhaṃ paṭicca pariyesanā, pariyesanaṃ paṭicca lābho, lābhaṃ paṭicca vinicchayo, vinicchayaṃ paṭicca chandarāgo, chandarāgaṃ paṭicca ajjhosānaṃ, ajjhosānaṃ paṭicca pariggaho, pariggahaṃ paṭicca macchariyaṃ, macchariyaṃ paṭicca ārakkhā, ārakkhādhikaraṇaṃ daṇḍādānādayo''ti (dī0 ni0 2.103; 3.359) ete ^b^nava taṇhāmūlakā^eb^. cattāro sassatavādā, cattāro ekaccasassatavādā, cattāro antānantikā, cattāro amarāvikkhepikā, dve adhiccasamuppannikā, soḷasa saññīvādā, aṭṭha asaññīvādā, aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā ^a^V1.0240^ea^, satta ucchedavādā, pañca paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti etāni ^b^dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni^eb^. ajjhattikassa upādāya ``asmī''ti hoti, ``itthasmī''ti, ``evasmī''ti, ``aññathāsmī''ti, ``bhavissa''nti, ``itthaṃ bhavissa''nti, ``evaṃ bhavissa''nti, ``aññathā bhavissa''nti, ``asasmī''ti, ``sātasmī''ti, ``siya''nti, ``itthaṃ siya''nti, ``evaṃ siya''nti, ``aññathā siya''nti, ``apāhaṃ siya''nti, ``apāhaṃ itthaṃ siya''nti, ``apāhaṃ evaṃ siya''nti, ``apāhaṃ aññathā siya''nti hotīti aṭṭhārasa, bāhirassupādāya ``iminā asmī''ti hoti, ``iminā itthasmī''ti, ``iminā evasmī''ti, ``iminā aññathāsmī''tiādikā (vibha0 975-976) vuttanayā aṭṭhārasāti chattiṃsa, atītā chattiṃsa, anāgatā chattiṃsa, paccuppannā chattiṃsāti ^b^aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritāni^eb^.

[03] ^b^pabheda^eb^-saddo ^a^M1.0255^ea^ paccekaṃ sambandhitabbo. tatthāyaṃ yojanā -- lobhappabhedā dosappabhedā yāva aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritappabhedāti. sabbāni sattānaṃ darathapariḷāhakarāni kilesānaṃ anekāni satasahassāni abhañjīti yojanā. ārammaṇādivibhāgato hi pavattiākāravibhāgato ca anantappabhedā kilesāti. ^b^saṅkhepato^eb^ti ettha samucchedappahānavasena sabbaso appavattikaraṇena ^b^kilesamāraṃ,^eb^ samudayappahānapariññāvasena ^b^khandhamāraṃ,^eb^ sahāyavekallakaraṇavasena sabbathā appavattikaraṇena ^b^abhisaṅkhāramāraṃ,^eb^ balavidhamanavisayātikkamanavasena ^b^devaputtamaccumāra^eb^ñca ^b^abhañji^eb^ bhagge akāsi. ^b^parissayāna^eb^nti upaddavānaṃ. sampati, āyatiñca sattānaṃ anatthāvahattā māraṇaṭṭhena vibādhanaṭṭhena kilesāva māroti ^b^kilesamāro^eb^. vadhakaṭṭhena khandhāva māroti ^b^khandhamāro^eb^. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``vadhakaṃ rūpaṃ `vadhakaṃ rūpa'nti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī''tiādi (saṃ0 ni0 3.85). jātijarādimahābyasananibbattanena abhisaṅkhārova māroti ^b^abhisaṅkhāramāro^eb^. saṃkilesanimittaṃ hutvā guṇamāraṇaṭṭhena devaputtova māroti ^b^devaputtamāro^eb^. sattānaṃ jīvitassa, jīvitaparikkhārānañca jānikaraṇena mahābādharūpattā maccu eva māroti ^b^maccumāro^eb^.

[03] ^b^satapuññalakkhaṇadharassā^eb^ti anekasatapuññanibbattamahāpurisalakkhaṇavahato ^b^rūpakāyasampatti dīpitā hoti,^eb^ itarāsaṃ phalasampadānaṃ mūlabhāvato, adhiṭṭhānabhāvato ca. ^b^dhammakāyasampatti^eb^ dīpitā hoti, pahānasampadāpubbakattā ñāṇasampadādīnaṃ. bhāgyavatāya lokiyānaṃ ^b^bahumatabhāvo^eb^. bhaggadosatāya parikkhakānaṃ bahumatabhāvoti yojanā. evaṃ ito paresupi yathāsaṅkhyaṃ yojetabbaṃ. puññavantaṃ hi ^b^gahaṭṭhā^eb^ khattiyādayo abhigacchanti, pahīnadosaṃ ^b^pabbajita^eb^tāpasaparibbājakādayo ^a^V1.0241^ea^ ``dosavinayāya dhammaṃ desetī''ti. ^b^abhigatānañca nesaṃ kāyacittadukkhāpanayane paṭibalabhāvo, āmisadānadhammadānehi^eb^ upakārasabbhāvato. rūpakāyaṃ tassa pasādacakkhunā, dhammakāyaṃ paññācakkhunā disvā dukkhadvayassa paṭippassambhanato upagatānañca tesaṃ āmisadānadhammadānehi ^b^upakāritā,^eb^ ``pubbe āmisadānadhammadānehi mayā ayaṃ ^a^M1.0256^ea^ lokaggabhāvo adhigato, tasmā tumhehipi evameva paṭipajjitabba''nti evaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ niyojanena abhigatānaṃ ^b^lokiyalokuttarasukhehi saṃyojanasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti^eb^.

[03] ^b^sakacitte issariyaṃ^eb^ attano cittassa vasībhāvāpādanaṃ, yena paṭikkūlādīsu appaṭikkūlasaññitādivihārasiddhi, adhiṭṭhāniddhiādiko iddhividhopi cittissariyameva cittabhāvanāya vasībhāvappattiyā ijjhanato. ^b^aṇimālaghimādika^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena mahimā patti pākammaṃ īsitā vasitā yatthakāmāvasāyitāti ime chapi saṅgahitā. tattha kāyassa aṇubhāvakaraṇaṃ ^b^aṇimā^eb^. lahubhāvo ^b^laghimā^eb^ ākāse padasā gamanādinā. mahattaṃ ^b^mahimā^eb^ kāyassa mahantatāpādanaṃ. iṭṭhadesappatti ^b^patti^eb^. adhiṭṭhānādivasena icchitanipphādanaṃ ^b^pākammaṃ^eb^. sayaṃvasitā issarabhāvo ^b^īsitā^eb^. iddhividhe vasībhāvo ^b^vasitā^eb^. ākāsena vā gacchato, aññaṃ vā kiñci karoto yattha katthaci vosānappatti ^b^yatthakāmāvasāyitā^eb^. ``kumārakarūpādidassana''ntipi vadanti. evamidaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ ^b^lokiyasammataṃ^eb^ issariyaṃ. taṃ pana bhagavato iddhividhantogadhaṃ, anaññasādhāraṇañcāti āha ^b^``sabbākāraparipūraṃ atthī''^eb^ti.

[03] kesañci padesavutti, ayathābhūtaguṇasannissayattā aparisuddho ca yaso hoti, na evaṃ tathāgatassāti dassetuṃ ^b^``lokattayabyāpako''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha idha adhigatasatthuguṇānaṃ āruppe uppannānaṃ ``itipi so bhagavā''tiādinā bhagavato guṇe anussarantānaṃ yaso pākaṭo hotīti āha ``lokattayabyāpako''ti. yathābhuccaguṇādhigatattā eva ^b^ativiya parisuddho^eb^. anavasesalakkhaṇānubyañjanādisampattiyā ^b^sabbākāraparipūrā. sabbaṅgapaccaṅgasirī^eb^ sabbesaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ sobhā. ``tiṇṇo tāreyya''ntiādinā ^b^yaṃ yaṃ etena^eb^ lokanāthena ^b^icchitaṃ^eb^ manovacīpaṇidhānavasena, ^b^patthitaṃ^eb^ kāyapaṇidhānavasena. ^b^tathevā^eb^ti paṇidhānānurūpameva. vīriyapāramibhāvappatto, ariyamaggapariyāpanno ca ^b^sammāvāyāmasaṅkhāto payatto^eb^.

[03] ^b^bhedehī^eb^ti sabbattikadukapadasaṃhitehi pabhedehi. ^b^paṭiccasamuppādādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena na kevalaṃ ^a^V1.0242^ea^ ^b^vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ^eb^ āgatā satipaṭṭhānādayova saṅgahitā, atha kho saṅgahādayo, samayavimuttādayo, ṭhapanādayo ^a^M1.0257^ea^, tikapaṭṭhānādayo ca saṅgahitāti veditabbaṃ. ^b^dukkhasaccassa pīḷanaṭṭho^eb^ taṃsamaṅgino sattassa hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ. ^b^saṅkhataṭṭho^eb^ sameccasambhūyapaccayehi katabhāvo. ^b^santāpaṭṭho^eb^ dukkhadukkhatādīhi santappanaṃ paridahanaṃ. ^b^vipariṇāmaṭṭho^eb^ jarāya, maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatā. ^b^samudayassa āyūhanaṭṭho^eb^ dukkhassa nibbattanavasena sampiṇḍanaṃ. ^b^nidānaṭṭho^eb^ ``idaṃ taṃ dukkha''nti nidadantassa viya samuṭṭhāpanaṃ. ^b^saṃyogaṭṭho^eb^ saṃsāradukkhena saṃyojanaṃ. ^b^palibodhaṭṭho^eb^ maggādhigamassa nivāraṇaṃ. nirodhassa ^b^nissaraṇaṭṭho^eb^ sabbūpadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggasabhāvattā tato vinissaṭatā, tannissaraṇanimittatā vā. ^b^vivekaṭṭho^eb^ sabbasaṅkhāravisaṃyuttatā. ^b^asaṅkhataṭṭho^eb^ kenacipi paccayena anabhisaṅkhatatā. ^b^amataṭṭho^eb^ niccasabhāvattā maraṇābhāvo, sattānaṃ maraṇābhāvahetutā vā. ^b^maggassa niyyānaṭṭho^eb^ vaṭṭadukkhato niggamanaṭṭho. ^b^hetuattho^eb^ nibbānassa sampāpakabhāvo. ^b^dassanaṭṭho^eb^ accantasukhumassa nibbānassa sacchikaraṇaṃ. ^b^ādhipateyyaṭṭho^eb^ catusaccadassane sampayuttānaṃ ādhipaccakaraṇaṃ, ārammaṇādhipatibhāvo vā visesato maggādhipativacanato. satipi hi jhānādīnaṃ ārammaṇādhipatibhāve ``jhānādhipatino dhammā''ti evamādiṃ avatvā ``maggādhipatino dhammā'' icceva vuttaṃ, tasmā viññāyati ``atthi maggassa ārammaṇādhipatibhāve viseso''ti. ete ca pīḷanādayo soḷasākārā nāma. kasmā panettha aññesu rogagaṇṭhādiākāresu vijjamānesu eteva pariggayhantīti? salakkhaṇato ca saccantaradassanato ca āvibhāvato. svāyamattho parato saccakathāyameva āvi bhavissati.

[03] ^b^dibbavihāro^eb^ kasiṇādiārammaṇāni rūpāvacarajjhānāni. mettādijjhānāni ^b^brahmavihāro^eb^. phalasamāpatti ^b^ariyavihāro^eb^. kāmehi vivekaṭṭhakāyatāvasena ekībhāvo ^b^kāyaviveko^eb^. paṭhamajjhānādinā nīvaraṇādīhi vivittacittatā ^b^cittaviveko. upadhiviveko^eb^ nibbānaṃ. ^b^aññe^eb^ti lokiyābhiññādike.

[03] kilesābhisaṅkhāravasena bhavesu paribbhamanaṃ, so ca taṇhāppadhānoti vuttaṃ ^b^``taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ gamana''^eb^nti. ^b^vanta^eb^nti ariyamaggamukhena uggiritaṃ puna apaccāvamanavasena chaḍḍitaṃ. ^b^bhagavāti vuccati^eb^ niruttinayenāti dassento āha ^b^``yathā...pe0... mekhalā''^eb^ti.
[03] aparo ^a^M1.0258^ea^ ^a^V1.0243^ea^ nayo -- bhāgavāti bhagavā, bhatavāti bhagavā, bhāge vanīti bhagavā, bhage vanīti bhagavā, bhattavāti bhagavā, bhage vamīti bhagavā. bhāge vamīti bhagavā.
[21] bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā.
[22] bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino..

[03] tattha kathaṃ ^b^bhāgavāti bhagavā^eb^? ye te sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā guṇakoṭṭhāsā, te anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā tathāgatassa atthi upalabbhanti. tathā hissa sīlaṃ samādhi paññā vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ, hirī ottappaṃ, saddhā vīriyaṃ, sati sampajaññaṃ, sīlavisuddhi diṭṭhivisuddhi, samatho vipassanā, tīṇi kusalamūlāni, tīṇi sucaritāni, tayo sammāvitakkā, tisso anavajjasaññā, tisso dhātuyo, cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, cattāro ariyamaggā, cattāri ariyaphalāni, catasso paṭisambhidā, catuyoniparicchedakañāṇāni, cattāro ariyavaṃsā, cattāri vesārajjañāṇāni, pañca padhāniyaṅgāni, pañcaṅgiko sammāsamādhi, pañcañāṇiko sammāsamādhi, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, pañca nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, pañca vimuttāyatanañāṇāni, pañca vimuttiparipācanīyā saññā, cha anussatiṭṭhānāni, cha gāravā, cha nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, cha satatavihārā, cha anuttariyāni, cha nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā, cha abhiññā, cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni, satta aparihāniyā dhammā, satta ariyadhammā, satta ariyadhanāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, satta sappurisadhammā, satta nijjaravatthūni, satta saññā, sattadakkhiṇeyyapuggaladesanā, sattaviññāṇaṭṭhitidesanā, sattakhīṇāsavabaladesanā, aṭṭhapaññāpaṭilābhahetudesanā, aṭṭha sammattāni, aṭṭhalokadhammātikkamā, aṭṭha ārambhavatthūni, aṭṭhākkhaṇadesanā, aṭṭha mahāpurisavitakkā, aṭṭhābhibhāyatanadesanā, aṭṭha vimokkhā, nava yonisomanasikāramūlakā dhammā, nava pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅgāni, navasattāvāsadesanā, nava āghātapaṭivinayā, nava saññā, nava nānattā, nava anupubbavihārā, dasa nāthakāraṇā dhammā, dasa kasiṇāyatanāni, dasa kusalakammapathā, dasa sammattāni, dasa ariyavāsā, dasa asekkhadhammā, dasa tathāgatabalāni, ekādasa mettānisaṃsā, dvādasa ^a^M1.0259^ea^ dhammacakkākārā, terasa dhutaguṇā, cuddasa buddhañāṇāni, pañcadasa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā, soḷasavidhā ānāpānassati, soḷasa aparantapanīyā dhammā, aṭṭhārasa buddhadhammā, ekūnavīsati paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni, catucattālīsa ñāṇavatthūni ^a^V1.0244^ea^, paññāsa udayabbayañāṇāni, paropaññāsa kusaladhammā, sattasattatiñāṇavatthūni, catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasamāpattisañcārimahāvajirañāṇaṃ, anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānapavicayapaccavekkhaṇadesanāñāṇāni, tathā anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānaṃ sattānaṃ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādayo anantāparimāṇabhedā anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā saṃvijjanti upalabbhanti. tasmā yathāvuttavibhāgā guṇabhāgā assa atthīti bhāgavāti vattabbe ā-kārassa rassattaṃ katvā ``bhagavā''ti vutto. evaṃ tāva bhāgavāti bhagavā.
[21] yasmā sīlādayo sabbe, guṇabhāgā asesato.
[22] vijjanti sugate tasmā, ``bhagavā''ti pavuccati..

[03] kathaṃ ^b^bhatavāti bhagavā^eb^? ye te sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannehi manussattādike aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā katamahābhinīhārehi mahābodhisattehi paripūretabbā dānapāramī, sīlanekkhammapaññāvīriyakhantisaccādhiṭṭhānamettāupekkhāpāramīti dasa pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo, dānādīni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni, saccādīni cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni, attapariccāgo, nayana, dhana, rajja, puttadārapariccāgoti pañca mahāpariccāgā, pubbayogo, pubbacariyā, dhammakkhānaṃ, ñātatthacariyā, lokatthacariyā, buddhatthacariyāti evamādayo, saṅkhepato vā sabbe puññasambhārañāṇasambhārabuddhakārakadhammā, te mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyāni yathā hānabhāgiyā, saṃkilesabhāgiyā, ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na honti, atha kho uttaruttari visesabhāgiyāva honti, evaṃ sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ anavasesato bhatā sambhatā assa atthīti bhatavāti vattabbe ``bhagavā''ti vutto niruttinayena ta-kārassa ga-kāraṃ katvā. atha vā ^b^bhatavā^eb^ti teyeva yathāvutte buddhakārakadhamme vuttanayena bhari sambhari, paripūresīti attho. evampi bhatavāti bhagavā.
[21] sammāsambodhiyā ^a^M1.0260^ea^ sabbe, dānapāramiādike.
[22] sambhāre bhatavā nātho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato..

[03] kathaṃ ^a^V1.0245^ea^ ^b^bhāge vanīti bhagavā^eb^? ye te catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakasamāpattibhāgā, te anavasesato lokahitatthaṃ, attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ niccakappaṃ niccakappaṃ vani bhaji sevi bahulamakāsīti bhāge vanīti bhagavā. atha vā abhiññeyyadhammesu, kusalādīsu, khandhādīsu ca ye te pariññeyyādivasena saṅkhepato vā catubbidhā abhisamayabhāgā, vitthārato pana ``cakkhuṃ pariññeyyaṃ...pe0... jarāmaraṇaṃ pariññeyya''ntiādinā anekapariññeyyabhāgā, ``cakkhussa samudayo pahātabbo...pe0... jarāmaraṇassa samudayo pahātabbo''tiādinā pahātabbabhāgā, ``cakkhussa nirodho...pe0... jarāmaraṇassa nirodho sacchikātabbo''tiādinā (paṭi0 ma0 1.21) sacchikātabbabhāgā, ``cakkhussa nirodhagāminī paṭipadā''tiādinā, ``cattāro satipaṭṭhānā''tiādinā ca anekabhedā bhāvetabbabhāgā ca dhammā, te sabbe vani bhaji yathārahaṃ gocarabhāvanāsevanānaṃ vasena sevi. evampi bhāge vanīti bhagavā. atha vā ye ime sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā sāvakehi sādhāraṇā guṇakoṭṭhāsā guṇabhāgā, ``kinti nu kho te veneyyasantānesu patiṭṭhapeyya''nti mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi, sā cassa abhipatthanā yathādhippetaphalāvahā ahosi. evampi bhāge vanīti bhagavā.
[21] yasmā ñeyyasamāpatti-guṇabhāge tathāgato.
[22] bhaji patthayi sattānaṃ, hitāya bhagavā tato..

[03] kathaṃ ^b^bhage vanīti bhagavā^eb^? samāsato tāva katapuññehi payogasampannehi yathāvibhavaṃ bhajīyantīti bhagā, lokiyalokuttarasampattiyo. tattha lokiye tāva tathāgato sambodhito pubbe bodhisattabhūto paramukkaṃsagate vani bhaji sevi, yattha patiṭṭhāya niravasesato buddhakārakadhamme samannānento buddhadhamme paripācesi. buddhabhūto ^a^M1.0261^ea^ pana te niravajjasukhūpasaṃhite anaññasādhāraṇe lokuttarepi vani bhaji sevi. vitthārato pana padesarajjaissariyacakkavattisampattidevarajjasampattiādivasena, jhānavimokkhasamādhisamāpattiñāṇadassanamaggabhāvanāphalasacchikiriyādiuttarimanussadhammavasena ca anekavihite anaññasādhāraṇe bhage vani bhaji sevi. evampi bhage vanīti bhagavā.
[21] yā ^a^V1.0246^ea^ tā sampattiyo loke, yā ca lokuttarā puthū.
[22] sabbā tā bhaji sambuddho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato..

[03] kathaṃ ^b^bhattavāti bhagavā^eb^? bhattā daḷhabhattikā assa bahū atthīti bhattavā. tathāgato hi mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimitanirupamappabhāvaguṇavisesasamaṅgi bhāvato sabbasattuttamo sabbānatthaparihārapubbaṅgamāya niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā sadevamanussāya pajāya accantupakāritāya dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāsītianubyañjanabyāmappabhādianaññasādhāraṇaguṇavisesapaṭimaṇḍitarūpakāyatāya yathābhuccaguṇādhigatena ``itipi so bhagavā''tiādinayappavattena lokattayabyāpināsuvipulena, suvisuddhena ca thutighosena samannāgatattā, ukkaṃsapāramippattāsu appicchatāsantuṭṭhiādīsu supatiṭṭhitabhāvato, dasabalacatuvesārajjādiniratisayaguṇavisesasamaṅgibhāvato ca ``rūpappamāṇo rūpappasanno, ghosappamāṇo ghosappasanno, lūkhappamāṇo lūkhappasanno, dhammappamāṇo dhammappasanno''ti evaṃ catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse sabbathāpi pasādāvahabhāvena samantapāsādikattā aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ sadevamanussānaṃ ādarabahumānagāravāyatanatāya paramapemasambhattiṭṭhānaṃ. ye tassa ovāde patiṭṭhitā aveccappasādena samannāgatā honti, kenaci asaṃhāriyā tesaṃ sambhatti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vāti. tathā hi te attano jīvitapariccāgepi tattha pasādaṃ na pariccajanti, tassa vā āṇaṃ daḷhabhattibhāvato. tenevāha --
[21] ``yo ve kataññū katavedi dhīro,
[22] kalyāṇamitto daḷhabhatti ca hotī''ti.. (jā0 2.17.78).

[02] ``seyyathāpi ^a^M1.0262^ea^, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṃ nātivattati, evameva kho, bhikkhave, yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī''ti (udā0 45; cūḷava0 385) ca.
[03] evaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā niruttinayena ekassa ta-kārassa lopaṃ katvā itarassa ga-kāraṃ katvā.
[21] guṇātisayayuttassa ^a^V1.0247^ea^, yasmā lokahitesino.
[22] sambhattā bahavo satthu, bhagavā tena vuccati..

[03] kathaṃ ^b^bhage vamīti bhagavā^eb^? yasmā tathāgato bodhisattabhūtopi purimāsu jātīsu pāramiyo pūrento bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ, issariyaṃ, yasañca vami uggiri kheḷapiṇḍaṃ viya anapekkho chaḍḍayi. tathā hissa ^b^somanassakumārakāle^eb^ (jā0 1.15.211 ādayo) ^b^hatthipālakumārakāle^eb^ (jā0 1.15.337 ādayo) ^b^ayogharapaṇḍitakāle^eb^ (jā0 1.15.363 ādayo) ^b^mūgapakkhapaṇḍitakāle^eb^ (jā0 2.22.1 ādayo) ^b^cūḷasutasomakāle^eb^ti (jā0 2.17.195 ādayo) evamādīsu nekkhammapāramipūraṇavasena devarajjasadisāya rajjasiriyā pariccattāttabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ natthi. carimattabhāvepi hatthagataṃ cakkavattisiriṃ devalokādhipaccasadisaṃ catudīpissariyaṃ, cakkavattisampattisannissayaṃ sattaratanasamujjalaṃ yasañca tiṇāyapi amaññamāno nirapekkho pahāya abhinikkhamitvā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, tasmā ime siriādike bhage vamīti bhagavā. atha vā bhāni nāma nakkhattāni, tehi samaṃ gacchanti pavattantīti bhagā, sineruyugandharauttarakuruhimavantādibhājanalokavisesasannissayā sobhā kappaṭṭhiyabhāvato. tepi bhagavā vami tannivāsasattāvāsasamatikkamanato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena pajahīti. evampi bhage vamīti bhagavā.
[21] cakkavattisiriṃ yasmā, yasaṃ issariyaṃ sukhaṃ.
[22] pahāsi lokacittañca, sugato bhagavā tato..

[03] kathaṃ ^b^bhāge vamīti bhagavā^eb^? bhāgā nāma sabhāvadhammakoṭṭhāsā, te khandhāyatanadhātādivasena, tatthāpi rūpavedanādivasena, atītādivasena ca anekavidhā, te ca bhagavā ``sabbaṃ papañcaṃ, sabbaṃ yogaṃ, sabbaṃ ^a^M1.0263^ea^ ganthaṃ, sabbaṃ saṃyojanaṃ samucchinditvā amataṃ dhātuṃ samadhigacchanto vami uggiri anapekkho chaḍḍayi na paccāvami. tathā hesa sabbatthakameva pathaviṃ āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ, cakkhuṃ sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhaṃ kāyaṃ manaṃ, rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ...pe0... manoviññāṇaṃ, cakkhusamphassaṃ...pe0... manosamphassaṃ, cakkhusamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ...pe0... manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ, cakkhusamphassajaṃ saññaṃ...pe0... manosamphassajaṃ saññaṃ, cakkhusamphassajaṃ cetanaṃ...pe0... manosamphassajaṃ cetanaṃ, rūpataṇhaṃ ^a^V1.0248^ea^ ...pe0... dhammataṇhaṃ, rūpavitakkaṃ...pe0... dhammavitakkaṃ, rūpavicāraṃ...pe0... dhammavicāra''ntiādinā anupadadhammavibhāgavasenapi sabbeva dhammakoṭṭhāse anavasesato vami uggiri anapekkhapariccāgena chaḍḍayi. vuttaṃ hetaṃ --
[02] ``yaṃ taṃ, ānanda, cattaṃ vantaṃ muttaṃ pahīnaṃ paṭinissaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ tathāgato puna paccāvamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī''ti (dī0 ni0 2.183).

[03] evampi bhāge vamīti bhagavā. atha vā ^b^bhāge vamī^eb^ti sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje hīnapaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena vami uggiri anapekkho pariccaji pajahi, paresañca tathattāya dhammaṃ desesi. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[03] ``dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave, pahātabbā, pageva adhammā (ma0 ni0 1.240). kullūpamaṃ vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi nittharaṇatthāya, no gahaṇatthāyā''tiādi (ma0 ni0 1.240).
[25] evampi bhāge vamīti bhagavā.
[21] khandhāyatanadhātādi-dhammabhedā mahesinā.
[22] kaṇhā sukkā yato vantā, tatopi bhagavā mato..
[25] tena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā.
[22] bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino''ti..

[03] ettha ca yasmā saṅkhepato attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipattivasena duvidhā buddhaguṇā, tāsu attahitasampatti pahānasampadāñāṇasampadābhedato duvidhā, ānubhāvasampadādīnaṃ tadavinābhāvena tadantogadhattā. parahitapaṭipatti payogāsayabhedato ^a^M1.0264^ea^ duvidhā. tattha payogato lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa sabbadukkhaniyyānikadhammūpadeso, āsayato paṭiviruddhesupi niccaṃ hitesitā, ñāṇaparipākakālāgamanādiparahitapaṭipatti ca, āmisapaṭiggahaṇādināpi atthacariyā ^a^V1.0249^ea^ parahitapaṭipatti hotiyeva. tasmā tesaṃ vibhāvanavasena pāḷiyaṃ ``araha''ntiādīnaṃ padānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^``araha''^eb^nti iminā padena pahānasampadāvasena bhagavato attahitasampatti vibhāvitā. ^b^``sammāsambuddho, lokavidū''^eb^ti ca imehi padehi ñāṇasampadāvasena. nanu ca ``lokavidū''ti imināpi sammāsambuddhatā vibhāvīyatīti? saccaṃ vibhāvīyati, atthi pana viseso, ``sammāsambuddho''ti iminā sabbaññutaññāṇānubhāvo vibhāvito, ``lokavidū''ti pana iminā āsayānusayañāṇādīnampi ānubhāvo vibhāvitoti. ^b^``vijjācaraṇasampanno''^eb^ti iminā sabbāpi bhagavato attahitasampatti vibhāvitā. ^b^``sugato''^eb^ti pana iminā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato attahitasampatti, parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā. ^b^``anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna''^eb^nti imehi padehi bhagavato parahitapaṭipatti vibhāvitā. ^b^``buddho''^eb^ti iminā bhagavato attahitasampatti, parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā. evañca katvā ``sammāsambuddho''ti vatvā ``buddho''ti vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. tenevāha ``attanāpi bujjhi aññepi satte bodhesī''tiādi. ^b^``bhagavā''^eb^ti ca imināpi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato sabbā attahitasampatti, parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā.

[03] aparo nayo -- hetuphalasattūpakāravasena saṅkhepato tividhā buddhaguṇā. tattha ``arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno lokavidū''ti imehi padehi phalasampattivasena buddhaguṇā vibhāvitā. ``anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussāna''nti imehi sattūpakāravasena buddhaguṇā pakāsitā. ``buddho''ti iminā phalavasena, sattūpakāravasena ca buddhaguṇā vibhāvitā. ``sugato bhagavā''ti pana imehi padehi hetuphalasattūpakāravasena buddhaguṇā vibhāvitāti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ ^b^tassā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0265^ea^ buddhānussatikammaṭṭhānikassa yogino. ^b^eva^eb^nti ``tatrāyaṃ nayo''tiādinā vuttappakārena. ^b^tasmiṃ samaye^eb^ti buddhaguṇānussaraṇasamaye. ^b^rāgapariyuṭṭhita^eb^nti rāgena pariyuṭṭhitaṃ, pariyuṭṭhānappattehi rāgehi sahitaṃ cittaṃ araññamiva corehi tena pariyuṭṭhitanti vuttaṃ, tassa pariyuṭṭhānaṭṭhānabhāvato, pariyuṭṭhitarāganti attho. yaṃ vā rāgassa pariyuṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ taṃsahite citte upacaritanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. etasmiṃ pakkhe ^b^rāgenā^eb^ti rāgena hetunāti ^a^V1.0250^ea^ attho. ^b^ujugatamevā^eb^ti pageva kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ apanītattā, cittassa ca anujubhāvakarānaṃ māyādīnaṃ abhāvato, rāgādipariyuṭṭhānābhāvena vā onatiunnativirahato ujubhāvameva kataṃ. atha vā ^b^ujugatamevā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānassa vīthiṃ otiṇṇatāya līnuddhaccavigamanato majjhimasamathanimittapaṭipattiyā ujubhāvameva gataṃ. ^b^tathāgataṃ ārabbhā^eb^ti tathāgataguṇe ārammaṇaṃ katvā.

[03] ^b^iccassā^eb^ti iti assa. ``so bhagavā itipi araha''ntiādinā pubbe vuttappakārena buddhaguṇe anuvitakkayatoti sambandho. ^b^eva^eb^nti ``neva tasmiṃ samaye''tiādinā vuttanayena. ^b^buddhaguṇapoṇā^eb^ti buddhaguṇaninnā. ^b^``vitakkavicārā pavattantī''^eb^ti etena buddhaguṇasaṅkhātaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vitakkāhataṃ, vitakkapariyāhataṃ, punappunaṃ anumajjanañca karotīti dasseti. ^b^pīti uppajjatī^eb^ti bhāvanāvasena upacārajjhānanipphādikā balavatī pīti uppajjati. ^b^pītimanassa^eb^ vuttappakārapītisahitacittassa. ^b^kāyacittadarathā^eb^ti kāyacittapassaddhīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā sukhumāvatthā uddhaccasahagatā kilesā. ^b^paṭippassambhantī^eb^ti sannisīdanti. ^b^anukkamena ekakkhaṇe^eb^ti yadā buddhaguṇārammaṇā bhāvanā uparūpari visesaṃ āvahantī pavattati, tadā nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti, kilesā sannisinnāva honti, suvisadāni saddhādīni indriyāni honti, bhāvanāya paguṇatāya vitakkavicārā sātisayaṃ paṭukiccāva honti, balavatī pīti uppajjati, pītipadaṭṭhānā passaddhi savisesā jāyati, passaddhakāyassa samādhipadaṭṭhānaṃ sukhaṃ thirataraṃ hutvā pavattati, sukhena anubrūhitaṃ cittaṃ kammaṭṭhāne sammadeva samādhiyati. evaṃ anukkamena pubbabhāge vitakkādayo uparūpari paṭupaṭutarabhāvena pavattitvā bhāvanāya majjhimasamathapaṭipattiyā indriyānañca ekarasabhāvena paṭutamāni hutvā ekakkhaṇe ^b^jhānaṅgāni uppajjanti^eb^. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ bhagavatā --
[02] ``yasmiṃ ^a^M1.0266^ea^, mahānāma, samaye ariyasāvako tathāgataṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti...pe0... sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī''ti (a0 ni0 6.10).

[03] kasmā panettha jhānaṃ appanāpattaṃ na hotīti āha ^b^``buddhaguṇānaṃ pana gambhīratāyā''^eb^tiādi. gambhīre hi ārammaṇe gambhīre udake patitanāvā viya samathabhāvanā patiṭṭhaṃ ^a^V1.0251^ea^ na labhati, ``gambhīratāyā''ti ca iminā sabhāvadhammatāpi saṅgahitā. sabhāvadhammo hi gambhīro na paññatti. nanu ca tajjāpaññattivasena sabhāvadhammo gayhatīti? saccaṃ gayhati pubbabhāge, bhāvanāya pana vaḍḍhamānāya paññattiṃ samatikkamitvā sabhāveyeva cittaṃ tiṭṭhati. nanu ca sabhāvadhammepi katthaci appanā samijjhati dutiyāruppajjhānādīti? saccaṃ samijjhati, tañca kho ekappakāre ārammaṇe, idaṃ pana nānappakāranti dassento ^b^``nānappakāraguṇānussaraṇādhimuttatāyā''^eb^ti āha. evampi yathā nānappakāresu kesādikoṭṭhāsesu manasikāraṃ pavattentassa ekasmiṃyeva koṭṭhāse appanāvasena bhāvanā avatiṭṭhati, evamidha kasmā na hotīti? visamoyaṃ upaññāso. tattha hi satipi koṭṭhāsabahubhāve ekappakāreneva bhāvanā vattati paṭikkūlākārasseva gahaṇato, idha pana nānappakārena guṇānaṃ nānappakārattā, na ayamekasmiṃyeva guṇe ṭhātuṃ sakkoti bhāvanābalena paccakkhato buddhaguṇesu upaṭṭhahantesu saddhāya balavabhāvato. teneva hi ^b^``adhimuttatāyā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yadi upacārappattaṃ jhānaṃ hoti, kathaṃ buddhānussatīti vuttanti āha ^b^``tadeta''^eb^ntiādi.

[03] ^b^sagāravo hoti sappatisso,^eb^ satthu guṇasarīrassa paccakkhato upaṭṭhahanato. tatoyeva ^b^saddhāvepullaṃ^eb^ aveccappasādasadisaṃ saddhāmahattaṃ. buddhaguṇānaṃ anussaraṇavasena bhāvanāya pavattattā ^b^sativepullaṃ^eb^. tesaṃ paramagambhīratāya, nānappakāratāya ca ^b^paññāvepullaṃ^eb^. tesaṃ uḷārapuññakkhettatāya ^b^puññavepullañca adhigacchati. pītipāmojjabahulo hoti^eb^ pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyattā buddhānussatiyā. ^b^bhayabheravasaho^eb^ buddhaguṇārammaṇāya satiyā bhayabheravābhibhavanato. tenāha bhagavā ``anussaretha sambuddhaṃ, bhayaṃ tumhāka no siyā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.249 thokaṃ visadisaṃ). ^b^dukkhādhivāsanasamattho^eb^ buddhānussatiyā sarīradukkhassa padumapalāse udakassa viya vinivaṭṭanato ^a^M1.0267^ea^. ^b^saṃvāsasañña^eb^nti sahavāsasaññaṃ. ^b^buddhabhūmiyaṃ cittaṃ namati^eb^ buddhaguṇānaṃ mahantabhāvassa paccakkhato upaṭṭhānato. buddhānussatibhāvanāya sabbadā buddhaguṇānaṃ citte viparivattanato vuttaṃ ^b^``sammukhā satthāraṃ passato viyā''^eb^ti. ^b^uttari appaṭivijjhanto^eb^ti imāya bhāvanāya upari taṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā saccāni appaṭivijjhanto. ^b^sugatiparāyaṇo^eb^ti sugatisamparāyo.

[03] ^b^appamāda^eb^nti appamajjanaṃ sakkaccaṃ anuyogaṃ. ^b^kayirāthā^eb^ti kareyya. ^b^sumedhaso^eb^ti sundarapañño ^a^V1.0252^ea^. ^b^evaṃ mahānubhāvāyā^eb^ti vuttappakārena nīvaraṇavikkhambhanādisamatthena satthari sagāravabhāvādihetubhūtena mahatā sāmatthiyena samannāgatāya.

[03] 146^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhammānussati^eb^nti ettha padattho, sabhāvattho ca ādito vuttoyevāti taṃ anāmasitvā bhāvanāvidhānameva dassetuṃ ^b^``dhammānussatiṃ bhāvetukāmenāpī''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. kasmā panettha buddhānussatiyaṃ viya ``aveccappasādasamannāgatenā''ti na vuttaṃ. nanu etā paṭipāṭiyā cha anussatiyo ariyasāvakānaṃ vasena desanaṃ āruḷhāti? saccametaṃ, evaṃ santepi ``parisuddhasīlādiguṇānaṃ puthujjanānampi ijjhantī''ti dassanatthaṃ ``aveccappasādasamannāgatenā''ti idha na vuttaṃ, ariyasāvakānaṃ pana sukhena ijjhantīti. tathāpi pāḷiyaṃ āgatattā ca buddhānussatiniddese vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, ayañca vicāro parato āgamissateva.

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ ^b^pariyattidhammopī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena lokuttaradhammaṃ sampiṇḍeti. ^b^itaresū^eb^ti sandiṭṭhikādipadesu. ^b^lokuttaradhammovā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ nippariyāyena sandiṭṭhikādiatthaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, pariyāyato panete pariyattidhammepi sambhavanteva. tathā hi ^b^pariyattidhammo^eb^ bahussutena āgatāgamena paramena satinepakkena samannāgatena paññavatā ādikalyāṇatādivisesato sayaṃ daṭṭhabboti ^b^sandiṭṭhiko^eb^. ācariyapayirupāsanāya vinā na labbhāti ce? lokuttaradhammepi samāne kalyāṇamittasannissayeneva sijjhanato, tathā satthusandassanepi. ``sandiṭṭhiyā jayatī''ti ayaṃ panattho titthiyanimmaddane nippariyāyatova labbhati ^a^M1.0268^ea^, kilesajaye pariyāyato paramparāhetubhāvato. ``sandiṭṭhaṃ arahatī''ti ayampi attho labbhateva, sabbaso saṃkilesadhammānaṃ pahānaṃ, vodānadhammānaṃ paribrūhanañca uddissa pavattattā. ayañca attho ``ye kho tvaṃ, gotami, dhamme jāneyyāsi, ime dhammā sarāgāya saṃvattanti no virāgāya, saññogāya saṃvattanti no visaññogāya, saupādānāya saṃvattanti no anupādānāya. ekaṃsena, gotami, dhāreyyāsi `neso dhammo, neso vinayo, netaṃ satthusāsana'''nti (cūḷava0 406; a0 ni0 8.53), ``dhammāpi vo, bhikkhave, pahātabbā, pageva adhammā''ti (ma0 ni0 1.240) ca evamādīhi suttapadehi vibhāvetabbo. akālikādhigamupāyatāya ^b^akāliko^eb^. vijjamānatāparisuddhatāhi ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ^b^ehipassiko^eb^. tato eva vaṭṭadukkhanittharaṇatthikehi ^a^V1.0253^ea^ attano citte upanayanaṃ, cittassa vā tattha upanayanaṃ arahatīti ^b^opaneyyiko^eb^. vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā paricayena sammadeva atthavedaṃ, dhammavedañca labhantehi ^b^paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī^eb^ti. evaṃ sandiṭṭhikādipadesu pariyattidhammampi pakkhipitvā manasikāro yujjateva.

[03] ^b^sā^eb^ti gāthā. ^b^samantabhadrakattā^eb^ti sabbabhāgehi sundarattā. ^b^dhammassā^eb^ti sāsanadhammassa. kiñcāpi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma paramatthato koci natthi, yesu pana avayavesu samudāyarūpena avekkhitesu ``gāthā''ti samaññā, taṃ tato bhinnaṃ viya katvā saṃsāmivohāraṃ āropetvā dassento ^b^``paṭhamena pādena ādikalyāṇā''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^``ekānusandhika''^eb^nti idaṃ nātibahuvibhāgaṃ yathānusandhinā ekānusandhikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, itarassa pana teneva desetabbadhammavibhāgena ādimajjhapariyosānabhāgā labbhantīti. ^b^nidānenā^eb^ti kāladesadesakaparisādiapadisanalakkhaṇena nidānaganthena. ^b^nigamanenā^eb^ti ``idamavocā''tiādikena (saṃ0 ni0 1.249), ``iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ, idametaṃ paṭicca vutta''nti (a0 ni0 10.27) vā yathāvuttatthanigamanena.

[03] ayaṃ kathā visesato suttapiṭakasaṃvaṇṇanāti katvā suttapiṭakavasena dhammassa ādikalyāṇādikaṃ dassetvā idāni suttapiṭakavinayapiṭakānaṃ vasena taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``sanidānasauppattikattā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sanidānasauppattikattā^eb^ti yathāvuttanidānena sanidānatāya, sāṭṭhuppattikatāya ^a^M1.0269^ea^ ca. ^b^veneyyānaṃ anurūpato^eb^ti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā, dhammadesanāya ca taṃtaṃsikkhāpadabhāvena paññāpiyamānassa veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ pavattiyamānassa anurūpato. ^b^atthassā^eb^ti desiyamānassa ca sīlādiatthassa. ``taṃ kissa hetu (saṃ0 ni0 1.249)? seyyathāpi, bhikkhave''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 3.95) tattha tattha hetūpamāgahaṇena ^b^hetudāharaṇayuttato^eb^.

[03] evaṃ suttavinayavasena pariyattidhammassa ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇataṃ dassetvā idāni tīṇi piṭakāni ekajjhaṃ gahetvā taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``sakalopī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sāsanadhammo^eb^ti --
[21] ``sabbapāpassa ^a^V1.0254^ea^ akaraṇaṃ, kusalassa upasampadā.
[22] sacittapariyodapanaṃ, etaṃ buddhāna sāsana''nti.. (dha0 pa0 183; dī0 ni0 2.90) --

[25] evaṃ vuttassa satthusāsanassa pakāsako pariyattidhammo. ^b^sīlena ādikalyāṇo^eb^ sīlamūlakattā sāsanassa. samathādīhi ^b^majjhekalyāṇo^eb^ tesaṃ sāsanasampattiyā vemajjhabhāvato. ^b^nibbānena pariyosānakalyāṇo^eb^ tadadhigamato uttarikaraṇīyābhāvato. sāsane sammāpaṭipatti nāma paññāya hoti, tassā ca sīlaṃ, samādhi ca mūlanti āha ^b^``sīlasamādhīhi ādikalyāṇo''^eb^ti. paññā pana anubodhapaṭivedhavasena duvidhāti tadubhayampi gaṇhanto ^b^``vipassanāmaggehi majjhekalyāṇo''^eb^ti āha. tassa nipphatti phalaṃ, kiccaṃ nibbānasacchikiriyā, tato paraṃ kattabbaṃ natthīti dassento āha ^b^``phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo''^eb^ti. phalaggahaṇena vā saupādisesanibbānamāha, itarena itaraṃ, tadubhayañca sāsanasampattiyā osānanti āha ^b^``phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo''^eb^ti.

[03] buddhassa subodhitā sammāsambuddhatā, tāya ^b^ādikalyāṇo^eb^ tappabhavattā. sabbaso saṃkilesappahānaṃ vodānaṃ, pāripūrī ca dhammasudhammatā, tāya ^b^majjhekalyāṇo^eb^ taṃsarīrattā. satthārā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ tathā paṭipatti ^b^saṅghasuppaṭipatti,^eb^ tāya ^b^pariyosānakalyāṇo,^eb^ tāya sāsanassa loke suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato. ^b^ta^eb^nti sāsanadhammaṃ. ^b^tathattāyā^eb^ti yathattāya bhagavatā dhammo desito, tathattāya tathabhāvāya. so pana abhisambodhi paccekabodhi sāvakabodhīti tividho ^a^M1.0270^ea^, ito aññathā nibbānādhigamassa abhāvato. tattha sabbaguṇehi aggabhāvato, itarabodhidvayamūlatāya ca paṭhamāya bodhiyā ^b^ādikalyāṇatā,^eb^ guṇehi vemajjhabhāvato dutiyāya ^b^majjhekalyāṇatā,^eb^ tadubhayāvaratāya, tadosānatāya ca sāsanadhammassa tatiyāya ^b^pariyosānakalyāṇatā^eb^ vuttā.
[03] ^b^eso^eb^ti sāsanadhammo. ^b^nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato^eb^ti vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā saddhammaṃ suṇantassa nīvaraṇānaṃ vikkhambhanasambhavato. vuttaṃ hetaṃ --
[02] ``yathā yathāvuso, bhikkhuno satthā vā dhammaṃ deseti, aññataro vā garuṭṭhāniyo sabrahmacārī ^a^V1.0255^ea^, tathā tathā so tattha labhati atthavedaṃ labhati dhammaveda''nti (a0 ni0 5.26).
[02] ``yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvako ohitasoto dhammaṃ suṇāti, pañcassa nīvaraṇāni tasmiṃ samaye pahīnāni hontī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.219) --
[25] ca ādi. ^b^samathavipassanāsukhāvahanato^eb^ti samathasukhassa ca vipassanāsukhassa ca sampādanato. vuttampi cetaṃ --
[02] ``so vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukha''ntiādi (dī0 ni0 1.279; ma0 ni0 2.138).
[25] tathā --
[21] ``yato yato sammasati, khandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ.
[27] labhatī pītipāmojjaṃ, amataṃ taṃ vijānataṃ.
[22] amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato''ti ca.. (dha0 pa0 374, 373).

[03] ^b^tathāpaṭipanno^eb^ti yathā samathavipassanāsukhaṃ āvahati, yathā vā satthārā anusiṭṭhaṃ, tathā paṭipanno sāsanadhammo. ^b^tādibhāvāvahanato^eb^ti chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvassa lokadhammehi anupalepassa āvahanato. esa bhagavā vuttanayena tividhakalyāṇaṃ dhammaṃ desento yaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ, maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti, taṃ yathānurūpaṃ atthasampattiyā sātthaṃ, byañjanasampattiyā sabyañjananti yojanā.

[03] tattha ^a^M1.0271^ea^ avisesena tisso sikkhā, sakalo ca tantidhammo ^b^sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ^eb^. yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``katamesānaṃ kho, bhante, buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ naciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī''tiādi (pārā0 18). sabbasikkhānaṃ maṇḍabhūtasikkhattayasaṅgahito ariyamaggo ^b^maggabrahmacariyaṃ^eb^. yaṃ sandhāya ^a^V1.0256^ea^ vuttaṃ ``khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīya''nti (mahāva0 23; saṃ0 ni0 5.186). ^b^yathānurūpa^eb^nti yathārahaṃ. sikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ hi sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ atthasampattiyā ^b^sātthaṃ^eb^. maggabrahmacariye vattabbameva natthi. ^b^atthasampattiyā^eb^ti sampannatthatāya. sampattiattho hi idha saha-saddo. itaraṃ pana yathāvuttenatthena ^b^sātthaṃ, sabyañjana^eb^ñca. ye panettha ``vacanasabhāvaṃ ^b^sātthaṃ,^eb^ atthasabhāvaṃ ^b^sabyañjana''^eb^nti vibhajitvā vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ, tathā vibhattassa pariyattidhammassa abhāvato. saddatthā hi abhinnarūpā viya hutvā viniyogaṃ gacchanti. tathā hi nesaṃ lokiyāmissībhāvaṃ paṭijānanti. satipi vā bhede ``sabyañjana''nti ettha yadi tulyayogo adhippeto ``saputto āgato''tiādīsu viya, evaṃ sati ``atthapaṭisaraṇā, bhikkhave, hotha, mā byañjanapaṭisaraṇā''ti atthappadhānavādo bādhito siyā, atha vijjamānatāmattaṃ ``salomako sapakkhako''tiādīsu viya byañjanasampatti aggahitā siyā. tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo.

[03] ^b^sātthaṃ sabyañjana^eb^nti ettha nettinayenāpi atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``saṅkāsana...pe0... sabyañjana''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. tattha yadipi nettiyaṃ byañjanamukhena byañjanatthaggahaṇaṃ hotīti ``akkharaṃ pada''ntiādinā (netti0 4 dvādasapada) byañjanapadāni paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhāni, idha pana pāḷiyaṃ ``sātthaṃ sabyañjana''nti āgatattā atthapadāniyeva paṭhamaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``saṅkāsanapakāsanā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha saṅkhepato kāsanaṃ dīpanaṃ ^b^saṅkāsanaṃ^eb^ ``maññamāno bhikkhu baddho mārassa, amaññamāno mutto''tiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 3.64) viya. tattakena hi tena bhikkhunā paṭividdhaṃ. tenāha ``aññātaṃ bhagavā''tiādi. paṭhamaṃ kāsanaṃ ^b^pakāsanaṃ^eb^. ādikammasmiṃ hi ayaṃ ^b^pa^eb^saddo ``paññapeti paṭṭhapetī''tiādīsu (saṃ0 ni0 2.20) viya. tikkhindriyāpekkhaṃ cetaṃ padadvayaṃ uddesabhāvato. tikkhindriyo hi saṅkhepato paṭhamañca vuttamatthaṃ paṭipajjati ^a^M1.0272^ea^. saṃkhittassa vitthāravacanaṃ, sakiṃ vuttassa puna vacanañca ^b^vivaraṇavibhajanāni^eb^. yathā ``kusalā dhammā''ti saṅkhepato sakiṃyeva ca vuttassa atthassa ``katame dhammā kusalā? yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ citta''ntiādinā (dha0 sa0 1) vitthārato vivaraṇavasena, vibhajanavasena ca puna vacanaṃ. majjhimindriyāpekkhametaṃ padadvayaṃ niddesabhāvato. vivaṭassa vitthāratarābhidhānaṃ, vibhattassa ca pakārehi ñāpanaṃ veneyyānaṃ cittaparitosanaṃ ^b^uttānīkaraṇapaññāpanāni^eb^. yathā ``phasso hotī''tiādinā (dha0 sa0 2) vivaṭavibhattassa atthassa ``katamo tasmiṃ samaye phasso? yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā''tiādinā ^a^V1.0257^ea^ (dha0 sa0 2) uttānīkiriyā, paññāpanā ca. mudindriyāpekkhametaṃ padadvayaṃ paṭiniddesabhāvato. ``paññāpanapaṭṭhapanavivaraṇavibhajanauttānīkaraṇapakāsanātthapadasamāyogato''tipi pāṭho.
[03] kathaṃ panāyaṃ pāṭhavikappo jātoti? vuccate -- nettipāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena purimapāṭho. tattha hi --
[21] ``saṅkāsanā pakāsanā,
[27] vivaraṇā vibhajanuttānīkammapaññatti.
[26] etehi chahi padehi,
[22] attho kammañca niddiṭṭha''nti.. (netti0 4 dvādasapada) --

[25] desanāhārayojanāya ca etassevatthassa ``saṅkāsanā pakāsanā''tiādinā āgataṃ. pacchimo pana ``paññapeti paṭṭhapeti vivarati vibhajati uttānīkaroti `passathā'ti cāhā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 2.20) sutte āgatanayena byañjanamattakato. evañca nesaṃ dvinnaṃ pāṭhānaṃ viseso, na atthato. tathā hi saṅkhepato ``paṭhamaṃ ñāpanaṃ ^b^paññāpanaṃ,^eb^ paṭhamameva ṭhapanaṃ ^b^paṭṭhapana''^eb^nti imāni padāni saṅkāsanapakāsanapadehi atthato avisiṭṭhāni. yañca purimapāṭhe chaṭṭhaṃ padaṃ ``pakārato ñāpana''nti paññāpanaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ dutiyapāṭhe pakāsanapadena ``nibbisesaṃ pakārato kāsana''nti katvā. yasmā ñāpanakāsanāni atthāvabhāsanasabhāvatāya abhinnāni, sabbesañca veneyyānaṃ cittassa tosanaṃ, buddhiyā ca nisānaṃ yāthāvato vatthusabhāvāvabhāsane jāyatīti. evaṃ atthapadarūpattā pariyattiatthassa yathāvuttachātthapadasamāyogato ^b^sātthaṃ^eb^ sāsanaṃ.

[03] ^b^akkharapadabyañjanākāraniruttiniddesasampattiyā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0273^ea^ ettha uccāraṇavelāyaṃ apariyosite pade vaṇṇo ^b^akkharaṃ^eb^. ``ekakkharaṃ padaṃ akkhara''nti eke ``ā evaṃ kira ta''ntiādīsu ā-kārādayo viya. ``visuddhakaraṇānaṃ manasā desanāvācāya akkharaṇato akkhara''nti aññe. vibhattiyantaṃ atthañāpanato ^b^padaṃ^eb^. saṅkhepato vuttaṃ padābhihitaṃ atthaṃ byañjetīti ^b^byañjanaṃ,^eb^ vākyaṃ. ``kiriyāpadaṃ abyayakārakavisesanayuttaṃ vākya''nti hi vadanti. pakārato vākyavibhāgo ^a^V1.0258^ea^ ^b^ākāro^eb^. ākārābhihitaṃ nibbacanaṃ ^b^nirutti^eb^. nibbacanavitthāro nissesupadesato ^b^niddeso^eb^. etesaṃ akkharādīnaṃ byañjanapadānaṃ sampattiyā sampannatāya ^b^sabyañjanaṃ^eb^.

[03] tatrāyamassa atthapadasamāyogo, byañjanasampatti ca -- akkharehi saṅkāseti, padehi pakāseti, byañjanehi vivarati, ākārehi vibhajati, niruttīhi uttānīkaroti, niddesehi paññapeti, tathā akkharehi ugghāṭetvā padehi vineti ugghaṭitaññuṃ, byañjanehi vipañcetvā ākārehi vineti vipañcitaññuṃ, niruttīhi netvā niddesehi vineti neyyaṃ. evañcāyaṃ dhammo ugghaṭiyamāno ugghaṭitaññuṃ vineti, vipañciyamāno vipañcitaññuṃ, niyyamāno neyyaṃ. tattha ugghaṭanā ādi, vipañcanā majjhe, nayanamante. evaṃ tīsu kālesu tidhā desito dosattayavidhamano guṇattayāvaho tividhaveneyyavinayanoti. evampi tividhakalyāṇoyaṃ dhammo atthabyañjanapāripūriyā ``sāttho sabyañjano''ti veditabbo ``paripuṇṇo, parisuddho''ti ca.

[03] ^b^atthagambhīratā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^attho^eb^ nāma tantiattho. ^b^dhammo^eb^ tanti. ^b^paṭivedho^eb^ tantiyā, tantiatthassa ca yathābhūtāvabodho. ^b^desanā^eb^ manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanā. te panete atthādayo yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā, alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca, tasmā ^b^gambhīrā^eb^. atha vā ^b^attho^eb^ nāma hetuphalaṃ. ^b^dhammo^eb^ hetu. ^b^desanā^eb^ paññatti, yathādhammaṃ dhammābhilāpo, anulomapaṭilomasaṅkhepavitthārādivasena vā kathanaṃ. ^b^paṭivedho^eb^ abhisamayo, atthānurūpaṃ dhammesu, dhammānurūpaṃ atthesu, paññattipathānurūpaṃ paññattīsu avabodho, tesaṃ tesaṃ vā dhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo salakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo. tepi cete atthādayo yasmā anupacitakusalasambhārehi duppaññehi ^a^M1.0274^ea^ sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo dukkhogāhā, alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca, tasmā ^b^gambhīrā^eb^. tesu paṭivedhassāpi atthasannissitattā vuttaṃ ^b^``atthagambhīratāpaṭivedhagambhīratāhi sāttha''^eb^nti atthaguṇadīpanato. tāsaṃ dhammadesanānaṃ byañjanasannissitattā vuttaṃ ^b^``dhammagambhīratādesanāgambhīratāhi sabyañjana''^eb^nti tāsaṃ byañjanasampattidīpanato.

[03] atthesu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ ^b^atthapaṭisambhidā^eb^. atthadhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāsu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ ^b^paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā^eb^ti imissāpi paṭisambhidāya atthavisayattā āha ^b^``atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāvisayato sāttha''^eb^nti, atthasampattiyā asati tadabhāvato. ^b^dhammo^eb^ti tanti ^a^V1.0259^ea^. ^b^niruttī^eb^ti tantipadānaṃ niddhāretvā vacanaṃ. tattha pabhedagatāni ñāṇāni dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāti āha ^b^``dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāvisayato sabyañjana^eb^nti, asati byañjanasampattiyā tadabhāvato. ^b^parikkhakajanappasādaka^eb^nti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo hetuattho. yasmā parikkhakajanānaṃ kiṃkusalagavesīnaṃ pasādāvahaṃ, tasmā ^b^sātthaṃ^eb^. atthasampannanti phalena hetuno anumānaṃ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhippavattiyā. sātthakatā panassa paṇḍitavedanīyatāya, sā paramagambhīrasaṇhasukhumabhāvato veditabbā. vuttañhetaṃ ``gambhīro duddaso''tiādi (mahāva0 8). ^b^lokiyajanappasādakanti sabyañjana^eb^nti yasmā lokiyajanassa pasādāvahaṃ, tasmā ^b^sabyañjanaṃ^eb^. lokiyajano hi byañjanasampattiyā tussati, idhāpi phalena hetuno anumānaṃ. sabyañjanatā panassa saddheyyatāya, sā ādikalyāṇādibhāvato veditabbā.

[03] atha vā ^b^paṇḍitavedanīyato sāttha''^eb^nti paññāpadaṭṭhānatāya atthasampannataṃ āha, tato parikkhakajanappasādakaṃ. ^b^saddheyyato sabyañjana^eb^nti saddhāpadaṭṭhānatāya byañjanasampannataṃ, tato lokiyajanappasādakanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^gambhīrādhippāyato sāttha^eb^nti adhippāyato agādhāpāratāya atthasampannaṃ aññathā tadabhāvato. ^b^uttānapadato sabyañjana^eb^nti subodhasaddatāya byañjanasampannaṃ, paramagambhīrassapi atthassa veneyyānaṃ suviññeyyabhāvāpādanato. sabbopesa paṭhamassa atthadvayassa pabhedo daṭṭhabbo, tathā ceva tattha tattha saṃvaṇṇitaṃ. tathā hettha ^a^M1.0275^ea^ vikappassa, samuccayassa vā aggahaṇaṃ. ^b^upanetabbassā^eb^ti pakkhipitabbassa vodānatthassa avuttassa ^b^abhāvato. sakalaparipuṇṇabhāvenā^eb^ti sabbabhāgehi paripuṇṇatāya. ^b^apanetabbassā^eb^ti saṃkilesadhammassa.

[03] ^b^paṭipattiyā^eb^ti sīlavisuddhiyādisammāpaṭipattiyā, tannimittaṃ. ^b^adhigamabyattito^eb^ti saccapaṭivedhena adhigamaveyyattiyasabbhāvato ^b^sātthaṃ^eb^ kapilavatādi viya tucchaṃ niratthakaṃ ahutvā atthasampannanti katvā. ^b^pariyattiyā^eb^ti pariyattidhammaparicayena. ^b^āgamabyattito^eb^ti durakkhātadhammesu paricayaṃ karontassa viya sammohaṃ ajanetvā bāhusaccaveyyattiyasabbhāvato ^b^sabyañcanaṃ^eb^. byañjanasampattiyā hi sati āgamabyattīti. ^b^sīlādipañcadhammakkhandhayuttato^eb^ti sīlādīhi pañcahi dhammakoṭṭhāsehi avirahitattā. ^b^kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ^eb^ anavasesena samantato puṇṇaṃ pūritaṃ. ^b^nirupakkilesato^eb^ti diṭṭhimānādiupakkilesābhāvato. ^b^nittharaṇatthāyā^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇāya. ^b^lokāmisanirapekkhato^eb^ti kathañcipi taṇhāsannissayassa anissayanato.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V1.0260^ea^ ādikalyāṇatādiapadesena satthu purimavesārajjadvayavasena dhammassa svākkhātataṃ vibhāvetvā idāni pacchimavesārajjadvayavasenāpi taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``atthavipallāsābhāvato vā suṭṭhu akkhātoti svākkhāto''^eb^ti vatvā tamatthaṃ byatirekamukhena vibhāvento ^b^``yathā hī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^vipallāsamāpajjatī^eb^ti tesaṃ dhamme ``antarāyikā''ti vuttadhammānaṃ vipākādīnaṃ antarāyikattābhāvato ekaṃsena apāyūpapattihetutāya abhāvato. ^b^niyyānikattābhāvato^eb^ti atammayatābhāvato, saṃsārato ca niyyānikāti vuttadhammānaṃ ekaccayaññakiriyāpakatipurisantaraññāṇādīnaṃ tato niyyānikattābhāvato viparīto eva hoti. ^b^tenā^eb^ti atthassa vipallāsāpajjanena. ^b^te^eb^ aññatitthiyā. ^b^tathābhāvānatikkamanato^eb^ti kammantarāyādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ antarāyikabhāvassa ariyamaggadhammānaṃ niyyānikabhāvassa kadācipi anativattanato.

[03] ^b^nibbānānurūpāya paṭipattiyā^eb^ti adhigantabbassa sabbasaṅkhatavinissaṭassa nibbānassa anurūpāya sabbasaṅkhāranissaraṇūpāyabhūtāya sapubbabhāgāya sammāpaṭipattiyā ^a^M1.0276^ea^ akkhātattāti yojanā. ^b^paṭipadānurūpassā^eb^ti sabbadukkhaniyyānikabhūtā ārammaṇakaraṇamattenāpi kilesehi anāmasanīyā yādisī paṭipadā, tadanurūpassa. ^b^supaññattā^eb^ti sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgahitā sammādiṭṭhiādippabhedā micchādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pahāyikabhāvena suṭṭhu sammadeva vihitā. ^b^saṃsandati^eb^ kilesamalavisuddhitāya ^b^sameti^eb^. evaṃ magganibbānānaṃ paṭipadāpaṭipajjanīyabhāvehi aññamaññānurūpatāya svākkhātataṃ dassetvā idāni tividhassāpi lokuttaradhammassa paccekaṃ svākkhātataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``ariyamaggo cetthā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^antadvaya^eb^nti sassatucchedaṃ, kāmasukhāttakilamathānuyogaṃ, līnuddhaccaṃ, patiṭṭhānāyūhananti evaṃ pabhedaṃ antadvayaṃ. ^b^anupagammā^eb^ti anupagantvā, anupagamanahetu vā. ^b^paṭipassaddhakilesānī^eb^ti suṭṭhu vūpasantakilesāni, paṭipassaddhippahānavasena sammadeva pahīnadosāni. ^b^sassatādisabhāvavasenā^eb^ti ``sassatañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi amatañca tāṇañca leṇañcā''tiādinā tesu tesu suttesu sassatādibhāvakittanavasena.

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ ^b^``rāgādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ karontena ariyapuggalena sāmaṃ daṭṭhabbo''^eb^ti iminā ``ariyamaggena mama rāgādayo pahīnā''ti sayaṃ attanā anaññaneyyena daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhi, sandiṭṭhi eva ^b^sandiṭṭhiko^eb^.

[03] ^b^tena^eb^ ^a^V1.0261^ea^ ^b^tena^eb^ ariyasāvakena ^b^parasaddhāya^eb^ parassa saddahanena paraneyyena ^b^gantabbataṃ hitvā^eb^ ñāpetabbataṃ pahāya ^b^paccavekkhaṇañāṇena^eb^ karaṇabhūtena. ^b^pasatthā diṭṭhi sandiṭṭhi^eb^ yathā sambojjhaṅgo. ariyamaggo attanā sampayuttāya sandiṭṭhiyā kilese jayati, ariyaphalaṃ tāya eva attano kāraṇabhūtāya, nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇena attano visayībhūtāya sandiṭṭhiyā kilese jayatīti yojanā.

[03] ^b^bhāvanābhisamayavasena^eb^ maggadhammo. ^b^sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena^eb^ nibbānadhammo. phalampi heṭṭhimaṃ sakadāgāmivipassanādīnaṃ paccayabhāvena upari maggādhigamassa upanissayabhāvato pariyāyato ^b^``dissamāno vaṭṭabhayaṃ nivattetī''^eb^ti vattabbataṃ labhati.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ ^b^nāssa^eb^ ^a^M1.0277^ea^ ^b^kālo^eb^ti nāssa āgametabbo kālo atthi. yathā hi lokiyakusalassa ``upapajje, aparapariyāye''tiādinā phaladānaṃ pati āgametabbo kālo atthi, na evametassāti attho. tenāha ^b^``na pañcāhā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^pakaṭṭho^eb^ti dūro. phaladānaṃ pati kālo pakaṭṭho assāti ^b^kāliko,^eb^ kālantaraphaladāyī. tenāha ^b^``attano phaladāne''^eb^ti. ^b^patto^eb^ti upanīto. ^b^ida^eb^nti ``akāliko''ti padaṃ.

[03] 150^b^.^eb^ ^b^vidhi^eb^nti vidhānaṃ, ``ehi passā''ti evaṃpavattavidhivacanaṃ. ^b^vijjamānattā^eb^ti paramatthato upalabbhamānattā. ^b^parisuddhattā^eb^ti kilesamalavirahena sabbathā visuddhattā. amanuññampi kadāci payojanavasena yathāsabhāvappakāsanena dassetabbaṃ bhaveyyāti tadabhāvaṃ dassento āha ^b^``manuññabhāvappakāsanenā''^eb^ti.

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ upanetabboti upaneyyo, upaneyyova opaneyyikoti imassa atthassa adhippetattā āha ^b^``upanetabboti opaneyyiko''^eb^ti. citte upanayanaṃ uppādananti āha ^b^``idaṃ saṅkhate lokuttaradhamme yujjatī''^eb^ti. ^b^citte upanayana^eb^nti pana ārammaṇabhūtassa dhammassa ārammaṇabhāvūpanayane adhippete asaṅkhatepi yujjeyya ``ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^upanayanaṃ arahatīti opaneyyiko''^eb^ti. ^b^allīyana^eb^nti phusanaṃ. ^b^nibbānaṃ upaneti^eb^ ariyapuggalanti adhippāyo.

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ ^b^viññūhī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0262^ea^ vidūhi, paṭividdhasaccehīti attho. te pana ekaṃsato ugghaṭitaññūādayo hontīti āha ^b^``ugghaṭitaññūādīhī''^eb^ti. ^b^``paccatta''^eb^nti etassa ``pati attanī''ti bhummavasena attho gahetabboti āha ^b^``attani attanī''^eb^ti. ^b^veditabbo^eb^ti vuttaṃ, kathaṃ veditabboti āha ^b^``bhāvito me''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^``me''^eb^ti iminā ``paccatta''nti padena vuttamatthaṃ anvayato dassetvā puna byatirekena dassetuṃ ^b^``na hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva. ^b^``viññūhī''^eb^ti idaṃ antogadhāvadhāraṇanti dassento ^b^``bālānaṃ pana avisayo cesā''^eb^ti āha.

[03] evaṃ ādikalyāṇatādinā aññamaññassa anurūpadesanāya dhammassa svākkhātataṃ dassetvā idāni purimassa purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ padaṃ kāraṇavacananti dassento ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sandiṭṭhikattā^eb^ti yasmā ^a^M1.0278^ea^ ayaṃ dhammo vuttanayena sāmaṃ daṭṭhabbo, sandiṭṭhiyā kilese viddhaṃseti, sandassanañca arahati, tasmā ^b^svākkhāto^eb^ durakkhāte titthiyadhamme tadabhāvato. iminā nayena sesapadesupi yathārahaṃ attho daṭṭhabbo.
[03] 153^b^.^eb^ ^b^tasseva^eb^ntiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ buddhānussatiyaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ ^b^ariyasaṅghaguṇā^eb^ti ārakattā kilesehi, anaye na iriyanato, aye ca iriyanato, sadevakena ca lokena ``saraṇa''nti araṇīyato ariyo ca so saṅgho ca, ariyānaṃ vā saṅgho ariyasaṅgho, tassa guṇā.

[03] 155^b^.^eb^ yaṃ sammāpaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno ``suṭṭhu paṭipanno''ti vuccati. sā ariyamaggapaṭipadā paṭipakkhadhamme anivattidhamme katvā pajahanato payojanābhāvā sayampi anivattidhammā, adhigantabbassa ca nibbānassa ekaṃsato anulomīti. tato eva apaccanīkā, anudhammabhūtā ca, tassā ^b^ca^eb^ paṭipannattā ariyasaṅgho ``suppaṭipanno''ti vuttoti dassetuṃ ^b^``suṭṭhu paṭipanno''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^``anivattipaṭipada''^eb^nti iminā ujuppaṭipattiṃ dasseti. punappunaṃ nivattane hi sati ujuppaṭipatti na hoti. ^b^``anulomapaṭipadaṃ apaccanīkapaṭipada''^eb^nti ^a^V1.0263^ea^ iminā ñāyappaṭipattiṃ. paṭipajjitabbassa hi nibbānassa anulomanena, apaccanīkatāya cassā ñāyato. ^b^``dhammānudhammapaṭipada''^eb^nti iminā sāmīcippaṭipattiṃ anucchavikabhāvadīpanato. etena paṭhamapadassa papañcaniddeso, itarāni tīṇi padānīti dasseti. tenāha ^b^``yasmā panā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjanena kiccasiddhito ariyabhāvāvahaṃ savanaṃ sakkaccasavanaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ ^b^``sakkaccaṃ suṇantīti sāvakā''^eb^ti, tena ariyā eva nippariyāyato satthu sāvakā nāmāti dasseti. ^b^sīladiṭṭhisāmaññatāyā^eb^ti ariyena sīlena, ariyāya ca diṭṭhiyā samānabhāvena. ariyānañhi sīladiṭṭhiyo majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ninnānākaraṇaṃ maggenāgatattā. tena ^a^M1.0279^ea^ te yattha katthaci ṭhitāpi saṃhatāva. tenāha ^b^``saṅghātabhāvamāpanno''^eb^ti. māyāsāṭheyyādipāpadhammasamucchedena ^b^uju^eb^. tato eva gomuttavaṅkābhāvena ^b^avaṅkā^eb^. candalekhāvaṅkābhāvena ^b^akuṭilā^eb^. naṅgalakoṭivaṅkābhāvena ^b^ajimhā^eb^. avaṅkādibhāvena vā ^b^uju^eb^. parisuddhaṭṭhena ^b^ariyā^eb^. apaṇṇakabhāvena ñāyati kamati nibbānaṃ, taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti ^b^ñāyo^eb^. vaṭṭadukkhaniyyānāya ^b^anucchavikattā^eb^. anurūpattā ^b^sāmīci^eb^ opāyikātipi ^b^saṅkhaṃ^eb^ samaññaṃ ^b^gatā^eb^ sammāpaṭipatti, tāya samaṅgitāya ^b^suppaṭipannā^eb^ ``sammā paṭipajjantī''ti katvā. vattamānattho hi ayaṃ ^b^paṭipanna^eb^-saddo yathā ``sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno''ti (pu0 pa0 206). ^b^atītaṃ paṭipada^eb^nti yathāvuttamaggasammāpaṭipattiṃ vadati. ubhayena ca sāmaññaniddesena, ``suppaṭipannā ca suppaṭipannā ca suppaṭipannā''ti ekasesanayena vā gahitānaṃ samūho ``suppaṭipanno''ti vuttoti dasseti.

[03] evaṃ ādipadatthaniddesabhāvena itarapadānaṃ atthaṃ vatvā idāni catunnampi padānaṃ avomissakaṃ atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^yathānusiṭṭha^eb^nti satthārā yathā anusiṭṭhaṃ, tathā anusāsanīanurūpanti attho. ^b^apaṇṇakapaṭipada^eb^nti avirajjhanakapaṭipadaṃ, anavajjapaṭipattinti attho. ettha ca svākkhāte dhammavinaye apaṇṇakapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannattāti evaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ. purimapadena sambandhe dutiyapadaṃ na vattabbaṃ siyā, nanu ca dutiyapadena sambandhepi paṭhamaṃ padaṃ na vattabbaṃ siyāti? na tassa paṭhamaṃ apekkhitattā. sā pana sāvakānaṃ apaṇṇakapaṭipadā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipadāti dassanatthaṃ ``yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipannattā''ti vattabbaṃ ^a^V1.0264^ea^. ubhayassāpi vā suppaṭipannabhāvasādhanattā ubhayaṃ vuttaṃ. tathā hi pi-saddena ubhayaṃ samuccinoti.
[03] kilesajimhavasena antadvayagāhoti sabbaso taṃ pahāya sammāpaṭipadā kāyādivaṅkappahāyinī ujuppaṭipatti hotīti āha ^b^``majjhimāya paṭipadāya...pe0... ujuppaṭipanno''^eb^ti.
