[03] ñāyo nāma yuttappattapaṭipatti, nibbānañca, sabbasaṅkhārasamathatāya ādittaṃ celaṃ, sīsaṃ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi paṭipajjitabbamevāti āha ^b^``ñāyo vuccati nibbāna''^eb^nti. nibbāyanakiriyāmukhena cettha nibbānaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ ^a^M1.0280^ea^, maggañāṇādīhi vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati sacchikarīyati cāti ^b^ñāyo nibbāna^eb^nti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
[01] guṇasambhāvanāya parehi kayiramānaṃ paccupaṭṭhānādisāmīcikammaṃ arahantīti ^b^sāmīcikammārahā^eb^.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ ^b^yadida^eb^nti antogadhaliṅgavacanabhedo nipātoti tassa vacanabhedena atthamāha ^b^``yā imānī''^eb^ti. ^b^eva^eb^nti pakāratthe nipāto, iminā pakārenāti attho. tena itarāni tīṇi yugaḷāni dassitāni hontīti āha ^b^``evaṃ cattāri purisayugaḷāni hontī''^eb^ti. ^b^eta^eb^nti etaṃ ``purisapuggalā''ti bahuvacanavasena vuttaṃ padaṃ. purisā ca te puggalā ca ^b^purisapuggalā^eb^. tattha ^b^``purisā''^eb^ti iminā paṭhamāya pakatiyā gahaṇaṃ, ^b^``puggalā''^eb^ti pana dutiyāyapi sattasāmaññenāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ^eb^ kīdisānaṃ? ānetvā hunitabbānanti adhikārato pākaṭoyamattho. ^b^dātabba^eb^nti vā paccattavacanaṃ ``catunnaṃ paccayāna''nti padaṃ apekkhitvā sāmivasena pariṇāmetabbaṃ, aññathā yesaṃ kesañci catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ ``āhuna''nti samaññā siyā. āhunaṃ arahatīti vā ^b^āhuneyyo. sakkādīnampi vā āhavana^eb^nti sakkādīhipi diyyamānaṃ dānaṃ. ^b^yattha hutaṃ mahapphala^eb^nti yasmiṃ āvahanīyaggimhi hutaṃ dadhiādi āhuneyyaggigahapataggidakkhiṇeyyaggīsu hutato uḷāraphalanti ^b^tesaṃ^eb^ brāhmaṇānaṃ ^b^laddhi. huta^eb^nti dinnaṃ. ^b^nikāyantare^eb^ti sabbatthikavādinikāye.

[03] ^b^ṭhapetvā^eb^ 165 ^b^te^eb^ti te piyamanāpe ñātimitte apanetvā, tesaṃ adatvāti adhippāyo. ^b^esa^eb^ eso. ^b^ekabuddhantare ca dissatī^eb^ti ekasmiṃ buddhantare vītivatte dissati. ^b^ca^eb^-saddena kadāci asaṅkhyeyyepi kappe vītivatteti dasseti. ^b^abbokiṇṇa^eb^nti paṭipakkhehi avomissaṃ, kiriyāvisesakañcetaṃ. ^b^piyamanāpattakaradhammā^eb^ nāma sīlādayo, te ariyasaṅghe suppatiṭṭhitā. ayaṃ hettha adhippāyo -- ñātimittā vippayuttā na cirasseva samāgacchanti, anavaṭṭhitā ca tesu piyamanāpatā, na evamariyasaṅgho. tasmā saṅghova ^b^pāhuneyyo^eb^ti. ^b^pubbakāra^eb^nti aggakiriyaṃ. ^b^sabbappakārenā^eb^ti ādaragāravabahumānādinā, deyyadhammassa sakkaccakaraṇādinā ^a^M1.0281^ea^ ca sabbena pakārena. svāyaṃ ^b^pāhavanīya^eb^-saddo ``pāhuneyyo''ti vuccati pariyāyabhāvena.

[03] dakkhanti etāya sattā yathādhippetāhi sampattīhi vaḍḍhantīti ^b^dakkhiṇā^eb^. tathābhāvakaraṇena ^b^dakkhiṇaṃ arahati^eb^. yathā uḷārātivipuludrayalābhena visodhitaṃ nāma hoti, evaṃ dakkhiṇā vipulaphalatāyāti vuttaṃ ^b^``mahapphalakaraṇatāya visodhetī''^eb^ti.
[03] puññatthikehi añjali karaṇīyā etthāti ^b^añjalikaraṇīyo^eb^.

[03] yadipi pāḷiyaṃ ``anuttara''nti vuttaṃ. natthi ito uttaraṃ visiṭṭhanti hi ^b^anuttaraṃ^eb^. samampissa pana natthīti dassento ^b^``asadisa''^eb^nti āha. khittaṃ vuttaṃ bījaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena tāyati rakkhati, khipanti vapanti ettha bījānīti vā khettaṃ, kedārādi, khettaṃ viya khettaṃ, puññānaṃ khettaṃ ^b^puññakkhettaṃ^eb^. sesaṃ buddhānussatiyaṃ vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ.

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ aho vata sīlāni akhaṇḍāni, aho vata acchiddānīti evaṃ sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. ^b^aho vatā^eb^ti ca sambhāvane nipāto. tenāha ^b^``akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasenā''^eb^ti. akhaṇḍabhāvādisampattivasenāti attho. parassa sīlāni anussariyamānāni piyamanāpabhāvāvahanena kevalaṃ mettāya padaṭṭhānaṃ honti, na visuṃ kammaṭṭhānanti āha ^b^``attano sīlāni anussaritabbānī''^eb^ti. ^b^cāgā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^yesa^eb^nti ^a^V1.0266^ea^ sīlādīnaṃ. paṭipāṭiyā samādāne samādānakkamena, ekajjhaṃ samādāne uddesakkamena sīlānaṃ ādiantaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^pariyante chinnasāṭako viyā^eb^ti vatthante, dasante vā chinnavatthaṃ viya, visadisūdāharaṇaṃ cetaṃ. evaṃ sesānipi udāharaṇāni. vinivedhavasena chinnasāṭako ^b^vinividdhasāṭako^eb^. visabhāgavaṇṇena gāvī viyāti sambandho. sabalarahitāni vā ^b^asabalāni^eb^. tathā ^b^akammāsāni^eb^. sattavidhamethunasaṃyogo heṭṭhā sīlakathāyaṃ vutto eva. ^b^kodhūpanāhādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena makkhapaḷāsaissāmacchariyamāyāsāṭheyyamānātimānādayo gahitā. ^b^tāniyeva^eb^ akhaṇḍādiguṇāni sīlāni. sīlassa ^b^taṇhādāsabyato^eb^ ^a^M1.0282^ea^ mocanaṃ vivaṭṭūpanissayabhāvāpādanaṃ. tato eva taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo serī sayaṃvasī bhujisso nāma hoti. tenāha ^b^``bhujissabhāvakaraṇena bhujissānī''^eb^ti. ``imināhaṃ sīlena devo vā bhaveyyaṃ devaññataro vā, tattha nicco dhuvo sassato''ti, ``sīlena suddhī''ti ca evamādinā ^b^taṇhādiṭṭhīhi^eb^ aparāmaṭṭhattā ^b^ayaṃ te sīlesu doso^eb^ti catūsu vipattīsu yāya kāyaci vipattiyā dassanena ^b^parāmaṭṭhuṃ^eb^ anuddhaṃsetuṃ. samādhisaṃvattanappayojanāni ^b^samādhisaṃvattanikāni^eb^.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ ^b^sikkhāya sagāravo^eb^ti sīladhanaṃ nissāya paṭiladdhasamādānattā sātisayaṃ sikkhāya sagāravo sappatisso hoti. ^b^sabhāgavuttī^eb^ti sampannasīlehi sabhāgavuttiko, tāya eva vā sikkhāya sabhāgavutti. yo hi sikkhāgāravarahito, so tāya visabhāgavutti nāma hoti vilomanato. yathā parehi saddhiṃ attano chiddaṃ na hoti, evaṃ dhammāmisehi paṭisantharaṇaṃ ^b^paṭisanthāro^eb^. sikkhāya sagāravattā eva tattha ^b^appamatto^eb^ hoti. attānuvādabhayaṃ parānuvādabhayaṃ daṇḍabhayaṃ duggatibhayanti evamādīni bhayāni imassa dūrasamussāritānīti āha ^b^``attānuvādādibhayavirahito''^eb^ti. sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ ^b^pakatiyā^eb^ti sabhāvena. ^b^cāgādhimuttenā^eb^ti deyyadhammapariccāge yuttappayuttena tanninnena tappoṇena. niccaṃ sadā pavattā dānasaṃvibhāgā yassa so ^b^niccapavattadānasaṃvibhāgo,^eb^ tena. idhāpi ``pakatiyā''ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. yaṃ parassa paṭiyattaṃ diyyati, taṃ ^b^dānaṃ^eb^. yaṃ attanā paribhuñjitabbato saṃvibhajati, so ^b^saṃvibhāgo. ito dāni pabhutī^eb^ti ito paṭṭhāya dāni ajjatagge ajjadivasaṃ ādiṃ katvā. ^b^adatvā na bhuñjissāmīti^eb^ dāna^b^samādānaṃ^eb^ katvā ^a^V1.0267^ea^. ^b^taṃdivasa^eb^nti tasmiṃ bhāvanārambhadivase. tattha ^b^nimittaṃ gaṇhitvā^eb^ti tasmiṃ dāne pariccāgacetanāya pavattiākārassa sallakkhaṇavasena nimittaṃ gahetvā. ^b^vigatamalamaccheratādiguṇavasenā^eb^ti vigatāni malamaccherāni etasmāti vigatamalamacchero, cāgo, tassa bhāvo ^b^vigatamalamaccheratā^eb^. tadādīnaṃ guṇānaṃ, sampattīnaṃ, ānisaṃsānaṃ vā vasena.

[03] ^b^sataṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0283^ea^ ^b^dhammaṃ anukkama^eb^nti sādhūnaṃ bodhisattānaṃ dhammaṃ paveṇiṃ anu anu kamanto okkamanto, avokkamanto vā. ye ime ^b^dāyakassa lābhā^eb^ āyuvaṇṇasukhabalapaṭibhānādayo, piyabhāvādayo ca bhagavatā ^b^saṃvaṇṇitā^eb^ pakittitā. ^b^manussattaṃ vā^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddo avuttavikappattho, tena indriyapāṭavabhāvakammassakatāñāṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

[01] ^b^maccheramalenā^eb^ti maccherasaṅkhātena malena. atha vā maccherañca malañca maccheramalaṃ, tena maccherena ceva lobhādimalena cāti attho. ^b^pajāyanavasenā^eb^ti yathāsakaṃ kammanibbattanavasena. ^b^kaṇhadhammāna^eb^nti lobhādiekantakāḷakānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ. ^b^vigatattā^eb^ti pahīnattā. ^b^vigatamalamaccherena cetasā^eb^ti itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^sotāpannassa sato^eb^ti gehaṃ āvasantassa sotāpannassa samānassa. ^b^nissayavihāra^eb^nti nissāya viharitabbavihāraṃ, devasikaṃ vaḷañjanakakammaṭṭhānanti attho. ^b^abhibhavitvā^eb^ti agāraṃ āvasantānaṃ aññesaṃ uppajjanakarāgādiupakkilese abhibhuyya.

[03] yo kiñci dentopi sāpekkhova deti, so muttacāgo na hoti, ayaṃ pana na evanti ^b^``muttacāgo''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^vissaṭṭhacāgo^eb^ti nirapekkhapariccāgoti attho. yathā pāṇātipātabahulo puggalo ``lohitapāṇī''ti vuccati, evaṃ dānabahulo puggalo ``payatapāṇī''ti vuttoti dassento ^b^``dātuṃ sadā dhotahatthoyevā''^eb^ti āha. tattha ^b^sadā^eb^ti niccaṃ, abhiṇhanti attho. ^b^pariccāgo^eb^ti deyyadhammapariccāgoti adhikārato viññāyati. ^b^yaṃ yaṃ^eb^ deyyadhammaṃ ^b^pare^eb^ yācanakā. yācane yogo ^b^yācanayogo,^eb^ parehi yācituṃ yuttoti attho. ^b^yājena yutto^eb^ti dānena yutto sadā pariccajanato. ^b^ubhaye^eb^ti yathāvutte dāne, saṃvibhāge ca ^b^rato^eb^ abhirato.

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ yathā parisuddhasīlassa puggalassa akhaṇḍatādiguṇavasena attano sīlassa anussarantassa sīlānussatibhāvanā ijjhati, evaṃ parisuddhauḷārapariccāgassa puggalassa anupakkiliṭṭhameva ^a^V1.0268^ea^ attano pariccāgaṃ anussarantassa bhāvanā ijjhatīti dassetuṃ ^b^``vigatamalamaccheratādiguṇavasenā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ, taṃ vuttatthameva.

[03] ^b^bhiyyoso^eb^ti ^a^M1.0284^ea^ uparipi. ^b^mattāya^eb^ pamāṇassa mahatiyā mattāya, vipulena pamāṇenāti attho. ^b^cāgādhimutto^eb^ti pariccāge adhimutto ninnapoṇapabbhāro. tato eva ^b^alobhajjhāsayo^eb^ katthacipi anabhisaṅgacitto. paṭiggāhakesu mettāyanavasena pariccāgo hotīti ^b^mettāya^eb^ mettābhāvanāya ^b^anulomakārī^eb^ anurūpapaṭipatti. ^b^visārado^eb^ti visado attanova guṇena katthacipi amaṅkubhūto abhibhuyya vihārī. sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ ^b^ariyamaggavasenā^eb^ti ariyamaggassa adhigamavasena. ^b^samudāgatehī^eb^ti sammadeva taduppattito uddhaṃ āgatehi. yādisā hi ariyānaṃ santāne lokiyāpi saddhādayo, na tādisā kadācipi pothujjanikā saddhādayo. dibbantīti ^b^devā^eb^. cattāro mahārājāno etesanti catumahārājā, te eva ^b^cātumahārājikā^eb^. tettiṃsa sahapuññakārino tatthūpapannāti taṃsahacaritaṃ ṭhānaṃ tāvatiṃsaṃ, tannivāsinopi devā taṃsahacaraṇato eva ^b^tāvatiṃsā^eb^. dukkhato yātā apayātāti ^b^yāmā^eb^. tusāya pītiyā itā upagatāti ^b^tusitā^eb^. bhogānaṃ nimmāne rati etesanti ^b^nimmānaratino^eb^. paranimmitesu bhogesu vasaṃ vattentīti ^b^paranimmitavasavattino^eb^. brahmānaṃ kāyo samūho brahmakāyo, tappariyāpannatāya tattha bhavāti ^b^brahmakāyikā. tatuttarī^eb^ti tato brahmakāyikehi uttari, upari parittābhādike sandhāya vadati. ^b^devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā^eb^ti ``yathārūpāya maggenāgatāya ^b^saddhāya samannāgatā, sīlena sutena cāgena paññāya samannāgatā ito cutā tattha upapannā tā devatā,^eb^ mayhampi tathārūpā saddhā sīlaṃ sutaṃ cāgo paññā ca saṃvijjatī''ti devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā sakkhiṃ otārentena viya ^b^attano saddhādiguṇā anussaritabbā^eb^.

[03] yadi evaṃ ^b^sutte^eb^ (a0 ni0 6.10) ubhayaguṇānussaraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ kathanti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha ^b^``sutte panā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^kiñcāpi vutta^eb^nti ``attano ca, tāsañca devatāna''nti ubhayaṃ samadhuraṃ viya ^b^sutte^eb^ (a0 ni0 6.10) kiñcāpi vuttaṃ. atha ^a^M1.0285^ea^ kho ^b^taṃ^eb^ ``devatānaṃ saddhañca sīlañcā''tiādivacanaṃ. ^b^sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetabba^eb^nti ``vutta''nti parato padaṃ ^a^V1.0269^ea^ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. kimatthaṃ pana sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapananti āha ^b^``devatānaṃ attano saddhādīhi samānaguṇadīpanatthanti veditabba''^eb^nti. kasmā pana sutte yathārutavasena atthaṃ aggahetvā evaṃ attho gayhatīti āha ^b^``aṭṭhakathāyañhī''^eb^tiādi.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā attano guṇānussaraṇaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, sīlacāgānussatīsu viya idhāpi attano guṇānussaraṇaṃ jhānuppattinimittaṃ yuttaṃ, tasmā. ^b^pubbabhāge^eb^ bhāvanārambhe. ^b^aparabhāge^eb^ti yathā bhāventassa upacārajjhānaṃ ijjhati, tathā bhāvanākāle. yadi attano eva idha guṇā anussaritabbā, kathamayaṃ devatānussatīti āha ^b^``devatānaṃ guṇasadisasaddhādiguṇānussaraṇavasenā''^eb^ti. tena sadisakappanāya ayaṃ bhāvanā ``devatānussatī''ti vuttā, na devatānaṃ, tāsaṃ guṇānaṃ vā anussaraṇenāti dasseti. pubbabhāge vā pavattaṃ devatāguṇānussaraṇaṃ upādāya ``devatānussatī''ti imissā samaññā veditabbā. tathā hi vakkhati ``pubbabhāge devatā ārabbha pavattacittavasenā''ti. sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ ^b^etāsa^eb^nti etāsaṃ buddhānussatiādīnaṃ channaṃ anussatīnaṃ. ^b^vitthāradesanāya^eb^nti vitthāravasena pavattadesanāyaṃ, ^b^mahānāmasuttaṃ^eb^ (a0 ni0 6.10; 11.11) sandhāya vadati. ^b^bhagavātiādīnaṃ attha^eb^nti bhagavātiādīnaṃ padānaṃ atthaṃ. ^b^atthaveda^eb^nti vā hetuphalaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ tuṭṭhimāha. ^b^dhammaveda^eb^nti hetuṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ tuṭṭhiṃ. ``ārakattā araha''nti anussarantassa hi yaṃ taṃ bhagavato kilesehi ārakattaṃ, so hetu. ñāpako cettha hetu adhippeto, na kārako, sampāpako vā. yonena ñāyamāno arahattattho, taṃ phalaṃ. iminā nayena sesapadesupi hetuphalavibhāgo veditabbo. dhammānussatiādīsupi ``ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇattā''tiādinā, ``yasmā pana sā sammāpaṭipadā''tiādinā ca tattha tattha hetuapadeso katoyevāti. ^b^dhammūpasaṃhita^eb^nti yathāvuttahetuhetuphalasaṅkhātaguṇūpasaṃhitaṃ. ^b^guṇe^eb^ti attano guṇe.

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ ^b^ariyasāvakānaññeva^eb^ ^a^M1.0286^ea^ ^b^ijjhantī^eb^ti ariyasāvakānaṃ ijjhantiyevāti uttarapadāvadhāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, avadhāraṇañca tesaṃ sukhasiddhidassanatthaṃ. tenāha ^b^``tesaṃ hī''^eb^tiādi. na puthujjanānaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ ijjhantīti. tathā hi vakkhati ``evaṃ santepī''tiādi. yadi evaṃ ^a^V1.0270^ea^, kasmā ^b^mahānāmasuttā^eb^dīsu (a0 ni0 6.10; 11.11) bahūsu suttesu ariyasāvakaggahaṇaṃ katanti? tesaṃ bahulavihāratāyāti ācariyā.

[03] ^b^nikkhanta^eb^nti niggataṃ nissaṭaṃ. ^b^mutta^eb^nti vissaṭṭhaṃ. ^b^vuṭṭhita^eb^nti apetaṃ. sabbametaṃ vikkhambhanameva sandhāya vadati. ^b^gedhamhā^eb^ti palibodhato. ^b^idampī^eb^ti buddhānussativasena laddhaṃ upacārajjhānamāha. ^b^ārammaṇaṃ karitvā^eb^ti paccayaṃ katvā, pādakaṃ katvāti attho. ^b^visujjhantī^eb^ti paramatthavisuddhiṃ pāpuṇanti.

[03] ^b^sambādhe^eb^ti taṇhāsaṃkilesādinā sampīḷe saṃkaṭe gharāvāse. ^b^okāsādhigamo^eb^ lokuttaradhammassa adhigamāya adhigantabbaokāso. anussatiyo eva ^b^anussatiṭṭhānāni. visuddhidhammā^eb^ti visujjhanasabhāvā, visujjhituṃ vā bhabbā. ^b^paramatthavisuddhidhammatāyā^eb^ti paramatthavisuddhiyā nibbānassa bhabbabhāvena. ^b^upakkamenā^eb^ti payogena. ^b^pariyodapanā^eb^ti visodhanā.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ santepīti^eb^ evaṃ ^b^mahānāmasuttā^eb^dīsu anekesu suttesu ariyasāvakasseva vasena chasu anussatīsu desitāsupi. ^b^yassānubhāvenā^eb^ti yassa cittappasādassa balena. ^b^pītiṃ paṭilabhitvā^eb^ti anussavavasena buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā.
[06] chānussatiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti sattamaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ ^b^ito^eb^ti ^a^M1.0287^ea^ ^a^V1.0271^ea^ devatānussatiyā. sā hi chasu anussatīsu sabbapacchā niddiṭṭhattā āsannā, paccakkhā ca. ^b^anantarāyā^eb^ti tadanantaraṃ uddiṭṭhattā vuttaṃ. maraṇassa sati maraṇassatīti maraṇaṃ tāva dassetuṃ ^b^``tattha maraṇa''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. kāmañcettha khandhānaṃ bhedo ``jarāmaraṇaṃ dvīhi khandhehi saṅgahita''nti (dhātu0 71) vacanato cutikhandhānaṃ vināso maraṇanti vattabbaṃ, visesato pana taṃ jīvitindriyassa vināsabhāvena kammaṭṭhānikānaṃ paccupatiṭṭhatīti ^b^``jīvitindriyassa upacchedo''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tenevāha ^b^niddese^eb^ ``kaḷevarassa nikkhepo jīvitindriyassupacchedo''ti (vibha0 236; dī0 ni0 2.390; ma0 ni0 1.92, 123). tattha ^b^ekabhavapariyāpannassā^eb^ti ekena bhavena paricchinnassa. ^b^jīvitindriyassa upacchedo^eb^ti jīvitindriyappabandhassa vicchedo āyukkhayādivasena antaradhānaṃ. ^b^samucchedamaraṇa^eb^nti arahato santānassa sabbaso ucchedabhūtaṃ maraṇaṃ. ^b^saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgasaṅkhāta^eb^nti saṅkhatadhammānaṃ udayavayaparicchinnassa pavattikhaṇassa bhaṅgo nirodhoti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ. ^b^khaṇikamaraṇa^eb^nti yathāvuttakhaṇavantaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe labbhamānaṃ maraṇaṃ. yaṃ khandhappabandhaṃ upādāya rukkhādisamaññā, tasmiṃ anupacchinnepi allatādivigamanaṃ nissāya matavohāro ^b^sammutimaraṇaṃ. na taṃ idha adhippeta^eb^nti taṃ samucchedakhaṇikasammutimaraṇaṃ idha maraṇānussatiyaṃ nādhippetaṃ abāhullato, anupaṭṭhahanato, asaṃvegavatthuto cāti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^adhippetaṃ^eb^ satiyā ārammaṇabhāvena. āyuādīnaṃ khayakāle maraṇaṃ ^b^kālamaraṇaṃ^eb^. tesaṃ aparikkhīṇakāle maraṇaṃ ^b^akālamaraṇaṃ. ``kālamaraṇaṃ puññakkhayenā''^eb^ti idaṃ yathādhikāraṃ sampattibhavavasena vuttaṃ, vipattibhavavasena pana ``pāpakkhayenā''ti vattabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^āyusantānajanakapaccayasampattiyā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0272^ea^ āyuppabandhassa pavattāpanakānaṃ āhārādipaccayānaṃ sampattiyaṃ. ^b^vipakkavipākattā^eb^ti attano phalānurūpaṃ dātabbavipākassa dinnattā. ^b^gatikālāhārādisampattiyā^eb^ ^b^abhāvenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0288^ea^ devānaṃ viya gatisampattiyā, paṭhamakappiyānaṃ viya kālasampattiyā, uttarakurukādīnaṃ viya āhārasampattiyā ca abhāvena. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena utusukkasoṇitādiṃ pariggayhati. ^b^ajjatanakālapurisānaṃ viyā^eb^ti ^b^viya^eb^-saddo aṭṭhāne paṭṭhapito, ajjatanakālapurisānaṃ vassasatamattaparimāṇassa viya āyuno khayavasenāti yojanā. evaṃ hi anāgatepi paramāyuno saṅgaho kato hoti, atīte pana gatisampattiyā viya kālāhārādisampattiyā bhāvena anekavassasahassa parimāṇopi āyu ahosi. ayañca vibhāgo vattamānassa antarakappassa vasena vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^kalāburājādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena nandayakkhanandamāṇavakādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^taṃ sabbampī^eb^ti yaṃ ``kālamaraṇaṃ akālamaraṇaṃ, tatthāpi puññakkhayamaraṇaṃ āyukkhayamaraṇaṃ ubhayakkhayamaraṇaṃ upakkamamaraṇa''nti vuttappabhedaṃ maraṇaṃ, taṃ sabbampi.

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ ^b^yoniso^eb^ti upāyena. ^b^manasikāro^eb^ti maraṇārammaṇo manasikāro. yena pana upāyena manasikāro pavattetabbo, taṃ byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ ^b^``ayoniso pavattayato''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^ayoniso pavattayato^eb^ti anupāyena satiṃ, saṃvegaṃ, ñāṇañca anupaṭṭhapetvā maraṇaṃ anussarato. ^b^tadetaṃ sabbampī^eb^ti sokapāmojjānaṃ uppajjanaṃ, saṃvegassa anuppajjanaṃ, santāsassa uppajjanañca yathākkamaṃ ^b^satisaṃvegañāṇaviharato hoti^eb^. yo hi ``maraṇaṃ nāmetaṃ jātassa ekantika''nti paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ sarati, tattha saṃvegajāto hoti sampajāno ca, tassa iṭṭhajanamaraṇādinimittaṃ sokādayo anokāsāva. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ayoniso manasikāraṃ pavattayato ete dosā, tasmā. ^b^tattha tatthā^eb^ti araññasusānādīsu. ^b^hatamatasatte^eb^ti corādīhi hate, sarasena mate ca satte. diṭṭhapubbā sampatti yesaṃ te diṭṭhapubbasampattī, tesaṃ ^b^diṭṭhapubbasampattīnaṃ. yojetvā^eb^ti upaṭṭhapetvā. ^b^ekaccassā^eb^ti tikkhindriyassa ñāṇuttarassa.

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ ^b^vadhakapaccupaṭṭhānato^eb^ti ghātakassa viya pati pati upaṭṭhānato āsannabhāvato. ^b^sampattivipattito^eb^ti ārogyādisampattīnaṃ viya jīvitasampattiyā vipajjanato. ^b^upasaṃharaṇato^eb^ti paresaṃ maraṇaṃ dassetvā attano ^a^M1.0289^ea^ maraṇassa upanayanato. ^b^kāyabahusādhāraṇato^eb^ti sarīrassa bahūnaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvato. ^b^āyudubbalato^eb^ti jīvitassa dubbalabhāvato. ^b^animittato^eb^ti maraṇassa vavatthitanimittābhāvato ^a^V1.0273^ea^. ^b^addhānaparicchedato^eb^ti kālassa paricchannabhāvato. ^b^khaṇaparittato^eb^ti jīvitakkhaṇassa ittarabhāvato.

[03] ^b^vadhakapaccupaṭṭhānato^eb^ti ettha viya-saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti dassento ^b^``vadhakassa viya paccupaṭṭhānato''^eb^ti vatvā tamevatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^``yathā hī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^cārayamāno^eb^ti āgurento paharaṇākāraṃ karonto. ^b^paccupaṭṭhitova^eb^ upagantvā ṭhito samīpe eva. ^b^jarāmaraṇaṃ gahetvāva nibbatta^eb^nti ``yathā hi ahicchattakamakuḷaṃ uggacchantaṃ paṃsuvirahitaṃ na hoti, evaṃ sattā nibbattantā jarāmaraṇavirahitā na hontī''ti ettakena upamā. ahicchattakamakuḷaṃ kadāci katthaci paṃsuvirahitampi bhaveyya, sattā pana kathañcipi jarāmaraṇavirahitā na hontīti khaṇikamaraṇaṃ tāva upamābhāvena dassetvā idhādhippetaṃ maraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``tathā hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. atha vā yadime sattā jarāmaraṇaṃ gahetvāva nibbattanti, nibbattisamanantarameva maritabbanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``tathā hī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^avassaṃ maraṇato^eb^ti avassaṃ maritabbato, ekantena maraṇasabbhāvato vā. ^b^pabbateyyā^eb^ti pabbatato āgatā. ^b^hārahārinī^eb^ti pavāhe patitassa tiṇapaṇṇādikassa ativiya haraṇasīlā. ^b^sandatevā^eb^ti savati eva. ^b^vattatevā^eb^ti pavāhavasena vattati eva na tiṭṭhati.

[03] ^b^yamekaratti^eb^nti yassaṃ ekarattiyaṃ, bhummatthe upayogavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, accantasaṃyoge vā. ^b^paṭhama^eb^nti sabbapaṭhamaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe. ^b^gabbhe^eb^ti mātukucchiyaṃ. ^b^māṇavo^eb^ti satto. yebhuyyena sattā rattiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantīti ^b^ratti^eb^ggahaṇaṃ. ^b^abbhuṭṭhitovā^eb^ti uṭṭhitābbho viya, abhimukhabhāvena vā uṭṭhitova maraṇassāti adhippāyo. ^b^so yātī^eb^ti so māṇavo yāti, paṭhamakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya gacchateva. ^b^sa gacchaṃ na nivattatī^eb^ti so evaṃ gacchanto khaṇamattampi na nivattati, aññadatthu maraṇaṃyeva upagacchati.

[03] ^b^kunnadīna^eb^nti pabbatato patitānaṃ khuddakanadīnaṃ. ^b^pāto āporasānugatabandhanāna^eb^nti purimadivase divā sūriyasantāpena anto anupavisitvā puna rattiyaṃ bandhanamūlaṃ upagatena āporasena tintasithilabandhanatāya pāto āporasānugatabandhanānaṃ.

[03] ^b^accayantī^eb^ti ^a^M1.0290^ea^ atikkamanti. ^b^uparujjhatī^eb^ti nirujjhati. udakameva ^b^odakaṃ,^eb^ udakoghaṃ vā ^a^V1.0274^ea^. yasmā accayanti ahorattā, tasmā jīvitaṃ uparujjhati. yasmā jīvitaṃ uparujjhati, tasmā ^b^āyu khīyati maccānaṃ. papatato^eb^ti papatanato ^b^bhayaṃ^eb^ sāmikānaṃ rukkhe ṭhatvā kamme viniyuñjitukāmānaṃ, heṭṭhā paviṭṭhānaṃ vā. ^b^uggamanaṃ pati^eb^ uggamananimittaṃ. ^b^mā maṃ amma nivāraya^eb^ pabbajjāyāti adhippāyo.
[03] koci mittamukhasatturandhagavesī saha vattamānopi na haneyya, ayaṃ pana ekaṃsena hanatiyevāti dassetuṃ ^b^``sahajātiyā āgatato''^eb^ti vatvā ^b^``jīvitaharaṇato cā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ ^b^na^eb^nti sampattiṃ. ^b^sukhī^eb^ti dibbasadisehi bhogehi, ādhipateyyena ca sukhasamaṅgī. ^b^dehabandhenā^eb^ti sarīrena. ^b^asoko^eb^ti asokamahārājā. ^b^sokamāgato^eb^ti socitabbataṃ gato.

[03] ^b^ārogyaṃ^eb^ yobbanānaṃ. byādhijarāpariyosānatā jīvitassa maraṇapariyosānatāya udāharaṇavasena ānītā, paccayabhāgavasena vā. lokoyeva ^b^lokasannivāso^eb^ yathā sattāvāsāti, sannivasitabbatāya vā sattanikāyo ^b^lokasannivāso. anugato^eb^ti anubandho paccatthikena viya. ^b^anusaṭo^eb^ti anupaviṭṭho upavisena viya. ^b^abhibhūto^eb^ti ajjhotthaṭo maddahatthīhi viya. ^b^abbhāhato^eb^ti pahaṭo bhūtehi viya.

[03] ^b^selā^eb^ti silāmayā, na paṃsuādimayā. ^b^vipulā^eb^ti mahantā anekayojanāyāmavitthārā. ^b^nabhaṃ āhaccā^eb^ti vipulattā eva ākāsaṃ abhivihacca sabbadisāsu pharitvā. ^b^anupariyeyyu^eb^nti anuvicareyyuṃ. ^b^nippothentā^eb^ti attanā āghātitaṃ cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karontā. ^b^adhivattantī^eb^ti adhibhavanti. kulena vā rūpena vā sīlena vā sutena vā saddhādīhi vā seṭṭhoti sambhāvanāya ^b^khattiyā^eb^dīsu ^b^na kañci parivajjeti^eb^. tehi eva nihīnoti avamaññamānāya ^b^suddā^eb^dīsu ^b^na kañci parivajjeti^eb^. aññadatthu ^b^sabbameva abhimaddati^eb^ nimmathati. daṇḍādiupāyā ca tattha avisayā evāti dassetuṃ ^b^``na tattha hatthīnaṃ bhūmī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^mantayuddhenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0291^ea^ āthabbaṇavedavihitena mantasaṅgāmappayogena. ^b^dhanenā^eb^ti dhanadānena. ^b^vā^eb^-saddo avuttavikappanattho. tena sāmaṃ, bhedañca saṅgaṇhāti.

[03] 171^b^.^eb^ ^b^parehi saddhiṃ attano upasaṃharaṇato^eb^ti parehi matehi saddhiṃ ``tepi nāma matā, kimaṅgaṃ ^a^V1.0275^ea^ pana mādisā''ti attano maraṇassa upanayanato. ^b^yasamahattato^eb^ti parivāramahattato, vibhavamahattato ca. ^b^puññamahattato^eb^ti mahāpuññabhāvato. ^b^thāmamahattato^eb^ti vīriyabalamahattato. ^b^yudhiṭṭhilo^eb^ dhammaputto. ^b^cānuro^eb^ yo baladevena nibbuddhaṃ katvā mārito.
[03] ^b^saha iddhīhī^eb^ti vejayantakampananandopanandadamanādīsu diṭṭhānubhāvāhi attano iddhīhi saddhiṃ ^b^maccumukhaṃ paviṭṭho^eb^.

[03] ^b^kalaṃ nagghanti soḷasi^eb^nti soḷasannaṃ pūraṇabhāgaṃ na agghanti. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- āyasmato therassa sāriputtassa paññaṃ soḷasabhāge katvā tato ekaṃ bhāgaṃ soḷasadhā gahetvā laddhaṃ ekabhāgasaṅkhātaṃ kalaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ sattānaṃ paññā na agghantīti.

[03] sabbassāpi saṃkilesapakkhassa samugghāto ñāyena āraddhavīriyassa hotīti āha ^b^``ñāṇavīriyabalenā''^eb^ti. sammādiṭṭhisammāvāyāmesu hi siddhesu aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo siddhova hotīti. ekākībhāvena ^b^khaggavisāṇakappā^eb^. paratoghosena vinā sayameva bhūtā paṭividdhākuppāti ^b^sayambhuno^eb^.

[03] hatthagatasuvaṇṇavalayānaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭanaṃ vaṃsakaḷīrassa katthaci asattatāti evamādikaṃ ^b^taṃ taṃ nimittaṃ^eb^ kāraṇaṃ ^b^āgamma. vīmaṃsantā^eb^ti pavattinivattiyo upaparikkhantā. mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esanaṭṭhena ^b^mahesayo. ekacariyanivāsenā^eb^ti ekacariyanivāsamattena, na sīlādinā. khaggamigasiṅgasamā upamā yesaṃ, khaggamigasiṅgaṃ vā samūpamā yesaṃ te ^b^khaggasiṅgasamūpamā^eb^.

[01] tambanakhatuṅganakhatādiasītianubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitehi suppatiṭṭhitapādatādīhi dvattiṃsāya mahāpurisalakkhaṇehi vicitro acchariyabbhuto rūpakāyo etassāti ^b^asīti...pe0... rūpakāyo^eb^. saha vāsanāya sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ ^a^M1.0292^ea^ pahīnattā sabbākāraparisuddhasīlakkhandhādiguṇaratanehi samiddho dhammakāyo etassāti ^b^sabbākāra...pe0... dhammakāyo. ṭhānaso^eb^ti taṅkhaṇeyeva.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0276^ea^ ^b^mahānubhāvassā^eb^ti evaṃ yathāvuttarūpakāyasampattiyā, dhammakāyasampattiyā ca viññāyamānavipulāparimeyyabuddhānubhāvassa, ^b^vasaṃ nāgataṃ^eb^ anupagamanavasenāti adhippāyo.
[03] maraṇaṃ sāmaññaṃ etassāti maraṇasāmañño, tassa bhāvo ^b^maraṇasāmaññatā,^eb^ tāya.
[03] 172^b^.^eb^ ^b^kimikulāna^eb^nti kimisamūhānaṃ, kimijātīnaṃ vā. ^b^jīyantī^eb^ti jaraṃ pāpuṇanti.

[03] ^b^nikkhante^eb^ti vītivatte. ^b^paṭihitāyā^eb^ti paccānugatāya. ^b^so mamassa antarāyo^eb^ti sā yathāvuttā na kevalaṃ kālakiriyāva, atha kho mama atidullabhaṃ khaṇaṃ labhitvā ṭhitassa satthusāsanamanasikārassa antarāyo ^b^assa^eb^ bhaveyya. ^b^byāpajjeyyā^eb^ti vipattiṃ gaccheyya. satthakena viya aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kantanakā maraṇakāle sandhibandhanacchedanakavātā ^b^satthakavātā^eb^.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ ^b^abala^eb^nti balahīnaṃ. ^b^dubbala^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ. abhāvattho hi ayaṃ ^b^du^eb^-saddo ``dussīlo (a0 ni0 5.213; a0 ni0 10.75) duppañño''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.449) viya. ^b^tadetaṃ^eb^ āyu. ^b^assāsapassāsānaṃ^eb^ samavuttitā aparāparaṃ pavesanikkhamova. ^b^bahi nikkhantanāsikavāte anto apavisante, paviṭṭhe vā anikkhamante^eb^ti ekasseva pavesanikkhamo viya vuttaṃ, taṃ nāsikavātabhāvasāmaññenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^adhimattatāya^eb^ accāsannādhiṭṭhānādinā. tadabhāvo hi iriyāpathānaṃ samavuttitā. ^b^atisītena^eb^ abhibhūtassa kāyassa vipajjanaṃ mahiṃsaraṭṭhādīsu himapātakālena dīpetabbaṃ. tattha hi sattā sītena bhinnasarīrā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpuṇanti. ^b^atiuṇhena^eb^ abhibhūtassa vipajjanaṃ marukantāre uṇhābhitattāya pacchiṃ, tattha ṭhapitaṃ upari sāṭakaṃ, puttañca akkamitvā matāya itthiyā dīpetabbaṃ. ^b^mahābhūtānaṃ^eb^ samavuttitā pakopābhāvo ^a^M1.0293^ea^. ^b^pathavīdhātu^eb^ādīnaṃ pakopena sarīrassa vikārāpatti parato ^b^dhātukammaṭṭhānakathāyaṃ^eb^ āgamissati. ^b^yuttakāle^eb^ti bhuñjituṃ yuttakāle khuddābhibhūtakāle.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ ^b^avavatthānato^eb^ti kālādivasena vavatthānābhāvato. ^b^vavatthāna^eb^nti cettha paricchedo adhippeto, na asaṅkarato vavatthānaṃ, nicchayo cāti āha ^b^``paricchedābhāvato''^eb^ti. ^b^na nāyare^eb^ti na ñāyanti.

[03] ^b^ito^eb^ ^a^V1.0277^ea^ ^b^para^eb^nti ettha ^b^para^eb^nti paraṃ aññaṃ kālanti attho. tena orakālassāpi saṅgaho siddho hoti. paramāyuto orakālaṃ eva cettha ``para''nti adhippetaṃ. tato paraṃ sattānaṃ jīvanassa abhāvato ^b^``vavatthānābhāvato''^eb^ti vattuṃ na sakkāti. ^b^abbudapesī^eb^tiādīsu ``abbudakāle pesikāle''tiādinā ^b^kāla^eb^-saddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. ^b^kālo^eb^ti idha pubbaṇhādivelā adhippetā. tenāha ^b^``pubbaṇhepi hī''^eb^tiādi. idheva dehena patitabbanti sambandho. ^b^anekappakārato^eb^ti nagare jātānaṃ gāme, gāme jātānaṃ nagare, vane jātānaṃ janapade, janapade jātānaṃ vanetiādinā anekappakārato. ^b^ito cutenā^eb^ti ito gatito cutena. ^b^idha^eb^ imissaṃ gatiyaṃ. ^b^yantayuttagoṇo viyā^eb^ti yathā yante yuttagoṇo yantaṃ nātivattati, evaṃ ^b^loko^eb^ gatipañcakanti ettakena upamā.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ ^b^appaṃ vā bhiyyo^eb^ti vassasatato upari ``dasa vā vassāni, vīsati vā''tiādinā dutiyaṃ vassasataṃ apāpuṇanto appakaṃ vā jīvatīti attho. ^b^gamanīyo^eb^ti gandhabbo upapajjanavasena. ^b^samparāyo^eb^ti paraloko.
[03] ^b^hīḷeyyā^eb^ti paribhaveyya na sambhāveyya. ^b^na^eb^nti āyuṃ. ^b^suporiso^eb^ti sādhupuriso paññavā. ^b^careyyā^eb^ti sucaritaṃ careyya. tenāha ^b^``ādittasīsovā''^eb^ti.
[25] ^b^sattahi upamāhī^eb^ti --

[02] ``seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇa, tiṇagge ussāvabindu sūriye uggacchante khippaṃyeva paṭivigacchati, na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ hoti. udake udakapubbuḷaṃ. udake ^a^M1.0294^ea^ daṇḍarāji. nadī pabbateyyā dūraṅgamā sīghasotā hārahārinī. balavā puriso jivhagge kheḷapiṇḍaṃ saṃyūhitvā akasireneva vameyya. divasaṃ santatte ayokaṭāhe maṃsapesi pakkhittā khippaṃyeva paṭivigacchati, na ciraṭṭhitikā hoti. gāvī vajjhā āghātanaṃ nīyamānā yaṃ yadeva pādaṃ uddharati, santikeva hoti vadhassa, santikeva maraṇassa, evamevaṃ kho, brāhmaṇa, govajjhūpamaṃ jīvitaṃ manussānaṃ parittaṃ lahukaṃ bahudukkhaṃ bahupāyāsaṃ mantāyaṃ boddhabbaṃ, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ, caritabbaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, natthi jātassa amaraṇa''nti (a0 ni0 7.74) --
[25] evamāgatāhi ^a^V1.0278^ea^ imāhi sattahi upamāhi ^b^alaṅkataṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^rattindiva^eb^nti ekaṃ rattindivaṃ. ^b^bhagavato sāsana^eb^nti ariyamaggapaṭivedhāvahaṃ satthu ovādaṃ. ^b^bahuṃ vata me kataṃ assā^eb^ti bahuṃ vata mayā attahitaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ kataṃ bhaveyya. ^b^tadantara^eb^nti taṃ khaṇaṃ tattakaṃ velaṃ. ^b^ekaṃ piṇḍapāta^eb^nti ekaṃ divasaṃ yāpanappahonakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ. ^b^dandha^eb^nti mandaṃ cirāya. ^b^avissāsiyo^eb^ avissāsanīyo.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ citte dharanteyeva sattānaṃ jīvitavohāro, cittassa ca atīttaro khaṇo lahuparivattibhāvato. yathāha bhagavā ``nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ, yathayidaṃ citta''nti (a0 ni0 1.48; kathā0 335). tasmā sattānaṃ jīvitaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikattā lahusaṃ ittaranti dassento ^b^``paramatthato''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^``paramatthato''^eb^ti iminā yāyaṃ ``yo ciraṃ jīvati, so vassasata''ntiādinā sattānaṃ (dī0 ni0 2.7; saṃ0 ni0 1.145; a0 ni0 7.74) jīvitappavatti vuttā, sā pabandhavisayattā vohāravasenāti taṃ paṭikkhipati. ^b^``atiparitto''^eb^ti iminā --

[02] ``seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, cattāro daḷhadhammā dhanuggahā susikkhitā katahatthā katūpāsanā catuddisā ṭhitā assu, atha puriso āgaccheyya `ahaṃ imesaṃ...pe0... katūpāsanānaṃ catuddisā kaṇḍe khitte appatiṭṭhite pathaviyaṃ gahetvā āharissāmī'ti. yathā ^a^M1.0295^ea^ ca, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa javo, yathā ca candimasūriyānaṃ javo, tato sīghataro. yathā ca, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa javo, yathā ca candimasūriyānaṃ javo, yathā ca yā devatā candimasūriyānaṃ purato dhāvanti, tāsaṃ devatānaṃ javo, tato sīghataraṃ āyusaṅkhārā khīyantī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 2.228) --

[25] evaṃ vuttaṃ parittampi paṭikkhipati. tatra hi gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyena paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi, pāde ca baddhakhuradhārāsannipātatopi parittako rūpajīvitindriyassa so khaṇo vutto, cittassa pana ativiya parittataro, yassa upamāpi natthi. tenevāha ``yāvañcidaṃ, bhikkhave, upamāpi na sukarā, yāva lahuparivattaṃ citta''nti (a0 ni0 1.48). ^b^jīvitakkhaṇo^eb^ti jīvanakkhaṇo. ^b^ekacittappavattimattoyeva^eb^ ekassa cittassa pavattimatteneva ^a^V1.0279^ea^ sattānaṃ paramatthato jīvanakkhaṇassa paricchinnattā. idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya pakāsento ^b^``yathā nāmā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^pavattamāna^eb^nti pavattantaṃ. ^b^ekacittakkhaṇika^eb^nti ekacittakkhaṇamattavantaṃ. ^b^tasmiṃ citte niruddhamatte^eb^ti yena vattamānacittakkhaṇena ``jīvatī''ti vuccati, tasmiṃ citte nirodhaṃ bhaṅgaṃ pattamatte taṃsamaṅgī ^b^satto niruddho^eb^ matoti ^b^vuccati^eb^. vuttamevatthaṃ pāḷiyā vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``yathāhā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tena tīsupi kālesu sattānaṃ paramatthato jīvanaṃ nāma cittakkhaṇavasenevāti dasseti.

[03] ^b^jīvita^eb^nti jīvitindriyaṃ. ^b^sukhadukkhā^eb^ti sukhadukkhavedanā. upekkhāpi hi sukhadukkhāsu eva antogadhā iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvato. ^b^attabhāvo^eb^ti jīvitavedanāviññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭhadhammā vuttā. ^b^kevalā^eb^ti attanā, niccabhāvena vā avomissā. ^b^ekacittasamāyuttā^eb^ti ekekena cittena sahitā. ^b^lahuso vattati khaṇo^eb^ti vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇikatāya lahuko atīttaro jīvitādīnaṃ khaṇo vattati.

[03] ^b^ye niruddhā marantassā^eb^ti cavantassa sattassa cutito uddhaṃ ``niruddhā''ti vattabbā ye khandhā. ^b^tiṭṭhamānassa vā idhā^eb^ti ye vā idha pavattiyaṃ tiṭṭhantassa dharantassa bhaṅgappattiyā niruddhā khandhā. ^b^sabbepi sadisā^eb^ te sabbepi ekasadisā. kathaṃ? ^b^gatā appaṭisandhikā^eb^ puna āgantvā paṭisandhānābhāvena vigatā. yathā ^a^M1.0296^ea^ hi cutikhandhā na nivattanti, evaṃ tato pubbepi khandhā, tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitanti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^anibbattena na jāto^eb^ti anuppannena cittena jāto na hoti ajāto nāma hoti. ^b^paccuppannena^eb^ vattamānena cittena ^b^jīvati^eb^ jīvamāno nāma hoti. ^b^cittabhaṅgā mato loko^eb^ti cuticittassa viya sabbassapi tassa tassa cittassa bhaṅgappattiyā ayaṃ loko paramatthato mato nāma hoti niruddhassa appaṭisandhikattā. evaṃ santepi ^b^paññatti paramatthiyā^eb^ yā taṃ taṃ dharantaṃ cittaṃ upādāya ``tisso jīvati, phusso jīvatī''ti vacanappavattiyā visayabhūtā santānapaññatti, sā ettha ^b^paramatthiyā^eb^ paramatthabhūtā. tathā hi vadanti ``nāmagottaṃ na jīratī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.76).

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ ^b^aññataraññatarena^eb^ ākārena. ^b^citta^eb^nti kammaṭṭhānārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ. ^b^āsevanaṃ labhatī^eb^ti bhāvanāsevanaṃ ^a^V1.0280^ea^ labhati, bahiddhā vikkhepaṃ pahāya ekattavasena maraṇārammaṇameva hotīti. tenāha ^b^``maraṇārammaṇā sati santiṭṭhatī''^eb^ti. sabhāvadhammānaṃ bhedo sabhāvadhammagatiko evāti āha ^b^``sabhāvadhammattā pana ārammaṇassā''^eb^ti. tenāha bhagavā ``jarāmaraṇaṃ, bhikkhave, aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppanna''ntiādi (saṃ0 ni0 2.20). ^b^saṃvejanīyattā^eb^ti saṃvegajananato mahābhūtesu mahāvikāratā viya gayhamānā maraṇaṃ anussariyamānaṃ uparūpari ubbegameva āvahatīti tattha na bhāvanācittaṃ appetuṃ sakkoti. yadi sabhāvadhammattā appanaṃ na pāpuṇāti, lokuttarajjhānaṃ ekaccāni arūpajjhānāni ca kathanti āha ^b^``lokuttarajjhānaṃ panā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^visuddhibhāvanānukkamavasenā^eb^ti heṭṭhimavisuddhiyā ānubhāvena adhigatātisayāya paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhibhāvanāya, sabbasaṅkhārehi nibbindanavirajjanādivisaṃyogādhimuttiappanāya ca paṭipakkhabhūtānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ vigamoti evaṃbhūtassa visuddhibhāvanānukkamassa vasena lokuttarajjhānaṃ appanāppattameva hoti. ^b^ārammaṇasamatikkamanamattaṃ tattha hotī^eb^ti aññesaṃ sabhāvadhammārammaṇakammaṭṭhānānaṃ viya cittassa samādhāne byāpāro natthi. yathāsamāhitena pana cittena ārammaṇasamatikkamanamattameva bhāvanāya kātabbaṃ, tasmā sabhāvadhammepi āruppajjhānaṃ appetīti.

[03] ^b^satataṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0297^ea^ ^b^appamatto hoti^eb^ saṃvegabahulattā, tato evassa sabbabhavesu anabhiratisaññāpaṭilābho. ^b^jīvitanikantiṃ jahāti^eb^ maraṇassa avassaṃbhāvitādassanato. ^b^pāpagarahī hoti^eb^ aniccasaññāpaṭilābhato, tato eva asannidhibahulatā, vigatamalamaccheratā ca. ^b^tadanusārenā^eb^ti aniccasaññāparicayānusārena. ^b^abhāvitamaraṇā^eb^ti abhāvitamaraṇānussaraṇā. ^b^abhayo asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti^eb^ pageva maraṇasaññāya sūpaṭṭhitattā.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ buddhā uppajjanti etthāti ^b^buddhuppādo,^eb^ buddhānaṃ uppajjanakālo, tasmā. ^b^aññatra^eb^ taṃ ṭhapetvā, aññasmiṃ kāleti attho. na pavattapubbanti ^b^apavattapubbaṃ^eb^. tato eva ^b^sabbatitthiyānaṃ avisayabhūtaṃ^eb^. nanu ca ^b^sunettasatthārādayo^eb^ (a0 ni0 6.54; 7.66, 73), aññe ca tāpasaparibbājakā sarīraṃ ``asubha''nti jāniṃsu. tathā hi ^b^sumedhatāpasena^eb^ sarīraṃ jigucchantena vuttaṃ --
[21] ``yannūnimaṃ ^a^V1.0281^ea^ pūtikāyaṃ, nānākuṇapapūritaṃ.
[22] chaḍḍayitvāna gaccheyyaṃ, anapekkho anatthiko''ti.. (bu0 vaṃ0 2.8) --

[25] ādi. kāmaṃ bodhisattā, aññe ca tāpasādayo sarīraṃ ``asubha''nti jānanti, kammaṭṭhānabhāvena pana na jānanti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``aññatra buddhuppādā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^saṃvegāya saṃvattati^eb^ yāthāvato kāyasabhāvappavedanato. ^b^atthāyā^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammikādiatthāya. ^b^yogakkhemāyā^eb^ti catūhi yogehi khemabhāvāya. ^b^satisampajaññāyā^eb^ti sabbattha satiavippavāsāya ca sattaṭṭhāniyasampajaññāya ca. ^b^ñāṇadassanapaṭilābhāyā^eb^ti vipassanāñāṇādhigamāya. ^b^vijjāvimuttiphalasacchikiriyāyā^eb^ti tisso vijjā, cittassa adhimutti nibbānaṃ, cattāri sāmaññaphalānīti etesaṃ paccakkhakaraṇāya. amatassa nibbānassa adhigamahetutāya, amatasadisātappakasukhasahitatāya ca kāyagatāsati ^b^``amata''^eb^nti vuttā. ^b^paribhuñjantī^eb^ti jhānasamāpajjanena vaḷañjanti. ^b^parihīna^eb^nti jinaṃ. ^b^viraddha^eb^nti anadhigamena virajjhitaṃ. ^b^āraddha^eb^nti sādhitaṃ nipphāditaṃ. anekehi ākārehi tesu tesu suttantesu pasaṃsitvā yaṃ taṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaṃ niddiṭṭhanti sambandho ^a^M1.0298^ea^. kattha pana niddiṭṭhanti? ^b^kāyagatāsatisutte^eb^ (ma0 ni0 3.153 ādayo). tattha hi ``kathaṃ bhāvitā ca bhikkhave''tiādinā ayaṃ desanā āgatā. tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho -- bhikkhave, kena pakārena kāyagatāsatibhāvanā bhāvitā, kena ca pakārena punappunaṃ katā ānāpānajjhānādīnaṃ nipphattiyā mahapphalā, tesaṃ tesaṃ vijjābhāgiyānaṃ, abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānañca dhammānaṃ, aratiratisahanatādīnañca saṃsiddhiyā mahānisaṃsā ca hotīti? ^b^ānāpānapabba^eb^nti ānāpānakammaṭṭhānāvadhi. esa nayo sesesupi.

[03] dhātumanasikārakammaṭṭhānena yadipi upacārasamādhi ijjhati, sammasanavāro pana tattha sātisayoti dhātumanasikārapabbampi ^b^``vipassanāvasena vutta''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ``ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatīto''ti (dī0 ni0 2.379; ma0 ni0 1.112) tattha tattha asubhāniccatādīhi saddhiṃ kāye ādīnavassa vibhāvanavasena desanāya āgatattā ^b^``navasivathika...pe0... vuttānī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^ettha uddhumātakādīsū^eb^ti etesu sivathikapabbesu āgatauddhumātakādīsu. ^b^ānāpānassativasenā^eb^ti ānāpānassatibhāvanāvasena. yo upari ``karīsaṃ matthaluṅga''nti matthaluṅgakoṭṭhāso gayhati, taṃ idha ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (ma0 ni0 3.154) aṭṭhimiñjeneva saṅgaṇhitvā desanā āgatāti dassento ^b^``matthaluṅgaṃ aṭṭhimiñjena saṅgahetvā''^eb^ti āha ^a^V1.0282^ea^. ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ anussatiniddese. kāyaṃ gatā, kāye vā gatā sati ^b^kāyagatāsatī^eb^ti satisīsena idaṃ dvattiṃsākārakammaṭṭhānaṃ adhippetanti yojanā.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ ^b^catumahābhūtika^eb^nti catumahābhūtasannissayaṃ. ^b^pūtikāya^eb^nti pūtibhūtaṃ paramaduggandhakāyaṃ. ṭhānagamanāvatthaṃ sarīraṃ sandhāya, tassa vā avayavesu sabbaheṭṭhimaṃ pādatalanti vuttaṃ ^b^``uddhaṃ pādatalā''^eb^ti. ^b^tiriyaṃ tacaparicchinna^eb^nti ettha nanu kesalomanakhānaṃ, tacassa ca atacaparicchinnatā atthīti? kiñcāpi atthi, tacaparicchinnabahulatāya pana kāyassa tacaparicchinnatā hotīti evaṃ vuttaṃ. taco pariyanto assāti tacapariyantoti etena pana vacanena kāyekadesabhūto taco gahito eva, tappaṭibaddhā ca kesādayo tadanupaviṭṭhamūlā tacapariyantāva hontīti ^a^M1.0299^ea^ dvattiṃsākārasamūho sabbopi kāyo tacapariyanto vuttoti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^atthī^eb^ti vacanavipallāsena vuttaṃ, nipātapadaṃ vā etaṃ. tasmā tīsupi saṅkhāsu tadevassa rūpaṃ. tenāha ^b^``saṃvijjantī''^eb^ti. akkharacintakehi sarīre kāya-saddaṃ vaṇṇantehipi asucisamudāyabhāveneva icchitabboti dassento ``asucisañcayato''ti vatvā puna naṃ niruttinayena dassetuṃ ^b^``kucchitāna''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^āyabhūtato^eb^ti uppattiṭṭhānabhūtattā. ^b^``pūraṃ nānappakārassā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ``ke pana te pakārā? yehi nānappakāraṃ asuci vutta''nti te kesādike dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ ``kesā lomā''tiādi vuttanti imamatthaṃ dīpento āha ^b^``ete kesādayo dvattiṃsākārā''^eb^ti. ākārā pakārāti hi eko atthoti. ^b^evaṃ sambandho^eb^ti ``atthi imasmiṃ kāye nakhā''tiādinā sabbakoṭṭhāsesu ``atthi imasmiṃ kāye''ti padattayena sambandho veditabbo.
[03] ^b^parito^eb^ti tiriyaṃ, samantato vā pādatalakesamūlesu ca tacassa labbhanato. ^b^sucibhāva^eb^nti sucino sabbhāvaṃ, sucimeva vā.
[03] 180^b^.^eb^ yena vidhinā uggahe kusalo hoti, so sattavidho vidhi ^b^``uggahakosalla''^eb^nti vuccati, tannibbattaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ. ^b^manasikārakosalle^eb^pi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^sajjhāyantā vā^eb^ti sajjhāyaṃ karontā eva. tesaṃ kira cattāro māse sajjhāyantānaṃ sajjhāyamaggeneva ^a^V1.0283^ea^ koṭṭhāse upadhārentānaṃ paṭipāṭiyā dvattiṃsākārā vibhūtatarā hutvā khāyiṃsu, paṭikkūlasaññā saṇṭhāsi, te tasmiṃ nimitte jhānaṃ appetvā jhānapādakaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dassanamaggaṃ paṭivijjhiṃsu. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``sajjhāyantā va sotāpannā ahesu''^eb^nti.

[01] ^b^paricchinditvā^eb^ti tacapañcakādivaseneva paricchedaṃ katvā. pathavīdhātubahulabhāvato matthaluṅgassa karīsāvasāne tantiāropanamāha. ettha ca ^b^maṃsaṃ, nhāru, aṭṭhi, aṭṭhimiñjaṃ vakkaṃ, vakkaṃ aṭṭhimiñjaṃ, aṭṭhi, nhāru, maṃsaṃ, taco, dantā, nakhā, lomā, kesā^eb^ti evaṃ vakkapañcakādīsu anulomasajjhāyaṃ vatvā paṭilomasajjhāyo purimehi sambandho vutto. svāyaṃ ^b^sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0300^ea^ (vibha0 aṭṭha0 356) visuṃ tipañcāhaṃ, purimehi ekato tipañcāhanti chapañcāhaṃ sajjhāyo vutto, tattha ādiantadassanavasena vuttoti daṭṭhabbo. anulomapaṭilomasajjhāyepi hi paṭilomasajjhāyo antimo hoti, sajjhāyappakārantaraṃ vā etampīti veditabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^hatthasaṅkhalikā^eb^ti aṅgulipantimāha.

[03] ^b^manasā sajjhāyo^eb^ti cittena cintanamāha, yaṃ mānasaṃ ``jappana''nti vuccati, sammadeva ajjhāyoti vā sajjhāyo, cintananti attho. cirataraṃ suṭṭhu pavattanena paguṇabhūtā kammaṭṭhānatanti samāvajjitvā manasi karontassa ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā katthaci asajjamānā nirantarameva upaṭṭhāti, tadanusārena tadatthopi vibhūtataro hutvā khāyatīti āha ^b^``vacasā sajjhāyo hi...pe0... paṭivedhassa paccayo hotī''^eb^ti. ^b^lakkhaṇapaṭivedhassā^eb^ti asubhalakkhaṇapaṭivedhassa.

[03] paṭikkūlasabhāvasallakkhaṇassa kassaci vaṇṇaggahaṇamukhena koṭṭhāsā vavatthānaṃ gacchanti, kassaci saṇṭhānaggahaṇamukhena, kassaci disāvibhāgaggahaṇamukhena, kassaci patiṭṭhitokāsaggahaṇamukhena, kassaci sabbaso paricchijjaggahaṇamukhenāti vaṇṇādito sallakkhaṇaṃ uggahakosallāvahaṃ vuttanti taṃ dassento ^b^``kesādīnaṃ vaṇṇo vavatthapetabbo''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] attano bhāgo sabhāgo, sabhāgena paricchedo ^b^sabhāgaparicchedo,^eb^ heṭṭhuparitiriyapariyantehi, sakoṭṭhāsikakesantarādīhi ^a^V1.0284^ea^ ca paricchedoti attho. ^b^amissakatāvasenā^eb^ti koṭṭhāsantarehi avomissakatāvasena. asabhāgo hi idha ^b^``visabhāgo''^eb^ti adhippeto, na viruddhasabhāgo. svāyamattho kesādisaddato eva labbhati. saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadatīti ``kesā''ti vutte ``akesā na hontī''ti ayamattho viññāyati. ke pana te akesā? lomādayo, na ca ghaṭādīsu pasaṅgopakaraṇeneva tesaṃ nivattitattā.

[03] ^b^paṭikkūlavaseneva kathitaṃ^eb^ dhātuvibhāgassa sāmaññatopi agahitattā. tattheva visuṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānassa kathitattā ca dhātuvibhaṅgo ^b^pakkusātisuttaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0301^ea^ (ma0 ni0 3.342) vibhaṅgappakaraṇe ^b^dhātuvibhaṅgapāḷi^eb^ (vibha0 172 ādayo) ca. yassa vaṇṇato upaṭṭhāti kesādi, ^b^taṃ^eb^ puggalaṃ ^b^sandhāya jhānāni^eb^ kesādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇārammaṇāni ^b^vibhattāni^eb^. ñatvā ācikkhitabbanti yadatthaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``tattha dhātuvasenā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ paṭikkūlamanasikārapabbe. ^b^kāyagatāsatisutte^eb^ (ma0 ni0 3.153 ādayo) hi paṭikkūlamanasikārapabbaṃ gahetvā idha kāyagatāsatibhāvanā niddisīyati.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ ^b^na ekantarikāyā^eb^ti ekantarikāyapi na manasi kātabbaṃ, pageva dvantarikādināti adhippāyo. na bhāvanaṃ sampādeti, lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ na pāpuṇāti ekantarikāya manasi karontoti sambandho.

[03] ^b^okkamanavissajjana^eb^nti paṭipajjitabbavissajjetabbe magge. ^b^pucchitvāva gantabbaṃ hoti^eb^ gahetabbavissajjetabbaṭṭhānassa asallakkhaṇato. ^b^kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ pāpuṇātī^eb^ti ādito paṭṭhāya yāva pariyosānā manasikāramattaṃ hotīti adhippāyo. ^b^avibhūtaṃ pana hoti^eb^ paṭikkūlākārassa suṭṭhu asallakkhaṇato. tato eva ^b^na visesaṃ āvahati^eb^.

[03] ^b^kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na gacchatī^eb^ti paṭipāṭiyā sabbakoṭṭhāse manasi karotoyeva vibhūtā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti. te sātisayaṃ pāṭikkūlato manasi karontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ gaccheyya, imassa pana ativiya dandhaṃ manasi karoto vibhūtato upaṭṭhānameva natthi, kuto paṭikkūlatāya saṇṭhānaṃ. tenāha ^b^``visesādhigamassa paccayo na hotī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^bahiddhā^eb^ ^a^V1.0285^ea^ ^b^puthuttārammaṇe^eb^ti ``asuci paṭikkūla''nti kesādīsu pavattetabbaṃ asubhānupassanaṃ hitvā subhādivasena gayhamānā kesādayopi idha ``bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇamevā''ti veditabbā. rūpādayo hi nīlādivasena puthusabhāvatāya puthuttārammaṇaṃ nāma, nānārammaṇanti attho. asamādhānaṃ ^b^cetaso^eb^ virūpo khepoti ^b^vikkhepo^eb^. so satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā sakkaccaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasi karontena ^b^paṭibāhitabbo. parihāyatī^eb^ti hāyati. ^b^paridhaṃsatī^eb^ti vinassati.

[03] ^b^yā^eb^ ^a^M1.0302^ea^ ^b^ayaṃ kesā lomātiādikā^eb^ lokasaṅketānugatā. ^b^paṇṇattī^eb^ti aṭṭha dhamme upādāya paṇṇatti. ^b^taṃ^eb^ kesādipaṇṇattiṃ. ^b^atikkamitvā^eb^ti paṭikkūlabhāvanāya atikkamitvā ugghāṭetvā. tassā ugghāṭitattā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ koṭṭhāse paṭikkūlato upaṭṭhahante ^b^``paṭikkūla''nti cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ^eb^. idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvento ^b^``yathā hī''^eb^tiādimāha. tatridaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ -- manussā viya yogāvacaro. udapānaṃ viya koṭṭhāsā. tālapaṇṇādisaññāṇaṃ viya kesādipaññatti. tena manussānaṃ udapāne nhānapivanādi viya yogāvacarassa pubbabhāge kesā lomāti paṇṇattivasena manasikāro. abhiṇhasañcārena manussānaṃ saññāṇena vinā udapāne kiccakaraṇaṃ viya yogāvacarassa manasikārabalena paṇṇattiṃ atikkamitvā paṭikkūlabhāveyeva cittaṃ ṭhapetvā bhāvanānuyogo. ^b^pubbabhāge...pe0... pākaṭo hotī^eb^ti ``kesā lomā''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 3.154) bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa kesādipaññattiyā saddhiṃyeva koṭṭhāsānaṃ paṭikkūlabhāvo pubbabhāge pākaṭo hoti. ^b^athā^eb^ti pacchā bhāvanāya vīthipaṭipannakāle. ^b^paṭikkūlabhāveyeva cittaṃ ṭhapetabba^eb^nti koṭṭhāsānaṃ paṭikkūlākāreyeva bhāvanācittaṃ pavattetabbaṃ.

[03] anupubbena muñcanaṃ ^b^anupubbamuñcanaṃ,^eb^ anupaṭṭhahantassa anupaṭṭhahantassa muñcananti attho. kathaṃ pana anupaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti āha ^b^``ādikammikassā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^pariyosānakoṭṭhāsameva āhacca tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti idaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ tantianusārena ādito kammaṭṭhānamanasikāro pavattatīti katvā vuttaṃ. tathā hissa manasā sajjhāyo viya manasikāro te te koṭṭhāse āmaṭṭhamatte katvā gacchati, na lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena. yadā pana ne lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena suṭṭhu upadhārento manasi karoti, tadā keci upaṭṭhahanti, keci na upaṭṭhahanti. tattha paṭipajjanavidhiṃ dassento ^b^``athassā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^kamma^eb^nti manasikārakammaṃ ^b^tāva kātabbaṃ^eb^. kīva ciranti? ^b^yāva dvīsu upaṭṭhitesu,^eb^ tesampi dvinnaṃ ^b^eko suṭṭhutaraṃ upaṭṭhahati^eb^ tāva.

[03] ^b^ukkuṭṭhukkuṭṭhiṭṭhāneyeva^eb^ ^a^V1.0286^ea^ ^b^uṭṭhahitvā^eb^ti pubbe viya ekatthakatāya ukkuṭṭhiyā kamena sabbatālesu patitvā uṭṭhahitvā uṭṭhahitvā pariyantatālaṃ ^a^M1.0303^ea^, āditālañca āgantvā tato tato tattha tattheva katāya ukkuṭṭhiyā uṭṭhahitvāti attho.
[03] ^b^dve bhikkhā^eb^ti dvīsu gehesu laddhabhikkhā.

[03] ^b^appanāto^eb^ti appanākārato dvattiṃsākāre appanā honti. kiṃ paccekaṃ koṭṭhāsesu hoti udāhu aññathāti vicāraṇāyaṃ āha ^b^``appanākoṭṭhāsato''^eb^ti, koṭṭhāsato koṭṭhāsatoti attho. tenāha ^b^``kesādīsū''^eb^tiādi.
[03] ^b^adhicitta^eb^nti samathavipassanācittaṃ.

[03] ^b^anuyuttenā^eb^ti yuttappayuttena, bhāventenāti attho. ^b^kālenakāla^eb^nti kāle kāle. ^b^samādhinimittaṃ^eb^ upalakkhitasamādhānākāro samādhi eva. ^b^manasi kātabba^eb^nti citte kātabbaṃ, uppādetabbanti attho. samādhikāraṇaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ ^b^samādhinimittaṃ,^eb^ taṃ āvajjitabbanti attho. ^b^paggahanimittaupekkhānimittesupi^eb^ eseva nayo. ^b^ṭhānaṃ^eb^ atthīti vacanaseso. ^b^taṃ^eb^ bhāvanā ^b^cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃvatteyya,^eb^ etassa saṃvattanassa ṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ atthīti attho. ^b^taṃ^eb^ vā manasikaraṇa^b^cittaṃ kosajjāya saṃvatteyya,^eb^ etassa ṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ atthīti attho. ^b^mudu^eb^nti subhāvitabhāvena mudubhūtaṃ, vasībhāvappattanti attho. muduttā eva ^b^kammaññaṃ^eb^ kammakkhamaṃ kammayoggaṃ. ^b^pabhassara^eb^nti upakkilesavigamena parisuddhaṃ, pariyodātanti attho. ^b^na ca pabhaṅgū^eb^ti kammaniyabhāvūpagamanena na ca pabhijjanasabhāvaṃ suddhantaṃ viya suvaṇṇaṃ viniyogakkhamaṃ. tenāha ^b^``sammā samādhiyati āsavānaṃ khayāyā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^ukkaṃ bandhatī^eb^ti mūsaṃ sampādeti. ^b^ālimpetī^eb^ti ādīpeti jāleti. ^b^tañcā^eb^ti taṃ piḷandhanavikatisaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ payojanaṃ ^b^assa^eb^ suvaṇṇakārassa ^b^anubhoti^eb^ pahoti sādheti. ^b^assa^eb^ vā suvaṇṇassa atthaṃ suvaṇṇakāro ^b^anubhoti^eb^ pāpuṇāti.

[03] abhiññāya iddhividhādiñāṇena sacchikaraṇīyassa iddhividhapaccanubhavanādikassa ^b^abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyassa^eb^ ^a^V1.0287^ea^. yassa paccakkhaṃ atthi, so sakkhi. sakkhino bhabbatā ^b^sakkhibhabbatā,^eb^ sakkhibhavananti vuttaṃ hoti. sakkhi ca so ^a^M1.0304^ea^ bhabbo cāti vā sakkhibhabbo. ayañhi iddhividhādīnaṃ bhabbo, tattha ca sakkhīti sakkhibhabbo, tassa bhāvo ^b^sakkhibhabbatā,^eb^ taṃ ^b^pāpuṇāti. sati sati āyatane^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pubbahetuādike kāraṇe sati.

[03] ^b^sītibhāva^eb^nti nibbānaṃ, kilesadarathavūpasamaṃ vā. ^b^niggaṇhātī^eb^ti uddhaṭaṃ cittaṃ uddhaccapātato rakkhaṇavasena niggaṇhāti. ^b^paggaṇhātī^eb^ti līnaṃ cittaṃ kosajjapātato rakkhaṇavasena paggaṇhāti. ^b^sampahaṃsetī^eb^ti samappavattaṃ cittaṃ tathāpavattiyaṃ paññāya toseti, uttejeti vā. yadā vā nirassādaṃ cittaṃ bhāvanāya na pakkhandati, tadā jātiādīni ^b^saṃvegavatthūni^eb^ (a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.418; itivu0 aṭṭha0 37) paccavekkhitvā sampahaṃseti samuttejeti. ^b^ajjhupekkhatī^eb^ti yadā pana cittaṃ alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ sammadeva bhāvanāvīthiṃ otiṇṇaṃ hoti, tadā paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu kañci byāpāraṃ akatvā samappavattesu yugesu sārathi viya ajjhupekkhati upekkhakova hoti. ^b^paṇītādhimuttiko^eb^ti paṇīte uttame maggaphale adhimutto ninnapoṇapabbhāro.

[03] ^b^suggahitaṃ katvā^eb^ti yathāvuttaṃ uggahakosallasaṅkhātaṃ vidhiṃ suṭṭhu uggahitaṃ pariyāpuṇanādinā supariggahitaṃ katvā. ^b^suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā^eb^ti manasikārakosallasaṅkhātaṃ vidhiṃ sammadeva sallakkhaṇavasena upadhāretvā. ^b^visesa^eb^nti pubbenāparaṃ bhāvanāya visesaṃ. ^b^punappunaṃ parivattetvā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānatantiṃ paguṇabhāvaṃ pāpento bhiyyo bhiyyo vācāya, manasā ca parivattetvā. ^b^gaṇṭhiṭṭhāna^eb^nti yathā rukkhassa dubbinibhedo araññassa vā gahanabhūto padeso ``gaṇṭhiṭṭhāna''nti vuccati, evaṃ kammaṭṭhānatantiyā atthato dubbinibhedo gahanabhūto ca padeso ``gaṇṭhiṭṭhāna''nti vuccati. taṃ paripucchanādiladdhena ñāṇapharasunā ^b^chinditvā^eb^.

[03] ^b^nimitta^eb^nti kammaṭṭhānanimittaṃ, asubhākāro. edisena payojanena luñcanampi anavajjanti dassetuṃ ^b^``luñcitvā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^chinnaṭṭhāne^eb^ti muṇḍitaṭṭhāne. ^b^vaṭṭatiyeva^eb^ nissaraṇajjhāsayena olokanato. ^b^ussadavasenā^eb^ti aphalitānaṃ, phalitānaṃ vā bahulatāvasena. ^b^disvāva nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ^eb^ dassanayogyatāya tacapañcakassa, itaresu sutvā ca ñatvā ca nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ.

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ ^b^addāriṭṭhakavaṇṇā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0305^ea^ ^a^V1.0288^ea^ abhinavāriṭṭhaphalavaṇṇā. ^b^kaṇṇacūḷikā^eb^ti uparikaṇṇasakkhalikāya parabhāgaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā,^eb^ kathaṃ? ^b^dve kesā ekato natthī^eb^ti.
[03] ^b^āsayo^eb^ti nissayo, paccayoti attho.
[03] 184^b^.^eb^ ^b^asambhinnakāḷakā^eb^ aññena vaṇṇena asammissakāḷakā.

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ pattasadisattā nakhā eva ^b^nakhapattāni^eb^. nakhā ^b^tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā^eb^ti visuṃ vavatthitataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. tameva hi atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``dve nakhā ekato natthī''^eb^ti āha.
[03] 186^b^.^eb^ ^b^dantapāḷiyā^eb^ti dantāvaliyā. ^b^yānakaupatthambhinī^eb^ti sakaṭassa dhuraṭṭhāne upatthambhakadaṇḍo. dantānaṃ ādhārabhūtā aṭṭhi ^b^hanukaṭṭhi^eb^.

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅkaḍḍhiyamānā^eb^ti sampiṇḍiyamānā. ^b^kosakārakakoso^eb^ upalliṇḍupoṭṭalakaṃ, yaṃ ``koseyyaphala''ntipi vuccati. ^b^puṭabandhaupāhano^eb^ sakalapiṭṭhipādacchādanaupāhano. ^b^ānisadaṃ^eb^ āsanapadeso. ^b^tūṇiro^eb^ sarāvāso. ^b^galakañcukaṃ^eb^ kaṇṭhattāṇaṃ. ^b^kīṭakulāvakaṃ^eb^ kharamukhakuṭi.

[03] ^b^anulomena paṭilomena cā^eb^ti ettha aṃsapadesato paṭṭhāya bāhuno piṭṭhipadesena otaraṇaṃ anulomo, maṇibandhato paṭṭhāya bāhuno purimabhāgena ārohanaṃ paṭilomo. ^b^teneva nayenā^eb^ti dakkhiṇahatthe vuttena nayena anulomena paṭilomena cāti attho. ^b^sukhumampī^eb^ti yathāvuttaoḷārikacammato sukhumaṃ. antomukhacammādikoṭṭhāsesu vā tacena paricchinnattā yaṃ durupalakkhaṇīyaṃ, taṃ ``sukhuma''nti vuttaṃ. tañhi vuttanayena ñāṇena tacaṃ vivaritvā passantassa pākaṭaṃ hoti. idha chavipi tacagatikā evāti ``taco ^b^upari ākāsena paricchinno''^eb^ti vutto.

[03] 188^b^.^eb^ ^b^nisadapoto^eb^ ^a^M1.0306^ea^ ^a^V1.0289^ea^ silāputtako. ^b^uddhanakoṭī^eb^ti mattikāpiṇḍena katauddhanassa koṭi. ^b^tālaguḷapaṭalaṃ^eb^ nāma pakkatālaphalalasikaṃ tālapaṭṭikādīsu limpitvā sukkhāpetvā uddharitvā gahitapaṭalaṃ. ^b^sukhuma^eb^nti yathāvuttamaṃsato sukhumaṃ. paṇhikamaṃsādithūlānaṃ sakalasarīrassa kisānaṃ yebhuyyena maṃsena paṭicchāditattā vuttaṃ ^b^``tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinna''^eb^nti.
[03] 189^b^.^eb^ jālākāro kañcuko ^b^jālakañcuko^eb^. visuṃ vavatthitabhāveneva nhārū ^b^tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā^eb^.

[03] 190^b^.^eb^ dantānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā ^b^``ṭhapetvā dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhīnī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^ekaṃ jaṇṇukaṭṭhi, ekaṃ ūruṭṭhī^eb^ti ^b^eka^eb^-ggahaṇaṃ ``ekekasmiṃ pāde''ti adhikatattā. ^b^evaṃ timattānī^eb^ti evaṃ mattasaddehi ānisadaṭṭhiādīni idha avuttānipi dassetīti veditabbaṃ. evañca katvā ``atirekatisatāṭṭhikasamussaya''nti (visuddhi0 1.122) idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^kīḷāgoḷakāni^eb^ suttena bandhitvā aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭetvā kīḷanagoḷakāni. ^b^dhanukadaṇḍo^eb^ dārakānaṃ kīḷanakakhuddakadhanukaṃ. tattha ^b^jaṅghaṭṭhikassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhāna^eb^nti jaṇṇukaṭṭhimhi pavisitvā ṭhitaṭṭhānanti adhippāyo. ^b^tena^eb^ ūruṭṭhinā patiṭṭhitaṃ ṭhānaṃ yaṃ ^b^kaṭiṭṭhino,^eb^ taṃ ^b^aggacchinnamahāpunnāgaphala^eb^sadisaṃ.

[03] kumbhakārena nipphāditaṃ uddhanaṃ ^b^kumbhakārikauddhanaṃ. sīsakapaṭṭaveṭhakaṃ^eb^ veṭhetvā ṭhapitaṃ sīsamayaṃ paṭṭakaṃ. yena suttaṃ kantanti, tasmiṃ takkamhi vijjhitvā ṭhapitagoḷakā vaṭṭanā nāma, vaṭṭanānaṃ āvaḷi ^b^vaṭṭanāvaḷi^eb^.
[03] maṇḍalākārena chinnavaṃsakaḷīrakhaṇḍāni ^b^vaṃsakaḷīracakkalakāni. avalekhanasatthakaṃ^eb^ ucchutacāvalekhanasatthakaṃ.
[03] 192^b^.^eb^ ^b^vakkabhāgena paricchinna^eb^nti vakkapariyantena bhāgena paricchinnaṃ. ito paresupi evarūpesu eseva nayo.

[03] 193^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaṃ^eb^ ^a^V1.0290^ea^ ^b^nissāyā^eb^ti yaṃ lohitaṃ nissāya, nissayanissayopi ``nissayo''tveva vuccati. bhavati hi kāraṇakāraṇepi kāraṇavohāro yathā ``corehi gāmo daḍḍho''ti. atha vā yasmiṃ rūpakalāpe hadayavatthu ^a^M1.0307^ea^, tampi lohitagatikameva hutvā tiṭṭhatīti ``yaṃ nissāyā''ti vuttaṃ.
[03] 194^b^.^eb^ ^b^paṇḍukadhātuka^eb^nti paṇḍusabhāvaṃ.
[03] 195^b^.^eb^ ^b^pariyonahanamaṃsa^eb^nti paṭicchādakamaṃsaṃ.
[03] 196^b^.^eb^ ^b^udarajivhāmaṃsa^eb^nti jivhāsaṇṭhānaṃ udarassa matthakapasse tiṭṭhanakamaṃsaṃ. ``nīla''nti vatvā nīlaṃ nāma bahudhātukanti āha ^b^``nigguṇḍipupphavaṇṇa''^eb^nti.
[03] 197^b^.^eb^ ^b^papphāsamaṃsa^eb^nti yathāṭhāne eva lambitvā thokaṃ parivattakamaṃsaṃ. ^b^nirasa^eb^nti nihīnarasaṃ. ^b^niroja^eb^nti nippabhaṃ, ojārahitaṃ vā.
[03] 198^b^.^eb^ ^b^obhaggā^eb^ti avabhujitvā ṭhitā. ^b^sakkharasudhāvaṇṇa^eb^nti marumbehi katasudhāvaṇṇaṃ. ``setasakkharasudhāvaṇṇa''ntipi pāṭho, setasakkharavaṇṇaṃ, sudhāvaṇṇañcāti attho.

[03] 199^b^.^eb^ antassa ābhujitvā ābhujitvā ṭhitappadesā ^b^antabhogaṭṭhānāni^eb^. tesaṃ bandhanabhūtaṃ antaguṇaṃ nāmāti dassento āha ^b^``antaguṇanti antabhogaṭṭhānesu bandhana''^eb^nti. ^b^kuddālapharasukammādīni karontānaṃ antabhoge agaḷante ekato ābandhitvā,^eb^ kiṃ viya? yantasuttakamiva yantaphalakānīti. kimiva tattha ṭhitanti āha ^b^``pādapuñchana...pe0... ṭhita''^eb^nti. purimañcettha ābandhanassa, dutiyaṃ ṭhānākārassa nidassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] 200^b^.^eb^ ^b^asitaṃ^eb^ nāma bhuttaṃ odanādi. ^b^pītaṃ^eb^ nāma pivanavasena ajjhohaṭapānakādi. ^b^khāyitaṃ^eb^ nāma saṃkhāditaṃ piṭṭhamūlaphalakhajjādi. ^b^sāyitaṃ^eb^ nāma assāditaṃ ambapakkamadhuphāṇitādi.

[03] ^b^yatthā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0291^ea^ yasmiṃ udare. ^b^ya^eb^nti ca udarameva paccāmasati. yattha pānabhojanādīni patitvā tiṭṭhatīti sambandho. ^b^suvānavamathu^eb^ sārameyyavantaṃ. ^b^viveka^eb^nti vibhāgaṃ.

[03] 201^b^.^eb^ ^b^heṭṭhānābhipiṭṭhikaṇṭakamūlānaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0308^ea^ ^b^antare^eb^ti purimabhāgavasena nābhiyā heṭṭhāpadesassa pacchimabhāgavasena heṭṭhimapiṭṭhikaṇṭakānaṃ vemajjhe. ^b^veḷunāḷikasadiso^eb^ padesoti adhippāyo.
[03] 202^b^.^eb^ ^b^samohita^eb^nti nicitaṃ.
[03] 204^b^.^eb^ pūtibhāvaṃ āpannaṃ kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ ^b^pūtikukkuṭaṇḍaṃ. uddeko^eb^ pittādīhi vinā kevalo uddhaṅgamavāto.
[03] 205^b^.^eb^ ^b^ācāmo^eb^ avassāvanakañjikaṃ.
[03] 206^b^.^eb^ ^b^vakkahadayayakanapapphāse temayamāna^eb^nti ettha yakanaṃ heṭṭhābhāgapūraṇeneva temeti, itarāni tesaṃ upari thokaṃ thokaṃ paggharaṇenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] 207^b^.^eb^ ^b^utuvikāro^eb^ uṇhavalāhakādihetuko. visamacchinno bhisādikalāpo visamaṃ udakaṃ paggharati, evamevaṃ sarīraṃ kesakūpādivivarehi upari, heṭṭhā, tiriyañca sedaṃ visamaṃ paggharatīti dassetuṃ ^b^visamacchinna^eb^-ggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.

[03] 208^b^.^eb^ ^b^visamāhāra^eb^nti tadāpavattamānasarīrāvatthāya asappāyāhāraṃ, atikaṭukāccuṇhādivisabhāgāhāraṃ vā. ^b^sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ (vibha0 aṭṭha0 356) pana ``visabhāgāhāra''ntveva vuttaṃ tadā pavattamānānaṃ dhātūnaṃ visabhāgattā.

[03] 209^b^.^eb^ ^b^``nhānakāle''^eb^ti idaṃ udakassa upari sinehassa sambhavadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^paribbhamantasinehabinduvisaṭasaṇṭhānā^eb^ti visaṭaṃ hutvā paribbhamantasinehabindusaṇṭhānā. ^b^utuvisabhāgo^eb^ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhāno. ^b^dhātuvisabhāgo^eb^ antosamuṭṭhāno. ^b^te padesā^eb^ti te hatthatalādipadesā.
[03] 210^b^.^eb^ ^b^kiñcī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0292^ea^ uṇhādirasānaṃ aññataraṃ āhāravatthu. ^b^nesa^eb^nti sattānaṃ. ^b^hadayaṃ āgilāyatī^eb^ti visabhāgāhārādiṃ paṭicca hadayappadeso vivattati.
[03] 211^b^.^eb^ dadhino ^a^M1.0309^ea^ vissandanāccharaso ^b^dadhimuttaṃ. gaḷitvā^eb^ti sanditvā. ^b^tālumatthakavivarena otaritvā^eb^ti matthakavivarato āgantvā tālumatthakena otaritvā.

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ telaṃ viya sakaṭassa nābhiakkhasīsānaṃ ^b^aṭṭhisandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā. kaṭakaṭāyantī^eb^ti ``kaṭa kaṭā''ti saddaṃ karonti. anuravadassanaṃ hetaṃ. ^b^dukkhantī^eb^ti dukkhitāni sañjātadukkhāni honti.

[03] 213^b^.^eb^ samūlakūlamāsaṃ jhāpetvā chārikaṃ avassāvetvā gahitayūso ^b^māsakhāro^eb^. ucchiṭṭhodakagabbhamalādīnaṃ chaḍḍanaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^candanikā. ravaṇaghaṭaṃ^eb^ nāma pakatiyā sammukhameva hoti. yassa pana āraggamattampi udakassa pavisanamukhaṃ natthi, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``amukhe ravaṇaghaṭe''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^āyūhana^eb^nti samīhanaṃ.

[03] 214^b^.^eb^ ^b^evañhī^eb^tiādi yathāvuttāya uggahakosallapaṭipattiyā nigamanaṃ. idāni yathāvuttaṃ manasikārakosallapaṭipattimpi nigamanavasena gahetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassetuṃ ^b^``anupubbato''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^paṇṇattisamatikkamāvasāne^eb^ti kesādipaṇṇattisamatikkamavasena pavattāya bhāvanāya avasāne. ^b^apubbāpariyamivā^eb^ti ekajjhamiva. ^b^kesāti iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā, evamādinā iminā pakārena vāti attho. ^b^te dhammā^eb^ti vaṇṇādivasena vavatthāpitā paṭikkūlākārato upaṭṭhitā koṭṭhāsadhammā.

[03] ^b^bahiddhāpī^eb^ti sasantānato bahipi, parasantānakāyepīti attho. ^b^manasikāraṃ upasaṃharatī^eb^ti yathāvuttaṃ paṭikkūlamanasikāraṃ upaneti. yathā idaṃ, tathā etanti. ^b^evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu pākaṭībhūtesū^eb^ti yathā attano kāye, evaṃ paresampi kāye sabbesu kesādikoṭṭhāsesu paṭikkūlavasena vibhūtabhāvena upaṭṭhitesūti attho. ayamettha kasiṇesu vaḍḍhanasadiso yogino bhāvanāviseso dassito.

[03] ^b^anupubbamuñcanādī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0293^ea^ ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena suttantanayena vibhāvitaṃ vīriyasamatāyojanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^punappunaṃ manasi karoto^eb^ti vuttanayena attano ^a^M1.0310^ea^ kāye kesādike ``paṭikkūlā paṭikkūlā''ti abhiṇhaso manasikāraṃ pavattentassa yadā saddhādīni indriyāni laddhasamathāni visadāni pavattanti, tadā assaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena sātisayaṃ balappattehi sattahi saddhammehi laddhūpatthambhāni vitakkādīni jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni hutvā pātubhavanti. tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkatāya nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi. upacārasamādhinā cittaṃ samādhiyati, so taṃyeva nimittaṃ āsevanto bhāvento bahulīkaronto appanaṃ pāpuṇāti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``anukkamena appanā uppajjatī''^eb^ti. ^b^sabbākārato^eb^ti vaṇṇādivasena pañcadhāpi. ^b^sā^eb^ti appanā.

[03] yadi panetaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ aviññāṇakāsubhakammaṭṭhānāni viya paṭhamajjhānavasena sijjhati, atha kasmā ``kāyagatāsatī''ti vuttanti āha ^b^``evaṃ paṭhamajjhānavasenā''^eb^tiādi. nānāvaṇṇasaṇṭhānādīsu dvattiṃsāya koṭṭhāsesu pavattamānāya satiyā kiccamettha sātisayanti āha ^b^``satibalena ijjhanato''^eb^ti.

[03] pantasenāsanesu, adhikusalesu ca aratiṃ, kāmaguṇesu ca ratiṃ sahati abhibhavatīti ^b^aratiratisaho^eb^ sarīrasabhāvacintanena anabhiratiyā pahīnattā. tathā koṭṭhāsabhāvanāya attasinehassa parikkhīṇattā ^b^bhayabheravaṃ sahati,^eb^ sītādīnañca ^b^adhivāsakajātiko^eb^ hoti. attasinehavasena hi purisassa bhayabheravaṃ hoti, dukkhassa ca anadhivāsanaṃ. imaṃ pana koṭṭhāsabhāvanamanuyuttassa na kevalaṃ paṭhamajjhānamattameva, uttaripi paṭivedho atthīti dassetuṃ ^b^``kesādīna''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] 215^b^.^eb^ yaṃ taṃ evaṃ pasaṃsitvā ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ niddiṭṭhanti sambandho. tattha yasmā ^b^``kathaṃ bhāvito''^eb^tiādikāya pucchāpāḷiyā atthe vibhāvite thomanāpāḷiyāpi attho vibhāvitoyeva hoti bhedābhāvato, tasmā taṃ laṅghitvā ^b^``kathaṃ bhāvito cā''^eb^tiādinā ārabhati. tattha hi ito pasaṃsābhāvo ``ayampi kho''ti vacanañca viseso. tesu pasaṃsābhāvaṃ ^a^V1.0294^ea^ dassetuṃ ^b^``evaṃ pasaṃsitvā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. pasaṃsā ca tattha abhirucijananena ussāhanatthā. tañhi sutvā bhikkhū ``bhagavā imaṃ samādhiṃ anekehi ākārehi pasaṃsati, santo ^a^M1.0311^ea^ kirāyaṃ samādhi paṇīto ca asecanako ca sukho ca vihāro pāpadhamme ca ṭhānaso antaradhāpetī''ti sañjātābhirucayo ussāhajātā sakkaccaṃ anuyuñjitabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ maññanti. ``ayampi kho''ti padassa ye ime mayā nibbānamahāsarassa otaraṇatitthabhūtā kasiṇajjhānāsubhajjhānādayo desitā, na kevalaṃ te eva, ayampi khoti bhagavā attano paccakkhabhūtaṃ samādhiṃ desanānubhāvena tesampi bhikkhūnaṃ āsannaṃ, paccakkhañca karonto sampiṇḍanavasena evamāhāti sambandhamukhena attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^soḷasavatthuka^eb^nti catūsu anupassanāsu catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena soḷasaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^sabbākāraparipūro^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānapāḷiyā padattho piṇḍattho upamā codanā parihāro payojananti evamādīhi sabbehi ākārehi paripuṇṇo. ^b^niddeso^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānassa nissesato vitthāro.

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ ^b^katha^eb^nti idaṃ pucchanākāravibhāvanapadaṃ. pucchā cettha kathetukamyatāvasena aññāsaṃ asambhavato. sā ca upari desanaṃ āruḷhānaṃ sabbesaṃ pakāravisesānaṃ āmasanavasenāti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^``kathanti...pe0... kamyatāpucchā''^eb^ti āha. ^b^kathaṃ bahulīkato^eb^ti etthāpi ``ānāpānassatisamādhī''ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. tattha ^b^katha^eb^nti ānāpānassatisamādhibahulīkāraṃ nānappakārato vitthāretukamyatāpucchā. ^b^bahulīkato ānāpānassatisamādhī^eb^ti tathāpuṭṭhadhammanidassananti imamatthaṃ ^b^``eseva nayo''^eb^ti iminā atidisati. tathā santabhāvādayopi tassa yehi bhāvanābahulīkārehi siddhā, taggahaṇeneva gahitā hontīti dassetuṃ ^b^``kathaṃ bahulīkato...pe0... vūpasametīti etthāpi eseva nayo''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] ``puna ca paraṃ, udāyi, akkhātā mayā sāvakānaṃ paṭipadā, yathāpaṭipannā me sāvakā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāventī''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 2.247) uppādanavaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanā vuccatīti tadubhayavasena atthaṃ dassento ^b^``bhāvitoti uppādito vaḍḍhito vā''^eb^ti āha. tattha bhāvaṃ vijjamānataṃ ito gatoti ^b^bhāvito,^eb^ uppādito paṭiladdhamattoti attho. ^b^uppanno^eb^ pana laddhāsevano, ^b^bhāvito^eb^ paguṇabhāvaṃ āpādito, vaḍḍhitoti attho ^a^M1.0312^ea^. ^b^ānāpānapariggāhikāyā^eb^ti dīgharassādivisesehi saddhiṃ assāsapassāse paricchijjagāhikāya, te ārabbha pavattāya, satiyaṃ ^a^V1.0295^ea^ paccayabhūtāyanti attho. purimasmiñhi atthe samādhissa satiyā sahajātādipaccayabhāvo vutto sampayuttavacanato, dutiyasmiṃ pana upanissayabhāvopi. upacārajjhānasahagatā hi sati appanāsamādhissa upanissayo hotīti. ^b^bahulīkato^eb^ti bahulaṃ pavattito, tena āvajjanādivasībhāvappattimāha. yo hi vasībhāvaṃ āpādito, so icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjitabbato punappunaṃ pavattīyati. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``punappunaṃ kato''^eb^ti. yathā ``idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo''ti (ma0 ni0 1.139; a0 ni0 4.241), ``vivicceva kāmehī''ti (dī0 ni0 1.226; saṃ0 ni0 2.152; a0 ni0 4.123) ca evamādīsu paṭhamapade vutto eva-saddo dutiyādīsupi vutto eva hoti, evamidhāpīti āha ^b^``ubhayattha evasaddena niyamo veditabbo''^eb^ti. ubhayapadaniyamena laddhaguṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``ayañhī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^asubhakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti asubhārammaṇajhānamāha. taṃ hi asubhesu yogakammabhāvato, yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato ca ``asubhakammaṭṭhāna''nti vuccati. ^b^``kevala''^eb^nti iminā ārammaṇaṃ nivatteti. ^b^paṭivedhavasenā^eb^ti jhānapaṭivedhavasena. jhānañhi bhāvanāvisesena ijjhantaṃ attano visayaṃ paṭivijjhantameva pavattati, yathāsabhāvato paṭivijjhīyati cāti ``paṭivedho''ti vuccati. ^b^oḷārikārammaṇattā^eb^ti bībhacchārammaṇattā. ^b^paṭikkūlārammaṇattā^eb^ti jigucchitabbārammaṇattā. ^b^pariyāyenā^eb^ti kāraṇena, lesantarena vā. ^b^ārammaṇasantatāyā^eb^ti anukkamena vicetabbataṃ pattaṃ ārammaṇassa paramasukhumataṃ sandhāyāha. sante hi sannisinne ārammaṇe pavattamāno dhammo sayampi sannisinnova hoti. tenāha ^b^``santo vūpasanto nibbuto''^eb^ti, nibbutasabbapariḷāhoti attho. ārammaṇasantatāya tadārammaṇadhammānaṃ santatā lokuttaradhammārammaṇāhi paccavekkhaṇāhi dīpetabbā.

[03] nāssa santapaṇītabhāvāvahaṃ kiñci secananti ^b^asecanako^eb^. asecanakattā ^b^anāsittako^eb^. anāsittakattā eva ^b^abbokiṇṇo^eb^ asammisso parikammādinā. tato eva ^b^pāṭiyekko^eb^ visuṃyeveko. ^b^āveṇiko^eb^ asādhāraṇo. sabbametaṃ sarasato eva santabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^a^M1.0313^ea^ vuttaṃ. ^b^parikammaṃ^eb^ vā santabhāvanimittaṃ, ^b^parikamma^eb^nti ca kasiṇakaraṇādīni nimittuppādapariyosānaṃ, tādisaṃ idha natthīti adhippāyo. tadā hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ nirassādattā asantamappaṇītaṃ siyā. ^b^upacārena^eb^ vā natthi ettha santatāti yojanā. yathā upacārakkhaṇe nīvaraṇavigamena, aṅgapātubhāvena ^a^V1.0296^ea^ ca paresaṃ santatā hoti, na evamimassa. ayaṃ pana ādisamannā...pe0... paṇīto cāti yojanā. ^b^kecī^eb^ti uttaravihāravāsike sandhāyāha. ^b^anāsittako^eb^ti upasecanena na āsittako. tenāha ^b^``ojavanto''^eb^ti, ojavantasadisoti attho. ^b^madhūro^eb^ti iṭṭho, cetasikasukhapaṭilābhasaṃvattanaṃ tikacatukkajjhānavasena, upekkhāya vā santabhāvena sukhagatikattā sabbesampi vasena veditabbaṃ. jhānasamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭṭhasarīratāvasena pana kāyikasukhapaṭilābhasaṃvattanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tañca kho jhānato vuṭṭhitakāle. imasmiṃ pakkhe ^b^``appitappitakkhaṇe''^eb^ti idaṃ hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^avikkhambhite^eb^ti jhānena sakasantānato anīhaṭe appahīne. ^b^akosallasambhūte^eb^ti akosallaṃ vuccati avijjā, tato sambhūte. avijjāpubbaṅgamā hi sabbe pāpadhammā. ^b^khaṇenevā^eb^ti attano pavattikkhaṇeneva. ^b^antaradhāpetī^eb^ti ettha antaradhāpanaṃ vināsanaṃ, taṃ pana jhānakattukassa idhādhippetattā pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ hotīti āha ^b^``vikkhambhetī''^eb^ti. ^b^vūpasametī^eb^ti visesena upasameti. visesena upasamanaṃ pana sammadeva upasamanaṃ hotīti āha ^b^``suṭṭhu upasametī''^eb^ti.

[03] nanu ca aññopi samādhi attano pavattikkhaṇeneva paṭipakkhadhamme antaradhāpeti vūpasameti, atha kasmā ayameva samādhi evaṃ visesetvā vuttoti? pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya nānāvitakkavūpasamasabbhāvato. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``ānāpānassati bhāvetabbā vitakkupacchedāyā''ti (a0 ni0 9.1; udā0 31). apica tikkhapaññassa ñāṇuttarassetaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ, ñāṇuttarassa ca kilesappahānaṃ itarehi sātisayaṃ, yathā saddhādhimuttehi diṭṭhippattassa. tasmā imaṃ visesaṃ sandhāya ^b^``ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasametī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. atha vā nimittapātubhāve sati khaṇeneva aṅgapātubhāvasabbhāvato ayameva samādhi ``ṭhānaso antaradhāpeti vūpasametī''ti vutto. yathā taṃ mahato akālameghassa uṭṭhitassa dhārānipāte khaṇeneva pathaviyaṃ ^a^M1.0314^ea^ rajojallassa vūpasamo. tenāha -- ``seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, mahāakālamegho uṭṭhito''tiādi (saṃ0 ni0 5.985; pārā0 165). sāsanikassa jhānabhāvanā yebhuyyena nibbedhabhāgiyāva hotīti āha ^b^``nibbedhabhāgiyattā''^eb^ti. buddhānaṃ pana ekaṃsena nibbedhabhāgiyāva hoti. imameva hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ bhāvetvā sabbepi sammāsambuddhā sammāsambodhiṃ adhigacchanti. ariyamaggassa pādakabhūto ayaṃ samādhi anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā ariyamaggabhāvaṃ upagato viya hotīti āha ^b^``anupubbena ariyamaggavuddhippatto''^eb^ti.

[03] ayaṃ ^a^V1.0297^ea^ panattho virāganirodhapaṭinissaggānupassanānaṃ vasena sammadeva yujjati. heṭṭhā papañcavasena vuttamatthaṃ sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ saṅgahetvā dassento ^b^``ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho''^eb^ti āha, piṇḍatthoti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] 217^b^.^eb^ ^b^tamattha^eb^nti taṃ ``kathaṃ bhāvito''tiādinā pucchāvasena saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ. ``idha tathāgato loke uppajjatī''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 1.190; ma0 ni0 1.291; a0 ni0 3.61) idha-saddo lokaṃ upādāya vutto, ``idheva tiṭṭhamānassā''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 2.369) okāsaṃ, ``idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī assaṃ pavārito''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.30) padapūraṇamattaṃ, ``idha bhikkhu dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇātī''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 5.73) pana sāsanaṃ, ``idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhū''ti idhāpi sāsanamevāti dassento ``bhikkhave, imasmiṃ sāsane bhikkhū''ti vatvā tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ ^b^``ayañhī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sabbappakārāanāpānassatisamādhinibbattakassā^eb^ti sabbappakāraggahaṇaṃ soḷasa pakāre sandhāya. te hi imasmiṃyeva sāsane. bāhirakā hi jānantā ādito catuppakārameva jānanti. tenāha ^b^``aññasāsanassa tathābhāvapaṭisedhano''^eb^ti, yathāvuttassa puggalassa nissayabhāvapaṭisedhanoti attho. etena ^b^``idha bhikkhave''^eb^ti idaṃ antogadhevasaddanti dasseti. santi hi ekapadānipi sāvadhāraṇāni yathā ``vāyubhakkho''ti. tenevāha ^b^``idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo''^eb^tiādi. paripuṇṇasamaṇakaraṇadhammo hi so, yo sabbappakārāanāpānassatisamādhinibbattako. ^b^parappavādā^eb^ti paresaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ nānappakārā vādā titthāyatanāni.

[03] araññādikasseva ^a^M1.0315^ea^ bhāvanānurūpasenāsanataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``imassa hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. duddamo damathaṃ anupagato goṇo ^b^kūṭagoṇo^eb^. yathā thanehi sabbaso khīraṃ na paggharati, evaṃ dohapaṭibandhinī ^b^kūṭadhenu^eb^. rūpasaddādike paṭicca uppajjanako assādo ^b^rūpārammaṇādiraso. pubbe āciṇṇārammaṇa^eb^nti pabbajjato pubbe, anādimati vā saṃsāre paricitārammaṇaṃ.

[03] ^b^nibandheyyā^eb^ti bandheyya. ^b^satiyā^eb^ti sammadeva kammaṭṭhānasallakkhaṇasampavattāya satiyā. ^b^ārammaṇe^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe. ^b^daḷha^eb^nti thiraṃ, yathā satokārissa upacārappanābhedo samādhi ijjhati, tathā thāmagataṃ katvāti attho.

[03] ^b^visesādhigamadiṭṭhadhammasukhavihārapadaṭṭhāna^eb^nti ^a^V1.0298^ea^ sabbesaṃ buddhānaṃ, ekaccānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ, buddhasāvakānañca visesādhigamassa ceva aññakammaṭṭhānena adhigatavisesānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārassa ca padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ.
[03] ^b^vatthuvijjācariyo viya bhagavā^eb^ yogīnaṃ anurūpanivāsaṭṭhānupadisanato.

[01] ^b^bhikkhu dīpisadiso^eb^ araññe ekiko viharitvā paṭipakkhanimmathanena icchitatthasādhanato. ^b^phalamuttama^eb^nti sāmaññaphalamāha. ^b^parakkamajavayoggabhūmi^eb^nti bhāvanussāhajavassa yoggakaraṇabhūmibhūtaṃ.

[03] 218^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ vuttalakkhaṇesū^eb^ti ^b^abhidhammapariyāyena^eb^ (vibha0 530), ^b^suttantapariyāyena^eb^ ca vuttalakkhaṇesu. ^b^rukkhasamīpa^eb^nti ``yāvatā majjhanhike kāle samantā chāyā pharati, nivāte paṇṇāni patanti, ettāvatā rukkhamūlanti vuccatī''ti evaṃ vuttaṃ rukkhassa samīpaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^avasesasattavidhasenāsana^eb^nti pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ vanapatthaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñjanti evaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^ututtayānukūlaṃ dhātucariyānukūla^eb^nti gimhādiututtayassa, semhādidhātuttayassa, mohādicariyattayassa ca anukūlaṃ. tathā hi gimhakāle ca araññaṃ anukūlaṃ, hemante rukkhamūlaṃ, vassakāle suññāgāraṃ, semhadhātukassa semhapakatikassa araññaṃ, pittadhātukassa rukkhamūlaṃ ^a^M1.0316^ea^, vātadhātukassa suññāgāraṃ anukūlaṃ, mohacaritassa araññaṃ, dosacaritassa rukkhamūlaṃ, rāgacaritassa suññāgāraṃ anukūlaṃ. ^b^alīnānuddhaccapakkhika^eb^nti asaṅkocāvikkhepapakkhikaṃ. sayanañhi kosajjapakkhikaṃ, ṭhānacaṅkamanāni uddhaccapakkhikāni, na evaṃ nisajjā. tato evassa santatā. ^b^nisajjāya daḷhabhāvaṃ^eb^ pallaṅkābhujanena, ^b^assāsapassāsānaṃ pavattanasukhataṃ^eb^ uparimakāyassa ujukaṭṭhapanena, ^b^ārammaṇapariggahūpāyaṃ^eb^ parimukhaṃ satiyā ṭhapanena ^b^dassento. ūrubaddhāsana^eb^nti ūrūnamadhobandhanavasena nisajjā. heṭṭhimakāyassa anujukaṃ ṭhapanaṃ nisajjā-vacaneneva bodhitanti ^b^``ujuṃ kāya''^eb^nti ettha ^b^kāya^eb^-saddo uparimakāyavisayoti āha ^b^``uparimasarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā''^eb^ti. taṃ pana ujukaṭṭhapanaṃ sarūpato, payojanato ca dassetuṃ ^b^``aṭṭhārasā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^na paṇamantī^eb^ti na onamanti. ^b^na paripatatī^eb^ti ^a^V1.0299^ea^ na vigacchati vīthiṃ na vilaṅghati, tato eva pubbenāparaṃ visesuppattiyā ^b^vuddhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati^eb^. idha ^b^pari^eb^-saddo ^b^abhi^eb^-saddena samānatthoti āha ^b^``kammaṭṭhānābhimukha''^eb^nti, bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇato nivāretvā kammaṭṭhānaṃyeva purakkhitvāti attho. ^b^parīti pariggahaṭṭho^eb^ ``pariṇāyikā''tiādīsu (dha0 sa0 16) viya. ^b^niyyānaṭṭho^eb^ paṭipakkhato niggamanaṭṭho. tasmā ^b^pariggahitaniyyāna^eb^nti sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ satiṃ katvā, paramaṃ satinepakkaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti attho.

[03] 219^b^.^eb^ ^b^satovā^eb^ti satiyā samannāgato eva saranto eva ^b^assasati^eb^ nāssa kāci sativirahitā assāsappavatti hotīti attho. ^b^sato passasatī^eb^ti etthāpi satova passasatīti eva-saddo ānetvā vattabbo. ^b^satokārī^eb^ti sato eva hutvā, satiyā eva vā kātabbassa kattā, karaṇasīlo vā. yadi ``satova assasati sato passasatī''ti etassa ^b^vibhaṅge^eb^ (ma0 ni0 3.148; saṃ0 ni0 5.986; pārā0 165) vuttaṃ, atha kasmā ``assasati passasati''cceva avatvā ``satokārī''ti vuttaṃ? ekarasaṃ desanaṃ kātukāmatāya. paṭhamacatukke padadvayameva hi vattamānakālavasena āgataṃ, itarāni anāgatakālavasena. tasmā ekarasaṃ desanaṃ kātukāmatāya ^b^sabbattha^eb^ (paṭi0 ma0 1.165 ādayo) ``satokāri''cceva vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^dīghaṃ^eb^ ^a^M1.0317^ea^ ^b^assāsavasenā^eb^ti dīghāssāsavasena vibhattialopaṃ katvā niddeso. ^b^dīgha^eb^nti vā bhagavatā vuttāssāsavasena. ^b^cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepa^eb^nti vikkhepassa paṭipakkhabhāvato ``avikkhepo''ti laddhanāmacittassa ekaggabhāvaṃ pajānato. ^b^sati upaṭṭhitā hotī^eb^ti ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhitā hoti. ^b^tāya satiyā tena ñāṇenā^eb^ti yathāvuttāya satiyā, yathāvuttena ca ñāṇena. idaṃ vutta hoti -- dīghaṃ assāsaṃ ārammaṇabhūtaṃ avikkhittacittassa, asammohato vā pajānantassa tattha sati upaṭṭhitā eva hoti, taṃ sampajānantassa ārammaṇakaraṇavasena, asammohavasena vā sampajaññaṃ, tadadhīnasatisampajaññena taṃsamaṅgī yogāvacaro satokārī nāma hotīti. ^b^paṭinissaggānupassī assāsavasenā^eb^ti paṭinissaggānupassī hutvā assasanassa vasena. ``paṭinissaggānupassīassāsavasenā''ti vā pāṭho. tassa paṭinissaggānupassino assāsā paṭinissaggānupassīassāsā, tesaṃ vasenāti attho. vinayanayena anto uṭṭhitasasanaṃ ^b^assāso,^eb^ bahi uṭṭhitasasanaṃ ^b^passāso^eb^. suttantanayena pana bahi uṭṭhahitvāpi anto sasanato ^b^assāso,^eb^ anto uṭṭhahitvāpi bahi sasanato ^b^passāso^eb^. ayameva ca nayo --

[02] ``assāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ ^a^V1.0300^ea^ satiyā anugacchato ajjhattaṃ vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā''ti, ``passāsādimajjhapariyosānaṃ satiyā anugacchato bahiddhā vikkhepagatena cittena kāyopi cittampi sāraddhā ca honti iñjitā ca phanditā cā''ti (paṭi0 ma0 1.157) --
[25] imāya ^b^pāḷiyā^eb^ sameti.

[03] ^b^paṭhamaṃ abbhantaravāto bahi nikkhamati,^eb^ tasmā pavattikkamena assāso paṭhamaṃ vuttoti vadanti. ^b^tāluṃ āhacca nibbāyatī^eb^ti tāluṃ āhacca nirujjhati. tena kira sampatijāto bāladārako khipitaṃ karoti. ^b^evaṃ tāvā^eb^tiādi yathāvuttassa atthassa nigamanaṃ. keci ``evaṃ tāvāti anena pavattikkamena assāso bahinikkhamanavātoti gahetabbanti adhippāyo''ti vadanti.

[03] ^b^addhānavasenā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0318^ea^ kāladdhānavasena. ayaṃ hi ^b^addhāna^eb^-saddo kālassa, desassa ca vācako. tattha desaddhānaṃ udāharaṇabhāvena dassetvā kāladdhānavasena assāsapassāsānaṃ dīgharassataṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``yathā hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^okāsaddhāna^eb^nti okāsabhūtaṃ addhānaṃ. ^b^pharitvā^eb^ti byāpetvā. ^b^cuṇṇavicuṇṇāpi^eb^ anekakalāpabhāvena. ^b^dīghaṃ addhāna^eb^nti dīghaṃ padesaṃ. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti saṇikaṃ pavattiyā dīghasantānatāya ``dīghā''ti vuccanti. ettha ca hatthiādisarīre, sunakhādisarīre ca assāsapassāsānaṃ desaddhānavisiṭṭhena kāladdhānavaseneva dīgharassatā vuttāti veditabbā. ``saṇikaṃ pūretvā saṇikameva nikkhamanti'', ``sīghaṃ pūretvā sīghameva nikkhamantī''ti ca vacanato. ^b^manussesū^eb^ti samānappamāṇesupi manussasarīresu. ^b^dīghaṃ assasantī^eb^ti dīghaṃ assāsappabandhaṃ pavattentīti attho. ^b^passasantī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. sunakhasasādayo viya rassaṃ assasanti ca passasanti cāti yojanā. idaṃ pana dīghaṃ, rassañca assasanaṃ, passasanañca tesaṃ sattānaṃ sarīrasabhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^tesa^eb^nti sattānaṃ. ^b^te^eb^ti assāsapassāsā. ^b^ittaramaddhāna^eb^nti appakaṃ kālaṃ.

[03] ^b^navahākārehī^eb^ti bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa pubbenāparaṃ aladdhavisesassa kevalaṃ addhānavasena ādito ^a^V1.0301^ea^ vuttā tayo ākārā, te ca kho ekacco assāsaṃ suṭṭhu sallakkheti, ekacco passāsaṃ, ekacco tadubhayanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena. keci pana ``assasatipi passasatipīti ekajjhaṃ vacanaṃ bhāvanāya nirantaraṃ pavattidassanattha''nti vadanti. chandavasena pubbe viya tayo, tathā pāmojjavasenāti imehi navahākārehi.

[03] kāmaṃ cettha ekassa puggalassa tayo eva ākārā labbhanti, tantivasena pana sabbesaṃ pāḷiāruḷhattā, tesaṃ vasena parikammassa kātabbattā ca ^b^``tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu navahākārehī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^evaṃ pajānato^eb^ti evaṃ yathāvuttehi ākārehi assāsapassāse pajānato, tattha manasikāraṃ pavattentassa. ^b^ekenākārenā^eb^ti dīghaṃ assāsādīsu catūsu ākāresu ekena ākārena, navasu tīsu vā ekena. tathā hi vakkhati --
[21] ``dīgho rasso ca assāso, passāsopi ca tādiso.
[22] cattāro vaṇṇā vattanti, nāsikagge va bhikkhuno''ti..
[03] ayaṃ ^a^M1.0319^ea^ bhāvanā assāsapassāsakāyānupassanāti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā sampajjatī''^eb^ti.

[03] idāni pāḷivaseneva te nava ākāre, bhāvanāvidhiñca dassetuṃ ^b^``yathāhā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^kathaṃ pajānātī^eb^ti pajānanavidhiṃ kathetukamyatāya pucchati. ^b^dīghaṃ assāsa^eb^nti vuttalakkhaṇaṃ dīghaṃ assāsaṃ. ^b^addhānasaṅkhāte^eb^ti ``addhāna''nti saṅkhaṃ gate dīghe kāle, dīghaṃ khaṇanti attho. koṭṭhāsapariyāyo vā saṅkhāta-saddo ``theyyasaṅkhāta''ntiādīsu (pārā0 91) viya, tasmā addhānasaṅkhāteti addhānakoṭṭhāse, desabhāgeti attho. ^b^chando uppajjatī^eb^ti bhāvanāya pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ āvahantiyā laddhassādattā tattha sātisayo kattukāmatālakkhaṇo kusalacchando uppajjati. ^b^chandavasenā^eb^ti tathāpavattachandassa vasena savisesaṃ bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuddhiṃ phātiṃ gamentassa. ^b^tato sukhumatara^eb^nti yathāvuttachandappavattiyā purimato sukhumataraṃ. bhāvanābalena hi paṭippassaddhadarathapariḷāhatāya kāyassa assāsapassāsā sukhumatarā hutvā pavattanti. ^b^pāmojjaṃ uppajjatī^eb^ti assāsapassāsānaṃ sukhumatarabhāvena ārammaṇassa santataratāya, kammaṭṭhānassa ca vīthipaṭipannatāya bhāvanācittasahagato pamodo khuddikādibhedā ^a^V1.0302^ea^ taruṇapīti uppajjati. ^b^cittaṃ vivattatī^eb^ti anukkamena assāsapassāsānaṃ ativiya sukhumatarabhāvappattiyā anupaṭṭhahane vicetabbākārappattehi cittaṃ vinivattatīti keci. bhāvanābalena pana sukhumatarabhāvappattesu assāsapassāsesu tattha paṭibhāganimitte uppanne pakatiassāsapassāsato cittaṃ nivattati. ^b^upekkhā saṇṭhātī^eb^ti tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte upacārappanābhede samādhimhi uppanne puna jhānanibbattanatthaṃ byāpārābhāvato ajjhupekkhanaṃ hotīti. sā panāyaṃ upekkhā tatramajjhattupekkhāti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^imehi navahi ākārehī^eb^ti imehi yathāvuttehi navahi pakārehi pavattā. ^b^dīghaṃ assāsapassāsā kāyo^eb^ti dīghākārā assāsapassāsā cuṇṇavicuṇṇāpi samūhaṭṭhena kāyo. assāsapassāse nissāya uppannanimittampettha assāsapassāsasamaññameva vuttaṃ. ^b^upaṭṭhānaṃ satī^eb^ti ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā tiṭṭhatīti sati upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. ^b^anupassanā^eb^ ^a^M1.0320^ea^ ^b^ñāṇa^eb^nti samathavasena nimittassa anupassanā, vipassanāvasena assāsapassāse, tannissayañca kāyaṃ ``rūpa''nti, cittaṃ taṃsampayuttadhamme ca ``arūpa''nti vavatthapetvā nāmarūpassa anupassanā ca ñāṇaṃ, tattha yathābhūtāvabodho. ^b^kāyo upaṭṭhāna^eb^nti so kāyo ārammaṇakaraṇavasena upagantvā sati ettha tiṭṭhatīti upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma. ettha ca ``kāyo upaṭṭhāna''nti iminā itarakāyassāpi saṅgaho hoti yathāvuttasammasanacārassāpi idha icchitattā. ^b^no satī^eb^ti so kāyo sati nāma na hoti. ^b^sati upaṭṭhānañceva sati ca^eb^ saraṇaṭṭhena, upatiṭṭhanaṭṭhena ca. ^b^tāya satiyā^eb^ti yathāvuttāya satiyā. ^b^tena ñāṇenā^eb^ti yathāvutteneva ñāṇena. ^b^taṃ kāya^eb^nti taṃ assāsapassāsakāyañceva tannissayarūpakāyañca. ^b^anupassatī^eb^ti jhānasampayuttañāṇena ceva vipassanāñāṇena ca anu anu passati. ^b^tena vuccati kāye kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā^eb^ti tena anupassanena yathāvutte kāye ayaṃ kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanāti vuccati.

[03] idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yā ayaṃ yathāvutte assāsapassāsakāye, tassa nissayabhūte karajakāye ca kāyasseva anupassanā anudakabhūtāya marīciyā udakānupassanā viya na aniccādisabhāve kāye niccādibhāvānupassanā, atha kho yathārahaṃ aniccadukkhānattāsubhabhāvassevānupassanā. atha vā kāye ``aha''nti vā ``mama''nti vā ``itthī''ti vā ``puriso''ti vā gahetabbassa kassaci abhāvato tādisaṃ ananupassitvā kāyamattasseva anupassanā ^a^V1.0303^ea^ ^b^kāyānupassanā,^eb^ tāya kāyānupassanāya sampayuttā satiyeva upaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^satipaṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ tassa bhāvanā vaḍḍhanā ^b^kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānabhāvanā^eb^ti.
