[03] 250^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhātuvinibbhogo^eb^ti sasambhārasaṅkhepādinā dhātūnaṃ vinibbhujanaṃ. aparādho nāma aparajjhantassa puggalassa rūpadhammamukhena gayhatīti katvā āha ^b^``kiṃ kesānaṃ kujjhasī''^eb^tiādi, kesādivinimuttassa aparajjhanakassa puggalassa abhāvato. idāni nibbattitaparamatthadhammavaseneva ^a^V1.0341^ea^ vinibbhogavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``atha vā panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. pañcakkhandhe upādāya, dvādasāyatanāni upādāyāti paccekaṃ ^b^upādāya^eb^-saddo yojetabbo. ^b^kodhassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ na hotī^eb^ti yathā āragge sāsapassa, ākāse ca cittakammassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ natthi, evamassa ``verī''ti parikappite puggale kodhassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānaṃ na hoti, kesādīnaṃ akujjhitabbato, tabbinimuttassa ca puggalassa abhāvato.

[03] 251^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṃvibhāgo^eb^ti āmisasaṃvibhāgo. ^b^parassā^eb^ti paccatthikassa. ^b^bhinnājīvo^eb^ti aparisuddhājīvo. ^b^tassevaṃ karoto^eb^ti evaṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ karontassa tassa dāyakassa. ^b^itarassā^eb^ti paṭiggāhakassa. ^b^``mama mātarā^eb^ ^b^upāsikāya^eb^ ^a^M1.0362^ea^ ^b^dinno''^eb^ti idaṃ ^b^``dhammiyalābho''^eb^ti etassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. tena pana tassa āgamanasuddhiṃ dasseti.

[01] ^b^sabbatthasādhaka^eb^nti ``attattho parattho diṭṭhadhammiko attho samparāyiko attho''ti (mahāni0 69; cūḷani0 mogharājamāṇavapucchāniddesa 85; paṭi0 ma0 3.5) evamādīnaṃ sabbesaṃ atthānaṃ, hitānaṃ, payojanānañca nipphādakaṃ. ^b^unnamanti^eb^ dāyakā. ^b^namanti^eb^ paṭiggāhakā.

[03] 252^b^.^eb^ ^b^eva^eb^nti yathāvuttehi kakacūpamovādānussaraṇādīhi attano ovadanākārehi. ^b^vūpasantapaṭighassā^eb^ti paṭisaṅkhānabalena vinoditāghātassa. ^b^tasmimpī^eb^ti verīpuggalepi. ^b^verī^eb^-gahaṇeneva cettha appiyapuggalassāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ verimhi mettāya siddhāya tasmimpi mettāsiddhito, piyato pana atippiyasahāyakassa visuṃ gahaṇaṃ āsannapaccatthikassa dubbinimocayabhāvadassanatthaṃ. ^b^mettāvasenā^eb^ti mettāyanavasena. ^b^samacittata^eb^nti hitūpasaṃhārena samānacittataṃ. ^b^sīmāsambhedo^eb^ sā eva samacittatā. ^b^imasmiṃ puggale^eb^ti mettākammaṭṭhānikapuggale. ^b^nisinne^eb^ti bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe bhummaṃ.

[03] ^b^hitamajjhatte^eb^ti piye, majjhatte ca. ^b^catubbidhe^eb^ti catubbidhe jane, yattha katthacīti adhippāyo. ^b^nānatta^eb^nti piyamajjhattādinānākaraṇaṃ. ^b^hitacittova pāṇina^eb^nti kevalaṃ sattesu hitacitto evāti pavuccati, na pana ``mettāya nikāmalābhī''ti vā ``kusalī''ti vā pavuccati. kasmā? yasmā attādīsu passati nānattanti. kasmā panāyaṃ hitacitto kusalīti na vuccatīti? sātisayassa kusalassa vasena kusalibhāvassa adhippetattā. imassa ca ^a^V1.0342^ea^ puggalassa mettābhāvanā na visesavatī. atha vā ^b^na nikāmalābhī mettāya^eb^ yato attādīsu passati nānattaṃ. ^b^kusalī^eb^ti pavuccati, yasmā hitacittova pāṇinanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. gāmasīmādayo viya gāmantarādīhi sattasaṅkhāte mettāvisaye bhāvanāya pubbe aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇamariyādārūpena ṭhitattā attādayo idha sīmā nāmāti āha ^b^``catasso sīmāyo''^eb^ti. ^b^sambhinnā hontī^eb^ti ettha vuttaṃ sambhedaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``samaṃ pharati mettāyā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^mahāviseso^eb^ti mahanto bhāvanāya viseso atisayo. ^b^purimena^eb^ purimato attādinānattadassinā. ^b^na nāyatī^eb^ti na ñāyati.

[03] 253^b^.^eb^ ^b^nimitta^eb^nti ^a^M1.0363^ea^ yathā kasiṇakammaṭṭhānādīsu taṃtaṃkasiṇamaṇḍalādipariggahamukhena bhāvanāvasena laddhaṃ uggahanimittaṃ nissāya jhānassa gocarabhāvena paṭibhāganimittaṃ upatiṭṭhati, na evamidha upaṭṭhitaṃ nimittaṃ nāma atthi. yo panāyaṃ yathāvutto sīmāsambhedo laddho, sveva nimittaṃ viyāti nimittaṃ. tasmiṃ hi laddhe bhāvanāya sātisayattā nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti, kilesā sannisinnāva, upacārasamādhinā cittaṃ samāhitameva. tenāha ^b^``nimittañca upacārañca laddhaṃ hotī''^eb^ti. ^b^tameva nimitta^eb^nti sīmāsambhedavasena pavattasamathanimittaṃ. ^b^appakasireneva^eb^ akiccheneva, pageva paripanthassa visodhitattā.
[03] ^b^ettāvatā^eb^ti ettakena bhāvanānuyogena. ^b^anena^eb^ yoginā. ^b^pañcaṅgavippahīna^eb^ntiādīnaṃ padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vutto eva.

[03] ^b^``paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ aññataravasenā''^eb^ti idaṃ vakkhamānāya vikubbanāya tesaṃ sādhāraṇatāya vuttaṃ. ^b^appanāppattacittasseva^eb^ na upacāramattalābhino. paguṇabalavabhāvāpādanena vepullādivisesappattassa odhiso, anodhiso ca disāpharaṇādivasena jhānassa pavijambhanā vikubbanā vividhā kiriyāti katvā.

[03] 254^b^.^eb^ ^b^mettāsahagatenā^eb^ti uppādato yāva bhaṅgā mettāya saha pavattena saṃsaṭṭhena sampayuttenāti attho. yasmā pana taṃ vuttanayena mettāya sahagataṃ, tāya ekuppādādividhinā sammadeva āgataṃ hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``mettāya samannāgatenā''^eb^ti. ^b^ceto^eb^-saddo ``adhicetaso''tiādīsu (pāci0 153; udā0 37) samādhipariyāyopi hotīti tato visesetuṃ ^a^V1.0343^ea^ ^b^``cetasāti cittenā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^eta^eb^nti etaṃ padaṃ. disodhipariggaho sattodhipariggahamukheneva hotīti dassento āha ^b^``ekissā disāya paṭhamapariggahitaṃ sattaṃ upādāyā''^eb^ti. disāsu hi ṭhitasattā disāgahaṇena gahitā. tenāha ^b^``ekadisāpariyāpannasattapharaṇavasena vutta''^eb^nti. pharaṇañca sārammaṇassa dhammassa attano ārammaṇassa phassanā paccakkhato dassanaṃ gahaṇaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇamevāti āha ^b^``pharitvāti phusitvā ārammaṇaṃ katvā''^eb^ti. ^b^brahmavihārādhiṭṭhita^eb^nti mettājhānupatthambhitaṃ. ^b^tathā^eb^ti niyamanaṃ. taṃ ^a^M1.0364^ea^ aniyamāpekkhasambandhībhāvato upamākāraniyamanaṃ. ^b^dutiya^eb^nti upameyyadassanaṃ, upameyyañca nāma upamaṃ, tena sambandhañca vinā natthīti tadubhayampi dassetuṃ ^b^``yathā puratthimādīsū''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^tathā dutiya^eb^nti ettha pharitvā viharatīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. evaṃ ^b^tatiyaṃ catuttha^eb^nti etthāpi. ^b^tadanantara^eb^nti ca pharaṇāpekkhaṃ anantaraggahaṇaṃ, na pharitabbadisāpekkhaṃ disānaṃ aniddiṭṭharūpattā. pharaṇānukkamena hi tāsaṃ dutiyāditā, na sarūpato. tenevāha ^b^``yaṃ kiñci ekaṃ disa''^eb^nti. ^b^itī^eb^ti evaṃ yathāvuttaṃ catasso, evaṃ uddhaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatīti attho. tenāha ^b^``eteneva nayenā''^eb^ti. idampi iti-saddasseva atthadassanaṃ. ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (ma0 ni0 3.309; 3.230; vibha0 642) ^b^adho tiriya^eb^nti ettha pi-saddo luttaniddiṭṭhoti dassetuṃ ^b^``adhodisampi tiriyaṃ disampī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. eteneva ^b^``dutiya''^eb^ntiādīsupi pi-saddassa luttaniddiṭṭhatā dīpitāti veditabbaṃ. ^b^evamevā^eb^ti idampi iti-saddasseva atthadassanaṃ. ettha ca ^b^``adho''^eb^ti iminā yathā nirayesu, nāgabhavanādīsu, yattha tattha vā attano heṭṭhimadisāya sattā gayhanti, evaṃ ^b^``uddha''^eb^nti iminā devaloke, yattha tattha vā attano uparimadisāyaṃ sattā gahitāti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^majjhattādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena itthipurisāriyānariyadevamanussādike pabhede saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^īsakampi bahi avikkhipamāno^eb^ti appakampi kammaṭṭhānato bahi vikkhepaṃ anāpajjanto hitūpasaṃhārato aññathā thokampi avattamāno. ^b^sabbattatāyā^eb^ti vā sabbena attabhāvena yathā sabbabhāvena attani attano attabhāve hitesitā, evaṃ sabbadhi sabbasattesu mettāya pharitvā viharatīti attho. mettāya vuccamānattā sattavisayo ^b^sabba^eb^-saddo, so ca dīghaṃ katvā vutto, tasmā sabbasattakāyasaṅkhātā pajā etassa atthīti sabbāvantoti padatthato dassento ^b^``sabbāvantanti sabbasattavanta''^eb^nti āha. ettha ca ^b^sabbadhī^eb^ti disodhinā, desodhinā ca anodhisopharaṇaṃ vuttaṃ, ^b^sabbattatāya sabbāvanta^eb^nti sattodhinā. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``anodhiso dassanattha''nti ^a^V1.0344^ea^. ekamevatthaṃ pakārato pariyāyenti ñāpentīti ^b^pariyāyā,^eb^ vevacanāni. vipulādisaddā cettha tādisāti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``vipulenāti evamādipariyāyadassanato''^eb^ti. pariyāyadassane ca pubbe gahitapadānipi ^a^M1.0365^ea^ puna gayhanti, yathā ``saddhā saddahanā''ti (dha0 sa0 12) ettha vuttampi saddhāpadaṃ puna indriyādipariyāyadassane ``saddhā saddhindriya''nti (dha0 sa0 12) vuttaṃ. ^b^tathāsaddo vā itisaddo vā na vutto^eb^ti ``mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī''ti etassa anuvattako tathā-saddo ca iti-saddo ca tesaṃ pharaṇānantarādiṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhānanti katvā te na vuttāti puna ^b^``mettāsahagatena cetasāti vutta''^eb^nti attho. vuttassevatthassa puna vacanaṃ nigamananti āha ^b^``nigamanavasena vā etaṃ vutta''^eb^nti. nanu ca samāpanavasena vuttassevatthassa puna vacanaṃ nigamananti? nāyaṃ doso odhisoanodhisopharaṇānaṃ samāpane eva vuttattā. ^b^vipulenā^eb^ti mahantena, mahattañcassa asubhakammaṭṭhānādīsu viya ārammaṇassa ekadesameva aggahetvā anavasesaggahaṇavasenāti āha ^b^``pharaṇavasena vipulatā daṭṭhabbā''^eb^ti.

[03] kilesavikkhambhanasamatthatādīhi mahattaṃ gataṃ, mahantehi vā uḷāracchandacittavīriyapaññehi gataṃ paṭipannanti ^b^mahaggataṃ^eb^. tayidaṃ yasmā ekantato rūpāvacaraṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``bhūmivasena mahaggata''^eb^nti. niruḷho hi rūpārūpāvacaresu mahaggatavohāro. ^b^paguṇavasenā^eb^ti pakārato guṇitaṃ bahulīkataṃ paguṇaṃ, tassa vasena, subhāvitabhāvenāti attho. taṃ hi pamāṇaṃ gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya appamāṇaṃ nāma hoti. ^b^appamāṇasattārammaṇavasenā^eb^ti aparimāṇasattārammaṇakaraṇavasena. sayampi verarahitattā, taṃsamaṅgino verābhāvahetuttā ca ^b^averaṃ^eb^. tayidaṃ dvayaṃ yato labhati, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``byāpādapaccatthikappahānenā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. cetaso byāpattivasena hananato byāpajjaṃ, cetasikaṃ asātaṃ, tadabhāvato ^b^abyāpajjaṃ^eb^. tenāha ^b^``niddukkha''^eb^nti. taṃ panassa abyāpajjattaṃ pañcaviññāṇādīnaṃ viya na sabhāvato, atha kho paccatthikavivekatoti dassento ^b^``domanassappahānato''^eb^ti āha. ^b^aya^eb^nti idha yathānītaṃ ^b^appamaññāvibhaṅge^eb^ (vibha0 642), tesu tesu ca ^b^suttapadesesu^eb^ (ma0 ni0 1.459; 2.309, 315) āgataṃ mettābrahmavihāravikubbanamāha.

[03] 255^b^.^eb^ ^b^``tathā''^eb^ti iminā imissā ``pañcahākārehi, sattahākārehi, dasahākārehī''ti ākāravibhāgena ^b^paṭisambhidāyaṃ^eb^ (paṭi0 ma0 2.22) vuttāya ca vikubbanāya ^a^M1.0366^ea^ majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇassa ^a^V1.0345^ea^ viya bhedābhāvamupasaṃharati odhisopharaṇānodhisopharaṇadisāpharaṇavasena desanāya āgatattā. kevalaṃ panettha ^b^paṭisambhidāmagge^eb^ (paṭi0 ma0 2.22) viya sattodhi na gahitoti ayameva viseso. ^b^yampī^eb^ti vikubbanaṃ sandhāyāha.
[03] idāni bhedābhāvadassanamukhena uddesato ānītaṃ ^b^paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiṃ^eb^ niddesato dassetvā tassā anuttānapadavaṇṇanaṃ kātuṃ ^b^``tattha cā''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] 256^b^.^eb^ tattha ^b^sabbe sattā^eb^ti ^b^sabba^eb^-saddo kāmaṃ padesasabbavisayo, na sabbasabbavisayo yathā ``sabbaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇa''nti (paṭi0 ma0 1.119-120), ``sattā''ti pana padena paricchinnaṃ attano visayaṃ asesetvāva pariyādiyatīti āha ^b^``anavasesapariyādānameta''^eb^nti.
[03] ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ rūpe. ^b^satto^eb^ti sajjanakiccena chandādipariyāyena lobhena āsatto laggo. ^b^tatrā^eb^ti vā karaṇe bhummaṃ, tena chandādināti attho.

[03] yadi sattatāya sattā, kathaṃ vītarāgesūti āha ^b^``ruḷhīsaddenā''^eb^tiādi. avītarāgesu ruḷhena, avītarāgesu vā pavattitvā indriyabaddhakhandhasantānatāya taṃsadisesu vītarāgesu ruḷhena saddena. atha vā kiñci nimittaṃ gahetvā satipi aññasmiṃ tannimittayutte katthaci visaye sammutiyā cirakālatāya nimittavirahepi pavatti ruḷhī nāma yathā ``gacchantīti gāvo''ti, evaṃ sattasaddassāpi ruḷhībhāvo daṭṭhabbo. bhūtapubbagatiyā vā vītarāgesu sattavohāro daṭṭhabbo. ^b^satvayogato^eb^ti ettha ^b^satvaṃ^eb^ nāma buddhi, vīriyaṃ, tejo vā, tena yogato sattā, yathā ``nīlaguṇayogato nīlo paṭo''ti.

[03] pāṇanti etenāti pāṇanaṃ, assāsapassāsā, tassa kammaṃ ^b^pāṇanatā,^eb^ tāya, assāsapassāsasampayogenāti attho. ^b^bhūtattā^eb^ti kammakilesehi jātattā. pūraṇato, galanato ca ^b^puggalā^eb^ti neruttā. sattā hi nibbattantā taṃtaṃsattanikāyaṃ pūrentā viya honti, sabbāvatthanipātitāya ca galanti cavantīti attho. apariññātavatthukānaṃ ``attā''ti ^a^M1.0367^ea^ bhavati ettha abhidhānaṃ, cittañcāti ^b^attabhāvo, sarīraṃ, khandhapañcakameva vā. ta^eb^nti khandhapañcakaṃ ^a^V1.0346^ea^. ^b^upādāyā^eb^ti gahetvā upādānaṃ nissayaṃ katvā. ^b^paññattimattasambhavato^eb^ti paramatthato asantepi sattasaññite paññattimattena sambhavato.

[03] ^b^yathā ca sattāti vacana^eb^nti yathā satta-saddo yathāvuttenaṭṭhena nippariyāyato padesavuttipi ruḷhīvasena anavasesapariyādāyako. ^b^sesānipī^eb^ti pāṇādivacanānipi. tānipi hi rūpārūpabhavūpagacatutthajjhānādisamaṅgīnaṃ assāsapassāsābhāvato avinipātadhammānaṃ pugalanassa abhāvato padesavuttīni. ^b^ruḷhīvasena āropetvā^eb^ yathāvuttāya ruḷhiyā vasena katthaci visaye avijjamānampi pāṇapuggalabhāvaṃ āropetvā. yadi sādhāraṇato sattavevacanānīti gahetvā anodhisopharaṇā mettā vuccati, atha kasmā pañcaheva ākārehi vuttāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``kāmañcā''^eb^tiādi. keci panāhu ``na kho panetāni ``sattā''tiādīni padāni vevacanatāmattaṃ upādāya gahitāni, yato jantuādīnampi gahaṇaṃ āpajjeyya, atthavisesaṃ pana nimittabhūtaṃ upādāya gahitānī''ti, te sandhāyāha ^b^``ye panā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^atthato^eb^ti sajjanaṭṭhena sattā, pāṇanaṭṭhena pāṇāti evamādiatthato. tesaṃ taṃ matimattanti dassento āha ^b^``anodhisopharaṇā virujjhatī''^eb^ti. kasmā? keci sattā, keci pāṇā, keci puggalāti āpajjanato. ^b^tathā atthaṃ aggahetvā^eb^ti sattādisaddā sappadesavisayāti evamatthaṃ aggahetvā pubbe vuttanayena nippadesavisayāti evamatthaṃ gahetvāti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``imesū''^eb^tiādi. ^b^pañcasu ākāresū^eb^ti ``sabbe sattā''tiādinā ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (paṭi0 ma0 2.22) āgatesu pañcasu bhāvanākāresu. ^b^aññataravasenā^eb^ti yassa kassaci vasena.

[03] 257^b^.^eb^ idāni dvāvīsatiyā bhāvanākāresu appanā pariggahetvā dassetuṃ ^b^``ettha cā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^byāpādarahitā^eb^ti domanassabyāpādarahitā. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā na kevalaṃ yathāvuttāakāravibhāgamattato appanāvibhāgo, tasmā. ^b^imesupi padesū^eb^ti ``sabbe sattā averā hontū''tiādikoṭṭhāsesupi. ^b^yaṃ yaṃ pākaṭaṃ hotī^eb^ti yadipi pubbabhāge ^a^M1.0368^ea^ tattha tattha abhinivese anekakoṭṭhāsavaseneva manasikāraṃ pavatteti, bhāvanāya samijjhanakkhaṇe pana tattha yaṃ paguṇataratāya supākaṭaṃ hoti, tassa vasena appanā hoti, yathā taṃ dvattiṃsākāre. tattha pana ārammaṇaṃ, idha bhāvanākāroti ayameva viseso. ^b^catunna^eb^nti catunnaṃ catunnaṃ. byāpanicchālopena hi niddiṭṭhaṃ. esa nayo sesesupi.
[03] ^b^liṅgavasena^eb^ ^a^V1.0347^ea^ ^b^vuttaṃ^eb^ tesaṃ pacurato labbhamānattā. tatiyā pana pakati yadipi paṭhamadukena na saṅgahitā, dutiyadukena pana tikena ca saṅgahitā eva.
[03] ^b^iti sabbānipī^eb^ti anodhisopharaṇe vīsati, odhisopharaṇe aṭṭhavīsati, disāpharaṇe cattāri satāni, asīti cāti evaṃ sabbānipi. sata-saddāpekkhāya napuṃsakaniddeso.

[03] 258^b^.^eb^ evaṃ mettābhāvanaṃ vibhāvetvā idāni tattha ānisaṃse vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``itī''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^sesā janā^eb^ti mettāya cetovimuttiyā alābhino. ^b^samparivattamānā^eb^ti dakkhiṇena passena asayitvā sabbaso parivattamānā. ^b^kākacchamānā^eb^ti ghurughurupassāsavasena vissaraṃ karontā. ^b^sukhaṃ supatī^eb^ti ettha duvidhāsupanā sayane piṭṭhippasāraṇalakkhaṇā, kiriyāmayacittehi avokiṇṇabhavaṅgappavattilakkhaṇā ca. tatthāyaṃ ubhayathāpi sukhameva supati. yasmā saṇikaṃ nipajjitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni samodhāya pāsādikena ākārena sayati, niddokkamanepi jhānaṃ samāpanno viya hoti. tenāha ^b^``evaṃ asupitvā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] niddākāle sukhaṃ alabhitvā dukkhena suttattā eva paṭibujjhanakāle sarīrakhedena nitthunanaṃ, vijambhanaṃ, ito cito viparivattanañca hotīti āha ^b^``nitthunantā vijambhantā samparivattantā dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhantī''^eb^ti. ayaṃ pana sukhena suttattā sarīrakhedābhāvato nitthunanādirahitova paṭibujjhati. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``evaṃ appaṭibujjhitvā''^eb^tiādi. sukhapaṭibodho ca sarīravikārābhāvenāti āha ^b^``sukhaṃ nibbikāra''^eb^nti.

[03] ^b^``bhaddakameva^eb^ ^a^M1.0369^ea^ ^b^supinaṃ passatī''^eb^ti idaṃ anubhūtapubbavasena, devatūpasaṃhāravasena cassa bhaddakameva supinaṃ hoti, na pāpakanti katvā vuttaṃ. tenāha ^b^``cetiyaṃ vandanto viyā''^eb^tiādi. dhātukkhobhahetukampi cassa bahulaṃ bhaddakameva siyā yebhuyyena cittajarūpānuguṇatāya utuāhārajarūpānaṃ.

[03] ^b^ure āmuttamuttāhāro viyā^eb^ti gīvāya bandhitvā ure lambitamuttāhāro viyāti kehici vuttaṃ. taṃ ekāvalivasena vuttaṃ siyā, anekaratanāvalisamūhabhūto pana muttāhāro aṃsappadesato paṭṭhāya yāva kaṭippadesassa heṭṭhābhāgā palambanto ure āmukkoyeva nāma hoti.
[03] ^b^tatthevā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0348^ea^ pāṭaliputteyeva. ^b^sakkā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā^eb^ desassa khematāya, tassa tassa padesassa ramaṇīyatāya ca.
[03] dasāva anto ^b^dasanto,^eb^ vatthassa osānanto.

[03] ^b^samappavattavāsa^eb^nti tattha tattha vihāre samappavattavattavāsaṃ. thero kira attanā paviṭṭhapaviṭṭhavihāre ``ahamettha āgantuko''ti acintetvā tattha tattha yathārahaṃ attanā kātabbavattāni paripūrento eva vihāsi. apare pana bhaṇanti sabbasattesu samappavattamettāvihāravāsaṃ. ayaṃ hi thero arahattādhigamato pubbepi mettāvihārī ahosi.

[01] ^b^vanantare ṭhito^eb^ti thero kira tathā samappavattavāsavasena caramāno ekadivasaṃ aññataraṃ ramaṇīyaṃ vanantaraṃ disvā tattha aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā yathāparicchedena tato uṭṭhito attano guṇāvajjanahetukena pītisomanassena udānento ``yāvatā upasampanno''ti gāthaṃ abhāsi. tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``vanantare ṭhito''^eb^ti paṭhamagāthā ṭhapitā. tattha ^b^gajjamānako^eb^ti sīhagajjitaṃ gajjanto. ^b^guṇamesanto^eb^ti attano guṇasamudayaṃ gavesanto paccavekkhanto.

[03] maṇilarukkhe nivāsitāya taṃ devataṃ ^b^``maṇiliyā''^eb^ti voharanti, tasmā sā devatāpi ^b^``ahaṃ, bhante, maṇiliyā''^eb^ti āha. rukkhadevatānaṃ hi yebhuyyena nivāsarukkhavasena vohāro yathā phandanadevatāti. ^b^tatthevā^eb^ti cittalapabbateyeva.
[03] ^b^``balavapiyacittatāyā''^eb^ti ^a^M1.0370^ea^ iminā balavapiyacittatāmattenapi satthaṃ na kamati, pageva mettāya cetovimuttiyāti dasseti.

[03] ^b^khippameva cittaṃ samādhiyati^eb^ kenaci paripanthena parihīnajjhānassa byāpādassa dūrasamussāritabhāvato khippameva samādhiyati. āsavānaṃ khayāyāti keci. sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. ettha ca kiñcāpi ito aññakammaṭṭhānavasena adhigatajjhānānampi sukhasupanādayo ānisaṃsā labbhanti, yathāha --
[21] ``sukhaṃ ^a^V1.0349^ea^ supanti munayo, ajjhattaṃ susamāhitā.
[22] suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti, sadā gotamasāvakā''ti.. --

[25] ca ādi, tathāpime ānisaṃsā brahmavihāralābhino anavasesā labbhanti byāpādādīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato brahmavihārānaṃ. tenevāha ``nissaraṇaṃ hetaṃ, āvuso, byāpādassa, yadidaṃ mettā cetovimuttī''tiādi (dī0 ni0 3.326; a0 ni0 6.13). byāpādādivasena ca sattānaṃ dukkhasupanādayoti tappaṭipakkhabhūtesu brahmavihāresu siddhesu sukhasupanādayo hatthagatā eva hontīti.

[03] 259^b^.^eb^ ^b^karuṇa^eb^nti karuṇābrahmavihāraṃ. ^b^nikkaruṇatāyā^eb^ti vihesāya, ``idhekacco pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā aññataraññatarena vā sattānaṃ viheṭhanajātiko hotī''ti evaṃ vuttaviheṭhaneti attho. ^b^ādīnava^eb^nti dosaṃ. yathā tathā sattānaṃ viheṭhanāya pāpako vipāko idha ceva samparāye ca. tathā hi yo satte jīvitā voropanena vā aṅgapaccaṅgacchedanena vā dhanajāniyā vā alābhāya vā avāsāya vā anatthāya vā ayasatthāya vā parisaṃsakkanena vā antamaso yathāvajjadassanenapi viheṭheti, tassa so pamādavihāro diṭṭheva dhamme alābhāyapi hoti, laddhassa parihānāyapi hoti, tannimittaṃ pāpako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati, avisārado ^a^M1.0371^ea^ parisaṃ upasaṅkamati maṅkubhūto, sammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā, sugatiyampi manussabhūto dujjaccopi hoti nīcakuliko, dubbaṇṇopi hoti duddasiko, bahvābādhopi hoti rogabahulo, duggatopi hoti appannapāno, appāyukopi hoti parittajīvitoti evamādianekānatthānubandhitā vihesāya paccavekkhitabbā, tappaṭipakkhato karuṇāya ānisaṃsā paccavekkhitabbā. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``nikkaruṇatāya ādīnavaṃ karuṇāya ca ānisaṃsaṃ paccavekkhitvā''^eb^ti. ^b^``piyo hī''^eb^tiādinā paṭhamaṃ piyapuggalādīsu anārambhassa kāraṇamāha. piyaṃ hi puggalaṃ karuṇāyitumārabhantassa na tāva piyabhāvo vigacchati, avigate ca tasmiṃ kuto karuṇāyanā. tenāha ^b^``piyaṭṭhāneyeva tiṭṭhatī''^eb^ti. sesapuggalesupi eseva nayo. ^b^liṅgavisabhāgakālakatānaṃ^eb^ akhettabhāve kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.

[03] yattha ^a^V1.0350^ea^ pana paṭhamaṃ ārabhitabbā, taṃ pāḷinayeneva dassetuṃ ^b^``kathañca bhikkhū''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^duggata^eb^nti daliddaṃ. so hi bhogapārijuññato sukhasādhanānaṃ abhāvena dukkhaṃ gato upagato duggatoti vuccati. atha vā ^b^duggata^eb^nti dukkhena samaṅgibhāvaṃ gataṃ. ^b^durupeta^eb^nti kāyaduccaritādīhi upetaṃ. gatikularūpādivasena vā tamabhāve ṭhito ^b^duggato^eb^. kāyaduccaritādīhi upetattā tamaparāyaṇabhāve ṭhito ^b^durupeto^eb^ti evamettha attho veditabbo. ^b^paramakicchappatta^eb^nti ativiya kicchamāpannaṃ mahābyasanaṃ nimuggaṃ. ^b^appeva nāmā^eb^ti sādhu vata.

[01] ^b^vadhetha na^eb^nti ``ghātetha naṃ cora''nti evaṃ pahitāya ^b^rañño āṇāya khādanīyampi...pe0... denti^eb^ ``idāneva māriyamāno ettakampi sukhaṃ labhatū''ti. ^b^susajjito^eb^ti sukhānubhavane sannaddho.

[03] ^b^eteneva upāyenā^eb^ti yena yena vidhinā etarahi yathāvutte paramakicchāpanne āyatiṃ vā dukkhabhāgimhi puggale karuṇāyituṃ karuṇā uppāditā, eteneva nayena. ^b^piyapuggale^eb^ti piyāyitabbapuggale. etarahi vā dissamānaṃ āyatiṃ vā bhāviniṃ dukkhappattiṃ gahetvā karuṇā pavattetabbāti sambandho. majjhattaverīsupi eseva nayo. yo hi so karuṇāya vatthubhūto duvidho puggalo vutto, kāmaṃ tattha karuṇābhāvanā sukheneva ijjhati, iminā pana bhikkhunā tattha bhāvanaṃ paguṇataraṃ katvā ^a^M1.0372^ea^ sīmāsambhedaṃ kātuṃ tadanantaraṃ piyapuggale, tato majjhatte, tato veripuggale karuṇā bhāvetabbā. bhāventena ca ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse muduṃ kammaniyaṃ cittaṃ katvā tadanantare tadanantare upasaṃharitabbaṃ. yassa pana veripuggalo vā natthi, mahāpurisajātikattā vā anatthaṃ karontepi verisaññāva nuppajjati, tena majjhatte me cittaṃ kammaniyaṃ jātaṃ, idāni verimhi upasaṃharāmīti byāpārova na kātabbo. yassa pana atthi, taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``sace panā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] tattha ^b^pubbe vuttanayenevā^eb^ti mettākammaṭṭhānikassa (visuddhi0 1.240 ādayo) vuttanayena. ^b^taṃ mettāya vuttanayeneva. vūpasametabba^eb^nti ``athānena purimapuggalesū''tiādinā (visuddhi0 1.243), ``kakacūpamaovādādīnaṃ anussarato''tiādinā (visuddhi0 1.243) ca mettābhāvanāya vuttena nayena taṃ paṭighaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ. evaṃ etarahi mahādukkhappatte sukhitepi akatakusalatāya āyatiṃ dukkhappattiyā vasena karuṇāyanavidhiṃ dassetvā idāni katakalyāṇepi taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``yopi cetthā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^tesa^eb^nti byasanānaṃ. ^b^vaṭṭadukkhaṃ anatikkantattā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0351^ea^ sammāsambuddhenāpi akkhānena pariyosāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyassa anāgatassa āpāyikassa sugatīsupi jātijarādibhedassāti aparimitassa saṃsāradukkhassa anatikkantabhāvato. ^b^sabbathāpi karuṇāyitvā^eb^ti dukkhappattiyā, sukhappattiyā akatakusalatāya vā katākusalatāya vāti sabbapakārenapi karuṇāya vatthubhāvassa sallakkhaṇena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ puggale karuṇaṃ katvā karuṇābhāvanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā. ^b^vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ``athānena punappunaṃ mettāyantenā''tiādinā (visuddhi0 1.243) ^b^mettābhāvanāyaṃ^eb^ vuttena nayena. ^b^taṃ nimitta^eb^nti sīmāsambhedavasena pavattaṃ samathanimittaṃ. ^b^mettāya vuttanayenevā^eb^ti yathā mettābhāvanāyaṃ ``appakasirenevā''tiādinā (visuddhi0 1.253) ^b^tikacatukkajjhānavasena appanā^eb^ ``ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī''tiādinā (visuddhi0 1.253-254) tassā vaḍḍhanā ca vuttā, evamidha karuṇābhāvanāyaṃ tikacatukkajjhānavasena appanā veditabbā ca vaḍḍhetabbā ca, tathevassā vaḍḍhanāvidhipi veditabbāti adhippāyo. ^b^vuttanayenevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇena ``paṭhamaṃ veripuggalo karuṇāyitabbo''ti idaṃ yathā pāḷiviruddhaṃ, evaṃ yuttiviruddhampīti imamatthaṃ ^a^M1.0373^ea^ dīpeti. paṭhamaṃ hi veriṃ samanussarato kodho uppajjeyya, na karuṇā. attāpi sakkhibhāvena karuṇāyanavasena gahetabbo, so kimiti pacchā gayhatīti. ^b^``appanā vaḍḍhetabbā''^eb^ti iminā ca appanāppattacittasseva ``karuṇāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī''tiādinā (dī0 ni0 3.308; ma0 ni0 1.77, 509; 2.309, 315, 452, 471; 3.230) vuttavikubbanā ijjhatīti ayamattho dassito.

[03] karuṇāpadamattameva cassā pāḷiyā visesoti taṃ anāmasitvā paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttavikubbanā, mettāya vuttāanisaṃsā ca idha labbhantīti dassetuṃ ^b^``tato paraṃ...pe0... veditabbā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^tato para^eb^nti ``karuṇāsahagatena cetasā''ti (dī0 ni0 3.308; ma0 ni0 1.77, 509; 2.309, 315, 452, 471; 3.230) vuttavikubbanato upari. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] 260^b^.^eb^ ^b^piyapuggalādīsū^eb^ti piyamajjhattaverīsu na ārabhitabbā. muditābhāvanāti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā yojanā. ^b^na hī^eb^tiādi tattha kāraṇavacanaṃ. ^b^piyabhāvamattenā^eb^ti ettha ^b^matta^eb^-saddo ^a^V1.0352^ea^ visesanivatti attho, tena somanassapaṭisandhikatādisiddhā niccappahaṃsitamukhatā, pubbabhāsitā, sukhasambhāsatā, sakhilatā, sammodakatāti evamādike muditāya padaṭṭhānabhūte visese ulliṅgeti, īdisehi visesehi virahitoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^eva^eb^-kārena pana piyapuggalassa sukhasamappitatādiṃ, muditāya ca hetubhūtaṃ pamodappavattiṃ nivatteti. piyapuggalepi hi paramāya sampattiyā pamudite haṭṭhatuṭṭhe bhikkhuno muditokāsaṃ labheyya. vakkhati hi ``piyapuggalaṃ vā''tiādi. ādito majjhattapuggalaṃ anussarantassa udāsinatā saṇṭhāti, veriṃ samanussarantassa kodho uppajjati. tenāha ^b^``pageva majjhattaverino''^eb^ti.

[03] pamodappavattiyā soṇḍasadiso sahāyo ^b^soṇḍasahāyo. muditamuditovā^eb^ti pasādasommatāya ativiya mudito eva. pasāde hi idaṃ āmeḍitaṃ. evaṃ aṭṭhakathānayena ādito muditābhāvanāya vatthuṃ dassetvā idāni pāḷinayena dassetuṃ ^b^``piyapuggalaṃ vā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sukhita^eb^nti sañjātasukhaṃ, sukhappattanti attho. ^b^sajjita^eb^nti sukhānubhavane sannaddhaṃ paṭiyattasukhasādhanaṃ. ^b^aho sādhū^eb^ti tassa sattassa sampattiyaṃ ^a^M1.0374^ea^ sampajaññapubbapamodanākāradassanaṃ. puna ^b^aho suṭṭhū^eb^ti tassa pamodanassa bahulīkāradassanaṃ. ^b^piyaṃ manāpa^eb^nti ettha ^b^manāpa^eb^-ggahaṇena pāḷiyampi atippiyasahāyako adhippetoti eke.

[03] ^b^atīte^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva attabhāve atīte. ^b^anāgate^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. na hi bhavantaragate brahmavihārabhāvanā ruhati. yadi evaṃ, atītānāgate kathanti? nāyaṃ doso. ``so evāyaṃ datto tisso''ti addhāpaccuppannatāya vijjamānabhāvena gahetabbato. kathaṃ panassa anāgate sampatti ārammaṇaṃ hotīti? ādesādito, paccuppannāya vā payogasampattiyā anumānato laddhāya gahetabbato.

[01] ^b^piyapuggale^eb^ti soṇḍasahāyasaññite atippiyapuggale, piyapuggale ca. duvidhopi cesa idha piyabhāvasāmaññato ``piyapuggalo''ti vutto. ^b^anukkamenā^eb^ti atippiyapuggalo piyapuggalo majjhatto verīti catūsu koṭṭhāsesu ekekasmiṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ paguṇaṃ, muduṃ, kammaniyañca katvā sesesu upasaṃharaṇānukkamena. kiñcāpi catūsu janesu samacittatāva ^b^sīmāsambhedo^eb^ sīmā sambhijjati etāyāti katvā. bhāvanāya pana tathā bahuso pavattamānāya purimasiddhaṃ hetuṃ, itaraṃ phalañca katvā ^a^V1.0353^ea^ vuttaṃ ^b^``samacittatāya sīmāsambhedaṃ katvā''^eb^ti. yathāvuttasīmābhāvo vā sīmāsambhedoti vuttaṃ ^b^``samacittatāya sīmāsambhedaṃ katvā''^eb^ti. sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03] 261^b^.^eb^ ^b^upekkhābhāvana^eb^nti upekkhābrahmavihārabhāvanaṃ. yasmā purimabrahmavihārattayanissando catutthabrahmavihāro, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``mettādīsu paṭiladdhatikacatukkajjhānenā''^eb^ti. ^b^paguṇatatiyajjhānā^eb^ti subhāvitaṃ vasībhāvaṃ pāpitaṃ paguṇaṃ, tathārūpā tatiyabrahmavihārajjhānato. appaguṇaṃ hi uparijhānassa padaṭṭhānaṃ na hoti. catukkanayavasena cettha tatiyaggahaṇaṃ. ^b^sukhitā hontūtiādivasenā^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ``niddukkhā hontū''ti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^sattakelāyanaṃ^eb^ sattesu mamāyanaṃ ^a^M1.0375^ea^ mamattakaraṇaṃ, tathā manasikārena yogo ^b^sattakelāyanamanasikārayuttattaṃ,^eb^ tasmā. mettādīnaṃ rāgagehassitadomanassasomanassānaṃ āsannavuttitāya yathārahaṃ ^b^paṭighānunayasamīpacāritā^eb^ veditabbā. atha vā ``sukhitā hontu, dukkhato muccantu modantū''ti hitesitabhāvappattiyā tissannampi anunayassa āsannacāritā. sati ca tabbipariyāye lohitappakope pubbo viya laddhokāsamevettha paṭighanti avisesena tāsaṃ paṭighānunayasamīpacāritā daṭṭhabbā.

[03] ^b^``somanassayogena oḷārikattā''^eb^ti idaṃ tatiyajjhānassa vasena vuttaṃ, tato vuṭṭhitassa idamādīnavadassananti. mettādivasena pana oḷārikabhāve vuccamāne vitakkavicārapītiyogeneva oḷārikatā vattabbā siyā, tāhipi tāsaṃ samāyogasambhavato, upekkhāya ca tadabhāvato. na vā vattabbā tatiyajjhānikānaṃyeva mettādīnaṃ idhādhippetattā, taṃtaṃjhānasamatikkameneva ca taṃtaṃjhānikā mettādayopi samatikkantā eva nāma honti, jhānasāmaññena viya mettādisāmaññena vohāramattaṃ. ^b^purimāsū^eb^ti mettākaruṇāmuditāsu. ^b^santabhāvato^eb^ti yathāvuttasattakelāyanādianupasantabhāvābhāvato upekkhāya santabhāvato. ``santabhāvato''ti ca idaṃ nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. sukhumatā paṇītatā vidūrakilesatā vipulaphalatāti evamādayopi upekkhāya ānisaṃsā daṭṭhabbā. ^b^pakatimajjhatto^eb^ti kiñci kāraṇaṃ anapekkhitvā pakatiyā sabhāveneva imassa bhikkhuno udāsinapakkhe ṭhito. ^b^ajjhupekkhitvā^eb^ti attanā katakammavaseneva ayamāyasmā āgato gacchati ca, tvampi attanā katakammavaseneva āgato ^a^V1.0354^ea^ gacchasi ca, na tassa tava payogena kiñci sukhaṃ vā upanetuṃ, dukkhaṃ vā apanetuṃ labbhā, kevalaṃ panetaṃ cittassa anujukammaṃ, yadidaṃ mettāyanādinā sattesu kelāyanaṃ. buddhādīhi ariyehi gatamaggo cesa apaṇṇakapaṭipadābhūto, yadidaṃ sabbasattesu majjhattatāti evaṃ paṭipakkhajigucchāmukhena majjhattatāya samupajātagāravabahumānādaro taṃ puggalaṃ punappunaṃ ajjhupekkhati, tattha ca savisesaṃ upekkhaṃ paccupaṭṭhapeti, tassa tathā paṭipajjato pakatiyāpi udāsinattā sātisayaṃ tattha majjhattatā saṇṭhāti ^a^M1.0376^ea^. bhāvanābalena nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti, kilesā sannisinnā eva honti, so taṃ upekkhaṃ piyapuggalādīsu upasaṃharati. tenāha ^b^``upekkhā uppādetabbā. tato piyapuggalādīsū''^eb^ti. ^b^ekaṃ puggala^eb^nti ettha aññattho ^b^eka^eb^-saddo ``ittheke abhivadantī''tiādīsu (ma0 ni0 3.27) viya. ekavacaneneva cettha saṅkhyāviseso siddho, tasmā aññaṃ ekaṃ puggalanti ayamettha attho. tena attānaṃ nivatteti. ^b^``neva manāpa''^eb^nti iminā piyapuggalaṃ, atippiyasahāyakañca nivatteti, attānampi vā attani amanāpatāya abhāvato. ^b^``na amanāpa''^eb^nti iminā appiyaṃ, veripuggalañca, pārisesato majjhattapuggalassa gahaṇaṃ āpannaṃ. iti ^b^``ekaṃ puggalaṃ neva manāpaṃ nāmanāpa''^eb^nti iminā attano, piyādīnañca paṭikkhepamukhena udāsinapuggalaṃ dasseti.

[03] ^b^vuttanayenā^eb^ti ``yvāssa pakatimajjhatto''tiādinā anantaraṃ vuttena nayena. attasinehassa balavabhāvato veritopi attani majjhattatāya durūpasaṃhārattā ``imesu ca attani cā''ti attā pacchā vutto. ^b^pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ``ayaṃ samāpatti āsannapītipaccatthikā''tiādinā (visuddhi0 1.87) pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayena. yaṃ hi heṭṭhā ``paguṇatatiyajjhānā vuṭṭhāyā''tiādi (visuddhi0 1.87) vuttaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā tīsu brahmavihāresu, catutthabrahmavihāre ca ādīnavānisaṃsadassanavasena vuttaṃ. idaṃ pana tatiyajjhāne ādīnavaṃ, catutthajjhāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā catutthādhigamāya yogaṃ karontassa catutthajjhānassa uppajjanākāradassanaṃ. tasmā tattha vuttaṃ ``pathavīsaddaṃ apanetvā tadeva nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjatī''tiādinā yojetabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^pathavīkasiṇādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena sesakasiṇāni, assāsapassāsanimittañca saṅgaṇhāti. kāmaṃ kasiṇānāpānesu uppannassāpi tatiyajjhānassa upekkhābrahmavihārena rūpāvacarajjhānāditāya attheva sabhāgatā, taṃ pana akāraṇaṃ ārammaṇassa visadisatāyāti āha ^a^V1.0355^ea^ ^b^``ārammaṇavisabhāgatāyā''^eb^ti. nanu ca aññathāva kasiṇādibhāvanā, aññathā brahmavihārabhāvanāti bhāvanāvasenāpi yathāvuttajjhānānaṃ attheva visadisatāti? saccametaṃ, bhāvanāvasena pana visadisatā anuppattiyā na ekantikaṃ kāraṇaṃ. tathā hi aññathāva mettādibhāvanā ^a^M1.0377^ea^, aññathā upekkhābhāvanā. tathāpi sattesu yathāpavattitaṃ hitesitādiākāraṃ byatirekamukhena āmasantī, tato vinivattamānarūpena ajjhupekkhanākārena brahmavihārupekkhā pavattati. tathā hi vakkhati ``kammassakā sattā, te kassa ruciyā sukhitā vā bhavissantī''tiādi (visuddhi0 1.263). ārammaṇasabhāgatāpi cettha atthīti mettādivasena paṭiladdhatatiyajjhānassa ijjhati upekkhābrahmavihāro. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``mettādīsū''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^mettādīsū^eb^ti mettādīsu nipphādetabbesu, mettādivasenāti attho. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
[03] 262^b^.^eb^ ^b^brahmuttamenā^eb^ti ettha sammutibrahmāno upapattibrahmāno visuddhibrahmānoti tividhā brahmāno.
[21] ``sampannaṃ sālikedāraṃ, suvā bhuñjanti kosiya.
[22] paṭivedemi te brahme, na ne vāretumussahe.. (jā0 1.14.1).
[22] paribbaja mahābrahme, pacantaññepi pāṇino''ti.. (pāci0 647) --
[25] ca evamādīsu hi brahmasaddena sammutibrahmāno vuttā.
[21] ``apārutā tesaṃ amatassa dvārā,
[27] ye sotavanto pamuñcantu saddhaṃ.
[26] vihiṃsasaññī paguṇaṃ na bhāsiṃ,
[22] dhammaṃ paṇītaṃ manujesu brahme''..

[03] ``atha kho brahmā sahampatī''ti (dī0 ni0 2.71; ma0 ni0 1.283; 2.340; saṃ0 ni0 1.172; mahāva0 9) ca ^a^V1.0356^ea^ evamādīsu brahmasaddena upapattibrahmāno vuttā. ``brahmacakkaṃ pavattetī''tiādi (ma0 ni0 1.148; saṃ0 ni0 2.21; a0 ni0 4.8; 5.11; paṭi0 ma0 2.44) vacanato ``brahma''nti ariyadhammo vuccati, tato nibbattattā avisesena sabbepi ariyā visuddhibrahmāno nāma paramatthabrahmatāya. visesato pana ``brahmāti, bhikkhave, tathāgatassetaṃ adhivacana''nti vacanato sammāsambuddho uttamabrahmā nāma sadevake loke brahmabhūtehi guṇehi ukkaṃsapāramippattito. iti brahmānaṃ uttamo, brahmā ca so uttamo cāti vā ^a^M1.0378^ea^ ^b^brahmuttamo,^eb^ bhagavā. tena ^b^kathite^eb^ ``so mettāsahagatena cetasā''tiādinā (dī0 ni0 1.556; 3.308; ma0 ni0 1.77, 459, 509; 2.309, 315, 451, 471) tattha tattha veneyyānaṃ desite. ^b^itī^eb^ti evaṃ yathāvuttena bhāvanākkamena ceva atthavaṇṇanākkamena ca ^b^viditvā^eb^ jānitvā. ^b^pakiṇṇakakathāpi viññeyyā^eb^ti pubbe viya asādhāraṇaṃ taṃtaṃbrahmavihārapaṭiniyatameva atthaṃ aggahetvā sādhāraṇabhāvato tattha tattha pakiṇṇakaṃ visaṭaṃ atthaṃ gahetvā pavattitā pakiṇṇakakathāpi vijānitabbā.

[03] ^b^mejjatī^eb^ti dhammato aññassa kattunivattanatthaṃ dhammameva kattāraṃ katvā niddisati. ^b^siniyhatī^eb^ti ettha sattesu byāpajjanavasena lūkhabhāvassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ hitākārapavattivasena sinehanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na taṇhāyanavasena. taṃ hi mohapubbaṅgamaṃ lubbhanasabhāvaṃ, idaṃ pana adussanasabhāvaṃ alobhasampayuttaṃ. nanu ca taṇhāsinehopi byāpādavirodhī tena sahānavaṭṭhānato. yadipi tena saha ekasmiṃ citte nappavattati, virodhī pana na hoti appahāyakato. mejjatīti ^b^mitto,^eb^ hitajjhāsayo khandhappabandho, tappariyāpannatāya mitte bhavā, mitte vā ārammaṇabhūte piye puggale bhavā, mittassa esā pavatti mejjanavasena vāti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^karotīti karuṇā,^eb^ kiṃ karoti, kesaṃ, kiṃ nimittanti āha ^b^``paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampana''^eb^nti. ^b^kampana^eb^nti ca paresaṃ dukkhaṃ disvā tassa apanetukāmassa asahanākārena cittassa aññathattaṃ. tayidaṃ sappurisānaṃyeva hotīti āha ^b^``sādhūna''^eb^nti. sappurisā hi saparahitasādhanena ``sādhū''ti vuccanti. ^b^vināsetī^eb^ti adassanaṃ gameti, apanetīti attho. tenettha hiṃsanaṃ apanayananti dasseti. paradukkhāpanayanākārappavattilakkhaṇā hi karuṇā. ^b^pharaṇavasenā^eb^ti ^a^V1.0357^ea^ phusanavasena, ārammaṇakaraṇavasenāti attho. ārammaṇakaraṇañcettha dukkhitesu dukkhāpanayanākārenevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^modanti tāyā^eb^ti modanakiriyāya muditāya karaṇabhāvaniddeso, svāyaṃ upacārasiddho, muditāvinimutto natthi tattha koci kattāti tameva kattubhāvena niddisati ^b^``sayaṃ vā modatī''^eb^ti, ayampi upacāraniddesova. dhammānaṃ avasavattanatoti vasavattibhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ ^b^``modanamattameva vā tanti muditā''^eb^ti āha.

[03] piyādīsu ^a^M1.0379^ea^ pakkhapātupacchedanamukhena udāsinabhāvasaṅkhātā upapattito ikkhā upekkhā. tenāha ^b^``averā hontū''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^upekkhatī^eb^ti kattuniddese kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.

[03] 263^b^.^eb^ ^b^hito^eb^ nāma atthacaro, tasmā ^b^hitākārappavattilakkhaṇā^eb^ti sattānaṃ hitacaraṇākārena pavattilakkhaṇā, hitākārassa vā pavattanalakkhaṇā. ^b^hitūpasaṃhārarasā^eb^ti sattesu hitassa upanayanakiccā, upanayanasampattikā vā. ``anatthaṃ me acarī''tiādinā (dha0 sa0 1237; vibha0 909) pavattanakassa āghātassa vinayanākārena paccupatiṭṭhati, ñāṇassa gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati, yattha vā sayaṃ uppajjati, tattha āghātavinayanaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti ^b^āghātavinayapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^. amanāpānampi sattānaṃ paṭikkūle appaṭikkūlasaññitārūpena, pageva manāpānaṃ yaṃ manāpabhāvadassanaṃ, tathāpavatto yonisomanasikāro, taṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ etissāti ^b^manāpabhāvadassanapadaṭṭhānā. byāpādūpasamo^eb^ti byāpādassa vikkhambhanavasena vūpasamo. ^b^sampattī^eb^ti sampajjanaṃ sammadeva nibbatti. ^b^sinehasambhavo^eb^ti taṇhāsinehassa uppatti. ^b^vipattī^eb^ti vināso. mettāmukhena hi rāgo vañceti.

[03] karuṇādīnaṃ lakkhaṇādīsu iminā nayena attho veditabbo. visesamattameva vaṇṇayissāma. sattānaṃ pavattadukkhassa apanayanākāro. apanayanaṃ pana hotu vā mā vā, yo dukkhāpanayanākāro, tathāpavattilakkhaṇā ^b^dukkhāpanayanākārappavattilakkhaṇā^eb^. apanetukāmatāya paresaṃ dukkhassa asahanaṃ anadhivāsanaṃ ^b^paradukkhāsahanaṃ^eb^. na vihiṃsā avihiṃsā, sattānaṃ aviheṭhanaṃ. taṃ paccupaṭṭhapeti, vihiṃsāya vā paṭipakkhabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhatīti ^b^avihiṃsāpaccupaṭṭhānā. vihiṃsūpasamo^eb^ti ettha vihiṃsanti etāya satte, vihiṃsanaṃ vā nesaṃ tanti vihiṃsā ^a^V1.0358^ea^, sattānaṃ viheṭhanākārena pavatto karuṇāya paṭipakkhabhūto paṭighacittuppādo. karuṇāmukhena soko vañcetīti āha ^b^``sokasambhavo vipattī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^pamodanalakkhaṇā^eb^ti parasampattiyā pamodanalakkhaṇā. ^b^anissāyanarasā^eb^ti issāyanassa usūyanassa paṭipakkhabhāvakiccā. sattānaṃ sampattiyā, pantasenāsanesu, adhikusaladhammesu ca asahanaṃ aramaṇaṃ aratīcceva ^a^M1.0380^ea^ saṅgahaṃ gacchati, tassā vihananākārena paccupatiṭṭhati, tassa vā vighātaṃ vūpasamaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti ^b^arativighātapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^.

[03] pahāso gehasitapītivasena pahaṭṭhabhāvo uppilāvitattaṃ. ^b^sattesu samabhāvadassanarasā^eb^ti piyādibhedesu sabbasattesu udāsinavuttiyā samabhāvasseva dassanakiccā, upapattito ikkhaṇato samabhāveneva tesaṃ gahaṇakiccāti attho. sattesu paṭikkūlāpaṭikkūlākārānaṃ aggahaṇato tattha paṭighānunayānaṃ vūpasamanākārena vuttiyā tesaṃ vūpasamaṃ vikkhambhanaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti ^b^paṭighānunayavūpasamapaccupaṭṭhānā. evaṃ pavattakammassakatādassanapadaṭṭhānā^eb^ti ettha ^b^``eva''^eb^nti iminā byatirekamukhena hitūpasaṃhāradukkhāpanayanasampattipamodanākārena paccāmasanto mettādīnaṃ tissannaṃ pavattiākārapaṭisedhanamukhena pavattaṃ kammassakatāñāṇaṃ upekkhābrahmavihārassa āsannakāraṇaṃ, na yaṃ kiñcīti dasseti.

[03] 264^b^.^eb^ ^b^vipassanāsukhañceva bhavasampatti cā^eb^ti ettha diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro cāti vattabbaṃ. tampi hi nesaṃ sādhāraṇapayojanaṃ. tathā ``sukhaṃ supatī''tiādayo (a0 ni0 8.1; 11.15) ekādasānisaṃsā. te pana heṭṭhā vuttā evāti idha na gahitā.

[03] nissarati apagacchati etenāti ^b^nissaraṇaṃ,^eb^ pahāyakaṃ. kāmañcetehi pañcapi nīvaraṇāni, tadekaṭṭhā ca pāpadhammā vikkhambhanavasena pahīyanti, ujuvipaccanīkadassanavasena pana byāpādādayo ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (dī0 ni0 3.326; a0 ni0 6.13) vuttā. evañca katvā rāganissaraṇatāvacanaṃ upekkhābrahmavihārassa suṭṭhu samatthitaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] 265^b^.^eb^ ^b^etthā^eb^ti etesu brahmavihāresu. mettā sattesu yathārahaṃ dānapiyavacanādisīlasutādiguṇagahaṇavasena pavattati. tena vuttaṃ ``sattānaṃ manāpabhāvadassanapadaṭṭhānā''ti. rāgopi ^a^V1.0359^ea^ tattha yathā tathā guṇaggahaṇamukheneva pavattati manāpasaññāpalobhatoti āha ^b^``guṇadassanasabhāgatāyā''^eb^ti. tasmā mittamukhasapatto viya tulyākārena dūsanato ^b^rāgo^eb^ mettāya ^b^āsannapaccatthiko, so lahuṃ otāraṃ labhati^eb^ satisammosamattenāpi mettaṃ apanīya tassā vatthusmiṃ uppajjanārahattā ^a^M1.0381^ea^. ^b^tato^eb^ti rāgato, rāgassa vā otāralābhato. ^b^sabhāgavisabhāgatāyā^eb^ti sabhāgassa, sabhāgena vā visabhāgatāya. sattesu hi manāpākāragāhino mettāsabhāgassa tabbiparītasabhāvo byāpādo tena visabhāgo. tasmā so otāraṃ labhamāno cireneva labheyyāti purisassa dūre ṭhitasapatto viya mettāya dūrapaccatthiko. ^b^tato^eb^ti byāpādato. ^b^nibbhayenā^eb^ti anussaṅkanaparisaṅkanena, laddhapatiṭṭhāya mettāya byāpādena duppadhaṃsiyattāti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``mettāyissatī''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ^b^iṭṭhāna^eb^nti piyānaṃ. ^b^kantāna^eb^nti kamanīyānaṃ. ^b^manāpāna^eb^nti manavaḍḍhanakānaṃ. tato eva mano ramentīti ^b^manoramānaṃ. lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttāna^eb^nti taṇhāsannissitānaṃ. ^b^appaṭilābhato samanupassato^eb^ti appaṭilābhena ahamime na labhāmīti paritassato. ^b^atīta^eb^nti atikkantaṃ. ^b^niruddha^eb^nti nirodhappattaṃ. ^b^vipariṇata^eb^nti sabhāvavigamena vigataṃ. ^b^samanussarato^eb^ti anutthunanavasena cintayato. ^b^gehasita^eb^nti kāmaguṇanissitaṃ. ^b^``ādinā''^eb^ti iminā ``sotaviññeyyānaṃ saddāna''nti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^vipattidassanasabhāgatāyā^eb^ti yesu sattesu bhogādivipattidassanamukhena karuṇā pavattati, tesu tannimittameva ayoniso ābhoge sati yathāvuttadomanassamukhena soko uppajjeyya, so karuṇāya āsannapaccatthiko. soko hi idha domanassasīsena vutto. ^b^sabhāgavisabhāgatāyā^eb^ti ettha sattesu dukkhāpanayanakāmatākārassa karuṇāsabhāgassa tesu dukkhūpanayanākāro vihesāsabhāvo visabhāgoti tāya sabhāgavisabhāgatāya sā otāraṃ labhamānā cireneva labheyyāti purisassa dūre ṭhitasapatto viya karuṇāya dūrapaccatthikā vuttā.

[01] ^b^sampattidassanasabhāgatāyā^eb^ti yesu sattesu bhogādisampattidassanamukhena muditā pavattati, tesu tannimittameva ayoniso ābhoge sati ``cakkhuviññeyyānaṃ rūpāna''ntiādinā (ma0 ni0 3.306) vuttasomanassamukhena pahāso uppajjeyya, so ca muditāya āsannapaccatthiko. pahāso hi idha somanassasīsena vutto. ^b^sabhāgavisabhāgatāyā^eb^ti bhogādisampattīhi ^a^M1.0382^ea^ muditesu sattesu pamodanākārassa muditāsabhāgassa tattha anabhiramanākārā arati visabhāgāti tāya sabhāgavisabhāgatāya ^a^V1.0360^ea^ sā otāraṃ labhamānā cireneva labheyyāti purisassa dūre ṭhitasapatto viya muditāya dūrapaccatthikā vuttā. ^b^pamudito cā^eb^tiādi muditāya siddhāya ayampi arati na hotīti laddhabbaguṇadassanavasena vuttaṃ, na idhādhippetāratiniggahadassanavasena. kāyacittavivekapaṭipakkhāya vā aratiyā vikkhambhitāya muditāya paṭipakkhā arati suvikkhambhaneyyā hotīti dassanatthaṃ ekadesena arati dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^adhikusaladhammesū^eb^ti samathavipassanādhammesu.

[03] bālakaradhammayogato ^b^bālassa^eb^. attahitaparahitabyāmūḷhatāya ^b^mūḷhassa^eb^. puthūnaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādīhi kāraṇehi ^b^puthujjanassa^eb^. kilesodhīnaṃ maggodhīhi ajitattā ^b^anodhijinassa,^eb^ odhijinā vā sekkhā odhisova kilesānaṃ jitattā. tena imassa odhijitabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. sattamabhavādito uddhaṃ pavattanavipākassa ajitattā ^b^avipākajinassa,^eb^ vipākajinā vā arahanto appaṭisandhikattā. tenassa asekkhattaṃ paṭikkhipati. anekādīnave sabbesampi pāpadhammānaṃ mūlabhūte sammohe ādīnavānaṃ adassanasīlatāya ^b^anādīnavadassāvino^eb^. āgamādhigamābhāvā ^b^assutavato^eb^. ediso ekaṃsena andhaputhujjano nāma hotīti tassa andhaputhujjanabhāvadassanatthaṃ punapi ^b^``puthujjanassā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^evarūpā^eb^ti vuttākārena sammohapubbikā. ^b^rūpaṃ sā nātivattatī^eb^ti rūpānaṃ samatikkamanāya kāraṇaṃ na hoti, rūpārammaṇe kilese nātivattatīti adhippāyo. somanassadomanassarahitaṃ aññāṇameva ^b^aññāṇupekkhā. dosaguṇāvicāraṇavasena sabhāgattā^eb^ti yathā brahmavihārupekkhā mettādayo viya sattesu hitūpasaṃhārādivasena guṇadose avicārentī kevalaṃ ajjhupekkhanavaseneva pavattati, evaṃ aññāṇupekkhā sattesu vijjamānampi guṇadosaṃ acintentī kevalaṃ ajjhupekkhanavaseneva pavattatīti dosaguṇāvicāraṇavasena sabhāgā. tasmā sā lahuṃ otāraṃ labhatīti brahmavihārupekkhāya āsannapaccatthikā vuttā. ^b^sabhāgavisabhāgatāyā^eb^ti iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu majjhattākārassa upekkhāsabhāgassa ^a^M1.0383^ea^ tattha anurodhavirodhapavattiākārā rāgapaṭighā visabhāgāti tāya sabhāgavisabhāgatāya te otāraṃ labhamānā cireneva labheyyunti purisassa dūre ṭhitasapatto viya upekkhābrahmavihārassa dūrapaccatthikā vuttā.

[03] 266^b^.^eb^ ^b^kattukāmatā chando ādi^eb^ ``chandamūlakā kusalā dhammā''ti (a0 ni0 8.83) vacanato, atha vā sattesu hitesitādukkhāpanayanakāmatādinā anavajjābhipatthanāvasena ^a^V1.0361^ea^ pavattanato ``kattukāmatā chando ādī''ti vuttaṃ. upekkhābrahmavihāropi hi sattesu anirākatahitacchandoyeva ``tattha abyāvaṭatā apaṇṇakapaṭipadā''ti ajjhupekkhanākārena pavattati mātā viya sakiccapasute putte. ^b^nīvaraṇādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena tadekaṭṭhakilesānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. katthaci sattaggahaṇampi saṅkhāraggahaṇameva hoti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya yathā ``sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā''ti (a0 ni0 10.27; khu0 pā0 4.1), na evamidhāti āha ^b^``paññattidhammavasena eko vā satto aneke vā sattā ārammaṇa''^eb^nti. ^b^paññattidhammavasenā^eb^ti paññattisaṅkhātadhammavasena. kāmañcettha ``sukhitā hontū''tiādinā (paṭi0 ma0 2.23) bhāvanāyaṃ sukhādiggahaṇampi labbhati. taṃ pana ``sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā''ti (dha0 pa0 255; theragā0 676; netti0 5) vipassanāya aniccalakkhaṇagahaṇaṃ viya appadhānabhūtaṃ, sattapaññatti eva padhānabhāvena gayhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^upacāre vā^eb^ patte ^b^ārammaṇavaḍḍhanaṃ^eb^ tatthāpi sīmāsambhedasiddhitoti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^ekamāvāsaṃ paricchinditvā^eb^ti ettha ``satte mettāya pharissāmī''ti evaṃ ñāṇena paricchedaṃ katvā ekā racchā paricchinditabbāti yojanā. racchāgahaṇena racchāvāsino sattā gahitā yathā ekaṃ disanti. evaṃ sabbattha.

[03] 267^b^.^eb^ ^b^kasiṇānaṃ nissando^eb^ti kasiṇajjhānānaṃ nissandaphalasadisā ^b^āruppā^eb^ arūpajjhānāni, kasiṇajjhānānaṃ pāripūriyāva sijjhanato. tehi vinā asijjhanatoti keci. ^b^samādhinissando^eb^ti rūpajjhānasamādhīnaṃ, heṭṭhimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ arūpajjhānasamādhīnañca nissando paṭipāṭiyā te adhigantvāva paṭilabhitabbato ^a^M1.0384^ea^. ^b^vipassanānissando^eb^ vipassanānubhāvena laddhabbato, vipassanāvaseneva ca samāpajjitabbato. ^b^samathavipassanānissando nirodhasamāpatti^eb^. yathāha ``dvīhi balehi samannāgatattā''tiādi (visuddhi0 2.868). ^b^``purimabrahmavihārattayanissando''^eb^ti iminā mettādivasena tīṇi jhānāni adhigantvā ṭhitasseva upekkhābrahmavihāro, na itarassāti dasseti. tamevatthaṃ upamāya pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ ^b^``yathā hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.

[03] 268^b^.^eb^ ^b^siyā^eb^ti vuccamānākārena siyā kassaci parivitakko. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etesu mettādīsu brahmavihāratā veditabbā, itarakammaṭṭhānāni attahitapaṭipattimattāni. imāni pana ``sabbe ^a^V1.0362^ea^ sattā sukhitā hontū''tiādinā (paṭi0 ma0 2.22) parahitapaṭipattibhūtāni. tasmā sattesu sammā paṭipattibhāvena seṭṭhā ete vihārā. ^b^brahmāno^eb^ti upapattibrahmāno. te hi idha jhānabhāvanāya vinīvaraṇacittā hutvā brahmaloke uppannā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ vinīvaraṇacittāva honti. tasmā ^b^``niddosacittā viharantī''^eb^ti vadanti. ^b^brahmāno^eb^ti vā sakalabuddhaguṇahetubhūtānaṃ dānapāramitādīnaṃ buddhakaradhammānaṃ paripūraṇavasena brūhitaguṇā mahāsattā bodhisattā. te hi sabbasattānaṃ hitesanena, ahitāpanayanena, sampattipamodanena, sabbattha vivajjitāgatigamanamajjhattabhāvādhiṭṭhānena ca niddosacittā viharanti. ^b^eva^eb^nti yathā te upapattibrahmāno, mahābodhisattabrahmāno vā, evaṃ etehi brahmavihārehi sampayuttā samaṅgībhūtā.

[03] 269^b^.^eb^ ^b^catassovātiādipañhassā^eb^ti catassotiādikassa tividhassa pañhassa. ^b^visuddhimaggādivasā^eb^ti ettha byāpādasaṃkilesādito visujjhanupāyo visuddhimaggo. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena hitūpasaṃhārādimanasikāravisesā saṅgahitā. ^b^āsaṃ^eb^ mettādīnaṃ. ^b^appamāṇe^eb^ti pamāṇarahite. ^b^yenā^eb^ti yena kāraṇena. ^b^ta^eb^nti tasmā. ^b^da^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro.

[03] byāpādabahulassa visuddhimaggoti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ, ujuvipaccanīkabhāvatoti adhippāyo. esa nayo sesesupi. pakkhapātavasena anābhujanamanābhogo majjhattākāroti adhippāyo. yvāyaṃ catubbidho sattesu ^a^M1.0385^ea^ manasikāro vutto, tameva upamāya dassetuṃ ^b^``yasmā ca yathā mātā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha vuttassāpi hitūpasaṃhārādiatthassa upameyyabhāvaṃ upanetvā dassetuṃ atthupanayanattho ^b^``yasmā cā''^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-saddo. ^b^pariyāye^eb^ti vāre, tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kiccavasena parivattanakkameti attho. ^b^abyāvaṭā^eb^ti anussukkā. ^b^tathā^eb^ti yathā mātā daharādīsu puttesu, tathā sabbasattesu mettādivasena mettāyanādivasikena bhavitabbanti yojanā. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā sabbepi saṃkilesadhammā yathārahaṃ dosamoharāgapakkhiyā, tehi ca visujjhanupāyo appamaññā, hitūpasaṃhārādivasena catubbidho ca sattesu manasikāro, tasmā visuddhimaggādivasā catassova appamaññā. ^b^catassopi etā bhāvetukāmena^eb^ na ekekanti adhippāyo. sati hi sabbasaṅgahe kamena bhavitabbaṃ. hitesitā mettāyananti āha ^b^``evaṃ patthitahitāna''^eb^nti. ^b^sambhāvetvā vā^eb^ti ``imāya paṭipattiyā ayaṃ nirayādīsu nibbatteyyā''ti parikappetvā vā. dukkhāpanayanākāarappavattivasena ^a^V1.0363^ea^ paṭipajjitabbanti sambandho. ^b^tato para^eb^nti tato hitākārappavattiādito paraṃ. ^b^kattabbābhāvato^eb^ti catutthassa pakārassa kattabbassa abhāvato. ^b^ayaṃ kamo^eb^ti ayaṃ imāsaṃ appamaññānaṃ yebhuyyena pavattanakkamoti katvā vuttaṃ, na ``imināva kamena etāsaṃ pavatti, na aññathā''ti. mettādīnaṃ hi tissannaṃ bhāvanānaṃ kamaniyamo natthi, yaṃ vā taṃ vā paṭhamaṃ bhāvetuṃ labbhā, desanākkamavasena vā evaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^ekasattassāpī^eb^ti ekassāpi sattassa. appaṭibhāganimittattā paricchedaggahaṇaṃ natthi, na ca sammutisaccavasena pavattaṃ sattaggahaṇaṃ paricchinnarūpādiggahaṇaṃ hotīti appanāppattiyā aparāmāsasattaggahaṇamuddhabhūtānaṃ mettādīnaṃ ekasattārammaṇānampi appamāṇagocaratā vuttā. ^b^evaṃ pamāṇaṃ aggahetvā^eb^ti yathā uddhumātakādīsu atirekuddhumātakādibhāvappatte padese nimittaṃ gayhati, evaṃ pamāṇaṃ aggahetvā. ^b^sakalapharaṇavasenā^eb^ti niravasesapharaṇavasena.

[03] 270^b^.^eb^ ^b^nissaraṇattā^eb^ti ettha yaṃ yassa nissaraṇaṃ, taṃ tassa ujupaṭipakkhabhūtameva hoti. yathā kāmānaṃ nekkhammaṃ, rūpānaṃ āruppā, saṅkhārānaṃ nibbānaṃ ^a^M1.0386^ea^, evaṃ domanassasahitānaṃ byāpādavihiṃsāratīnaṃ nissaraṇabhūtā mettākaruṇāmuditā na somanassarahitā honti. nissaraṇaggahaṇeneva ca pubbabhāgiyānaṃ tāsaṃ upekkhāsampayogopi anuññātoti daṭṭhabbaṃ anissaraṇabhāvato. tathā hi aṭṭhavīsatiyā cittuppādesu karuṇāmuditānaṃ pavattiṃ ācariyā icchanti. na hi brahmavihārupekkhā upekkhāvedanaṃ vinā vattati pārisuddhiupekkhā viya. na hi kadāci pārisuddhiupekkhā vedanupekkhaṃ vinā vattatīti.

[03] 271^b^.^eb^ ^b^sātasahagata^eb^nti sukhasahagataṃ. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ``tato tvaṃ bhikkhū''tiādikāya (a0 ni0 8.63) desanāya catunnampi appamaññānaṃ savitakkādibhāvo viya upekkhāsahagatabhāvopi viññāyati, tasmā. ^b^catassopi appamaññā catukkapañcakajjhānikā^eb^ti codakassa adhippāyo. ^b^evañhi satī^eb^ti yadi mūlasamādhimhi vuttamatthaṃ anantaraṃ vuttatāya brahmavihāresu pakkhipati, evaṃ sante kāyānupassanādayopi catukkapañcakajjhānikā siyuṃ, na pana honti vipassanāvasena desitattāti adhippāyo, hontu kāyānupassanādayo ānāpānabhāvanāvasena catukkapañcakajjhānikāti vadeyyāti āsaṅkanto āha ^b^``vedanādīsū''^eb^tiādi. ^b^byañjanacchāyāmattaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti ``mettā me cetovimutti bhāvitā bhavissatī''tiādīhi ^a^V1.0364^ea^ byañjanehi pakāsito eva cittasamādhi ``ajjhattaṃ me cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhavissatī''tiādīhipi byañjanehi pakāsitoti byañjanato labbhamānasamādhicchāyāmattaṃ gahetvā ubhayattha labbhamānaṃ adhippāyaṃ aggahetvāti attho. suttatthaṃ hi aññathā vadanto ayathāvāditāya satthāraṃ apavadanto nāma hoti. tenāha ^b^``mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhī''^eb^ti.

[03] 272^b^.^eb^ ``tayimaṃ dosaṃ pariharitukāmena na sabbaṃ suttaṃ nītatthameva, tasmā garukulato adhippāyo maggitabbo''ti dassento ^b^``gambhīraṃ hī''^eb^tiādiṃ vatvā tattha ādito paṭṭhāya adhippāyaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``ayañhī''^eb^tiādimāha. āyācitā dhammadesanā etenāti āyācitadhammadesano, taṃ ^b^āyācitadhammadesanaṃ. evamevā^eb^ti garahane nipāto, mudā evāti attho. ^b^ajjhatta^eb^nti gocarajjhatte, kammaṭṭhānārammaṇeti attho ^a^M1.0387^ea^. yasmā cittekaggatā nāma sasantatipariyāpannā hoti, tasmā atthavaṇṇanāyaṃ ^b^``niyakajjhattavasenā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhavissatī^eb^ti bahiddhā avikkhippamānaṃ ekaggabhāve ṭhitaṃ bhavissati. tato eva ^b^susaṇṭhitaṃ,^eb^ suṭṭhu samāhitanti attho. ^b^uppannā^eb^ti avikkhambhitā. ^b^pāpakā^eb^ti lāmakā. ^b^akusalā dhammā^eb^ti kāmacchandādayo akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena akusalā dhammā. cittaṃ pariyādāya pavattituṃ okāsādānena kusalacittaṃ khepetvā na ca ṭhassantīti yojanā. iminā yathāvuttassa samādhānassa kāraṇamāha.

[03] ^b^cittekaggatāmatto^eb^ti bhāvanamanuyuttena paṭiladdhamattaṃ nātisubhāvitaṃ samādhānaṃ. taṃ pana upari vuccamānānaṃ samādhivisesānaṃ mūlakāraṇabhāvato ^b^``mūlasamādhī''^eb^ti vutto. svāyaṃ cittekaggatāmatto ``ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṃ karomi samādahāmī''tiādīsu viya khaṇikasamādhi adhippeto. yatheva hi aññatthāpi ``āraddhaṃ kho pana me, bhikkhave, vīriyaṃ ahosi asallīnaṃ...pe0... samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekagga''nti (a0 ni0 8.11; pārā0 11) vatvā ``vivicceva kāmehī''tiādivacanato (a0 ni0 8.11) paṭhamaṃ vuttacittekaggatā ``khaṇikasamādhī''ti viññāyati, evamidhāpīti. ^b^so eva samādhī^eb^ti mūlasamādhimāha.

[03] ^b^assā^eb^ti bhikkhuno, assa vā mūlasamādhissa. ^b^bhāvana^eb^nti vaḍḍhanaṃ. ^b^ayaṃ samādhī^eb^ti ca mūlasamādhiyeva adhippeto. ^b^evaṃ bhāvito^eb^ti yathā araṇisahitena uppādito aggi gomayacuṇṇādīhi ^a^V1.0365^ea^ vaḍḍhito gomayaggiādibhāvaṃ pattopi araṇisahitena uppāditamūlaggītveva vuccati, evamidhāpi mūlasamādhi eva mettādivasena vaḍḍhitoti katvā vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^aññesupi ārammaṇesu^eb^ pathavīkasiṇādīsu. tattha yathā mettābhāvanāpubbaṅgamena bhāvanānayena pathavīkasiṇādīsu savitakkādibhāvavasena catukkapañcakajjhānasampāpanavidhinā mūlasamādhissa bhāvanā vuttā, evaṃ karuṇādibhāvanāpubbaṅgamaṃ pathavīkasiṇādīsupi bhāvanāvidhiṃ dassetvā pacchā kāyānupassanādipubbaṅgamaṃ bhāvanāvidhiṃ dassento āsavakkhayāya dhammaṃ desesi. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``karuṇā me cetovimuttī''^eb^tiādi. yadi evaṃ dhammānupassanāpariyosānāya desanāya arahattādhigamāya kammaṭṭhānassa ^a^M1.0388^ea^ kathitattā puna ``tato tvaṃ, bhikkhu, imaṃ samādhiṃ savitakkampī''tiādi (a0 ni0 8.63) kasmā vuttanti? dhammānupassanāya matthakappattidassanatthaṃ. sā hi saṅkhārupekkhābhāvena vattamānā yathāvuttajjhānadhamme sammasantī visesato matthakappattā nāma hoti. phalasamāpattibhūmidassanatthaṃ vuttanti keci.

[03] puna ^b^yato kho te^eb^tiādi arahattappattito uddhaṃ laddhabbaphāsuvihāradassanaṃ. tattha ^b^gagghasī^eb^ti gamissasi. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ``savitakkampī''tiādikā desanā mettādīnaṃ ārammaṇato aññasmiṃ ārammaṇe samādhiṃ sandhāya vuttā, na appamaññā, tasmā. ^b^``tathevā''^eb^tiādinā ganthantarenapi tamevatthaṃ samattheti. tattha ^b^tathevā^eb^ti tikacatukkajjhānavaseneva. ^b^abhidhamme^eb^ti cittuppādakaṇḍe (dha0 sa0 251 ādayo), appamaññāvibhaṅgādīsu (vibha0 684 ādayo) ca tattha tattha abhidhammappadesesu.

[03] 273^b^.^eb^ ^b^subhaparamādivasenā^eb^ti ^b^subha^eb^-saddo ``subhanteva adhimutto hotī''ti (paṭi0 ma0 1.212; a0 ni0 8.66) evaṃ vuttasubhavimokkhaṃ sandhāya vutto uttarapadalopena. ^b^parama^eb^-saddo ukkaṃsattho. subho subhavimokkho paramo ukkaṃso paramā koṭi etissāti subhaparamā, mettācetovimutti, tato paraṃ tāya sādhetabbaṃ natthīti attho. asādhāraṇassa atthassa adhippetattā vipassanāsukhādayo idha anavasarā. itaretaravisiṭṭhāpete visesā, pageva parehi. tenāha ^b^``aññamaññaṃ asadiso ānubhāvaviseso veditabbo''^eb^ti. ^b^visesetvā^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ visiṭṭhaṃ katvā.

[03] ^b^tassa^eb^ ^a^V1.0366^ea^ ^b^tassa upanissayattā^eb^ti subhavimokkhādikassa tassa tassa vimokkhassa pakatūpanissayavasena upanissayapaccayabhāvato. idāni tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ katvā dassetuṃ ^b^``mettāvihārissā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. assa mettāvihārissa cittaṃ upasaṃharatoti sambandho. ^b^appaṭikkūlaparicayā^eb^ti mettābhāvanāvasena sattasaññite yattha katthaci ārammaṇe appaṭikkūlākāreneva gahaṇassa paricitattā. tassa saṅkhārabhūtampi yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇaṃ appaṭikkūlākāreneva paccupatiṭṭhati, pageva sabhāvato. ``appaṭikkūla''nti ^a^M1.0389^ea^ tatthassa cittaṃ abhirativasena nirāsaṅkaṃ pavattati, paccanīkadhammehi ca sukhena, suṭṭhu ca vimuccati, yatassa jhānassa vimokkhapariyāyo vutto. tenāha ^b^``appaṭikkūlesū''^eb^tiādi. yathāvutto ca attho anatthacaraṇādiadhippāyena sacetane ārammaṇe āghātaṃ uppādentassa paṭikkūlaparicayā acetanepi vātātapādike āghātuppattiyā vibhāvetabbo. ^b^na tato para^eb^nti tato subhavimokkhato paraṃ kassaci vimokkhassa upanissayo na hotīti attho.

[03] abhihananti etenāti abhighāto, daṇḍo abhighāto yassa taṃ daṇḍābhighātaṃ, taṃ ādi yassa taṃ daṇḍābhighātādi, daṇḍābhighātādi rūpaṃ nimittaṃ yassa taṃ ^b^daṇḍābhighātādirūpanimittaṃ^eb^. kiṃ pana tanti āha ^b^``sattadukkha''^eb^nti, daṇḍappahārādijanitaṃ karajarūpahetukaṃ sattānaṃ uppajjanakadukkhanti attho. ^b^rūpe ādīnavo suparividito hoti^eb^ karuṇāvihārissa rūpanimittattā, dukkhassa karuṇāya ca paradukkhāsahanarasattāti adhippāyo. ^b^tattha^eb^ ākāse. ^b^cittaṃ pakkhandati^eb^ sabbaso rūpānaṃ abhāvo vivaramapagamoti.

[03] ^b^tena tenā^eb^tiādīsu ayaṃ yojanā -- tena tena bhogasampattiādinā pāmojjakāraṇena pamuditānaṃ sattānaṃ uppannapāmojjaviññāṇaṃ samanupassantassa yogino ``sādhu vatāyaṃ satto pamodatī''ti muditāya pavattisambhavato pamuditaviññāṇassa dassanena viññāṇaggahaṇaparicitaṃ cittaṃ hotīti.

[03] ^b^anukkamādhigata^eb^nti ākāsakasiṇavajje yattha katthaci kasiṇe rūpāvacarajjhānādhigamānukkamena rūpavirāgabhāvanāya adhigataṃ. ākāsanimittaṃ gocaro etassāti ākāsanimittagocaraṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^ākāsanimittagocare^eb^ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe. ^b^cittaṃ upasaṃharato^eb^ti dutiyāruppādhigamāya bhāvanācittaṃ nentassa, tathā bhāvayatoti attho. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ ^a^V1.0367^ea^ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe. ^b^citta^eb^nti viññāṇañcāyatanacittaṃ. ^b^pakkhandatī^eb^ti anupavisati vimokkhabhāvena appeti.

[03] ^b^ābhogābhāvato^eb^ti ``sukhitā hontū''tiādinā (paṭi0 ma0 2.23) sukhāsīsanādivasena ābhujanābhāvato. sattānaṃ sukhāsīsanādivasena pavattamānā ^a^M1.0390^ea^ mettādibhāvanāva paramatthaggahaṇamukhena satte ārammaṇaṃ karoti, upekkhābhāvanā pana tathā appavattitvā kevalaṃ ajjhupekkhanavaseneva satte ārammaṇaṃ karotīti āha ^b^``upekkhāvihārissa sukhadukkhādiparamatthaggāhavimukhabhāvato avijjamānaggahaṇadukkhaṃ cittaṃ hotī''^eb^ti. nanu ca ``kammassakā sattā, te kassa ruciyā sukhitā vā bhavissantī''tiādinā paṭikkhepavasenapi paramatthaggahaṇamukheneva upekkhābrahmavihāropi satte ārammaṇaṃ karotīti? saccametaṃ, taṃ pana bhāvanāya pubbabhāge, matthakappattiyaṃ pana kevalaṃ ajjhupekkhanavaseneva satte ārammaṇaṃ karotīti savisesaṃ paramatthato avijjamāne eva visaye tassa pavatti. avijjamānaggahaṇadukkhatā ca ajjhupekkhanavasena appanāppattiyā aparāmāsasattaggahaṇamuddhabhūtatāya veditabbā. sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03] 274^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbāpetā^eb^ti sabbāpi etā appamaññā. ^b^dānādīna^eb^nti pāramibhāvappattānaṃ dānādīnaṃ buddhakaradhammānaṃ. ^b^sabbakalyāṇadhammāna^eb^nti sabbesaṃ anavajjadhammānaṃ, samatiṃsāya pāramitānaṃ, tannimittānaṃ buddhayāniyānañca, sabbehi vā sundarasabhāvānaṃ. na hi lokiyadhammā buddhakaradhammehi ānubhāvato ukkaṭṭhā nāma atthi, buddhadhammesu vattabbameva natthi. ^b^paripūrikā^eb^ti parivuddhikarā. adhiṭṭhānāni viya hi appamaññā sabbāsaṃ pāramitānaṃ pāripūrikarā. ^b^``hitajjhāsayatāyā''^eb^tiādinā mettābrahmavihārādīnaṃ upekkhābrahmavihārassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvadassanamukhena catūhi appamaññāhi attano santānassa pageva abhisaṅkhatattā mahābodhisattā dānādipāramiyo pūretuṃ samatthā honti, nāññathāti imamatthaṃ dasseti. ^b^imassa dātabbaṃ, imassa na dātabba^eb^nti nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, ``idaṃ dātabbaṃ, idaṃ na dātabbanti ca vibhāgaṃ akatvā''ti vattabbato. deyyapaṭiggāhakavikapparahitā hi dānapāramitā. yathāha --
[21] ``yathāpi kumbho sampuṇṇo, yassa kassaci adhokato.
[22] vamatevudakaṃ nissesaṃ, na tattha parirakkhatī''ti.. (bu0 vaṃ0 2.118).

[03] ``sabbasattāna''nti ^a^V1.0368^ea^ idaṃ ``sukhanidāna''nti imināpi sambandhitabbaṃ, ``dentī''ti iminā ca. tena deyyadhammena viya dānadhammenāpi mahāsattānaṃ lokassa bahūpakāratā ^a^M1.0391^ea^ vuttā hoti, tathā tassa pariṇāmanato. tadatthadīpanatthaṃ hi ``vibhāgaṃ akatvā''ti vatvāpi ``sabbasattāna''nti vuttaṃ. ^b^tesa^eb^nti sabbasattānaṃ. ^b^upaghāta^eb^nti etthāpi ``vibhāgaṃ akatvā''ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ayaṃ hettha padayojanā -- vibhāgaṃ akatvā upaghātaṃ parivajjayantā sabbasattānaṃ sukhanidānaṃ sīlaṃ samādiyantīti. sattakālavikapparahitā hi sīlapāramitā, lokatthameva cassa phalaṃ pariṇamīyati. ^b^nekkhammaṃ bhajantī^eb^ti pabbajjaṃ upagacchanti. pabbajitassa hi sabbaso sīlaṃ paripūrati, na gahaṭṭhassa. idhāpi ``vibhāgaṃ akatvā sabbasattānaṃ sukhanidāna''nti idaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. na hi bodhisattā kālavibhāgaṃ katvā pabbajjaṃ anutiṭṭhanti, sīlaṃ vā samādiyanti, nidassanamattañcetaṃ jhānādinekkhammabhajanassāpi icchitabbattā. sabbasattānaṃ sukhanidānatā heṭṭhā vuttanayāva. esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^hitāhitesū^eb^ti atthānatthesu. ^b^asammohatthāyā^eb^ti sammohaviddhaṃsanāya. ^b^paññaṃ pariyodapentī^eb^ti yogavihitaṃ vijjāṭṭhānādiṃ assutaṃ suṇantā sutaṃ vodapentā ahaṃkāramamaṃkārādiṃ vidhunantā ñāṇaṃ visodhenti. ``ahaṃ mamā''ti vikapparahitā hi paññāpāramitā. ^b^hitasukhatthāyā^eb^ti sattānaṃ hitasukhādivuddhiyatthameva. ^b^nicca^eb^nti satataṃ avicchedena paṭipakkhena avokiṇṇaṃ. ^b^vīriyamārabhantī^eb^ti yathā sattānaṃ anuppannaṃ hitasukhaṃ uppajjati, uppannaṃ abhivaḍḍhati, evaṃ parakkamaṃ karonti. saṅkocavikkheparahitā hi vīriyapāramitā. ^b^``vīrabhāvaṃ pattāpī''^eb^ti iminā aparaddhānaṃ niggahasamatthataṃ dasseti. ^b^nānappakārakaṃ aparādhaṃ khamantī^eb^ti mammacchedanākārena attani pavattitaṃ nānāvidhaṃ aparādhaṃ sahanti. attaparavikappavirahitā hi dosasahanā khantipāramitā.

[03] ^b^paṭiññaṃ na visaṃvādentī^eb^ti avisaṃvādanasāmaññena sabbassapi anariyavohārassa akaraṇamāha. paṭiññāte, apaṭiññāte ca diṭṭhādike micchāvikapparahitā hi saccapāramitā. ^b^avicalādhiṭṭhānā^eb^ti yathāsamādinnesu dānādidhammesu niccalādhiṭṭhāyino acalasamādānādhiṭṭhānā, samādinnesu ca buddhakaradhammesu sammadeva avaṭṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramitā. ^b^tesū^eb^ti sattesu. ^b^avicalāyā^eb^ti paṭipakkhena akampanīyāya. ^b^eva^eb^nti yathāvuttena sattesu hitajjhāsayatādiākārena. yathā ca brahmavihārādhiṭṭhānā pāramiyo, evaṃ adhiṭṭhānādhiṭṭhānāpi. tathā hi yathāpaṭiññaṃ parānuggahāya pāramīnaṃ ^a^M1.0392^ea^ anuṭṭhānena saccādhiṭṭhānaṃ, tappaṭipakkhapariccāgato ^a^V1.0369^ea^ cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ, pāramīhi sacittupasamato upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ, tāhi parahitūpāyakosallato paññādhiṭṭhānaṃ. evaṃ paccekampi pāramitāsu yathārahaṃ netabbaṃ. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato pana pāramitāsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ paramatthadīpaniyaṃ ^b^cariyāpiṭakavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ, ativitthārabhayena na vitthārayimha. tathā dasabalañāṇādiketi. ^b^etāva hontī^eb^ti etā honti evāti yojanā.
[06] brahmavihāraniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti navamaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 275^b^.^eb^ ^b^uddiṭṭhesū^eb^ti ^a^M1.0393^ea^ ^a^V1.0370^ea^ ``cattāro āruppā''ti evaṃ uddiṭṭhesu, niddhāraṇe cetaṃ bhummaṃ. tenevāha ^b^``catūsu āruppesū''^eb^ti. tattha rūpavivekena arūpaṃ, arūpameva āruppaṃ jhānaṃ, idha pana tadatthaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ adhippetaṃ. taṃ bhāvetukāmo catutthajjhānaṃ uppādetīti sambandho. ^b^rūpādhikaraṇa^eb^nti rūpahetu. hetuattho hi ettha ^b^adhikaraṇa^eb^-saddo ``kāmādhikaraṇa''ntiādīsu (ma0 ni0 1.168-169) viya. daṇḍanaṭṭhena daṇḍo, muggarādi. parapīḷādhippāyena tassa ādānaṃ ^b^daṇḍādānaṃ^eb^. sattānaṃ sasanaṭṭhena ^b^satthaṃ,^eb^ āvudhaṃ. bhaṇḍanaṃ ^b^kalaho^eb^. virodho ^b^viggaho^eb^. nānāvādo ^b^vivādo. eta^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ daṇḍādānādikaṃ. ^b^sabbaso^eb^ti anavasesato. ^b^āruppe^eb^ arūpabhāve, āruppe vā bhave. ^b^rūpānaṃyevā^eb^ti diṭṭhādīnavānaṃ rūpānaṃyeva, na arūpānanti adhippāyo. ^b^nibbidāyā^eb^ti vikkhambhanavasena nibbindanatthāya. ^b^virāgāyā^eb^ti virajjanatthāya. ^b^nirodhāyā^eb^ti nirujjhanatthāya. sabbametaṃ samatikkamaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^daṇḍādānādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena adinnādānādikaṃ sabbaṃ rūpahetukaṃ anatthaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, na idha pāḷiyaṃ āgatamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^karajarūpe^eb^ti yathāvuttādīnavādhikaraṇabhāvayogyaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ, oḷārikarūpeti attho. ^b^ādīnava^eb^nti dosaṃ. ^b^tassā^eb^ti rūpassa. ^b^āloko^eb^ti vaṇṇaviseso evāti tattha pavattaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ ugghāṭetvā siyā ākāsanimittaṃ uggahetuṃ, na pana paricchinnākāsakasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā. tassa hi ugghāṭanā nāma rūpanimitteneva siyāti āha ^b^``ṭhapetvā paricchinnākāsakasiṇaṃ navasū''^eb^ti. keci pana ``ālokakasiṇampi ṭhapetvā aṭṭhasū''ti vadanti, tassa pana ṭhapane kāraṇaṃ na dissati, karajarūpaṃ atikkantaṃ hoti tassa anālambanato.

[01] yadi evaṃ kasmā ``catutthajjhānavasenā''ti vuttaṃ. nanu paṭhamajjhānādīnipi tassa anālambanavaseneva pavattanti paṭibhāganimittārammaṇattā? saccametaṃ, oḷārikaṅgappahānato pana santasabhāvena ^a^V1.0371^ea^ āneñjappattena catutthajjhānena atikkantaṃ suṭṭhu atikkantaṃ nāma hotīti ^b^``catutthajjhānavasenā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ ^a^M1.0394^ea^. keci ``assāsapassāsānaṃ nirujjhanato, kāmadhātusamatikkamanato cā''ti vadanti, taṃ akāraṇaṃ, itaresaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ sambhavato, heṭṭhimajjhānānañca akāmadhātusaṃvattanīyato. ^b^tappaṭibhāgamevā^eb^ti karajarūpapaṭibhāgameva nimittaggāhasambhavato. sadisañca nāma taṃ na hoti, tasmā kiṃ tassa samatikkamanenāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya ^b^``kathaṃ? yathā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^katha^eb^nti kathetukamyatāpucchā. ^b^yathā^eb^ti opammatthe nipāto. ^b^lekhācitta^eb^nti kāḷavaṇṇādinā kataparikammāya lekhāya cittaṃ. ^b^phalitantara^eb^nti vivaraṃ. ^b^disvā^eb^ti dūrato disvā. ^b^samānarūpasaddasamudācāra^eb^nti sadisarūpasaṇṭhānasarappayogaṃ.

[01] ^b^ārammaṇavasenā^eb^ti ``mama cakkhu sobhanaṃ, mama kāyo thiro, mama parikkhārā sundarā''ti evaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena. ^b^karajarūpasamaṅgikālo^eb^ti attano attabhāvarūpena ceva ārammaṇarūpena ca samannāgatakālo. ^b^tampī^eb^ti kasiṇarūpassapi. sāmiatthe hi idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. bhayasantāsādassanakāmatā viya samatikkamitukāmatāti yojanā. idañca yathāvuttānaṃ nibbidāvirāganirodhānaṃ sādhāraṇavacanaṃ. te hi tayo apekkhitvā bhayasantāsādassanakāmatā vuttā. eko kira sunakho vane sūkarena pahaṭamatto palāto, so arūpadassanavelāya bhattapacanaukkhaliṃ dūrato disvā sūkarasaññāya bhīto uttasanto palāyi, pisācabhīruko puriso rattibhāge aparicite dese matthakacchinnaṃ tālakkhandhaṃ disvā pisācasaññāya bhīto uttasanto mucchito papati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^``sūkarā...pe0... veditabbā''^eb^ti.

[03] 276^b^.^eb^ ^b^eva^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ opammatthaṃ nigamento āha. ^b^so^eb^ti yogāvacaro. tasmiṃ jhāne ādīnavaṃ passatīti sambandho. ^b^rūpa^eb^nti kasiṇarūpaṃ. ^b^santavimokkhato^eb^ti arūpajjhānato. tāni hi ``ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 8.72; 10.9) santavimokkhāti āgatā. santatāsiddhi cassa anussutito daṭṭhabbā. ^b^yathevā^eb^ti ^b^eva^eb^-kārena yena pakārena etaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ, evaṃ āruppānipīti ^a^M1.0395^ea^ upekkhācittekaggatāvasena duvaṅgikattaṃ dasseti, na tatiyajjhāne viya duvaṅgikatāmattaṃ. nanu cetthāpi duvaṅgikatāmattameva bhūmibhedatoti? nāyaṃ doso upamopameyyabhāvassa bhinnādhikaraṇato.

[03] ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne. ^b^nikanti^eb^nti apekkhaṃ. ^b^pariyādāyā^eb^ti ādīnavadassanena ^a^V1.0372^ea^ tasmiṃ jhāne khepetvā, anapekkho hutvāti attho. santato manasikaraṇeneva paṇītato, sukhumato ca manasikāro siddho hotīti āha ^b^``santato anantato manasi karitvā''^eb^ti. ^b^pattharitvā^eb^ti pageva vaḍḍhitaṃ, tadā vaḍḍhanavasena vā pattharitvā. ^b^tenā^eb^ti kasiṇarūpena. ^b^ugghāṭeti kasiṇa^eb^nti rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ pathavīkasiṇādikasiṇarūpaṃ apaneti. ugghāṭanavidhiṃ pana dassento ^b^``ugghāṭento hī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^saṃvelletī^eb^ti paṭisaṃharati. ^b^aññadatthū^eb^ti ekaṃsena. ^b^neva ubbaṭṭatī^eb^ti neva uṭṭhahati. ^b^na vivaṭṭatī^eb^ti na vinivaṭṭati. ^b^imassā^eb^ti imassa kasiṇarūpassa. ^b^amanasikāra^eb^nti manasi akaraṇaṃ acintanaṃ. ^b^manasikārañca paṭiccā^eb^ti ``ākāso ākāso''ti bhāvanāmanasikārañca nissāya. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ kasiṇarūpaṃ na sabbena sabbaṃ manasi karoto, tena ca phuṭṭhokāsaṃ ``ākāso ākāso''ti manasi karoto yadā taṃ bhāvanānubhāvena ākāsaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti, tadā so kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭeti nāma, tañca tena ugghāṭitaṃ nāma hotīti. tenāha ^b^``kasiṇugghāṭimākāsamattaṃ paññāyatī''^eb^ti. ^b^sabbameta^eb^nti tividhampetaṃ ^b^ekameva^eb^ pariyāyabhāvato.

[03] ^b^``nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhantī''^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ? nanu rūpāvacarapaṭhamajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāni, tato paṭṭhāya cassa na nesaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ. yadi siyā, jhānato parihāyeyya? yaṃ paneke vadanti ``attheva sukhumāni arūpajjhānavikkhambhaneyyāni nīvaraṇāni, tāni sandhāyetaṃ vutta''nti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. na hi mahaggatakusalesu lokuttarakusalesu viya odhiso pahānaṃ nāma atthi. yo pana rūpāvacarehi āruppānaṃ uḷāraphalatādiviseso, so bhāvanāvisesena santatarapaṇītatarabhāvena tesuyeva purimapurimehi pacchimapacchimānaṃ ^a^M1.0396^ea^ viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ``vikkhambhantī''ti pana vacanaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanavasena vuttaṃ. tathā hi aññatthāpi heṭṭhā pahīnānaṃ upari pahānaṃ vuccati. ye pana ``sabbe kusalā dhammā sabbesaṃ akusalānaṃ paṭipakkhāti katvā evaṃ vutta''nti vadanti, tehi dutiyajjhānūpacārādīsu nīvaraṇavikkhambhanāvacanassa kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ. ^b^sati santiṭṭhatī^eb^ti ākāsanimittārammaṇā sati sammā sūpaṭṭhitā hutvā tiṭṭhati. satisīsena cettha upacārajjhānānuguṇānaṃ saddhāpañcamānaṃ sakiccayogaṃ dasseti. ^b^upacārenā^eb^ti upacārajjhānena. ^b^idhāpī^eb^ti rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ sandhāya sampiṇḍanaṃ. taṃ hi upekkhāvedanāsampayuttaṃ. ^b^sesa^eb^nti ``sesāni kāmāvacarānī''tiādi. yaṃ idha vattabbamavuttaṃ, taṃ pana ^b^pathavīkasiṇaniddese^eb^ (visuddhi0 1.51 ādayo) vuttanayānusārena ^a^V1.0373^ea^ veditabbanti āha ^b^``pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayamevā''^eb^ti.

[03] evaṃ yaṃ tattha avisiṭṭhaṃ, taṃ atidisitvā idāni visiṭṭhaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``ayaṃ pana viseso''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^yānapputoḷi kumbhimukhādīna^eb^nti oguṇṭhanasivikādiyānānaṃ mukhaṃ yānamukhaṃ, putoḷiyā khuddakadvārassa mukhaṃ putoḷimukhaṃ, kumbhimukhanti paccekaṃ mukha-saddo sambandhitabbo. ^b^ākāsaṃyeva^eb^ yānamukhādiparicchinnaṃ. ^b^parikammamanasikārenā^eb^ti parikammabhūtena manasikārena upacārajjhānena. parikammaṃ anulomaṃ upacāroti ca anatthantarañhetaṃ. ^b^pekkhamāno^eb^ arūpāvacarajjhānacakkhunā.

[03] 277^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbākārenā^eb^ti rūpanimittaṃ daṇḍādānasambhavadassanādinā sabbena rūpadhammesu, pathavīkasiṇādirūpanimittesu, tadārammaṇajjhānesu ca dosadassanākārena, tesu eva vā rūpādīsu nikantippahānānāvajjitukāmatādinā. ^b^rūpajjhānampi rūpanti vuccati^eb^ uttarapadalopena ``rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī''tiādīsu (dha0 sa0 160; vibha0 625) yathā rūpabhavo rūpaṃ. ^b^rūpī^eb^ti hi rūpajjhānalābhīti attho. ^b^ārammaṇampi^eb^ kasiṇarūpaṃ ^b^rūpanti vuccati^eb^ purimapadalopena yathā ``devadatto datto''ti. ^b^rūpāni passatī^eb^ti kasiṇarūpāni jhānacakkhunā passatīti attho. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā uttarapadalopena, purimapadalopena ca yathākkamaṃ rūpajjhānakasiṇarūpesu rūpavohāro dissati, tasmā. rūpe rūpajjhāne taṃsahagatā saññā ^b^rūpasaññā. tadārammaṇassa cā^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-saddena yathāvuttaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ sampiṇḍeti, tena ^a^M1.0397^ea^ pāḷiyaṃ ``rūpasaññāna''nti sarūpekasesena niddeso katoti dasseti. ^b^virāgā^eb^ti jigucchanato. ^b^nirodhā^eb^ti tappaṭibandhachandarāgavikkhambhanena nirodhanato. vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^``kiṃ vuttaṃ hotī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tassa sabbākārena virāgā anavasesānaṃ nirodhāti evaṃ vā ettha yojanā kātabbā.

[03] ^b^``ārammaṇe avirattassa saññāsamatikkamo na hotī''^eb^ti idaṃ yasmā imāni jhānāni ārammaṇātikkamena pattabbāni, na aṅgātikkamenāti katvā vuttaṃ. yasmā panettha saññāsamatikkamo ārammaṇasamatikkamena vinā na hoti, tasmā ``samatikkantāsu ca saññāsu ārammaṇaṃ samatikkantameva hotī''ti āha. avatvā vuttoti sambandho. ^b^samāpannassā^eb^tiādīsu ^a^V1.0374^ea^ kusalasaññāvasena samāpannaggahaṇaṃ, vipākasaññāvasena upapannaggahaṇaṃ, kiriyāsaññāvasena diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraggahaṇaṃ. arahato hi jhānāni visesato diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāro. yadi saññāsamatikkamassa anunipphādiārammaṇasamatikkamo vibhaṅge ca avutto, atha kasmā idha gahitoti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``yasmā panā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^ārammaṇasamatikkamavasenāpi ayamatthavaṇṇanā katā,^eb^ ``tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ adhivacana''ntiādinā vibhaṅge viya saññāsamatikkamameva avatvāti adhippāyo.

[03] 278^b^.^eb^ ^b^paṭighātenā^eb^ti paṭihananena visayīvisayasamodhānena. ^b^atthaṅgamā^eb^tiādīsu purimaṃ purimaṃ pacchimassa pacchimassa atthavacanaṃ, tasmā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamo jhānasamaṅgikāle anuppattīti tassa idheva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ anuyogamukhena dassetuṃ ^b^``kāmañcetā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^ussāhajananatthaṃ^eb^ paṭipajjanakānaṃ. ^b^etāsaṃ^eb^ paṭighasaññānaṃ. ^b^ettha^eb^ paṭhamāruppakathāyaṃ. ^b^vacanaṃ^eb^ atthaṅgamavasena.

[03] kiṃ vā pasaṃsākittanena, paṭighasaññānaṃ pana atthaṅgamo idheva vattabbattā vuttoti dassetuṃ ^b^``atha vā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha sabhāvadhammassa abhāvo nāma paṭipakkhena pahīnatāya vā paccayābhāvena vā. tesu rūpajjhānasamaṅgino paṭighasaññānaṃ abhāvo paccayābhāvamattena, na paṭipakkhādhigamenāti dassento āha ^b^``kiñcāpī''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^tā^eb^ti paṭighasaññā ^a^M1.0398^ea^. ^b^rūpāvacara^eb^nti rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ. ^b^samāpannassā^eb^ti samāpajjitvā viharantassa. kiñcāpi na santīti yojanā. ^b^na pahīnattā na santī^eb^ti na tadā paṭighasaññā pahīnabhāvena na santi nāma. tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^``na hi rūpavirāgāya rūpāvacarabhāvanā saṃvattatī''^eb^ti. nanu ca paṭighasaññāpi arūpadhammā evāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``rūpāyattā ca etāsaṃ pavattī''^eb^ti. ^b^ayaṃ pana bhāvanā^eb^ti arūpabhāvanamāha. ^b^dhāretu^eb^nti avadhāretuṃ. ^b^idhā^eb^ti arūpajjhāne. āneñjābhisaṅkhāravacanādīhi ^b^āneñjatā^eb^. ``ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppā''tiādinā (a0 ni0 8.72; 10.9) ^b^santavimokkhatā ca vuttā^eb^.

[03] 279^b^.^eb^ dosadassanapubbakapaṭipakkhabhāvanāvasena paṭighasaññānaṃ suppahīnattā mahatāpi saddena arūpasamāpattito na vuṭṭhāti. tathā pana na suppahīnattā sabbarūpāvacarasamāpattito vuṭṭhānaṃ siyā, paṭhamajjhānaṃ pana appakampi saddaṃ na sahatīti taṃ samāpannassa saddo kaṇṭakoti ^a^V1.0375^ea^ vuttaṃ. āruppabhāvanāya abhāve cutito uddhaṃ uppattirahānaṃ rūpasaññāpaṭighasaññānaṃ yāva attano vipākappavatti, tāva anuppattidhammatāpādanena samatikkamo, atthaṅgamo ca vutto. nānattasaññāsu pana yā tasmiṃ bhave na uppajjanti ekantarūpanissitā, tā anokāsatāya na uppajjanti, na āruppabhāvanāya nivāritattā, anivāritattā ca kāci uppajjanti. tasmā tāsaṃ amanasikāro anāvajjanaṃ apaccavekkhaṇaṃ, javanapaṭipādakena vā bhavaṅgamanassa anto akaraṇaṃ appavesanaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] tena ca nānattasaññāmanasikārahetūnaṃ rūpānaṃ samatikkamā samādhissa thirabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``saṅkhepato''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. apica imehi tīhi padehi ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā vaṇṇo kathito sotūnaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ, palobhanatthañca. ye hi akusalā evaṃgāhino ``sabbassādarahite ākāse pavattitasaññāya ko ānisaṃso''ti, te tato micchāgāhato nivattetuṃ tīhi padehi jhānassa ānisaṃso kathito. taṃ hi sutvā tesaṃ evaṃ bhavissati ``evaṃ santā kirāyaṃ samāpatti evaṃ paṇītā, handassā nibbattanatthaṃ ussāhaṃ karissāmī''ti.

[03] 280^b^.^eb^ ^b^assā^eb^ti ^a^M1.0399^ea^ ākāsassa. uppādo eva anto ^b^uppādanto,^eb^ tathā ^b^vayanto^eb^. sabhāvadhammo hi ahutvā sambhavato, hutvā ca vinassanato udayavayaparicchinno. ākāso pana asabhāvadhammattā tadubhayābhāvato ananto vutto. ajaṭākāsaparicchinnākāsānaṃ idha anadhippetattā ^b^``ākāsoti kasiṇugghāṭimākāso vuccatī''^eb^ti āha. kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭīyati etenāti kasiṇugghāṭo, tadeva ^b^kasiṇugghāṭimaṃ. manasikāravasenāpī^eb^ti rūpavivekamattaggahaṇena paricchedassa aggahaṇato anantapharaṇākārena pavattaparikammamanasikāravasenāpi. ^b^anantaṃ pharatī^eb^ti aggahitaparicchedatāya anantaṃ katvā parikammasamphassapubbakena jhānasamphassena phusati. yathā bhisaggameva bhesajjaṃ, evaṃ ^b^ākāsānantameva ākāsānañcaṃ^eb^ saṃyogaparassa ta-kārassa ca-kāraṃ katvā. jhānassa pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato ārammaṇaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena ^b^``āyatanamassā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhe āyatana-saddassa dassanato. kāraṇākarasañjātidesanivāsatthepi āyatana-saddo idha yujjateva.

[03] 281^b^.^eb^ ciṇṇo ^a^V1.0376^ea^ carito paguṇikato āvajjanādilakkhaṇo vasībhāvo etenāti ciṇṇavasībhāvo, tena ^b^ciṇṇavasībhāvena^eb^. rūpāvacarasaññaṃ anatikkamitvā anadhigantabbato, taṃsahagatasaññāmanasikārasamudācārassa hānabhāgiyabhāvāvahato, taṃsamatikkameneva tadaññesaṃ samatikkamitabbānaṃ samatikkamasiddhito ca vuttaṃ ^b^``āsannarūpāvacarajjhānapaccatthikā''^eb^ti. vīthipaṭipannāya bhāvanāya uparūparivisesāvahabhāvato, paṇītabhāvasiddhito ca paṭhamāruppato dutiyāruppaṃ santatarasabhāvanti āha ^b^``no ca viññāṇañcāyatanamiva santā''^eb^ti vakkhati hi ``suppaṇītatarā honti, pacchimā pacchimā idhā''ti (visuddhi0 1.290). ^b^anantaṃ ananta^eb^nti kevalaṃ ``anantaṃ ananta''nti ^b^na manasi kātabbaṃ^eb^ na bhāvetabbaṃ, ``anantaṃ viññāṇaṃ, anantaṃ viññāṇa''nti pana manasi kātabbaṃ, ``viññāṇaṃ viññāṇa''nti vā.

[03] ^b^tasmiṃ nimitte^eb^ti tasmiṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇasaṅkhāte viññāṇanimitte. ^b^cittaṃ cārentassā^eb^ti bhāvanācittaṃ pavattentassa. ^b^ākāsaphuṭe viññāṇe^eb^ti ^a^M1.0400^ea^ kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ pharitvā pavatte paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe ārammaṇabhūte. ^b^appetī^eb^ti appanāvasena pavattati. sabhāvadhammepi ārammaṇasamatikkamabhāvanābhāvato idaṃ appanāppattaṃ hoti catutthāruppaṃ viya. ^b^appanānayo panettha vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ettha dutiyāruppajjhāne purimabhāge tīṇi, cattāri vā javanāni kāmāvacarāni upekkhāvedanāsampayuttāneva honti. ``catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vā arūpāvacara''ntiādinā (visuddhi0 1.276) paṭhamāruppajjhāne vuttena nayena, atha vā ^b^appanānayo^eb^ti sabhāvadhammepi ārammaṇe jhānassa appanānayo ārammaṇātikkamabhāvanāvasena āruppaṃ appanaṃ pāpuṇāti, ``appanāppattasseva hi jhānassa ārammaṇasamatikkamanamattaṃ tattha hotī''ti ^b^maraṇānussatiniddese^eb^ (visuddhi0 1.177) vuttanayena veditabboti attho.

[03] 282^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbaso^eb^ti sabbākārena paṭhamāruppe ``āsannarūpajjhānapaccatthikatā, asantasabhāvatā''ti evamādinā sabbena dosadassanākārena, tattha vā nikantipahānānāvajjitukāmatādiākārena, sabbaṃ vā kusalavipākakiriyābhedato anavasesanti attho. svāyamattho heṭṭhā vuttanayena ñātuṃ sakkāti āha ^b^``sabbasoti idaṃ vuttanayamevā''^eb^ti. jhānassa ākāsānañcāyatanatā bāhiratthasamāsavasena heṭṭhā vuttāti āha ^b^``pubbe vuttanayena jhānampi ākāsānañcāyatana''^eb^nti ^a^V1.0377^ea^. ārammaṇassa pana samānādhikaraṇasamāsavasenāti sandassetuṃ ^b^``ārammaṇampī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^``purimanayenevā''^eb^ti idaṃ ``nāssa anto''tiādinā vuttapadasiddhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. yathā adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena, evaṃ sañjātidesaṭṭhenapi āyatana-saddena idha attho yujjatīti dassetuṃ ^b^``tathā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha sañjāyati etthāti sañjāti, sañjāti eva deso ^b^sañjātideso. jhānaṃ^eb^ appavattikaraṇena. ^b^ārammaṇaṃ^eb^ amanasikaraṇena. ^b^ubhayampi^eb^ vā ubhayatā yojetabbā. jhānassapi hi anāvajjanaṃ, javanapaṭipādakena vā bhavaṅgamanassa anto akaraṇaṃ amanasikaraṇaṃ, ārammaṇassa ca ārammaṇakaraṇavasena appavattanaṃ ^b^appavattikaraṇa^eb^nti atthassa sambhavato ^b^ekajjhaṃ katvā^eb^ sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesanayena vā.

[01] pubbe ^a^M1.0401^ea^ anantassa ākāsassa ārammaṇakaraṇavasena paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ attano pharaṇākāreneva ``ananta''nti manasi kātabbattā ``anantaṃ viññāṇa''nti vuttanti puna ^b^``manasikāravasena vā ananta''^eb^nti vuttaṃ, sabbaso manasikaraṇavasenāti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``anavasesato manasi karonto `ananta'nti manasi karotī''^eb^ti. ^b^jhānavibhaṅgepi^eb^ ayamevattho vuttoti dassento ^b^``yaṃ pana vibhaṅge vutta''^eb^ntiādimāha. tassā pāḷiyā evaṃ vā attho veditabbo -- taṃyeva ākāsaṃ phuṭaṃ viññāṇaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaviññāṇena manasi karotīti. ayaṃ panattho yutto viya dissati, taṃyeva ākāsaṃ viññāṇena phuṭaṃ tena gahitākāraṃ manasi karoti. evaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ anantaṃ pharatīti. yaṃ hi ākāsaṃ paṭhamāruppasamaṅgī viññāṇena anantaṃ pharati, taṃ pharaṇākārasahitameva viññāṇaṃ manasi karonto dutiyāruppasamaṅgī anantaṃ pharatīti vuccati.

[03] manasikāravasena anantapharaṇākārena idha anantatā, na ākāsassa viya uppādantādiabhāvenāti ^b^``nāssa antoti ananta''^eb^nti ettakamevāha. ^b^``ruḷhīsaddo''^eb^ti iminā ``viññāṇānañca''nti etassa padassa atthe viññāṇañca-saddo niruḷhoti dasseti, yathāvuttaṃ vā viññāṇaṃ dutiyāruppajjhānena añcīyati vuttākārena ālambīyatīti viññāṇañcanti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. sesaṃ vuttatthamevāti āha ^b^``sesaṃ purimasadisamevā''^eb^ti.

[03] 283^b^.^eb^ tatiyāruppakammaṭṭhāne yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttasadisaṃ, taṃ vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ, apubbameva ^a^V1.0378^ea^ vaṇṇayissāma. tattha ^b^tassevā^eb^ti yaṃ ārabbha viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ pavattaṃ, tasseva. kiṃ pana tanti āha ^b^``ākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇassā''^eb^ti. etena tato aññaṃ tatiyāruppajjhānassa ārammaṇaṃ natthīti dasseti. ^b^``ārammaṇabhūtassā''^eb^ti iminā tassa anārammaṇabhūtaṃ dutiyāruppaviññāṇaṃ nivatteti. ^b^abhāvo^eb^ti natthitā. ^b^suññatā^eb^ti rittatā. ^b^vivittākāro^eb^ti viveko. tīhi padehi paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa apagamameva vadati. ``manasi kātabbo''ti vatvā ^a^M1.0402^ea^ manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``taṃ viññāṇa''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^amanasikaritvā^eb^ti sabbena sabbaṃ manasi akatvā acintetvā. ^b^vā^eb^-saddo aniyamattho, tena tīsu pakāresu ekenapi atthasiddhīti dasseti.

[03] ^b^tasmiṃ nimitte^eb^ti tasmiṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa abhāvasaṅkhāte jhānuppattinimitte. ^b^ākāse phuṭe^eb^ti ākāsaṃ pharitvā pavatte. ``ākāsaphuṭe''ti vā pāṭho. ^b^suññavivittanatthibhāve^eb^ti suññabhāve, vivittabhāve, natthibhāve cāti yena ākārena bhāvitaṃ, tassa gahaṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ. atha vā ^b^suññavivittanatthibhāve^eb^ti suññavivittatāsaṅkhāte natthibhāve, tena vināsābhāvameva dasseti, na pure abhāvādike.
