[03] 381^b^.^eb^ bhavati ettha iddhīti ^b^bhūmiyo,^eb^ jhānāni. ^b^etthā^eb^ti ca hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ. vivekato jātā bhūmi ^b^vivekajabhūmi^eb^. vivekajaṃ hi paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ nīvaraṇavivekasambhūtattā. pītisukhabhūtā bhūmi ^b^pītisukhabhūmi^eb^. dutiyajjhānañhi pītisukhabhūmibhūtañceva pītisukhasañjātañca samādhivasena. upari dvīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^iddhilābhāyā^eb^ti iddhiyā adhigamāya. ^b^iddhipaṭilābhāyā^eb^ti iddhiyā punappunaṃ labhamānāya, bahulīkaraṇāyāti attho. ^b^iddhivikubbanatāyā^eb^ti iddhiyā vividharūpakāraṇāya, vikubbaniddhiyāti attho ^a^M2.0017^ea^. ^b^iddhivisavitāyā^eb^ti iddhiyā vividhānisaṃsapasavanāya. ^b^iddhivasitāyā^eb^ti iddhiyā khippanisantiādibhāvāvahavasībhāvatthāya. ^b^iddhivesārajjāyā^eb^ti iddhiyā paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena vigatasaṃkilesatāya suṭṭhu visāradabhāvāya. catutthajjhānaṃ tāva iddhiyā bhūmi hotu tattha patiṭṭhāya nipphādetabbato, itarāni pana kathanti āha ^b^``ettha cā''^eb^tiādi. tattha tīṇi jhānāni sambhārabhūmiyoti veditabbānīti sambandho. tatiyajjhāne sukhapharaṇena, paṭhamadutiyesu pītipharaṇena sukhapharaṇena ca hetubhūtenāti yathārahavasena yojanā. pharaṇaṃ cettha jhānassa subhāvitabhāvena sātisayānaṃ pītisukhānaṃ vasena jhānappaccayādinā sahajātanāmakāyassa paribrūhanaṃ, rūpakāyassa ca taṃsamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi paripphuṭatā. tenāha bhagavā ``pītisukhena abhisandeti parisandeti paripūreti parippharatī''ti (dī0 ni0 1.226; ma0 ni0 1.427). ^b^sukhasañña^eb^nti jhānasukhena sahagataṃ saññaṃ. ^b^lahusañña^eb^nti taṃsampayuttalahutāsahagataṃ saññaṃ. ^b^okkamitvā^eb^ti anupavisitvā. tesu hi jhānesu sātisayāya lahutāya sampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ santānavasena pavattento yogī taṃ samokkanto viya hotīti evaṃ vuttaṃ. saññāsīsena niddeso. jhānasampayuttā hi lahutā vināpi iddhiyā ākāsaṃ laṅghāpanappamāṇappattā viya hoti. lahubhāvaggahaṇeneva cettha mudukammaññabhāvāpi gahitā eva. tenāha ^b^``lahumudukammaññakāyo hutvā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^iminā^eb^ ^a^V2.0017^ea^ ^b^pariyāyenā^eb^ti tiṇṇaṃ jhānānaṃ samāpajjanena sukhalahubhāvappattanāmarūpakāyassa sati cittaparidamane catutthaṃ jhānaṃ sukheneva iddhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattatīti iminā pariyāyena. pakatibhūmiyā hi adhiṭṭhānabhūtā sambhārabhūmiyo pākārassa nemippadeso viyāti.

[03] 382^b^.^eb^ iddhipādaniddese ^b^cattāro^eb^ti gaṇanaparicchedo. ^b^iddhipādā^eb^ti ettha ijjhatīti iddhi, samijjhati nipphajjatīti attho. ijjhanti vā etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi. paṭhamenatthena iddhi eva pādoti iddhipādo, iddhikoṭṭhāsoti attho. dutiyenatthena iddhiyā pādoti iddhipādo. ^b^pādo^eb^ti patiṭṭhā, adhigamūpāyoti attho. tena hi uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti. ayaṃ tāva aṭṭhakathānayo. tattha iddhi-saddassa paṭhamo kattuattho, dutiyo karaṇattho ^a^M2.0018^ea^ vutto. pāda-saddassa eko karaṇatthova. pajjitabbāva iddhi vuttā, na ca ijjhantī, pajjitabbā ca iddhi pajjanakaraṇena pādena samānādhikaraṇā hotīti paṭhamena atthena ``iddhi eva pādo iddhipādo''ti na sakkā vattuṃ. tathā iddhikiriyākaraṇena sādhetabbāva vuddhisaṅkhātā iddhi pajjanakiriyākaraṇena pajjitabbāti dvinnaṃ karaṇānaṃ na asamānādhikaraṇatā sambhavatīti dutiyenatthena ``iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo''ti ca na sakkā vattuṃ. tasmā paṭhamenatthena samānādhikaraṇasamāso, dutiyena sāmivacanasamāso na yujjatīti paṭhamenatthena iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo, dutiyenatthena iddhi eva pādo iddhipādoti samāso yutto, yathāvuttopi vā, pādassa ijjhamānakoṭṭhāsaijjhanakaraṇūpāyabhāvato.

[03] pubbabhāgachandavasena ^b^chandahetuko^eb^. sampayuttachandavasena ^b^chandādhiko^eb^. pubbābhisaṅkhāravasena eva pana sahajātachandassāpi adhikatā veditabbā. atha vā ``chandañce bhikkhu adhipatiṃ karitvā labhati samādhiṃ, labhati cittassekaggataṃ, ayaṃ vuccati chandasamādhī''ti imāya pāḷiyā chandādhipatisamādhi ^b^chandasamādhī^eb^ti adhipati-saddalopaṃ katvā samāso vuttoti viññāyati. adhipatisaddatthadassanavasena pana ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ``chandahetuko chandādhiko vā samādhī''ti vuttaṃ. tenevāha ^b^``chandaṃ adhipatiṃ karitvā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^padhānabhūtā^eb^ti vīriyabhūtāti keci vadanti. saṅkhatasaṅkhāranivattanatthaṃ pana ^b^padhānaggahaṇaṃ^eb^. atha vā taṃ taṃ visesaṃ saṅkharotīti ^b^saṅkhāro,^eb^ sabbampi vīriyaṃ. tattha catukiccasādhakato aññassa nivattanatthaṃ ^b^padhānaggahaṇaṃ. padhānabhūtā^eb^ seṭṭhabhūtāti attho. catubbidhassa pana vīriyassa adhippetattā bahuvacananiddeso. yo pana ``iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo''ti evaṃ samāsayojanāvasena pādassa upāyatthataṃ gahetvā iddhipādattho ^a^V2.0018^ea^ vutto, so paṭilābhapubbabhāgānaṃ kattukaraṇiddhibhāvaṃ ``chandiddhipādo''tiādinā (vibha0 457) vā abhidhamme āgatattā chandādīhi iddhipādehi sādhetabbāya vuddhiyā kattiddhibhāvaṃ, chandādīnaṃ karaṇiddhibhāvañca sandhāya vuttoti veditabbo.

[03] vīriyiddhipāde ^b^``vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgata''^eb^nti dvikkhattuṃ vīriyaṃ āgataṃ. tattha purimaṃ samādhivisesanaṃ vīriyādhipati samādhi ^b^vīriyasamādhī^eb^ti. dutiyaṃ samannāgamaṅgadassanaṃ. dve eva hi sabbattha samannāgamaṅgāni samādhi ^a^M2.0019^ea^, padhānasaṅkhāro ca. chandādayo samādhivisesanāni, padhānasaṅkhāro pana padhānavacaneneva visesito, na chandādīhīti na idha vīriyādhipatitā padhānasaṅkhārassa vuttā hoti. vīriyañca samādhiṃ visesetvā ṭhitameva samannāgamaṅgavasena padhānasaṅkhāravacanena vuttanti nāpi dvīhi vīriyehi samannāgamo vutto hotīti. yasmā pana chandādīhi visiṭṭho samādhi, tathā visiṭṭheneva ca tena sampayutto padhānasaṅkhāro, sesadhammā ca, tasmā samādhivisesanānaṃ vasena cattāro iddhipādā vuttā. visesanabhāvo ca chandādīnaṃ taṃtaṃavassayavasena hotīti.

[03] ^b^atha vā^eb^tiādinā nissayaṭṭhepi pāda-sadde upāyaṭṭhena chandādīnaṃ iddhipādatā vuttā. teneva abhidhamme uttaracūḷabhājanīye ``cattāro iddhipādā chandiddhipādo''tiādinā (vibha0 457) chandādīnameva iddhipādatā vuttā. pañhāpucchake ca ``cattāro iddhipādā idha bhikkhu chandasamādhī''tiādināva (vibha0 462) uddesaṃ katvāpi puna chandādīnaṃyeva kusalādibhāvo vibhatto. upāyiddhipādadassanatthameva hi sutte, abhidhamme ca nissayiddhipādadassanaṃ kataṃ, aññathā catubbidhatā na hotīti.

[03] 383^b^.^eb^ ^b^chandādīni aṭṭhā^eb^ti chandasamādhi vīriyasamādhi cittasamādhi vīmaṃsāsamādhīti evaṃ chandādīni aṭṭha. kāmaṃ cettha catūsupi ṭhānesu samādhi samādhi eva, tathāpi iddhiṃ uppādetukāmatāchandasahitova samādhi iddhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattati, na kevalo. evaṃ vīriyasamādhiādayopi. tasmā chandādisahitā ete cattāro ca samādhī, chandādayo ca cattāroti aṭṭha pajjati iddhi etehi pāpuṇīyati, sayaṃ vā pajjanti iddhipaṭilābhāya sampajjantīti ^b^padānī^eb^ti vuccanti. tenāha ^b^``iddhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattantī''^eb^ti. yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ ``chando na samādhī''tiādi, taṃ yadipi chandādayo samādhisahitāva iddhiṃ nipphādenti, tathāpi visuṃ ^a^V2.0019^ea^ nesaṃ padabhāvadassanaṃ. ^b^ekato niyuttova,^eb^ na ekeko hutvāti adhippāyo. ^b^niyuttovā^eb^ti sahito eva, na viyutto.

[03] 384^b^.^eb^ ^b^anonata^eb^nti na onataṃ, vīriyena paggahitattā alīnanti attho. tenāha ^b^``kosajje na iñjatī''^eb^ti, kosajjanimittaṃ na calatīti ^a^M2.0020^ea^ attho. uddhaṃ nataṃ ^b^unnataṃ,^eb^ uddhataṃ vikkhittaṃ. na unnataṃ ^b^anunnataṃ,^eb^ avikkhittaṃ samāhitanti attho. tenāha ^b^``uddhacce na iñjatī''^eb^ti. abhisaṅgavasena nataṃ abhinataṃ, na abhinataṃ ^b^anabhinataṃ,^eb^ arattaṃ. apagamanavasena nataṃ apanataṃ, kodhavasena vimukhaṃ. na apanataṃ ^b^anapanataṃ,^eb^ aduṭṭhaṃ. diṭṭhiyā ``ahaṃ, mama''nti nissayavasena na nissitanti ^b^anissitaṃ^eb^. chandarāgavasena na paṭibaddhanti ^b^appaṭibaddhaṃ. rāgo^eb^ kevalaṃ āsattimattaṃ, ^b^chandarāgo^eb^ pana bahalakileso. tathā hissa dūre ṭhitampi ārammaṇaṃ paṭibaddhameva. ^b^vippamutta^eb^nti visesato pamuttaṃ. jhānānaṃ kāmarāgapaṭipakkhatāya āha ^b^``kāmarāge''^eb^ti. ^b^visaṃyutta^eb^nti vivittaṃ saṃkilesato, na vā saṃyuttaṃ catūhipi yogehi. ^b^vimariyādikataṃ^eb^ kilesamariyādāya, yathā īsakampi kilesamariyādā na hoti, tathā paṭipannaṃ. ^b^ekattagata^eb^nti ekaggataṃ upagataṃ accantameva samāhitaṃ. tato eva ^b^nānattakilesehi^eb^ nānāsabhāvehi kilesehi ^b^na iñjati^eb^.

[03] ^b^esa attho^eb^ti kosajjādinimittaṃ. imassa cittassa āneñjanattho siddho eva āneñjappattiyā pakāsanavasena dassitattā. ^b^puna vutto^eb^ti iddhiyā bhūmipādapadadassanappasaṅgena ``imāni mūlāni nāmā''ti mūlabhāvadassanatthaṃ puna vutto. ^b^purimo^eb^ti ``saddhādīhi pariggahitattā''tiādinā pubbe chadhā dassitanayo. ^b^aya^eb^nti adhunā soḷasadhā dassitanayo. suttanaye, paṭisambhidānaye ca dassite tattha sammoho na hoti, na adassiteti āha ^b^``ubhayattha asammohattha''^eb^nti.

[03] 385^b^.^eb^ ^b^ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahanto^eb^ti ``kathaṃ panāyaṃ evaṃ hotī''ti ettha pubbe attanā vuttapadaṃ uddharati adhiṭṭhānavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāyā''^eb^ti. ettha anupubbena cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitvā catutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāyāti keci, taṃ ayuttaṃ. yathicchitajjhānasamāpajjanatthañhi cittaparidamanaṃ, catutthajjhānameva ca abhiññāpādakaṃ, na itarāni. ^b^parikammaṃ katvā^eb^ti pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kāmāvacaracittena ``sataṃ homī''tiādinā ^a^V2.0020^ea^ cintanamevettha parikammakaraṇaṃ, tathāvajjanameva ca āvajjanaṃ. ^b^dutiyampī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo samuccayattho, tena tatiyampi, tato bhiyyopīti imamatthaṃ dīpeti. yathā hi jhānabhāvanā, evamabhiññābhāvanāpi. ^b^``ekavāraṃ dvevāra''^eb^nti idampi nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^nimittārammaṇa^eb^nti paṭibhāganimittārammaṇaṃ. ^b^parikammacittānī^eb^ti ettha ekekassa parikammacittassa satārammaṇatā ^a^M2.0021^ea^ daṭṭhabbā ``sataṃ homī''ti pavattanato. ^b^sahassārammaṇānī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^vaṇṇavasenā^eb^ti attanā parikappitavaṇṇavasena. ^b^no paṇṇattivasenā^eb^ti na sattapaṇṇattivasena. ^b^taṃ^eb^ adhiṭṭhānacittaṃ ^b^appanācittamivā^eb^ti ivaggahaṇaṃ abhiññācittassa jhānacittassa paṭhamuppattisadisabhāvato vuttaṃ, na tassa appanābhāvato. ^b^rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānika^eb^nti rūpāvacaracatutthajhānavantaṃ, tena sampayuttaṃ.

[03] 386^b^.^eb^ yadi evaṃ ``āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhātī''ti paṭisambhidāvacanaṃ kathanti āha ^b^``yampī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^tatrāpī^eb^ti paṭisambhidāyampi. ^b^āvajjatī^eb^ti ``bahukaṃ āvajjatī''ti idaṃ pāṭhapadaṃ ^b^parikammavaseneva vuttaṃ,^eb^ na āvajjanavasena. ^b^āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhātīti abhiññāñāṇavasena vuttaṃ,^eb^ na parikammacittasampayuttassa, aññassa vā kāmāvacarassa ñāṇassa vasena. na hi tassa tādiso ānubhāvo atthīti. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā appanāppattassa abhiññāñāṇasseva vasena adhiṭṭhānaṃ, tasmā. ayamadhiṭṭhānakkamoti dassento ^b^``bahukaṃ āvajjatī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sanniṭṭhāpanavasenā^eb^ti nipphādanavasena.
[03] ^b^kāyasakkhidassanattha^eb^nti na kevalaṃ vacanamattameva, atha kho ayametassatthassa attano kāyena sacchikatattā kāyasakkhīti sakkhidassanatthaṃ.

[03] ^b^kokanada^eb^nti padumavisesanaṃ yathā ``kokāsaka''nti. taṃ kira bahupattaṃ, vaṇṇasampannaṃ, ativiya sugandhañca hoti. ^b^pāto^eb^ti pageva. ayañhettha attho -- yathā kokanadasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^padumaṃ pāto^eb^ sūriyassuggamanavelāyaṃ ^b^phullaṃ^eb^ vikasitaṃ ^b^avītagandhaṃ siyā virocamānaṃ,^eb^ evaṃ sarīragandhena, guṇagandhena ca ^b^sugandhaṃ^eb^ saradakāle ^b^antalikkhe ādiccamiva^eb^ attano tejasā ^b^tapantaṃ^eb^ aṅgehi niccharaṇakajutitāya ^b^aṅgīrasaṃ^eb^ sammāsambuddhaṃ ^b^passā^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^abhabbo^eb^ti paṭipattisāramidaṃ sāsanaṃ, paṭipatti ca pariyattimūlikā, tvañca pariyattiṃ uggahetuṃ ^a^V2.0021^ea^ asamattho, tasmā abhabboti adhippāyo. ^b^abhabbo nāma na hoti^eb^ vāsadhurasseva padhānabhāvato.

[03] ^b^bhikkhū^eb^ti pabbajitavohārena vuttaṃ, bhāvinaṃ vā bhikkhubhāvaṃ upādāya yathā ``agamā rājagahaṃ buddho''ti (su0 ni0 410). ^b^pilotikakhaṇḍa^eb^nti suvisuddhaṃ coḷakhaṇḍaṃ ^a^M2.0022^ea^. rajo haratīti ^b^rajoharaṇaṃ. abhinimminitvā adāsi^eb^ tattha pubbe katādhikārattā. tathā hi yoniso ummujjanto ``attabhāvassa panāyaṃ doso''ti asubhasaññaṃ, aniccasaññañca paṭilabhitvā nāmarūpapariggahādinā pañcasu khandhesu ñāṇaṃ otāretvā kalāpasammasanādikkamena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā udayabbayañāṇādipaṭipāṭiyā vipassanaṃ anulomagotrabhusamīpaṃ pāpesi. obhāsavissajjanapubbikā bhāsitagāthā ^b^obhāsagāthā^eb^.

[03] ^b^rāgo rajo^eb^ ariyassa vinaye, na ca pana ^b^reṇu vuccati ``rajo''^eb^ti. kasmā? cittassa malīnabhāvakaraṇato. ^b^rāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ ``rajo''^eb^ti. ^b^etaṃ raja^eb^nti etaṃ rāgasaṅkhātaṃ rajaṃ. ^b^vippajahitvā^eb^ti aggamaggena visesato pajahanahetu. ^b^paṇḍitā viharanti te^eb^ti te pajahanakā paṇḍitā hutvā viharanti. ^b^vītarajassa^eb^ sabbaso pahīnarāgādirajassa buddhassa bhagavato ^b^sāsane^eb^. tathā hi vadanti --
[21] ``cittamhi saṃkiliṭṭhamhi, saṃkilissanti māṇavā.
[22] citte suddhe visujjhanti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā''ti.. (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.373; ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.106; saṃ0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.3.100; itivu0 aṭṭha0 88).
[03] chaḷabhiññāgahaṇena gahitāya chaḷabhiññāya vibhāvitepi ariyamagge anuttarabhāvasāmaññena phalanibbānehi saddhiṃ saṅgaṇhanto āha ^b^``nava lokuttaradhammā''^eb^ti.
[03] pattassa pidahanākārena hatthaṃ ṭhapento ^b^``hatthaṃ pidahī''^eb^ti vutto. ^b^hattha^eb^nti vā karaṇatthe upayogavacanaṃ, hatthena pidahīti attho.

[03] ^b^sahassakkhattu^eb^nti ^a^V2.0022^ea^ sahassadhā. sahassadhā hi attānaṃ ekacitteneva nimminantopi sahassavāraṃ nimminanto viya hoti. asatipi kiriyābyāvuttiyaṃ tadatthasiddhitoti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ``sahassakkhattu''nti vuttaṃ. ^b^ambavane^eb^ti ambavane katavihāre. ^b^ramme^eb^ti ramaṇīye. yāva kālappavedanā, tāva nisīdīti yojanā.

[03] ^b^aniyametvā^eb^ti vaṇṇāvayavasarīrāvayavaparikkhārakiriyāvisesādīhi niyamaṃ akatvā. ^b^nānāvaṇṇe^eb^ti nānākāre yathāvuttavaṇṇādivasena nānāvidhe. ^b^missakakese^eb^ti palitehi missitakese. upaḍḍharattavaṇṇaupaḍḍhapaṇḍuvaṇṇādīsu aññataravaṇṇanti evaṃ ^b^upaḍḍharattacīvare^eb^. padavasena atthassa ^a^M2.0023^ea^, gamanavasena pāḷiyā bhaṇanaṃ ^b^padabhāṇaṃ^eb^. parikathādivasena dhammassa kathanaṃ ^b^dhammakathā^eb^. sarena bhaññaṃ suttādīnaṃ uccāraṇaṃ ^b^sarabhaññaṃ. aparepī^eb^ti vuttākārato aññepi dīgharassakisathūlādike nānappakārake. ^b^icchiticchitappakārāyeva hontī^eb^ti yathā yathā icchitā, taṃtaṃpakārāyeva honti. yattakā hi visesā vaṇṇādivasena tesu icchitā, tattakavisesavantova te honti. te pana tathā bahudhā bhinnākārepi vaṇṇavasena ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekameva adhiṭṭhānacittaṃ pavattati. ayaṃ hissa ānubhāvo -- yathā ekāva cetanā nānāvisesavantaṃ attabhāvaṃ nibbatteti, tattha bhavapatthanā kammassa visesapaccayo hoti. acinteyyo ca kammavipākoti ce, idhāpi parikammacittaṃ visesapaccayo hoti, acinteyyo ca iddhivisayoti gahetabbaṃ. ^b^esa nayo^eb^ti yvāyaṃ bahubhāvanimmāne ``abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā''tiādinā adhiṭṭhānanayo vutto, esa nayo itaresupi adhiṭṭhānesu.

[03] iti avisesaṃ atidesena dassetvā visesaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^``ayaṃ pana viseso''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha iminā bhikkhunā icchantenāti sambandho. ^b^maṃ jānissantī^eb^ti ``iddhimā''ti maṃ jānissanti. ^b^antarāvā^eb^ti paricchinnakālassa abbhantare eva. ^b^pādakajjhāna^eb^ntiādi parikammakaraṇākāradassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, itaraṃ pana atideseneva vibhāvitanti. ^b^evaṃ akaronto^eb^ti ``eko homī''ti antarā adhiṭṭhānaṃ akaronto. ^b^``yathāparicchinnakālavasenā''^eb^ti iminā ``sataṃ homī''tiādinā adhiṭṭhānaṃ karontena kālaparicchedavaseneva kātabbanti dasseti. ^b^sayameva eko hoti^eb^ adhiṭṭhānassa paṭippassaddhattā. ettha ca parikammādhiṭṭhānacittānaṃ iddhimā vaṇṇavasena sayameva ārammaṇaṃ hoti. tesu parikammacittāni ^a^V2.0023^ea^ santatipaccuppannārammaṇāni. adhiṭṭhānacittaṃ sampativattamānārammaṇaṃ adhiṭṭhānassa ekacittakkhaṇikattāti vadanti.

[03] 387^b^.^eb^ ^b^``āvibhāva''^eb^nti padassa heṭṭhā vuttena hoti-saddena sambandho na yujjati upayogavacanena vuttattā, tathā vakkhamānena ca gacchati-saddena attano, paresañca āvibhāvassa icchitattā, nāmapadañca kiriyāpadāpekkhanti kiriyāsāmaññavācinā karoti-saddena yojetvā āha ^b^``āvibhāvaṃ karotī''^eb^ti. ^b^tirobhāva^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo ^a^M2.0024^ea^. yadi evaṃ kathaṃ paṭisambhidāyanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``idameva hī''^eb^tiādi. kāmaṃ ^b^paṭisambhidāyaṃ^eb^ ``āvibhāvanti kenaci anāvaṭaṃ hotī''tiādinā (paṭi0 ma0 3.11) āgataṃ, tampi idameva āvibhāvakaraṇaṃ, tirobhāvakaraṇañca sandhāya vuttaṃ. sesapadāni tesaṃyeva vevacanāni. ^b^andhakāra^eb^nti rattandhakāraṃ, divāpi vā bilaguhādigataṃ ^b^andhakāraṃ. paṭicchanna^eb^nti kuṭṭakavāṭādinā paṭicchāditaṃ. ^b^anāpātha^eb^nti dūratāsukhumataratādinā na āpāthagataṃ. ^b^aya^eb^nti iddhimā. paṭicchannopi dūre ṭhitopi attā vā paro vā yathā dissatīti vibhattiṃ pariṇāmetvā yojetabbaṃ. ^b^ālokajāta^eb^nti ālokabhūtaṃ, jātālokaṃ vā.

[03] 388^b^.^eb^ ^b^etaṃ pana pāṭihāriya^eb^nti āvibhāvapāṭihāriyamāha. ^b^kena katapubba^eb^nti tattha kāyasakkhiṃ pucchitvā ``satthā tāva kāyasakkhī''ti dassentena ``bhagavatā''ti vatvā tamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``bhagavā hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. sāvatthivāsike passantīti ānetvā sambandho, tathā ``yāva avīciṃ dassesī''ti. ākāsagatesu heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimavimānesu uparūparivimānaṃ byavadhāyakesu byūhiyamānesu taggataṃ ākāsaṃ byūḷhaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``ākāsañca dvidhā viyūhitvā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^ayamattho^eb^ti āvibhāvapāṭihāriyassa satthārā katabhāvo. purimabuddhānaṃ paṭipattiāvajjanaṃ buddhappaveṇiyā anupālanatthaṃ. ^b^``ekena pādenā''^eb^tiādi tivikkamadassanaṃ. ^b^nayaṃ deti^eb^ yassa nayassa anusārena vācanāmaggaṃ ṭhapesi.
[03] ^b^cūḷānāthapiṇḍiko^eb^ nāma anāthapiṇḍikamahāseṭṭhissa kaniṭṭhabhātā.
[03] ^b^sinerupabbataṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0024^ea^ ^b^nibbijjhitvā^eb^ti taṃ parisāya dissamānarūpaṃyeva katvā nibbijjhitvā. ^b^na^eb^nti sinerupabbataṃ.
[03] anekasatasahassasaṅkhassa okāsalokassa, taṃnivāsisattalokassa ca vivaṭabhāvakaraṇapāṭihāriyaṃ ^b^lokavivaraṇaṃ nāma. mahābrahmā^eb^ti sahampatimahābrahmā.
[03] passatha ^a^M2.0025^ea^ tāva apaṇṇakapaṭipadāya phalanti ^b^nirayabhayena tajjetvā^eb^ satthu anupubbikathānayena ^b^saggasukhena palobhetvā,^eb^ na pana saggasampattiyaṃ ninnabhāvāpādanena.

[03] 389^b^.^eb^ yathā āvibhāvakaraṇe ālokakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ ālokanimmānāya, evaṃ tirobhāvakaraṇe andhakāranimmānāya nīlakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ. kāmañcetaṃ pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato nāgataṃ, ``vivaṭaṃ āvaṭa''nti (paṭi0 ma0 3.11) pana vacanato atthato āgatameva. odātakasiṇantogadhaṃ vā ālokakasiṇanti vuttovāyamattho. ^b^andhakāra^eb^nti andhakāravantaṃ.
[03] 390^b^.^eb^ ^b^avasese^eb^ iṭṭiyattherādike.

[03] 391^b^.^eb^ pākaṭo iddhimā etassa atthīti pākaṭaṃ, pākaṭañca taṃ pāṭihāriyañcāti ^b^pākaṭapāṭihāriyaṃ^eb^. na ettha iddhimā pākaṭoti apākaṭaṃ, apākaṭañca taṃ pāṭihāriyañcāti ^b^apākaṭapāṭihāriyaṃ^eb^. iddhimato eva hi pākaṭāpākaṭabhāvenāyaṃ bhedo, na pāṭihāriyassa. na hi taṃ apākaṭaṃ atthi.

[03] ^b^uttarimanussadhammā^eb^ti manussadhammo vuccati dasa kusalakammapathadhammā, tato manussadhammato uttari. iddhisaṅkhātaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ ^b^iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ. āḷinde^eb^ti pamukhe. ^b^okāsehī^eb^ti pakira. ^b^iddhābhisaṅkhāra^eb^nti iddhipayogaṃ. ^b^abhisaṅkhāsī^eb^ti abhisaṅkhari, akāsīti attho. ^b^tālacchiggaḷenā^eb^ti kuñcikacchiddena. ^b^aggaḷantarikāyā^eb^ti piṭṭhasaṅghātānaṃ antarena.

[03] ^b^antarahito^eb^ti antaradhāyitukāmo. ^b^bako^eb^ brahmā yathā antaradhāyituṃ na sakkoti, tathā katvā bhagavā sayaṃ tassa, brahmagaṇassa ca anāpāthabhāvagamanena antarahito hutvā ``samaṇassa gotamassa ^a^V2.0025^ea^ imasmiṃ ṭhāne atthibhāvo vā natthibhāvo vā na sakkā jānitu''nti evaṃ brahmagaṇassa vacanokāso mā hotūti ^b^``bhavevāha''^eb^nti imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.

[03] tattha ^b^bhavevāhaṃ bhayaṃ disvā^eb^ti ahaṃ bhave saṃsāre jātijarādibhedaṃ bhayaṃ disvā eva. ^b^bhavañca vibhavesina^eb^nti imañca kāmabhavādiṃ tividhampi ^a^M2.0026^ea^ sattabhavaṃ, vibhavesinaṃ vibhavaṃ gavesamānampi pariyesamānampi punappunaṃ bhave eva disvā. ^b^bhavaṃ nābhivadi^eb^nti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena kiñci bhavaṃ na abhivadiṃ na gahesiṃ. ^b^nandiñca na upādiyi^eb^nti bhavataṇhaṃ na upagacchiṃ, na aggahesinti attho.

[03] 392^b^.^eb^ ^b^alaggamāno^eb^ti vinivijjhitvā gamanena kuṭṭādīsu katthaci na laggamāno. ^b^āvajjitvā kataparikammenā^eb^ti yassa parato gantukāmo, taṃ āvajjitvā ``ākāso hotu, ākāso hotū''ti evaṃ kataparikammena iddhimatā. pākārapabbatāpekkhāya ``susiro, chiddo''ti ca pulliṅgavasena vuttaṃ. ubbedhavasena pavattaṃ vivaraṃ ^b^susiraṃ^eb^. tiriyaṃ pavattaṃ ^b^chiddaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^yattha katthaci kasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā^eb^ti pathavīkasiṇādīsu yattha katthaci kasiṇe jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā parikammaṃ katvā ``ākāso hotū''ti adhiṭṭhātabbo. tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^``aṭṭhasamāpattivasībhāvoyeva pamāṇa''^eb^nti. tasmā ^b^yaṃ yaṃ icchati, taṃ tadeva hoti^eb^. etena pathaviyā ummujjananimujjane āpokasiṇasamāpajjanaṃ, udakādīsu pathavīnimmāne pathavīkasiṇasamāpajjanaṃ na ekantato icchitabbanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^eta^eb^nti etaṃ tirokuṭṭādigamanapāṭihāriyakaraṇe ākāsakasiṇasamāpajjanaṃ ^b^avassaṃ vattabbaṃ^eb^ anucchavikabhāvato. evañca katvā ``ākāsakasiṇavasena paṭicchannānaṃ vivaṭakaraṇa''ntiādivacanaṃ viya pathavīkasiṇavasena ``ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī''tiādibhāvo ``ākāse vā udake vā pathaviṃ nimminitvā padasā gamanaṃ icchatī''tiādinā yaṃ pakiṇṇakanaye vuttaṃ, tampi samatthitaṃ hoti.

[03] ``doso natthī''ti dvikkhattuṃ baddhaṃ subaddhaṃ viya daḷhīkaraṇaṃ nāma hotīti adhippāyena vatvā tena payojanābhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``puna samāpajjitvā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^adhiṭṭhitattā ākāso hotiyevā^eb^ti sacepi kiñci antarā upaṭṭhitaṃ pabbatādi siyā, tampi ``ākāso hotū''ti adhiṭṭhitattā ^a^V2.0026^ea^ ākāso hotiyeva. idampi aṭṭhānaparikappanamattaṃ, tādisassa upaṭṭhānameva natthīti dassetuṃ ^b^``antarā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] 393^b^.^eb^ ^b^paricchinditvā^eb^ti yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ ñāṇena paricchinditvā. ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ pathaviyā udakabhāvādhiṭṭhāne ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ yathāvuttapaṭipattivibhāvinī ^b^pāḷi^eb^ ^a^M2.0027^ea^. parato ``tatrāyaṃ pāḷī''ti āgataṭṭhānesupi iminā nayena attho veditabbo.
[03] ^b^so^eb^ti iddhimā. adhiṭṭhānakāle kālaparicchedaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ ^b^``paricchinnakālaṃ pana atikkamitvā''^eb^ti. ^b^pakatiyā udakaṃ^eb^ animmānaudakaṃ.
[03] 394^b^.^eb^ ^b^viparīta^eb^nti yaṃ udakaṃ akkamitvā akkamanto na saṃsīdati, taṃ panettha iddhiyā pathavīnimmānavasena veditabbaṃ. ^b^pathavīkasiṇa^eb^nti pathavīkasiṇajjhānaṃ.

[03] 395^b^.^eb^ ^b^pallaṅka^eb^nti samantato ūrubaddhāsanaṃ. chinnapakkho, asañjātapakkho vā sakuṇo ḍetuṃ na sakkotīti pāḷiyaṃ ``pakkhī sakuṇo''ti (paṭi0 ma0 3.11) pakkhī-saddena visesetvā sakuṇo vuttoti ^b^``pakkhehi yuttasakuṇo''^eb^ti āha. ^b^parikammaṃ katvā^eb^ti ``pathavī hotū''ti parikammaṃ katvā.

[03] ^b^ākāse antalikkhe^eb^ti antalikkhasaññite ākāse. yattha yattha hi āvaraṇaṃ natthi, taṃ taṃ ``ākāsa''nti vuccati. ayañca iddhimā na pathaviyā āsanne ākāse gacchati. yattha pana pakkhīnaṃ agocaro, tattha gacchati, tādisañca loke ``antalikkha''nti vuccati. tena vuttaṃ ``antalikkhasaññite ākāse''ti.

[01] ^b^thero^eb^ti pubbe vutta ^b^tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero. samāpattisamāpajjana^eb^nti puna samāpattisamāpajjanaṃ. ^b^nanu samāhitamevassa citta^eb^nti iddhimato pāṭihāriyavasena pavattamānassa cittaṃ accantaṃ samāhitameva hoti, na aññadā viya asamāhitanti adhippāyo. taṃ pana therassa matimattaṃ. pubbe hi pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā pathaviṃ adhiṭṭhāya gacchati, idāni pana ākāso icchitabbo, tasmā ākāsakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitabbameva. tenāha ^b^``kiñcāpī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^tirokuṭṭapāṭihāriye^eb^ ^a^V2.0027^ea^ ^b^vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabba^eb^nti yathā tattha kuṭṭādi ``ākāso hotū''ti adhiṭṭhānena ākāso hoti, evaṃ idhāpi pabbatarukkhādiṃ adhiṭṭhānena ākāsaṃ katvā gantabbanti attho. atha vā ^b^tirokuṭṭapāṭihāriye vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ``sace panassa bhikkhuno adhiṭṭhahitvā gacchantassā''tiādinā (visuddhi0 2.392) tattha ^a^M2.0028^ea^ vuttanayena. etena ``purimādhiṭṭhānabaleneva cassa antarā añño pabbato vā rukkho vā utumayo uṭṭhahissatīti aṭṭhānameveta''nti nāgādīhi kayiramāno vibandho gamanantarāyaṃ na karotīti dasseti.
[03] ^b^okāse^eb^ti janavivitte yuttaṭṭhāne. ^b^pākaṭo hoti^eb^ ākāsacārī ayaṃ samaṇoti.

[03] 396^b^.^eb^ ^b^dvācattālīsayojanasahassa^eb^ggahaṇaṃ paṭhamakappavasena kataṃ, tato paraṃ pana anukkamena pathaviyā ussitabhāvena tato katipayayojanūnatā siyā, appakaṃ adhikaṃ vā ūnaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti tathā vuttaṃ. ^b^tīsu dīpesu ekakkhaṇe ālokakaraṇenā^eb^ti yadā yasmiṃ dīpe majjhe tiṭṭhanti, tadā tato purimasmiṃ atthaṃ gacchantā pacchime udentā hutvā ālokakaraṇena. aññajotīnaṃ vā abhibhavanena, duddasatāya ca ^b^mahiddhike^eb^. sattānaṃ sītapariḷāhavūpasamanena, osadhitiṇavanappatīnaṃ paribrūhanena ca ^b^mahānubhāve. chupatī^eb^ti phusati. ^b^parimajjatī^eb^ti hatthaṃ ito cito ca sañcārento ghaṃseti. ^b^abhiññāpādakajjhānavasenevā^eb^ti yassa kassaci abhiññāpādakajjhānavasena. ^b^eva^eb^-kārena pādakajjhānavisesaṃ nivatteti, na adhiṭṭhānaṃ. tenevāha ^b^``natthettha kasiṇasamāpattiniyamo''^eb^ti. tirokuṭṭapāṭihāriyādīsu viya imasmiṃ nāma kasiṇe jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā adhiṭṭhātabbanti na ettha koci niyamo atthīti attho. tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ kiñci samāpattiṃ aparāmasitvā ``idha so iddhimā''tiādi (paṭi0 ma0 3.10-11) vuttaṃ. ^b^hatthapāse hoti^eb^ ``candimasūriye''ti evaṃ vuttaṃ candimasūriyamaṇḍalaṃ. ^b^rūpagataṃ hatthapāse^eb^ti hatthapāse ṭhitaṃ rūpagataṃ, hatthapāse vā rūpagataṃ. hatthaṃ vā vaḍḍhetvā parāmasatīti yojanā.

[03] upādinnakaṃ nissāya anupādinnakassa vaḍḍhanaṃ vuttaṃ. yuttiyā panettha upādinnakassapi vaḍḍhanacchāyā dissati. attano aṇumahantabhāvāpādane upādinnakassa hāpanaṃ viya vaḍḍhanampi labbhateva. yathā āyasmato ^b^mahāmoggallānassa nandopananda^eb^damaneti evaṃ pavattaṃ sahavatthunā theravādaṃ āharitvā tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero āhā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^kiṃ pana na hoti,^eb^ hotiyevāti ^a^V2.0028^ea^ adhippāyo. dve hi paṭisedhā ^a^M2.0029^ea^ pakatiṃ gamentīti. ^b^``tadā mahantaṃ hoti mahāmoggallānattherassa viyā''^eb^ti idaṃ yathādhikatatthadassanavasena vuttaṃ, khuddakabhāvāpādanampettha labbhateva.

[03] ^b^olokesi^eb^ buddhāciṇṇavasena ``atthi nu kho assa upanissayo''ti. lokiyaṃ ratanattaye pasādalakkhaṇaṃ sāsanāvatāraṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``appasanno''^eb^ti. micchādiṭṭhito vivecetvā pasādetabboti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``ko nu kho...pe0... viveceyyā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^taṃ divasa^eb^nti yadā bhagavā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tāvatiṃsabhavanābhimukho gacchati, taṃ divasabhāgaṃ. ^b^āpānabhūmiṃ sajjayiṃsū^eb^ti yattha so nisinno bhojanakiccaṃ karoti, taṃ parivesanaṭṭhānaṃ sittaṃ sammaṭṭhaṃ bhojanūpakaraṇūpanayanādinā sajjayiṃsu paṭiyādesuṃ. ^b^tividhanāṭakehī^eb^ti vadhūkumārikaññāvatthāhi tividhāhi nāṭakitthīhi. ^b^olokayamāno^eb^ti pekkhanto, vicārento vā.

[03] ^b^uparūparī^eb^ti matthakamatthake. ^b^bhavanenā^eb^ti bhavanapadesena. ^b^bhogehī^eb^ti sarīrabhogehi. ^b^avakujjenā^eb^ti nikujjitena. ^b^gahetvā^eb^ti yathā tāvatiṃsabhavanassa padesopi nāvasissati, evaṃ pariyādāya.

[03] ^b^sineruparibhaṇḍa^eb^nti sinerumekhalaṃ. sinerussa kira samantato bahalato, puthulato ca pañcayojanasahassaparimāṇāni cattāri paribhaṇḍāni tāvatiṃsabhavanassa ārakkhāya nāgehi, garuḷehi, kumbhaṇḍehi, yakkhehi ca adhiṭṭhitāni, tāni paribhaṇḍabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ katvā ``paribhaṇḍa''nti vuttaṃ. tehi kira sinerussa upaḍḍhaṃ pariyādinnaṃ.
[03] ^b^attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā^eb^ti manussarūpaṃ antaradhāpetvā. ^b^bādhatī^eb^ti khedamattaṃ uppādeti.

[03] ^b^attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā^eb^ti sukhumattabhāvanimmānena nāgarūpaṃ vijahitvā. ^b^mukhaṃ vivari^eb^ ``mukhagataṃ ^a^V2.0029^ea^ samaṇaṃ saṃkhādissāmī''ti. ^b^pācīnena ca pacchimena cā^eb^ti nāgassa tathānipannattā vuttaṃ. suṭṭhu satiyā paccupaṭṭhāpanatthamāha ^b^``manasi karohī''^eb^ti.
[03] ^b^ādito^eb^ ^a^M2.0030^ea^ ^b^paṭṭhāya sabbapāṭihāriyānī^eb^ti tadā therena katapāṭihāriyāni sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^imaṃ pana ṭhāna^eb^nti imaṃ nāsāvātavissajjanakāraṇaṃ.
[03] ^b^anubandhī^eb^ti ``na sakkā evaṃmahiddhikassa imassa samaṇassa paṭipaharitu''nti bhayena palāyantaṃ anubandhi.

[03] ^b^ekapaṭipāṭiyā^eb^ti ekāya paṭipāṭiyā, nirantaranti attho. ^b^ayamevā^eb^ti yā upādinnakaṃ nissāya anupādinnakassa vaḍḍhi, ayameva. ^b^ettha^eb^ edise hatthavaḍḍhanādipāṭihāriye ^b^yutti^eb^ yuttarūpā cittato, ututo vā upādinnakarūpānaṃ anuppajjanato. atha vā ^b^upādinna^eb^nti sakalameva indriyabaddhaṃ adhippetaṃ. evampi tassa tathā vaḍḍhi na yujjati evāti vuttanayeneva vaḍḍhi veditabbā. ekasantāne upādinnaṃ, anupādinnañca sambhinnaṃ viya pavattamānampi atthato asambhinnameva. tattha yathā āḷhakamatte khīre anekāḷhake udake āsitte yadipi khīraṃ sabbena sambhinnaṃ sabbatthakameva lambamānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati, tathāpi na tattha khīraṃ vaḍḍhati, udakameva vaḍḍhati, evamevaṃ yadipi upādinnaṃ anupādinnañca sambhinnaṃ viya pavattati, tathāpi upādinnaṃ na vaḍḍhati, iddhānubhāvena cittajaṃ, tadanusārena utujañca vaḍḍhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^so^eb^ti so iddhimā. ^b^evaṃ katvā^eb^ti vuttākārena hatthaṃ vā vaḍḍhetvā te vā āgantvā hatthapāse ṭhite katvā. pādaṭṭhapanādipi vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^aparopi^eb^ iddhimā. ^b^tathevā^eb^ti pāṭihāriyakaraṇato pubbe viya. ^b^tathūpamameta^eb^nti yathā udakapuṇṇāsu nānāpātīsu bahūhi nānācandamaṇḍalesu dissamānesu na tena candamaṇḍalassa gamanādiuparodho, bahūnañca paccekaṃ dassanaṃ ijjhati, tathūpamametaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ candimasūriyānaṃ gamanādiuparodhābhāvato, bahūnañca iddhimantānaṃ tattha iddhipayogassa yathicchitaṃ samijjhanatoti adhippāyo.
[03] 397^b^.^eb^ ^b^paricchedaṃ katvā^eb^ti abhividhivasena pana paricchedaṃ katvā, na mariyādavasena. tathā hesa brahmaloke attano kāyena vasaṃ vatteti. ^b^pāḷī^eb^ti paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷi.

[03] ^b^yāva^eb^ ^a^V2.0030^ea^ ^b^brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattetī^eb^ti ettha yasmā na brahmalokasseva gamanaṃ adhippetaṃ, nāpi brahmalokassa gamanameva, atha kho ^a^M2.0031^ea^ aññathā aññampi. ^b^yāva brahmalokā^eb^ti pana dūrāvadhinidassanametaṃ, tasmā ``sace brahmalokaṃ gantukāmā hotī''ti vatvāpi itarampi dassetuṃ ^b^``santikepi dūre adhiṭṭhātī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^pi^eb^-saddo samuccayattho, tena vuttāvasesassa adhiṭṭhāniddhiyā nipphādetabbassa sabbassāpi saṅgaho, na vuttassevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^yamakapāṭihāriyāvasāne^eb^tiādinā tivikkamassa adhiṭṭhāniddhinipphannatā vuttā, aññattha pana lakkhaṇānisaṃsatā. tadubhayaṃ yathā aññamaññaṃ na virujjhati, tathā vicāretvā gahetabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^nīlamātika^eb^nti nīlavaṇṇodakamātikaṃ.
[03] ^b^mahābodhi^eb^nti aparājitapallaṅkaṃ mahābodhiṃ. ^b^citte uppanne santike akāsī^eb^ti tathā cittuppattisamanantarameva pathaviṃ, samuddañca saṃkhipitvā mahābodhisantike akāsi.
[01] ^b^nakkhattadivase^eb^ti mahadivase. ^b^candapūve^eb^ti candasadise candamaṇḍalākāre pūve. ^b^ekapattapūramattamakāsī^eb^ti yathā te pamāṇato sarūpeneva antopattapariyāpannā honti, tathā akāsi.

[03] ^b^kākavaliyavatthusmi^eb^ñca ``bhagavā thokaṃ bahuṃ akāsī''ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. taṃ pana vatthuṃ saṅkhepatova dassetuṃ ^b^``mahākassapatthero kirā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^samāpattiyā^eb^ti nirodhasamāpattiyā.
[03] ^b^gaṅgātīre^eb^ti tambapaṇṇidīpe gaṅgānadiyā tīre. ^b^saññaṃ adāsī^eb^ti yathā te yathādhiṭṭhitaṃ sappiṃ passanti, tathā saññaṃ adāsi.

[01] ^b^tassā^eb^ti yassa brahmuno rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo, tassa brahmuno rūpaṃ passati. ^b^saddaṃ suṇātī^eb^ti dibbāya sotadhātuyā brahmuno saddaṃ suṇāti. ^b^cittaṃ pajānātī^eb^ti cetopariyañāṇena brahmuno cittaṃ pajānāti. ^b^karajakāyassa vasenā^eb^ti cātumahābhūtikarūpakāyassa vasena. ``cittaṃ pariṇāmetī''ti ettha kiṃ taṃ cittaṃ, kathaṃ vā pariṇāmananti āha ^b^``pādakajjhānacittaṃ gahetvā kāye āropetī''^eb^ti. kathaṃ ^a^V2.0031^ea^ pana kāye āropetīti āha ^b^``kāyānugatikaṃ karotī''^eb^ti. evampi saddadandharovāyanti vacanapathaṃ pacchindanto āha ^b^``dandhagamana''^eb^nti. karotīti ^a^M2.0032^ea^ sambandho. ^b^kāyagamanaṃ hi dandhaṃ,^eb^ dandhamahābhūtapaccayattāti adhippāyo. ayañhettha attho -- dissamānena kāyena gantukāmatāya vasena cittaṃ pariṇāmento yogī pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya ``idaṃ cittaṃ kāyo viya dandhagamanaṃ hotū''ti parikammaṃ karoti. tathā parikammakaraṇaṃ hi sandhāya ``pādakajjhānacittaṃ gahetvā''ti vuttaṃ. parikammaṃ pana katvā puna samāpajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhahanto taṃ cittaṃ kāye āropeti, kāyānugatikaṃ dandhagamanaṃ karoti.

[03] ^b^sukhasañña^eb^nti sukhasahagataṃ saññaṃ, saññāsīsena niddeso. lahubhāvena saññātanti ^b^lahusaññaṃ^eb^. kathaṃ pana iddhicittena saha sukhasaññāya sambhavoti āha ^b^``sukhasaññā nāma upekkhāsampayuttā saññā''^eb^ti. sukhanti saññātanti vā ^b^sukhasaññaṃ^eb^. tenevāha ^b^``upekkhā hi santaṃ sukhanti vuttā''^eb^ti ekantagarukehi nīvaraṇehi, oḷārikehi anupasantasabhāvehi ca vitakkādīhi vippayogo cittacetasikānaṃ lahubhāvassa kāraṇanti dassento āha ^b^``sāyeva...pe0... veditabbā''^eb^ti. ^b^taṃ okkantassā^eb^ti taṃ sukhalahusaññaṃ anuppattassa. ^b^assā^eb^ti yogino. ^b^gantukāmatā eva ettha pamāṇa^eb^nti ettha etasmiṃ dissamānena kāyena gamane yaṃ ṭhānaṃ gantukāmo, taṃ uddissa gantukāmatāvasena pavattaparikammādhiṭṭhānāni eva pamāṇaṃ, tāvatā gamanaṃ ijjhati. tasmā magganimmānavāyuadhiṭṭhānehi vināpi icchitadesappatti hotīti. idāni tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^``sati hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^kāyaṃ gahetvā^eb^ti karajakāyaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena parikammacittena gahetvā. ^b^citte āropetī^eb^ti ``ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū''ti pādakajjhānacitte āropeti taggatikaṃ karoti. tenāha ^b^``cittānugatikaṃ karoti sīghagamana''^eb^nti. ^b^cittagamana^eb^nti cittappavattimāha. ^b^idaṃ pana^eb^ cittavasena kāyapariṇāmanapāṭihāriyaṃ. ^b^cittagamanamevā^eb^ti cittena samānagamanameva. kathaṃ pana kāyo dandhappavattiko lahuparivattinā cittena samānagatiko hotīti? na sabbathā samānagatiko. yatheva hi kāyavasena cittapariṇāmane cittaṃ sabbathā kāyena samānagatikaṃ na hoti. na hi tadā cittaṃ sabhāvasiddhena attano khaṇena avattitvā garuvuttikassa rūpadhammassa khaṇena vattati. ``idaṃ cittaṃ ayaṃ kāyo viya hotū''ti pana adhiṭṭhānena ^a^M2.0033^ea^ dandhagatikassa kāyassa anuvattanato yāva icchitaṭṭhānappatti, tāva kāyagatianulomeneva hutvā santānavasena ^a^V2.0032^ea^ pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ kāyagatiyā pariṇāmitaṃ nāma hoti, evaṃ ``ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū''ti adhiṭṭhānena pageva sukhalahusaññāya sampāditattā abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ viya dandhaṃ avattitvā yathā lahukatipayacittavāreheva icchitaṭṭhānappatti hoti, evaṃ pavattamāno kāyo cittagatiyā pariṇāmito nāma hoti, na ekacittakkhaṇeneva icchitaṭṭhānappattiyā.

[03] evañca katvā ``seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyyā''ti idampi upamāvacanaṃ nippariyāyeneva samatthitaṃ hoti. avassaṃ cetaṃ evaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, aññathā suttābhidhammapāṭhehi, vinayāṭṭhakathāya ca virodho siyā, dhammatā ca vilomitā. ``nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampī''ti (a0 ni0 1.11 ādayo) hi ettha aññagahaṇena rūpadhammā gahitā alahuparivattitāya. abhidhamme (paṭṭhā0 1.1.10-11) ca purejātapaccayo rūpameva vutto, pacchājātapaccayo ca tasseva. yattha yattha ca dhammā uppajjanti, tattha tattheva bhijjanti. natthi desantarasaṅkamanaṃ, na ca sabhāvo aññathā hotīti. na hi iddhibalena dhammānaṃ kenaci lakkhaṇaṃ aññathattaṃ kātuṃ sakkā, bhāvaññathattameva pana kātuṃ sakkā. ^b^``tīsupi khaṇesū''^eb^ti idampi gamanārambhaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na gamananiṭṭhānanti vadanti. ^b^thero^eb^ti aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ antare eko thero. ^b^idhā^eb^ti idaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ vibhajitvā vuttapāṭhe. ^b^sayaṃ gamanameva āgataṃ^eb^ ``brahmalokaṃ gacchatī''ti vuttattā.

[01] ^b^cakkhusotādīna^eb^nti cakkhusotādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``sabbaṅgapaccaṅga''nti, sabbāṅgapaccaṅgavantanti attho. ^b^pasādo nāma natthī^eb^ti imināva bhāvajīvitindriyānampi abhāvo vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^rucivasenā^eb^ti icchāvasena. ^b^aññampī^eb^ti bhagavatā kariyamānato aññampi kiriyaṃ karoti. ayañcettha buddhānubhāvo. yadi sāvakanimmitesu nānappakāratā natthi, ``sace pana nānāvaṇṇe kātukāmo hotī''tiādi yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ, taṃ kathanti? taṃ tathā tathā parikammaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhahantassa te te vaṇṇavayādivisesā parikammānurūpaṃ ijjhantīti katvā vuttaṃ. idha pana yathādhiṭṭhite nimmitarūpe sace sāvako ``ime visesā hontū''ti ^a^M2.0034^ea^ icchati, na ijjhati, buddhānaṃ pana ijjhatīti ayamattho dassitoti na koci virodho.

[01] idāni yāni tāni ``yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vattetī''ti (paṭi0 ma0 3.10) pāḷiyā atthadassanavasena vibhattāni ``dūrepi santike adhiṭṭhātī''tiādīni cuddasa pāṭihāriyāni ^a^V2.0033^ea^, tattha sikhāppattaṃ kāyena vasavattanapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``ettha cā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^ya^eb^nti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ, tena ^b^``rūpaṃ passatī''^eb^ti ettha yadetaṃ rūpadassanaṃ, ^b^``saddaṃ suṇātī''^eb^ti ettha yadetaṃ saddasavanaṃ, ^b^``cittaṃ pajānātī''^eb^ti ettha yadetaṃ cittajānananti evaṃ dibbacakkhusotacetopariyañāṇakattukaṃ dassanasavanajānanakiriyaṃ parāmasatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ito paresu ^b^santiṭṭhatī^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^yampissā^eb^ti yampi assa. yogino adhiṭṭhānanti sambandho. ^b^yañca kho^eb^ti ettha ^b^kho^eb^-saddo avadhāraṇattho, visesattho vā, tena ayamevettha kāyena vasavattanapāṭihāriyesu ukkaṭṭhataranti dīpeti. kasmā? ``ayaṃ nu kho iddhimā, ayaṃ nu kho nimmito''ti ekaccassa brahmuno āsaṅkuppādanato. yadaggena cetaṃ adhiṭṭhitaṃ visesato manomayanti vuccati, tadaggena ukkaṭṭhataranti veditabbaṃ. tenāha ^b^``ettāvatā kāyena vasaṃ vatteti nāmā''^eb^ti. yadi evaṃ kasmā idha sesāni gahitānīti āha ^b^``sesaṃ...pe0... vutta''^eb^nti.

[03] 398^b^.^eb^ ^b^idaṃ nānākaraṇa^eb^nti kāmamimāpi dve iddhiyo adhiṭṭhānavaseneva ijjhanti, tathāpi idaṃ idāni vuccamānaṃ imāsaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ viseso. ^b^pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā^eb^ti attano pakatirūpaṃ vijahitvā apanetvā, paresaṃ adassetvāti attho. ^b^kumārakavaṇṇa^eb^nti kumārakasaṇṭhānaṃ. ^b^dassetī^eb^ti tathā vikubbanto attani dasseti. ^b^nāgavaṇṇaṃ vā^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^hatthimpi dassetī^eb^ti attānampi hatthiṃ katvā dasseti, bahiddhāpi hatthiṃ dasseti. etadatthameva hi idha ``hatthivaṇṇaṃ vā dassetī''ti avatvā ``hatthimpi dassetī''ti (paṭi0 ma0 3.13) vuttaṃ. yaṃ pana keci bahiddhā hatthiādidassanavacanaṃ ``pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā''ti vacanena vikubbaniddhibhāvena virujjhatīti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ. kasmā? pakativaṇṇavijahanaṃ nāma attano pakatirūpassa aññesaṃ adassanaṃ, na sabbena sabbaṃ tassa nirodhanaṃ. evaṃ sati attānaṃ adassetvā bahiddhā hatthiṃ dassento ``pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā hatthiṃ dassetī''ti ^a^M2.0035^ea^ vuccamāne ko ettha virodho, attanā pana hatthivaṇṇo hutvā bahiddhāpi hatthiṃ dassante vattabbameva natthi. tenevāha ``bahiddhāpi hatthiādidassanavasena vutta''nti. evañca katvā vikubbaniddhibhāvena ca na koci virodho.

[03] pāḷiyañca ^b^kumārakavaṇṇaṃ vā^eb^tiādīsu aniyamattho vā-saddo vutto. tesu ekekasseva karaṇadassanatthaṃ. ^b^hatthimpī^eb^tiādīsu pana hatthiādīnaṃ bahūnaṃ ekajjhaṃ kātabbābhāvadassanatthaṃ samuccayattho pi-saddo vutto. tena ``hatthimpi dassetī''tiādīsu dutiye vuttanayeneva attho gahetabbo.

[03] iddhimato ^a^V2.0034^ea^ attano kumārakākārena paresaṃ dassanaṃ kumārakavaṇṇanimmānaṃ, na ettha kiñci apubbaṃ pathavīādivatthu nipphādīyatīti kasiṇaniyamena payojanābhāvato ^b^``pathavīkasiṇādīsu aññatarārammaṇato''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. satipi vā vatthunipphādane yathārahaṃ taṃ pathavīkasiṇādivaseneva ijjhatīti evampettha kasiṇaniyamena payojanaṃ nattheva. kumārakavaṇṇañhi dassentena nīlavaṇṇaṃ vā dassetabbaṃ siyā, pītādīsu aññataravaṇṇaṃ vā. tathā sati nīlādikasiṇāni samāpajjitabbānīti āpannova kasiṇaniyamo. eseva nayo sesesupi. evamadhiṭṭhite yadeke pathavīkasiṇavasena ``ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī''tiādi (dī0 ni0 1.238; ma0 ni0 1.147; saṃ0 ni0 5.842; paṭi0 ma0 3.10) bhāvoti evaṃ pavattena kasiṇaniddesena idha vikubbaniddhiniddese ``pathavīkasiṇādīsu aññatarārammaṇato''tiādivacanassa virodhaṃ āsaṅkanti, so anokāsovāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. nimminitabbabhāvena attanā icchitoti ^b^attano kumārakavaṇṇo,^eb^ na pana attano daharakāle kumārakavaṇṇoti. ^b^nāgā^eb^divaṇṇesupi ayaṃ nayo byāpī evāti yadeke ``nāgādinimmāne na yujjati viyā''ti vadanti, tadapohataṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^bahiddhāpī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena ajjhattaṃ sampiṇḍeti. ayañhettha attho -- ^b^hatthimpi dassetī^eb^tiādi ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhāpi hatthiādidassanavasena vuttaṃ, na ``kumārakavaṇṇaṃ vā''tiādi viya ajjhattameva kumārakavaṇṇādīnaṃ dassanavasenāti. yaṃ ettha vattabbaṃ adhiṭṭhānavidhānaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.

[03] 399^b^.^eb^ ^b^kāya^eb^nti ^a^M2.0036^ea^ attano karajakāyaṃ. ^b^vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ``ayaṃ kāyo susiro hotū''ti parikammaṃ katvā puna ``pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāyā''ti imaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusāramāha. ^b^aññaṃ kāya^eb^nti yaṃ manomayaṃ kāyaṃ nimminitukāmo, taṃ. ^b^muñjamhā^eb^ti muñjatiṇato. ^b^īsika^eb^nti tassa kaṇḍaṃ. ^b^kosiyā^eb^ti asikosato. ^b^karaṇḍāyā^eb^ti peḷāya, nimmokatoti ca vadanti. ^b^abbāhatī^eb^ti uddharati. ^b^pavāheyyā^eb^ti ākaḍḍheyya.
[06] iddhividhaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti dvādasamaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 400^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatthā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0037^ea^ ^a^V2.0035^ea^ dibbasotadhātuyā niddese. abhiññāpāḷiyā hi niddesamukhena abhiññānaṃ nibbattanavidhi vidhīyati. abhiññāsīsenettha abhiññāpāḷi vuttā. tenāha ^b^``tato parāsu ca tīsu abhiññāsū''^eb^ti. ^b^tato parāsū^eb^ti ca satthuno desanākkamaṃ, attano ca uddesakkamaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, na paṭipattikkamaṃ. na hi paṭipajjantā imināva kamena paṭipajjanti. ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti dibbasotadhātupāḷiyaṃ, sesābhiññāpāḷiyañcāti sabbattha. ^b^tatrā^eb^ti vākyopaññāse nipātamattaṃ, ^b^tatra^eb^ vā yathāvuttapāṭhe. ^b^dibbasadisattā^eb^ti dibbe bhavāti dibbā, devānaṃ sotadhātu, tāya dibbāya sadisattā. idāni taṃ dibbasadisataṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``devānaṃ hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sucaritakammanibbattā^eb^ti saddhābahulatāvisuddhadiṭṭhitānisaṃsadassāvitādisampattiyā suṭṭhu caritattā sucaritena devūpapattijanakena puññakammena nibbattā. ^b^pittasemharuhirādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena vātarogādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^apalibuddhā^eb^ti anupaddutā. pittādīhi anupaddutattā, kammassa ca uḷāratāya ^b^upakkilesavimutti^eb^ veditabbā. upakkilesadosarahitaṃ hi kammaṃ tiṇādidosarahitaṃ viya sassaṃ uḷāraphalaṃ anupakkiliṭṭhaṃ hoti. kāraṇūpacārena cassa phalaṃ tathā voharīyati, yathā ``sukkaṃ sukkavipāka''nti (dī0 ni0 3.312; ma0 ni0 2.81; a0 ni0 4.233). ^b^dūrepī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena sukhumassāpi ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchanasamatthataṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^pasādasotadhātū^eb^ti catumahābhūtānaṃ pasādalakkhaṇā sotadhātu.

[03] vīriyārambhavaseneva ijjhanato sabbāpi kusalabhāvanā vīriyabhāvanā, padhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatā vā iddhipādabhāvanāpi visesato vīriyabhāvanā, tassā ānubhāvena nibbattā ^b^vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattā^eb^. ñāṇamayā sotadhātu ñāṇasotadhātu. ^b^tādisāyevā^eb^ti upakkilesavimuttatāya, dūrepi sukhumassapi ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchanasamatthatāya ca taṃsadisā eva ^a^V2.0036^ea^. ^b^dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattā^eb^ti dibbavihārasaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ bhūmīnaṃ vasena paṭiladdhattā, iminā kāraṇavasenassā dibbabhāvamāha. yaṃ cettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. ^b^dibbavihārasannissitattā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0038^ea^ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgamena ukkaṃsagataṃ pādakajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ dibbavihāraṃ sannissāya pavattattā, dibbavihārapariyāpannaṃ vā attanā sampayuttaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ nissayapaccayabhūtaṃ sannissitattāti evampettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^savanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti saddagahaṇaṭṭhena. yāthāvato hi saddūpaladdhi saddasabhāvāvabodho savanaṃ. santesupi aññesu sabhāvadhāraṇādīsu dhātuatthesu attasuññatāsandassanatthā satthu dhātudesanāti āha ^b^``nijjīvaṭṭhena cā''^eb^ti. ^b^sotadhātukiccaṃ^eb^ saddasampaṭicchanaṃ, saddasanniṭṭhānapaccayatā ca.

[03] ñāṇassa parisuddhi upakkilesavigamenevāti āha ^b^``nirupakkilesāyā''^eb^ti. ^b^mānusikā^eb^ manussa santakā, maṃsasotadhātu, dibbavidūrādivisayaggahaṇasaṅkhātena attano kiccavisesena atikkantaṃ mānusikaṃ etāyāti ^b^atikkantamānusikā^eb^. tenāha ^b^``manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā saddasavanenā''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^manussūpacāra^eb^nti manussehi upacaritabbaṭṭhānaṃ, pakatiyā sotadvārena gahetabbaṃ visayanti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``saddasavanenā''^eb^ti. ^b^dibbe^eb^ti devalokapariyāpanne. te pana visesato devānaṃ kathā saddā hontīti āha ^b^``devānaṃ sadde''^eb^ti. manussānaṃ eteti mānusā, te ^b^mānuse^eb^. evaṃ devamanussasaddānaṃyeva gahitattā vuttaṃ ^b^``padesapariyādāna''^eb^nti, ekadesaggahaṇanti attho. ^b^sadehasannissitā^eb^ attano sarīre sannissitā. ^b^nippadesapariyādānaṃ^eb^ ṭhānabhedaggahaṇamukhena saviññāṇakādibhedabhinnassa saddassa anavasesena saṅgaṇhanato.

[03] ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ dibbasotadhātu. ^b^parikammasamādhicittenā^eb^ti parikammabhūtāveṇikasamādhicittena, dibbasotañāṇassa parikammavasena pavattakkhaṇikasamādhinā samāhitacittenāti attho. ^b^parikammasamādhi^eb^ nāma dibbasotadhātuyā upacārāvatthātipi vadanti. sā pana nānāvajjanavasena vuttāti daṭṭhabbā. sabboḷārikasaddadassanatthaṃ sīhādīnaṃ saddo paṭhamaṃ gahito. tiyojanamatthakepi kira kesarasīhassa sīhanādasaddo suyyati. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena meghasaddabyagghasaddādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ettha ca yathā oḷārikasaddāvajjanaṃ yāvadeva sukhumasaddāvajjanūpāyadassanatthaṃ, tathā saddaggahaṇabhāvanābalena sukhumatarasaddaggahaṇasaṃsiddhito.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M2.0039^ea^ āsannasaddaggahaṇānusārena dūradūratarasaddaggahaṇampi samijjhatīti dassetuṃ ^b^``puratthimāya^eb^ ^a^V2.0037^ea^ ^b^disāyā''^eb^tiādinā disāsambandhavasena saddānaṃ manasikāravidhi āraddho. tattha ^b^saddanimitta^eb^nti ñāṇuppattihetubhāvato saddo eva saddanimittaṃ, yo vā yathāvutto upādāyupādāya labbhamāno saddānaṃ oḷārikasukhumākāro, taṃ saddanimittaṃ. tenevāha ^b^``saddānaṃ saddanimitta''^eb^nti. yaṃ pana vuttaṃ ^b^``oḷārikānampi sukhumānampi saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi kātabba''^eb^nti, taṃ oḷārikasukhumasammatesupi oḷārikasukhumasabbhāvadassanatthaṃ. tañca sabbaṃ sukhume ñāṇaparicayadassanatthaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. saddanimittassa apaccuppannasabhāvattā ``saddova saddanimitta''nti ayameva pakkho ñāyāgatoti keci, taṃ na oḷārikasukhumānaṃ saddānaṃ vaṇṇārammaṇena ñāṇena nīlapītādivaṇṇānaṃ viya tattheva gahetabbato. oḷārikasukhumabhāvo cettha saddanimittanti adhippetanti. ^b^tassā^eb^ti yathāvuttena vidhinā paṭipajjantassa yogino. ^b^te saddā^eb^ti ye sabboḷārikato pabhuti āvajjantassa anukkamena sukhumasukhumā saddā āvajjitā, te. ^b^pākatikacittassāpī^eb^ti pādakajjhānasamāpajjanato pubbe pavattacittassāpi. ^b^parikammasamādhicittassā^eb^ti dibbasotadhātuyā uppādanatthaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhitassa saddaṃ ārabbha parikammakaraṇavasena pavattakkhaṇikasamādhicittassa. pubbepi ñāṇena parimadditattā ativiya pākaṭā hontīti sambandho.

[03] ^b^tesu saddesū^eb^ti ye parikammassa visayadassanatthaṃ bahū saddā vuttā, tesu saddesu. ^b^aññatara^eb^nti yatthassa parikammakaraṇavasena abhiṇhaṃ manasikāro pavatto, taṃ ekaṃ saddaṃ. ^b^tato para^eb^nti tato appanuppattito paraṃ. ^b^tasmiṃ sote^eb^ti tasmiṃ ñāṇasote. ^b^patito hotī^eb^ti dibbasotadhātu antogadhā hoti appanācittassa uppattito pabhuti dibbasotañāṇalābhī nāma hoti, na dānissa tadatthaṃ bhāvanābhiyogo icchitabboti attho. ^b^ta^eb^nti dibbasotadhātuṃ. ^b^thāmajāta^eb^nti jātathāmaṃ daḷhabhāvappattaṃ. ^b^vaḍḍhetabbaṃ^eb^ pādakajjhānārammaṇaṃ. kinti kittakanti āha ^b^``etthantare saddaṃ suṇāmīti ekaṅgulamattaṃ paricchinditvā''^eb^ti. pādakajjhānassa hi ārammaṇabhūtaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ ``ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pharatū''ti manasi karitvā pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjantassa kasiṇanimittaṃ tattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati ^a^M2.0040^ea^. so samāpattito vuṭṭhāya tattha gate sadde āvajjati, subhāvitabhāvanattā tattha aññataraṃ saddaṃ ārabbha uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ cattāri, pañca vā javanāni uppajjanti. tesu pacchimaṃ iddhicittaṃ, itarassa punapi pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitabbameva. tato eva hi pādakajjhānārammaṇena phuṭṭhokāsabbhantaragatepi sadde suṇātiyevāti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. ^b^ekaṅguladvaṅgulā^eb^diggahaṇañcettha sukhumasaddāpekkhāya kataṃ.

[03] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0038^ea^ ^b^suṇantovā^eb^ti evaṃ paricchinditvā paricchinditvā savanena vasīkatābhiñño hutvā yathāvajjite sadde suṇanto eva. ^b^pāṭiyekka^eb^nti ekajjhaṃ pavattamānepi te sadde paccekaṃ vatthubhedena vavatthapetukāmatāya sati.
[06] dibbasotadhātukathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 401^b^.^eb^ ^b^pariyātī^eb^ti sarāgādivibhāgena paricchijja jānāti. tenāha ^b^``paricchindatīti attho''^eb^ti. yesañhi dhātūnaṃ gati attho, buddhipi tesaṃ attho. ``parasattāna''nti ettha para-saddo aññatthoti āha ^b^``attānaṃ ṭhapetvā sesasattāna''^eb^nti, yathā hi yo paro na hoti, so attā. yo attā na hoti, so paroti. ^b^sattāna^eb^nti cettha rūpādīsu sattāti sattā. tassā pana paññattiyā saviññāṇakasantāne niruḷhattā nicchandarāgāpi sattātveva vuccanti, bhūtapubbagatiyā vā. ``pu''nti narakaṃ, tattha galanti papatantīti ^b^puggalā,^eb^ pāpakārino. itarepi saṃsāre saṃsārino taṃsabhāvānātivattanato puggalātveva vuccanti. taṃtaṃsattanikāyassa vā tattha tattha upapattiyā pūraṇato, aniccatāvasena galanato ca ^b^puggalā^eb^ti neruttā.

[03] ^b^etañhī^eb^ti ettha ^b^hi^eb^-saddo hetuattho. yasmā ``etaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇavasena ijjhatī''ti ^b^taṃ^eb^ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ, ^b^etassa^eb^ cetopariyañāṇassa uppādane ^b^parikammaṃ,^eb^ tasmā tena cetopariyañāṇaṃ uppādetukāmena adhigatadibbacakkhuñāṇena bhikkhunāti evaṃ yojanā kātabbā ^a^M2.0041^ea^. ^b^hadayarūpa^eb^nti na hadayavatthu, atha kho hadayamaṃsapesi. yaṃ bahi kamalamakuḷasaṇṭhānaṃ, anto kosātakīphalasadisanti vuccati, tañhi nissāya dāni vuccamānaṃ lohitaṃ tiṭṭhati. hadayavatthu pana imaṃ lohitaṃ nissāya pavattatīti. kathaṃ pana dibbacakkhunā lohitassa vaṇṇadassanena arūpaṃ cittaṃ pariyesatīti āha ^b^``yadā hī''^eb^tiādi. kathaṃ pana somanassasahagatādicittavuttiyā kammajassa lohitassa vividhavaṇṇabhāvāpattīti? ko vā evamāha ``kammajameva taṃ lohita''nti catusantatirūpassāpi tattha labbhamānattā. tenevāha ^b^``idaṃ rūpaṃ somanassindriyasamuṭṭhāna''^eb^ntiādi. evampi yaṃ tattha acittajaṃ, tassa yathāvuttavaṇṇabhedena ^a^V2.0039^ea^ na bhavitabbanti? bhavitabbaṃ, sesatisantatirūpānaṃ tadanuvattanato. yathā hi gamanādīsu cittajarūpāni utukammāhārasamuṭṭhānarūpehi anuvattīyanti, aññathā kāyassa desantaruppattiyeva na siyā, evamidhāpi cittajarūpaṃ sesatisantatirūpāni anuvattamānāni pavattanti. pasādakodhavelāsu cakkhussa vaṇṇabhedāpattiyeva ca tadatthassa nidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^pariyesantenā^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ tāva anumānato ñāṇaṃ pesetvā gavesantena. cetopariyañāṇañhi uppādetukāmena yoginā heṭṭhā vuttanayena rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā dibbacakkhuñāṇassa lābhī samāno ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbena cakkhunā parassa hadayamaṃsapesiṃ nissāya pavattamānassa lohitassa vaṇṇadassanena ``idāni imassa cittaṃ somanassasahagata''nti vā ``domanassasahagata''nti vā ``upekkhāsahagata''nti vā nayaggāhavasenapi vavatthapetvā pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya ``imassa cittaṃ jānāmī''ti parikammaṃ kātabbaṃ. kālasatampi kālasahassampi punappunaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatheva paṭipajjitabbaṃ. tassevaṃ dibbacakkhunā hadayalohitavaṇṇadassanādividhinā paṭipajjantassa idāni cetopariyañāṇaṃ uppajjissatīti yaṃ tadā pavattatīti vavatthāpitaṃ cittaṃ, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati, tasmiṃ niruddhe cattāri, pañca vā javanāni javanti. tesaṃ purimāni tīṇi, cattāri vā parikammādisamaññāni kāmāvacarāni, catutthaṃ, pañcamaṃ vā appanācittaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānikaṃ. tattha yaṃ antena appanācittena saddhiṃ uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ, idaṃ ^b^cetopariyañāṇaṃ^eb^. tañhi yatthānena parikammaṃ kataṃ, taṃ parassa cittaṃ paccakkhato paṭivijjhantaṃ vibhāventameva hutvā ^a^M2.0042^ea^ pavattati rūpaṃ viya ca dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ, saddaṃ viya ca dibbasotañāṇaṃ. tato paraṃ pana kāmāvacaracittehi sarāgādivavatthāpanaṃ hoti nīlādivavatthāpanaṃ viya. evamadhigatassa pana cetopariyañāṇassa thāmagamanavidhānampi adhigamanavidhānasadisamevāti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``tasmā tena...pe0... thāmagataṃ kātabba''^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^evaṃ thāmagate hī^eb^tiādi thāmagatānisaṃsadassanaṃ. ^b^sabbampi kāmāvacaracitta^eb^nti catupaṇṇāsavidhampi kāmāvacaracittaṃ. ^b^``sabbampī''^eb^ti padaṃ ``rūpāvacarārūpāvacaracitta''nti etthāpi ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. tena pañcadasavidhampi rūpāvacaracittaṃ, dvādasavidhampi arūpāvacaracittanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^pajānātī^eb^ti sarāgādipakārehi jānāti, paccakkhato paṭivijjhatīti adhippāyo. puthujjanavasenāyaṃ abhiññākathāti lokuttaraṃ cittaṃ idha anuddhaṭaṃ. tampi ^a^V2.0040^ea^ hi uparimo, sadiso vā ariyo heṭṭhimassa, sadisassa ca cittampi pajānāti eva. tenāha ^b^``anuttaraṃ vā citta''^eb^ntiādi. ^b^saṅkamanto^eb^ti ñāṇena upasaṅkamanto. ekaccañhi cittaṃ ñatvā parikammena vinā tadaññaṃ cittaṃ jānanto ^b^``cittā cittaṃ saṅkamanto''^eb^ti vutto. tenāha ^b^``vināpi hadayarūpadassanenā''^eb^ti. hadayarūpadassanādividhānaṃ hi ādikammikavasena vuttaṃ. tenāha ^b^``vuttampi ceta''^eb^ntiādi. ^b^yattha katthacī^eb^ti pañcavokārabhave, catuvokārabhavepi vā. na kato abhiññānuyogasaṅkhāto abhiniveso etenāti ^b^akatābhiniveso,^eb^ tassa, ādikammikassāti attho. ^b^ayaṃ kathā^eb^ti ``ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā''tiādinā vuttaparikammakathā.

[03] ^b^avasesa^eb^nti vuttāvasesaṃ. evaṃ avibhāgena vuttaṃ vibhāgato dassetuṃ ^b^``catubhūmakaṃ kusalābyākataṃ cittaṃ vītarāga''^eb^nti āha. tañhi yonisomanasikārappaccayataṃhetukatāhi rāgena sampayogāsaṅkābhāvato ``vītarāga''nti vattabbataṃ labhati. sesākusalacittānaṃ rāgena sampayogābhāvato nattheva sarāgatā, taṃnimittakatāya pana siyā taṃsahitatālesoti nattheva vītarāgatāpīti dukavinimuttatāva yuttāti vuttaṃ ^b^``imasmiṃ duke saṅgahaṃ na gacchantī''^eb^ti. yadi evaṃ padesikaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ āpajjatīti? nāpajjati, dukantarapariyāpannattā tesaṃ. ye pana ``paṭipakkhabhāve asatipi sampayogābhāvo evettha pamāṇaṃ ekaccābyākatānaṃ viyā''ti sesākusalacittānampi vītarāgataṃ paṭijānanti ^a^M2.0043^ea^, te sandhāyāha ^b^``keci pana therā tānipi saṅgaṇhantī''^eb^ti. sadosadukepi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.

[03] ^b^pāṭipuggalikanayenā^eb^ti āveṇikanayena, tadaññākusalacittesu viya lobhadosehi amissitassa mohasseva sabbhāvatoti attho. akusalamūlasaṅkhātesu saha mohenevāti ^b^samohaṃ^eb^ paṭhamanaye, dutiyanaye pana saheva mohenāti ^b^samoha^eb^nti evaṃ uttarapurimapadāvadhāraṇato dvīsu nayesu bhedo veditabbo. attanā sampayuttaṃ thinamiddhaṃ anuvattanavasena gataṃ pavattaṃ ^b^thinamiddhānugataṃ^eb^ pañcavidhaṃ sasaṅkhārikākusalacittaṃ ^b^saṃkhittaṃ,^eb^ ārammaṇe saṅkocanavasena pavattanato. vuttanayena ^b^uddhaccānugataṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ, taṃ pana uddhaccasahagataṃ cittaṃ, yattha vā uddhaccaṃ paccayavisesena thāmajātaṃ hutvā pavattati. kilesavikkhambhanasamatthatāya, vipulaphalatāya, dīghasantānatāya ca mahantabhāvaṃ gataṃ, mahantehi vā uḷāracchandavīriyacittapaññehi gataṃ paṭipannanti ^b^mahaggataṃ. avasesa^eb^nti parittāppamāṇaṃ. attānaṃ uttarituṃ samatthehi saha uttarehīti ^b^sauttaraṃ^eb^. uttiṇṇanti uttaraṃ, loke apariyāpannabhāvena lokato uttaranti ^b^lokuttaraṃ^eb^. tato eva natthi ^a^V2.0041^ea^ etassa uttaranti ^b^anuttaraṃ^eb^. upanijjhānalakkhaṇappattena samādhinā sammadeva āhitanti ^b^samāhitaṃ. tadaṅgavimuttippattaṃ^eb^ kāmāvacarakusalacittaṃ. ^b^vikkhambhanavimuttippattaṃ^eb^ mahaggatacittaṃ. ^b^samucchedavimuttippattaṃ^eb^ maggacittaṃ. ^b^paṭippassaddhivimuttippattaṃ^eb^ phalacittaṃ. ^b^nissaraṇavimuttippatta^eb^mpi tadubhayameva. kāmaṃ kānici paccavekkhaṇacittādīni nibbānārammaṇāni honti, nissaraṇavimuttippattāni pana na honti tādisakiccāyogato. ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ āgatasarāgādibhedavasena ceva tesaṃ antarabhedavasena ca ^b^sabbappakārampi^eb^.
[06] cetopariyañāṇakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03] 402^b^.^eb^ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, tassa vā anussaraṇaṃ ^b^pubbenivāsānussati,^eb^ taṃ nissayādipaccayabhūtaṃ paṭicca uppajjanato ``pubbenivāsānussatimhi yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tadatthāyā''ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto ^a^M2.0044^ea^ pubbenivāsaṃ tāva dassetvā tattha satiñāṇāni dassetuṃ ^b^``pubbenivāso''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ``pubbe''ti idaṃ padaṃ ``ekampi jāti''ntiādivacanato atītabhavavisayaṃ idhādhippetanti āha ^b^``atītajātīsū''^eb^ti nivāsa-saddo kammasādhano, khandhavinimutto ca nivasitadhammo natthīti āha ^b^``nivutthakkhandhā''^eb^ti. nivutthatā cettha sasantāne pavattatā, tathābhūtā ca te anu anu bhūtā jātā pavattā tattha uppajjitvā vigatāva hontīti āha ^b^``nivutthāti ajjhāvutthā anubhūtā attano santāne uppajjitvā niruddhā''^eb^ti. evaṃ sasantatipariyāpannadhammavasena nivāsa-saddassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni avisesena vattuṃ ``nivutthadhammā vā nivutthā''ti vatvā taṃ vivarituṃ ^b^``gocaranivāsenā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. gocarabhūtāpi hi gocarāsevanāya āsevitā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena anubhūtā nivutthā nāma hontīti. te pana duvidhā saparaviññāṇagocaratāyāti ubhayepi te dassetuṃ ^b^``attano''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ``attano viññāṇena viññātā''ti vatvā ``paricchinnā''ti vacanaṃ ye te gocaranivāsena nivutthadhammā, te na kevalaṃ viññāṇena viññāṇamattā, atha kho yathā pubbe jātināmagottavaṇṇaliṅgāhārādivisesehi paricchedakārikāya paññāya paricchijja gahitā, tathevetaṃ ^a^V2.0042^ea^ ñāṇaṃ paricchijja gaṇhātīti imassa atthassa dīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. paraviññāṇaviññātāpi vā nivutthāti sambandho. na kevalaṃ attanova viññāṇena, atha kho paresaṃ viññāṇena viññātāpi vāti attho. idhāpi ``paricchinnā''ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ ``paresampi vā viññāṇena viññātā paricchinnā''ti. tassa ca gahaṇe payojanaṃ vuttanayeneva vattabbaṃ. te ca kho yasmā abhītāsu eva jātīsu aññehi viññātā paricchinnā, te ca parinibbutāpi honti. ye hi te viññātā, tesaṃ tadā vattamānasantānānusārena tesampi atīte pavatti ñāyatīti sikhāppattaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa visayabhūtaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``chinnavaṭumakānussaraṇādīsū''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. chinnavaṭumakā sammāsambuddhā, tesaṃ anussaraṇā ^b^chinnavaṭumakānussaraṇaṃ. ādi^eb^-saddena paccekasambuddhabuddhasāvakānussaraṇāni gayhantīti vadanti. chinnavaṭumakā pana sabbeva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā ^a^M2.0045^ea^ parinibbutā. tesaṃ anussaraṇaṃ nāma tesaṃ paṭipattiyā anussaraṇaṃ, sā pana paṭipatti saṅkhepato chaḷārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇāti tāni idha paraviññāṇaviññātaggahaṇena gahitāni, te panete sammāsambuddhānaṃyeva visayā, na aññesanti āha ^b^``te buddhānaṃyeva labbhantī''^eb^ti. na hi atīte buddhā bhagavanto evaṃ vipassiṃsu, evaṃ maggaṃ bhāvesuṃ, evaṃ phalanibbānāni sacchākaṃsu, evaṃ veneyye vinesunti ettha sabbadā aññesaṃ ñāṇassa gati atthīti. yāya satiyā pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati, sā pubbenivāsānussatīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^anekavidha^eb^nti nānābhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsādivasena bahuvidhaṃ. ^b^pakārehī^eb^ti nāmagottādiākārehi saddhiṃ, sahayoge cetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^pavattitaṃ^eb^ desanāvasena. tenāha ^b^``saṃvaṇṇita''^eb^nti, vitthāritanti attho. ^b^``nivāsa''^eb^nti antogadhabhedasāmaññavacanametanti te bhede byāpanicchāvasena saṅgahetvā dassento ^b^``tattha tattha nivutthasantāna''^eb^nti āha. sāvakassevetaṃ anussaraṇaṃ, na satthunoti vuttaṃ ^b^``khandhapaṭipāṭivasena cutipaṭisandhivasena vā''^eb^ti. ^b^khandhapaṭipāṭi^eb^ khandhānaṃ anukkamo. sā ca kho cutito paṭṭhāya uppaṭipāṭivasena. keci panettha ``iriyāpathapaṭipāṭi khandhapaṭipāṭī''ti vadanti. ^b^anugantvā anugantvā^eb^ti ñāṇagatiyā anugantvā anugantvā. ^b^titthiyā^eb^ti aññatitthiyā, te pana kammavādino kiriyavādino tāpasādayo. ṭhapetvā aggasāvakamahāsāvake itare satthu sāvakā ^b^pakatisāvakā^eb^.

[03] yasmā titthiyānaṃ brahmajālādīsu cattālīsāya eva saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭānaṃ anussaraṇaṃ āgataṃ, tasmā ^a^V2.0043^ea^ ``na tato para''nti vatvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ vadanto ^b^``dubbalapaññattā''^eb^tiādimāha, tena vipassanābhiyogo pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa visesakāraṇanti dasseti. ^b^balavapaññattā^eb^ti ettha nāmarūpaparicchedādiyeva paññāya balavakāraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. tañhettha nesaṃ sādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ. ^b^ettako^eb^ti kappānaṃ lakkhaṃ, tadadhikaṃ ekaṃ, dve ca asaṅkhyeyyānīti kālavasena evaṃparimāṇo yathākkamaṃ tesaṃ mahāsāvakāggasāvakapaccekabuddhānaṃ puññañāṇābhinīhāro sāvakapaccekabodhipāramitā samitā. yadi bodhisambhārasambharaṇakālaparicchinno tesaṃ tesaṃ ariyānaṃ abhiññāñāṇavibhāgo, evaṃ sante ^a^M2.0046^ea^ buddhānampi visayaparicchedatā āpannāti āha ^b^``buddhānaṃ pana paricchedo nāma natthī''^eb^ti. ``yāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñāṇa''nti (mahāni0 156; cūḷani0 mogharājamāṇavapucchāniddesa 85; paṭi0 ma0 3.5) vacanato sabbaññutaññāṇassa viya buddhānaṃ abhiññāñāṇānampi visaye paricchedo nāma natthi. tattha yaṃ yaṃ ñātuṃ icchanti, taṃ taṃ jānanti eva. atha vā satipi kālaparicchede kāraṇūpāyakosallapariggahādinā sātisayattā mahābodhisambhārānaṃ paññāpāramitāya pavattiānubhāvassa paricchedo nāma natthi, kuto tannibbattānaṃ abhiññāñāṇānanti āha ^b^``buddhānaṃ pana paricchedo nāma natthī''^eb^ti. atīte ettakāni kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānīti evaṃ kālaparicchedo nāma natthi, anāgate anāgataṃsañāṇassa viya.

[03] evaṃ channaṃ janānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ kālavibhāgato dassetvā idāni ārammaṇaggahaṇato ānubhāvavisesato, pavattiākārato ca dassetuṃ ^b^``titthiyā cā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^cutipaṭisandhivasenā^eb^ti attano, parassa vā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve cutiṃ disvā antarā kiñci anāmasitvā paṭisandhiyā eva gahaṇavasena. vuttamevatthaṃ byatirekato, anvayato ca vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``tesañhī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. pakatisāvakā cutipaṭisandhivasenapi saṅkamantīti ayamattho heṭṭhā vuttanayena ``balavapaññattā''ti hetunā vibhāvetabbo, cutipaṭisandhivasena saṅkamanaṃ vemajjhadassane payojanābhāvato. ñāṇabaladassanatthaṃ panettha vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^taṃ taṃ pākaṭamevā^eb^ti yathā nāma saradasamaye ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ caturatanike gehe cakkhumato purisassa rūpagataṃ supākaṭameva hotīti lokasiddhametaṃ, siyā pana tassa sukhumataratirohitādibhedassa rūpagatassa agocaratā. nattheva buddhānaṃ ñātuṃ icchitassa ñeyyassa agocaratā, atha kho taṃ ñāṇālokena obhāsitaṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya supākaṭaṃ suvibhūtameva ^a^V2.0044^ea^ hoti tathā ñeyyāvaraṇassa supahīnattā. ^b^peyyālapāḷiṃ viya saṅkhipitvā^eb^ti yathā peyyālapāḷiṃ paṭhantā ``paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ...pe0... pañcamaṃ jhāna''nti ādipariyosānameva gaṇhantā saṅkhipitvā sajjhāyanti, na anupadaṃ, evaṃ anekāpi kappakoṭiyo saṅkhipitvā. ^b^yaṃ yaṃ icchantī^eb^ti yasmiṃ kappe, yasmiṃ bhave yaṃ ^a^M2.0047^ea^ yaṃ jānituṃ icchanti, tattha tattheva ñātuṃ icchite eva ñāṇena ^b^okkamantā. sīhokkantavasena^eb^ sīhagatipatanavasena ñāṇagatiyā ^b^gacchanti^eb^. satadhā bhinnassa vāḷassa koṭiyā koṭipaṭipādanavasena ^b^katavālavedhaparicayassa. sarabhaṅgasadisassā^eb^ti sarabhaṅgabodhisattasadisassa (jā0 2.17.50 ādayo). lakkhaṭṭhānassa appattavasena ^b^na sajjati^eb^. atikkamanapassagamanavasena ^b^na virajjhati^eb^.

[03] ^b^khajjupanakappabhāsadisaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātī^eb^ti ñāṇassa ativiya appānubhāvatāya khajjotobhāsasamaṃ hutvā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti. esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^dīpappabhāsadisa^eb^nti pākatikadīpālokasadisaṃ. ^b^ukkāpabhā^eb^ mahāummukāloko. ^b^osadhitārakappabhā^eb^ti ussannā pabhā etāya dhīyatīti osadhi, osadhīnaṃ vā anubalappadāyikattā osadhīti evaṃ laddhanāmāya tārakāya pabhā. ^b^saradasūriyamaṇḍalasadisaṃ^eb^ savisaye sabbaso andhakāravidhamanato.

[03] ^b^yaṭṭhikoṭigamanaṃ viya^eb^ khandhapaṭipāṭiyā amuñcanato. kunnadīnaṃ atikkamanāya ekeneva rukkhadaṇḍena katasaṅkamo ^b^daṇḍakasetu^eb^. catūhi, pañcahi vā janehi gantuṃ sakkuṇeyyo phalake attharitvā āṇiyo koṭṭetvā katasaṅkamo ^b^jaṅghasetu^eb^. jaṅghasatthassa gamanayoggo saṅkamo jaṅghasetu jaṅghamaggo viya. sakaṭassa gamanayoggo saṅkamo ^b^sakaṭasetu^eb^ sakaṭamaggo viya. mahatā jaṅghasatthena gantabbamaggo ^b^mahājaṅghamaggo^eb^. bahūhi vīsāya vā tiṃsāya vā sakaṭehi ekajjhaṃ gantabbamaggo ^b^mahāsakaṭamaggo^eb^.
[03] ^b^imasmiṃ pana adhikāre^eb^ti ``cittaṃ paññañca bhāvaya''nti (saṃ0 ni0 1.23, 192; peṭako0 22; mi0 pa0 2.1.9) cittasīsena sāvakassa niddiṭṭhasamādhibhāvanādhikāre.

[03] 403^b^.^eb^ ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā sāvakānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ idhādhippetaṃ, tasmā. ^b^eva^eb^nti yathā te anussaranti, evaṃ anussaritukāmena. heṭṭhā tīsu jhānesu yathārahaṃ pītisukhehi kāyacittānaṃ ^a^V2.0045^ea^ sampīnanāya ^b^``cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitvā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, aññathā pādakajjhānameva samāpajjitabbaṃ siyā. yāya nisajjāya nisinnassa anussaraṇārambho, sā idha ^b^sabbapacchimā nisajjā. tato āsanapaññāpana^eb^nti tato nisajjāya purimakaṃ āsanapaññāpanaṃ āvajjitabbanti sambandho. esa nayo sesesupi ^a^M2.0048^ea^. ^b^bhojanakālo^eb^tiādīsu kālasīsena tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle katakiccamāha. ^b^cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇavandanakālo^eb^ti cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇesu cetiyabodhīnaṃ vandanakālo. ^b^sakalaṃ rattindiva^eb^nti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ.

[03] ^b^kiñci^eb^ kiccaṃ. ^b^ettakenā^eb^ti pādakajjhānasamāpajjanena. pādakajjhānañhi satthakassa viya nisānasilā satipaññānampi nisitabhāvāvahaṃ. yaṃ tassa, tā taṃ samāpajjanena paramanepakkappattā honti. tenāha ^b^``dīpe jalite viya pākaṭaṃ hotī''^eb^ti, andhakāraṭṭhāneti adhippāyo. ^b^purimabhave^eb^ti imassa bhavassa anantare purimasmiṃ bhave. ^b^pavattitanāmarūpa^eb^nti attano paccayehi pavattitanāmarūpaṃ. tañca kho paṭhamaṃ rūpaṃ āvajjitvā nāmaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ. paṭhamaṃ nāmaṃ āvajjitvā pacchā rūpanti apare. ^b^pahotī^eb^ti sakkoti. ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ nāma imissā abhiññābhāvanāya katādhikāro.

[03] ^b^``aññaṃ uppanna''^eb^nti idaṃ aññasmā kammabhavā añño upapattibhavo uppannoti katvā vuttaṃ addhāpaccuppannantarabhāvato. aññathā ekabhavepi aññamaññameva nāmarūpaṃ uppajjati, niruddhañca appaṭisandhikaṃ. tenevāha --
[21] ``ye niruddhā marantassa, tiṭṭhamānassa vā idha.
[22] sabbepi sadisā khandhā, gatā appaṭisandhikā''ti.. (mahāni0 39).
[03] ^b^taṃ ṭhāna^eb^nti taṃ nikkhepaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^āhundarika^eb^nti samantato, upari ca ghanasañchannaṃ sambādhaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^andhatamamivā^eb^ti andhakāratimisā viya.

[03] ^b^kūṭāgārakaṇṇikatthāyā^eb^ti kūṭāgārassa kūṭatthāya. kūṭāgārassa kaṇṇikā viya pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ, mahārukkho viya purimabhave cutikkhaṇe pavattanāmarūpaṃ, sākhāpalāsā viya tena sambandhaṃ imasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhicittaṃ, pharasudhārā viya parikammabhāvanā ^a^V2.0046^ea^, kammārasālā viya pādakajjhānanti evaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^kaṭṭhaphālakopamāpi^eb^ ``yathā nāma balavā puriso odanapacanādiatthaṃ mahantaṃ dāruṃ phālento tassa tacapheggumattaphālane pharasudhārāya vipannāya mahantaṃ dāruṃ phāletuṃ asakkonto dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā''tiādinā vuttanayānusārena veditabbā. tathā ^b^kesohārakūpamā^eb^.

[03] ^b^pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0049^ea^ ^b^nāma na hoti^eb^ atītāsu jātīsu nivutthadhammārammaṇattābhāvā. ^b^ta^eb^nti pacchimanisajjato pabhuti yāva paṭisandhi pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa parikammabhāvena pavattasamādhinā sampayuttañāṇaṃ ^b^parikammasamādhiñāṇaṃ. taṃ rūpāvacaraṃ sandhāya na yujjatī^eb^ti taṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ atītaṃsañāṇaṃ ce, rūpāvacaraṃ adhippetaṃ na yujjati parikammasamādhiñāṇassa kāmāvacarabhāvato. na hi anantaracuticittassa orato pavattikkhandhe ārabbha rūpāvacaraṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti pāḷiyaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vā āgataṃ atthi. yesaṃ javanānaṃ purimānīti yojanā. yadā pana appanācittaṃ hoti, tadāssāti sambandho. ^b^idaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ nāmā^eb^ti kāmaṃ anantarassa bhavassa cutikkhaṇe pavattitanāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattañāṇaṃ dassitaṃ, taṃ pana nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ñāṇasāmaññassa jotitabhāvato. yatheva hi tato nāmarūpato pabhuti sabbe atītā khandhā, khandhapaṭibaddhā ca sabbo pubbenivāso, evaṃ tassa paṭivijjhanavasena pavattañāṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ. tenāha ^b^``tena ñāṇena sampayuttāya satiyā anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussaratī''^eb^ti.

[03] 404^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekampi jāti^eb^nti ekampi bhavaṃ. so hi ekakammanibbatto ādānanikkhepaparicchinno antogadhadhammappabhedo khandhappabandho idha jātīti adhippeto. tenāha ^b^``ekampi...pe0... khandhasantāna''^eb^nti. ^b^parihāyamāno^eb^ti khīyamāno vinassamāno. ^b^kappo^eb^ti asaṅkhyeyyakappo. so pana atthato kālo, tadā pavattamānasaṅkhāravasenassa parihāni veditabbā. ^b^vaḍḍhamāno vivaṭṭakappo^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. yo pana ``kālaṃ khepetī''ti, ``kālo ghasati bhūtāni, sabbāneva sahattanā''ti (jā0 1.2.190) ca ādīsu kālassāpi khayo vuccati, so idha nādhippeto aniṭṭhappasaṅgato. saṃvaṭṭanaṃ vinassanaṃ saṃvaṭṭo, saṃvaṭṭato uddhaṃ tathā ṭhāyī ^b^saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī. taṃmūlakattā^eb^ti taṃpubbakattā. vivaṭṭanaṃ nibbattanaṃ, vaḍḍhanaṃ vā ^b^vivaṭṭo^eb^.

[03] tejosaṃvaṭṭo āposaṃvaṭṭo vāyosaṃvaṭṭoti evaṃ saṃvaṭṭasīmānukkamena saṃvaṭṭesu vattabbesu tathā ^a^V2.0047^ea^ avatvā ^b^``āposaṃvaṭṭo^eb^ ^b^tejosaṃvaṭṭo^eb^ ^a^M2.0050^ea^ ^b^vāyosaṃvaṭṭo''^eb^ti vacanaṃ saṃvaṭṭakamahābhūtadesanānupubbiyāti keci. saṃvaṭṭānupubbiyāti apare. āpena saṃvaṭṭo ^b^āposaṃvaṭṭo. saṃvaṭṭasīmā^eb^ti saṃvaṭṭamariyādā.
[03] ^b^saṃvaṭṭatī^eb^ti vinassati. ^b^sadā^eb^ti sabbakālaṃ, tīsupi saṃvaṭṭakālesūti attho.

[03] ``ekaṃ buddhakhetta''nti idha yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, taṃ niyametvā dassetuṃ ^b^``buddhakhettaṃ nāma tividha''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. yattake ṭhāne tathāgatassa paṭisandhiñāṇānubhāvo puññaphalasamuttejito saraseneva pathavī vijambhati, taṃ sabbampi buddhaṅkurassa nibbattanakhettaṃ nāmāti āha ^b^``jātikhettaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷapariyanta''^eb^nti. ^b^ānubhāvo vattatī^eb^ti idha iddhimā cetovasippatto āṇākhettapariyāpanne yattha katthaci cakkavāḷe ṭhatvā attano atthāya parittaṃ katvā tattheva aññaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ gatopi kataparitto eva hoti. atha vā tattha ekacakkavāḷe ṭhatvā sabbasattānaṃ atthāya paritte kate āṇākhette sabbasattānaṃ abhisambhuṇātveva parittānubhāvo tattha devatāhi parittāṇāya sampaṭicchitabbato. yaṃ visayakhettaṃ sandhāya ekasmiṃyeva khaṇe sarena abhiviññāpanaṃ, attano rūpadassanañca paṭijānantena bhagavatā ``yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyā''ti (a0 ni0 3.81) vuttaṃ. ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yasmiṃ anantāparimāṇe visayakhette. ^b^yaṃ yaṃ tathāgato ākaṅkhati, taṃ taṃ jānāti^eb^ ākaṅkhāmattapaṭibaddhavuttitāya buddhañāṇassa. ^b^saṇṭhahanta^eb^nti vivaṭṭamānaṃ jāyamānaṃ.
[03] 405^b^.^eb^ ^b^gokhāyitakamattesū^eb^ti gohi khāditabbappamāṇesu. ^b^ya^eb^nti yasmiṃ samaye. pupphaphalūpajīviniyo ca devatā brahmaloke nibbattantīti sambandho.

[03] ^b^etesa^eb^nti ``vassūpajīvino''tiādinā vuttasattānaṃ. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti brahmaloke. so ca kho parittābhādibrahmaloko veditabbo. ``paṭiladdhajjhānavasenā''ti vatvā jhānappaṭilābhassa sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``tadā hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. lokaṃ byūhenti sampiṇḍentīti ^b^lokabyūhā^eb^. te kira disvā manussā tattha tattha ṭhitāpi nisinnāpi saṃvegajātā, sambhamappattā ^a^M2.0051^ea^ ca hutvā tesaṃ āsanne ṭhāne sannipatanti. sikhābandhassa muttatāya ^b^muttasirā^eb^. ito cito ca vidhūyamānakesatāya ^b^vikiṇṇakesā^eb^. lokavināsabhayena sokavantacittatāya ^b^ativiya virūpavesadhārino. mārisā^eb^ti devānaṃ ^a^V2.0048^ea^ piyasamudācāro. kathaṃ panete kappavuṭṭhānaṃ jānantīti? dhammatāya sañcoditāti ācariyā. tādisanimittadassanenāti eke. brahmadevatāhi uyyojitāti apare.

[03] ^b^mettādīnī^eb^ti mettāmanasikārādīni kāmāvacarapuññāni. ^b^devaloke^eb^ti kāmadevaloke. devānaṃ kira sukhasamphassavātaggahaṇaparicayena vāyokasiṇe jhānāni sukheneva ijjhanti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā jhānaṃ paṭilabhantī''^eb^ti. ^b^tadaññe panā^eb^ti āpāyike sandhāyāha. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti devaloke.

[03] ^b^dutiyo sūriyo^eb^ti dutiyaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ. ^b^sattasūriya^eb^nti sattasūriyapātubhāvasuttaṃ. ^b^pakatisūriye^eb^ti kappavuṭṭhānakālato pubbe uppannasūriyavimāne. kappavuṭṭhānakāle pana yathā aññe kāmāvacaradevā, evaṃ sūriyadevaputtopi jhānaṃ nibbattetvā brahmalokaṃ upapajjati, sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ pana pabhassaratarañceva tejavantatarañca hutvā pavattati. taṃ antaradhāyitvā aññameva uppajjatīti apare. gaṅgā yamunā sarabhū aciravatī mahīti imā ^b^pañca mahānadiyo^eb^.
[03] ^b^pabhavā^eb^ti uppattiṭṭhānabhūtā. ^b^haṃsapātano^eb^ti mandākinimāha.
[03] ^b^na saṇṭhātī^eb^ti na tiṭṭhati.

[03] ^b^pariyādinnasineha^eb^nti parikkhīṇasinehaṃ. yāya āpodhātuyā tattha tattha pathavīdhātu ābandhattā sampiṇḍatā hutvā tiṭṭhati, sā chasūriyapātubhāvena parikkhayaṃ gacchati. ^b^yathā cida^eb^nti yathā ca idaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ. ^b^evaṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷānipī^eb^ti vipattimahāmeghuppattito paṭṭhāya idha vuttaṃ sabbaṃ kappavuṭṭhānaṃ, taṃ tattha atidisati.

[03] ^b^palujjitvā^eb^ti chijjitvā. ^b^saṅkhāragata^eb^nti bhūtupādāyappabhedaṃ saṅkhārajātaṃ. ^b^sabbasaṅkhāraparikkhayā^eb^ti jhāpetabbasaṅkhāraparikkhayā. sayampi saṅkhāragataṃ samānaṃ indhanābhāvato chārikampi asesetvā niḍḍahitvā vūpasamatīti āha ^b^``sappi...pe0... nibbāyatī''^eb^ti.

[03] 406^b^.^eb^ ^b^dīghassa^eb^ ^a^M2.0052^ea^ ^b^addhuno^eb^ti saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyīasaṅkhyeyyakappasaṅkhātassa dīghassa kālassa accayena ^a^V2.0049^ea^. ^b^tālakkhandhādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena sākasālādirukkhe saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^ghanaṃ karotī^eb^ti visarituṃ adatvā piṇḍitaṃ karoti. tenāha ^b^``parivaṭuma''^eb^nti, vaṭṭabhāvena paricchinnaṃ. ^b^ta^eb^nti udakaṃ. ^b^assā^eb^ti vātassa. ^b^vivaraṃ detī^eb^ti yathā ghanaṃ karoti sampiṇḍeti, evaṃ tattha antaraṃ deti. ^b^parikkhayamāna^eb^nti pubbe yāva brahmalokā ekoghabhūtena vātena parisosiyamānatāya parikkhayaṃ gacchantaṃ. brahmaloko pātubhavatīti yojanā. ^b^brahmaloko^eb^ti ca paṭhamajjhānabhūmimāha. ^b^upari catukāmāvacaradevalokaṭṭhāne^eb^ti yāmadevalokādīnaṃ catunnaṃ patiṭṭhānaṭṭhāne. cātumahārājikatāvatiṃsabhavanānaṃ pana patiṭṭhānaṭṭhānāni pathavīsambandhatāya na tāva pātubhavanti.
[03] ^b^rundhantī^eb^ti yathā heṭṭhā na bhassati, evaṃ nirodhenti.

[03] ^b^``paṭhamatarābhinibbattā''^eb^ti idaṃ āyukkhayassa sambhavadassanaṃ, tena dvinnaṃ, catunnaṃ, aṭṭhannaṃ vā kappānaṃ ādimhi nibbattāti dasseti. ^b^tato^eb^ti ābhassarabrahmalokato. parittābhāppamāṇābhāpi hi ābhassaraggahaṇeneva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti. ^b^``te honti sayaṃpabhā antalikkhacarā''^eb^ti idaṃ upacārajjhānapuññassa mahānubhāvatāya vuttaṃ. ^b^āluppakāraka^eb^nti ālopaṃ katvā katvāti vadanti, āluppanaṃ vilopaṃ katvāti attho.
[03] ^b^haṭṭhatuṭṭhā^eb^ti ativiya haṭṭhā uppilāvitacittā. ^b^nāmaṃ karontī^eb^ti tathā voharanti.
[03] ^b^sinerucakkavāḷahimavantapabbatā^eb^ti ettha dīpasamuddāpīti vattabbaṃ. tathā hi vakkhati ``ninnaninnaṭṭhāne samuddā, samasamaṭṭhāne dīpā''ti. ^b^thūpathūpā^eb^ti unnatunnatā.

[03] ^b^atimaññantī^eb^ti atikkamitvā maññanti, hīḷentīti attho. ^b^teneva nayenā^eb^ti ``ekacce vaṇṇavanto hontī''tiādinā (dī0 ni0 3.123) vuttena nayeneva. ^b^padālatā^eb^ti evaṃnāmikā latājāti. tassā kira pārāsavajāti gaḷocīti vadanti. akaṭṭhe eva bhūmippadese paccanako ^b^akaṭṭhapāko. akaṇo^eb^ti kuṇḍakarahito.

[03] sumanasaṅkhātajātipupphasadiso ^a^M2.0053^ea^ ^b^sumanajātipupphasadiso^eb^. yo yo raso etassāti yaṃyaṃraso, odano, taṃ ^b^yaṃyaṃrasaṃ,^eb^ yādisarasavantanti attho. rasapathavī, bhūmipappaṭako, padālatā ca ^a^V2.0050^ea^ paribhuttā sudhāhāro viya khuddaṃ vinodetvā rasaharaṇīhi rasameva brūhentā tiṭṭhanti, na vatthuno sukhumabhāvena nissandā, sukhumabhāveneva gahaṇindhanameva ca honti. odano pana paribhutto rasaṃ vaḍḍhentopi vatthuno oḷārikabhāvena nissandaṃ vissajjento passāvaṃ, kasaṭañca uppādetīti āha ^b^``tato pabhuti muttakarīsaṃ sañjāyatī''^eb^ti. purimattabhāvesu pavattaupacārajjhānānubhāvena yāva sattasantāne kāmarāgavikkhambhanavego na samito, na tāva balavakāmarāgūpanissayāni itthipurisindriyāni pāturahesuṃ. yadā panassa vicchinnatāya balavakāmarāgo laddhāvasaro ahosi, tadā tadupanissayāni tāni sattānaṃ attabhāvesu sañjāyiṃsu. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``purisassa...pe0... pātubhavatī''^eb^ti. tenevāha ^b^``tatra suda''^eb^ntiādi.
[03] ^b^alasajātikassā^eb^ti sajjukameva taṇḍulaṃ aggahetvā paradivasassatthāya gahaṇena alasapakatikassa.

[03] ^b^anutthunantī^eb^ti anusocanti. ^b^sammanneyyāmā^eb^ti samanujāneyyāma. ^b^no^eb^ti amhesu. ^b^sammā^eb^ti sammadeva yathārahaṃ. ^b^khīyitabba^eb^nti khīyanārahaṃ nindanīyaṃ. ^b^garahitabba^eb^nti hīḷetabbaṃ.
[03] ayameva bhagavā paṭibalo paggahaniggahaṃ kātunti yojanā. ^b^rañjetī^eb^ti saṅgahavatthūhi sammadeva rameti pīṇeti.
[03] ^b^vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīasaṅkhyeyyaṃ^eb^ catusaṭṭhiantarakappasaṅgahaṃ. vīsatiantarakappasaṅgahanti keci. sesāsaṅkhyeyyāni kālato tena samappamāṇāneva.

[03] 407^b^.^eb^ ^b^mahādhārāhī^eb^ti tālasālakkhandhappamāṇāhi mahatīhi khārudakadhārāhi. ^b^samantato^eb^ti sabbaso. ^b^pathavito^eb^ti pathaviyā heṭṭhimantato pabhuti. tena hi khārudakena phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhā pathavīpabbatādayo udake ^a^M2.0054^ea^ pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya vilīyanteva, tasmā pathavīsandhārudakena saddhiṃ ekūdakameva taṃ hotīti keci. apare ``pathavīsandhārakaṃ udakakkhandhañca udakasandhārakaṃ vāyukkhandhañca anavasesato vināsetvā sabbattha sayameva ekoghabhūtaṃ tiṭṭhatī''ti vadanti, taṃ yuttaṃ. ^b^tayopi brahmaloke^eb^ti parittābhāppamāṇābhāabhassarabrahmaloke, tayidaṃ ``ayaṃ pana viseso''ti āraddhattā vuttaṃ, aññathā ``chapi brahmaloke''ti vattabbaṃ siyā. ^b^subhakiṇhe^eb^ti ukkaṭṭhaniddesena ^a^V2.0051^ea^ tatiyajjhānabhūmiyā upalakkhaṇaṃ. parittāsubhāppamāṇāsubhepi hi āhacca udakaṃ tiṭṭhati. heṭṭhā ``ābhassare āhacca tiṭṭhatī''ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ kappavināsakaudakaṃ. ^b^udakānugata^eb^nti udakena anugataṃ phuṭṭhaṃ. ^b^abhibhavitvā^eb^ti vilīyāpetvā.
[03] ^b^idamekaṃ asaṅkhyeyya^eb^nti idaṃ saṃvaṭṭasaṅkhātaṃ kappassa ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ.

[03] 408^b^.^eb^ thūlaraje apagate eva pathavīnissitaṃ saṇharajaṃ apagacchatīti vuttaṃ ^b^``tato saṇharaja''^eb^nti. samuṭṭhāpetīti sambandho. ^b^``visamaṭṭhāne ṭhitamahārukkhe''^eb^ti idaṃ paṭhamaṃ samuṭṭhāpetabbataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^cakkavāḷapabbatampi sinerupabbatampī^eb^ti mahāpathaviyā viparivattaneneva viparivattitaṃ cakkavāḷapabbatampi sinerupabbatampi vāto ukkhipitvā ākāse khipati. ^b^te^eb^ cakkavāḷapabbatādayo. ^b^abhihantvā^eb^ti ghaṭṭetvā. ^b^aññamañña^eb^nti ekissā lokadhātuyā cakkavāḷahimavantasineruṃ aññissā lokadhātuyā cakkavāḷādīhīti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ samāgamavasena ghaṭṭetvā. ^b^sabbasaṅkhāragata^eb^nti pathavīsandhārakaudakaṃ, taṃsandhārakavātanti sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ vināsetvā sayampi vinassati avaṭṭhānassa kāraṇābhāvato.

[03] 409^b^.^eb^ yadipi saṅkhārānaṃ ahetuko sarasanirodho vināsakābhāvato, santānanirodho pana hetuvirahito natthi yathā taṃ sattakāyesūti. bhājanalokassāpi sahetukena vināsena bhavitabbanti hetuṃ pucchati ^b^``kiṃ kāraṇā evaṃ loko vinassatī''^eb^ti. itaro yathā tattha nibbattanakasattānaṃ puññabalena paṭhamaṃ loko vivaṭṭati, evaṃ tesaṃ pāpabalena saṃvaṭṭatīti dassento ^b^``akusalamūlakāraṇā''^eb^ti āha. yathā hi rāgadosamohānaṃ adhikabhāvena yathākkamaṃ rogantarakappo, satthantarakappo, dubbhikkhantarakappoti ime tividhā ^a^M2.0055^ea^ antarakappā vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyimhi asaṅkhyeyyakappe jāyanti, evamete yathāvuttā tayo saṃvaṭṭā rāgādīnaṃ adhikabhāveneva hontīti dassento ^b^``akusalamūlesu hī''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^ussannatare^eb^ti ativiya ussanne. dose ussannatare adhikataradosena viya tikkhatarena khārudakena vināso yuttoti vuttaṃ ^b^``dose ussannatare udakena vinassatī''^eb^ti. pākaṭasattusadisassa dosassa aggisadisatā, apākaṭasattusadisassa rāgassa khārudakasadisatā ca yuttāti adhippāyena ^b^``dose ussannatare agginā, rāge ussannatare udakenā''^eb^ti ^a^V2.0052^ea^ kecivādassa adhippāyo veditabbo. rāgo sattānaṃ bahulaṃ pavattatīti rāgavasena bahuso lokavināso.
[03] 410^b^.^eb^ evaṃ pasaṅgena saṃvaṭṭādike pakāsetvā idāni yathādhikataṃ nesaṃ anussaraṇākāraṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``pubbenivāsaṃ anussarantopī''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ.

[03] ^b^``amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe''^eb^ti idaṃ saṃvaṭṭakappassa ādito ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (dī0 ni0 1.244) gahitattā vuttaṃ. tatthāpi hi imassa katipayaṃ kālaṃ bhavādīsu saṃsaraṇaṃ upalabbhatīti. saṃvaṭṭakappe vā vaṭṭamānesu bhavādīsu imassa upapatti ahosi, taṃdassanametaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. atha vā ^b^amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappe^eb^ti ettha ^b^vā^eb^-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho daṭṭhabbo, tena ca aniyamatthena itarāsaṅkhyeyyānampi saṅgaho siddho hoti. ^b^bhave vā^eb^tiādīsu kāmādibhave vā aṇḍajādi^b^yoniyā vā^eb^ devādi ^b^gatiyā vā^eb^ nānattakāyanānattasaññīādi^b^viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā vā sattāvāse vā^eb^ khattiyādi ^b^sattanikāye vā. āsi^eb^nti ahosiṃ. ^b^vaṇṇasampattiṃ vā^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddena vaṇṇavipattiṃ vāti dasseti.

[03] ^b^sālimaṃsodanāhāro vā^eb^ gihikāle. ^b^pavattaphalabhojano vā^eb^ tāpasādikāle. ^b^sāmisā^eb^ gehassitā somanassādayo. ^b^nirāmisā^eb^ nekkhammassitā. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena vivekajasamādhijasukhādīnaṃ saṅgaho.

[03] ``amutrāsi''ntiādinā sabbaṃ yāvadicchakaṃ anussaraṇaṃ dassetvā idāni aññathā atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^amutrāsi^eb^nti sāmaññaniddesoyaṃ, byāpanicchālopo vā, amutra amutrāsinti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^anupubbena ārohantassa yāvadicchakaṃ anussaraṇa^eb^nti ettha ^a^M2.0056^ea^ ^b^ārohantassā^eb^ti paṭilomato ñāṇena pubbenivāsaṃ ārohantassa. ^b^paccavekkhaṇa^eb^nti anussaritānussaritassa paccavekkhaṇaṃ, na anussaraṇaṃ. ^b^itī^eb^ti vuttatthanidassanaṃ. tañca kho yathārahato, na yathānupubbatoti dassento ^b^``nāmagottavasenā''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^vaṇṇādīhī^eb^ti vaṇṇāhāravedayitāyuparicchedehi. ^b^odātotī^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā, tena evamādi evaṃpakāra^b^nānattato^eb^ti dassitaṃ hoti.
[06] pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
