[03] ^b^atimahanta^eb^nti soḷasacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ. tattha hi tadārammaṇacittaṃ uppajjati, na aññattha. ^b^vibhūta^eb^nti supākaṭaṃ, tañca kāmāvacarameva. tattha hi tadārammaṇassa uppatti. ^b^kāmāvacarajavanāvasāne^eb^ti kāmāvacarajavanasseva avasāne. na hi taṃ kāmataṇhāhetukakammanibbattaṃ mahaggatānuttarajavanaṃ anubandhati ajanakattā, janakāsadisattā ca. yathā gehato bahi gantukāmo taruṇadārako janakaṃ, janakasadisaṃ vā anubandhati, na aññaṃ, evamidampi ^a^V2.0125^ea^. tatthāpi na sabbasmā javanā sabbaṃ javanena tadārammaṇassa niyametabbato, ārammaṇena ca vedanāya parivattetabbato. tatthāyaṃ niyamo -- parittakusalalobhamohamūlasomanassasahagatakiriyajavanānaṃ aññatarānantaraṃ atimahati visaye pañcannaṃ somanassasahagatānaṃ aññataraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ uppajjati, tathā parittakusalākusalaupekkhāsahagatakiriyajavanānaṃ aññatarānantaraṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ channaṃ tadārammaṇānaṃ aññataraṃ pavattati. ^b^iṭṭhārammaṇādīna^eb^nti iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattāniṭṭhārammaṇānaṃ vasenāti sambandho. tayidaṃ ārammaṇena vedanāparivattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^``purimakammavasenā''^eb^ti idaṃ tadārammaṇavisesadassanatthaṃ. na ^a^M2.0134^ea^ hi paṭisandhijanakameva kammaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ janeti, atha kho aññakammampi. taṃ pana paṭisandhidāyinā kammena nibbattetabbatadārammaṇato visadisampi nibbattetīti. ^b^``javanacittavasenā''^eb^ti idaṃ tadārammaṇaniyamadassanatthaṃ. ``javanena tadārammaṇaṃ niyametabba''nti hi vuttaṃ. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena paṭisandhicittaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. tañhi attano ukkaṭṭhatarassa tadārammaṇassa paccayo na hoti. ^b^yo yo paccayo laddho hotī^eb^ti yathāvuttesu iṭṭhārammaṇādīsu yo yo tadārammaṇassa uppattiyā paccayo samaveto hoti. ^b^kiñci antara^eb^nti kiñci khaṇantaraṃ. ^b^udakamivā^eb^ti paṭisotaṃ gacchantaṃ udakamiva.

[03] ^b^dvikkhattuṃ sakiṃ vā^eb^ti vacanasiliṭṭhavasena vuttaṃ ``aṭṭha vā dasa vā''tiādīsu (a0 ni0 8.11; pārā0 11) viya. dvikkhattuṃyeva pana vaṇṇenti. vipākacittattā, āvajjanassa ca vidūrattā, mūlabhavaṅgādibhavaṅgasāmaññasabbhāvato ca bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇe pavattanārahaṃ samānaṃ tassa javanassa ārammaṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etassāti tadārammaṇanti vuccati ekassa ārammaṇasaddassa lopaṃ katvā ``kāmāvacaraṃ, oṭṭhamukha''nti ca yathā. ettha ca keci ``paṭṭhāne `kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī'ti (paṭṭhā0 1.1.406) vipākadhammadhammānaṃ eva anantaraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ vutta''nti kiriyājavanānantaraṃ na icchanti. vipphāravantaṃ hi javanaṃ nāvaṃ viya nadīsoto bhavaṅgaṃ anubandhati, na pana chaḷaṅgupekkhāvato santavuttikiriyajavanaṃ paṇṇapuṭaṃ viya nadīsototi. tayidaṃ labbhamānassāpi kenaci adhippāyena katthaci avacanaṃ dissati, yathā taṃ dhammasaṅgahe akusalaniddese labbhamānopi adhipati na vutto. yañca paṇṇapuṭaṃ nidassitaṃ, tampi nidassitabbena na samānaṃ. nāvāpaṇṇapuṭānañhi nadīsotassa āvaṭṭanaṃ, gati ca visadisīti nāvāya nadīsotassa anubandhanaṃ, paṇṇapuṭassa ananubandhanañca yujjati, idha pana kiriyajavanetarajavanānaṃ bhavaṅgasotassa ^a^V2.0126^ea^ āvaṭṭanaṃ, gati ca sadisīti etassa ananubandhanaṃ, itarassa anubandhanañca na yujjati. tasmā vicāretabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^bhavaṅgamevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ bhavapariyosānassa idha na adhippetattā. aññathā tadārammaṇāvasāne cutipi na hotiyeva. ^b^dassanādīnī^eb^ti dassanasavanaghāyanasāyanaphusanāni. ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, tena sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. paṭisandhito bhavaṅgameva, bhavaṅgato āvajjanamevāti ^a^M2.0135^ea^ evaṃ pavatta^b^cittaniyamavaseneva. tampī^eb^ti cuticittampi. paṭisandhibhavaṅgacittāni viya ^b^ekūnavīsatividhameva hoti^eb^ atthato bhedābhāvato.

[03] ^b^bhavagatiṭhitinivāsesū^eb^ti tīsu bhavesu, pañcasu gatīsu, sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu, navasu sattāvāsesu ca. yo panettha acittako, so idha na gahetabbo viññāṇakathābhāvato. ``etthā''ti idaṃ ``saṃsaramānānaṃ sattāna''nti iminā sambandhitabbaṃ. ettha etesu vuttanayena saṃsaramānesu sattesu yo pana arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti sammāpaṭipattimanvāyāti adhippāyo. ^b^tassa^eb^ arahato ^b^niruddhameva hoti^eb^ cittaṃ appaṭisandhikabhāvato.
[06] iti viññāṇakkhandhe vitthārakathāmukhavaṇṇanā.

[03] 456^b^.^eb^ vedena anubhavanākārena ayitaṃ pavattaṃ vedayitaṃ, vedayitanti lakkhitabbadhammajātaṃ ^b^vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. taṃ pana atthato vedanā evāti āha ^b^``vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ nāma vedanāvā''^eb^ti. atha vā vedayitaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti kappanāsiddhaṃ bhedaṃ nissāya aññapadatthasamāsavasenāpi vedanāva vuccatīti āha ^b^``vedayitalakkhaṇaṃ nāma vedanāvā''^eb^ti. ^b^vedayati vedayatī^eb^ti byāpanicchāvasena vacanaṃ vedanāya savisaye abhiṇhappavattidassanatthaṃ. sabhāvadhammato añño kattā natthīti dassanatthaṃ kattuniddeso. ^b^itī^eb^ti aniyamato hetuattho. ^b^kho^eb^ti vacanālaṅkāramattaṃ. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti tassa niyamanaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yasmā yathāpaccayaṃ ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati, tasmā vedanāti vuccatīti.

[01] ^b^``kusalaviññāṇena^eb^ ^a^V2.0127^ea^ ^b^sampayuttā''^eb^ti idaṃ kusalāya vedanāya upalakkhaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. yā kāci kusalā vedanā, sabbā sā kusalena viññāṇena sampayuttāti, na pana tassā kusalabhāvasaṃsiddhidassanatthaṃ. na hi kusalena viññāṇena sampayogato kusalāya vedanāya kusalabhāvo, atha ^a^M2.0136^ea^ kho yonisomanasikārādikato. tenāha ^b^``jātivasenā''^eb^ti. ^b^akusalādīsu^eb^pi eseva nayo. yathā pana jātivasena kusalādiviññāṇasampayuttatāya tividhā, evaṃ yāva ekūnanavutiviññāṇasampayuttāti ekūnanavutividhā veditabbā. ^b^sabhāvabhedato^eb^ti sampayuttabhūmiārammaṇādivasena labbhamānaṃ bhedaṃ aggahetvā kevalaṃ sabhāvakatabhedato evāti attho.

[03] ``pañcavidhā''ti vatvā taṃ pañcavidhataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``sukha''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. tattha sukhayatīti ^b^sukhaṃ,^eb^ kāyaṃ, sampayuttadhamme ca laddhassāde karotīti attho. suṭṭhu vā khādati, khaṇati vā kāyikaṃ ābādhanti ^b^sukhaṃ^eb^. sukaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etassāti ^b^sukha^eb^nti apare. dukkhayatīti ^b^dukkhaṃ,^eb^ kāyaṃ, sampayuttadhamme ca vibādhatīti attho. duṭṭhu vā khādati, khaṇati vā kāyikaṃ assādanti ^b^dukkhaṃ^eb^. dukkaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etassāti ^b^dukkha^eb^nti apare. ^b^somanassupekkhānaṃ^eb^ saddattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. domanassassa somanasse vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ. kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ mānasetarasātāsātavasena sukhaṃ, dukkhañca vibhajitvā vuttaṃ ^b^``sukhaṃ somanassaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassa''^eb^nti, upekkhā pana mānasī, itarā ca ekadhāva vuttāti? bhedābhāvato. yathā hi anuggahūpaghātakatāya sukhadukkhāni aññathā kāyassa anuggahamupaghātañca karonti, aññathā manaso, na evamupekkhā. tasmā bhedābhāvato ekadhāva upekkhā vuttāti.

[03] tattha yena sabhāvabhedena vedanā pañcavidhā, sā pavattiṭṭhāne dassite supākaṭā hotīti pavattiṭṭhānaṃ tāva dassetuṃ ^b^``tatthā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^akusalavipākenā^eb^ti etthāpi ``kāyaviññāṇena sampayutta''nti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. yathā adhikaraṇīmatthake kappāsapicupiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā ayokūṭena paharantassa picupiṇḍaṃ atikkamitvā kūṭaṃ adhikaraṇiṃ gaṇhāti, nighaṃso balavā hoti, evaṃ paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃsassa balavabhāvato iṭṭhe, iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe kāyaviññāṇaṃ sukhasahagataṃ hoti. aniṭṭhe, aniṭṭhamajjhatte ca dukkhasahagatanti āha ^b^``kusala...pe0... dukkha''^eb^nti. kāmāvacaravipākaviññāṇāni pañca kammārammaṇavasena somanassasahagatāni honti, rūpāvacaravipākāni cattāri kammavasena, sesāni terasa kāmāvacarāni, aṭṭha rūpāvacarāni, dvattiṃsa lokuttarāni, yathārahaṃ ^a^M2.0137^ea^ cetobhisaṅkhārārammaṇapādakādivasena ^a^V2.0128^ea^ somanassasahagatāni hontīti āha ^b^``somanassaṃ dvāsaṭṭhiyā viññāṇehi sampayutta''^eb^nti. ^b^domanassaṃ dvīhi^eb^ akusalaviññāṇehi sampayuttaṃ cetobhisaṅkhārārammaṇādivasena.

[03] ^b^avasesapañcapaññāsāyā^eb^ti yathāvuttāni chasaṭṭhi viññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasesāya pañcapaññāsāya. tattha kusalākusalavipākāni iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu nibbikappakāni sukhadukkhasampayuttāni bhavituṃ yuttānipi dvinnaṃ picupiṇḍānaṃ viya dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ upādārūpānaṃ ghaṭṭanānighaṃsassa mandabhāvato cakkhādisannissitāni aṭṭhapi viññāṇāni sabbattha upekkhāsampayuttāneva honti, tathā balavapaccayatāya sukhadukkhānaṃ tesañca tadabhāvato. apubbārammaṇanissayappavattīni āvajjanasampaṭicchanaviññāṇāni, asadisānantarappaccayaṃ kiriyārambhassa ādibhūtaṃ voṭṭhabbanaṃ, kāyadukkhapadhānatāya akusalaphalassa tadupanissayabhūtaṃ akusalavipākapaṭisandhiādi, iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇappavattīni kāmāvacarakusalavipākaviññāṇāni ca upekkhāsahagatāniyeva honti. kammavasena vā vipākānubhavanassa iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇesu adukkhamasukhabhāvo yutto. sati ca vipākabhūtāya upekkhāya sukhadukkhamajjhattabhāve kammārammaṇavasena kusalavipākāya iṭṭhabhāvo, akusalavipākāya aniṭṭhabhāvo ca veditabbo. avasiṭṭhāni pana sattatiṃsa viññāṇāni cetobhisaṅkhārārammaṇapādakādivasena upekkhāsampayuttāni hontīti evaṃ pañcapaññāsāya viññāṇehi upekkhāya sampayuttatā veditabbā.

[03] salakkhaṇaṃ nāma dhammānaṃ anaññasādhāraṇo sabhāvo, anubhavanañca sabbavedanānaṃ sādhāraṇalakkhaṇanti taṃ paṭiniyatena ārammaṇena niyametvā dassento āha ^b^``iṭṭhaphoṭṭhabbānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ sukha''^eb^nti tassa byabhicārābhāvato. bhusaṃ brūhanaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ ^b^upabrūhanaṃ^eb^. tayidaṃ kāmañca cetasikasukhepi labbhati, taṃ pana savikappakaṃ cetobhisaṅkhāravasenāpi hoti. idantu nibbikappakaṃ sabhāvasiddhattā tato sātisayanti āha ^b^``sampayuttānaṃ upabrūhanarasa''^eb^nti. assādiyatīti assādo, sukhāvedanā. tenāha bhagavā ``yaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcupādānakkhandhe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, pañcupādānakkhandhesu assādo''ti ^a^M2.0138^ea^ (saṃ0 ni0 3.26). kāyanissitattā kāye bhavo kāyiko, so eva assādo tathā paccupatiṭṭhatīti ^b^kāyikāssādapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. kāyindriyapadaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ anaññavatthukattā.
[03] dukkhassa lakkhaṇādīni vuttanayānusārena veditabbāni.

[03] sabhāvato ^a^V2.0129^ea^, parikappato vā iṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa anubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ ^b^iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. tenāha ^b^``yathā tathā vā iṭṭhākārasambhogarasa''^eb^nti, yathābhūtena vā ayathābhūtena vā iṭṭhākārena ārammaṇassa ^b^saṃbhuñjanarasaṃ,^eb^ paccanubhavanakiccanti attho. ^b^``passaddhipadaṭṭhāna''^eb^nti idaṃ ``passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedetī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.376; a0 ni0 11.12) suttapadaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ, taṃ pana nirāmisasomanassavasena veditabbaṃ.
[03] somanasse vuttavipariyāyena domanassassa lakkhaṇādīni veditabbāni. domanassassa kāmadhātuyaṃ uppajjanato ekantena hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānatā tato viseso.

[01] majjhattassa, ārammaṇassa majjhattaṃ vā vedayitaṃ anubhavanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti ^b^majjhattavedayitalakkhaṇā^eb^. majjhattānubhavanato eva sampayuttānaṃ ^b^nātiupabrūhanamilāpanarasā. ``santabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā''^eb^ti idaṃ anavajjāya nirāmisāya upekkhāya vasena veditabbaṃ, na sabbāya.
[06] iti vedanākkhandhe vitthārakathāmukhavaṇṇanā.
[03] 457^b^.^eb^ ^b^sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ nāma saññāvā^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ vedanākkhandhaniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03] kāmaṃ vedanāyapi vippayuttaṃ viññāṇaṃ natthi, tassā pana sabhāvato bhinnattā kāyaci vedanāya sampayuttampi kāyaci vippayuttaṃ hoti. saññāya pana īdisaṃ natthīti āha ^b^``na hi taṃ viññāṇaṃ...pe0... saññāyā''^eb^ti.

[01] ^b^sabbāvā^eb^ti catubhūmikāpi. atha vā yathā vedanā bhinnasabhāvattā bhedanalakkhaṇādito vuttā, na evamayaṃ, ayaṃ pana sabbāva sañjānanalakkhaṇā ^a^M2.0139^ea^. nīlādibhedassa ārammaṇassa sañjānanaṃ saññaṃ katvā jānanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti ^b^sañjānanalakkhaṇā^eb^. tathā hi sā abhiññāṇena sañjānanato ^a^V2.0130^ea^ paccābhiññāṇarasāti vuccati. nimittena hi puna sañjānanakiccā ^b^paccābhiññāṇarasā^eb^. tassā vaḍḍhakissa dārumhi abhiññāṇaṃ katvā tena abhiññāṇena paccābhijānanakāle pavatti veditabbā. tenāha ^b^``tadeveta''^eb^ntiādi. puna sañjānanassa paccayo punasañjānanapaccayo, tadeva nimittaṃ puna...pe0... nimittaṃ, tassa karaṇaṃ, puna...pe0... karaṇaṃ, punasañjānanapaccayabhūtaṃ vā nimittakaraṇaṃ puna...pe0... karaṇaṃ, tadassā kiccanti ^b^punasañjānanapaccayanimittakaraṇarasā^eb^. punasañjānananimittakaraṇaṃ nimittakārikāya, nimittena sañjānanantiyā ca sabbāya saññāya samānaṃ yojetabbaṃ. ^b^abhinivesakaraṇaṃ^eb^ ``idameva sacca''nti (ma0 ni0 2.187, 202, 203, 427; ma0 ni0 3.27-29) saññābhinivesamatteneva daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^yathāupaṭṭhitavisayapadaṭṭhānā^eb^ avikappasabhāvattā. ñāṇasampayuttā pana saññā ñāṇameva anuvattati, tasmā abhinivesakārikā, viparītaggāhikā ca na hoti. eteneva samādhisampayuttatāya aciraṭṭhānatā ca na hotīti veditabbā. evaṃ rāgadiṭṭhimānādisampayuttāya saññāya rāgādianuvattikabhāvoti.
[06] iti saññākkhandhe vitthārakathāmukhavaṇṇanā.

[03] 458^b^.^eb^ ^b^rāsikaraṇalakkhaṇa^eb^nti sampiṇḍanalakkhaṇaṃ, tato saṅkhārā āyūhanarasā vuccanti. cetanāpadhānatāya hi saṅkhārakkhandhadhammā evaṃ vuttā. tenevāha ^b^``kiṃ pana tanti saṅkhārāyevā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontī^eb^ti yathā attano phalaṃ saṅkhataṃ sammadeva nipphannaṃ hoti, evaṃ abhisaṅkharontīti attho. ^b^vipphārapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^ti ettha ^b^vipphāro^eb^ nāma vipphāravantatā, tasmā sabyāpārapaccupaṭṭhānāti attho.

[03] tasmiṃ tasmiṃ citte uppanne niyamena uppajjanato ^b^niyatā. sarūpena āgatā^eb^ti evaṃ piṭṭhivattake akatvā pāḷiyā sarūpeneva āgatā. kadācideva uppajjanato na niyatāti ^b^aniyatā^eb^. yadipi aniyatā ekajjhaṃ ^a^M2.0140^ea^ na uppajjanti, tasmiṃ pana citte uppajjanadhammatāya ^b^``chattiṃsā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tenāha ^b^``uppajjamānāpi ca na ekato uppajjantī''^eb^ti.

[03] 459^b^.^eb^ ^b^phusatī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0131^ea^ kattuniddeso. yaṃ tattha kāraṇaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. phusanti etenāti vā ^b^phasso^eb^. sampayuttadhammā hi ārammaṇe pavattamānā taṃ phusanalakkhaṇena phassena phusantā viya honti. ārammaṇaphusanamattaṃ vā ^b^phasso^eb^ti sādhanattayampi yujjateva. sabhāvadhammesu kattukaraṇasādhanavacanaṃ tadākārasamāropanato pariyāyakathā, bhāvasādhanavacanameva nippariyāyakathāti vuttaṃ ^b^``phusanalakkhaṇo''^eb^ti. ^b^ayañhī^eb^tiādi yathāvuttalakkhaṇādisamatthanaṃ. yadi ayaṃ dhammo cetasiko, svāyaṃ arūpadhammo samāno kathaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo, saṅghaṭṭanarasādiko ca hotīti antolīnaṃ codanaṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā tassa sodhanatthaṃ ^b^``arūpadhammopi samāno''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^``phusanākāreneva pavattatī''^eb^ti iminā arūpassāpi tassa dhammassa ayaṃ sabhāvoti dasseti. sā ca tassa phusanākārappavatti ambilāmbapakkādiṃ khādantaṃ passantassa parassa kheḷuppatti, paraṃ vibādhiyamānaṃ disvā dayālukassa sarīrakampanaṃ, rukkhasākhagge duṭṭhitaṃ purisaṃ disvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa bhīrukapurisassa jaṅghacalanaṃ, pisācādibhāyitabbaṃ disvā ūrukhambhoti evamādīsu paribyattā hoti.

[01] ^b^ekadesenā^eb^ti kaṭṭhadvayādi viya attano ekapassena. ^b^anallīyamānopī^eb^ti asaṃsiliyamānopi. rūpasaddehi saha phassassa sāmaññaṃ anallīyamānasaṅghaṭṭanameva, na visayabhāvo. yathā rūpasaddā cakkhusotāni anallīyamānā eva ``phusita''ntiādinā vuttā, evaṃ phassassāpi ārammaṇaphusanasaṅghaṭṭanānīti. ^b^saṅghaṭṭana^eb^ñca phassassa cittārammaṇānaṃ sannipatanabhāvo eva. tenāha ^b^``cittamārammaṇañca saṅghaṭṭetī''^eb^ti. kiccaṭṭhena rasena saṅghaṭṭanarasatā vuttā, vatthārammaṇasannipātena vā sampajjatīti saṅghaṭṭanasampattiko phasso saṅghaṭṭanaraso vutto. yathā ``dve pāṇī vajjeyyu''ntiādīsu (mi0 pa0 2.3.8) pāṇissa pāṇimhi saṅghaṭṭanaṃ tabbisesabhūtā rūpadhammā, evaṃ cittassa ārammaṇe saṅghaṭṭanaṃ tabbisesabhūto eko cetasikadhammo daṭṭhabbo. ``tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso''ti (ma0 ni0 1.204; 3.421, 425, 426; saṃ0 ni0 2.43-44; 4.60) vacanato cakkhurūpaviññāṇādīnaṃ ^a^M2.0141^ea^ saṅgativasena gahetabbattā āha ^b^``tikasannipātasaṅkhātassā''^eb^tiādi. tassa phassassa kāraṇabhūto tadanurūpo samannāhāro ^b^tajjāsamannāhāro^eb^. indriyassa tadabhimukhabhāvo, āvajjanāya ca ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ visayassa ^b^parikkhatatā^eb^ abhisaṅkhatatā, viññāṇassa visayabhāvakaraṇanti attho. yathā niccammā gāvī yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatā, tattha tattha dukkhameva pāpuṇāti, evaṃ phasse sati vedanā uppajjateva. vedanā ca dukkhasallādisabhāvāti vuttaṃ ^b^``vedanādhiṭṭhānabhāvato pana niccammagāvī viya daṭṭhabbo''^eb^ti.

[03] 460^b^.^eb^ ^b^abhisandahati^eb^ ^a^V2.0132^ea^ pabandhati pavatteti. ^b^cetanābhāvo^eb^ byāpārabhāvo. ^b^āyūhanaṃ^eb^ cetayanaṃ īriyanaṃ. ^b^saṃvidahanaṃ^eb^ vicāraṇaṃ. āyūhanarasāya cetanāya pavattamānāya sabbepi sampayuttadhammā yathāsakaṃ kiccappasutā hontīti sā ^b^sakiccaparakiccasādhikā^eb^ vuttā. jeṭṭhasisso pare sajjhāyane uyyojento sayampi sajjhāyati. mahāvaḍḍhakimhi vaḍḍhakikammaṃ kātumāraddhe itarepi karontiyeva. ^b^ussāhanabhāvenā^eb^ti ādarakaraṇabhāvena. sā hi sayaṃ ādarabhūtā sampayuttadhamme ādarayatīti. āyūhanavasena ussāhanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na vīriyussāhavasena.

[03] 461^b^.^eb^ ^b^vīrabhāvo^eb^ti yena vīro nāma hoti, so dhammoti attho. vidhinā īretabbaṃ pavattetabbanti vā ^b^vīriyaṃ,^eb^ ussāho, taṃtaṃkiccasamārambho, parakkamo vā. ^b^upatthambhanaṃ^eb^ sampayuttadhammānaṃ kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā dhāraṇaṃ anubalappadānaṃ, sampaggaṇhanaṃ vā. saṃsīdanapaṭipakkho dhammo asaṃsīdanaṃ, na saṃsīdanābhāvamattanti asaṃsīdanabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhatīti vuttaṃ ^b^``asaṃsīdanabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāna''^eb^nti. ^b^saṃvegapadaṭṭhāna^eb^nti aṭṭhasaṃvegapubbikāya (a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.418) kusalakiriyāya vīriyārambhavatthupadaṭṭhānaṃ. ``maggo gantabbo hoti, maggo gato, kammaṃ kātabbaṃ, kammaṃ kataṃ, appamattako ābādho uppanno, gilānā vuṭṭhito hoti, aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā, gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya vicaranto na labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ, labhati...pe0... pāripūri''nti evaṃ vuttāni etāni anurūpapaccavekkhaṇāsahitāni aṭṭha ^b^vīriyārambhavatthūni,^eb^ taṃmūlakāni vā paccavekkhaṇāni.

[03] 462^b^.^eb^ attanā ^a^M2.0142^ea^ anupāletabbānaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ anupālanaṃ jīvitassa byāpāro, tañca nesaṃ jīvananti taṃ tassa kāraṇabhāvaṃ purakkhatvā vuttaṃ ^b^``jīvanti tenā''^eb^ti. tampi cassa atthato jīvanamevāti āha ^b^``jīvanamattameva vā ta''^eb^nti.

[03] 463^b^.^eb^ ^b^ādhiyatī^eb^ti ṭhapeti. ^b^avisāro^eb^ attano eva avisaraṇasabhāvo. ^b^avikkhepo^eb^ sampayuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ avikkhittatā. yena sampayuttā avikkhittā honti, so dhammo avikkhepoti. avūpasamalakkhaṇassa vikkhepassa paṭipakkhatāya cittassa upasamanākārena paccupatiṭṭhatīti ^b^upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno. visesato^eb^ti yebhuyyena. sukhavirahitopi hi atthi samādhīti. ^b^dīpacci^eb^nidassanena santānaṭhitibhāvaṃ samādhissa dasseti.

[03] 464^b^.^eb^ ^b^saddahanti^eb^ ^a^V2.0133^ea^ ^b^etāyā^eb^ti saddahanakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena saddhāya paccayataṃ dasseti. tassā hi dhammānaṃ tathāpaccayabhāve sati puggalo saddahatīti vohāro hoti. saddahanaṃ saddheyyavatthuno pattiyāyanaṃ, taṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etissāti ^b^saddahanalakkhaṇā. okappanalakkhaṇā^eb^ti anupavisitvā evametanti kappanalakkhaṇā. kālussiyamalaṃ vidhametvā sampayuttānaṃ, puggalasseva vā pasādanaṃ anāvilabhāvakaraṇaṃ raso etissāti ^b^pasādanarasā. pakkhandanaṃ^eb^ adhimuccanavasena ārammaṇassa anupavisanaṃ. akālusabhāvo akālussiyaṃ, anāvilabhāvoti attho. pasādanīyaṭṭhānesu pasādaviparītaṃ akusalaṃ assaddhiyaṃ, micchādhimutti ca, tappaccanīkova pasādabhūto vatthugato nicchayo ^b^adhimutti,^eb^ na yevāpanakādhimokkho. ratanattayaṃ, kammaṃ, kammaphalañca ^b^saddheyyavatthu^eb^. sappurisasaṃsevanasaddhammasavanayonisomanasikāradhammānudhammappaṭipattiyo ^b^sotāpattiyaṅgāni^eb^. kusaladhammānaṃ ādāne ^b^hatthaṃ^eb^ viya, sabbasampattisampadāne ^b^vittaṃ^eb^ viya, amatakasiphalaphalane ^b^bījaṃ^eb^ viya daṭṭhabbā.

[03] 465^b^.^eb^ ^b^saranti tāyā^eb^ti saraṇakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena satiyā paccayataṃ dasseti. tassā hi dhammānaṃ tathāpaccayabhāve sati taṃsamaṅgipuggalo saratīti vohāro hoti. udake alābu viya pilavitvā gantuṃ adatvā pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa ^a^M2.0143^ea^ ārammaṇassa ṭhapanaṃ saraṇaṃ asammuṭṭhatākaraṇaṃ ^b^apilāpanaṃ^eb^. sammosapaccanīkaṃ kiccaṃ ^b^asammoso,^eb^ na sammosābhāvamattaṃ. ``satārakkhena cetasā''ti (a0 ni0 10.20) vacanato ^b^ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^. aññato āgantvā cittavisaye abhimukho bhavati etāyāti ^b^visayābhimukhabhāvo,^eb^ sati. satiyā vatthubhūtā kāyādayova ^b^kāyādisatipaṭṭhānāni,^eb^ sati eva vā purimā pacchimāya padaṭṭhānaṃ.

[03] 466^b^.^eb^ ^b^kāyaduccaritādīhī^eb^ti hetumhi karaṇavacanaṃ. ^b^hiriyatī^eb^ti lajjākārena jigucchati. ^b^tehiyevā^eb^ti kāyaduccaritādīhiyeva. ^b^ottappatī^eb^ti ubbijjati. hirī pāpadhamme gūthaṃ viya passantī jigucchatīti āha ^b^``pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī''^eb^ti. ottappaṃ te uṇhaṃ viya passantaṃ tato uttasatīti vuttaṃ ^b^``uttāsalakkhaṇaṃ ottappa''^eb^nti. ^b^vuttappakārenā^eb^ti lajjākārena, uttāsākārena ca. ^b^attagāravapadaṭṭhānā^eb^ hirī ajjhattasamuṭṭhānatāya, attādhipatitāya ca. ^b^paragāravapadaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ ottappaṃ bahiddhāsamuṭṭhānatāya, lokādhipatitāya ca. tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^``attānaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0134^ea^ ^b^hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā ca hiriottappānaṃ tattha tattha pākaṭabhāvena vuttā, na panetesaṃ kadāci aññamaññavippayogā. na hi lajjanaṃ nibbhayaṃ, pāpabhayaṃ vā alajjanaṃ atthīti. ^b^lokapālakā^eb^ti ettha ``dveme, bhikkhave, sukkā dhammā lokaṃ pālentī''ti (a0 ni0 2.9; itivu0 42) suttapadaṃ attādhipati, lokādhipatibhāve ca ``so attānaṃyeva adhipatiṃ karitvā, so lokaṃyeva adhipatiṃ karitvā''ti (a0 ni0 3.40) ca suttapadāni āharitvā vattabbāni.

[03] 467^b^.^eb^ yasmā lobhapaṭipakkho alobhoti ye dhammā tena sampayuttā, taṃsamaṅgino vā sattā tena na lubbhanti, sayaṃ kadācipi na lubbhateva, atthato vā alubbhanākāro eva ca hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``na lubbhantī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^eseva nayo^eb^ti ``na dussanti tenā''tiādinā kārakattayayojanaṃ atidisati. ^b^agedho^eb^ agijjhanaṃ anabhikaṅkhanaṃ. ^b^alaggabhāvo^eb^ anāsattatā. ^b^apariggaho^eb^ kassaci vatthuno mamattavasena asaṅgaho. anallīno bhāvo adhippāyo etassāti ^b^anallīnabhāvo^eb^. evañhi upamāya sameti.

[03] 468^b^.^eb^ caṇḍikassa ^a^M2.0144^ea^ bhāvo caṇḍikkaṃ, kopo. tappaṭipakkho ^b^acaṇḍikkaṃ,^eb^ abyāpādo. ^b^avirodho^eb^ aviggaho. ^b^anukūlamitto^eb^ anuvattako. ^b^vinayaraso^eb^ti vinayanaraso. ^b^sommabhāvo^eb^ mejjanavasena hilādanīyatā.

[03] 469^b^.^eb^ dhammānaṃ yo yo sabhāvo yathāsabhāvo, tassa tassa paṭivijjhanaṃ ^b^yathāsabhāvapaṭivedho^eb^. akkhalitaṃ avirajjhitvā paṭivedho ^b^akkhalitapaṭivedho^eb^. visayassa obhāsanaṃ tappaṭicchādakasammohandhakāravidhamanaṃ ^b^visayobhāsanaṃ^eb^. katthacipi visaye asammuyhanākāreneva paccupatiṭṭhati, sammohapaṭipakkhatāya vā tadabhāvaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti ^b^asammohapaccupaṭṭhāno. sabbakusalānaṃ mūlabhūtā^eb^ti sabbesaṃ catubhūmakakusaladhammānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanena patiṭṭhābhūtā, na tesaṃ kusalabhāvasādhanena. yadi hi tesaṃ kusalabhāvo kusalamūlapaṭibaddho siyā, evaṃ sati taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpesu hetupaccayatā na siyā. na hi te tesaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ sādhenti, na ca paccayā na honti. vuttañhetaṃ ``hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo''ti (paṭṭhā0 1.1.1). yathā ca kusalabhāvo, evaṃ abyākatabhāvopi abyākatamūlappaṭibaddho siyā. tathā sati ahetukacittānaṃ ^a^V2.0135^ea^ abyākatabhāvo eva na siyā, akusalesu ca yattha ekaṃyeva mūlaṃ, tassa akusalabhāvo na siyā, ubhayampi hotiyeva. tasmā na mūlappaṭibaddho kusalādibhāvo, atha kho yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddho. tesaṃ pana suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanāni mūlānīti gahetabbaṃ.

[03] 470^b^.^eb^ ^b^passambhanaṃ^eb^ darathavūpasamo. kāyasaddo samūhavācī, so ca kho vedanādikkhandhattayavasenāti āha ^b^``kāyoti cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā''^eb^ti. tenevāha ``tattha katamā tasmiṃ samaye kāyapassaddhi hoti? yā tasmiṃ samaye vedanākkhandhassā''tiādi (dha0 sa0 40). ^b^daratho^eb^ sārambho, domanassapaccayānaṃ uddhaccādhikānaṃ kilesānaṃ, tathāpavattānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. darathanimmaddanena pariḷāhaparipphandavirahito sītibhāvo ^b^aparipphandasītibhāvo^eb^. uddhaccappadhānā kilesā ^a^M2.0145^ea^ ^b^uddhaccādikilesā,^eb^ uddhaccaṃ vā ādiṃ katvā sabbakilese saṅgaṇhāti. sesesupi eseva nayo.
[03] ^b^garubhāvo^eb^ dandhatā, thinamiddhādhikānaṃ, tathāpavattānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. dandhatāya paṭipakkho ^b^adandhatā,^eb^ na dandhatāya abhāvamattaṃ.

[03] thaddhabhāvo ^b^thambho,^eb^ diṭṭhimānādhikānaṃ, tappadhānānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānametaṃ nāmaṃ. thaddhabhāvanimmaddanato eva katthaci ārammaṇe appaṭihatākārena paccupatiṭṭhanti, sampayuttānaṃ vā tattha appaṭighātaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpentīti ^b^appaṭighātapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^.

[03] kammani sādhu kammaññaṃ, na kammaññaṃ akammaññaṃ, tassa bhāvo ^b^akammaññabhāvo,^eb^ dānasīlādipuññakiriyāyaṃ ayogyatā. atthato kāmacchandādisaṃkilesadhammā, tappadhānā vā cattāro akusalakkhandhā. kammaññabhāveneva sampannākārena ārammaṇassa gahaṇaṃ ^b^ārammaṇakaraṇasampatti^eb^. vuttāvasesā kāmacchandādayo, tadekaṭṭhā ca saṃkilesadhammā ^b^avasesanīvaraṇādayo^eb^. vinibandhanimmaddanena sukhappavattihetutāya ^b^pasādanīyavatthūsu pasādāvahā. suvaṇṇavisuddhi viyā^eb^ti yathā suvaṇṇavisuddhi apagatakāḷakā alaṅkāravikativiniyogakkhamā, evamayampi saṃkilesavigamena hitakiriyāviniyogakkhamā.

[03] kāyacittānaṃ gelaññaṃ, assaddhiyādi, tadekaṭṭhā ca pāpadhammā. gelaññapaṭipakkho agelaññaṃ ^a^V2.0136^ea^, tabbhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ etāsanti ^b^agelaññabhāvalakkhaṇā^eb^. yathāvuttagelaññanimmaddaneneva natthi etāsaṃ ādīnavo doso, na vā etā ādīnaṃ kapaṇaṃ vanti pavattantīti nirādīnavā, tenākārena paccupatiṭṭhanti, taṃ vā sampayuttesu paccupaṭṭhapentīti ^b^nirādīnavapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^.

[03] kāyasambandhī, cittasambandhī ca ujubhāvoti lakkhitabbatāya ^b^kāyacittājjavalakkhaṇā^eb^. kāyacittānaṃ naṅgalasīsacandakoṭigomuttavaṅkatāsaṅkhātānaṃ kuṭilabhāvānaṃ nimmaddanato ^b^kāyacittakuṭilabhāvanimmaddanarasā^eb^. tato eva sabbathāpi ajimhabhāvena paccupatiṭṭhanti, sampayuttānaṃ vā ajimhataṃ paccupaṭṭhapentīti ^b^ajimhatāpaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^. ``santadosapaṭicchādanalakkhaṇā māyā, asantaguṇasambhāvanalakkhaṇaṃ sāṭheyya''nti evaṃ vuttā tadākārappavattā ^a^M2.0146^ea^ akusalā khandhā, tadekaṭṭhā ca saṃkilesadhammā ^b^māyāsāṭheyyādikā^eb^. ettha ca cittapassaddhiādīhi cittameva passaddhaṃ, lahu, mudu, kammaññaṃ, paguṇaṃ, uju ca hoti. kāyapassaddhiādīhi pana rūpakāyopi. tenevettha bhagavatā dhammānaṃ duvidhatā vuttā, na sabbattha.

[03] 471^b^.^eb^ chandanaṃ ^b^chando,^eb^ ārammaṇena atthikatā. ``chando kāmo''tiādīsu (vibha0 564) pana taṇhāpi vuccati, ``chandaṃ janeti vāyamatī''tiādīsu (vibha0 432) vīriyampīti tato nivattanatthaṃ ^b^``kattukāmatāyetaṃ adhivacana''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^kattukāmatā^eb^ vuccati karaṇicchā. cetasikassa ca dhammassa sārammaṇattā karaṇicchā nāma ālambanassa ālambitukāmatāmukheneva hotīti ārammaṇakaraṇicchālakkhaṇo chando ^b^kattukāmatālakkhaṇo^eb^ vutto. tenevāha ^b^``ārammaṇapariyesanaraso, ārammaṇena atthikatāpaccupaṭṭhāno''^eb^ti ca. yadaggena panāyaṃ attano ārammaṇapariyesanaraso, tadaggena sampayuttānampi hotiyeva ekārammaṇatāya tena tesaṃ. tenevāha ^b^``ārammaṇaggahaṇe cāyaṃ cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo''^eb^ti. svāyaṃ kusalesu uppanno kusalacchandoti vuccati yonisomanasikārasamuṭṭhānattā.

[03] 472^b^.^eb^ ^b^adhimuccanaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇe sanniṭṭhānavasena veditabbaṃ, na pasādanavasena. yathā tathā vā hi ārammaṇe nicchayanaṃ adhimuccanaṃ anadhimuccantassa pāṇātipātādīsu, dānādīsu vā pavattiyā abhāvā, saddhā pana pasādanīyesu pasādādhimokkhāti ayametesaṃ viseso. voṭṭhabbanaṃ pana yathā santīrite atthe nicchayanākārena pavattitvā parato ttamānānaṃ tathā pavattiyā paccayo hoti. yadi evaṃ, vicikicchāsampayuttesu kathanti? tesampi ekaṃseneva saṃsappanākārassa ^a^V2.0137^ea^ paccayatāya daṭṭhabbaṃ. dārakassa viya ito cito ca saṃsappanassa ``karissāmi na karissāmī''ti anicchayassa paṭipakkhakiriyā ^b^asaṃsappanaṃ,^eb^ yesu cittuppādesu ayaṃ sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo adhimokkho, tesaṃ ārammaṇadhammo eva ^b^sanniṭṭheyyadhammo^eb^.

[03] 473^b^.^eb^ ^b^kiriyā^eb^ ^a^M2.0147^ea^ ^b^kāro^eb^ti kārasaddassa bhāvasādhanatamāha. ^b^manamhi kāro^eb^ti manasi ārammaṇassa karaṇaṃ. yena hi mano ārammaṇe karīyati ārammaṇenassa saṃyojanato, tato eva tena ārammaṇampi manasi karīyatīti. ^b^purimamanato^eb^ti bhavaṅgamanato. ^b^visadisamana^eb^nti vīthijavanaṃ manaṃ ^b^karotī^eb^ti manasikārasāmaññena vīthijavanapaṭipādake dasseti.

[01] sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ sārento viya hotīti manasikāro ^b^sāraṇalakkhaṇo^eb^ vutto. satiyā asammussanavasena visayābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānatā, manasikārassa pana saṃyojanavasena ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānatāti ayametesaṃ viseso. ārammaṇapaṭipādakassa saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannatāvacanaṃ itaramanasikārānaṃ tadaññakkhandhapariyāpannatāmattaṃ jotetīti tathājotitaṃ taṃ viññāṇakkhandhe otāretvā dassetuṃ ^b^``vīthipaṭipādako''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] 474^b^.^eb^ ^b^tesu dhammesū^eb^ti yesu dhammesu sayaṃ uppannā, tesu attanā sampayuttesu cittacetasikadhammesu. anārammaṇattepi hi tesu samappavattesu udāsinabhāvato ^b^``tatramajjhattatā''^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^samavāhitalakkhaṇā^eb^ti samaṃ avisamaṃ yathāsakakiccesu pavattanalakkhaṇā. udāsinabhāvena pavattamānāpi hesā sampayuttadhamme yathāsakakiccesu pavatteti, yathā rājā tuṇhī nisinnopi atthakaraṇe dhammaṭṭhe yathāsakakiccesu appamatte pavatteti. alīnānuddhatapavattipaccayatā ^b^ūnādhikatānivāraṇarasā,^eb^ kiccavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ. yadi evaṃ, sahajātādhipatino kathanti? tampi tassā kiccameva. yaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ adhipatibhāvoti, tassāpi tathāpavattanamevāti nāyaṃ doso. ``idaṃ nihīnakiccaṃ hotu, idaṃ atirekatarakicca''nti evaṃ pakkhapātavasena viya pavatti ^b^pakkhapāto,^eb^ taṃ upacchindantī viya hotīti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^``aniyatesu icchantī''^eb^ti iminā cetasikantarabhāvena icchantīti dasseti. ^b^adosoyeva mettā^eb^. tathā ^a^V2.0138^ea^ hi soyeva ``mettā mettāyanā''tiādinā (dha0 sa0 1062) niddiṭṭho. ^b^upekkhā^eb^ti yaṃ upekkhaṃ mettāya saddhiṃ parikappenti, sā ^b^tatramajjhattupekkhāyeva^eb^.

[03] 475^b^.^eb^ ^b^kāyaduccaritādivatthūna^eb^nti ^a^M2.0148^ea^ parapāṇaparadhanaparaitthiādīnaṃ. ^b^amaddanaṃ^eb^ maddanapaṭipakkhabhāvo. kāyaduccaritādivatthuto saṅkocanakiriyāpadesena kāyaduccaritādito eva saṅkocanakiriyā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. na hi viratiyo duccaritavatthuno ^b^akiriyapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^ yujjanti, atha kho duccaritassa, viratīnañca soraccavasena saṅkocanaṃ, akiriyānañca hirottappānaṃ jigucchanādivasenāti ayametesaṃ viseso.

[03] 476^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅkhārā^eb^ti saṅkhārakkhandhadhamme sandhāyāha. te hi idhādhippetā, aññathā aṭṭhatiṃsāti vattabbaṃ siyā. yathā cittaṃ, evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi dutiye sasaṅkhārā evāti āha ^b^``sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso''^eb^ti. ^b^avasesā^eb^ paṭhame vuttadhammā.

[03] ^b^avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchantī^eb^ti ettha kathaṃ karuṇāmuditāupekkhāsahagate sambhavantīti? pubbabhāgabhāvato. appanāppattā eva hi karuṇāmuditā upekkhāsahagatā na honti, tato aññattha pana upekkhāsahagatāpi hontīti ācariyā.

[03] suvisuddhassa kāyakammādikassa cittasamādhānavasena rūpārūpāvacarakusalappavatti, na kāyakammādīnaṃ sodhanavasena, nāpi duccaritadurājīvānaṃ samucchindanapaṭippassambhanavasenāti mahaggatacittuppādesu viratīnaṃ asambhavoyevāti āha ^b^``ṭhapetvā viratittaya''^eb^nti. ^b^tato^eb^ti rūpāvacarapaṭhame vuttacetasikato. ^b^teyevā^eb^ti rūpāvacarapañcame vuttacetasikā eva. yadi eva rūpāvacarato ko visesoti āha ^b^``arūpāvacarabhāvoyeva hi ettha viseso''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^paṭhamajjhānike^eb^ti paṭhamajjhānavati. ^b^maggaviññāṇe^eb^ti catubbidhepi maggaviññāṇe vuttanayeneva veditabbāti sambandho. ^b^dutiyajjhānikādibhede maggaviññāṇe^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena tatiyacatutthapañcamajjhānikāni saṅgaṇhāti. ``vuttanayenā''ti vuttaṃ kiṃ avisesenāti codanāyane taṃ dassento ^b^``karuṇāmuditāna''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha maggaviññāṇānaṃ nibbānārammaṇattā, karuṇāmuditānañca sattārammaṇattā na tāsaṃ tattha sambhavo. maggadhammesu ca pādakādiniyamena ^a^V2.0139^ea^ kadāci sammāsaṅkappaviraho siyā ^a^M2.0149^ea^, na pana virativiraho kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ samucchindanavaseneva ariyamaggassa pavattanatoti ^b^niyataviratitā^eb^.

[03] 478^b^.^eb^ ^b^na hiriyati^eb^ na lajjatīti ^b^ahiriko,^eb^ puggalo, cittaṃ, taṃsampayuttadhammasamudāyo vā. ``ahirikka''nti vattabbe ekassa kakārassa lopaṃ katvā ^b^``ahirika''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ``na ottappa''nti ottappassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ dhammamāha. ^b^ajigucchanaṃ^eb^ ahīḷanaṃ. ^b^alajjā^eb^ aviriḷā. ^b^tehevā^eb^ti kāyaduccaritādīhi eva. ^b^asārajjaṃ^eb^ nibbhayatā. ^b^anuttāso^eb^ asambhamo. ^b^vuttapaṭipakkhavasenā^eb^ti alajjanākārena pāpānaṃ karaṇarasaṃ ahirikaṃ, anuttāsākārena anottappaṃ, vuttappakāreneva pāpato asaṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānāni attani, paresu ca agāravapadaṭṭhānāni. gāmasūkarassa viya asucito kilesāsucito ajigucchanaṃ ahirikena hoti, salabhassa viya aggito pāpato anuttāso anottappena hotīti evaṃ vuttappaṭipakkhavasena vitthāro veditabbo.

[03] 479^b^.^eb^ ^b^lubbhanti tenā^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ. ^b^lubbhantī^eb^ti abhigijjhanti. ^b^muyhantī^eb^ti na bujjhanti. ^b^ārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ^eb^ ``mama ida''nti taṇhābhinivesavasena abhinivissa ārammaṇassa avissajjanaṃ, na ārammaṇakaraṇamattaṃ. ^b^abhisaṅgo^eb^ abhimukhabhāvena āsatti. ^b^apariccāgo^eb^ avijahanaṃ, dummocanīyatā vā. ^b^assādadassanaṃ^eb^ assādadiṭṭhi. ``assādānupassino ca taṇhā pavaḍḍhatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 2.52, 54, 57) hi vuttaṃ.

[03] 480^b^.^eb^ dhammasabhāvassa yāthāvato adassanaṃ ^b^cittassa andhabhāvo. aññāṇaṃ^eb^ ñāṇapaṭipakkho. sampaṭivijjhituṃ asamatthatā ^b^asampaṭivedho^eb^. yathā ñāṇaṃ ārammaṇasabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na labbhati, mohassa tathā pavatti ^b^ārammaṇasabhāvacchādanaṃ^eb^. asammāpaṭipattiṃ paccupaṭṭhapeti, sammāpaṭipattiyā paṭipakkhabhāvena gayhatīti vā ^b^asammāpaṭipattipaccupaṭṭhāno^eb^. yassa uppajjati, tassa andhakaraṇaṃ andhakāro, tathā paccupatiṭṭhatīti ^b^andhakārapaccupaṭṭhāno^eb^.

[03] 481^b^.^eb^ ^b^micchā^eb^ti dhammasabhāvassa viparītaṃ, niccāditoti attho. ^b^ayoniso abhiniveso^eb^ anupāyābhiniveso uppathābhiniveso. dhammasabhāvaṃ ^a^M2.0150^ea^ atikkamitvā parato āmasanaṃ ^a^V2.0140^ea^ ^b^parāmāso^eb^. viparītaggāhavasena ``idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña''nti (ma0 ni0 2.187, 202, 203; 3.27-29) abhinivisanaṃ ^b^micchābhiniveso^eb^.

[03] 482^b^.^eb^ yassa dhammassa vasena uddhataṃ hoti cittaṃ, taṃsampayuttadhammā vā, so dhammo ^b^uddhaccaṃ. avūpasamo^eb^ti asannisinnāppasannabhāvamāha. ^b^anavaṭṭhānarasa^eb^nti calanakiccaṃ. ^b^bhantatta^eb^nti paribbhamanākāraṃ. ^b^cetaso avūpasame^eb^ti nipphādetabbe payojane bhummaṃ, avūpasamapaccayabhūtaṃ ārammaṇaṃ vā ``avūpasamo''ti vuttaṃ. akusaladhammānaṃ ekantanihīnatāya ^b^``akusalabhāvena ca lāmakatta''^eb^nti vuttaṃ.
[03] 483^b^.^eb^ thinamiddhamettha aniyataṃ, na mānādīti thinamiddhassa aniyatatā ca ettha dutiyacitte paṭhamākusalato viseso.

[03] anussāhanāvasīdanabhāvena saṃhatabhāvo thinaṃ, tena yogato cittaṃ thinaṃ, tassa bhāvoti ^b^thinatā^eb^. asamatthatāvighātavasena akammaññatā middhaṃ. yasmā tato eva tena sampayuttadhammā medhitā vihatasāmatthiyā honti, tasmā ^b^``middhanatā middha''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^anussāhalakkhaṇa^eb^nti ussāhapaṭipakkhalakkhaṇaṃ. vīriyassa avanodanaṃ khipanaṃ ^b^vīriyāvanodanaṃ^eb^. sampayuttadhammānaṃ saṃsīdanākārena paccupatiṭṭhati, tesaṃ vā saṃsīdanaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti ^b^saṃsīdanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. akammaññatālakkhaṇa^eb^nti ettha kāmaṃ thinampi akammaññasabhāvameva, taṃ pana cittassa, middhaṃ vedanādikkhandhattayassāti ayamettha viseso. tathā hi pāḷiyaṃ ``tattha katamaṃ thinaṃ? yā cittassa akallatā akammaññatā. tattha katamaṃ middhaṃ? yā kāyassa akallatā akammaññatā''ti (dha0 sa0 1162-1163) ca ādinā imesaṃ niddeso pavatto. ^b^onahanaṃ^eb^ viññāṇadvārānaṃ pidahanaṃ. ^b^līnatā^eb^ līnākāro ārammaṇaggahaṇe saṅkoco. yasmā thinena cittasseva saṃhananaṃ hoti, middhena pana vedanādikkhandhattayassa viya rūpakāyassāpi, tasmā taṃ pacalāyikāniddaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti ^b^pacalāyikāniddāpaccupaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ. ^b^arati^eb^ pantasenāsanesu, adhikusaladhammesu ca arocanā. ^b^vijambhikā^eb^ vijambhanasaṅkhātassa kāyaduṭṭhullassa kāraṇabhūtā saṃkilesappavatti. ^b^arativijambhikādīsū^eb^ti ^a^M2.0151^ea^ ca ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena tandiādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. nipphādetabbe payojane cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ.

[03] ^b^avasesā^eb^ ^a^V2.0141^ea^ soḷasa. māno panettha aniyato hoti, tena saddhiṃ sattaraseva honti. paṭṭhāne hi ``saṃyojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃyojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā''ti ettha catukkhattuṃ kāmarāgena, tikkhattuṃ paṭighena ca māno vicikicchā bhavarāgoti tayopete sakadāgāmino saṃyojanānaṃ saṃyojanehi dasavidhā yojanāti dassitāya dasavidhāya yojanāya ``kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca mānasaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojana''nti (paṭṭhā0 3.4.1) vatvā ``kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojana''nti (paṭṭhā0 3.4.1) tathā ``mānasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ avijjāsaṃyojana''nti (paṭṭhā 3.4.1) vatvā ``bhavarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭicca avijjāsaṃyojana''nti (paṭṭhā0 3.4.1) ca evamāgatāhi yojanāhi mānassa aniyatabhāvo pakāsito. yadi hi māno niyato siyā, kāmarāgassa mānarahitā pavatti na siyā, tathā bhavarāgassa. evaṃ sati paṭṭhāne catukkhattuṃ kāmarāgena yojanā na siyā, tikkhattuṃyeva siyā. bhavarāgamūlikā ca na siyā. evañca saṃyojanānaṃ saṃyojanehi aṭṭhavidhena yojanā siyā, na dasavidhena. dasavidhāva ca dassitāti. seyyādivasena uccato namanaṃ ^b^unnati^eb^. unnamanavaseneva ^b^saṃpaggaharaso^eb^. na vīriyaṃ viya taṃtaṃkiccasādhane abbhussahanavasena. omānassāpi attānaṃ avaṃ katvā gahaṇampi sampaggahaṇavasenevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ketu vuccati accuggatadhajo, idha pana ketu viyāti ketu, uḷāratamādibhāvo. taṃ ketubhāvasaṅkhātaṃ ketuṃ kāmetīti ketukamyaṃ, cittaṃ. yassa dhammassa vasena ketukamyaṃ, sā ^b^ketukamyatā^eb^. ``aha''nti pavattanato mānassa diṭṭhisadisī pavattīti so diṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ ekacittuppāde na pavattati, attasinehasannissayo cāti āha ^b^``diṭṭhivippayuttalobhapadaṭṭhāno''^eb^ti.
[03] ^b^etthāpi cā^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-saddena thinamiddhaṃ ākaḍḍhati.

[03] 485^b^.^eb^ ^b^dussantī^eb^ti byāpajjanti. ^b^caṇḍikkaṃ^eb^ kujjhanaṃ. attano pavattiākāravasena, virūpasaṃsappanakāniṭṭharūpasamuṭṭhāpanavasena ca ^b^visappanaraso^eb^. kāyassa ^a^M2.0152^ea^ vijjhattabhāvāpādanato ^b^attano nissayadahanaraso^eb^. dussanaṃ attano, parassa ca upabhogaphalakālesu aniṭṭhattā ^b^visasaṃsaṭṭhapūtimuttaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo^eb^ti sabbena sabbaṃ aggahetabbataṃ dasseti.

[03] 486^b^.^eb^ yaṃ parasampattīsu issākaraṇaṃ, sā issāti dassento āha ^b^``issāyanā issā''^eb^ti ^a^V2.0142^ea^. ^b^usūyanaṃ^eb^ asahanaṃ. ^b^tatthevā^eb^ti parasampattīsu eva. abhiratipaṭipakkhabhūtaṃ issāya kiccaṃ, na abhiratiyā abhāvamattanti āha ^b^``anabhiratirasā''^eb^ti.

[03] 487^b^.^eb^ maccharayogena ``maccharī''ti pavattamānaṃ maccharisaddaṃ gahetvā āha ^b^``maccharabhāvo macchariya''^eb^nti. niruttinayena pana mā idaṃ acchariyaṃ aññesaṃ hotu, mayhameva hotūti macchariyanti porāṇā. taṃ macchariyaṃ vuccamānāni lakkhaṇādīni pariyādāya tiṭṭhati. ^b^saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhāna^eb^nti attasampattīnaṃ parehi asādhāraṇabhāvakaraṇena saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ. kaṭukākāragati ^b^kaṭukañcukatā. attasampatti^eb^ āvāsādi.

[03] 488^b^.^eb^ ^b^kukata^eb^nti ettha akatampi kukatameva. evañhi vattāro honti ``yaṃ mayā na kataṃ, taṃ kukata''nti. tathā hi vakkhati ``katākatānusocanarasa''nti. evaṃ katākataṃ duccaritaṃ, sucaritañca kukataṃ, taṃ ārabbha vippaṭisāravasena pavattaṃ pana cittaṃ taṃsahacaritatāya idha ``kukata''nti gahetvā ^b^``tassa bhāvo kukkucca''^eb^nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. pacchā anutāpanaṃ vibādhanaṃ ^b^pacchānutāpo^eb^. yathāpavattassa katākatākāravisiṭṭhassa duccaritasucaritassa anusocanavasena virūpaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ ^b^vippaṭisāro^eb^. parāyattatāhetutāya ^b^dāsabyamiva daṭṭhabbaṃ^eb^. yathā hi dāsabye sati dāso parāyatto hoti, evaṃ kukkucce sati taṃsamaṅgī. na hi so attano dhammatāya kusale pavattituṃ sakkoti. atha vā katākatākusalakusalānusocane āyattatāya tadubhayavasena kukkuccena taṃsamaṅgī hotīti taṃ dāsabyaṃ viya hotīti.
[03] aniyatesu issādīsu ^b^thinamiddhasambhavova^eb^ cāti ^b^ca^eb^-saddaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03] 490^b^.^eb^ ^b^pavattiṭṭhitimatto^eb^ti ^a^M2.0153^ea^ khaṇaṭṭhitimatto. ``nivāte dīpaccīnaṃ ṭhiti viyā''ti hi evaṃ vuttacittaṭṭhiti viya santānaṭṭhitiyā paccayo bhavituṃ asamattho nicchayābhāvena asaṇṭhahanato cetaso pavattipaccayamattatāya pavattiṭṭhitimatto. tenāha ^b^``dubbalo samādhī''^eb^ti. ^b^vigatā cikicchā^eb^ti cikicchituṃ dukkaratāya vuttaṃ, na sabbathā vicikicchāya cikicchābhāvatoti tadatthamattaṃ dasseti. ``evaṃ nu kho, nanu kho''tiādinā saṃsappanavasena setīti ^b^saṃsayo. kampanarasā^eb^ti nānārammaṇe cittassa kampanakiccā. uddhaccañhi attanā gahitākāre ^a^V2.0143^ea^ eva ṭhatvā bhamatīti ekārammaṇasmiṃyeva vipphandanavasena pavattati. vicikicchā pana yadipi rūpādīsu ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe uppajjati, tathāpi ``evaṃ nu kho, nanu kho, idaṃ nu kho, aññaṃ nu kho''ti aññaṃ gahetabbākāraṃ apekkhatīti nānārammaṇe kampanaṃ hotīti. anicchayaṃ dveḷhakaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti ^b^anicchayapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^. anekaṃsassa ārammaṇe nānāsabhāvassa gahaṇākārena paccupatiṭṭhatīti ^b^anekaṃsagāhapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^.

[03] 491^b^.^eb^ ^b^sattārammaṇattā^eb^ti sattapaññattiārammaṇattā. nanu ca paññattiārammaṇāpi vipākā hontīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``ekantaparittārammaṇā hi kāmāvacaravipākā''^eb^ti. ^b^viratiyopi vipākesu na santī^eb^ti etthāpi nanu kesuci vipākesu viratiyopi santīti codanaṃ manasi katvā āha ^b^``pañca sikkhāpadā kusalāyevāti hi vutta''^eb^nti, tena lokiyavipākesu viratiyo na santīti dasseti.
[03] ^b^tesa^eb^nti rūpāvacarādivipākaviññāṇānaṃ. janetabbajanakasambandhe hi idaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.

[03] 492^b^.^eb^ ^b^te^eb^ti te ahetukakiriyasaṅkhārā. tattha kusalavipākamanodhātusampayuttehi samānā ahetukakiriyamanodhātusampayuttā, somanassasahagatasantīraṇasampayuttehi samānā hasituppādasampayuttā, upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇasampayuttehi samānā voṭṭhabbanasampayuttāti imamatthaṃ dassentena ^b^``kusala...pe0... samānā''^eb^ti vatvā tato labbhamānaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``manoviññāṇadhātudvaye panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^vīriyasabbhāvato balappatto samādhi hoti^eb^ ``vīriyantaṃ bala''nti katvā.

[03] samucchedaviratīhi ^a^M2.0154^ea^ eva arahantānaṃ viramanakiccassa niṭṭhitattā kiriyacittesu viratiyo na santīti āha ^b^``ṭhapetvā viratiyo''^eb^ti. kāmāvacarasahetukakiriyasaṅkhārānaṃ kāmāvacarakusalehi viratikato viseso atthi, mahaggatesu pana tādisopi natthīti āha ^b^``sabbākārenapī''^eb^ti, dhammato, ārammaṇato, pavattiākāratoti sabbapakārenapīti attho.
[06] iti saṅkhārakkhandhe vitthārakathāmukhavaṇṇanā.
[03] abhidhammantogadhampi ^a^V2.0144^ea^ suttantabhājanīyaṃ suttantanayo eva, ekantābhidhammanayo pana abhidhammabhājanīyanti āha ^b^``abhidhamme padabhājanīyanayenā''^eb^ti.

[03] 493^b^.^eb^ bhagavatā pana evaṃ khandhā vitthāritāti sambandho. tasmā imāyapi pāḷiyā vasena khandhānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karissāmāti adhippāyo. ^b^yaṃ kiñcī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ya^eb^nti sāmaññena aniyamadassanaṃ. ^b^kiñcī^eb^ti pakārabhedaṃ āmasitvā aniyamadassanaṃ. ubhayenāpi atītaṃ vā...pe0... santike vā appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā yādisaṃ vā tādisaṃ vā napuṃsakaniddesārahaṃ sabbaṃ byāpetvā gaṇhātīti āha ^b^``anavasesapariyādāna''^eb^nti. evaṃ pana aññesupi napuṃsakaniddesārahesu pasaṅgaṃ disvā tattha adhippetatthaṃ aticca pavattanato atippasaṅgassa niyamanatthaṃ rūpanti vuttanti dassento ^b^``rūpanti atippasaṅganiyamana''^eb^nti āha. ^b^yaṃ kiñcī^eb^ti ca ^b^yaṃ^eb^-saddaṃ ekaṃ padaṃ, sanipātaṃ ^b^kiṃ^eb^-saddañca ekaṃ padanti gahetvā aniyamekatthadīpanato ^b^``padadvayenāpī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^assā^eb^ti rūpassa. ^b^atītādinā vibhāgaṃ ārabhati^eb^ atītānāgatapaccuppannantiādinā.

[03] 494^b^.^eb^ ^b^addhāsantatisamayakhaṇavasenā^eb^ti ettha cutipaṭisandhiparicchinne kāle ^b^addhā^eb^-saddo vattatīti ``ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna''ntiādisuttavasena (ma0 ni0 1.18; saṃ0 ni0 2.20) viññāyati. tathā hi ^b^bhaddekarattasutte^eb^pi ``atītaṃ nānvāgameyyā''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 3.272, 275, 276, 277) addhāvaseneva atītādibhāvo vutto. ``tayome, ^a^M2.0155^ea^ bhikkhave, addhā, katame tayo? atīto addhā anāgato addhā paccuppanno addhā''ti (dī0 ni0 3.305; itivu0 63) pana paramatthato paricchijjamāno addhā ^b^niruttipathasutta^eb^vasena khaṇaparicchinno vutto. tattha hi ``yaṃ, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ jātaṃ...pe0... pātubhūtaṃ. atthīti tassa saṅkhā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.62) vijjamānassa paccuppannatā, tato pubbe, pacchā ca atītānāgatatā vuttā. tadaññasuttesu pana yebhuyyena cutipaṭisandhiparicchinno atītādiko addhā vuttoti so eva idhāpi ``addhāvasenā''ti vutto.

[03] sītaṃ sītassa sabhāgo, tathā uṇhaṃ uṇhassa. yaṃ pana sītaṃ, uṇhaṃ vā sarīre sannipatitaṃ ^a^V2.0145^ea^ santānavasena pavattamānaṃ anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ ekākāraṃ, taṃ eko utūti vuccatīti sabhāgautuno anekattā ^b^eka^eb^-ggahaṇaṃ kataṃ, evaṃ āhārepi. ^b^ekavīthiekajavanasamuṭṭhāna^eb^nti pañcachaṭṭhadvāravasena vuttaṃ. santatisamayakathā vipassakānaṃ upakāratthāya aṭṭhakathāsu kathitā. janako hetu, upathambhako paccayo, tesaṃ uppādanaṃ, upatthambhanañca kiccaṃ. yathā bījassa aṅkuruppādanaṃ, pathavīādīnañca tadupatthambhanaṃ, kammassa kaṭattārūpavipākuppādanaṃ, āhārādīnaṃ tadupatthambhanaṃ, evaṃ ekekassa kalāpassa, cittuppādassa ca janakānaṃ kammānantarādipaccayabhūtānaṃ, upatthambhakānañca sahajātapurejātapacchājātānaṃ kiccaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ. evaṃ utuādīnaṃ sabhāgavisabhāgatāsambhavato taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ santativasena atītādivibhāgo vutto, kammassa pana ekabhavanibbattakassa sabhāgavisabhāgatā natthīti taṃsamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ santativasena atītādivibhāgaṃ avatvā upatthambhakavaseneva vutto. yadā pana liṅgaparivattanaṃ hoti, tadā balavatā akusalena purisaliṅgaṃ antaradhāyati, dubbalena kusalena itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhavati. dubbalena ca akusalena itthiliṅgaṃ antaradhāyati, balavatā kusalena purisaliṅgaṃ pātubhavatīti kammasamuṭṭhānarūpānampi attheva visabhāgatāti tesampi santativasena atītādivibhāgo sambhavati, so pana na sabbakālikoti na gahito.
[03] ^b^taṃtaṃsamaya^eb^nti ekamuhuttādiko so so samayo etassāti taṃtaṃsamayaṃ, rūpaṃ, taṃtaṃsamayavantanti attho.

[03] ^b^tato^eb^ ^a^M2.0156^ea^ ^b^pubbe^eb^ti tato khaṇattayassa pariyāpattito pubbe. anuppannattā ^b^anāgataṃ. pacchā^eb^ti tato pacchā. khaṇattayaṃ atikkantattā ^b^atītaṃ^eb^. yassa hetukiccaṃ, paccayakiccañca niṭṭhitattā atikkantaṃ, taṃ ^b^atītaṃ^eb^ uppādakkhaṇe hetukiccaṃ, uppannaphalattā niṭṭhitañcāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. tīsupi khaṇesu paccayakiccaṃ. pathavīādīnaṃ sandhāraṇādikaṃ, phassādīnaṃ phusanādikañca attano kiccaṃ sakiccaṃ, sakiccassa karaṇakkhaṇo ^b^sakiccakkhaṇo,^eb^ saha vā kiccena sakiccaṃ, yasmiṃ khaṇe sakiccaṃ rūpaṃ vā arūpaṃ vā hoti, so ^b^sakiccakkhaṇo,^eb^ tasmiṃ khaṇe paccuppannaṃ. ettha ca khaṇādikathāyaṃ ^b^``tato pubbe anāgataṃ, pacchā atīta''^eb^nti vacanaṃ addhādīsu viya bhedābhāvato nippariyāyaṃ. addhādivasena hi aññeva dhammā atītā aññe anāgatā aññe paccuppannā labbhanti, khaṇādivasena pana natthi dhammato bhedo, kālato eva bhedo. uppādato pubbe anāgato ^a^V2.0146^ea^, khaṇattaye vattamāno, tato paraṃ atītoti nippariyāyā, addhāpaccuppannādi viya kenaci pariyāyena atītamanāgatanti ca vattabbatābhāvato.

[03] 495^b^.^eb^ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ajjhattikabāhirabhedaṃ sandhāya ^b^``vuttanayo evā''^eb^ti vatvā tena aparitussamānena yadipi tattha ajjhattameva ajjhattikanti saddattho labbhati, tathāpi attheva ajjhattājjhattikasaddānaṃ, bahiddhābāhirasaddānañca aññamaññaṃ atthabhedo. tathā hi ajjhattikasaddo saparasantānikesu cakkhādīsu rūpādīsu bāhirasaddo viya pavattati, ajjhattasaddo pana tassa tassa sattassa sasantānikesveva cakkhurūpādīsu tato aññesu bahiddhāsaddo viya pavattati. tasmā tamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ suttantanaye. niyakajjhattampi na pubbe vuttājjhattikameva, parapuggalikampi na pubbe vuttabāhiramevāti adhippāyo.

[03] 496^b^.^eb^ hīnapaṇītabhedo pariyāyato, nippariyāyato ca veditabboti sambandho. ^b^tadeva^eb^ sudassīnaṃ rūpaṃ. ^b^yatthā^eb^ti yasmiṃ ārammaṇabhūte. yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā akusalavipākaviññāṇaṃ uppajjati, ^b^taṃ hīnaṃ^eb^ aniṭṭhabhāvato. yaṃ ^b^kusalavipākaṃ, taṃ paṇītaṃ^eb^ iṭṭhabhāvato. yathā hi akusalavipāko sayaṃ aniṭṭho aniṭṭhe eva uppajjati, na iṭṭhe, evaṃ kusalavipākopi sayaṃ iṭṭho iṭṭhe eva uppajjati, na aniṭṭhe. tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ --

[02] ``akusalakammajavasena ^a^M2.0157^ea^ aniṭṭhā pañca kāmaguṇā vibhattā, kusalakammajaṃ pana aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthi, sabbaṃ iṭṭhameva. kusalakammajavasena iṭṭhā pañca kāmaguṇā vibhattā. kusalakammajañhi aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthi, sabbaṃ iṭṭhamevā''ti (vibha0 aṭṭha0 6) ca.

[03] tattha manāpānipi kānici hatthirūpādīni akusalakammanibbattāni santi, na pana tāni tesaṃyeva hatthiādīnaṃ sukhassa hetubhāvaṃ gacchanti. tassa tasseva hi sattassa attanā katena kusalena nibbattaṃ sukhassa paccayo hoti, akusalena nibbattaṃ dukkhassa. tasmā kammajānaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhatā kammakārakasattassa vasena yojanārahā siyā. tattha yaṃ vuttaṃ ``kusalakammajaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī''ti, na ca vuttaṃ ``akusalakammajaṃ iṭṭhaṃ nāma natthī''ti, tena ^a^V2.0147^ea^ akusalakammajampi sobhanaṃ parasattānaṃ iṭṭhaṃ atthīti anuññātaṃ bhavissati, kusalakammajaṃ pana sabbesaṃ iṭṭhamevāti.

[03] tiracchānagatānaṃ pana kesañci manussarūpaṃ amanāpaṃ, yato te disvāva palāyanti, manussā ca devatārūpaṃ passitvā bhāyanti, tesampi vipākaviññāṇaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ ārabbha kusalavipākameva uppajjati, tādisassa pana puññassa abhāvā na tesaṃ tattha abhirati hoti. kusalakammajassa pana aniṭṭhassa abhāvo viya akusalakammajassa ca iṭṭhassa abhāvo vattabbo. hatthiādīnampi hi akusalakammajaṃ manussānaṃ akusalavipākasseva ārammaṇaṃ, kusalakammajaṃ pana pavatte samuṭṭhitaṃ kusalavipākassa. iṭṭhārammaṇena pana vomissakattā appakaṃ akusalakammajaṃ bahulaṃ akusalavipākuppattiyā kāraṇaṃ na bhavissatīti sakkā viññātuṃ, vipākaṃ pana na sakkā vañcetunti vipākavasena iṭṭhāniṭṭhārammaṇavavatthānaṃ suṭṭhu yujjati. yaṃ pana vuttaṃ ``aniṭṭhā pañca kāmaguṇā''ti, taṃ rūpādibhāvasāmaññato kāmaguṇasadisatāya taṃsadisesu tabbohārena vuttaṃ. iṭṭhāneva hi rūpādīni ``kāmaguṇā''ti pāḷiyaṃ (ma0 ni0 1.164-165, 177-178, 287; 2.155, 280; 3.57, 190; saṃ0 ni0 5.30) vuttāni. kāmaguṇavisabhāgā vā rūpādayo ``kāmaguṇā''ti vuttā asive sivoti vohāro viya, sabbāni vā iṭṭhāniṭṭhāni rūpādīni taṇhāvatthubhāvato kāmaguṇā eva. vuttañhi ``rūpā loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpa''ntiādi (dī0 ni0 2.400; ma0 ni0 1.133). atisayena pana kamanīyattā ^b^suttesu^eb^ kāmaguṇāti iṭṭharūpādīni vuttāni.

[03] ^b^vuttanayamevā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0158^ea^ abhidesena lakkhaṇato dūrasantikaṃ dassitanti āha ^b^``okāsatopettha upādāyupādāya dūrasantikatā veditabbā''^eb^ti. tattha kittakato paṭṭhāya rūpaṃ okāsavasena santike nāma, kittakato pana paṭṭhāya dūre nāma? pakatikathāya kathentānaṃ dvādasa hatthā savanūpacāro nāma, tassa orato santike, parato dūre. tattha sukhumarūpaṃ dūre hontaṃ lakkhaṇatopi okāsatopi dūre hoti, santike hontaṃ pana okāsatova santike hoti, na lakkhaṇato. oḷārikarūpaṃ santike hontaṃ lakkhaṇatopi okāsatopi santike hoti, dūre hontaṃ okāsatova hoti, na lakkhaṇato. ``upādāyupādāyā''ti pana vuttattā attano rūpaṃ santike nāma, antokucchigatassāpi parassa dūre. antokucchigatassa santike, bahi ṭhitassa dūreti ^a^V2.0148^ea^ evaṃ antogabbhapamukhapariveṇasaṅghārāmasīmāgāmakhettajanapadarajjasamuddacakkavāḷesu tadantogatabahigatānaṃ vasena dūrasantikatā veditabbā.

[03] 497^b^.^eb^ ^b^tadekajjha^eb^nti taṃ ekajjhaṃ ekato. ^b^abhisaṃyūhitvā^eb^ti saṃharitvā, samūhaṃ vā katvā. ^b^abhisaṅkhipitvā^eb^ti saṅkhipitvā saṅkhepaṃ katvā. ^b^``sabbampi rūpaṃ...pe0... dassitaṃ hotī''^eb^ti iminā rūpakhandhasaddānaṃ samānādhikaraṇasamāsabhāvaṃ dasseti. tenevāha ^b^``na hi rūpato añño rūpakkhandho nāma atthī''^eb^ti.
[03] 498^b^.^eb^ rāsibhāvūpagamanena vedanākkhandhādayoti dassitā hontīti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^santativasena, khaṇādivasena cā^eb^ti ettha addhāsamayavasena atītādivibhāgassa avacanaṃ sukhādivasena bhinnāya atītādibhāvavacanato. na hi sukhā eva addhāvasena, samayavasena ca atītādikā hoti, tathā dukkhā eva, adukkhamasukhā eva ca kāyikacetasikādibhāvena bhinnā, tena vedanāsamudāyo addhāsamayavasena atītādibhāvena vattabbataṃ arahati samudāyassa tehi paricchinditabbattā, vedanekadesā pana gayhamānā santatikhaṇehi paricchedaṃ arahanti tathā paricchinditvā gahetabbato. ekasantatiyaṃ pana sukhādīsu anekabhedabhinnesu yo bhedo paricchinditabbabhāvena gahito, tassa ekappakārassa ^a^M2.0159^ea^ pākaṭassa paricchedikā taṃsahitadvārālambanappavattā, avicchedena taduppādakekavidhavisayasamāyogappavattā ca santati bhavituṃ arahatīti tassā bhedantaraṃ anāmasitvā paricchedakabhāvena gahaṇaṃ kataṃ, lahuparivattino vā arūpadhammā parivattaneneva paricchedena paricchindanaṃ arahantīti santatikhaṇavaseneva paricchedo vutto. ekavidhavisayasamāyogappavattā divasampi buddharūpaṃ passantassa, dhammaṃ suṇantassa pavattasaddhādisahitavedanā ^b^paccuppannā. ``pubbantāparantamajjhattagatā''^eb^ti etena hetupaccayakiccavasena vuttanayaṃ dasseti.

[03] 499^b^.^eb^ sabyāpārasaussāhasavipākatā kusalādīhi tīhipi sādhāraṇāti asādhāraṇameva dassetuṃ ^b^``sāvajjakiriyahetuto''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sāvajjakiriyahetuto^eb^ti pāṇātipātādigārayhakiriyānimittato. ^b^kilesasantāpabhāvato^eb^ti kilesapariḷāhena sadarathabhāvato ^a^V2.0149^ea^. vūpasantasabhāvāya kusalāya vedanāya ^b^oḷārikā. sabyāpārato^eb^ti saīhato. tena yathā pavattamānāyassā vipākena bhavitabbaṃ, tathā pavattiṃ vadanto vipākuppādanayogyatamāha. ^b^saussāhato^eb^ti sasattito, tena vipākuppādanasamatthataṃ. ^b^savipākato^eb^ti vipākasabbhāvato, tena paccayantarasamavāyenassā vipākanibbattanaṃ. tīhipi padehi vipākadhammataṃyeva dasseti. kāyakammādibyāpārasabbhāvato vā ^b^sabyāpārato,^eb^ javanussāhavasena ^b^saussāhato,^eb^ vipākuppādanasamatthatāvasena ^b^savipākato^eb^ti evamettha attho veditabbo. vipākaṃ anuppādentīpi kiriyā kusalā viya sabyāpārā, saussāhā eva ca hotīti tadubhayaṃ anāmasitvā kiriyābyākatavāre ``savipākato'' icceva vuttaṃ. ^b^sabyābajjhato^eb^ti kilesadukkhena sadukkhato. ^b^vuttavipariyāyato^eb^ti anavajjakiriyahetuto, kilesasantāpābhāvato, abyābajjhato ca vūpasantavuttīti evaṃ akusalāya vuttavipallāsato. ^b^yathāyoga^eb^nti yogānurūpaṃ. tīsu kāraṇesu yaṃ yaṃ yassā yassā yujjati, tadanurūpanti attho. kusalākusalavedanāhi vipākabyākatāya tīhipi kāraṇehi ^b^oḷārikā^eb^. kiriyābyākatāya savipākato savipākatāvisiṭṭhasabyāpārasaussāhato vāti. ^b^vuttapariyāyenā^eb^ti vipākabyākatā abyāpārato ^a^M2.0160^ea^, anussāhato, avipākato ca tāhi kusalākusalavedanāhi sukhumā. kiriyābyākatā avipākato, avipākatāvisiṭṭhasabyāpārasaussāhato vāti evaṃ kusalākusalāya vuttavipallāsena. kammavegakkhittā hi kammapaṭibimbabhūtā ca kāyakammādibyāpāravirahato nirussāhā vipākā. saussāhā ca kiriyā avipākadhammā. savipākadhammā hi sagabbhā viya oḷārikāti.

[03] 500^b^.^eb^ ^b^nirassādato^eb^ti assādābhāvato sukhapaṭikkhepato. ^b^savipphārato^eb^ti saparipphandato, anupasantatoti attho. ^b^abhibhavanato^eb^ti ajjhottharaṇato. sukhāya majjhattatā natthi, upekkhāya sātatā. santatādayo pana sabbattha sukhupekkhāsu labbhantīti ^b^``yathāyoga''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^pākaṭato^eb^ti sukhito dukkhitoti disvāpi jānitabbattā vibhūtabhāvato. ^b^sā^eb^ adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
[03] 501^b^.^eb^ ^b^asamāpannasamāpanna^eb^-ggahaṇena cettha bhūmivasenāpi vedanānaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā vuttāti veditabbā. ^b^itarā^eb^ samāpannassa vedanā.

[03] ^b^oghaniyato^eb^ti ^a^V2.0150^ea^ oghehi ārammaṇaṃ katvā atikkamitabbato. tathā ^b^yoganiyato, ganthaniyato cā^eb^ti etthāpi ganthova ganthanaṃ, tassa hitaṃ ārammaṇabhāvena sambandhanatoti ^b^ganthaniyaṃ^eb^. evaṃ ^b^nīvaraṇiyaṃ, upādāniyañca^eb^ veditabbaṃ. saṃkilese niyuttā, saṃkilesaṃ vā arahantīti ^b^saṃkilesikā. sā^eb^ anāsavā.

[03] 502^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatthā^eb^ti yathāvuttāya oḷārikasukhumatāya. ^b^sambhedo^eb^ti saṅkaro. ``oḷārikā, sukhumā''ti ca vuttānampi jātiādivasena puna sukhumoḷārikabhāvāpattidoso yathā na hoti, tathā ^b^pariharitabbo^eb^. jātivasena sukhumāya vedanāya sabhāvapuggalalokiyavasena oḷārikataṃ pāḷivasena dassetuṃ ^b^``vuttañheta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^evaṃ sukhādayopī^eb^ti ettha akusalā vedanā ^b^jātivasena oḷārikā, sabhāvavasena sukhumā^eb^. kusalajjhānasahagatā sukhā vedanā jātivasena oḷārikā, samāpannassa vedanāti katvā puggalavasena sukhumāti evamādinā yojetabbā. ^b^``na parāmasitabbo''^eb^ti etena jātiādayo ^a^M2.0161^ea^ cattāro koṭṭhāsā aññamaññaṃ avomissakā eva gahetabbā. evaṃ sambhedassa parihāro, na aññathāti dasseti. yathā abyākatamukhena, evaṃ kusalākusalamukhenapi, yathā ca jātimukhena, evaṃ sabhāvādimukhenapi dassetabbanti imamatthaṃ ^b^``esa nayo sabbatthā''^eb^ti atidisati.

[03] idāni jātiādikoṭṭhāsesupi mitho akusalādīnaṃ upādāyupādāya oḷārikasukhumataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^``nissayadahanato''^eb^ti iminā dosasahagatāya pākaṭaṃ kurūrappavattiṃ dasseti. ^b^niyatā^eb^ti micchattaniyāmena niyatā, ānantariyabhāvappattā kappatiṭṭhanakavipākatāya ^b^kappaṭṭhitikā^eb^ devadattādīnaṃ viya. ^b^asaṅkhārikā^eb^ sabhāvatikhiṇatāya ^b^oḷārikā. diṭṭhisampayuttā^eb^ mahāsāvajjatāya ^b^oḷārikā. sāpi^eb^ diṭṭhisampayuttā ^b^niyatā oḷārikā,^eb^ tato ^b^kappaṭṭhitikā,^eb^ tato ^b^asaṅkhārikā^eb^ti tividhāpi heṭṭhā vuttanayattā ekajjhaṃ vuttā visuṃ visuṃyeva yojetabbā. tenāha ^b^``itarā sukhumā''^eb^ti. ^b^avisesenā^eb^ti dosasahagatā, lobhasahagatāti abhedena. ^b^akusalā bahuvipākā^eb^ dosussannatāya ^b^oḷārikā^eb^. tathā ^b^kusalā appavipākā^eb^. mandadosattā akusalā ^b^appavipākā sukhumā^eb^. tathā ^b^kusalā bahuvipākā^eb^.

[03] oḷārikasukhumanikantivatthubhāvato kāmāvacarādīnaṃ oḷārikasukhumatā, lokuttarā pana ekantasukhumāva. tatthāpi ca vibhāgaṃ parato vakkhati. ^b^bhāvanāmayāpī^eb^ti bhāvanāmayāya bhedanena ^a^V2.0151^ea^ dānasīlamayānampi bhedanaṃ nayato dassitanti veditabbaṃ. bhāvanāya paguṇabalavakālādīsu kadāci ñāṇavippayuttacittenapi manasikāro hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``bhāvanāmayāpi duhetukā''^eb^ti. ^b^taṃtaṃbhūmivipākakiriyāvedanāsū^eb^ti ettha ``kāmāvacaravipākā oḷārikā, rūpāvacarā sukhumā''tiādinā yāva arahattaphalā netabbaṃ. ``kāmāvacarakiriyā oḷārikā, rūpāvacarakiriyā sukhumā''tiādinā kāmāvacarā ca ``dānākārappavattā oḷārikā, sīlākārappavattā sukhumā''tiādinā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā netabbaṃ. yathā ca jātikoṭṭhāse ayaṃ vibhāgo, evaṃ sabhāvakoṭṭhāsādīsupīti dassetuṃ ^b^``dukkhādī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] sabbo ^a^M2.0162^ea^ cāyaṃ vibhāgo lakkhaṇasannissito vuttoti katvā āha ^b^``okāsavasena cāpī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^sukhāpī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena adukkhamasukhaṃ sampiṇḍeti. ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbāsu bhūmīsu. ^b^yathānurūpa^eb^nti yā yā vedanā yattha yattha labbhati, tadanurūpaṃ. ^b^vatthuvasenā^eb^ti yaṃ vatthuṃ ārabbha vedanā pavattati, tassa vasenāpi. ^b^hīnavatthukā^eb^ti hīnaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kaṅgubhattaṃ bhuñjantassa vedanā hīnavatthukatāya ^b^oḷārikā^eb^. sālimaṃsodanaṃ bhuñjantassa paṇītavatthukatāya ^b^sukhumā^eb^ti.

[03] 503^b^.^eb^ ^b^ādinā nayenā^eb^ti sabbaṃ pāḷigatiṃ āmasati. jātiādivasena asamānakoṭṭhāsatā ^b^visabhāgatā^eb^. dukkhavipākatādivasena asadisakiccatā ^b^asaṃsaṭṭhatā,^eb^ na asampayogo. yadi siyā, dūravipariyāyena santikaṃ hotīti saṃsaṭṭhatā santikatā āpajjati, na ca vedanāya vedanāsampayogo atthi. santikapadavaṇṇanāya ca ``sabhāgato ca sarikkhato cā''ti vakkhatīti vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. asadisasabhāvatā ^b^asarikkhatā. sabbavāresū^eb^ti oḷārikasukhumabhede vuttanayānusārena vattabbesu sabbesu vāresu. jātiādivasena samānakoṭṭhāsatā ^b^sabhāgatā,^eb^ dukkhavipākatādivasena pana sadisasabhāvatā ^b^sarikkhatā^eb^. tenāha ^b^``akusalā pana...pe0... santike''^eb^ti.
[06] iti vedanākkhandhassa atītādivibhāge vitthārakathāmukhavaṇṇanā.

[03] 504^b^.^eb^ ^b^eta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0152^ea^ evaṃ atītādivibhāge vitthārakathāmukhaṃ. ^b^ñāṇabhedattha^eb^nti nānappakāraṃ ñāṇappabhedatthaṃ. ^b^kamato^eb^ti desanākkamato, yena kāraṇenāyaṃ desanākkamo kato, tatoti attho. ^b^visesato^eb^ti bhedato, khandhupādānakkhandhavibhāgatoti attho. ^b^anūnādhikato^eb^ti pañcabhāvato. ^b^upamāto^eb^ti upamāhi upametabbato. ^b^daṭṭhabbato dvidhā^eb^ti dvīhi ākārehi ñāṇena passitabbato. ^b^passantassatthasiddhito^eb^ti ^a^M2.0163^ea^ yathā passantassa yathādhippetatthanipphattito. ^b^vibhāvinā^eb^ti paññavatā.

[03] ^b^uppattikkamo^eb^ti yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjantānaṃ uppajjanapaṭipāṭi. ``dassanenapahātabbā''tiādinā (dha0 sa0 tikamātikā 8, 9) paṭhamaṃ pahātabbā paṭhamaṃ vuttā, dutiyaṃ pahātabbā dutiyaṃ vuttāti ayaṃ ^b^pahānakkamo^eb^. sīlavisuddhiṃ paṭipajja cittavisuddhi paṭipajjitabbā, tathā tato parāpīti āha ^b^``sīlavisuddhi...pe0... paṭipattikkamo''^eb^ti, anupubbapaṇītā bhūmiyo anupubbena vavatthitāti ayaṃ ^b^bhūmikkamo^eb^. ``cattāro satipaṭṭhānā''tiādiko (vibha0 355) ekakkhaṇepi satipaṭṭhānādisambhavato ^b^desanākkamo^eb^ ca. dānakathādayo anupubbukkaṃsato kathitā, uppattiādivavatthānābhāvato pana dānādīnaṃ idha desanākkamavacanaṃ. uppattiādivavatthānahetukatāya hi ``paṭhamaṃ kalalaṃ hotī''tiādikā (saṃ0 ni0 1.235; kathā0 692) desanāpi samānā uppattiādikamabhāveneva vuttā. yathāvuttavavatthānābhāvena pana anekesaṃ vacanānaṃ sahapavattiyā asambhavato yena kenaci pubbāpariyena desetabbatāya tena tena adhippāyena desanāmattasseva kamo ^b^desanākkamo^eb^ daṭṭhabbo. ^b^pubbāpariyavavatthānenā^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ rūpakkhandho, tato vedanākkhandhoti evaṃ pubbāpariyavavatthānena anuppattito. ^b^appahātabbato^eb^ti khandhesu ekaccānaṃ pahātabbatāva natthi, kuto pahānakkamo. sati hi sabbesaṃ pahātabbatāya pahānakkamena nesaṃ desanā siyā. ^b^appaṭipajjanīyato^eb^ti sammāpaṭipattivasena na paṭipajjitabbato. ^b^``catubhūmipariyāpannattā''^eb^ti iminā vedanādīnaṃ aniyatabhūmikataṃ dasseti. niyatabhūmikānañhi bhūmikkamo sambhaveyya.

[03] ^b^abhedenā^eb^ti rūpādīnaṃ bhedaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā ekajjhaṃ piṇḍaggahaṇena. ^b^attagāhapatita^eb^nti attagāhasaṅkhāte diṭṭhoghe nipatitaṃ. ^b^samūhaghanavinibbhogadassanenā^eb^ti rūpato arūpaṃ vivecento rūpārūpasamūhe ^a^V2.0153^ea^ ghanavinibbhujjanadassanena. ^b^cakkhuādīnampi visayabhūta^eb^nti ekadesena samudāyabhūtaṃ rūpakkhandhaṃ vadati. yā ettha iṭṭhaṃ, aniṭṭhañca rūpaṃ saṃvedeti, ayaṃ vedanākkhandhoti iṭṭhāniṭṭharūpasaṃvedanikaṃ vedanaṃ desesīti sambandho. evaṃ sabbattha. iṭṭhamajjhattāniṭṭhamajjhattānampi iṭṭhāniṭṭhasabhāvattā iṭṭhāniṭṭhaggahaṇeneva gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^eva^eb^nti yathāvuttanayena. saññāya gahitākāre ^a^M2.0164^ea^ visaye abhisaṅkhārappavattīti āha ^b^``saññāvasena abhisaṅkhārake''^eb^ti. yathā viññāṇassa sampayuttadhammānaṃ nissayabhāvo pākaṭo, na tathā vedanādīnanti āha ^b^``vedanādīnaṃ nissaya''^eb^nti. ``manopubbaṅgamā dhammā (dha0 pa0 1-2), cittānuparivattino dhammā (dha0 sa0 dukamātikā 62), chadvārādhipati rājā''ti (dha0 pa0 aṭṭha0 2.181 erakapatthanāgarājavatthu) vacanato ^b^viññāṇaṃ^eb^ adhipati.
[03] 505^b^.^eb^ rūpakkhandhe ^b^``sāsavaṃ upādāniya''^eb^nti vacanaṃ anāsavānaṃ dhammānaṃ sabbhāvato rūpakkhandhassa taṃsabhāvatānivattanatthaṃ, na anāsavarūpanivattanatthaṃ.
[03] ^b^anāsavāva khandhesu vuttā^eb^ti ettha aṭṭhānappayutto ^b^eva^eb^-saddo, anāsavā khandhesveva vuttāti attho. ^b^idha pana^eb^ visuddhimagge ^b^sabbepete^eb^ khandhāpi upādānakkhandhāpi.

[03] 506^b^.^eb^ sabbasaṅkhatānaṃ sabhāgena ekajjhaṃ saṅgaho ^b^sabbasaṅkhatasabhāgekasaṅgaho^eb^. sabhāgasabhāvena hi saṅgayhamānā sabbasaṅkhatā pañcakkhandhā honti. tattha ruppanādisāmaññena samānakoṭṭhāsā sabhāgāti veditabbā. tesu saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇakiccaṃ āyūhanarasāya cetanāya balavanti sā ``saṅkhārakkhandho''ti vuttā. aññe ca ruppanādivisesalakkhaṇarahitā phassādayo saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇasāmaññenāti daṭṭhabbā, phusanādayo pana sabhāvā visuṃ khandhasaddavacanīyā na hontīti dhammasabhāvaññunā tathāgatena phassakkhandhādayo na vuttāti veditabbā. ``ye hi keci, bhikkhave, samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā sassatavādā sassataṃ attānañca lokañca paññapenti, sabbe te ime eva pañcupādānakkhandhe nissāya paṭicca, etesaṃ vā aññatara''nti evamādisuttānañca vasena attattaniyagāhassa etapparamatā daṭṭhabbā. etena ca vakkhamānasuttavasena ca khandhe eva nissāya parittārammaṇādivasena na vattabbā ca diṭṭhi uppajjati khandhanibbānavajjassa sabhāvadhammassa abhāvatoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^rūpa^eb^nti ruppanasabhāvaṃ dhammajātamāha. ^b^vedana^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. ``sīlakkhandho samādhikkhandho''tiādi (dī0 ni0 3.355) vacanato ^a^V2.0154^ea^ aññesañca khandhasaddavacanīyānaṃ ^a^M2.0165^ea^ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ sabbhāvato na pañcevāti codanaṃ nivattetumāha ^b^``aññesaṃ tadavarodhato''^eb^ti.

[03] 507^b^.^eb^ pavattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``nivāsaṭṭhānato''^eb^ti. dukkhadukkhavipariṇāmadukkhasaṅkhāradukkhatāvasena vedanāya ābādhakattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. rāgādisampayuttassa vipariṇāmādidukkhassa itthipurisādiākāragāhikā taṃtaṃsaṅkappamūlabhūtā saññā ^b^samuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. pittādi viya rogassa āsannakāraṇaṃ ^b^samuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. utubhojanavisamatāvisamaparihārādi viya mūlakāraṇaṃ ^b^nidānaṃ^eb^. cittassa aṅgabhūtā cetasikāti viññāṇaṃ gilānūpamaṃ vuttaṃ. kuṭṭharogavato siniyhanaṃ tassa bhiyyobhāvāya viya bālassa puññābhisaṅkhārādivasena pavatti vedanādukkhāvahā asappāyasevanasadisī. ^b^vedanattāyā^eb^ti vedanāsabhāvatthaṃ, vedanattalābhāyāti attho. kāraṇaṭṭhānatāya, bhojanādhāratāya ca ^b^cārakūpamaṃ, bhājanūpama^eb^ñca rūpaṃ. subhasaññādivasena vedanākāraṇassa hetubhāvato, vedanābhojanassa chādāpanato ca ^b^aparādhūpamā, byañjanūpamā^eb^ ca saññā. vedanāhetuto ^b^kāraṇakārakūpamo, parivesakūpamo^eb^ ca saṅkhārakkhandho. bhattakāro eva yebhuyyena parivisatīti parivesakaggahaṇaṃ. vedanāya vibādhitabbato, anuggahetabbato ca ^b^aparādhikūpamaṃ, bhuñjakūpama^eb^ñca viññāṇaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] 508^b^.^eb^ ``pañca vadhakā paccatthikā ukkhittāsikāti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana''nti ^b^āsīvisūpame^eb^ (saṃ0 ni0 4.238) vadhakāti vuttā, ``bhāroti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana''nti ^b^bhārasutte^eb^ (saṃ0 ni0 3.22) bhārāti, ``atītampāhaṃ addhānaṃ evameva rūpena khajjiṃ, seyyathāpi etarahi paccuppannena rūpena khajjāmi. ahañceva kho pana anāgataṃ rūpaṃ abhinandeyyaṃ, anāgatampāhaṃ addhānaṃ evameva rūpena khajjeyyaṃ, seyyathāpi...pe0... khajjāmī''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 3.79) ^b^khajjanīyapariyāye^eb^ khādakāti, ``so aniccaṃ rūpaṃ `aniccaṃ rūpa'nti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānātī''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 3.85) ^b^yamakasutte^eb^ aniccādikāti. yadipi ``idha pana sabbepete ekajjhaṃ katvā khandhāti adhippetā''ti vuttaṃ, bāhullena pana upādānakkhandhānaṃ tadantogadhānaṃ daṭṭhabbatā veditabbā. vipassanāya bhūmivicāro hesoti.

[03] ^b^pheṇapiṇḍo^eb^ ^a^M2.0166^ea^ ^b^viyā^eb^tiādīsu rūpādīnaṃ evaṃ pheṇapiṇḍādisadisatā daṭṭhabbā, yathā pheṇapiṇḍo ^a^V2.0155^ea^ nissāro paridubbalo agayhupago; gahitopi kiñci atthaṃ na sādheti, chiddāvachiddo anekasandhisaṅghaṭito bahūnaṃ pāṇakānaṃ āvāso anupubbūpacito sabbāvatthanipātī avassaṃbhedī, evaṃ rūpampi niccasārādivirahato nissāraṃ pheggu viya, sukhabhañjanīyato dubbalaṃ, niccanti vā dhuvanti vā ahanti vā mamanti vā na gahetabbaṃ, gahitampi tathā na hoti, bahuchiddaṃ asītisatasandhisaṅghaṭitaṃ anekakimikulāvāsaṃ kalalādivasena anupubbūpacitaṃ kalalakālato paṭṭhāya sabbāsupi avatthāsu vinassati, avassameva ca bhijjati. ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (saṃ0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.3.95; vibha0 aṭṭha0 26 kamādivinicchayakathā) pana parimaddanāsahanameva upamūpameyyasambandho vutto.

[03] yathā pubbuḷo nissāro paridubbalo agayhupago, gahitopi na kiñci atthaṃ sādheti, na ciraṭṭhitiko, tathā vedanāpi. yathā ca pubbuḷo, udakatalaṃ, udakabinduṃ, udakajallikaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā puṭaṃ katvā gahaṇavātañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca jāyati, evaṃ vedanāpi vatthuṃ, ārammaṇaṃ, kilesajallaṃ, phassasaṅghaṭṭanañcāti cattāri kāraṇāni paṭicca uppajjati. yathā hi udakatale bindunipātajanito vāto udakajallikasaṅkhātaṃ udakalasikaṃ saṅkaḍḍhitvā puṭaṃ katvā pubbuḷaṃ nāma karoti, evaṃ vatthumhi ārammaṇāpāthagamanajanito phasso anupacchinnaṃ kilesajallaṃ sahakārīpaccayabhāvena saṅkaḍḍhitvā vedanaṃ nāma karoti. idañca kilesehi mūlakāraṇabhūtehi, ārammaṇassādanabhūtehi ca nibbattaṃ vaṭṭagataṃ vedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena vā cattāro paccayā vuttā, ūnehipi pana uppajjateva. idha muhuttaramaṇīyatā upamopameyyasambandho vutto.

[03] yathā pana ^b^marīcikā^eb^ asārā agayhupagā. na hi taṃ gahetvā pātuṃ vā nhāyituṃ vā bhājanaṃ vā pūretuṃ sakkā, evaṃ saññāpi asārā agayhupagā. yathā ca marīcikā vipphandamānā sañjātūmivegā viya khāyantī mahājanaṃ vippalambeti, evaṃ saññāpi ``nīlaṃ pītaṃ dīghaṃ rassa''ntiādinā ārammaṇe pavattamānā sabhāvamatte aṭṭhatvā ``subhaṃ sukhaṃ nicca''ntiādimicchāgāhassa kāraṇabhāvena lokaṃ vippalambeti.

[03] yathā ^a^M2.0167^ea^ ^b^kadalikkhandho^eb^ asāro agayhupago. na hi taṃ gahetvā gopānasīādīnaṃ atthāya upanetuṃ sakkā, upanītampi tathā na hoti, bahuvaṭṭisamodhāno ca hoti, evaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhopi ^a^V2.0156^ea^ asāro agayhupago. na hi taṃ niccādivasena gahetuṃ sakkā, gahitampi tathā na hoti, bahudhammasamodhāno ca. aññadeva hi phassassa lakkhaṇaṃ, aññaṃ cetanādīnaṃ, te pana sabbe samodhānetvā saṅkhārakkhandhoti vuccati.

[03] yathā ca ^b^māyā^eb^ asārā agayhupagā. na hi taṃ gahetvā kiñci atthaṃ kiccaṃ sādhetuṃ sakkā, ittarā lahupaccupaṭṭhānā amaṇiādimeva maṇiādirūpena dassentī mahājanaṃ vañceti, evaṃ viññāṇampi asāraṃ ittaraṃ lahupaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, teneva cittena āgacchantaṃ viya, gacchantaṃ viya, ṭhitaṃ viya, nisinnaṃ viya ca katvā gāhāpeti, aññadeva cittaṃ āgamane, aññaṃ gamanādīsūti. evaṃ viññāṇaṃ māyāsadisaṃ.

[03] pañcapi upādānakkhandhā asubhādisabhāvā eva saṃkilesāsucivatthubhāvāditoti asubhādito daṭṭhabbā eva, tathāpi katthaci koci viseso sukhaggahaṇīyo hotīti āha ^b^``visesato cā''^eb^tiādi. tattha cattāro satipaṭṭhānā catuvipallāsappahānakarāti tesaṃ gocarabhāvena rūpakkhandhādīsu asubhādibhāvena daṭṭhabbatā vuttā.
[03] 509^b^.^eb^ ^b^khandhehi na vihaññati^eb^ parividitasabhāvattā. vipassakopi tesaṃ vipattiyaṃ na dukkhamāpajjati, khīṇāsavesu pana vattabbameva natthi. te hi āyatimpi khandhehi na bādhīyantīti.

[03] ^b^kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ parijānātī^eb^ti ``āhārasamudayā rūpasamudayo''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.56,57) vacanato ajjhattikarūpe chandarāgaṃ pajahanto tassa samudayabhūte kabaḷīkārāhārepi chandarāgaṃ pajahatīti attho. ayaṃ ^b^pahānapariññā^eb^. ajjhattikarūpaṃ pana pariggaṇhanto tassa paccayabhūtaṃ kabaḷīkārāhāraṃ pariggaṇhātīti ^b^ñātapariññā^eb^. tassa ca udayabbayānupassī hotīti ^b^tīraṇapariññā^eb^ ca yojetabbā. evaṃ pariññattaye sijjhante ime vipallāsādayo vidhamīyanti evāti āha ^b^``asubhe subhanti vipallāsaṃ pajahatī''^eb^tiādi. tattha kāmarāgabhūtaṃ abhijjhaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``abhijjhākāyagantha''^eb^nti. asubhānupassanāya hi kāmarāgappahānaṃ hoti ^a^M2.0168^ea^, kāmarāgamukhena vā sabbalobhappahānaṃ vadati. ^b^na upādiyati^eb^ na gaṇhati na uppādeti.

[03] ``phassapaccayā ^a^V2.0157^ea^ vedanā''ti (ma0 ni0 3.126; saṃ0 ni0 2.39; mahāva0 1; udā0 1; netti0 24) vuttattā ``vedanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahanto tassā paccayabhūte phassāhārepi chandarāgaṃ pajahatī''tiādinā āhāraparijānane vuttanayena phassaparijānanaṃ yojetabbaṃ. vedanāya dukkhato dassanena tattha ^b^sukhanti vipallāsaṃ pajahati^eb^. sukhatthameva bhavapatthanā hotīti vedanāya taṇhaṃ pajahanto ^b^bhavoghaṃ uttarati^eb^. tato eva ^b^bhavayogena visaṃyujjati. bhavāsavena ca anāsavo hoti,^eb^ sabbavedanaṃ dukkhato passanto attano parena apubbaṃ dukkhaṃ uppāditaṃ, sukhaṃ vā vināsitaṃ na cinteti, tato ``anatthaṃ me acarī''tiādi (dha0 sa0 1237; vibha0 909) āghātavatthuppahānato ^b^byāpādakāyaganthaṃ bhindati^eb^. ``sukhabahule sugatibhave suddhī''ti aggahetvā gosīlagovatādīhi suddhiṃ parāmasanto sukhapatthanāvaseneva parāmasatīti vedanāya taṇhaṃ pajahantopi ^b^sīlabbatupādānaṃ na upādiyati^eb^.

[03] manosañcetanā saṅkhārakkhandho, saññā pana taṃsampayuttāti saññāsaṅkhāre anattato passanto manosañcetanāya chandarāgaṃ pajahati, tañca pariggaṇhāti, tīreti cāti ^b^``saññaṃ saṅkhāre...pe0... parijānātī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. saññāsaṅkhāre anattāti passanto attadiṭṭhimūlakattā sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ attadiṭṭhiṃ viya sabbadiṭṭhiyopi vidhamatīti dassento ^b^``diṭṭhoghaṃ uttarati...pe0... attavādupādānaṃ na upādiyatī''^eb^ti āha.

[03] ^b^viññāṇaṃ aniccato passanto^eb^ aniccānupassanāmukhena tissopi anupassanā ussukkanto tīhipi pariññāhi ^b^viññāṇāhāraṃ parijānāti^eb^. visesato panettha ^b^anicce niccanti vipallāsaṃ pajahati^eb^. tattha niccaggāhabāhullato avijjāya viññāṇe ghanagahaṇaṃ hotīti ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā taṃ aniccato passanto ^b^avijjoghaṃ uttarati^eb^. tato eva avijjāyogena visaṃyutto ^b^avijjāsavena anāsavo ca hoti^eb^. mohabaleneva sīlabbataparāmasanaṃ hotīti taṃ pajahanto ^b^``sīlabbataparāmāsakāyaganthaṃ bhindati^eb^.

[02] ``yañca ^a^M2.0169^ea^ kho idaṃ, bhikkhave, vuccati cittaṃ itipi, mano itipi, viññāṇaṃ itipi, tatrāssutavā puthujjano nālaṃ nibbindituṃ, nālaṃ virajjituṃ, nālaṃ vimuccituṃ. taṃ kissa hetu? dīgharattaṃ hetaṃ, bhikkhave, assutavato puthujjanassa ajjhositaṃ mamāyitaṃ ^a^V2.0158^ea^ parāmaṭṭhaṃ `etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā'''tiādi (saṃ0 ni0 2.62) --
[03] vacanato yathā viññāṇaṃ niccato passanto diṭṭhupādānaṃ upādiyati, evaṃ taṃ aniccato passanto ^b^diṭṭhupādānaṃ na upādiyatī^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^evaṃ mahānisaṃsanti^eb^ vuttappakārena vipallāsādisakalasaṃkilesavidhamanupāyabhāvato evaṃ vipuludayaṃ. ^b^vadhakādivasenā^eb^ti ukkhittāsikavadhakādivasena. ^b^passeyyā^eb^ti ñāṇadassanena paccakkhato passeyya.
[06] khandhaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti cuddasamaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 510^b^.^eb^ ``khandhāyatanā''tiādinā ^a^M2.0170^ea^ ^a^V2.0159^ea^ heṭṭhā uddiṭṭhāni paduddhāravasena ``āyatanānī''ti vatvā gaṇanaparicchedenāha ^b^``dvādasāyatanānī''^eb^ti. tattha vattabbaṃ parato sayameva vakkhati. ^b^cakkhāyatana^eb^ntiādi nesaṃ sarūpadassanaṃ.

[01] ^b^attho^eb^ nāma saddattho, bhāvattho pana ^b^lakkhaṇameva^eb^. so pana saddattho duvidho -- asādhāraṇo sādhāraṇoti. tattha asādhāraṇo cakkhādisaddattho, sādhāraṇo āyatanasaddattho dvādasannampi samānattā.

[03] tesu asādhāraṇaṃ tāva dassento ^b^``visesato tāvā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^visesato^eb^ti visesatthato, cakkhādisaddatthatoti attho. ^b^assādetī^eb^ti cakkhati-saddo ``madhuṃ cakkhati, byañjanaṃ cakkhatī''ti rasasāyanattho atthīti tassa vasena atthaṃ vadati. ``cakkhuṃ kho pana, māgaṇḍiya, rūpārāmaṃ rūparataṃ rūpasammudita''nti (ma0 ni0 2.209) vacanato cakkhu ^b^rūpaṃ assādeti^eb^. satipi sotādīnaṃ saddārāmatādibhāve yo ``yaṃ cakkhu catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo''tiādinā (dha0 sa0 597) pāḷiyaṃ, ``rūpābhighātārahabhūtappasādalakkhaṇa''ntiādinā (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 600; visuddhi0 2.433) aṭṭhakathāyañca vutto atthaviseso, tattheva niruḷhattā cakkhumhi eva cakkhusaddo pavattati gavādīsu gosaddādi viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^vibhāveti cā^eb^ti saddalakkhaṇasiddhassa cakkhati-saddassa vasena atthaṃ vadati. ^b^cakkhatī^eb^ti hi ācikkhati, abhibyattaṃ vadatīti attho. nettassa ca vadantassa viya samavisamavibhāvanameva ^a^V2.0160^ea^ ācikkhananti katvā āha ^b^``vibhāveti cāti attho''^eb^ti, anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṃ vibhāvanatthatā ca cakkhati-saddassa daṭṭhabbā. rattaduṭṭhādikālesu kakaṇṭakarūpaṃ viya, uddarūpaṃ viya ca vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ rūpaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ rūpayati rūpamiva pakāsaṃ karoti, saviggahamiva katvā dassetīti attho. vitthāraṇaṃ vā ^a^M2.0171^ea^ rūpasaddassa attho, vitthāraṇañca pakāsanamevāti āha ^b^``pakāsetīti attho''^eb^ti. anekatthattā vā dhātūnaṃ pakāsanattho eva rūpasaddo daṭṭhabbo. vaṇṇavācakassa rūpasaddassa rūpayatīti nibbacanaṃ, rūpakkhandhavācakassa ruppatīti ayaṃ viseso. ^b^udāharīyatī^eb^ti vuccatīti atthe vacanasaddo eva gahito siyā, na ca vacanasaddo evettha saddo, atha kho sabbopi sotaviññeyyoti. ^b^sappatī^eb^ti sakehi paccayehi sappīyati, sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ gamīyatīti attho.

[03] ^b^sūcayatī^eb^ti attano vatthuṃ apākaṭaṃ gandhavasena ``idaṃ sugandhaṃ, duggandha''nti pakāseti, paṭicchannaṃ vā pupphādivatthuṃ ``ettha pupphamatthi, campakādiphalamatthi, ambādī''ti pesuññaṃ karontaṃ viya hotīti attho. rasaggahaṇamūlakattā ajjhoharaṇassa jīvitahetumhi āhārarase ninnatāya ^b^jīvitaṃ avhayatīti jivhā^eb^ niruttilakkhaṇena. ^b^kucchitānaṃ sāsavadhammānaṃ āyo^eb^ti visesena ^b^kāyo^eb^ vutto anuttariyahetubhāvaṃ anāgacchantesu kāmarāganidānakammajanitesu, kāmarāgassa ca visesapaccayesu ghānajivhākāyesu kāyassa visesatarasāsavapaccayattā. tena hi phoṭṭhabbasukhaṃ assādentā sattā methunampi sevanti. ^b^uppattideso^eb^ti uppattiṭṭhānanti attho, kāyindriyavatthukā vā cattāro khandhā balavakāmāsavādihetubhāvato visesena sāsavāti vuttāti tesaṃ uppattiṭṭhānanti attho.

[03] ^b^munātī^eb^ti nāḷiyā minamāno viya, mahātulāya dhārayamāno viya ca ārammaṇaṃ vijānātīti attho. manate iti vā ^b^mano,^eb^ taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ paricchedavasena jānātīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^attano lakkhaṇaṃ dhārentī^eb^ti ye visesalakkhaṇena āyatanasaddaparā vattabbā, te cakkhādayo tathā vuttāti tato aññe manogocarabhūtā dhammā sāmaññalakkhaṇeneva ekāyatanabhāvaṃ upanetvā vuttā. yathā hi oḷārikavatthārammaṇamananasaṅkhātehi visayavisayībhāvehi purimāni pākaṭāni, tathā apākaṭā ca aññe manogocarā na attano sabhāvaṃ na dhārentīti imassa atthassa dīpanattho dhammasaddo. dhārīyanti sāmaññarūpena avadhārīyantīti vā ^b^dhammā^eb^. yathā hi rūpādayo cakkhuviññāṇādīhi asādhāraṇato eva yathāsakaṃ ^a^V2.0261^ea^ sabhāvato viññāyanti ^a^M2.0172^ea^, na evamete, ete pana anekadhammabhāvato, sādhāraṇato, sabhāvasāmaññatopi manasā viññāyantīti.

[03] 511^b^.^eb^ ^b^sena senā^eb^ti sakena sakena. ^b^uṭṭhahantī^eb^ti uṭṭhānaṃ karonti. ^b^vāyamantī^eb^ti ussahanti, attano kiccaṃ karonticceva attho. imasmiṃ ca atthe āyatanti etthāti āyatanānīti adhikaraṇattho āyatanasaddo, dutiyatatiyesu kattuattho. ^b^te cā^eb^ti cittacetasike dhamme. te hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇesu ayanti gacchanti pavattantīti ^b^āyā. vitthārentī^eb^ti pubbe anuppannattā līnāni apākaṭāni pubbantato uddhaṃ pattharenti pākaṭāni karonti, uppādentīti attho. ^b^idañca^eb^ saṃsāradukkhaṃ. ^b^na nivattatī^eb^ti anuppādanirodhavasena na nirujjhati. ^b^āyatanaṃ āyatana^eb^nti āmeḍitavacanaṃ assā samaññāya cakkhādīsu niruḷhabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
[03] 512^b^.^eb^ evaṃ avayavabhedavasena āyatanasaddassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni tattha pariyāyatopi dassetuṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. sādhuphalabharitatāya, aparissayatāya ca ^b^manoramme^eb^.

[03] tattha ^b^nivasantī^eb^ti nivasantā viya honti. tenāha ^b^``tadāyattavuttitāyā''^eb^ti. yattha suvaṇṇaratanādīni nivutthāni viya ākiṇṇāni tiṭṭhanti, so padeso tesaṃ ^b^ākaro,^eb^ evaṃ cittacetasikā cakkhādīsūti te tesaṃ ākaroti dassento āha ^b^``cakkhādīsu ca...pe0... ākaro''^eb^ti. ^b^tannissitattā^eb^ti ettha mano manoviññāṇādīnaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ nissayapaccayo na hotīti tassa tesaṃ dvārabhāvo nissayabhāvoti daṭṭhabbo. ahutvā eva paccayasāmaggivasena uppajjantāpi cittacetasikā aneke ekajjhaṃ tattha labbhamānā samosaṭā viya hontīti vuttaṃ ^b^``vatthudvārārammaṇavasena samosaraṇato''^eb^ti. na hi dhammānaṃ anāgataddhe vijjamānatālesopi atthi. tenāha ``puñjo natthi anāgate''ti (mahāni0 10). ^b^tattheva uppattito^eb^ti tesu cakkhādīsu eva uppattito. uppattiyā paccayabhūte cakkhādike uppattiṭṭhānaṃ viya katvā upacāravasena vuttaṃ. na hi arūpadhammānaṃ nippariyāyato uppattideso nāma atthi. yadaggena vā te ^a^M2.0173^ea^ tesaṃ nissayārammaṇabhūtā, tadaggena ^b^sañjātideso^eb^. na hi paccayabhāvamantarena rūpadhammānampi ādhārādheyyabhāvo atthi. tenāha ^b^``nissayārammaṇabhāvenā''^eb^ti. byatirekapadhānatāya kāraṇalakkhaṇassa ^b^``tesaṃ abhāve abhāvato''^eb^ iccevāha, na ``bhāve bhāvato''ti.

[03] ^b^yathāvuttenatthenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0162^ea^ ``cakkhatī''tiādinā, ``āyatanato āyānaṃ tananato''tiādinā, ``nivāsaṭṭhāna''ntiādinā ca vuttappakārena atthena. dhammāyatanapariyāpannānaṃ dhammānaṃ bahubhāvato yebhuyyena ca te bahū eva hutvā kiccakarāti ^b^``dhammā ca te āyatanañcā''^eb^ti bahuvacananiddeso.
[03] 513^b^.^eb^ tathā tathā lakkhitabbato lakkhīyati etenāti vā ^b^lakkhaṇaṃ,^eb^ sabhāvo.

[03] ^b^tāvabhāvato^eb^ti tattakato, tena anūnādhikabhāvaṃ dasseti. tattha dvādasāyatanavinimuttassa kassaci dhammassa abhāvā adhikabhāvato codanā natthi, salakkhaṇadhāraṇaṃ pana sabbesaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇanti ūnacodanā sambhavatīti taṃ dassento āha ^b^``cakkhādayopi hī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^bhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto^eb^ti dvikkhattuṃ calitvā pavattabhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto. calanavasena bhavaṅgappavattiyā sati eva āvajjanuppatti, na aññatthāti āvajjanassāpi kāraṇabhūtanti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``bhavaṅgamanasaṅkhāto...pe0... uppattidvāra''^eb^nti. ^b^asādhāraṇa^eb^nti cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ. satipi asādhāraṇabhāve cakkhādīnaṃ dvārabhāvena gahitattā dhammāyatanena aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. dvārārammaṇabhāvehi vā asādhāraṇataṃ sandhāya ``asādhāraṇa''nti vuttaṃ.

[03] 514^b^.^eb^ yebhuyyasahuppattiādīhi uppattikkamādīsu ayutti yojetabbā. yebhuyyena hi cakkhāyatanādīni kassaci kadāci ekato uppajjanti. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavantī''tiādi (yama0 aṭṭha0 āyatanayamaka 18-21). tasmā āyatanānaṃ uppattikkamo tāva na yujjati, na pahānakkamo kusalābyākatānaṃ appahātabbato, na paṭipattikkamo akusalānaṃ ekaccābyākatānañca appaṭipajjanīyato ^a^M2.0174^ea^, na bhūmikkamo aḍḍhekādasannaṃ āyatanānaṃ ekantakāmāvacarattā, itaresañca catubhūmipariyāpannattā, ekaccassa lokuttarabhāvato cāti. ^b^``ajjhattikesu hī''^eb^ti etena ajjhattikabhāvena, visayībhāvena ca ajjhattikānaṃ paṭhamaṃ desetabbataṃ dasseti, tesupi paṭhamaṃ desetabbesu pākaṭattā paṭhamataraṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ desitanti.
