[03] saṅkhārā bahū ekūnatiṃsacetanābhedato, viññāṇāni ca bahūni bāttiṃsavidhattā, na ca sabbato sabbānīti āha ^b^``katarasaṅkhārapaccayā kataraviññāṇanti ce''^eb^ti. ^b^``viññāṇa''^eb^nti ca idaṃ viññāṇasāmaññaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. kāmaṃ ^b^khandhaniddesepi^eb^ (visuddhi0 2.451 ādayo) imāni viññāṇāni niddiṭṭhāni, taṃ pana atisaṃkhittaṃ, na ca tattha nesaṃ saṅkhārapaccayatā vibhāvitāti taṃ pavattiyaṃ, paṭisandhiyañca bhavādīsu pavattanākāravasena vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^``kāmāvacarapuññābhisaṅkhārapaccayā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^manoviññāṇe^eb^ti niddhāraṇe bhūmmaṃ. ^b^mahāvipākānī^eb^ti viññāṇāpekkhāya napuṃsakaniddeso. ^b^mahāvipākā^eb^ti pana pāṭhe manoviññāṇadhātuyoti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03] 621^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaṃsaṅkhārapaccayā^eb^ti yassa yassa saṅkhārassa paccayabhāvena. ^b^yaṃ viññāṇa^eb^nti ``yaṃ yaṃ viññāṇa''nti evaṃ ubhayattha āmeḍitalopo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^``hotī''^eb^ti iminā kāraṇabhāve viññāṇassa sabbhāvamattaṃ paveditaṃ, na pavattivisesoti taṃ dassento ^b^``evaṃ pavatti veditabbā''^eb^ti āha ^a^V2.0278^ea^. brahmānampi aniṭṭharūpādiāpāthagamane akusalavipākacakkhuviññāṇādīni kadāci uppajjantīti ^b^``imāni terasa...pe0... pavattantī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tattha pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vokāro vitthāro etthāti pañcavokāro, so eva bhavo, etasmiṃ ^b^pañcavokārabhave^eb^. hoti hi bhinnādhikaraṇānampi aññapadatthasamāso yathā ``urasilomo''ti. atha vā yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānehi pañcahi khandhehi vokarīyatīti pañcavokāro, so eva bhavoti sabbaṃ pubbe viya.
[03] ``pavattiyaññeva ^a^M2.0297^ea^ pavattantī''ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^``katha''^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ.

[03] ^b^``yebhuyyena lobhasampayuttajavanāvasāne''^eb^ti idaṃ paṭighavicikicchuddhaccasampayuttānantaraṃ somanassasahagatassa anuppajjanatoti keci, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. ``cakkhuṃ assādeti abhinandati, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati...pe0... vicikicchā uppajjati, uddhaccaṃ uppajjati, akusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī''ti vacanato. iṭṭhaṃ ce ārammaṇaṃ, somanassatadārammaṇaṃ na na uppajjatīti. javanena tadārammaṇaniyame somanassasahagatānantaraṃ somanassasahagatāneva sandhāya vuttanti apare, taṃ vicāretabbaṃ upekkhāsahagatakusalākusalajavanānantarampi somanassatadārammaṇassa icchitabbattā. upekkhāsahagatakiriyājavanānantarameva hi somanassatadārammaṇaṃ na icchanti.

[03] yasmā pana tihetukajavanāvasāne ca kadāci ahetukaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ hoti, tasmā ^b^``yebhuyyenā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yasmā ekacittakkhaṇāyukaṃ javanārammaṇaṃ hoti, tadā tattha ekameva tadārammaṇaṃ hotīti katvā ^b^``sakiṃ vā''^eb^ti vuttanti keci. apare pana tadārammaṇaṃ nāma javanārammaṇānubhavanakiccaṃ, taṃ ekacittakkhaṇike tathā āsannabhede ārammaṇe nuppajjati. tasmā ^b^``sakiṃ vā''^eb^ti idaṃ dirattatirattādi viya vacanasiliṭṭhatāvasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ, dvikkhattumeva pana uppajjatīti. ``dirattatiratta''nti (pāci0 50) ettha hi vā-saddassa abhāvā vacanasiliṭṭhatāmattena dirattaggahaṇaṃ katanti yujjati. ``nirantaraṃ tirattadassanatthaṃ vā''ti idha pana vā-saddo vikappattho vuttoti sakiṃ eva ca kadāci pavattiṃ sandhāya ^b^``sakiṃ vā''^eb^ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. teneva hi ^b^sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ sakiṃ tadārammaṇappavattiyā vicāretabbataṃ dassentena ``cittappavattigaṇanāyaṃ pana sabbadvāresu tadārammaṇe dve eva cittavārā āgatā''ti (vibha0 aṭṭha0 227) vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0279^ea^ ^b^cittappavattigaṇanāya^eb^nti vipākakathāyaṃ balavarūpādiārammaṇe vuttaṃ cittappavattigaṇanaṃ sandhāyāha. tattha hi dveva tadārammaṇuppattivārā vuttā ^a^M2.0298^ea^. tadeva hi sandhāya idhāpi vuttaṃ ^b^``abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana tadārammaṇe dve cittavārā āgatā''^eb^ti. abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ aniyatārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccā hutvā pavattantīti (vibha0 aṭṭha0 227) dvāraṃ anāmasitvā eva vuttaṃ, taṃ anantaraṃ parato vuttasahetukavipākaviññāṇānaṃ sadisasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ kātukāmatādhippāyena vuttaṃ. ahetukadvayādīnañhi bhavaṅgabhūtānaṃ sayameva dvārattā, cutipaṭisandhibhūtānañca bhavaṅgasaṅkhātena, aññena ca dvārena anuppattito niyataṃ, aniyataṃ vā dvāraṃ etesanti na sakkā vattunti.

[03] ahetukadvayassa pana santīraṇatadārammaṇabhūtassa dvāraṃ labbhati, tañca aniyatanti tampi gaṇhanto ^b^``aniyatadvārārammaṇaṭṭhānakiccā hutvā pavattantī''^eb^ti āha. teneva cettha mahāvipākānampi tadārammaṇabhūtānaṃ dvāraṃ labbhatīti tatthāpi dvāraggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.

[03] ekassa sattassa pavatto rūpāvacaravipāko pathavīkasiṇādīsu yasmiṃ ārammaṇe pavatto, tato aññasmiṃ tassa pavatti natthīti rūpāvacarānaṃ niyatārammaṇatā vuttā. ^b^itarāni^eb^ āruppavipākaviññāṇāni. niyataṃ avatthukānīti ^b^niyatāvatthukāni^eb^. kasiṇugghāṭimākāsādīsuyeva ārammaṇesu pavattanato ^b^niyatārammaṇāni. tatrā^eb^ti pavattiyaṃ. ^b^assā^eb^ti bāttiṃsavidhassa vipākaviññāṇassa. ^b^te te saṅkhārā^eb^ti yathāvuttā puññābhisaṅkhārādisaṅkhārā. ^b^kammapaccayenā^eb^ti nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena. ^b^upanissayapaccayenā^eb^ti pakatūpanissayapaccayena.

[03] 622^b^.^eb^ evaṃ pavattiyaṃ viññāṇappavattiṃ dassetvā paṭisandhiyaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``yaṃ pana vutta''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^anurūpāya paṭisandhiyā^eb^ti anurūpena paṭisandhikiccena. taṃ pana anurūpataṃ sayameva vakkhati. bhavantarena bhavantarassa sandhānaṃ idha paṭisandhīti taṃ acittakampi atthevāti katvā ``kati paṭisandhiyo''ti pucchaṃ katvāpi ^b^``kati paṭisandhicittānī''^eb^ti pucchā katā. ^b^``kena katthā''^eb^ti kena cittena kasmiṃ bhave.

[03] ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tesu ekūnavīsatiyā paṭisandhicittesu. kusalavipākāya ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyāti ^a^V2.0280^ea^ sambandho. natthi devesu ahetukā paṭisandhīti ^b^``manussaloke''^eb^ti visesanaṃ. ^b^napuṃsakādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^saddena ^a^M2.0299^ea^ mammādīnaṃ saṅgaho. keci pana ekacce ahetukapaṭisandhikā avikalindriyā hutvā thokaṃ vicāraṇapakatikāpi hontiyeva, tasmā tādisānampi idha ādisaddena saṅgahoti vadanti. ^b^saṅkhepato^eb^ti samāsato, asukāya paṭisandhiyā asukaṃ ārammaṇanti vibhāgaṃ akatvāti attho.

[03] ^b^sesāna^eb^nti rūpāvacarā pañca, paṭhamatatiyāruppā dveti imāsaṃ vuttāvasesānaṃ sattannaṃ paṭisandhīnaṃ. ^b^paccuppannārammaṇaṃ cuticittaṃ nāma natthi^eb^ paṭisandhiārammaṇe eva pavattanato. ^b^dvīsu ārammaṇesū^eb^ti atītanavattabbavasena dvīsu ārammaṇesu.

[03] 623^b^.^eb^ ^b^tānī^eb^ti pubbe katāni kammāni. ^b^assā^eb^ti āsannamaraṇassa puggalassa. ^b^olambantī^eb^ti sāyanhe mahantānaṃ pabbatakūṭānaṃ chāyā viya bhūmiyaṃ tassa citte avalambanti upatiṭṭhanti. ^b^tasmiṃ niruddhe^eb^ti tasmiṃ cuticitte niruddhamatte tassa nirodhasamanantarameva. ^b^tadevā^eb^ti taṃyeva yathāvuttajavanavīthiyā ārammaṇabhūtaṃ. avijjātaṇhādīsu kilesesu anupacchinnesveva kammādino upaṭṭhānaṃ, tañca ārabbha cittasantānassa bhavantaraninnapoṇapabbhāratā hotīti āha ^b^``anupacchinnakilesabalavināmita''^eb^nti. santāne hi vināmite tadekadesabhūtaṃ paṭisandhicittañca vināmitameva hoti, na ca ekadesavināmitabhāvena vinā santānassa vināmitatā atthīti. sabbattha pana duggatipaṭisandhininnāya cutiyā purimajavanāni akusalāni, itarāya ca kusalānīti nicchinanti. ``nimittassādagadhitaṃ vā, bhikkhave, viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ tiṭṭhati, anubyañjanassādagadhitaṃ vā, tasmiṃ ce samaye kālaṃ karoti, ṭhānametaṃ vijjati, yaṃ dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ upapajjeyya nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.235) hi vuttaṃ, tasmā akusalaṃ duggatiyaṃ, kusalañca sugatiyaṃ paṭisandhiyā upanissayo hotīti. arahato pana sabbaso kilesānaṃ upacchinnattā paṭippassaddhasabbabhavussukkatāya kammādinimittaṃ na upaṭṭhahati, tato vijjamānampi kammaṃ aladdhasahāyattā paṭisandhiṃ na janeti.

[01] ^b^vuttappakārakammavasenā^eb^ti pāpakammavasena, tadupaṭṭhāpitanti adhippāyo. ^b^``narakādīsu aggijālavaṇṇādika''^eb^nti idaṃ taṃsadisatāvasena vuttaṃ. na ^a^M2.0300^ea^ hi so eva nirayaggivaṇṇādi tadā tassa ^a^V2.0281^ea^ āpāthaṃ āgacchati. tattha ^b^aggijālavaṇṇādika^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena vettaraṇīsimbaliasipattavanādivaṇṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^narakādīsū^eb^ti pana ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena petatiracchānānaṃ nibaddhasañcaraṇaṭṭhānapariyāpannavaṇṇaṃ. ^b^manodvāre āpāthamāgacchatī^eb^ti kammabalena upaṭṭhāpitavaṇṇāyatanaṃ supinaṃ passantassa viya, dibbacakkhussa viya ca manodvāre eva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchati. ekaṃ āvajjanaṃ, pañca javanāni, dve tadārammaṇānīti tīṇi vīthicittāni.

[01] ^b^rāgādihetubhūtaṃ hīnamārammaṇa^eb^nti akusalavipākassa ārammaṇaṃ bhavituṃ yuttaṃ aniṭṭhamārammaṇamāha. tampi hi saṅkappanavasena rāgassāpi hetu hotīti. akusalavipākajanakakammasahajātānaṃ vā taṃsadisāsannacutijavanacetanāsahajātānañca rāgādīnaṃ hetubhāvo eva hīnatā. tañhi pacchānutāpajanakakammānamārammaṇaṃ kammavasena aniṭṭhaṃ akusalavipākassa ārammaṇaṃ bhaveyya. aññathā ca iṭṭhārammaṇe pavattassa akusalakammassa vipāko akusalakammanimittārammaṇo na bhaveyya. na hi akusalavipāko iṭṭhārammaṇo bhavituṃ arahatīti.

[03] pañcadvāre ca āpāthaṃ āgacchantaṃ paccuppannaṃ kammanimittaṃ āsannakatakammārammaṇasantatiyaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃsadisañca daṭṭhabbaṃ. aññathā tadeva paṭisandhiārammaṇūpaṭṭhāpakaṃ, tadeva ca paṭisandhijanakaṃ bhaveyya. na ca paṭisandhiyā upacārabhūtāni viya, etasmiṃ tayā pavattitabbanti paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṃ anuppādentāni viya ca pavattāni cutiāsannāni javanāni paṭisandhijanakāni bhaveyyuṃ. ``katattā upacitattā''ti (dha0 sa0 431) hi vuttaṃ. tadā ca taṃsamānavīthiyaṃ viya pavattamānāni kathaṃ katūpacitāni siyuṃ? tadā na assāditāni. na ca lokiyāni lokuttarāni viya samānavīthiphalāni honti. ``pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ, pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ, maraṇakāle vāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi samattā hoti samādinnā. tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjatī''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 3.303) sutte maraṇakāle samattāya samādinnāya micchādiṭṭhiyā, sammādiṭṭhiyā ca sahajātacetanāya paṭisandhidānaṃ vuttaṃ, na ca dubbalehi pañcadvārikajavanehi micchādiṭṭhi, sammādiṭṭhi ^a^M2.0301^ea^ vā samattā hoti samādinnā. tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ ``sabbampi hetaṃ kusalākusaladhammapaṭivijānanādicavanapariyosānaṃ kiccaṃ manodvārikacitteneva hoti, na pañcadvārikenāti ^a^V2.0282^ea^ sabbassapetassa kiccassa karaṇe sahajavanakāni vīthicittāni paṭikkhittānī''ti (vibha0 aṭṭha0 766).

[03] tattha hi ^b^na kiñci dhammaṃ paṭivijānātī^eb^ti ``manopubbaṅgamā dhammā''ti (dha0 pa0 1-2) evaṃ vuttaṃ ekampi kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā na paṭivijānātīti ca vuttaṃ. yesaṃ paṭivibhāvanappavattiyā sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā anveti, tesaṃ sā pavatti pañcadvāre paṭikkhittā. kusalākusalakammasamādānañca tādisamevāti. tadārammaṇānantaraṃ pana cavanaṃ, tadanantarā ca upapatti manodvārikā eva hoti, na sahajavanakavīthicittapariyāpannāti iminā adhippāyena idha pañcadvārikatadārammaṇānantarā cuti, tadanantarā paṭisandhi ca vuttāti daṭṭhabbā. tattha avasesapañcacittakkhaṇāyuke rūpādimhi uppannaṃ paṭisandhiṃ sandhāya ``paccuppannārammaṇaṃ upapatticittaṃ paccuppannārammaṇassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo''ti, avasesaekacittakkhaṇāyuke ca uppannaṃ paṭisandhiṃ sandhāya ``paccuppannārammaṇaṃ upapatticittaṃ atītārammaṇassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo''ti ca vuttanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 624^b^.^eb^ ^b^kaṇhapakkhe sukkapakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā^eb^ti ettha yathā pubbe ``pāpakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā''ti vutte kaṇhapakkhe ``anavajjakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā''ti sukkapakkho vutto, evaṃ ``duggatipariyāpannaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ, narakādīsu aggijālavaṇṇādikaṃ duggatinimitta''nti ca vutte kaṇhapakkhe ``sugatipariyāpannaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ, manussaloke rattakambalasadisamātukucchivaṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ, devaloke vā uyyānavimānakapparukkhādivaṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ sugatinimitta''nti evaṃ sukkapakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ sabbaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^atītapaccuppannārammaṇāyā^eb^ti kammakammanimittavasena atītārammaṇāya, mātukucchivaṇṇādisugatinimittavasena paccuppannārammaṇāya.

[03] 625^b^.^eb^ ^b^tañca kho^eb^ti yadetaṃ ``anavajjakammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā''ti aniyamanaṃ kataṃ, tañca kho. ^b^kammanimittameva āpāthamāgacchati^eb^ ekantato ^a^M2.0302^ea^ attano kammārammaṇatāya mahaggatavipākassa. ^b^suddhāya vā^eb^ti mahaggatakammanimittārammaṇāya ^b^javanavīthiyā,^eb^ tadārammaṇarahitāyāti attho, sā pana javanavīthi mahaggatavipākassa upacāro viya daṭṭhabbā. keci pana tañca vīthiṃ mahaggatāvasānaṃ vadanti. ^b^``navattabbārammaṇā vā''^eb^ti idaṃ rūpāvacarapaṭisandhiṃ, āruppesu ^a^V2.0283^ea^ ca paṭhamaṃ, tatiyañca sandhāya vuttaṃ. dutiyacatutthā pana atītārammaṇavacaneneva gahitā.

[03] ^b^mātukucchivaṇṇasaṅkhāta^eb^ntiādinā vaṇṇo eva gatinimittabhāvena āgato. tattha saddo tāva anupādinnabhāvena sugatipariyāpannatāya gatinimittabhāvena aṭṭhakathāsu nāgatoti yuttametaṃ, gandhādīnaṃ pana anāgamane kāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^ayaṃ tāta tavatthāya buddhapūjā karīyatī^eb^tiādīsu pubbacetanāvasena puññaṃ hoti. sabbantimajavane vattamānassāpīti vadanti.

[03] 626^b^.^eb^ ^b^``etenānusārena āruppacutiyāpi anantarā paṭisandhi veditabbā''^eb^ti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu ``pathavīkasiṇajjhānādivasena paṭiladdhamahaggatassa sugatiyaṃ ṭhitassā''ti evamādike eva naye ayampi paṭisandhi avaruddhāti? na, tattha rūpāvacaracutianantarāya eva paṭisandhiyā vuttattā. tattha hi ``pathavīkasiṇādikaṃ vā nimittaṃ mahaggatacittaṃ vā manodvāre āpāthaṃ āgacchati, cakkhusotānaṃ vā''tiādinā tena vacanena rūpāvacaracutiyā eva anantarā paṭisandhi vuttāti viññāyati. athāpi yathāsambhavayojanāya ayampi paṭisandhi tattheva avaruddhā, arūpāvacaracutianantarā pana rūpāvacarapaṭisandhi natthi. arūpāvacare ca uparūpari cutiyā anantarā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā paṭisandhi natthīti catutthāruppacutiyā navattabbārammaṇapaṭisandhi natthi. tena tato tattheva atītārammaṇā, kāmāvacare ca atītapaccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhi. itarāhi ca yathāsambhavaṃ atītanavattabbārammaṇā āruppapaṭisandhi, atītapaccuppannārammaṇā ca kāmāvacarapaṭisandhi yojetabbāti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ visuṃ uddharaṇaṃ kataṃ.

[03] 627^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ārammaṇavasena ekavidhāya kāmāvacarasugaticutiyā duvidhā duggatipaṭisandhi, duggaticutiyā duvidhā sugatipaṭisandhi, kāmāvacarasugaticutiyā dviekadvippakārānaṃ kāmarūpārūpānaṃ vasena pañcavidhā sugatipaṭisandhi ^a^M2.0303^ea^, rūpāvacaracutiyā tatheva pañcavidhā, duvidhāya āruppacutiyā paccekaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ kāmāruppānaṃ vasena aṭṭhavidhā ca paṭisandhi ^a^V2.0284^ea^ dassitā. duggaticutiyā pana ekavidhāya duggatipaṭisandhi duvidhā na dassitā, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``duggatiyaṃ ṭhitassa panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. yathā vuttā pana --
[21] dve dve pañcātha pañcaṭṭha, dve bhavālambabhedato.
[22] cutiyā tādisāyetā, catuvīsati sandhiyo.. (vibha0 mūlaṭī0 227).
[03] 628^b^.^eb^ ``kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā''tiādinā (dha0 sa0 431) nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo heṭṭhā dassitappakāroti upanissayabhāvameva dassento ^b^``vuttañheta''^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] nissayapaccayabhūtena rūpena sahapavattiyevettha viññāṇassa tena ^b^missitā,^eb^ tadabhāvo ^b^amissitā^eb^. yavanti ettha sattā ekajātisamanvayena aññamaññamissitā hontīti ^b^yoniyo^eb^. sucaritaduccaritavasena gantabbā pāpuṇitabbāti ^b^gatiyo^eb^. tiṭṭhati etthāti ṭhiti, viññāṇassa ṭhiti ^b^viññāṇaṭṭhiti^eb^. nānattakāyanānattasaññītiādiāvāso eva sattehi āvasitabbato ^b^sattāvāso^eb^. asaññasattāvāsassa idha asambhavato ^b^``sattāvāsavasena aṭṭhavidhaṃ hotī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[03] 629^b^.^eb^ ^b^aññatra jātipaṇḍakapaṭisandhiyā^eb^ti ettha paṭhamakappikapaṭisandhiyāpīti vattabbaṃ. sāpi hi bhāvena vināva uppajjatīti.

[03] ^b^omato^eb^ti avamato, avakaṃsatoti attho. ^b^ādinā^eb^ti ``missaṃ amissa''nti etasmiṃ duke ādimhi vuttena missaviññāṇena. ^b^omato dve vā tayo vā dasakā uppajjantī^eb^ti gabbhaseyyakānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ. aññattha pana aneke kalāpā saha uppajjanti. brahmattabhāvepi hi anekagāvutappamāṇena aneke kalāpā saha uppajjantīti tiṃsato adhikāneva rūpāni honti. tadahujātaeḷakassa lomaṃ ^b^jātiuṇṇā^eb^ti keci. himavantappadese jātimantaeḷakalomaṃ ^b^jātiuṇṇā^eb^ti apare. gabbhaṃ phāletvā gahitaeḷakalomaṃ ^b^jātiuṇṇā^eb^ti aññe. imāsu gatīsu imā yoniyo sambhavanti, imāsu na sambhavantīti evaṃ ^b^yonīnaṃ gativasena sambhavabhedo^eb^.

[03] 630^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhummavajjesū^eb^ti ^a^M2.0304^ea^ bhummadevānaṃ vajjanaṃ yonivibhāgaṃ pati tesaṃ manussasadisattā. ^b^yoniyo^eb^ ^a^V2.0285^ea^ ^b^tisso purimikā na hontī^eb^ti yonittayapaṭikkhepena pacchimā yoni anuññātāti atthato āpannameva hoti. ^b^gatittaye^eb^ti manussapetatiracchānasaññite gatittaye. tañhi ettha pubbe anāmaṭṭhaṃ.

[03] ca-saddo avuttasamuccayatthoti dassetuṃ ^b^``ca-saddenā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. kasmā pana nijjhāmataṇhikapetesu purimikā tisso yoniyo na santīti? asambhavato. tāsañhi niccāturabhāvato kāmasevā natthīti na tā aṇḍajādayo honti. kucchiyaṃ tāsaṃ gabbho nāvatiṭṭhati jālasabbhāvatoti keci. aggijālāya santappamānasarīrā etā nibbattantīti allaṭṭhānesu, pupphādīsu ca sambhavābhāvato saṃsedajatāpi tāsaṃ natthevāti vadanti. tenāha ^b^``opapātikā eva hi te hontī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^rūpībrahmesu tāva opapātikayonikesū^eb^ti opapātikayonikehi rūpībrahme niddhāreti. ^b^rūpībrahmesū^eb^ti hi adhikaraṇe bhummaṃ, opapātikesūti niddhāraṇe. tena ``opapātikayonikesū''ti sāmaññato vuttarāsito ``rūpībrahmesū''ti visesena tadekadesaṃ niddhāreti. ^b^cakkhusotavatthudasakānaṃ, jīvitanavakassa cā^eb^ti ettha keci ``cakkhusotavatthusattakānaṃ, jīvitachakkassa cāti catunnaṃ kalāpānaṃ vasena rūpabhave paṭisandhiviññāṇena saha sattavīsati rūpāni uppajjanti, tattha gandharasāhārānaṃ paṭikkhittattā''ti kāraṇaṃ vatvā taṃ samatthentā ``pāḷiyañhi `rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe ṭhapetvā aññasattānaṃ devānaṃ pañcāyatanāni pātubhavanti, pañca dhātuyo pātubhavantī'ti (vibha0 1015-1016) vuttaṃ, tathā `rūpadhātuyā cha āyatanāni, nava dhātuyo'ti sabbasaṅgahakavasena tattha vijjamānāyatanadhātuyo dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. kathāvatthumhi ca ghānāyatanādīnaṃ viya gandhāyatanādīnañca tattha bhāvo paṭikkhitto `atthi tattha ghānāyatananti? āmantā. atthi tattha gandhāyatananti? na hevaṃ vattabbe'tiādinā (kathā0 520). na ca aphoṭṭhabbāyatanānaṃ pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ viya agandharasāyatanānaṃ gandharasānaṃ tattha bhāvo sakkā vattuṃ, phusituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāvinimuttassa pathavīādisabhāvassa viya gandharasāyatanabhāvavinimuttassa gandharasasabhāvassa ^a^M2.0305^ea^ abhāvā. yadi ca ghānasamphassādīnaṃ kāraṇabhāvo natthīti `āyatanānī'ti te na vucceyyuṃ, dhātusaddo pana nissattanijjīvavācakoti `gandhadhātu rasadhātū'ti avacane kāraṇaṃ natthi, dhammabhāvo ca tesaṃ ekantena icchitabbo sabhāvadhāraṇādilakkhaṇato aññassa abhāvā. dhammānañca āyatanabhāvo ekantiko ^a^V2.0286^ea^ ^b^yamake^eb^ vutto `dhammo āyatananti? āmantā'ti (yama0 1.āyatanayamaka.13). tasmā tesaṃ gandharasāyatanabhāvābhāvepi koci āyatanabhāvo vattabbo. yadi ca phoṭṭhabbabhāvato añño pathavīādibhāvo viya gandharasabhāvato añño tesaṃ koci sabhāvo siyā, tesaṃ dhammāyatanasaṅgaho. gandharasabhāve pana āyatanabhāve ca sati `gandho ca so āyatanañca gandhāyatanaṃ, raso ca so āyatanañca rasāyatana'nti idamāpannamevāti gandharasāyatanabhāvo ca na sakkā nivāretuṃ. `tayo āhārā'ti ca vacanato kabaḷīkārāhārassa tattha abhāvo viññāyati. tasmā yathā pāḷiyā avirodho hoti, tathā rūpagaṇanā kātabbā. evañhi dhammatā na vilomitā hotī''ti vadanti.

[03] ettha vuccate -- rūpāvacarasattānaṃ ghānajivhāyatanābhāvato vijjamānāpi gandharasā āyatanakiccaṃ na karontīti te anāmasitvā pāḷiyaṃ ``pañcāyatanāni pātubhavantī''ti (vibha0 1015), ``cha āyatanānī''ti (vibha0 992) ca ādi vuttaṃ, ``tayo āhārā''ti ca ajjhoharitabbassa āhārassa abhāvena ojaṭṭhamakarūpasamuṭṭhāpanasaṅkhātassa āhārakiccassa akaraṇato, na sabbena sabbaṃ gandharasānaṃ, ojāya ca abhāvato. iti visayino, kiccassa ca abhāvena visayo, kiccavā ca dhammo na vutto. yasmiñhi bhave visayī natthi, tasmiṃ taṃhetuko nippariyāyena visayassa āyatanabhāvo natthīti vijjamānassāpi avacanaṃ yathā tattheva rūpabhave pathavītejovāyodhātūnaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanabhāvena. yassa pana yattha vacanaṃ, tassa tattha visayīsabbhāvahetuko nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo vutto yathā tattheva rūpāyatanassa.

[03] yadi visayīsabbhāvahetuko visayassa nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo, kathamasaññasattānaṃ dve āyatanāni pātubhavantīti, asaññasattānañhi ^a^M2.0306^ea^ cakkhāyatanaṃ natthi, acakkhāyatanabhāvena ca nesaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ aññesaṃ avisayoti? nāyaṃ virodho. yena adhippāyena rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ gandhāyatanādīnaṃ avacanaṃ, tena rūpāyatanassāpi avacananti asaññīnaṃ ekaṃ āyatanaṃ vattabbaṃ. yathāsakañhi indriyagocarabhāvāpekkhāya yesaṃ nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo atthi, tesu niddisiyamānesu tadabhāvato rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ gandhādike visuṃ āyatanabhāvena avatvā dhammasabhāvānativattanato, manoviññāṇassa ca visayabhāvūpagamanato dhammāyatanantogadhe katvā ^a^V2.0287^ea^ ``pañcāyatanānī''ti ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (vibha0 1015) vuttaṃ. etadatthañhi ``dhammāyatana''nti sāmaññato nāmakaraṇaṃ, piṭṭhivaṭṭakāni vā tāni katvā ``pañcāyatanānī''ti vuttaṃ.

[03] yena ca pana adhippāyena asaññīnaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ, tena saññīnampi gandhādīnaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kātabbanti imassa nayassa dassanatthaṃ ``asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ dve āyatanāni pātubhavantī''ti (vibha0 1017) vuttaṃ. asatipi hi tattha attano indriye rūpassa vaṇṇāyatanasabhāvātikkamo natthevāti taṃ rūpāyatanantveva vuccati. iminā ca nayadassanena gandhādīni tīṇi pakkhipitvā saññīnaṃ aṭṭha āyatanāni, asaññīnaṃ pañcāti ayamattho dassito hoti. evañcetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, aññathā rūpaloke phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pathavīādīnaṃ brahmānaṃ vacīghoso eva na siyā. na hi paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃsamantarena saddappavatti atthi, na ca phusanasabhāvānaṃ katthaci aphusanabhāvatā sakkā viññātuṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanasaṅkhātassa ca bhūtattayassa abhāve rūpabhave rūpāyatanādīnampi sambhavo eva na siyā. tasmā phusituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāyapi pathavīādīnaṃ tattha kāyindriyābhāvena tesaṃ phoṭṭhabbabhāvo na vutto. evañca katvā rūpadhātuyaṃ tesaṃ sappaṭighavacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti. vuttañhi ``asaññasattānaṃ anidassanasappaṭighaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca dve mahābhūtā''tiādi (paṭṭhā0 2.22.20).

[03] paṭigho ca nāma bhūtattayassa kāyappasādaṃ pati tannissayabhūtaghaṭṭanādvārena abhimukhabhāvo, idha pana taṃsabhāvatā. so ca phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyasabhāvassa ghaṭṭanāya abhāvato natthi. yadi tattha asatipi visayini rūpāyatanaṃ gahetvā ``dve āyatanānī''ti vuttaṃ, atha kasmā ^a^M2.0307^ea^ gandhāyatanādīni gahetvā ``pañcāyatanānī''ti na vuttanti? nayadassanavasena desanā pavattāti vuttovāyamattho. atha vā tattha rūpāyatanasseva vacanaṃ kadāci aññabhūmikānaṃ pasādassa visayabhāvaṃ sandhāya, na pana itaresaṃ abhāvato, nāpi pariyāyenapi āyatanabhāvābhāvato. asaññīnañhi rūpāyatanaṃ samānatalavāsīnaṃ vehapphalānaṃ, uparibhūmikānañca suddhāvāsānaṃ pasādassa visayabhāvaṃ gacchati, na pana gandharasāti tesaṃyeva tattha avacanaṃ yuttaṃ. ^b^kathāvatthumhi^eb^ ca nippariyāyena gandhāyatanādīnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ paṭijānantaṃ sandhāya paṭisedho kato.

[01] yadipi ^a^V2.0288^ea^ cetaṃ vacanaṃ tattha gandhāyatanādīnaṃ abhāvavibhāvanaṃ na hoti, atthibhāvadīpanampi pana aññavacanaṃ natthevāti? nayidamevaṃ, aṭṭhakathāsu tattha nesaṃ atthibhāvassa niddhāretvā vuttattā. yañhi aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ pāḷiyā na virujjhati, taṃ pāḷi viya pamāṇabhūtaṃ agarahitāya ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjatanā āgatattā. tattha siyā -- yaṃ pāḷiyā na virujjhati aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ, taṃ pamāṇaṃ, idaṃ pana virujjhatīti? nayidamevaṃ, yathā na virujjhati, tathā paṭipāditattā. cakkhādīnaṃ āyatanānaṃ, tannissayānañca viññāṇānaṃ sattasuññatāsandassanatthaṃ bhagavato dhātudesanāti āyatanabhāvena vuttānaṃyeva dhātubhāvadīpanato dhātubhāvassāpi tesaṃ avacanaṃ yujjati eva. tasmā yathā pāḷiyā avirodho hoti, tathā cakkhudasakādivasena idha rūpagaṇanā katāti na ettha dhammatāvilomanāsaṅkāya okāsoti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^aññesu saṃsedajaopapātikayonikesū^eb^ti rūpībrahme pana ṭhapetvā aññesu opapātikesu, saṃsedajesu cāti evamettha sambandho veditabbo. opapātikavisesanañhettha aññaggahaṇaṃ, na saṃsedajavisesanaṃ asambhavato. sati hi sambhave, byabhicāre ca visesanavisesitabbatā hoti. kāmāvacaradevesu sabbakālaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu yathāvuttāya santatiyā rūpānaṃ labbhanato vuttaṃ ^b^``tāni ca niccaṃ devesū''^eb^ti. na hi te kadācipi vikalindriyā, abhāvakā ca hontīti. cakkhu nesaṃ dasannaṃ pūraṇoti katvā ^b^cakkhudasako^eb^ nāma, asādhāraṇena vā cakkhunā lakkhito dasako ^b^cakkhudasako. evaṃ sesā^eb^ti yathā cakkhudasako vutto, evaṃ sesāpi dasakā yojetvā veditabbā. ``saṃsedajūpapātayonīsu ^a^M2.0308^ea^, avakaṃsato tiṃsā''ti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^``avakaṃsato panā''^eb^tiādimāha, taṃ panetaṃ pāḷiyā na sameti. na hi pāḷiyaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ saṃsedajopapātikānaṃ aghānakānaṃ upapatti vuttā. ^b^dhammahadayavibhaṅge^eb^ hi ``kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavanti, kassaci dasāyatanāni, kassaci aparāni dasāyatanāni, kassaci navāyatanāni, kassaci sattāyatanāni pātubhavantī''ti vuttaṃ, na vuttaṃ ``aṭṭhāyatanāni pātubhavantī''ti (vibha0 1007). yadi hi aghānakassāpi upapatti siyā, tikkhattuṃ ``dasāyatanāni pātubhavantī''ti vattabbaṃ siyā, tikkhattuñca ``navāyatanāni pātubhavantī''ti, na ca taṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^upapattikkhaṇe^eb^ti paṭisandhikkhaṇe. ^b^ekādasā^eb^ti paripuṇṇāyatanassa saddāyatanavajjāni ekādasa āyatanāni. ^b^kassaci dasāyatanānī^eb^ti andhassa cakkhāyatanavajjāni. ^b^aparāni dasāyatanānī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0289^ea^ badhirassa sotāyatanavajjāni. ^b^navāyatanānī^eb^ti andhabadhirassa cakkhusotāyatanavajjāni. ^b^sattāyatanānī^eb^ti gabbhaseyyakassa rūpagandharasakāyaphoṭṭhabbamanodhammāyatanavasena vuttaṃ. yadi cakkhusotaghānavikalopi uppajjeyya, tassa aṭṭhevāyatanāni siyuṃ, na ca vuttaṃ ``aṭṭhāyatanāni pātubhavantī''ti. tasmā nattheva cakkhusotaghānavikalo. sati ca aghānakūpapattiyaṃ punapi ``kassaci aparānipi dasāyatanāni pātubhavantī''ti vattabbaṃ siyā. tathā ca sati yathā andhabadhirassa vasena ``kassaci navāyatanāni pātubhavantī''ti ekavāraṃ vuttaṃ, evaṃ andhāghānakassa, badhirāghānakassa ca vasena ``kassaci aparāni navāyatanāni, kassaci aparānipi navāyatanāni pātubhavantī''ti vattabbaṃ siyāti attho. evaṃ dhātupātubhāvādipañhānipi vattabbānīti vadanti. ettha ca yathā ``sattati ukkaṃsatotha rūpānī''ti padaṃ ``saṃsedajūpapātayonīsū''ti ettha yonidvayavasena yojīyati, na evaṃ ``avakaṃsato tiṃsā''ti idaṃ. idaṃ pana saṃsedajayonivaseneva yojetabbaṃ. ekayoganiddiṭṭhassāpi ekadeso sambandhaṃ labhatīti saṃsedajassa jaccandhabadhirāghānakanapuṃsakassa jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjantīti vuttaṃ, na opapātikassāti ayamettha aṭṭhakathāyamadhippāyo.

[03] ye ^a^M2.0309^ea^ pana ``opapātikassa jaccandhabadhirāghānakanapuṃsakassa jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjantīti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutta''nti vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. so hi pamādapāṭho. evañca katvā ^b^āyatanayamakavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ ``kāmadhātuyaṃ pana aghānako opapātiko natthi. yadi bhaveyya, `kassaci aṭṭhāyatanāni pātubhavantī'ti vadeyyā''ti (yama0 aṭṭha0 āyatanayamaka 18-21) vuttaṃ. apare panāhu ``kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavantīti yāva `kassaci navāyatanānī'ti pāḷi opapātike sandhāya vuttā. tasmā pubbenāparaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ avirodho siddho. tathā ca yathāvuttapāḷiyā ayamatthavaṇṇanā aññadatthu saṃsandati sametiyevā''ti. yaṃ paneke vadanti ``opapātikaggahaṇena saṃsedajāpi saṅgayhanti. tathā hi ^b^dhammahadayavibhaṅge^eb^ `kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavantī'tiādīnaṃ (vibha0 1007) ^b^niddese^eb^ `opapātikānaṃ petāna'ntiādinā (vibha0 1009) opapātikaggahaṇameva kataṃ, na saṃsedajaggahaṇa''nti, taṃ paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃyeva saṃsedajānaṃ opapātikesu saṅgahaṇavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ``saṃsedajayonikā paripuṇṇāyatanāparipuṇṇāyatanabhāvena opapātikasaṅgahaṃ katvā vuttā''ti, padhānāya ^a^V2.0290^ea^ vā yoniyā sabbaṃ paripuṇṇāyatanayoniṃ dassetuṃ ``opapātikānanti vutta''nti ca, idha pana yonidvayaṃ sarūpeneva pakāsetuṃ, saṃsedajayonivaseneva ca avakaṃsato rūpapavattiṃ dassetuṃ opapātikayoniyā itaraṃ asaṅgahetvā ``saṃsedajūpapātayonīsū''ti vuttaṃ. taṃ sabbaṃ vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^ukkaṃsāvakaṃsānaṃ pana antare^eb^ti ``sattati, tiṃsā''ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ rūpassa ukkaṃsāvakaṃsaparicchedānaṃ majjhe. ^b^anurūpato vikappo veditabbo^eb^ti apāyesu andhassa cha cakkhudasakābhāvato, tathā badhirassa sotadasakābhāvato, andhabadhirassa pana pañca cakkhusotadasakābhāvatoti evamādinā nayena veditabbo. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ vuttamevāti.
[03] 631^b^.^eb^ cutipaṭisandhīnaṃ khandhādīhi aññamaññasamānatā ^b^abhedo^eb^. asamānatā ^b^bhedo^eb^.

[03] ^b^ārammaṇatopi^eb^ ^a^M2.0310^ea^ ^b^abhinnā^eb^ti catūsu āruppesu tato tato cavitvā tattha tattheva upapajjantassa vasena vuttaṃ. tatheva pana heṭṭhā, rūpabhave vā upapatti natthi. arūpabhūmito cavitvā heṭṭhā upapatti nāma kāmabhave eva, tatthāpi tihetukapaṭisandhi eva. rūpabhavato pana cuto duhetukopi hotīti vadanti. ^b^amahaggatabahiddhārammaṇāya^eb^ cutiyā anantarā ^b^mahaggatājjhattārammaṇā^eb^ dutiyacatutthāruppapaṭisandhi. evaṃ nayamattassa dassitattā vuttaṃ, avuttañca sabbaṃ saṅgahetvā āha ^b^``ayaṃ tāva arūpabhūmīsuyeva nayo''^eb^ti. rūpārūpāvacarānaṃ upacārassa balavatāya tato cavitvā duggatiyaṃ upapatti natthīti ^b^``ekaccasugaticutiyā''^eb^ti āha. ^b^ekaccaduggatipaṭisandhī^eb^ti ettha ekaccaggahaṇassa payojanaṃ maggitabbaṃ. ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo siyā -- nānattakāyanānattasaññīsu vuttā ekacce ca vinipātikā tihetukādipaṭisandhikā, tesaṃ paṭisandhiṃ vinipātikabhāvena ``duggatipaṭisandhī''ti gahetvā sabbasugaticutiyā ca sā paṭisandhi hoti, na ekaccasugaticutiyā evāti tannivattanatthaṃ ekaccaduggatiggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. apāyapaṭisandhi eva hi ekaccasugaticutiyā hoti, na sabbasugaticutiyāti. atha vā duggatipaṭisandhi duvidhā ekaccasugaticutiyā anantarā, duggaticutiyā cāti. tattha pacchimaṃ vajjetvā purimaṃyeva gahetuṃ vuttaṃ ^b^``ekaccaduggatipaṭisandhī''^eb^ti. ^b^ahetukacutiyā sahetukapaṭisandhī^eb^ti duhetukā ca tihetukā ca yojetabbā. maṇḍūkadevaputtādīnaṃ viya hi ahetukacutiyā tihetukapaṭisandhipi hotīti.

[03] ^b^tassa^eb^ ^a^V2.0291^ea^ ^b^tassa viparītato ca yathāyogaṃ yojetabba^eb^nti ``ekaccasugaticutiyā ekaccaduggatipaṭisandhī''tiādīsu bhedavisesesu ``ekaccaduggaticutiyā ekaccaduggatipaṭisandhī''tiādinā yaṃ yaṃ yujjati, taṃ taṃ yojetabbanti attho. yujjamānamattāpekkhanavasena napuṃsakaniddeso kato. ^b^yojetabba^eb^nti vā bhāvatthatā daṭṭhabbā. ``amahaggatabahiddhārammaṇāya mahaggatājjhattārammaṇā''tiādīsu pana viparītayojanā na kātabbā. na hi mahaggatājjhattārammaṇāya cutiyā arūpabhūmīsu amahaggatabahiddhārammaṇā paṭisandhi atthi. ``catukkhandhāya āruppacutiyā anantarā pañcakkhandhā kāmāvacarapaṭisandhī''ti etassa vipariyāyo sayameva yojito. ``atītārammaṇāya cutiyā paccuppannārammaṇā paṭisandhī''ti ^a^M2.0311^ea^ etassa ca vipariyāyo natthi eva. bhedaviseso eva ca evaṃ vitthārena dassito, abhedaviseso pana ekekasmiṃ bhede tattha tattheva cutipaṭisandhiyojanāvasena veditabbo ``pañcakkhandhāya kāmāvacaracutiyā pañcakkhandhā kāmāvacarā...pe0... avitakkāvicārāya avitakkāvicārā''ti. catukkhandhāya pana catukkhandhā sayameva yojitā. eteneva nayena sakkā viññātunti pañcakkhandhādīsu abhedaviseso na dassitoti.

[03] 632^b^.^eb^ ^b^itī^eb^ti evaṃ vuttappakārena. etaṃ viññāṇaṃ avijjādisahakārikāraṇasahitassa saṅkhārassa vasena ^b^laddhappaccayaṃ^eb^. bāhirakakappitassa adhipatiṭṭhanakassa abhāvato ^b^rūpārūpadhammamattaṃ^eb^. tenāha ^b^``na satto na jīvo''^eb^ti. ^b^upetīti vuccati^eb^ tathāvohāramattaṃ, atthato pana paccayasāmaggiyā bhavantarabhāvena uppajjanamattanti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``tassa cā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^tato hetuṃ vinā^eb^ti tattha hetuṃ vinā. ^b^manussacutipaṭisandhikkamenā^eb^ti manussacutito manussapaṭisandhikkamena. evañhi pākaṭaggahaṇaṃ ubhayavisesanaṃ hoti. pākaṭatā cettha tadāsannakkhandhavasena veditabbā ``cavamāne upapajjamāne''tiādīsu (dī0 ni0 1.247) viya. ^b^manussacutipaṭisandhikkamenā^eb^ti vā manussacutito yassa kassaci paṭisandhikkamena. tathā hi vakkhati ``nissayaṃ assādayamānaṃ vā anāssādayamānaṃ vā''ti (visuddhi0 2.632).

[03] ^b^sarasenā^eb^ti sabhāvena, parikkhīṇāyusaṅkhāratāyāti attho. ^b^upakkamenā^eb^ti attanā, parena vā katena sīsacchedanādiupakkamena. sabbesaṃ aṅgapaccaṅgasandhīnaṃ bandhanāni ^b^sabbaṅgapaccaṅgasandhibandhanāni,^eb^ tesaṃ ^b^chedakānaṃ. sannipāta^eb^nti patanaṃ pavatti. hadayappadesopi anukkamena ^a^V2.0292^ea^ sussitvā appāvaseso hoti, pageva kāyoti āha ^b^``kamena upasussamāne sarīre''^eb^ti. tenevāha ``taṅkhaṇāvasesahadayavatthusannissita''nti. ^b^``niruddhesu cakkhādīsū''^eb^ti idaṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ āyatanānaṃ anupubbuppatti viya nirodhopi anupubbato hotīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ, atimandabhāvūpagamanataṃ vā sandhāya ^b^``niruddhesū''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, na anavasesanirodhaṃ. pañcadvārikaviññāṇānantarampi hi pubbe cuti dassitā. ^b^yamake^eb^ ca ``yassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nirujjhati, tassa manāyatanaṃ nirujjhatīti? āmantā. yassa ^a^M2.0312^ea^ vā pana manāyatanaṃ nirujjhati, tassa cakkhāyatanaṃ nirujjhatīti? sacittakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ manāyatanaṃ nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nirujjhati. sacakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ manāyatanañca nirujjhati, cakkhāyatanañca nirujjhatī''tiādinā (yama0 1.āyatanayamaka.120) cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ cuticittena saha nirodho vuttoti.

[03] ^b^hadayavatthumatte^eb^ti hadayavatthupadesamatte. na hi hadayavatthuṃ nissāya kāyindriyaṃ pavattati. hadayavatthupi tadā ātape pakkhittaharitatālapaṇṇaṃ viya appāvasesaṃ hotīti ^b^``taṅkhaṇāvasesahadayavatthusannissita''^eb^nti vuttanti vadanti. itaravatthūnaṃ pana sakiccāsamatthatāya kevalaṃ hadayavatthusannissitameva, tadā viññāṇaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``taṅkhaṇāvasesahadayavatthusannissita''^eb^nti. mātughātādi, mahaggatamaññaṃ vā tādisaṃ ^b^garukaṃ^eb^ nāma. ^b^samāsevitaṃ^eb^ abhiṇhaso kataṃ. ^b^āsannaṃ^eb^ maraṇakāle kataṃ, yadā tadā vā katampi paribyattaṃ hutvā anussaritaṃ. ^b^pubbakataṃ^eb^ aparāpariyāyavedanīyaṃ. laddho avaseso avijjādiko viññāṇassa paccayo etenāti ^b^laddhāvasesapaccayo,^eb^ saṅkhāro. etena vipaccituṃ katokāsaṃ yathūpacitaṃ kusalākusalacetanamāha. ^b^kammanimittaṃ^eb^ nāma yaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā āyūhanakāle kammaṃ āyūhati, taṃ. atīte kappakoṭisatasahassamatthakepi hi kamme kate vipaccanakāle āgantvā kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā upatiṭṭhati. ^b^gatinimittaṃ^eb^ nāma nibbattanakaokāse eko vaṇṇo. so ca niraye nibbattanārahassa ``aggijālavaṇṇādiko''tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. ^b^avijjāpaṭicchāditādīnave tasmiṃ^eb^ kammādivisaye paṭisandhiviññāṇassa ārammaṇabhāvena uppattiṭṭhānabhūte.

[03] taṇhāya appahīnattā eva, purimuppannāya ca santatiyā tathāpariṇatattā paṭisandhiṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ viññāṇaṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāraṃ hutvā pavattatīti āha ^b^``taṇhā nāmetī''^eb^ti. ^b^sahajātasaṅkhārā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0293^ea^ cutiāsannajavanaviññāṇasahajātā cetanā, sabbepi vā phassādayo. tasmiṃ paṭisandhiṭṭhāne kammādivisaye viññāṇaṃ ^b^khipanti^eb^. khipantā viya tasmiṃ visaye paṭisandhivasena viññāṇapatiṭṭhānassa hetubhāvena pavattantīti attho. ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ viññāṇaṃ. cutipaṭisandhitadāsannaviññāṇānaṃ ^b^santativasena^eb^ viññāṇanti upanītekattaṃ ^a^M2.0313^ea^. ^b^taṇhāya nāmiyamānaṃ...pe0... pavattatī^eb^ti namanakhipanapurimanissayajahanāparanissayassādananissayarahitapavattanāni santativasena tassevekassa viññāṇassa honti, na aññassāti dasseti. ^b^santativasenā^eb^ti ca vadanto ``tadevidaṃ viññāṇaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati anañña''nti (ma0 ni0 1.396) imañca micchāgāhaṃ paṭikkhipati. sati hi nānattanaye santativasena ekattanayo hotīti. ettha ca orimatīrarukkhavinibaddharajju viya purimabhavattabhāvavinibaddhaṃ kammādiārammaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, puriso viya viññāṇaṃ, tassa mātikātikkamanicchā viya taṇhā, atikkamanapayogo viya khipanakasaṅkhārā, yathā ca so puriso paratīre patiṭṭhahamāno paratīrarukkhavinibaddhaṃ kiñci assādayamāno vā anassādayamāno vā kevalaṃ pathaviyaṃ sakabalapayogeheva patiṭṭhāti, evamidampi bhavantarattabhāvavinibaddhaṃ hadayavatthusaṅkhātaṃ nissayaṃ pañcavokārabhave assādayamānaṃ, catuvokārabhave anassādayamānaṃ vā kevalaṃ ārammaṇasampayuttakammeheva pavattati. tattha ^b^assādayamāna^eb^nti pāpuṇantaṃ, paṭilabhamānanti attho.

[03] ^b^bhavantarādipaṭisandhānato^eb^ti bhavantarassa aññabhavassa ādipaṭisandhānabhāvato. bhavantarādayo vā bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsantarāni, tesaṃ paṭisandhānatoti attho. tadetaṃ viññāṇaṃ nāpi idhāgataṃ imasmiṃyeva bhave uppannattā. ^b^kamma^eb^nti paṭisandhijanakaṃ kammaṃ. ^b^saṅkhārā^eb^ti cutiāsannajavanaviññāṇasahagatā khipanakasaṅkhārā. ^b^natī^eb^ti namanavasena pavattataṇhā. ^b^visayo^eb^ kammādi.

[03] 633^b^.^eb^ saddapaṭighosādīnaṃ satipi paccayapaccayuppannabhāve santānabandho na pākaṭoti tesaṃ ekattanānattabhāvaṃ anāmasitvā anāgamanātītahetusamuppādameva dassento ^b^``ettha cā''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^saddādihetukā^eb^ti ettha ^b^paṭighoso^eb^ saddahetuko. ^b^padīpo^eb^ padīpantarādihetuko. ^b^muddā^eb^ lañchanahetukā. ^b^chāyā^eb^ ādāsādiabhimukhamukhādihetukā. ^b^honti aññatra agantvā^eb^ti saddādipaccayadesaṃ anupagantvā saddādihetukā honti tato pubbe abhāvā. evaṃ idampi paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ na hetudesaṃ gantvā taṃhetukaṃ hoti tato pubbe abhāvā. tasmā na idaṃ hetudesato ^a^V2.0294^ea^ purimabhavato idhāgataṃ paṭighosādayo viya saddādidesato, nāpi tattha hetunā vinā uppannaṃ saddādīhi vinā ^a^M2.0314^ea^ paṭighosādayo viyāti attho. atha vā ^b^honti aññatra agantvā^eb^ti pubbe paccayadese sannihitā hutvā tato aññatra gantvā tappaccayā na honti uppattito pubbe abhāvā, nāpi saddādipaccayā na honti, evaṃ idampīti vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.

[01] ^b^natthi ekatā^eb^ ekasantānekattepi aññasseva viññāṇassa pātubhavanato. ^b^nāpi nānatā^eb^ santānabandhato padīpo viya. khaṇikāya hi padīpajālāya santānekattaṃ upādāya so evāti vuccati, atthakiccañca sādheti, evamidhāpi daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^``yadi hī''^eb^tiādinā santānabandhe ekantaṃ ekatāya, nānatāya ca aggahetabbataṃ, gahaṇe ca dosaṃ dasseti. ^b^esa nayo^eb^ti atidesena bījaṅkurādīsu sabbahetuhetusamuppannesu yathāsambhavaṃ yojanā kātabbāti dasseti. idhāpi hi hetuhetusamuppannaviññāṇānaṃ ekantamekatte sati na manussagatito devagati sambhūtā siyā. ekantanānatte na kammavato phalaṃ siyā, tato ``rattassa bījaṃ rattassa phala''ntiādikassa viya ``bhūtapubbāhaṃ, bhante, rohitasso nāma isi ahosi''ntiādikassa (saṃ0 ni0 1.107) vohārassa lopo siyā, tasmā ettha santānabandhesu hetuhetusamuppannesu na ekantamekatā vā nānatā vā upagantabbā na gahetabbā. ettha ca ekantaekatāpaṭisedhena ``sayaṃkataṃ sukhaṃ dukkha''nti (vibha0 mūlaṭī0 227) imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nivāreti, ekantanānatāpaṭisedhena ``paraṃkataṃ sukhaṃ dukkha''nti (vibha0 mūlaṭī0 227), hetuhetusamuppannatāvacanena ``adhiccasamuppanna''nti (vibha0 mūlaṭī0 227) imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nivāreti.

[03] 634^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatthā^eb^ti phaluppattiṭṭhāne. ^b^aññassā^eb^ti yena taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ, tato aññassa. ^b^aññato^eb^ti yaṃ taṃ kammaṃ nibbattitaṃ, tato aññato. ``dhammamattaṃ bhavantaramupetī''ti (visuddhi0 2.632; vibha0 aṭṭha0 227; mahāni0 aṭṭha0 27; paṭi0 ma0 aṭṭha0 1.1.105) vuttattā phalassa ^b^upabhuñjake ca asati kassa taṃ phalaṃ siyā^eb^ti anuyuñjeti. ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ yathāvutte anuyoge.

[03] ^b^tatthā^eb^ti ekasantāne. yasmiṃ dhammapuñje kammaṃ nibbattaṃ, tasseva santāneti attho. ^b^etassa atthassā^eb^ti hetuphalānaṃ atthato aññattepi teneva ^a^M2.0315^ea^ hetuphalabhāvena sambandhattā taṃ phalaṃ ``aññassa, aññato''ti vā na vattabbanti etassa atthassa. catumadhurālattakarasādibhāvanā ambamātuluṅgādibījānaṃ ^a^V2.0295^ea^ ^b^abhisaṅkhāro^eb^. ettha ca abhisaṅkhataṃ bījaṃ viya kammavā satto, abhisaṅkhāro viya kammaṃ, bījassa aṅkurādippabandho viya sattassa paṭisandhiviññāṇādippabandho. tatthuppannassa madhurassa rattakesarassa vā phalassa vā tasseva bījassa, tato eva ca abhisaṅkhārato bhāvo viya kammakārakasseva sattassa, taṃkammato eva ca phalassa bhāvo veditabbo. bālasarīre kataṃ vijjāpariyāpuṇanaṃ, sippasikkhanaṃ, osadhappayogo ca na vuḍḍhasarīraṃ gacchanti. atha ca tannimittaṃ vijjāpāṭavaṃ sippajānanaṃ, anāmayatā ca vuḍḍhasarīre honti, na ca tāni aññassa honti taṃsantatipariyāpanne eva vuḍḍhasarīre uppajjanato, na ca yathāpayuttena vijjāpariyāpuṇanādinā vinā tāni aññato honti tadabhāve abhāvato, evaṃ idhāpi santāne yaṃ phalaṃ, etaṃ nāññassa. na ca aññatoti yojetabbaṃ. etena ca saṅkhārābhāve phalābhāvameva dasseti, na aññapaccayanivāraṇaṃ karoti.
[03] yampi vuttaṃ, tattha vadāmāti vacanaseso. tattha vā upabhuñjake asati siddhā bhuñjakasammutīti sambandho. phalatīti sammuti ^b^phalatisammuti^eb^.

[03] ^b^rukkhasaṅkhātānaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti rukkhapaññattiyā upādānabhūtānaṃ bhūtupādāyadhammānaṃ. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā yathā khandhasantāne kusalākusalacetanuppattiyaṃ ``puññaṃ karoti, pāpaṃ karotī''ti kattuvohāro, evaṃ tassa phaluppattiyaṃ ``sukhaṃ anubhavati, dukkhaṃ anubhavatī''ti upabhuñjakavohāro, tasmā na ettha khandhavinimuttena aññena upabhuñjakena nāma koci attho atthīti.

[03] 635^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ santepī^eb^ti asaṅkantipātubhāve tattha ca yathāvuttadosapariharaṇe sati, siddheti attho. ^b^pavattikkhaṇeyevā^eb^ti saṅkhārānaṃ pavattamānakkhaṇe eva. ^b^pavattito pubbe^eb^ti kammāyūhanakkhaṇato pubbe, avijjamānatāya samānattā evaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^pacchā cā^eb^ti vipaccanappapattito pacchā ca.
[03] avipakkavipākā katattā ce paccayā, vipakkavipākānampi katattaṃ samānanti tesampi phalāvahatā siyāti āsaṅkānivattanatthaṃ āha ^b^``na ca niccaṃ phalāvahā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^``na^eb^ ^a^M2.0316^ea^ ^a^V2.0296^ea^ ^b^vijjamānattā avijjamānattā vā''^eb^ti etena vijjamānattaṃ, avijjamānattañca nissāya vuttadose pariharati. tassā pāṭibhogakiriyāya, bhaṇḍakīṇanakiriyāya, iṇaggahaṇakiriyāya vā karaṇamattaṃ ^b^taṃkiriyākaraṇamattaṃ,^eb^ tadeva ^b^tadatthaniyyātane^eb^ paṭibhaṇḍadāne, iṇadāne ca paccayo hoti, aphalitaniyyātanādiphalanti attho.
[03] 636^b^.^eb^ ^b^sammohavighātattha^eb^nti bāttiṃsāya viññāṇesu yathāvuttasaṅkhārānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavattiyañca paccayabhāve vibhajja avibhāvite pavattanakasammohassa apanayanatthaṃ.

[03] ^b^puññābhisaṅkhāre^eb^ti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. ^b^avisesenā^eb^ti ``tihetuko tihetukassā''tiādikaṃ bhedaṃ akatvā sāmaññato, piṇḍavasenāti attho. sabbattha upanissayapaccayo balavakammassa vasena yojetabbo. ``dubbalañhi kammaṃ upanissayapaccayo na hotī''ti ^b^paṭṭhānasaṃvaṇṇanāya^eb^ dassitametaṃ. ^b^rūpāvacarapañcakusalacetanābhedo^eb^ti ``ṭhapetvā abhiññāppatta''nti visesetvā vattabbaṃ, na vā vattabbaṃ vipākassa paccayabhāvakathāya avipākārahassa pasaṅgābhāvato. abhiññācetanāya hi avipākatā heṭṭhā vibhāvitā eva. ^b^avisesena panā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. pañcannaṃ vipākaviññāṇānanti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^pañcanna^eb^nti cakkhusotaviññāṇānaṃ, sampaṭicchanamanodhātuyā, dvinnaṃ santīraṇamanoviññāṇadhātūnañcāti etesaṃ pañcannaṃ. ^b^tathevā^eb^ti dvedhā eva. kathaṃ pana iṭṭhārammaṇeyeva pavattanakāni kusalavipākaviññāṇāni duggatiyaṃ pavattantīti āha ^b^``niraye mahāmoggallānattherassā''^eb^tiādi. thero hi tattha iddhiyā vassaṃ nimminitvā katipayaṃ velaṃ nirayaggiṃ vūpasametvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ deseti.
[03] ^b^sveva^eb^ kāmāvacaro puññābhisaṅkhāro. ^b^avisesena pana puññābhisaṅkhāro^eb^ti kāmāvacaraṃ, rūpāvacarañcāti duvidhampi puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ ekajjhaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03] ^b^dvādasākusalacetanābhedo^eb^ti ettha uddhaccasahagatacetanāya gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ na dissati, vicāretabbametaṃ. ekassa viññāṇassa tatheva ^a^M2.0317^ea^ paccayo paṭisandhiyaṃ, no pavatteti ekasseva paccayabhāvaniyamo paṭisandhiyaṃ, no pavatte. pavatte hi sattannampi paccayoti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^rūpabhave^eb^ ^a^V2.0297^ea^ ^b^catunna^eb^nti akusalavipākānaṃ cakkhusotaviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇānaṃ. tāni pana ekantato aniṭṭhārammaṇāni, rūpabhave ca kathaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogoti āha ^b^``so ca kho''^eb^tiādi. ^b^``tathā kāmāvacaradevalokepi aniṭṭharūpādayo natthī''^eb^ti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuttaṃ. bahulañhi tesaṃ iṭṭhā eva rūpādayo upaṭṭhahanti, kadāci aniṭṭhaṃ. devānañhi kesañcideva pubbanimittapātubhāvakālādīsu milātamālādianiṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogo hotīti.

[03] 637^b^.^eb^ yattha vitthārappakāsanaṃ kataṃ, tato bhavato paṭṭhāya mukhamattappakāsanaṃ kātukāmo āha ^b^``ādito paṭṭhāyā''^eb^ti. teneva ``dvīsu bhavesū''tiādi vuttaṃ. manussāpi keci aṇḍajā, saṃsedajā ca hontīti tadapekkhāya ^b^``catūsu yonīsū''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ekattakāyaekattasaññitāsāmaññena catutthajhānabhūmikāpi asaññāruppavajjā catutthiṃyeva viññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ bhajanti. ^b^esa^eb^ puññābhisaṅkhāro. ^b^vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ``nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena cā''ti vuttanayeneva. ^b^yathāsambhava^eb^nti ekavīsatikāmāvacararūpāvacarakusalavipākesu cuddasannaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavatte ca, sattannaṃ pavatte evāti ayaṃ yathāsambhavo.
[03] ^b^tādiseyevā^eb^ti nānattakāyaekattasaññīsaṅkhāteyeva.

[03] ^b^catunnaṃ viññāṇāna^eb^nti bhavādayo apekkhitvā vuttaṃ. catūsu antogadhānaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ viññāṇānaṃ tīsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu paccayabhāvo yojetabbo. aviññāṇake sattāvāse saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇe alabbhamānepi tassa saṅkhārahetukattaṃ labbhateva. tathā hi tattha puññābhisaṅkhāro kaṭattārūpānaṃ nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayena paccayo hoti. etasmiñca mukhamattappakāsane puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ duggatiādīsu pavattiyaṃ kusalavipākādiviññāṇānaṃ paccayabhāvo bhavesu vuttanayeneva viññāyatīti na vuttoti veditabbo.
[03] 638^b^.^eb^ ^b^vibhāgā^eb^ ^a^M2.0318^ea^ ^b^nāmarūpāna^eb^nti nāmassa, rūpassa ca pabhedato.

[01] tattha nāmassa tāva pabhedaṃ dassentena kāmaṃ viññāṇampi nāmameva, paccayapaccayuppanne pana asaṅkarato ^a^V2.0298^ea^ dassetuṃ ^b^``ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ namanato vedanādayo tayo khandhā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. nibbānassa panettha pavattikathāyaṃ appaccayattā, namanaṭṭhābhāvato ca pasaṅgo eva natthi. nāmanaṭṭhena hi taṃ nāmaṃ, na namanaṭṭhena. ^b^tesaṃ^eb^ nāmarūpānaṃ sukhādivasena, pathavīādivasena ca ^b^vibhāgo^eb^.
[01] ^b^ekaṃ sattāvāsa^eb^nti asaññasattāvāsaṃ. purimesu catūsu, asaññasattāvāse cāti ^b^pañcasu^eb^.

[03] gabbhaseyyaggahaṇena jalābujā gahitāti ^b^``aṇḍajānañcā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. aṇḍajānañca abhāvakānanti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^santatisīsānī^eb^ti kalāpasantānamūlāni. yadipi vikārarūpāni paṭisandhikkhaṇe na santi, lakkhaṇaparicchedarūpāni pana santīti tāni paramatthato aparinipphannānīti vajjento āha ^b^``rūparūpato''^eb^ti. phassādike saṅkhārakkhandhabhāvena ekattaṃ netvā ^b^``tevīsati dhammā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^apanetvā^eb^ti kalāpantaragate pathavīādike samānalakkhaṇatāya aggahetvā.
[03] ^b^tesa^eb^nti brahmakāyikādīnaṃ. ^b^vitthārenā^eb^ti catūsupi santatisīsesu rūpānaṃ asaṅkhipanena.

[03] ^b^kāmabhave pana yasmā sesaopapātikāna^eb^nti ettha kiñcāpi kāmabhave opapātikā vuttā na santi, yena sesaggahaṇaṃ sātthakaṃ bhaveyya, aṇḍajagabbhaseyyakehi pana opapātikasaṃsedajā sesā hontīti sesaggahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ. atha vā brahmakāyikādikehi opapātikehi vuttehi sese sandhāya ^b^``sesaopapātikāna''^eb^nti āha. te pana arūpinopi santīti ^b^``kāmabhave''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. aparipuṇṇāyatanānaṃ pana nāmarūpaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ rūpamissakaviññāṇaniddese vuttanayena sakkā dhammagaṇanato viññātunti na vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^paṭisandhicittena saha pavattaututo^eb^ti paṭisandhicittena saha uppannarūpesu tejodhātuto. hadayavatthuno taṅkhaṇuppannattā paṭisandhicittassa ^b^vatthudubbalatā^eb^. tesaṃ ajjhoharitāhārena anugate sarīre ^a^M2.0319^ea^ āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ suṭṭhaddhakanti sambandho. ^b^naro^eb^ti teneva mātukucchigatabhāvena tirokkho. avakaṃsato dve aṭṭhakāneva utucittasamuṭṭhānāni hontīti sasaddakālaṃ sandhāya ^b^``ukkaṃsato dvinnaṃ navakāna''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^pubbe^eb^ti yaṃ pubbe santatidvayādikaṃ sattakapariyosānaṃ rūpaṃ idha vuttaṃ, taṃ ekekassa ^a^V2.0299^ea^ cittassa tīsu tīsu khaṇesu uppajjamānameva vuttanti katvā āha ^b^``pubbe...pe0... sattatividha''^eb^nti. ^b^duvidhampi ta^eb^nti utusamuṭṭhānaṃ, cittasamuṭṭhānañcāti duvidhampi taṃ saddaṃ.

[03] ^b^saṇṭhātu^eb^nti addhaniyabhāvena ṭhātuṃ, attano pana khaṇamattaṃ tiṭṭhateva. ^b^catuddisā vavatthāpitā^eb^ti aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhasīsā mūlena catūsu disāsu vavatthāpitā. aññamaññaṃ āliṅgetvā ṭhitā ^b^bhinnavāhanikā viya^eb^ ca.

[03] 639^b^.^eb^ ^b^pañcavokārabhave ca pavattiya^eb^nti rūpājanakakammajapañcaviññāṇappavattikālaṃ, sahajātaviññāṇapaccayañca sandhāyāha. tadā hi tato nāmameva hotīti. kammaviññāṇapaccayā pana tadāpi ubhayaṃ hotīti sakkā vattuṃ, pacchājātaviññāṇapaccayā ca rūpaṃ upatthaddhaṃ hotīti. ^b^asaññesū^eb^tiādi kammaviññāṇapaccayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^pañcavokārabhave ca pavattiya^eb^nti bhavaṅgādijanakakammato aññena rūpuppattikālaṃ, nirodhasamāpattikālaṃ, bhavaṅgādiuppattikālato aññakālañca sandhāya vuttanti yuttaṃ. bhavaṅgādiuppattikāle hi taṃjanakena kammunā uppajjamānaṃ rūpaṃ, so ca vipāko kammaviññāṇapaccayo hotīti sakkā vattuṃ. sahajātaviññāṇapaccayānapekkhampi hi pavattiyaṃ kammena pavattamānaṃ rūpaṃ, nāmañca na kammaviññāṇānapekkhaṃ hotīti. ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavatte ca. sahajātaviññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpaṃ, kammaviññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpañca yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ. ^b^nāmañca rūpañca nāmarūpañcā^eb^ti ettha nāmarūpasaddo attano ekadesena nāmasaddena nāmasaddassa sarūpo, rūpasaddena ca rūpasaddassa, tasmā sarūpānaṃ ekasesoti ^b^ekadesasarūpekaseso,^eb^ nāmarūpasaddassa ṭhānaṃ itaresañca nāmarūpasaddānaṃ adassananti attho.
[03] vipākato aññaṃ ^b^avipākaṃ^eb^. yato dvidhā mataṃ, tato yuttameva idanti yojetabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^kusalādicittakkhaṇe^eb^ti ^a^M2.0320^ea^ ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena akusalakiriyacittakkhaṇe viya vipākacittakkhaṇepi vipākājanakakammasamuṭṭhānaṃ saṅgahitanti veditabbaṃ. vipākacittakkhaṇe pana abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇapaccayā pubbe vuttanayena ubhayañca labbhatīti tādisavipākacittakkhaṇavajjanatthaṃ ^b^``kusalādicittakkhaṇe''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] 640^b^.^eb^ ^b^suttantikapariyāyato^eb^ti ^a^V2.0300^ea^ paṭṭhāne rūpānaṃ upanissayapaccayassa avuttattā vuttaṃ. suttante pana yasmiṃ sati yaṃ hoti, asati ca na hoti, so tassa upanissayo nidānaṃ hetu pabhavoti katvā ``viññāṇūpanisaṃ nāmarūpa''nti rūpassa ca viññāṇūpanissayatā vuttā. vanapatthapariyāye ca vanapatthagāmanigamanagarajanapadapuggalūpanissayo iriyāpathavihāro, tato ca cīvarādīnaṃ jīvitaparikkhārānaṃ kasirena, appakasirena ca samudāgamanaṃ vuttaṃ, na ca vanapatthādayo ārammaṇūpanissayādibhāvaṃ iriyāpathānaṃ, cīvarādisamudāgamanassa ca bhajanti. tasmā vinā abhāvo eva suttantikapariyāyato upanissayabhāvo daṭṭhabbo. nāmassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ kammārammaṇapaṭisandhiādikāle ārammaṇapaccayova hotīti vattabbameva natthīti rūpasseva suttantikapariyāyato ekadhāva paccayabhāvo vutto. sasaṃsayassa hi rūpassetaṃ paccayo hotīti vutte nāmassa hotīti vattabbameva natthīti.
[03] pavattassa pākaṭattā apākaṭaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā pucchati ^b^``kathaṃ paneta''^eb^ntiādinā. suttato nāmaṃ, yuttito rūpaṃ viññāṇapaccayā hotīti jānitabbaṃ.

[03] yuttito sādhetvā suttena taṃ daḷhaṃ karonto ^b^``kammasamuṭṭhānassāpi hī''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^cittasamuṭṭhānassevā^eb^ti cittasamuṭṭhānassa viya. ettha ca ``viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpa''nti (ma0 ni0 3.126; saṃ0 ni0 2.1, 39; mahāva0 1; udā0 1) bhāsamānena bhagavatā yasmā upaparikkhamānānaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ paramatthato nāmarūpamattameva pavattamānaṃ dissati, na satto, na jīvo, tasmā kenaci appaṭivattiyaṃ anuttaraṃ dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ hoti. suññatappakāsanañhi dhammacakkappavattananti. atha vā nāmarūpamattatāvacanena pavattiyā dukkhasaccamattatā vuttā. dukkhasaccappakāsanena ca tassa samudayo, tassa ca nirodho, nirodhagāminipaṭipadā ca ^a^M2.0321^ea^ pakāsitā eva hoti. ahetukassa dukkhassa, hetunirodhā anirujjhanakassa ca abhāvā, nirodhassa ca upāyena vinā anadhigantabbattāti catusaccappakāsanaṃ dhammacakkappavattanaṃ niddhāretabbaṃ.
[03] 641^b^.^eb^ ^b^ta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0301^ea^ nāmarūpaṃ. ^b^tassā^eb^ti saḷāyatanassa. ^b^tādisassevā^eb^ti katekasesasseva.

[03] idhāpi ^b^nāma^eb^nti khandhattayasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ vuttanayameva. ^b^niyamato^eb^ti idañca catunnaṃ bhūtānaṃ, channaṃ vatthūnaṃ, jīvitassa ca yathāsambhavaṃ sahajātanissayapurejātaindriyādinā saḷāyatanassa pavattamānassa ekantena paccayabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. rūpāyatanādīnaṃ pana sahajātanissayānupālanabhāvo natthīti aggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. ārammaṇārammaṇapurejātādibhāvo ca tesaṃ na sasantatipariyāpannānameva, na ca cakkhādīnaṃ viya ekappahārenevāti aniyamato paccayabhāvo. ^b^niyamato...pe0... jīvitindriyanti eva^eb^nti ettha ^b^evaṃ^eb^-saddena vā rūpāyatanādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatana^eb^nti ettha yadipi chaṭṭhāyatanasaḷāyatanasaddānaṃ saddato sarūpatā natthi, atthato pana saḷāyatanekadesova chaṭṭhāyatananti ekadesasarūpatā atthīti ekadesasarūpekaseso katoti veditabbo. atthatopi hi sarūpānaṃ ekadesasarūpekasesaṃ icchanti ``vaṅko ca kuṭilo ca kuṭilā''ti. tasmā atthato ekadesasarūpānañca ekasesena bhavitabbanti.

[03] atha vā chaṭṭhāyatanañca manāyatanañca chaṭṭhāyatananti vā manāyatananti vā chaṭṭhāyatanañca chaṭṭhāyatanañca chaṭṭhāyatananti vā manāyatanañca manāyatanañca manāyatananti vā ekasesaṃ katvā cakkhādīhi saddhiṃ ``saḷāyatana''nti vuttanti tameva ekasesaṃ nāmamattapaccayassa, nāmarūpapaccayassa ca manāyatanassa vasena kataṃ atthato dassento āha ^b^``chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañca saḷāyatananti evaṃ katekasesassā''^eb^ti. yathāvuttopi hi ekaseso atthato chaṭṭhāyatanañca saḷāyatanañcāti evaṃ kato nāma ^a^M2.0322^ea^ hotīti. sabbattha ca ekasese kate ekavacananiddeso katekasesānaṃ saḷāyatanādisaddavacanīyatāsāmaññavasena katoti daṭṭhabbo.
[03] ^b^``na aññathā''^eb^ti etena tassa tassa nāmassa, rūpassa ca abhāve taṃ taṃ āyatanaṃ na hotīti byatirekaṃ vibhāveti.
[03] ^b^ya^eb^nti ^a^V2.0302^ea^ yaṃ yaṃ nāmaṃ, rūpañca. ^b^yassā^eb^ti yassa yassa āyatanassa. ^b^yathā^eb^ti sahajātādinā yena yena pakārena. ^b^neyya^eb^nti ñeyyaṃ.

[03] ^b^tassa vasenā^eb^ti tassa hetuādipaccayassa vasena. ^b^ukkaṃsāvakaṃso^eb^ti ettha sattadhā paccayabhāvato ukkaṃso aṭṭhadhā paccayabhāvo, tato navadhā, tato dasadhāti ayaṃ ukkaṃso. avakaṃso pana dasadhā paccayabhāvato navadhā paccayabhāvo, tato aṭṭhadhā, tato sattadhāti evaṃ veditabbo, na pana sattadhā paccayabhāvato eva dvepi ukkaṃsāvakaṃsā yojetabbā, tato avakaṃsābhāvatoti.
[03] vipākaṃ nāmanti sambandho. ^b^vuttanayenevā^eb^ti sahajātādivasena, sattadhā, hetuādivasena ca. ^b^itara^eb^nti avipākaṃ nāmaṃ.

[03] ^b^``hadayavatthuno sahāyaṃ hutvā''^eb^ti etena arūpe viya asahāyaṃ nāmaṃ na hoti, hadayavatthu ca nāmena saha chaṭṭhāyatanassa paccayo hotīti ettakameva dasseti, na pana yathā hadayavatthu paccayo hoti, tathā nāmampīti ayamattho adhippeto. vatthu hi nāmassa vippayuttapaccayo hoti, na nāmaṃ. nāmañca vipākahetādipaccayo hoti, na vatthūti. pavatte arūpadhammā kammajarūpassa ṭhitippattasseva paccayā honti, na uppajjamānassāti vippayuttātthiavigatā ca pacchājātavippayuttādayo eva cakkhādīnaṃ yojetabbā.

[03] ``tatthevā''ti iminā ``pavatte''ti idaṃ paccāmaṭṭhanti āha ^b^``tattheva hi pavatte''^eb^ti. ``pañcavokārabhave''ti pana idaṃ ``pañcanna''nti iminā dīpitamevāti. pavattiyaṃ cakkhāyatanādikassa nāmaṃ vipākapaccayo na hoti, attanā janitarūpasseva hoti. paṭisandhiyaṃ pana kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānasadisaṃ, tasmā vatthunopi vipākapaccayo hotiyeva.
[03] ^b^rūpato^eb^ti ^a^M2.0323^ea^ rūpesu. ^b^yaṃ yaṃ āyatanaṃ uppajjatī^eb^ti paṭisandhiyaṃ aṇḍajajalābujānaṃ pañcasu āyatanesu kāyāyatanameva uppajjati. itaresaṃ yathārahaṃ itarānipi.

[03] ^b^avasesamanāyatanassā^eb^ti ettha ``pañcakkhandhabhave panā''ti etassa anuvattamānattā pañcavokārabhave ^a^V2.0303^ea^ eva pavattamānaṃ pañcaviññāṇehi avasesaṃ manāyatanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. nāmarūpassa sahajātādisādhāraṇapaccayabhāvo, sampayuttādiasādhāraṇapaccayabhāvo ca yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo. ``rūpapaccayā pañcāyatanānī''ti ayampi nayo labbhati nirodhasamāpannānaṃ vasena, so pana apacurabhāvato yebhuyyena ca paṭisandhiyaṃ paccayabhūtasseva nāmarūpassa pavattiyaṃ paccayabhāvo vibhāvitoti na dassitoti veditabbaṃ.
[03] 642^b^.^eb^ bāvīsatiyā lokiyavipākaviññāṇehi sampayuttā ^b^bāvīsatilokiyaviññāṇasampayuttā^eb^. tato eva ^b^bāvīsati^eb^.

[03] ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ saḷāyatane, tesu chasu āyatanesūti attho. ^b^ajjhatta^eb^nti sasantatipariyāpannameva gaṇhāti. tañhi sasantatipariyāpannakammanibbattaṃ tādisassa phassassa paccayo hoti. rūpādīni, pana bahiddhā anupādinnāni ca phassassa ārammaṇaṃ honti, na tāni cakkhādīni viya sasantatipariyāpannakammakilesanimittappavattibhāvena phassassa paccayā hontīti paṭhamācariyavāde na gahitāni, dutiyācariyavāde pana yathā tathā vā paccayabhāve sati na sakkā vajjetunti gahitāni.

[03] ^b^tatthā^eb^ti saḷāyatanapaccayā phassapade. ye tāva ācariyā mahāvihāravāsinova yathā viññāṇaṃ, evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ, saḷāyatanaṃ, phassaṃ, vedanañca paccayaṃ, paccayuppannañca sasantatipariyāpannaṃ dīpentā vipākameva icchanti. ``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phasso''ti ^b^abhidhammabhājanīya^eb^pāḷi (vibha0 243) āruppaṃ sandhāya vuttāti ^b^``chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā phassoti pāḷianusārato''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] sabbe phassā na sambhontīti yojanā. yadi sabbāyatanehi eko phasso sambhaveyya, ``saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso''ti ekassa vacanaṃ yujjeyya ^a^M2.0324^ea^, athāpi ekamhā āyatanā sabbe phassā sambhaveyyuṃ, tathāpi sabbāyatanehi sabbaphassasambhavato āyatanabhedena phassabhedo natthīti tadabhedavasena ekassa vacanaṃ yujjeyya, tathā pana asambhavato na yuttanti codeti ^b^``na sabbāyatanehī''^eb^tiādinā ^a^V2.0304^ea^. aññassāpi vā asambhavantassa vidhānassa bodhanatthametaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^``nāpi ekamhā āyatanā sabbe phassā''^eb^ti. ``na sabbāyatanehi eko phasso sambhotī''ti idameva pana ekaphassavacanassāyuttattadīpakaṃ kāraṇanti veditabbaṃ. nidassanavasena vā etaṃ vuttaṃ. nāpi ekamhā āyatanā sabbe phassā sambhonti, evaṃ na sabbāyatanehi eko phasso sambhoti. tasmā ekassa vacanaṃ ayuttanti. parihāraṃ pana anekāyatanehi ekaphassassa sambhavatoti dassento ^b^``tatridaṃ vissajjana''^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^avasesasampayuttadhammāyatanā^eb^ phassavajjitā taṃsampayuttacetasikā dhammā.
[03] ekopi anekāyatanappabhavo ^b^ekopanekāyatanappabhavo^eb^.
[03] chadhā paccayatte pañca vibhāvaye, ekaṃ navadhā paccayatte, bāhirāni cha āyatanāni ārammaṇādinā yathāsambhavaṃ paccayatte vibhāvayeti sambandho.

[03] ^b^anekabhedassā^eb^ti kusalavipākādipañcadvārādivasena anekavidhassa dvipañcaviññāṇasampayuttavajjassa vipākaphassassa. ^b^tāni cā^eb^ti rūpāyatanādīni. ``mano ca nesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotī''ti (ma0 ni0 1.455) hi vuttaṃ. ^b^tathā cā^eb^ti paccuppannāni rūpādīni paccuppannañca dhammāyatanapariyāpannaṃ rūparūpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^ārammaṇapaccayamattenā^eb^ti taṃ sabbaṃ apaccuppannaṃ, aññañca dhammāyatanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
[03] 643^b^.^eb^ ^b^dvārato saḷevā^eb^ti pabhavasāmaññato ekavidhāpi uppattidvārato cha eva hontīti chaḷeva vedanā vuttā.

[03] cittabhedena ekūnanavutividhāpi idhādhippetā eva dassetuṃ ^b^``vedanāsu panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ``sesāna''nti ettha sampaṭicchanasampayuttāya cakkhusamphassādayo pañca yadipi anantarādīhi paccayā honti, anantarādīnaṃ pana ^a^M2.0325^ea^ upanissaye antogadhattā santīraṇatadārammaṇānañca sādhāraṇassa tassa vasena ^b^``ekadhā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ekekasmiṃ dvāre hi cakkhudvārādīsu uppannacakkhuviññāṇādīhi ^a^V2.0305^ea^ sahajātā phassā sakasakavīthīsu sampaṭicchanādīhi sampayuttavedanānaṃ, manodvāre tadārammaṇavaseneva pavattānaṃ tebhūmakavipākavedanānampi sahajātamanosamphassasaṅkhāto so phasso aṭṭhadhā paccayo hotīti yojetabbaṃ.

[03] rūpārūpāvacaravipākavedanā paṭisandhiādivaseneva pavattanti, kāmāvacarāpi ekaccāti ^b^``tebhūmakavipākavedanānampī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. tāsampi hi sahajātamanosamphasso aṭṭhadhāva paccayo hoti. paccayaṃ anupādinnampi keci icchantīti ^b^``yā panā''^eb^tiādinā manodvārāvajjanasampayuttaphassassa paccayabhāvo vutto. tañca mukhamattadassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. etena nayena sabbassa anantarassa, anānantarassa ca phassassa tassā tassā vipākavedanāya upanissayatā yojetabbāti.
[03] 644^b^.^eb^ ^b^idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ loke, imasmiṃ vā sāsane cha taṇhā dīpitā. ^b^idhā^eb^ti vā imasmiṃ vedanāpaccayā taṇhāpade. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tāsu chasu taṇhāsu.

[03] ekekāya sassatadiṭṭhisahagatāya, ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatāya ca taṇhāya tadabhinandanānuguṇo rūpādīsu pavattiākāro, kevalaṃ kāmassādavasena pavattiyā visiṭṭhākārattā vuttappavattiākārato taṇhāya tividhatā.

[03] ^b^mamattenā^eb^ti sampiyāyanena, assādanataṇhāya icceva vuttaṃ hoti. tattha putto viya vedanā daṭṭhabbā, khīrādayo viya vedanāya paccayabhūtā rūpādayo, khīrādidāyikā dhāti viya rūpādichaḷārammaṇadāyakā cittakārādayo cha. tattha sukhasamphassavatthadāyako tantavāyo, vejjo rasāyatanojāvasena, tadupatthambhitajīvitavasena ca dhammārammaṇassa dāyakoti daṭṭhabbo. ^b^sabbāpesā^eb^ aṭṭhasatappabhedāpi.

[03] ārammaṇapaccayo uppajjamānāya ārammaṇamattameva hoti, na upanissayo viya uppādakoti uppādakassa upanissayasseva vasena ^b^``ekadhāvā''^eb^ti ^a^M2.0326^ea^ vuttaṃ. upanissayena vā ārammaṇūpanissayo ^a^V2.0306^ea^ saṅgahito. tena ca ārammaṇabhāvena taṃsabhāgo aññopi ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo dīpito hotīti upanissayavaseneva paccayabhāvo vuttoti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^``yasmā vā''^eb^tiādinā na kevalaṃ vipākasukhavedanā eva, tissopi pana vedanā vipākā visesena taṇhāya upanissayapaccayo, avisesena itarā cāti dasseti. ^b^upekkhā pana santattā, sukhamicceva bhāsitā^eb^ti tasmā sāpi bhiyyo icchanavasena taṇhāya upanissayoti adhippāyo. upekkhā pana akusalavipākabhūtā aniṭṭhattā dukkhe avarodhetabbā, itarā iṭṭhattā sukheti sā dukkhaṃ viya, sukhaṃ viya ca upanissayapaccayo hotīti sakkā vattuṃ. ``vedanāpaccayā taṇhā''ti vacanena sabbassa vedanāvato paccayassa atthitāya taṇhuppattippasaṅge tannivāraṇatthamāha ^b^``vedanāpaccayā cāpī''^eb^tiādi.

[03] nanu ``anusayasahāyā vedanā taṇhāya paccayo''ti vacanassa abhāvā atippasaṅganivattiṃ na sakkā kātunti? na, vaṭṭakathāya pavattattā. vaṭṭassa ca anusayavirahe abhāvato anusayasahitāva paccayoti atthato vuttamevetaṃ hotīti. atha vā ``avijjāpaccayā''ti anuvattamānattā anusayasahitāva paccayoti viññāyati. ^b^vedanāpaccayā taṇhā^eb^ti cettha vedanāpaccayā eva taṇhā, na vedanāya vināti ayaṃ niyamo icchito, na vedanāpaccayā taṇhā hotiyevāti, tasmā atippasaṅgo ettha natthi evāti.

[03] ^b^vusīmato^eb^ti vusitavato, vusitabrahmacariyavāsassāti attho. vussatīti vā vusīti maggo vuccati, so etassa vuttho atthīti ^b^vusīmā,^eb^ ukkaṭṭhaniddesena arahā. aggaphalaṃ vā pariniṭṭhitavāsattā ``vusī''ti vuccati, taṃ etassa atthīti ^b^vusīmā^eb^.

[03] 645^b^.^eb^ ^b^atthavibhāgo^eb^ atthassa vibhajanā. ^b^vatthusaṅkhātaṃ kāma^eb^nti kāmaguṇasaññitaṃ rūpādiārammaṇamāha. ^b^upādiyatī^eb^ti kāmavasena gaṇhāti, daḷhaṃ assādetīti attho. ^b^kāmaṃ upādiyatī^eb^ti ettha kammasādhano kāmasaddo ^a^M2.0327^ea^, ^b^kāmo ca so^eb^ti ettha kattusādhano kilesakāmassa adhippetattā. upādānasaddo pana ubhayatthāpi kattusādhanova. ^b^daḷhattho^eb^ bhusattho. yathā bhuso āyāso ^a^V2.0307^ea^ upāyāso, bhusaṃ kuṭṭhaṃ upakuṭṭhaṃ, evaṃ idhāpīti āha ^b^``upāyāsaupakuṭṭhādīsu viyā''^eb^ti. ^b^purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyatī^eb^ti purimadiṭṭhiṃ sassatabhāvena gaṇhantī upādiyati, purimadiṭṭhiākārena vā uttaradiṭṭhi uppajjamānā teneva purimadiṭṭhiṃ daḷhaṃ karontī taṃ upādiyatīti vuttā. atha vā ^b^purimadiṭṭhiṃ uttaradiṭṭhi upādiyatī^eb^ti ``sassato attā''ti (dī0 ni0 1.31) idaṃ purimadiṭṭhiṃ upādiyamānaṃ uttaradiṭṭhiṃ nidassetuṃ vuttaṃ. yathā hi esā daḷhīkaraṇavasena purimaṃ uttarā upādiyati, evaṃ ``natthi dinna''ntiādikāpīti (ma0 ni0 1.445; 2.94; 3.91, 116, 136; dha0 sa0 1221; vibha0 938). ^b^atta^eb^ggahaṇaṃ pana attavādupādānanti na idaṃ diṭṭhupādānadassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^loko cā^eb^ti vā attaggahaṇavinimuttaṃ gahaṇaṃ diṭṭhupādānabhūtaṃ idha purimadiṭṭhiuttaradiṭṭhivacanehi vuttanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^sīlabbataṃ upādiyatī^eb^ti ettha asuddhimaggagosīlādisamādānavasena sīlaṃ, avītikkamanavasena vataṃ. ubhayathāpi vā sīlaṃ, tapokammabhāvena gahitatāya vataṃ, gavādipakatibhāvanā. attano vā gavādibhāvādhiṭṭhānaṃ sīlaṃ, ``gacchanto bhakkheti, tiṭṭhanto muttetī''tiādinā gavādikiriyākaraṇaṃ vataṃ. taṃtaṃakiccasammatato vā nivatti sīlaṃ, taṃsamādānavatovesa bhojanakiccakaraṇādivisesapaṭipatti vataṃ, taṃ sīlabbataṃ asuddhimaggaṃ ``suddhimaggo''ti parāmasanto tathā abhinivisanto upādiyati, taṃ gāhaṃ daḷhaṃ gaṇhātīti attho. sīlabbatasahacaritaṃ parāmāsaṃ sīlabbatanti gahetvā āha ^b^``sīlabbatañca taṃ upādānañcā''^eb^ti. ^b^gosīlagovatādīnī^eb^ti ca tathābhūtaṃ diṭṭhiṃ vadati. tenevāha ^b^``sayameva upādānānī''^eb^ti. ^b^abhinivesato^eb^ti abhinivesabhāvato, abhinivisanato vā. ^b^attavādupādāna^eb^nti ``attā''ti vādassa paññāpanassa, gahaṇassa ca kāraṇabhūtā diṭṭhīti attho. ^b^attavādamattamevā^eb^ti attassa abhāvā ``attā''ti idaṃ vacanamattameva. ^b^upādiyantī^eb^ti daḷhaṃ gaṇhanti. kathaṃ? ``attā''ti. ``attā''ti hi abhinivisantā vacanamattameva daḷhaṃ katvā gaṇhantīti atthoti. evaṃ ``attavādamattameva upādiyantī''ti vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0328^ea^. ^b^attavādamatta^eb^nti vā vācāvatthumattamevāha. vācāvatthumattameva hi ``attā''ti upādiyanti attassa abhāvāti.

[03] ``dhammasaṅkhepavitthāre pana kāmupādānaṃ saṅkhepato taṇhādaḷhattaṃ, sesupādānattayaṃ diṭṭhimattameva, vitthārato panā''ti evaṃ dhammasaṅkhepavitthārasamudāyato tadavayavabhūtaṃ saṅkhepaṃ, vitthārañca niddhāretīti. ^b^dhammasaṅkhepavitthāre^eb^ti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^kāmesū^eb^ti pañcasu kāmaguṇesu ^a^V2.0308^ea^. ^b^kāmacchando^eb^ti kāmasaṅkhāto chando, na kattukamyatāchando, na ca dhammacchando. kāmanavasena, rañjanavasena ca kāmoyeva rāgo ^b^kāmarāgo,^eb^ evaṃ sabbattha kāmatthaṃ viditvā kāmo eva nandanaṭṭhena ^b^kāmanandī,^eb^ taṇhāyanaṭṭhena kāmoyeva ^b^kāmataṇhā,^eb^ sinehanaṭṭhena kāmo eva ^b^kāmasneho,^eb^ paridayhanaṭṭhena ^b^kāmapariḷāho,^eb^ mucchanaṭṭhena ^b^kāmamucchā,^eb^ gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpanaṭṭhena ^b^kāmajjhosānaṃ^eb^ veditabbaṃ. ^b^appattavisayapatthanā taṇhā^eb^ ārammaṇe paritassanabhāvato, ^b^sampattavisayaggahaṇaṃ upādānaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇe daḷhaggāhabhāvato. ^b^appicchatāpaṭipakkhā taṇhā^eb^ visayābhimukhabhāvato, ^b^santuṭṭhipaṭipakkhā upādānaṃ^eb^ taṇhādaḷhattaṃ hutvā atricchatābhāvato. ^b^pariyesanadukkhamūlā taṇhā^eb^ appattavisayapatthanābhāvato, ^b^ārakkhadukkhamūlaṃ upādānaṃ^eb^ sampattavisayaggahaṇabhāvato.

[03] ^b^natthi dinna^eb^ntiādīsu ^b^dinna^eb^nti dānamāha, taṃ aphalattā rūpaṃ viya dānaṃ nāma na hotīti paṭikkhipati. ^b^yiṭṭhaṃ^eb^ vuccati mahāvijitayaññasadiso mahāyāgo. ^b^huta^eb^nti āhunapāhunamaṅgalakiriyā. tattha āmantetvā havanaṃ dānaṃ ^b^āhunaṃ,^eb^ pāhunānaṃ atithīnaṃ atithikiriyā ^b^pāhunaṃ,^eb^ āvāhādīsu maṅgalatthaṃ dānaṃ ^b^maṅgalakiriyā,^eb^ dasa kusalakammapathā ^b^sukatakammāni^eb^ nāma, dasa akusalakammapathā ^b^dukkaṭakammāni^eb^ nāma, ^b^phalaṃ vipāko^eb^ti nissandādiphalañceva nippariyāyavipāko ca natthīti yojanā. yathā cettha, evaṃ ``natthi dinna''ntiādīsupi phalavipākapaṭikkhepova daṭṭhabbo. ^b^natthi ayaṃ loko^eb^ti paraloke ṭhito imaṃ lokaṃ ``natthī''ti gaṇhāti. imaṃ hi lokaṃ avekkhitvā paraloko, parañca lokaṃ avekkhitvā ayaṃ loko hoti gantabbato, āgantabbato cāti paralokato idhāgamanassa abhāvā tattheva ucchijjanato cittena paraloke ṭhito imaṃ lokaṃ ``natthī''ti gaṇhātīti attho. na hi ayaṃ diṭṭhi paraloke ṭhitasseva hotīti. ^b^natthi paraloko^eb^ti idhaloke ^a^M2.0329^ea^ ṭhito paralokaṃ ``natthī''ti gaṇhāti. idhāpi vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. ayaṃ vā ettha attho -- saṃsaraṇappadeso idhaloko, paraloko ca nāma koci natthi saṃsaraṇassa abhāvā tattha tattheva ucchijjanatoti.

[03] purimabhavato pacchimabhave upapatanaṃ upapāto, so yesaṃ sīlaṃ, te ^b^opapātikā^eb^. te pana cavanakaupapajjanakasattā natthīti dassento āha ^b^``natthi sattā opapātikā''^eb^ti. ^b^natthi loke samaṇa...pe0... pavedentī^eb^ti anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannattā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā ^a^V2.0309^ea^ lokasmiṃ natthi, ye imañca lokaṃ, parañca lokaṃ attanā eva abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena paccakkhato ñatvā pavedanasamatthā sabbaññubuddhā nāma natthīti dasseti. ^b^rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī^eb^tiādīsu vattabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.

[03] pakatiaṇuādīnaṃ sassataggāhapubbaṅgamo, sarīrassa ucchedaggāhapubbaṅgamo ca tesaṃ gāhānaṃ sāmibhūto koci sassato, ucchijjamāno vā attā atthīti attaggāho kadāci hotīti ^b^``yebhuyyenā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. svāyaṃ attaggāho atthato khandhārammaṇo eva daṭṭhabbo. yebhuyyena paṭhamaṃ attavādupādānantiādināva sambandho. yadipi bhavarāgajavanavīthi paṭhamaṃ pavattati gahitapaṭisandhikassa bhavanikantiyā pavattitabbattā, so pana bhavarāgo taṇhādaḷhattaṃ na hotīti maññamāno na kāmupādānassa paṭhamuppattimāha.
[01] taṇhā kāmupādānanti pana vibhāgassa akaraṇe sabbāpi taṇhā ^b^kāmupādānaṃ,^eb^ karaṇepi vā kāmarāgato aññāpi taṇhā daḷhabhāvaṃ pattā ^b^kāmupādāna^eb^nti tassa arahattamaggavajjhatā vuttā.

[01] uppattiṭṭhānabhūtā cittuppādā ^b^visayo^eb^. pañcupādānakkhandhā ^b^ālayo^eb^. tattha ramatīti ^b^ālayarāmā,^eb^ pajā. teneva sā ālayarāmatā sasantāne, parasantāne ca pākaṭā hoti. ^b^kāmāna^eb^nti vatthukāmānaṃ. ``sukhadukkhaṃ kammunā hotī''ti aggahetvā ^b^kotūhalamaṅgalādibahulo hoti. sā^eb^ kotūhalamaṅgalādibahulatā. ^b^assa^eb^ kāmupādānavato. ^b^ta^eb^nti diṭṭhupādānaṃ, anattani dhammamatte ``attā''ti micchābhinivesassa sukhumataradhammupādānatāya sukhumatā vuttā. upanissayavacanena ārammaṇānantarapakatūpanissayā ^a^M2.0330^ea^ vuttāti anantarapaccayādīnampi saṅgaho kato hoti.

[03] 646^b^.^eb^ ^b^atthato^eb^ti vacanatthato. ^b^dhammato^eb^ti sabhāvadhammato. ^b^sātthato^eb^ti sātthakato, pubbe vuttassapi puna vacanassa sappayojanato. ^b^bhedasaṅgahā^eb^ti bhedato saṅgahato, vibhāgato ceva vibhattassa saṅkhipanato cāti attho. ^b^yaṃ yassa paccayo^eb^ti yaṃ yaṃ upādānaṃ yassa yassa bhavassa paccayo hoti, tato cāti attho.

[03] ^b^bhavatīti^eb^ ^a^V2.0310^ea^ ^b^bhavo^eb^ti phalavohārena kammabhavo vutto. upapattibhavanibbacanameva hi dvayassapi sādhāraṇaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, bhavati etasmā upapattibhavoti vā. dutiyo pana kammabhavo sattassa punabbhavabhāvena savisesaṃ bhavatīti ^b^bhavo^eb^. tato eva na sabbassa bhavantarassa, taṃhetuno vā bhavabhāvappasaṅgo. ^b^duvidhenā^eb^ti dvīhi ākārehi pavattitoti attho. ^b^duvidhenā^eb^ti vā paccattatthe karaṇavacanaṃ, duvidhoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^atthī^eb^ti saṃvijjati.

[03] 647^b^.^eb^ attano paccayehi karīyatīti kammaṃ, attano phalaṃ karotīti kammanti keci, ``kamma''nti evaṃ vattabbā ^b^kammasaṅkhātā. parittabhūmako^eb^ti kāmabhūmako. ^b^mahābhūmako^eb^ti mahaggatabhūmako. ^b^sabba^eb^nti anavasesaṃ. bhavaṃ gacchati, gameti cāti ^b^bhavagāmi^eb^. gacchatīti ca nipphādanasamatthatāvasena, attano pavattikāle bhavābhimukhaṃ hutvā pavattatīti attho, nibbattanameva vā gamanaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^``bhavagāmī''^eb^ti ca etena kammakkhayakaraṃ kammaṃ nivatteti. ayañhi vaṭṭakathā, tañca vivaṭṭanissitanti. ^b^apuññābhisaṅkhāroti dvādasa cetanā^eb^ti uddhaccasahagatacetanāyapi gahaṇaṃ ``avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā''ti ettha viya veditabbaṃ. ``bhavapaccayā jātī''ti ettha pana ``saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇa''nti (ma0 ni0 3.126; mahāva0 1; saṃ0 ni0 2.1; udā0 1; netti0 24) ettha viya sāpi apanetabbā. ^b^mandabahuvipākatā^eb^ti appamahāvipākatā.

[03] ^b^``sabbampi bhavagāmikammanti iminā cetanāsampayuttā abhijjhādayo vuttā''^eb^ti etena ācayagāmitāya tesaṃ kammasaṅkhātatā vuttāti kammabhavapariyāpannataṃ ^a^M2.0331^ea^ pariyāyena vadati, nippariyāyena pana cetanāva kammabhavo. vuttañhi ``kammabhavo tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayutto, ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto''ti (dhātu0 244). upapattibhavo tīhipi tikehi vutto upādinnakkhandhova. yathāha ``upapattibhavo... kāmabhavo... saññābhavo... pañcavokārabhavo pañcahi khandhehi ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi saṅgahito''tiādi (dhātu0 67). yadi hi anupādinnakānampi gahaṇaṃ siyā, ``dvādasahi āyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhī''ti vattabbaṃ siyāti. kāmataṇhāya kāmetabbato kāmanissayatāya bhogā viya, kāmasahacaritatāya ``kuntā pacarantī''ti viya, kāmārammaṇatāya ``sukhaṃ rūpa''nti viya, kāmapaccayaṭṭhānatāya ``sukho saggo''ti viya kāmāti avīciparanimmitavasavattiparicchinnā upādinnakkhandhā vuccanti ^a^V2.0311^ea^. rūpāvirāgato yaṃ nissitā, tadupacārena ``mañcā ghosantī''ti viya, ``phandanadevatā''ti viya ca ``rūpa''nti vuccanti brahmakāyikākaniṭṭhaparicchinnā upādinnakkhandhā.

[03] rūpameva bhavo ^b^rūpabhavo,^eb^ tathā arūpanti ākāsānañcāyatanabhavaggaparicchinnā cattāro upādinnakkhandhā vuccanti. arūpameva bhavo ^b^arūpabhavo^eb^. kāmo eva bhavoti kāmabhavo, so pana yasmā yathāvuttenatthena ``kāmo''ti vattabbo hoti, tasmā ^b^``kāmasaṅkhāto bhavo''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. kāmāvacarasaññito vā bhavo ^b^``kāmasaṅkhāto bhavo''^eb^ti vutto. tathā rūpārūpabhavoti āha ^b^``esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesū''^eb^ti. ^b^saññāvataṃ bhavo^eb^ti ettha vantu-saddassa lopo daṭṭhabbo. tassa vā atthe akāraṃ katvā ``saññabhavo''tipi pāṭho. tenāha ^b^``saññāvā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^vokiṇṇo^eb^ti etena vokārasaddassa kammasādhanatamāha. vokirīyati pasārīyati vitthārīyatīti vokāro, vokiraṇaṃ vā vokāro, so ekasseva khandhassa vasena pavattattā ^b^``eko vokāro''^eb^ti vutto, pasaṭuppattīti attho.

[03] 648^b^.^eb^ kiñcāpi bhavaniddese ``sabbampi bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavo''ti (vibha0 234) iminā cetanāsampayuttadhammāpi vuttā. ^b^puññābhisaṅkhārādayovā^eb^ti pana avadhāraṇaṃ ^a^M2.0332^ea^ paccayadhammavisesepi atthappabhedena saṅkhārabhavaggahaṇesu attheva visesoti dassanatthaṃ kataṃ. tenāha ^b^``evaṃ santepī''^eb^tiādi. saṅkhārabhavānaṃ dhammabhedato na saṅkhārā eva puna vuttāti ^b^``sātthakamevidaṃ punavacana''^eb^nti etaṃ ayuttanti ce? na, bhavekadesabhāvena saṅkhārānaṃ bhavoti puna vuttattā. parena vā dhammavisesaṃ aggahetvā punavacanaṃ coditanti codakābhilāsavasena ^b^``sātthakamevidaṃ punavacana''^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03] 649^b^.^eb^ kāmabhavādinibbattakassa kammassa kāmabhavādibhāvo phalavohārena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto. sahajātaviññāṇassapi paccayabhūtaṃ avijjāhetukaṃ saṅkhāraggahaṇena yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ pubbe vuttaṃ, idha pana ``sabbampi bhavagāmikamma''nti (vibha0 234) vacanato bhavassa nibbattakaṃ upādānahetukaṃ vipaccanāya katokāsameva bhavoti adhippeto. yaṃ kāmupādānapaccayā rūpabhavanibbattakaṃ, arūpabhavanibbattakañca kammaṃ karīyati, so kammabhavo, tadabhinibbattā khandhā upapattibhavoti imamatthaṃ ^b^``esa nayo rūpārūpabhavesū''^eb^ti atidisati. ^b^dve kāmabhavā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0312^ea^ kāmakammabhavo, kāmūpapattibhavoti dve kāmabhavā. evaṃ ^b^``dve rūpabhavā, dve arūpabhavā''^eb^ti etthāpi. antogadhe hi visuṃ aggahetvā abbhantaragate eva katvā kāmabhavādike kammūpapattibhavavasena duguṇe katvā āha ^b^``cha bhavā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^avisesenā^eb^ti upādānavasena bhedaṃ akatvā. upādānabhedākaraṇeneva ca dvādasappabhedassa saṅgahavasena saṅgahato ^b^``cha bhavā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^anupagammā^eb^ti anissāya, anāmasitvāti attho.

[03] 650^b^.^eb^ gosīlena, kukkurasīlena ca samattena samādinnena gunnaṃ, kukkurānañca sahabyatā vuttāti ``sīlabbatupādānavato jhānabhāvanā na ijjhatī''ti maññamānā tena rūpārūpabhavā na hontīti keci vadanti. vakkhamānena pana pakārena paccayabhāvato ^b^``taṃ na gahetabba''^eb^nti āha. asuddhimagge ca suddhimaggaparāmasanaṃ sīlabbatupādānanti suddhimaggaparāmasanena rūpārūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ nibbattanaṃ na na yujjatīti.

[03] ^b^anussavavasenā^eb^ti ``setavadhayajjaṃ ālabhate bhūtikāmo''ti ādinnānussavavasena, yathā ime manussaloke kāmā samiddhā, evaṃ devaloke ^a^M2.0333^ea^ ito samiddhatarāti diṭṭhānusārena vā. purāṇabhāratasītāharaṇapasubandhavidhiādisavanaṃ ^b^assaddhammassavanaṃ. ādi^eb^-saddena asappurisūpanissayaṃ pubbe ca akatapuññataṃ, attamicchāpaṇidhiñca saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^kāyaduccaritādīnipī^eb^ti attano adhippetānaṃ kāmānaṃ anupāyabhūtānipi kāyaduccaritādīni ^b^karoti,^eb^ cirasaggādiatthaṃ yuddhādivasenāti adhippāyo. ^b^sandiṭṭhike vā pana^eb^ rajjasenāpatiṭṭhānādisaṅgahe ^b^kāme. tadantogadhā evā^eb^ti tasmiṃ duccaritanibbatte, sucaritanibbatte ca kāmabhave antogadhā evāti attho. ^b^antogadhā^eb^ti ca saññābhavapañcavokārabhavānaṃ ekadesena antogadhattā vuttaṃ. na hi te niravasesā kāmabhave antogadhāti.
[03] ^b^sappabhedassā^eb^ti sugatiduggatimanussādippabhedavato.

[03] kāmāvacarasampattibhave paṭhamadutiyaucchedavādavasena, rūpabhave tatiyaucchedavādavasena, arūpabhave sesaucchedavādavasena ayamattā sūcchinno hotīti tadupagaṃ kammaṃ karotīti āha ^b^``ayaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0313^ea^ ^b^attā nāmā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^sūcchinno^eb^ti sakalavaṭṭadukkhasamucchedena suṭṭhu ucchinno, apunabbhavuppattiko hotīti attho.

[03] ^b^``kāmāvacarasampattibhave''^eb^ti idaṃ paṭhamadiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādavasena vuttaṃ, sesaṃ itaradiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādavasena. tattha kiñcāpi ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (dī0 ni0 1.93 ādayo) rūpāvacarajjhānavaseneva upari cattāro diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā āgatā, diṭṭhigatiko pana yaṃ kiñci gahetvā yathā tathā abhinivisatīti arūpabhavaggahaṇaṃ, arūpajjhānānampi vā catutthajhānasaṅgahato arūpabhavaggahaṇaṃ, santasukhatāya vā taṃsamaṅgino sukhitabhāvasāmaññato. ^b^vigatapariḷāho^eb^ti yathābhilāsitavisayūpahārena, pahānena ca vūpasantakāmarāgapariḷāho, diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānappattoti attho.

[03] suddhimaggaparāmasanavasena pavattitaṃ yaṃ kiñci lokiyaṃ sīlaṃ, jhānañca sīlabbatamicceva idhādhippetanti āha ^b^``idaṃ sīlabbataṃ nāmā''^eb^tiādi. kamena avatvā sīlabbatupādānassa ante bhavapaccayatāvacanaṃ attavādupādānaṃ viya abhiṇhaṃ asamudācārato, attavādupādānanimittattā ca.

[03] ^b^kammabhave^eb^ti ^a^M2.0334^ea^ niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. ^b^hetupaccayappabhedehī^eb^ti ettha maggapaccayo ca vattabbo. diṭṭhupādānādīni hi sahajātakammabhavassa maggapaccayā hontīti, tasmā tāni sahajātādīsu hetupaccayaṃ apanīya maggapaccayaṃ pakkhipitvā sattadhā paccayā hontīti veditabbāni. sabbāni pana anantarasamanantarānantarūpanissayanatthivigatāsevanapaccayehi paccayā honti. nānantarassa upanissayapaccayena paccayā honti. kadāci ārammaṇapaccayādināpi, taṃ pana upanissayapaccayeneva saṅgahetvā vuttaṃ ^b^``vippayuttassa pana upanissayapaccayenevā''^eb^ti.

[03] 651^b^.^eb^ ^b^jātītiādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ``jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇaṃ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā sambhavantī''ti (ma0 ni0 3.126; saṃ0 ni0 2.1; mahāva0 1; udā0 1; netti0 24) sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. tenāha ^b^``jātiādīna''^eb^ntiādi. upapattibhavuppattiyeva ^a^V2.0314^ea^ jātīti āha ^b^``na upapattibhavo''^eb^ti. jāyamānassa pana jāti jātīti upapattibhavopi asati abhāvā jātiyā paccayoti sakkā vattuṃ. jāyamānarūpapadaṭṭhānatāpi hi rūpajātiyā vuttā ``upacitarūpapadaṭṭhāno upacayo, anuppabandharūpapadaṭṭhānā santatī''ti (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 641).

[03] jātānaṃ khandhānaṃ uññātatā, abhimatatā ca ^b^hīnapaṇītatā^eb^. aniṭṭhañhi hīnaṃ, iṭṭhaṃ paṇītaṃ. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇahīnuttamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^yamakānampi sata^eb^nti yamakabhāvena nibbattānampi samānānaṃ. ^b^so ca^eb^ sattānaṃ viseso. bhinnasantānikassa visesakāraṇassa sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato ^b^``ajjhattasantāne''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^aññassa kāraṇassa abhāvato^eb^ti attasantānagatato aññassa visesakāraṇassa anupalabbhamānattā, sati ca tasmiṃ sabbadā sabbesaṃ abhāvatoti pasaṅgassa dunnivāraṇato kāraṇe avisiṭṭhe phalavisesassa ayujjamānakattā. tenāha ^b^``kammabhavahetukovā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^tena tenā^eb^ti ñātibyasanādinā jarāmaraṇato aññena dukkhadhammena. jarāmaraṇanimittañhi uppannā sokādayo jarāmaraṇābhisambandhā, tadaññe anabhisambandhā. ^b^upanissayakoṭiyā^eb^ti upanissayaṃsena, upanissayalesenāti ^a^M2.0335^ea^ attho. yo hi paṭṭhāne anāgato sati bhāvā, asati ca abhāvā suttantapariyāyena upanissayo, so ``upanissayakoṭī''ti vuccati. paccayamahāpadeso kireso, yadidaṃ upanissayoti.

[03] 652^b^.^eb^ na kevalaṃ sokādīnaṃyeva jāti paccayo hoti, sokādīnaṃ pana paccayattā avijjāyapi paccayo evāti dassetuṃ ^b^``yasmā panā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^etthā^eb^ti paṭiccasamuppādadesanāyaṃ. ^b^aviditādi mida^eb^nti ^b^ma^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro. ^b^satata^eb^nti sabbakālaṃ yāva aggamaggādhigamā. ^b^samita^eb^nti saṅgataṃ, abbocchinnanti attho.
[03] ^b^tesū^eb^ti sokādīsu. ^b^siddhesū^eb^ti labbhamānesu. ^b^siddhā hoti avijjā^eb^ avinābhāvato.

[03] ^b^kāmayānassā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0315^ea^ kāmayamānassa, kāmo vā yānaṃ etassāti ^b^kāmayāno,^eb^ tassa kāmavasena yāyamānassāti attho. ^b^chandajātassā^eb^ti jātataṇhāchandassa. ^b^parihāyantī^eb^ti vigacchanti. ^b^ruppatī^eb^ti sokādinā kuppati.

[03] pariyuṭṭhānatāya tiṭṭhanasīlo ^b^pariyuṭṭhānaṭṭhāyī^eb^. ``pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino''ti vā pāṭho. tattha pariyuṭṭhātīti pariyuṭṭhaṃ, diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānaṃ, tena tiṭṭhatīti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyīti attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03] ^b^pañca pubbanimittānī^eb^ti ``mālā milāyanti, vatthāni kilissanti, kacchehi sedā muccanti, kāye vevaṇṇiyaṃ okkamati, devo devāsane nābhiramatī''ti (itivu0 83) vuttāni pañca maraṇapubbanimittānīti attho. tāni hi disvā kammanibbattakkhandhasaṅkhāte upapattibhave bhavacchandabalena devānaṃ balavasoko uppajjatīti.
[03] ^b^bālo^eb^ti avidvā. tena avijjāya kāraṇabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^tividhaṃ dukkha^eb^nti tassāruppakathāsavana, kammakāraṇādassana, maraṇakālakammopaṭṭhānanidānaṃ sokādidukkhaṃ.
[03] ^b^āsave sādhentī^eb^ti āsave gamenti bodhentīti attho.

[01] ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0336^ea^ ^b^satī^eb^ti evaṃ bhavacakkassa aviditāditāya anādibhāve sati. ^b^ādimattakathana^eb^nti avijjāvasena ādisabbhāvakathanaṃ. ādi etassa atthīti hi ādimaṃ, bhavacakkaṃ. tassa bhāvo ādimattaṃ, tassa kathanaṃ ādimattakathanaṃ. visesanivattiattho vā mattasaddo, sati anādibhāve avijjā ādimhi, majjhe, pariyosāne ca sabbattha siyāti ādimattāya avijjāya kathanaṃ virujjhatīti attho. ``avijjā padhānā''ti vatvā tassā padhānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``avijjāggahaṇenā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^avijjāggahaṇenā^eb^ti avijjāya uppādanena, appahānena vā, attano santāne sannihitabhāvakaraṇenāti attho. ^b^kammādīnī^eb^ti kammavipākavaṭṭāni. ^b^palibodhentī^eb^ti nānādukkhaparibyūḷhe saṃsāracārake nirodhenti. ^b^tehī^eb^ti kilesakammavipākavaṭṭehi. vaṭṭassa kāraṇabhāvena padhānattā ^b^``padhānadhammo''^eb^ti avijjā kathitā.
