[03] 685^b^.^eb^ diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto paccuppanno attabhāvo, tattha veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ ^b^diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ^eb^. paccuppannabhavato anantaraṃ veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ ^b^upapajjavedanīyaṃ. aparāpariyāye^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammānantarānāgatato aññasmiṃ attabhāvapariyāye attabhāvaparivatte. ^b^ahosikamma^eb^nti ahosi eva kammaṃ, na tassa vipāko ahosi, ``atthi, bhavissati vā''ti evaṃ vattabbakammaṃ. paṭipakkhehi anabhibhūtatāya, paccayavisesena paṭiladdhavisesatāya ca balavabhāvaṃ pattā tādisassa ^a^V2.0353^ea^ pubbābhisaṅkhārassa vasena sātisayā hutvā pavattā paṭhamajavanacetanā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve phaladāyinī ^b^diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā^eb^ nāma. sā hi vuttākārena balavati javanasantāne guṇavisesayuttesu upakārāpakāravasappavattiyā, āsevanālābhena appavipākatāya ca paṭhamajavanacetanā itaradvayaṃ viya pavattasantānuparamāpekkhaṃ, okāsalābhāpekkhañca kammaṃ na hotīti idheva pupphamattaṃ viya pavattivipākamattaṃ phalaṃ deti. ^b^tathā asakkonta^eb^nti kammassa vipākadānaṃ nāma upadhipayogādipaccayantarasamavāyeneva hotīti tadabhāvato ^a^M2.0377^ea^ tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontaṃ. ^b^atthasādhikā^eb^ti dānādipāṇātipātādiatthassa nipphādikā. kā pana sāti āha ^b^``sattamajavanacetanā''^eb^ti. sā hi sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā vuttanayena paṭiladdhavisesā, purimajavanacetanāhi laddhāsevanā ca samānā anantarattabhāve vipākadāyinī ^b^upapajjavedanīyakammaṃ^eb^ nāma. ^b^``sati saṃsārappavattiyā''^eb^ti iminā asati saṃsārappavattiyaṃ ahosikammapakkhe tiṭṭhati vipaccanokāsassa abhāvatoti dīpeti.

[03] 686^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaṃ garuka^eb^nti yaṃ akusalaṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ, kusalaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ kammaṃ. ^b^yaṃ bahula^eb^nti yaṃ bahulaṃ abhiṇhaso kataṃ samāsevitaṃ. ^b^maraṇakāle anussarita^eb^nti paribyattabhāvena maraṇassa āsannakāle anussaritaṃ. āsannakāle kate vattabbameva natthīti hi vuttaṃ. ^b^``punappunaṃ laddhāsevana''^eb^nti iminā ``yaṃ bahula''nti vuttakammato viseseti. tathā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ nivatteti paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanānujānanato. paṭisandhijanakavasena hi garukādikammacatukkaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha garukaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ vipaccati. tathā hi taṃ garukanti vuttaṃ. garuke asati bahulīkataṃ, tasmiṃ asati āsannaṃ, tasmimpi asati ``kaṭattā vā panā''ti vuttaṃ purimajātīsu katakammaṃ vipaccati. bahulāsannapubbakatesu ca balābalaṃ vā jānitabbaṃ, pāpato pāpantaraṃ, kalyāṇañca, kalyāṇato ca kalyāṇantaraṃ, pāpañca, bahulīkatato ca mahato ca pubbakatādi, appañca. bahulānussaraṇena vippaṭisārādijananato paṭipakkhassa aparipuṇṇatāya āraddhavipākassa kammassa, kammasesassa vā aparāpariyāye vedanīyassa aparikkhīṇatāya santatiyā pariṇāmavisesatoti tehi tehi kāraṇehi āhitabalaṃ paṭhamaṃ vipaccati. ^b^mahānāradakassapajātake^eb^ videharañño senāpati alāto, bījako dāso, rājakaññā rucā ca ettha nidassanaṃ. tathā hi vuttaṃ bhagavatā --

[02] ``tatrānanda ^a^V2.0354^ea^, yvāyaṃ puggalo idha pāṇātipātī...pe0... micchādiṭṭhi kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati. pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ, pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ ^a^M2.0378^ea^, maraṇakāle vāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnā, tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati. yañca kho so idha pāṇātipātī hoti...pe0... micchādiṭṭhi hoti, tassa diṭṭhe vā dhamme vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye.

[02] ``tatrānanda, yvāyaṃ puggalo idha pāṇātipātī...pe0... micchādiṭṭhi kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati. pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti kalyāṇakammaṃ sukhavedanīyaṃ, pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti kalyāṇakammaṃ sukhavedanīyaṃ, maraṇakāle vāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnā, tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati. yañca kho so idha pāṇātipātī hoti...pe0... micchādiṭṭhi hoti, tassa diṭṭhe vā dhamme vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye.

[02] ``tatrānanda, yvāyaṃ puggalo idha pāṇātipātā paṭivirato...pe0... sammādiṭṭhi kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati. pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti kalyāṇakammaṃ sukhavedanīyaṃ, pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti kalyāṇakammaṃ sukhavedanīyaṃ, maraṇakāle vāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnā, tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati. yañca kho so idha pāṇātipātā paṭivirato...pe0... sammādiṭṭhi hoti, tassa diṭṭhe vā dhamme vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye.

[02] ``tatrānanda, yvāyaṃ puggalo idha pāṇātipātā paṭivirato...pe0... sammādiṭṭhi kāyassa bhedā paraṃ...pe0... nirayaṃ upapajjati. pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ, pacchā vāssa taṃ kataṃ hoti pāpakammaṃ dukkhavedanīyaṃ, maraṇakāle vāssa hoti micchādiṭṭhi samattā samādinnā, tena so kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ ^a^V2.0355^ea^ ...pe0... nirayaṃ upapajjati. yañca kho so idha pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti...pe0... sammādiṭṭhi ^a^M2.0379^ea^ hoti, tassa diṭṭhe vā dhamme vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti upapajja vā apare vā pariyāye''ti (ma0 ni0 3.303).
[03] kiṃ bahunā yaṃ taṃ tathāgatassa mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇaṃ, tassevāyaṃ visayo, yadidaṃ tassa tassa kammassa tena tena kāraṇena pubbāparavipākatā sāmatthiyaṃ.

[03] 687^b^.^eb^ paṭisandhidānādivasena vipākasantānassa nibbattakaṃ janakaṃ. tenāha ^b^``taṃ paṭisandhiyampi pavattepi rūpārūpavipākakkhandhe janetī''^eb^ti. sukhadukkhasantānassa, nāmarūpappabandhassa vā ciratarappavattihetubhūtaṃ upatthambhakaṃ. tenāha ^b^``sukhadukkhaṃ upatthambheti, addhānaṃ pavattetī''^eb^ti. upapīḷakaṃ sukhadukkhappabandhe pavattamāne saṇikaṃ saṇikaṃ taṃ hāpeti. tenāha ^b^``sukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti bādhati, addhānaṃ pavattituṃ na detī''^eb^ti. ^b^ghātetvā^eb^ti upacchinditvā. kammassa upacchindanaṃ nāma tassa vipākapaṭibāhanamevāti āha ^b^``tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā''^eb^ti. tañca attano vipākuppattiyā okāsakaraṇanti vuttaṃ ^b^``attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karotī''^eb^ti. vipaccanāya katokāsaṃ kammaṃ vipakkameva nāma hotīti āha ^b^``evaṃ pana kammena kate okāse taṃ vipākaṃ uppannaṃ nāma vuccatī''^eb^ti. ^b^upapīḷakaṃ^eb^ aññassa vipākaṃ upacchindati, na sayaṃ attano vipākaṃ deti. ^b^upaghātakaṃ^eb^ pana dubbalaṃ kammaṃ upacchinditvā attano vipākaṃ uppādetīti ayametesaṃ viseso. bavhābādhatādipaccayūpanipātena vipākassa vibādhakaṃ ^b^upapīḷakaṃ,^eb^ tathā vipākasseva upacchedakaṃ ^b^upaghātakaṃ^eb^. kammaṃ upaghātetvā attano vipākassa okāsakaraṇena vipaccane sati janakameva siyā, janakādibhāvo nāma vipākaṃ pati icchitabbo, na kammaṃ patīti vipākasseva upaghātakatā yuttā viya dissati, vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.

[01] ^b^kammantara^eb^nti kammaviseso kammānaṃ balābalabhedo. ^b^vipākantara^eb^nti vipākaviseso, tassa hīnapaṇītatādibhedo. aparo nayo -- yasmiṃ kamme kate paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavatte ca vipākakaṭattārūpānaṃ uppatti hoti, taṃ ^b^janakaṃ^eb^. yasmiṃ pana kate aññena janitassa iṭṭhassa vā aniṭṭhassa vā phalassa vibādhakavicchedakapaccayānuppattiyā, upabrūhanapaccayuppattiyā ca janakānubhāvānurūpaṃ pariposaciratarappabandhā honti, taṃ ^b^upatthambhakaṃ^eb^. janakena ^a^M2.0380^ea^ nibbattitaṃ kusalaphalaṃ vā akusalaphalaṃ vā yena paccanīkabhūtena rogadhātusamatādinimittatāya bādhīyati, taṃ ^b^upapīḷakaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0356^ea^. yena pana kammunā janakasāmatthiyavasena ciratarappabandhārahampi samānaṃ phalaṃ vicchedakapaccayuppattiyā upahaññati vicchijjati, taṃ ^b^upaghātakaṃ^eb^. tattha keci dutiyassa kusalabhāvaṃ itthannāmagatassa appābādhadīghāyukatāsaṃvattanavasena, pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ akusalabhāvaṃ bavhābādhāppāyukatāsaṃvattanavasena vaṇṇenti. devadattādīnaṃ, pana nāgādīnaṃ, ito anupadinnena yāpanakapetānañca narakādīsu akusalavipākupatthambhanupapīḷanupaghātakāni na na santīti catunnampi akusalākusalabhāvo na virujjhati. buddhāveṇikatāya asādhāraṇasseva ñāṇassa gocarabhāvato kammantarādi ^b^``asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^ekadesato jānitabbaṃ^eb^ anavasesato jānituṃ na sakkā avisayattā. sabbena sabbaṃ ajānane paccayapariggaho na paripūratīti.

[03] 688^b^.^eb^ yathāvuttaṃ kammaṃ vattamānavipākappabandhanimittameva adhippetanti kammekadesatāya ^b^``dvādasavidhaṃ kammaṃ kammavaṭṭe pakkhipitvā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. kilesavaṭṭampi kammasahāyatāya kammavaṭṭapakkhikameva katvā āha ^b^``kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasenā''^eb^ti. yādisato paccayato paccuppanne addhāne nāmarūpassa pavatti, tādisato eva itarasmimpi addhadvayeti yathā atītānāgate nayaṃ neti, taṃ dassento ^b^``ida''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^anāgatepi kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasenevā^eb^ti ettha vuttaṃ ^b^eva^eb^-saddaṃ ``etarahi atītepī''ti etthāpi ānetvā vattabbaṃ addhattayepi kiriyākiriyaphalamattatādassanaparattā codanāya. ^b^iti kammañcevā^eb^tiādi vuttassevatthassa nigamanavasena vuttaṃ. aparāparaṃ vaṭṭanaṭṭhena ^b^vaṭṭaṃ^eb^. tathā pavattanaṃ ^b^pavattaṃ^eb^. hetuphalabhāvena sambandhatīti ^b^santati,^eb^ pabandho. karaṇaṭṭhena, paccayehi karīyatīti vā ^b^kiriyā^eb^.
[03] ^b^kammā^eb^ti kammato. sambhavati etasmāti sambhavo, kammaṃ sambhavo etassāti ^b^kammasambhavo,^eb^ vipāko.

[03] kāraṇasāmaggiyaṃ dānādīhi sādhitakiriyāya vattamānāya kāraṇamatte kattuvohāroti āha ^b^``neva kāraṇato uddhaṃ kārakaṃ passatī''^eb^ti. karotīti hi ^b^kārakaṃ^eb^. vipākapaṭisaṃvedakaṃ na passatīti sambandho ^a^M2.0381^ea^. kāmaṃ bālāpi ``kārako paṭisaṃvedako''ti vadantā atthato paññattimattameva vadanti, te pana viparītābhinivesavasenāpi vadantīti taṃ appamāṇanti āha ^b^``samaññāmattena paṇḍitā voharantī''^eb^ti.

[03] 689^b^.^eb^ ^b^eveta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0357^ea^ evaṃvidhaṃ etaṃ dassanaṃ, ^b^sammadassanaṃ,^eb^ aviparītadassananti attho. ^b^bījarukkhādikānaṃvā^eb^ti yathā bījato rukkho, rukkhato puna bījanti anādikālikattā bījarukkhasantānassa pubbakoṭi natthi, evaṃ kammapaccayā vipāko, vipākapaccayā kammanti anādikālikattā kammavipākasantānassa pubbakoṭi na paññāyati. ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ``kukkuṭiyā aṇḍaṃ, aṇḍato kukkuṭī, punapi kukkuṭiyā aṇḍa''nti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^anāgatepi saṃsāre^eb^ti yathā atīte, evaṃ anāgatepi addhāne ``khandhānañca paṭipāṭī''tiādinā (visuddhi0 2.619; dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.95 apasādanāvaṇṇanā; saṃ0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.2.60; a0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.4.199; dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 nidānakathā; vibha0 aṭṭha0 226 saṅkhārapadaniddesa; su0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.523; udā0 aṭṭha0 39; itivu0 aṭṭha0 14, 58; theragā0 aṭṭha0 1.67, 99; paṭi0 ma0 aṭṭha0 2.1.117; cūḷani0 aṭṭha0 6; bu0 vaṃ0 aṭṭha0 2.58) vutte saṃsāre sati kammavipākānaṃ appavattaṃ na dissati, kammavipākānaṃ appavatti na dissati, pavattati evāti attho.

[03] ^b^etamattha^eb^nti ``kammassa kārako natthī''tiādinā (visuddhi0 2.689) vuttamatthaṃ. ^b^asayaṃvasī^eb^ti na sayaṃvasino, micchābhinivesaparavasāti attho. ^b^aññamaññavirodhitā^eb^ti itarītaravirodhitā, diṭṭhiyo, diṭṭhiyā vā aññamaññena virodhitā viruddhā.

[03] gambhīrañāṇagocaratāya ^b^gambhīraṃ^eb^. tathā ^b^nipuṇaṃ^eb^. sattasuññatāya, aññamaññasabhāvasuññatāya ca ^b^suññaṃ. paccaya^eb^nti nāmarūpassa paccayaṃ, tappaccayapaṭivedheneva ca sabbaṃ paṭividdhaṃ hotīti. ^b^kammaṃ natthi vipākamhī^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
[03] paccayasuññaṃ phalanti yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``yathā na sūriye''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^tesa^eb^nti sūriyādīnaṃ. ^b^so^eb^ti aggi. ^b^sambhārehī^eb^ti ātapādīhi kāraṇehi.

[03] yadi ^a^M2.0382^ea^ ca hetu ca phalañca aññamaññarahitaṃ, kathaṃ hetuto phalaṃ nibbattatīti āha ^b^``kammañca kho upādāyā''^eb^ti. na kevalaṃ kammaphalameva suññaṃ katturahitaṃ, sabbampi dhammajātaṃ kārakarahitanti dassetuṃ ^b^``na hettha devo''^eb^ti gāthā vuttā. ^b^hetusambhārapaccayā^eb^ti hetusamūhanimittaṃ, hetupaccayanimittaṃ vā.

[03] 690^b^.^eb^ ^b^cutipaṭisandhivasena^eb^ ^a^V2.0358^ea^ ^b^viditā hontī^eb^ti kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭavasena paccayapariggahassa katattā cutipaṭisandhivasena viditā hontīti vadanti. vuttanayena pana sappaccayanāmarūpassa dassanena tīsu addhāsu pahīnavicikicchassa addhattayapariyāpannā dhammā atītapaccuppannānāgatabhavesu ca cutipaṭisandhivasena viditā honti, na anupadadhammavasena tathāpariggahassa akatattā. ^b^sāssa hoti ñātapariññā^eb^ti yāya nāmarūpapariggahaṃ, tassa ca paccayapariggahaṃ karoti, sā assa yogino ``idaṃ nāmaṃ, ettakaṃ nāma''ntiādinā, ``tassa ayaṃ paccayo, ettako paccayo''tiādinā ca paricchedavasena ñātavatī paññāti katvā ñātapariññā.

[03] idāni yena kāraṇena addhattayapariyāpannā dhammā cutipaṭisandhivasena viditā honti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``so evaṃ pajānātī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tena dhammānaṃ bhavantarasaṅkamo nāma na kadācipi atthi, tattha tattheva nirujjhanatoti dasseti. sajjhāya mantodakapāna mukhamaṇḍana padīpasīkhūpamāhi tameva dhammānaṃ saṅkamābhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``apica kho''^eb^tiādimāha.

[01] ^b^manodhātuanantara^eb^nti kiriyamanodhātuyā anantaraṃ labbhamānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. ^b^na ceva āgata^eb^nti kiriyamanodhātuto na ceva āgataṃ kiriyamanodhātuyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa abhāvato. ^b^nāpi na nibbattaṃ anantara^eb^nti kiriyamanodhātuto anāgacchantampi paccayasāmaggilābhena tato anantaraṃ nāpi na nibbattaṃ, nibbattameva hoti. yathāyaṃ pavattiyaṃ cittappavatti, tatheva paṭisandhimhi vattate cittasantati, cuticittato anāgacchantampi paṭisandhicittaṃ tato anantaraṃ nāpi na nibbattati, paccayasāmaggivasena nibbattatevāti attho. santatigahaṇena cettha kutoci āgamābhāvameva vibhāveti. hetuphalabhāvena hi sambandhatāti dhammappavatti ^b^santatī^eb^ti. tenāha ^b^``purimaṃ bhijjate citta''^eb^ntiādi. ^b^purima^eb^nti cuticittaṃ. ^b^bhijjate^eb^ti ^a^M2.0383^ea^ nirujjhati. ^b^pacchima^eb^nti paṭisandhicittaṃ. ^b^tato^eb^ti cuticittato anantarameva jāyati. yattha hi cuticittato dūrepi kālantarepi uppajjamānaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ anantarameva jāyatīti vuccati. tasmā ^b^tesaṃ antarikā natthi^eb^ tesaṃ cutipaṭisandhicittānaṃ byavadhāyakaṃ kiñci natthi. ^b^vīci tesaṃ na vijjatī^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^ito^eb^ti cuticittato anantaraṃ na ca gacchati kiñci cittaṃ. tañhi sasampayuttadhammaṃ tatheva nirujjhati. ^b^paṭisandhi cā^eb^ti paṭisandhiviññāṇañca aññameva yathāpaccayaṃ ^b^jāyati^eb^ nibbattatīti punapi saṅkamābhāvameva vibhāvento sappaccayanāmarūpadassanaṃ nigameti.

[03] 691^b^.^eb^ nāmarūpaggahaṇena ^a^V2.0359^ea^, tassa ca paccayadhammaggahaṇena aggahitassa tebhūmakadhammassa abhāvato ^b^``viditasabbadhammassā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. na cettha lokuttaradhammā adhigatā. ^b^thāmagataṃ^eb^ hoti anekākāravokārapaccayapariggahavidhino anuṭṭhitattā. ^b^suṭṭhutaraṃ pahīyati^eb^ tiyaddhagatadhammappavattiyā vigatasammohattā. ^b^sā evā^eb^ti soḷasavidhā kaṅkhā eva. yasmā ettha ``buddho, dhammo, saṅgho, sikkhā''ti ca kaṅkhāya gocarabhūtā lokiyā dhammā adhippetā. na hi lokuttaradhamme ārabbha kilesā pavattituṃ sakkonti. ^b^pubbanto^eb^ti atītā khandhāyatanadhātuyo. ^b^aparanto^eb^ti anāgatā. ^b^pubbantāparanto^eb^ti tadubhayaṃ, addhāpaccuppannaṃ vā tadubhayabhāgayuttattā. evaṃ buddhādiggahaṇena, paṭiccasamuppannadhammaggahaṇena ca gahito aṭṭhamo kaṅkhāvisayo nāmarūpamattaṃ, idappaccayatāggahaṇena pana tassa paccayo gahito, tasmā soḷasavatthukāya kaṅkhāya pahīnāya aṭṭhavatthukā kaṅkhā appatiṭṭhāva hotīti āha ^b^``na kevalañca...pe0... pahīyatiyevā''^eb^ti.

[03] diṭṭhekaṭṭhattā vicikicchāya yathā diṭṭhi samucchijjamānā vicikicchāya saddhiṃyeva samucchijjati, evaṃ vicikicchā vikkhambhiyamānā diṭṭhiyā saddhiṃyeva vikkhambhīyatīti āha ^b^``dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni vikkhambhantī''^eb^ti. attābhinivesūpanissayā hi ``ahosiṃ nu kho aha''ntiādi (ma0 ni0 1.18; saṃ0 ni0 2.20) nayappavattā soḷasavatthukā kaṅkhā, sā eva ca pubbantādivatthukabhāvena vuttā. attābhinivesavatthukāni ca dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhigatāni, buddhādivatthukā ca kaṅkhā tadekaṭṭhāti. dharīyanti ^a^M2.0384^ea^ attano paccayehīti dhammā, tiṭṭhati ettha tadāyattavuttitāya phalanti ṭhiti, dhammānaṃ ṭhiti dhammaṭṭhiti, paccayadhammo. atha vā dhammoti kāraṇaṃ ``dhammapaṭisambhidā''tiādīsu (vibha0 718 ādayo) viya, dhammassa ṭhiti sabhāvo, dhammato ca añño sabhāvo natthīti paccayadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvo dhammaṭṭhiti, dhammaṭṭhitiyaṃ ñāṇaṃ ^b^dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ^eb^. saṅkhārānaṃ yaṃ yaṃ bhūtaṃ aniccatādi yathābhūtaṃ, tattha ñāṇanti ^b^yathābhūtañāṇaṃ^eb^. sammā passatīti ^b^sammādassanaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^avijjā paccayo^eb^ti avijjā hetuādivasena saṅkhārānaṃ yathārahaṃ paccayo. tato eva ^b^saṅkhārā paccayasamuppannā. ubhopete^eb^ti yasmā avijjāpi āsavādivasena paccayasambhūtāva, tasmā avijjā saṅkhārāti ubhayepi ete dhammā paccayasamuppannā. ^b^itī^eb^ti evaṃ. ^b^paccayapariggahe paññā^eb^ti paccayānaṃ paricchijja gahaṇavasena pavattā paññā. vuttanayena ^b^dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^nimitta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0360^ea^ saṅkhāranimittaṃ, atthato pañcakkhandhā. te hi ghanasaññāpavattiyā vatthubhāvato nimittaṃ, saviggahabhāvena upaṭṭhānato vā. yasmā aniccatā nāma saṅkhārānaṃ aviparītākāro. tattha niccatāya lesassāpi abhāvato ^b^aniccato^eb^ passanto ^b^yathābhūtaṃ jānāti^eb^. tañca ñāṇaṃ aviparītaggahaṇatāya ^b^sammādassanaṃ^eb^. taṃsamaṅginā ca paccuppannesu viya atītānāgatesupi nayaṃ nentena te suparividitā honti.

[03] aniccatā ca nāma uppattimato, uppādo ca paccayavasenāti aniccatā sijjhamānā saṅkhārānaṃ sappaccayataṃ sādhentī yathāvuttakaṅkhappahānāya saṃvattatīti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^``aniccato...pe0... pahīyatī''^eb^ti āha. tattha ^b^tadanvayenā^eb^ti paccakkhato diṭṭhassa anugamanena. ^b^etthā^eb^ti yathādiṭṭhesu dhammesu. ^b^dukkhato manasi karonto^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^pavatta^eb^nti upādinnakkhandhappavattaṃ. tañhi kilesābhisaṅkhārehi pavattitattā sātisayaṃ dukkhabhāvena upaṭṭhāti. ^b^pavatta^eb^nti ṭhānanisajjādivasena dukkhadukkhatādivasena ca saṅkhārappavattanti apare. ``nimittaṃ, pavatta''nti ca vutte ajjhattabahiddhāsantānasaññite sabbasmiṃ sappaccaye nāmarūpe yāthāvato pavattā ekāva paññā pariyāyavasena ``yathābhūtañāṇa''ntipi ``sammādassana''ntipi tattha kaṅkhāvikkhambhanena ``kaṅkhāvitaraṇā''tipi vuccati. yathā ``rukkho pādapo tarū''ti imamatthaṃ dassento āha ^b^``yañca yathābhūtañāṇa''^eb^ntiādi.

[03] paramatthato ^a^M2.0385^ea^ sāsane assāso nāma ariyaphalaṃ, patiṭṭhā nāma ariyamaggo, ayaṃ pana anadhigatamaggaphalopi tadadhigamupāyapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitattā laddhassāso viya, laddhapatiṭṭho viya ca hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``laddhassāso laddhapatiṭṭho''^eb^ti. aparihīnakaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiko vipassako lokiyāhi sīlasamādhipaññāsampadāhi samannāgatattā uttari appaṭivijjhanto sugatiparāyaṇo ca hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``niyatagatiko''^eb^ti. tato eva ^b^cūḷasotāpanno nāma hoti^eb^. sotāpanno hi khīṇāpāyaduggativinipātoti.

[03] atha vā ^b^laddhassāso^eb^ diṭṭhivisuddhisamadhigamena. nāmarūpaparicchedena hi khandhādike sabhāvasarasato sallakkhetvā sāsane dhammupasaṃhitapāmojjappaṭilābhena laddhassāso hoti. ^b^laddhapatiṭṭho^eb^ kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhisamadhigamena. sappaccayanāmarūpadassanena hi parimadditadiṭṭhikaṇṭako viniddhatāhetuvisamahetuvādo yathāsakaṃ paccayeheva dhammamattaṃ jānitvā sāsane ^a^V2.0361^ea^ patiṭṭhitasaddho laddhapatiṭṭho nāma hoti. nāmarūpavavatthānena dukkhasaccaṃ, dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena samudayasaccaṃ, tasseva aparabhāgena aniccato manasikārādividhinā maggasaccañca abhiññāya pavattiyā dukkhabhāvaṃ disvā appavatte nirodhe ekaṃseneva ninnajjhāsayatāya lokiyeneva ñāṇena catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ adhigatattā apāyesu abhabbuppattiko, sotāpannabhūmiyaṃ bhabbuppattiko ca hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``niyatagatiko''^eb^ti. tenāha ^b^``cūḷasotāpanno nāma hotī''^eb^ti.
[03] ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā evaṃ mahānisaṃsametaṃ yathābhūtañāṇaṃ, tasmā. ^b^sadā^eb^ti sabbakālaṃ rattiñceva divā ca. ^b^sabbaso^eb^ti nibbattakahetuādipariggaṇhanavasena sabbappakārena.
[06] kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti ekūnavīsatimaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 692^b^.^eb^ ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0386^ea^ ^a^V2.0362^ea^ ^b^maggañca amaggañca ñatvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇa^eb^nti ayaṃ upakkilesavinimuttā vīthipaṭipannā vipassanāpaññā ariyamaggassa pubbabhāgamaggo, ayaṃ obhāsādibhedo dasavidho upakkileso na maggoti evaṃ maggañca amaggañca yāthāvato vavatthapetvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ.

[03] atītādivasena anekabhedabhinne dhamme kalāpato saṅkhipitvā sammasanaṃ ^b^kalāpasammasanaṃ,^eb^ ayaṃ kira jambudīpavāsīnaṃ abhilāpo. ``yaṃ kiñci rūpa''ntiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.361; 2.113; 3.86; a0 ni0 4.181) nayena hi dhammānaṃ vipassanā ^b^nayavipassanā,^eb^ ayaṃ kira tambapaṇṇidīpavāsīnaṃ abhilāpo. tenevāha ^b^``kalāpasammasanasaṅkhātāya nayavipassanāyā''^eb^ti. ^b^tāva^eb^-saddo kamattho, tena sammasanappakārānaṃ bahubhedataṃ dīpeti. bahubhāvato hi tesaṃ paṭhamaṃ nayavipassanāya yogārambhaṃ anusāsati ``nayavipassanāya tāva yogo karaṇīyo''ti. ^b^kasmā^eb^ti codakavacanaṃ. tassāyaṃ adhippāyo -- yadi maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi sampādetabbā, atha kasmā ``nayavipassanāya ādito yogo kātabbo''ti vuttanti. itaro tassāyaṃ adhigamūpāyoti dassento ^b^``āraddhavipassakassā''^eb^tiādimāha. tenetaṃ dasseti ``vipassanāya sati udayabbayañāṇuppādo, udayabbayañāṇe sati obhāsādiupakkilesasambhavo, tato maggāmaggavavatthānaṃ, tasmā tassa āditova ārambhassa sambhavo natthīti vipassanā paṭhamaṃ āraddhabbā''ti. evampi paṭhamaṃ nayavipassanāva kasmā āraddhabbāti āha ^b^``vipassanāya ca kalāpasammasanaṃ ādī''^eb^ti. tañhi atītādibhedabhinnānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthānavasena pavattanato ādikammikassa sukaraṃ sammasananti ādibhūtaṃ.

[03] ^b^tasmā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0363^ea^ ādibhūtattā. atha vā ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā āraddhavipassakassa...pe0... kalāpasammasanaṃ ādi, tasmā. ^b^eta^eb^nti kalāpasammasanaṃ. ^b^apicā^eb^tiādi kalāpasammasanasseva vipassanāya ādibhāve upacayahetudassanaṃ. udayabbayañāṇapariyosānā tīraṇapariññā, asampatte ^a^M2.0387^ea^ eva ca udayabbayañāṇe maggāmaggavavatthānaṃ hotīti āha ^b^``tīraṇapariññāya vattamānāyā''^eb^ti. ^b^kalāpasammasane tāva yogo kātabbo^eb^ti etthāpi tasseva paṭhamārambhe kāraṇaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. yasmā kalāpasammasanaṃ nāma ekavisuddhiyampi na antogadhaṃ, ekacce ca taṃ anāmasitvāva vipassanācāraṃ vaṇṇenti. evaṃ santepi taṃ ^b^suttantesu^eb^ ekadesena, anavasesato ca dassitaṃ. ^b^paṭisambhidāyaṃ^eb^ ādikammikānaṃ manasikārasukaratāya vipassanāya ādibhāvena ṭhapitaṃ. vipassantassa ca obhāsādīsu uppannesu maggāmaggañāṇasambhavo, tasmā ``taṃ sampādetukāmenā''tiādinā ayaṃ vicāro katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] 693^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ tīraṇapariññāya ñātapariññānantarabhāve, tāsu vā pariññāsu. ^b^vinicchayo^eb^ti sarūpato, kiccato, bhūmito ca sanniṭṭhānaṃ. lokuttarāpi purimasmiṃ saccadvaye maggasampayuttā tividhāpi pariññā kiccavasena labbhatīti ^b^``lokiyapariññā''^eb^ti visesetvā vuttaṃ. sabhāvadhammānaṃ lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇato ñeyyābhimukhā paññā ^b^abhiññāpaññā. ñātaṭṭhe^eb^ti ñātabhāvanimittaṃ. abhiññeyyassa jānanahetu ^b^``ñāṇa''^eb^nti vuccati. ^b^pariññāpaññā^eb^ti aniccādilakkhaṇāni paricchijja jānanapaññā. ^b^tīraṇaṭṭhe^eb^ti sammasanabhāvahetu. ^b^pahānapaññā^eb^ti pahātabbassa pajahanapaññā. vedayitādilakkhaṇavidhuratāya ^b^ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ^eb^ paccattalakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^tesaṃyeva^eb^ paccattalakkhaṇasallakkhaṇavasena gahitadhammānaṃyeva. yathā pathavīphassādīnaṃ kakkhaḷaphusanādilakkhaṇāni tīsupi khaṇesu sallakkhitabbāni paṭiniyatarūpatāya sabhāvasiddhāneva hutvā gayhanti, na evamaniccatādilakkhaṇāni. tāni pana bhaṅgudayabbayapīḷāvasavattanākāramukhena gahetabbato samāropitarūpāni viya gayhantīti vuttaṃ ^b^``sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā''^eb^ti. lokiyapariññānaṃyeva adhippetattā lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāva ^b^``pahānapariññā''^eb^ti vuttā.

[03] ^b^saṅkhārapaṭicchedato^eb^ti nāmarūpavavatthānato, yā ``diṭṭhivisuddhī''ti vuttā. keci pana ``khandhādīnaṃ vipassanāya bhūmibhāvato sabbopi khandhādivicāro saṅkhāraparicchedo''ti vadanti. ^b^``paccattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhasseva ādhipacca''^eb^nti iminā nāmarūpapaccayapariggahapaññānaṃ tīraṇapahānāsamatthataṃ ^a^V2.0364^ea^ dasseti ^a^M2.0388^ea^. tāsampi pana ``namanalakkhaṇaṃ nāmaṃ, ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpa''nti arūparūpānaṃ sādhāraṇākārasallakkhaṇavasena pavattiyā ekenākārena tīraṇapariyāyo, diṭṭhikaṅkhāvikkhambhanena pahānapariyāyo labbhatīti siyā tīraṇapahānesupi ādhipaccanti vadanti. ukkaṭṭhaniddesena pana yathā diṭṭhivisuddhiyāva saṅkhāraparicchedatā, evaṃ lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya eva tīraṇapahānakiccatā veditabbā. evaṃ hi tissopi pariññā vavatthitā honti, aññathā saṅkāro siyā. ^b^tīraṇapariññāya bhūmi^eb^ tattha paññāya aniccatādilakkhaṇasantīraṇato. tenāha ^b^``etasmiṃ...pe0... ādhipacca''^eb^nti. kāmaṃ udayabbayañāṇampi kañci micchābhinivesaṃ pajahati, tassa pana athāmagatattā na sātisayaṃ pahānanti vuttaṃ ^b^``bhaṅgānupassanaṃ ādiṃ katvā upari pahānapariññāya bhūmī''^eb^ti. ^b^aniccato anupassanto^eb^ti aniccākārato saṅkhāre anupassanto sammasanto. ^b^niccasañña^eb^nti ``te niccā sassatā''ti pavattaṃ micchāsaññaṃ. saññāsīsena diṭṭhicittānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. eseva nayo ito paresupi. ^b^nibbindanto^eb^ti aniccānupassanādisambhūtāya nibbidānupassanāya saṅkhāre nibbijjanavasena passanto. ^b^nandi^eb^nti sappītikataṇhaṃ. ^b^virajjanto^eb^ti virāgānupassanāya virajjanavasena yathā saṅkhāresu rāgo nuppajjati, evaṃ anupassanto. tathābhūto hi rāgaṃ pajahatīti vuccati. ^b^nirodhento^eb^ti nirodhānupassanāya yathā saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva, na āyatiṃ punabbhavavasena uppajjanti, evaṃ anupassanto. tathābhūto hi saṅkhārānaṃ samudayaṃ pajahati nāma anuppattidhammatāpādanato. ^b^paṭinissajjanto^eb^ti paṭinissaggānupassanāya yathā saṅkhārā na puna ādiyanti, evaṃ vossajjanto. tenāha ^b^``ādānaṃ pajahatī''^eb^ti, niccādivasena vā gahaṇaṃ vissajjetīti attho. ^b^sādhitattā^eb^ti sampāditattā. ^b^itarā^eb^ti tīraṇapahānapariññā. evaṃ pariññā niddisitvā pariññākkamavasenapi kaṅkhāvitaraṇānantaraṃ ``kalāpasammasane yogo kātabbo''ti yvāyamattho vutto, taṃ nigamavasena paccāharanto ^b^``tena vutta''^eb^ntiādimāha, taṃ vuttatthameva.

[03] 694^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ kalāpasammasane vibhāvetabbe, tassa vā kalāpasammasanassa ādibhāve. ^b^ayaṃ pāḷī^eb^ti dassiyamānaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷimāha. tattha ^b^saṅkhipitvā vavatthāne paññā^eb^ti atītādibhedabhinne dhamme ^a^M2.0389^ea^ ekato saṅgahetvā aniccādivasena vinicchaye sādhetabbe taṃsādhanīyā paññā. sammasane aniccatādivasena tīraṇe ñāṇanti pavuccati, sā kathaṃ hotīti attho. ^b^vavatthāne sammasane^eb^ti ca nipphādetabbe bhummavacanaṃ. ^b^yaṃ kiñci rūpa^eb^ntiādīni padāni ^a^V2.0365^ea^ heṭṭhā vuttatthāneva. ^b^sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato vavatthapetī^eb^tiādīni pana yasmā parato vaṇṇiyissanti, tasmā tattheva nesaṃ atthaṃ vibhāvayissāma.

[03] pāḷivavatthānaṃ pana evaṃ veditabbaṃ -- ettha hi ādikammikānaṃ vipassanāmanasikārasukhatthaṃ ^b^``yaṃ kiñci rūpa''^eb^ntiādinā paṭhamaṃ tāva pañcakkhandhā atītādivibhāgamukhena gahitā, te pana khandhā yasmā dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammavasena vibhāgaṃ labbhanti, tasmā tadanantaraṃ dvārachakkādivasena dasa chakkā gahitā. yasmā pana lakkhaṇesu anattalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhavibhāgaṃ, tasmā tassa vibhāvanāya cha dhātuyo gahitā. tato yesu kasiṇesu ito bāhirakānaṃ attābhiniveso, tāni imesaṃ jhānānaṃ ārammaṇabhāvena upaṭṭhānākāramattānīti dassanatthaṃ dasa kasiṇāni gahitāni. tato dukkhānupassanāya parivārabhāvena paṭikkūlākāravasena dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāsā gahitā. pubbe khandhavasena saṅkhepato gahitā dhammā nātisaṅkhepavitthāranayena, vitthāranayena ca manasi kātabbāti dassanatthaṃ dvādasāyatanāni, aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo ca gahitā. tesu ime dhammā satipi suññanirīhābyāpārabhāve dhammasabhāvato ādhipaccavasena pavattantīti anattalakkhaṇavibhāvanatthaṃ indriyāni gahitāni. evaṃ anekabhedabhinnāpime dhammā bhūmittayapariyāpannatāya tividhāva hontīti dassanatthaṃ tisso dhātuyo gahitā.

[03] ettāvatā nimittaṃ dassetvā pavattaṃ dassetuṃ kāmabhavādayo nava bhavā gahitā. ettake abhiññeyyavisese pavattamanasikārakosallena saṇhasukhumesu nibbattitamahaggatadhammesu manasikāro pavattetabboti dassanatthaṃ jhānappamaññāruppāni gahitāni. tattha jhānāni nāma vuttāvasesārammaṇāni rūpāvacarajjhānāni. paccayapaccayuppannavibhāgato ime dhammā bhinditvā manasi kātabbāti dassanatthaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṅgāni gahitāni. paccayākāramanasikāro hi lakkhaṇattayaṃ sukhena, suṭṭhutarañca vibhāveti, tasmā pacchato gahito. evamete sammasanīyabhāvena gahitā ^a^M2.0390^ea^ khandhādivasena koṭṭhāsato pañcavīsatividhā. pabhedato pana atītādibhedaṃ anāmasitvāva gayhamānā dvīhi ūnāni dvesatāni honti.

[03] tattha ^b^aniccato vavatthapetī^eb^tiādiko paṭhamo lakkhaṇavavatthāpanavāro. ^b^aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā^eb^tiādiko dutiyo hetuvāro lakkhaṇānaṃ hetukittanato. ^b^aniccaṃ saṅkhata^eb^ntiādiko pana hetupatiṭṭhāpanavāro ^a^V2.0366^ea^ pākaṭabhāvasallakkhaṇato. ^b^khayaṭṭhenā^eb^ti hi khayasabhāvato yasmā rūpaṃ khayasabhāvaṃ uppajjitvā khayaṃ vayaṃ bhedaṃ gacchati, tasmā aniccanti attho. ^b^bhayaṭṭhenā^eb^ti bhāyitabbabhāvato yasmā rūpaṃ pabhaṅguratāya bhayānakaṃ, tasmā dukkhanti. tenāha bhagavā ``yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkha''nti (saṃ0 ni0 30.15, 45, 46, 76, 85; 2.4.14; paṭi0 ma0 2.10). ^b^asārakaṭṭhenā^eb^ti asārakabhāvato, attasāravirahatoti attho. tatiyavāre pana ``rūpaṃ anicca''nti vatvā tassa hetuṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ ^b^``saṅkhata''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. yasmā samecca sambhūya paccayehi kataṃ, anurūpe ca paccaye paṭicca, na vinā tehi samaṃ, sammā ca uppannaṃ, tasmā khayavayavirāganirodhadhammanti. na hi paccayanibbattaṃ anirujjhanakaṃ nāma atthi. tenāha bhagavā ``yaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ palokadhammaṃ, taṃ vata mā palujjīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.379). etena aniccā pathavīdhātu paccayanibbattattā tadaññaṃ paccayanibbattaṃ viyāti dasseti. esa nayo sesadhammesupi.

[03] idāni anvayato, byatirekato ca saṅkhatadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ ^b^``jātipaccayā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. aniccalakkhaṇasseva cettha patiṭṭhāpanaṃ tasmiṃ patiṭṭhāpite sesalakkhaṇadvayassapi patiṭṭhāpanasiddhito.

[03] iminā peyyālena ime dhammarāsayo saṃkhittāti sambandho. ^b^``dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattā dhammā, pañcakkhandhā''^eb^ti idaṃ abhiññeyyaniddese ``cakkhuṃ, bhikkhave, abhiññeyya''ntiādinā (paṭi0 ma0 1.3; saṃ0 ni0 4.46) dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavatte dhamme dassetvā tesaṃ pañcahi khandhehi saṅgahitataṃ dassetuṃ ``rūpaṃ abhiññeyyaṃ...pe0... viññāṇaṃ abhiññeyya''nti āgatattā vuttaṃ. ^b^paṭisambhidāyaṃ^eb^ (paṭi0 ma0 1.48) pana ``yaṃ kiñci rūpa''ntiādinā paṭhamaṃ pañcakkhandhe dassetvā ``cakkhu''ntiādinā dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattā dhammā dassitā. tathādassane kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.

[03] kasmā ^a^M2.0391^ea^ panettha ime dhammarāsayo saṃkhittāti pāḷiyaṃ vitthārato āgatattāti dassento ^b^``vuttaṃ heta''^eb^ntiādimāha. tenevāha ^b^``taṃ tattha...pe0... saṃkhitta''^eb^nti. tattha ^b^ta^eb^nti abhiññeyyaṃ. ^b^etthā^eb^ti abhiññeyyaniddese. ``viññāṇaṃ mano dhammā''tiādinā tattha tattha koṭṭhāse ye lokuttaradhammā āgatā. keci pana ^b^``etthā^eb^ti paṭisambhidāya''nti vadanti, taṃ na ^a^V2.0367^ea^ sundaraṃ. sammasanupagā eva hi dhammā paṭisambhidāyaṃ gahitā sammasanavārassa adhippetattā, na abhiññeyyaniddese (paṭi0 ma0 1.3; saṃ0 ni0 4.46) viya sabbeva abhiññeyyā dhammā. ^b^ye^eb^ rūpārūpadhammā. ^b^yassā^eb^ti yogino. ^b^tesu tena sammasanaṃ ārabhitabbaṃ^eb^ yathāpākaṭaṃ vipassanābhinivesoti katvā. pacchā pana anupaṭṭhahantepi upāyena upaṭṭhahāpetvā anavasesatova sammasitabbā.

[03] 695^b^.^eb^ ``atītaṃ rūpaṃ anicca''ntiādinā aniccato sammasanassa atītādivibhāgā pavattiṭṭhānabhūtāti āha ^b^``ekādasahi okāsehī''^eb^ti. ^b^vavatthāpanaṃ^eb^ nāma sanniṭṭhānaṃ. aniccato sanniṭṭhānañcettha ``anicca''nti vipassanāvāti āha ^b^``aniccanti sammasatī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^katha^eb^nti sammasanākāro pucchitoti taṃ parato idheva pāḷiyaṃ dutiyavāre vuttanayenevāti saṅkhepeneva vissajjeti. idāni tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^``vuttañheta''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^hī^eb^-ti hetuatthe nipāto. yasmā ``rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenā''ti evaṃ vuttaṃ, tasmā iminā vuttanayena aniccanti sammasatīti yojanā.

[03] evampi saṅkhepoyevāti vibhajitvā dassetuṃ ^b^``esā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^atīte^eb^ti atīte bhave. ādikammikassa hi idaṃ sammasanavidhānaṃ, tasmā bhavavasena addhābhedo adhippeto. tenāha ^b^``nayimaṃ bhavaṃ sampattantī''^eb^ti. ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo hetuattho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yaṃ atītabhave pariyāpannaṃ rūpaṃ, taṃ atīteyeva bhave khīṇaṃ, tato na imaṃ bhavaṃ sampattaṃ, tasmā aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena khayasabhāvattāti sammasatīti. esa nayo ^b^yaṃ anāgata^eb^ntiādīsupi.
[03] yaṃ ^a^M2.0392^ea^ bahiddhā, tampi bahiddhā eva khīyati, na ajjhattabhāvaṃ gacchatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenāti, yaṃ oḷārikaṃ, tampi tattheva khīyatīti aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenātiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^idaṃ sabbampī^eb^ti idaṃ atītādibhedassa rūpassa sammasanato sabbaṃ ekādasavidhampi sammasanaṃ ekaṃ sammasanaṃ aniccato sammasananti katvā.

[03] ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ ekādasavidhampi rūpaṃ. ^b^sappaṭibhayatāyā^eb^ti bhayānakatāya. ^b^bhayāvahaṃ hotī^eb^ti appahīnavipallāsassa ^a^V2.0368^ea^ ``ahaṃ vinassāmi, mama santakaṃ vinassatī''ti cintentassa bhayajanakaṃ hoti. ^b^sīhopamasutte devānaṃ viyā^eb^ti sīhopamasutte desiyamāne devānaṃ viya. tattha hi --

[02] ``yadā tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho...pe0... so dhammaṃ deseti `iti rūpaṃ, iti rūpassa samudayo, iti rūpassa atthaṅgamo. iti vedanā... iti saññā... iti saṅkhārā... iti viññāṇaṃ, iti viññāṇassa samudayo, iti viññāṇassa atthaṅgamo'ti. yepi te, bhikkhave, devā dīghāyukā vaṇṇavanto sukhabahulā uccesu vimānesu ciraṭṭhitikā, tepi tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena bhayaṃ saṃvegaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjanti `aniccāva kira bho mayaṃ samānā niccamhāti amaññimha, addhuvāva...pe0... asassatāva kira bho mayaṃ samānā sassatamhāti amaññimha, mayampi kira bho aniccā addhuvā asassatā sakkāyapariyāpannā'''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.78; a0 ni0 4.33) --
[25] evaṃ devānaṃ bhayuppatti āgatā.

[03] khandhapañcakaṃ, tadekadeso vā attavādīhi ``attā''ti parikappīyati, tañca ekantato aniccaṃ, dukkhañcāti āha ^b^``yañhi aniccaṃ, taṃ dukkha''^eb^ntiādi. tīsu dukkhatāsu saṅkhāradukkhatāva byāpinī, ``yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkha''nti ca adhippetāti vuttaṃ ^b^``aniccataṃ vā udayabbayapaṭipīḷanaṃ vā''^eb^ti. ^b^attā abhavissā^eb^ti ``kārako vedako sayaṃvasī''ti evaṃbhūto attā abhavissāti adhippāyo. evañhi sati rūpassa ābādhāya saṃvattanaṃ ayujjamānakaṃ siyā. yathā rūpakkhandhe abhedato tividhaṃ sammasanaṃ, bhedato tettiṃsavidhaṃ, evaṃ vedanākkhandhādīsupīti imamatthaṃ ^b^``esa nayo''^eb^ti ^a^M2.0393^ea^ atidisati. tena khandhavasena tāva bhedato pañcasaṭṭhiadhikā sataṃ sammasanavārā dassitā honti. iminā nayena dvārachakkādīsupi yathārahaṃ sammasanabhedo veditabbo.

[03] 696^b^.^eb^ ^b^niyamato saṅkhatādibhedaṃ hotī^eb^ti ekaṃsena saṅkhatatādivisesavantaṃ hoti asaṅkhatādisabhāve aniccatāya asambhavato. ^b^assā^eb^ti aniccassa. ^b^pariyāyadassanattha^eb^nti vevacanadassanatthaṃ, taṃ pana ``khayadhamma''ntiādīnaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ, na purimānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ. na hi ^a^V2.0369^ea^ tadeva tassa pariyāyo hoti, nāpi saṅkhatapaṭiccasamuppannapadāni hutvā abhāvadīpanato pākabhāvadīpanato. pākabhāvadīpanena pana aniccatāya sādhanapakkhe tiṭṭhanti. teneva hi sabbesaṃ padānaṃ pariyāyatābhāvato ^b^``nānākārehi vā''^eb^ti vikappantaraṃ gahitaṃ. ^b^manasikārappavattīdassanattha^eb^nti aniccatāya upabrūhanamanasikārapavattidassanatthaṃ.

[03] 697^b^.^eb^ ^b^so^eb^ti yogāvacaro. ^b^tassā^eb^ti yathāvuttabhedassa aniccatādisammasanassa. ^b^thirabhāvatthāyā^eb^ti daḷhabhāvatthāya aniccādiākārassa punappunaṃ manasikāro viya bahulīkārabhāvato. yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā etassa vibhaṅge aniccādisammasanaṃ vuttanti sambandho. ^b^anulomika^eb^nti ariyamaggādhigamassa anukūlaṃ. ^b^khanti^eb^nti ñāṇakhantiṃ. ñāṇañhi visayasabhāvaṃ ogāhetvā vavatthāne khamati sahatīti khantīti vuccati. ^b^sammattaniyāma^eb^nti ariyamaggaṃ. so hi sammādiṭṭhiādisammattañceva anivattidhammatāya niyāmo cāti vuccati. ^b^``ādinā nayenā''^eb^ti iminā ``pañcakkhandhe dukkhato passanto anulomikaṃ khantiṃ paṭilabhati, khandhānaṃ nirodho sukhaṃ nibbānanti passanto sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamatī''ti (paṭi0 ma0 3.38) evamādiko pāṭhaseso rogādipaṭipakkhayojanāvasena vitthāretabbo. ^b^``khandhānaṃ nirodho niccaṃ nibbāna''^eb^nti vacanena saṅkhārānaṃ dukkharogatādipaṭipakkho nibbānassa sukhārogyādibhāvo ``ādinā nayenā''ti ettha nayaggahaṇena dīpitoti. avaseso sabbo pāṭho pakāsito eva hotīti.

[03] kāmañcetaṃ ^a^M2.0394^ea^ cattārīsāya ākārehi sammasanaṃ anulomañāṇe bhāvetabbavidhānaṃ. tenāha ^b^``anulomañāṇaṃ vibhajantena...pe0... vutta''^eb^nti, ito paṭṭhāya pana kataparicayasseva kiccāvahaṃ hotīti idhāpi vuttantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^tassāpī^eb^ti na kevalaṃ kalāpasammasanasseva, atha kho yathādassitassa cattālīsappabhedassa aniccādisammasanassapi. tañhi anulomikakhantipaṭilābhāya, sammattaniyāmokkamanāya ca saṃvattanato ekaṃsato icchitabbaṃ. vuttañhi --

[02] ``so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato samanupassanto anulomikāya khantiyā samannāgato bhavissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati, anulomikāya khantiyā ^a^V2.0370^ea^ asamannāgato sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati, sammattaniyāmaṃ anokkamamāno sotāpattiphalaṃ vā...pe0... arahattaṃ vā sacchikarissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbasaṅkhāre aniccato samanupassanto''ti (a0 ni0 6.98; paṭi0 ma0 3.36) --
[25] ādi sukkapakkho vitthāretabbo. tathā ``so vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato, dukkhato, kañci dhammaṃ attato, anattato''ti (paṭi0 ma0 3.36) vitthāretabbo.

[03] 698^b^.^eb^ ekekaṃ khandhaṃ aniccādisammasanassa vasena sammasatīti sambandho. tassa pana sammasanassa pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ sādhāraṇatāya ^b^``ekekaṃ khandha''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^anaccantikatāyā^eb^ti accantikatābhāvato, asassatatāyāti attho. sassatañhi accantikaṃ parāya koṭiyā abhāvato. ^b^ādiantavantatāyā^eb^ti pubbāparakoṭivantatāya, udayabbayadhammatoti attho. aniccato sammasatīti sambandho. esa nayo sabbattha.

[03] ^b^aniccato^eb^ti ca addhuvato. etañhi na niccaṃ, khaṇikatāya asadābhāvitāya vā na iccaṃ na upagantabbanti ^b^aniccaṃ. uppādavayapaṭipīḷanatāyā^eb^ti uppādena, vayena ca pati pati khaṇe khaṇe taṃsamaṅgino vibādhanasabhāvattā, tehi vā sayameva vibādhetabbattā. udayabbayavanto hi dhammā abhiṇhaṃ tehi paṭipīḷitā eva honti, yā pīḷanā ``saṅkhāradukkhatā''ti vuccati. ^b^dukkhavatthutāyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0395^ea^ tividhassāpi dukkhassa, saṃsāradukkhassa ca adhiṭṭhānabhāvato. ^b^paccayayāpanīyatāyā^eb^ti yathārahaṃ paccayehi yāpetabbatāya. ^b^rogamūlatāyā^eb^ti mūlabyādhi viya anubandhabyādhīnaṃ mūlabhāvato, padadvayenāpi yāpyarogasadisatoti dasseti. yāpyabyādhi hi rogo itaro ābādhoti. ^b^dukkhatāsūlayogitāyā^eb^ti tividhadukkhatāsaṅkhātena rujjanena yujjatāya. ^b^kilesāsucipaggharaṇatāyā^eb^ti yathārahamārammaṇavasena, samannāgamavasena ca rāgādikilesāsucivissandanato. ahutvā sambhavato uppattiyā ^b^uddhumātatā^eb^.

[03] ^b^antotudanatāyā^eb^ti abbhantare tudanato. dukkhavedanādayo viya hi ime saṅkhārā attabhāvassa abbhantaragatā eva udayabbayavasena tudanti. ariyamaggasaṇḍāsena vinā nīharituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ^b^dunnīharaṇīyatā^eb^ taṇhādiṭṭhābhinivesadaḷhabhāvato. ^b^agha^eb^nti pāpaṃ viya ariyajanehi ^a^V2.0371^ea^ vigarahitabbaṃ. sattānaṃ anatthajananato avaḍḍhiāvahaṃ, pāpassa ca vatthubhūtaṃ khandhapañcakanti āha ^b^``vigaraha...pe0... aghato''^eb^ti. ^b^aseribhāvajanakatāyā^eb^ti paravasatājananato. yathā gilāno aññehi saṃvesanavuṭṭhāpanādinā parapaṭibaddhasarīravuttiko aserī, evametepi aseribhāvajanakā. ^b^avasatāyā^eb^ti avasavattanato. yathā parosatanto puriso parassa vasaṃ na gacchati, evaṃ subhasukhādibhāvena vase vattetuṃ asakkuṇeyyato. ^b^avidheyyatāyā^eb^ti ``mā jīratha, mā mīyathā''tiādinā vidhātuṃ asakkuṇeyyato. ^b^palujjanatāyā^eb^ti byādhiādīhi pakārehi chijjanato vinassanato. tehi eva vā ābyasanato. byasanattho hi lokasaddo, pasaddo bhusattho daṭṭhabbo. byādhiādīhi ca khandhānaṃ byasananti. byasanāvahabhāvena etīti ^b^īti,^eb^ āgantukānaṃ akusalapakkhiyānaṃ byasanahetūnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. khandhā ca edisāti āha ^b^``anekabyasanāvahatāya ītito''^eb^ti.

[03] upaddavatīti upaddavo, anatthaṃ janento abhibhavati ajjhottharatīti attho, rājadaṇḍādīnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. khandhā ca edisāti vuttaṃ ^b^``aviditānaṃ...pe0... upaddavato''^eb^ti. diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikabhayāvahato, abhayapaṭipakkhato ca khandhā bhayanti āha ^b^``sabbabhayānaṃ...pe0... bhayato''^eb^ti. bahiddhā ñātibyasanādīhi, ajjhattaṃ rāgādīhi anatthehi upasajjanaṭṭhena, upasaggasadisatāya ^a^M2.0396^ea^ ca upasaggo. ^b^upasaggo^eb^ti ca devatūpasaṃhāravasena pavatto byādhiādianattho. so atthakāmena muhuttampi na ajjhupekkhitabbo hoti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``anekehi...pe0... upasaggato''^eb^ti. ^b^dosūpasaṭṭhatāyā^eb^ti ārammaṇato, sampayogato ca rāgādidosehi upetatāya. lokadhammā lābhādihetukā anunayapaṭighā, tehi, byādhiādīhi ca anavaṭṭhitatā ^b^pacalitatā^eb^.

[01] ^b^upakkamenā^eb^ti attano, parassa vā payogena. ^b^sarasenā^eb^ti sabhāvena. ^b^pabhaṅgupagamanasīlatā^eb^ bhiduratā. ^b^sabbāvatthanipātitāyā^eb^ti rukkhaphalaṃ viya atitaruṇakālato paṭṭhāya sabbāsu avatthāsu nipatanasīlatāya. anipatassapi sabbena sabbaṃ asāratāya ^b^thirabhāvassa abhāvatāya^eb^. thirañhi dhuvaṃ nāma hoti. tāyituṃ rakkhituṃ asamatthatāya na tāyanoti atāyano, tabbhāvo ^b^atāyanatā^eb^. tāṇāsīsāya upagatassa ^b^alabbhaneyyakhematā^eb^. dukkhabhītiyā upalīyanādhippāyena ^b^allīyituṃ^eb^. dukkhanivattanaṃ ^b^leṇakiccaṃ^eb^. jātiādibhayānaṃ hiṃsanaṃ vidhamanaṃ ^b^bhayasārakattaṃ. yathāparikappitehī^eb^ti paramatthato avijjamānehi bālehi parikappitappakārehi. ^b^rittatāyā^eb^ti vivittatāya, virahitatāyāti ^a^V2.0372^ea^ attho. antosārābhāvo ^b^rittatā^eb^. sā eva ca tucchatāti āha ^b^``rittatāyeva tucchato''^eb^ti. ^b^appakattā^eb^ti parittattā, lāmakattā vā. dhuvasārābhāvādīhi saddhiṃ attasārābhāvaṃ rittapadena vatvā nibbattitamattasārābhāvameva suññapadena dassetuṃ ^b^``sāmi...pe0... suññato''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. yathā kenaci sāmiādilakkhaṇena attanā suññā ete, evaṃ sayampi ataṃsabhāvoti āha ^b^``sayañca...pe0... anattato''^eb^ti. na attāti hi anattāti.

[03] ^b^pavattidukkhatāyā^eb^ti bhavapavattidukkhabhāvato. bhavapavatti ca pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ aniccādiākārena pavattanameva, so ca ādīnavo. yathāha ``yaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcupādānakkhandhā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ādīnavo''ti. tenāha ^b^``dukkhassa ca ādīnavatāyā''^eb^ti. ^b^ādīna^eb^nti bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso yathā ``ekamanta''nti (dī0 ni0 1.165), ativiya kapaṇanti attho. bhusattho hi ayaṃ ^b^ā^eb^-kāro. yathā ^a^M2.0397^ea^ ``dvidhā chiddakaṃ vicchiddaka''nti ettha dvi-saddassa atthe ^b^vi^eb^-saddo, evamidhāpīti āha ^b^``dvedhā pariṇāmapakatitāya vipariṇāmadhammato''^eb^ti. vipariṇāmo ca viparītasabhāvāpatti. ^b^dubbalatāyā^eb^ti sarasabhiduratāya balābhāvato. dubbalampi kiñci mudukammaññābhāvena duppadhaṃsiyā. ime pana supadhaṃsiyā evāti āha ^b^``pheggu viya sukhabhañjanīyatāya cā''^eb^ti. aghassa pāpassa hetutā ^b^aghahetutā^eb^. khandhapaṭibaddhameva hi sabbaṃ kibbisanti. ime rūpādayo sukhahetu, na dukkhahetūti janitavissāsānaṃ hananasīlatāya, khandhesu hi ``etaṃ mamā''ti gāhavasena sattā byasanaṃ pāpuṇanti, vissāsaṃ vā hanantīti ^b^vissāsaghātino,^eb^ tabbhāvato.

[01] ^b^vigatabhavatāyā^eb^ti apagatavaḍḍhitāya. vibhavataṇhā, vibhavadiṭṭhi ca vibhavo uttarapadalopena, tato ^b^vibhavato,^eb^ pitusadisassa vā sabhāvahetuno ^b^vibhavato^eb^ vināsato sambhūtatāya. āsavānaṃ ārammaṇādinā paccayabhāvo ^b^āsavapadaṭṭhānatā^eb^. bījādiko asādhāraṇo ^b^hetu,^eb^ bhūtasalilādiko sādhāraṇo ^b^paccayo^eb^. esa nayo ajjhattepi. tehi samecca sambhūya kato ^b^saṅkhato. maccumārassa^eb^ adhiṭṭhānabhāvena, ^b^kilesamārassa^eb^ paccayabhāvena saṃvaḍḍhanato ^b^āmisabhūtatā,^eb^ khandhāpi khandhānaṃ āmisabhūtā paccayabhāvena saṃvaḍḍhanato, tadantogadhā ^b^abhisaṅkhārā. devaputtamārassa^eb^ pana ``mameta''nti adhimānavasena āmisabhāvoti khandhādimārānampi imesaṃ yathārahaṃ āmisabhūtatā vattabbā. dhammasaddo ``jātidhammāna''ntiādīsu (ma0 ni0 3.373; paṭi0 ma0 1.33) viya pakatiattho ^a^V2.0373^ea^, ``dhammapaṭisambhidā''tiādīsu (vibha0 718 ādayo) viya hetuattho cāti āha ^b^``jātijarābyādhimaraṇapakatitāya, sokaparidevaupāyāsahetutāyā''^eb^ti. ^b^saṃkilesattaya^eb^ggahaṇena tadekaṭṭhānaṃ dasannaṃ kilesavatthūnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. tadārammaṇāpi hi dhammā tadanativattanato saṃkilesikā eva. tathā khuddā, taṇhā, jaṭādīsu sarīrassa, saṃkilesassa ca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.

[01] cattārīsāpi sammasanāni tīsu anupassanāsu antogadhānevāti tadantogadhabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``ettha hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^aniccānupassanāni^eb^ sarūpato ^a^M2.0398^ea^, pariyāyato ca aniccabhāvavibhāvanato. esa nayo itaresupi. ^b^``asārakato''^eb^ti idaṃ niccasārābhāvavibhāvanaṃ.
[03] ettāvatā kalāpato dhamme saṅgahetvā nayato sammasanamattaṃ dassitaṃ, na tāva anupadadhammavipassanā vihitāti ^b^``sammasanārambhavidhāna''^eb^nti. vuttaṃ.

[03] 699^b^.^eb^ ekaccassa tikkhindriyassa mahāpaññassa nayavipassanāvaseneva udayabbayañāṇaṃ uppajjati, itarassa nuppajjati. taṃ sandhāya ^b^``yassa pana...pe0... na sampajjatī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. udayabbayañāṇuppatti hi idha nayavipassanāya sampajjananti adhippetaṃ. tena ``navahākārehi indriyāni tikkhāni bhavanti...pe0... antarā ca abbosānenā''ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ navannaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena indriyāni tikkhāni katvā sappāyāni sevamānena sammasitabbanti sambandho.

[01] ^b^tenā^eb^ti yoginā. ^b^navahākārehī^eb^ti vakkhamānehi navahi ākārehi. ^b^indriyānī^eb^ti saddhādīni indriyāni. ^b^tikkhānī^eb^ti tikhiṇāni visadāni sūrāni. ^b^uppannuppannāna^eb^nti khaṇe khaṇe uppannānaṃ uppannānaṃ. ^b^saṅkhārāna^eb^nti vipassiyamānānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ. ^b^khayamevā^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ uppādaṃ disvā taṃ muñcitvā khayameva bhaṅgameva passati. tassa tathākhayadassanapasutassa vipassanāpaññā tikkhā sūrā vahati, itarāni ca indriyāni. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti khayadassane. ^b^sakkaccakiriyāyā^eb^ti ādarakāritāya, yathā khayadassanaparameneva vipassanāñāṇaṃ pavattati, evaṃ taṃ ādarajāto sampādeti. ^b^sātaccakiriyāyā^eb^ti avicchedakiriyāya, yathā vipassanāñāṇaṃ khayadassanavasena nirantarameva pavattati, evaṃ yuttappayutto naṃ sampādeti. ^b^sappāyakiriyāyā^eb^ti anurūpakiriyāya āvāsādisattavidhasappāyāsevanakiriyāya ^a^V2.0374^ea^. ^b^nimittaggāhenā^eb^ti yathā manasikarontassa vipassanāsamādhi uppanno, tassa ākārassa sallakkhaṇavasena samathanimittaggahaṇena sampādetīti sambandho. ^b^anupavattanatāyā^eb^ti anurūpato pavattanena bhāvanācittassa līnabhāve pītivīriyadhammavicayasambojjhaṅgānaṃ uddhatabhāve passaddhisamādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgānaṃ brūhanenāti attho. ^b^kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhata^eb^nti attano kāye asucibhāvena bāhirakāviññāṇakakuṇape ^a^M2.0399^ea^ viya jīvite ahitāvahapaccatthike viya nirapekkhacittaṃ upaṭṭhapeti. ^b^tattha ca abhibhuyya nekkhammenā^eb^ti tasmiṃ kāyacitte anapekkhabhāvena indriyānaṃ tikkhabhāvāpādanena uppannaṃ uppannaṃ dukkhaṃ vīriyena abhibhavitvā bhāvanaṃ sampādeti. ^b^antarā^eb^ti yathādhippetāya bhāvanāsiddhiyā antarāva. ^b^abbosānenā^eb^ti asaṅkocanena.

[03] ^b^evaṃ vuttāna^eb^nti evaṃ ``navahākārehi indriyāni tikkhāni bhavantī''tiādinā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttānaṃ. ettha ca yathā nāma sukhumānaṃ muttāpavāḷādīnaṃ vijjhane sukhumatarena vedhanena bhavitabbaṃ, evameva saṇhasukhumānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ, paccayassa ca pariggaṇhane tikkhena ñāṇena bhavitabbaṃ. tesaṃ pana khayavayadassane tikkhatarena bhavitabbaṃ. tikkhataratā cassa nisānasilāyaṃ saṇhamaṭṭhatāya karaṇena viya pharasudhārāya nisitabhāvāpādanena indriyānaṃ tikkhabhāvāpādanena sādhetabbā. tañca yehi navahi ākārehi hoti, tesu khaṇikānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanākāradassanaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttaṃ ``uppannuppannānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khayameva passatī''ti. asati ñāṇassa tikkhatarabhāve tadabhāvato sesindriyatikkhatā tassa sambhārabhāvato vuttā, avinābhāvato vā. sakkaccakiriyādiggahaṇaṃ pana tassa upāyadassanaṃ. ^b^asappāyāni^eb^ bhojanādīni anupayujjanādivasena ^b^vajjetvā sappāyāni^eb^ mattaso ^b^sevamānena^eb^. rūpārūpadhammānaṃ accantavidhuratāya ekajjhaṃ asammasitabbattā, tathā sammasanassa ca idha anadhippetattā ^b^``kālena rūpaṃ sammasitabbaṃ, kālena arūpa''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. tatthāpi ca rūpassa oḷārikatāya suviññeyyattā paṭhamaṃ sammasitabbatā vuttā. ^b^nibbatti passitabbā^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ tāva āgamānusārato anumānavasena daṭṭhabbā. tato paraṃ anukkamena balappatte bhāvanāñāṇe paccakkhatopi dissatīti.

[03] 700^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbesa^eb^nti ^a^V2.0375^ea^ kāmāvacarādiaṇḍajādibhedabhinnānaṃ sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ. ^b^paṭhamaṃ kammato nibbattati^eb^ taṃmūlakattā utujādirūpānaṃ. parato pavattanakakāyadasakādivasena labbhamānaṃ pabandhattayaṃ, santatisīsaṃ vā sandhāya ^b^``tisantativasenā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] dandhaṃ ^a^M2.0400^ea^ mandaṃ cirena nirodho etassāti ^b^dandhanirodhaṃ^eb^ sattarasacittakkhaṇāyukattā. tenāha ^b^``garuparivattī''^eb^ti. ^b^tenā^eb^ti tasmā, yasmā ``tato sīghataraṃ kho, bhikkhave, āyusaṅkhārā khīyantī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 2.228) vacanato rūpadhammāpi ittarakālā eva, arūpadhammā pana tehi sātisayaṃ ittarakālā, tasmā āha bhagavāti attho. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vicāritameva. ^b^tehi sadisā^eb^ti cittassa uppādabhaṅgakkhaṇehi sadisā. sabbesampi hi saṅkhārānaṃ uppādabhaṅgakkhaṇesu visadisatā natthi, samānakālāva te. ^b^ṭhānappatta^eb^nti ṭhitikkhaṇappattaṃ. ^b^tenā^eb^ti dutiyabhavaṅgacittena. vatthurūpaṃ ekassa cittassa nissayo hutvā aññassa na hoti ṭhapetvā maraṇāsannaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``tena saddhi''^eb^ntiādi.

[03] evaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya yāva cuticittassa uppatti, taṃ dassetvā idāni nirodhaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``paṭisandhicittassā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^ṭhānakkhaṇe^eb^ti paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇe. ^b^yāva pavatti nāma atthī^eb^ti yāva saṃsārappavatti nāma atthi, yāva vā cittassa pavatti nāma atthi. asaññūpapattiyañhi natthi cittappavattīti. rūpūpapattiyaṃ saṃsedajā opapātikasadisāti opapātikānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ. ^b^opapātikānampī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena vā saṃsedaje sampiṇḍeti. ^b^sattasantativasenā^eb^ti cakkhudasakādīnaṃ sattannaṃ santatisīsānaṃ vasena.

[03] 701^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatthā^eb^ti kammato rūpapavattiyaṃ. nānākkhaṇikakammapaccayabhūtaṃyeva idha kammanti adhippetanti āha ^b^``kammaṃ nāma kusalākusalacetanā''^eb^ti. jīvitanavakaṃ cakkhudasakādiantogadhameva katvā ^b^``samasattatirūpa''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. taṃ vā cakkhudasakādi viya sukhapariggahaṃ na hotīti. ^b^tadevā^eb^ti yathāvuttaṃ vipākakkhandhakaṭattārūpamāha. kammañhi kammajassa janakaṃ, paripācakampi hoti jīvitindriyassa, kammajaggino ca vasena anurakkhaṇasabbhāvato, āhārādipaṭilābhahetutāya upatthambhakanimittato ca. tenāha ^b^``upatthambhakapaccayopi hotī''^eb^ti. upatthambhakapaccayatā ^a^V2.0376^ea^ cassa upanissayapaccayavaseneva veditabbā. kammaṃ paccayo etassāti kammapaccayaṃ, tadeva cittaṃ, taṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ etassāti ^b^kammapaccayacittasamuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. vipākacetasikānampi kammapaccayacittasamuṭṭhānatā vattabbā, na vā vattabbā kammasamuṭṭhānakammapaccayaggahaṇena gahitattā. ^b^ṭhānappattā ojā aññaṃ ojaṭṭhamakaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti^eb^ āhārānugate sarīreti gahetabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^tatrāpī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0401^ea^ kammasamuṭṭhānāhārasamuṭṭhānepi ojaṭṭhamake. ^b^catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭetī^eb^ti sadisasantativasena catasso vā pañca vā rūpakalāpappavattiyo santāneti. bāhirapaccayavisesena pana visadisā bahūpi pavattiyo ghaṭetīti vadanti. yathā kammapaccayāhārasamuṭṭhāne paveṇighaṭanā, evaṃ kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānepīti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ nāmā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ettha ca yathā tattha tattha koṭṭhāse paramparappavattiṃ dassentena akammajā dutiyādipavattiyo asambhedena dassitā, evaṃ kammajāhārasamuṭṭhānautuvasena, kammajautusamuṭṭhānāhāravasena, kammapaccayacittajāhārautusamuṭṭhānautuāhāravasena ca sambhedavasenāpi rūpappavatti dassetabbāti vadanti. tattha kammajato pavattāahārā visesapaccayalābhe sati yathāvuttaparimāṇāhi pavattīhi uddhampi pavattiyo na ghaṭentīti na sakkā vattuṃ. tathā hi ``dasa dvādasa vāre pavattiṃ ghaṭetī''ti (visuddhi0 2.703), ``evaṃ dīghampi addhānaṃ anupādinnapakkhe ṭhatvāpi utusamuṭṭhānaṃ pavattati evā''ti (visuddhi0 2.704) ca vakkhati.

[03] 702^b^.^eb^ ^b^janakājanakā matā^eb^ti purimakā tikoṭṭhāsasaṅgahitā janakā, pacchimakoṭṭhāsikā ``soḷasā''ti vuttā ajanakāti matā ñātā. ^b^kusalakiriyato^eb^ti kusalato ca kiriyato ca. iriyāya kāyikakiriyāya pavattiṭṭhānatāya pathabhāvato ^b^iriyāpatho,^eb^ gamanādi, atthato tadavatthā rūpappavatti. kāmañcettha rūpavinimutto iriyāpatho, viññatti ca natthi, tathāpi na sabbaṃ rūpasamuṭṭhāpakacittaṃ iriyāpathūpatthambhakaṃ, viññattivikāruppādakañca hoti. yaṃ pana cittaṃ viññattijanakaṃ, taṃ ekaṃsato itarassa janakaṃ avinābhāvato, tathā iriyāpathūpatthambhakaṃ rūpassa. etassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ ^b^``rūpaṃ, iriyāpathaṃ, viññattiñcā''^eb^ti samuccayo kato. ^b^vipākavajjānī^eb^ti ettha vipākābhiññādvayavajjānīti vattabbaṃ tadaññesaṃyeva sesaggahaṇena gahetabbattā. na vā vattabbaṃ sesaggahaṇeneva abhiññācittānampi nivattetabbato. ^b^na viññattiṃ janaya^eb^nti ^a^V2.0377^ea^ mahaggatakusalādīnaṃ santabhāvena avipphārikabhāvato. vipphārikameva hi kāmāvacarakusalādiviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, iriyāpathūpatthambhakāni pana honti satipi santabhāve jhānavegena saussāhattā, yato tesaṃ javanakiccatā. pañca bhavaṅgacittānīti ^a^M2.0402^ea^ sambandho. ^b^rūpameva janayanti, na iriyāpathaṃ^eb^ nirussāhasantabhāvena paridubbalabhāvato. kiriyāmayacittehi avimissabhavaṅgappavattikāle khandhādisarīrāvayavānaṃ niccalabhāvenāvaṭṭhānaṃ. tathā hi abbokiṇṇe bhavaṅge pavattamāne aṅgāni osīdanti paviṭṭhāni viya honti. ``dvattiṃsā''ti pana ādinā vuttesu jāgaraṇacittesu vattamānesu aṅgāni upatthaddhāni yathāpavattairiyāpathabhāveneva pavattantīti. ^b^dvepañcaviññāṇāni^eb^ sabbadubbalatāya rūpaṃ na janenti. ^b^paṭisandhicittaṃ^eb^ vatthudubbalatāya. ^b^khīṇāsavānaṃ cuticitta^eb^nti ettha --

[02] ``kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati, rūpāvacare arūpāvacare pacchimabhavikānaṃ, ye ca rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ upapajjitvā parinibbāyissanti, tesaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ vacīsaṅkhāro nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhissatī''ti (yama0 2.saṅkhārayamaka.88) --

[25] pana vacanato aññesampi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti viññāyati. na hi rūpasamuṭṭhāpakacittassa gabbhagatatādivibandhābhāve kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpane kāraṇaṃ atthi, na ca yuttaṃ cuto ca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpañcassa pavattati, nāpi ``cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpetī''ti pāḷi atthi, ``khīṇāsavāna''nti, pana visesanaṃ appaṭisandhikanirodhena nirujjhantassa tesaṃ cuticittassa rūpasamuṭṭhāpanaṃ pākaṭanti katvā katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^soḷasa cittānī^eb^ti paricchijja gahaṇaṃ tesaṃ rūpajanane ekaṃsato niyametabbattā, aññāni pana bahūni arūpe uppannāni anokāsagatattā rūpaṃ na janentiyeva. na ṭhitikkhaṇe, bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā rūpaṃ janentīti sambandho. ^b^uppādakkhaṇe pana balavaṃ^eb^ anantarādipaccayalābhato.

[03] yathā pathavīādayo rūpadhammā cittahetukā cittasamuṭṭhānā, evaṃ vedanādayopīti vuttaṃ ^b^``cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma tayo arūpino khandhā, saddanavaka''^eb^ntiādi. tenevāha -- ``katame dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānā? vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho kāyaviññatti vacīviññattī''ti (dha0 sa0 1201, 1535). tattha ^a^V2.0378^ea^ kāyaviññattiādīnaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānatā pariyāyato vuttāti veditabbā tesaṃ anipphannattā. ^b^``evaṃ vuttaṃ catusamuṭṭhānarūpa''^eb^nti iminā ataṃsamuṭṭhānasseva cittajarūpassa cittapaccayatā dassitā. yathā pana kammapaccayaṃ dassitaṃ ^a^M2.0403^ea^, evaṃ cittapaccaye gayhamāne taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa, sahajātavedanādīnañca cittapaccayatā siyā. cittasamuṭṭhānacittapaccaye pana asaṅkarato dassetuṃ pacchājātapaccayavaseneva cittapaccayaṃ uddhaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. cittasamuṭṭhānautuāhārehi kammasamuṭṭhānautuāhārā balavanto hontīti tesaṃ vasena catupañcapavattighaṭanaṃ vuttaṃ, cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ pana vasena dvattippavattighaṭanaṃ taṃpākatikacittavasena, mahaggatānuttaracittavasena pana bahutarāpi pavattiyo icchitabbā. taṃnibbattānaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ uḷārapaṇītabhāvato.

[03] 703^b^.^eb^ ^b^``upādinnaṃ kammajarūpaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā''^eb^ti etena bahiddhā anupādinnaojā rūpāharaṇakiccaṃ na karotīti dasseti. paccayalābho cassa kammajabhūtasannissayatāvasenāti āha ^b^``tattha patiṭṭhāyā''^eb^ti. tattha kammapaccayacittasamuṭṭhānādirūpassapi kammamūlakattā siyā kammajapariyāyoti taṃnivattanatthaṃ ``upādinna''nti visesetvā vuttaṃ. āhārapaccayassa āhāro na kevalaṃ upatthambhakova, atha kho janakopīti dassetuṃ ^b^``catusamuṭṭhānarūpa''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ``dasa dvādasa vāre''ti vatvā kathaṃ imasseva dasa dvādasa vāre pavattighaṭanāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``ekadivasaṃ paribhuttāhāro''^eb^tiādi. ^b^dārakassa sarīraṃ pharitvā^eb^ti nābhimūlānugatāhi rasaharaṇīhi pharitvā, aññathā jalābuantarike kāye makkhanāvasena na sammāviniyogo āhārassa sambhavatīti.

[03] upādinnako anupādinnakoti duvidhe āhāre pubbe anupādinnako āhārapaccayāahāro dassitoti itaraṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``kammajāhāro''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. taṃ kammapaccayāhārasamuṭṭhāne vuttanayameva. tenāha ^b^``catasso vā pañca vā pavattiyo ghaṭetī''^eb^ti. āhārapaccayautunopi utupaccayāhārassa viya dasa dvādasa vāre pavattighaṭanā veditabbā. vuttanayattā na uddhatanti vadanti. ^b^sesāna^eb^nti kammacittautusamuṭṭhānānaṃ tisantatirūpānaṃ. kabaḷīkārāhāro hi aññāhārasamuṭṭhitassa, tisantatirūpānañca upatthambhakavasena attanā uppāditassa janako hutvā paccayo hoti. evaṃ āhārapaccayo hontoyeva atthiavigatavasenāpi paccayo hoti, nissayabhāvo pana paṭṭhānanayena natthi. āhārapaccayā pavattamānāni rūpāni āhāranissayāni ^a^M2.0404^ea^ ^a^V2.0379^ea^ nāma hontīti suttantanayena vuttoti daṭṭhabbo. parato utuno nissayajotanāyapi eseva nayo.

[03] 704^b^.^eb^ kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena catubbidhāyapi tejodhātuyā rūpuppādane samatthabhāvato ^b^``utu nāma catusamuṭṭhānā tejodhātū''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^esa duvidho hotī^eb^ti esa utu tejodhātubhāvāvisesepi tikkhamandatāvisesena uṇho, sītoti duvidho hoti. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vicāritameva. yadipi utu upādinnakena vināpi rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, indriyabaddhe pana tena vinā tassa rūpuppādanaṃ natthīti āha ^b^``upādinnakaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā''^eb^ti. tenāha ``catusamuṭṭhāno utū''ti. utusamuṭṭhānoyeva hi utu upādinnakena vinā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. ^b^utupaccayaṃ^eb^ nāma catusamuṭṭhānikaṃ rūpaṃ. yañhi utusamuṭṭhānaṃ pannarasavidhaṃ rūpaṃ, yañca tadaññatisantatirūpaṃ, tassa sabbassapi sabhāgo utūpatthambhakapaccayo hotīti. yasmā visabhāgo utu himādi viya padumādīnaṃ visadisarūpuppattihetubhūtaṃ purimarūpaṃ vināsentaṃ viya hoti, tasmā sabhāgaṃ, visabhāgañca ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ ^b^``utu catusamuṭṭhānikarūpānaṃ pavattiyā ca vināsassa ca paccayo hotī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^dīghampi addhāna^eb^nti ``dasa dvādasa vāre''ti aññassa vuttaparicchedato dīghampi kālaṃ. utu hi sabhāgasantativasena laddhapaccayaṃ ciratarampi kālaṃ sadisākāraṃ rūpappavattiṃ santāneti upādinnakasannissayena vinā, pageva itarathā. tenāha ^b^``anupādinnapakkhe ṭhatvāpī''^eb^ti, maṃsavinimuttakesalomanakhacammakhilatilakādivasena jīvamānasarīre aññattha matakaḷevarādivasenāti adhippāyo. rūpassa nibbattiyā diṭṭhāya tassa bhaṅgopi diṭṭhoyeva hoti ittarakālattā dhammappavattiyāti āha ^b^``nibbattiṃ passanto kālena rūpaṃ sammasati nāmā''^eb^ti. na hi nibbattimattadassanaṃ sammasanaṃ nāma hoti, udayabbayadassanañca adhikatanti. esa nayo ito paresupi nibbattiggahaṇesu.
[03] 705^b^.^eb^ ^b^lokiyacittuppādavasenevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ itarassa avisayattā.

[03] ^b^nibbattati^eb^ ^a^M2.0405^ea^ ^a^V2.0380^ea^ taṃtaṃbhavavasena. tadeva ekūnavīsatippabhedaṃ cittaṃ bhavaṅgavasena nibbattatīti sambandho. tathā ^b^cutivasena tadārammaṇavasenā^eb^ti etthāpi. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tesu ekūnavīsaticittuppādesu. ^b^anantaracittato paṭṭhāyā^eb^tiādināpi pavattiyeva vuttā.

[03] so pana paṭisandhicittānaṃyeva pavattiyaṃ pavattanākāroti suddhappavatticittānaṃ uppattiṃ dassento ^b^``pavatte panā''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^asambhinnattā^eb^ti avinaṭṭhattā. ``asambhinnattā cakkhussā''tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^``cakkhupasādassa hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^``ṭhitippattamevā''^eb^ti iminā yathā nirujjhamānaṃ rūpaṃ kassaci paccayo na hoti, evaṃ uppajjamānampīti dasseti. cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjatīti sambandho. evaṃ sesesupi. kāmāvacarakusalākusalakiriyacittesu ekaṃ vā pañca, satta vā javanāni hutvā uppajjatīti sambandho. upekkhāsahagatāhetukaṃ cittaṃ vāti vā-saddaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. voṭṭhabbanañhi sandhāya evaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ pana dutiyamoghavāravasena veditabbaṃ. ^b^pañca javanāni^eb^ suttamucchitādikāle, ^b^satta^eb^ pākatikakāle veditabbāni. ^b^javanārammaṇānurūpa^eb^nti ``tihetukaṃ ce javanaṃ, tihetukaṃ, dvihetukaṃ vā''tiādinā, ``iṭṭhaṃ ce ārammaṇaṃ, somanassasahagata''ntiādinā ca javanassa, ārammaṇassa ca anurūpaṃ. ^b^sesadvāresū^eb^ti sotadvārādisesadvāresu.
[03] ^b^anukkamenā^eb^ti udayabbayañāṇādhigamānukkamena ^b^paññābhāvanaṃ sampādeti^eb^ arahattaṃ adhigacchati.

[03] 706^b^.^eb^ rūpesu manasikārasattakaṃ ^b^rūpasattakaṃ,^eb^ rūpadhammesu sattahākārehi manasi kārotīti attho. evaṃ arūpasattakampi veditabbaṃ. ^b^imehi ākārehī^eb^ti imehi ādānanikkhepanamanasikārādippakārehi, imehi vā yathāvuttakoṭṭhāsehi. ^b^āropetvā^eb^ti tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā.

[03] ^b^ādānanikkhepanato^eb^ti bhavassa gahaṇavissajjanato, jātito, maraṇato cāti attho. ^b^vayovuḍḍhatthagāmito^eb^ti vayasā vuḍḍhassa atthagāmibhāvato, atthaṅgamato icceva attho. ^b^āhārato^eb^ti āhārahetu ^a^M2.0406^ea^ ^a^V2.0381^ea^, rūpassa paccayabhūtāahāratoti attho. ayalohādibhūmipāsāṇādibhedaṃ vividhavaṇṇasaṇṭhānaṃ kammānapekkhaṃ sabhāvasiddhaṃ rūpaṃ ^b^dhammatārūpaṃ. sattā^eb^ti sattadhā sattahākārehi. ^b^vipassatī^eb^ti taṃ taṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā vipassati sammasati.

[03] ``bhārādānaṃ dukhaṃ loke''ti vacanato khandhabhārassa ādito gahaṇanti katvā ^b^``ādānanti paṭisandhī''^eb^ti āha. ``sabbeva nikkhipissanti, bhūtā loke samussaya''nti (dī0 ni0 2.220; saṃ0 ni0 1.186) pana vacanato khandhabhāranikkhepoti katvā ^b^``nikkhepananti cutī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ``yo ciraṃ jīvati, so vassasata''nti (dī0 ni0 2.7; saṃ0 ni0 1.145-146; a0 ni0 7.74) vacanato tato ūnādhikabhāvo appamāṇanti vuttaṃ ^b^``ekaṃ vassasataṃ paricchinditvā''^eb^ti. ^b^etthantare sabbe saṅkhārā^eb^ti etasmiṃ ādānanikkhepantare pavattā sabbe bhūtupādāyarūpappabhedā saṅkhārā. rūpadhammesu hi idaṃ sammasanavidhānanti. ``aniccā''ti gahitamattaṃ yuttito hadaye patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ ^b^``kasmā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^uppādavayavattito^eb^ti uppajjanavasena, nirujjhanavasena ca pavattanato, ahutvā sambhavato hutvā vayūpagamanatoti attho. ^b^vipariṇāmato^eb^ti santānassa purimuttaravisadisabhāvatoti vadanti. taṃ vassasataparicchinne rūpe idaṃ sammasananti adhippāyeneva vuttaṃ siyā, jarāmaraṇena vipariṇāmetabbatoti attho. asatipi dhammabhede avatthābhedo icchitabbo. na hi uppādāvatthā eva bhaṅgāvatthāti yuttā. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``jarāya ceva maraṇena cāti dvedhā pariṇāmapakatitāyā''ti. sabhāvavigamo eva vā ettha vipariṇāmo. khaṇikatā ^b^tāvakālikatā^eb^. niccasabhāvābhāvo eva ^b^niccapaṭikkhepo^eb^. aniccadhammā hi teneva attano sabhāvena jānantānaṃ niccataṃ paṭikkhipanti nāma. yato na niccanti aniccaṃ, uppādakkhaṇe yadavatthā saṅkhārā, na tadavatthā ṭhitikkhaṇeti avatthantarappattiyā ñāyati tesaṃ kilamanākāroti āha ^b^``ṭhitiyaṃ jarāya kilamantī''^eb^ti, svāyamattho pākaṭajarāya veditabbo. ye pana saṅkhārānaṃ ṭhitiṃ na sampaṭicchanti, tattha vattabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. dhammānaṃ sabhāvo nāma duratikkamo jarānantaraṃ bhaṅgoti āha ^b^``jaraṃ patvā avassaṃ bhijjantī''^eb^ti. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti yasmā uppādajarābhaṅgavasena ^a^M2.0407^ea^ saṅkhārānaṃ nirantarabādhatā, tato ca nesaṃ dussahatāya dukkhamatā, tissannaṃ dukkhatānaṃ, saṃsāradukkhassa ca adhiṭṭhānatāya dukkhavatthutā, tasmā. abhiṇha...pe0... dukkhāti yojanā.

[03] ^b^``sukhapaṭikkhepato''^eb^ti ^a^V2.0382^ea^ idaṃ vuttanayameva. ^b^ṭhitiṃ mā pāpuṇantu,^eb^ uppajjamānākāreneva pavattantūti adhippāyo. ^b^``uppannā''^eb^ti iminā uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgitā vuttā. ^b^ṭhānappattā mā jīrantū^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu atthato ṭhiti eva jarāti? saccametaṃ, jarāvasena pana yo kilamatho, so idha jarāggahaṇena gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^mā bhijjantū^eb^ti niccataṃ āsīsati. kassaci dhammissarassāpi bhagavato vasavattibhāvo natthi. na hi lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ kenaci kātuṃ sakkā. bhāvaññathattameva hi iddhivisayo. ^b^suññā^eb^ saṅkhārā ^b^tena^eb^ tīsu ṭhānesu ^b^vasavattanākārena. tasmā^eb^ti vuttakāraṇaparāmasanaṃ. ^b^suññato^eb^ti nivāsīkārakavedakādhiṭṭhāyakavirahena tato suññato, na nissabhāvatoti ekaccaparikappitasabhāvasuññato. ^b^assāmikato^eb^ti sāmibhūtassa kassaci abhāvato. etena anattaniyataṃ dasseti. ^b^avasavattito^eb^ti yathāvuttavasavattibhāvābhāvato. ^b^attapaṭikkhepato^eb^ti paraparikappitassa attano paṭikkhipanato. ``suññato''tiādinā hi dhammānaṃ bāhirakaparikappitāttaviraho vutto, iminā pana ataṃsabhāvato attā na hotīti.

[03] 707^b^.^eb^ ettha ca ``uppādavayavattito''tiādinā catūhi kāraṇehi aniccā, ``abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanato''tiādinā catūhi kāraṇehi dukkhā, ``suññato''tiādinā catūhi kāraṇehi anattāti rūpadhamme niruḷhaṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ pubbe attanā asallakkhitaṃ sallakkhetvā sammasanto taṃ tattha āropetīti vuccati. tathā panānena ādānanikkhepanavasena sammasitattā āha ^b^``rūpe tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā''^eb^ti.

[03] tattha ca yasmā aniccalakkhaṇaggahaṇapubbakaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇaggahaṇaṃ, dukkhalakkhaṇaggahaṇapubbakaṃ vā anattalakkhaṇaggahaṇaṃ. aniccalakkhaṇañcettha rūpabhedena dassiyamānaṃ yathoḷārikato dīpetabbanti taṃ vassasataparicchedena paṭhamaṃ dassentena vassasataṃ ṭhitassa ``dasa vā vīsati vā''tiādinā ^a^M2.0408^ea^ vibhajitvā anukkamena yāvauddharaṇādikoṭṭhāsavasena rūpassa bhaṅgaṃ disvā tato ``aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā''ti tilakkhaṇāropanaṃ vayovuḍḍhatthaṅgamato sammasananti dassetuṃ ^b^``tameva vassasata''^eb^ntiādinā vayavasena rūpassa sammasanavidhi āraddho. tattha yasmā oḷārikavasenevāyaṃ ādito rūpabhedo gayhati, tasmā na vassasataṃ samakoṭṭhāsavasena vibhattaṃ, majjhimāvatthāya vā tathārūpattā majjhimavaye ekaṃ vassaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ.
[03] 708^b^.^eb^ mandatābāhullena ^a^V2.0383^ea^ pavattaṃ vassānaṃ dasakaṃ ^b^mandadasakaṃ^eb^. esa nayo sesesupi.

[03] ^b^tadā^eb^ti paṭhame vassadasake. ^b^so^eb^ti puggalo. ^b^capalo^eb^ti anavaṭṭhitakiriyatāya taralo. tena momūhabhāvato viseseti. na hesa navamadasake viya momūhabhāvena mando, atha kho capalatāyāti. tenāha ^b^``kumārako''^eb^ti. tatiye dasake maṃsapāripūriyā yathārahaṃ chavivaṇṇo vippasīdatīti āha ^b^``vaṇṇāyatanaṃ vepullaṃ pāpuṇātī''^eb^ti. catutthe dasake aṭṭhīnaṃ, nhārūnañca thirabhāvappattiyā ^b^balañca thāmo ca vepullaṃ pāpuṇāti^eb^. pañcame dasake yobbanamadassa dūrībhāvena yebhuyyena kilesatanutāya paññā yathārahaṃ suvisadā hoti. khiḍḍāya rati ^b^khiḍḍārati^eb^. kapallikādinissayavisesena padīpassa suddhatādi viya nissayavisesena pañcamachaṭṭhadasakesu paññāya buddhihāniyo veditabbā. ^b^purato pabbhāro hoti^eb^ kaṭisandhigīvāsandhīnaṃ vasena rassassāpi, pageva dīghassa. ^b^pabbhāro^eb^ti ca garubhāvena palambako. ^b^momūho hoti^eb^ satipaññāvippavāsato. ^b^sayanabahulova hoti^eb^ ṭhānādivasena sarīrabhāraṃ vahituṃ asakkonto.
[03] 709^b^.^eb^ ^b^tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vassāna^eb^nti yebhuyyatāya vuttaṃ. catuvassikopi hi eko koṭṭhāso hotīti. dvisataṃ koṭṭhāse katvā ekekāyanavasenātipi veditabbaṃ.
[03] vassāne pavattarūpanti sambandho.

[03] taṃ ^a^M2.0409^ea^ pana vassānaṃ dvidhā samattaṃ, na pubbe viya catumāsanti āha ^b^``dvemāsa''^eb^nti. accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. so pana ^b^vassāno^eb^ utu sāvaṇapoṭṭhapādamāsā, assayujakattikamāsā ^b^sarado,^eb^ migasiraphussamāsā ^b^hemanto,^eb^ māghaphaggunamāsā ^b^sisiro,^eb^ cittavesākhamāsā ^b^vasanto,^eb^ jeṭṭhāsaḷhamāsā ^b^gimho^eb^ utūti veditabbo. ^b^cha koṭṭhāse katvā^eb^ti dasadasanāṭikāvasena cha koṭṭhāse katvā.

[03] 710^b^.^eb^ abhimukhaṃ purato kamanaṃ ^b^abhikkamo^eb^. paṭinivattanavasena kamanaṃ ^b^paṭikkamo^eb^. āmukhaṃ lokanaṃ ^b^ālokanaṃ^eb^. vividhaṃ ito cito ca lokanaṃ ^b^vilokanaṃ^eb^. hatthapādānaṃ saṅkucanaṃ ^b^samiñjanaṃ^eb^. āyamanaṃ ^b^pasāraṇaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^pāduddharaṇakāle^eb^ti ^a^V2.0384^ea^ dutiyapāduddharaṇakāle. ^b^pādassā^eb^ti uddhaṭapādassa. ^b^omattā^eb^ti sattito hīnappamāṇā. tenāha ^b^``mandā''^eb^ti. ^b^itarā^eb^ti tejovāyodhātuyo. yathā pādassa uddharaṇaṃ sijjhati, tathā pavattacittasamuṭṭhānarūpesu ekaṃsato tejovāyodhātūnaṃ adhimattatā icchitabbā sallahukasabhāvatāya tāsaṃ. tato eva ca itarāsaṃ omattatā garusabhāvattā. taṃsambandhattā pana sesaṃ tisamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ taggatikameva hoti. kāyavacīviññattipavattiyaṃ vāyopathavīadhimattatā imassa atthassa nidassananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. purato haraṇe, pacchato haraṇe ca uddharaṇe viya sallahukasabhāvarūpappavattīti tāsaṃyeva dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ adhimattatā icchitabbāti āha ^b^``tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesū''^eb^ti. yathā uddharaṇādīsu sallahukasabhāvattā pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ kiccaṃ adhikaṃ hoti, itarāsaṃ hīnaṃ, evaṃ vossajjanādīsu tīsu garusabhāvattā purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ kiccaṃ adhikaṃ hoti, itarāsaṃ hīnanti dassento āha ^b^``vossajjane''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ^b^tadupādāyarūpānī^eb^ti tā dhātuyo nissāya pavattaupādārūpāni. ^b^etthevā^eb^ti uddharaṇeyeva. tenāha ^b^``atiharaṇaṃ appatvā''^eb^ti. ^b^itī^eb^ti evaṃ. ^b^tattha tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ uddharaṇādikoṭṭhāse. ^b^pabbaṃ^eb^ ^b^pabba^eb^ntiādi ^a^M2.0410^ea^ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ koṭṭhāsantarasaṅkarābhāvadassanaṃ. ^b^taṭataṭāyantā^eb^ti taṭataṭāyanti viya, tena nesaṃ pavattikkhaṇassa ittarataṃ dasseti.

[03] 711^b^.^eb^ ^b^assā^eb^ti sammasanassa. ^b^dārutiṇukkādīsū^eb^ti dārūkkātiṇukkādīsu. ``kiṃ andhabāla ekaghanaṃ satataṃ sabbadābhāviṃ ekanti maññasī''ti adhippāyenāha ^b^``kimettha manāpa''^eb^nti. ^b^idampī^eb^ti yadidaṃ telavaṭṭikkhayena padīpassa apaññāyanaṃ vuttaṃ, idampi. ^b^aṅgulaṅgulantare^eb^ti aṅguliyā mitaṃ aṅgulanti aṅgulappamāṇe padeseti attho. tantuno avayavalesabhūtaṃ paramasukhumabhāvappattaṃ aṃsuṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``aṃsuṃ pana muñcitvā''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^tatthā^eb^tiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. tattha kāmaṃ upameyye viya upamāyaṃ pākaṭo kālabhedo natthi, ekakoṭṭhāsagataṃ pana koṭṭhāsantaraṃ na pāpuṇātīti ettāvatā upamābhāvo veditabbo. upamāyampi vā tāva yāvāti kālassa bhedamattā labbhatevāti tassā gahaṇe kālabhedavasenāpi upamā yojetabbā.

[03] 712^b^.^eb^ pubbe ādānanikkhepādivasena catusantatirūpaṃ saṅgharitvā dassitaṃ, idāni āhārasamuṭṭhānādivasena ^a^V2.0385^ea^ bhinditvā dassento ^b^``tadeva rūpaṃ visaṅkharitvā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^visaṅkharitvā^eb^ vibhajitvā. ``visaṅgharitvā''ti vā pāṭho, ayamevattho. ^b^āhāramaya^eb^nti āhārena nibbattaṃ. ^b^jhatta^eb^nti milātaṃ. ^b^kilanta^eb^nti khinnaṃ. ^b^dhāta^eb^nti tittaṃ. ^b^pīṇita^eb^nti maṃsūpacayasampattiyā pīṇitaṃ. tato eva ^b^mudu. siniddha^eb^nti siniddhacchavitāya saṇhaṃ. tato eva ^b^phassavantaṃ^eb^.
[03] 713^b^.^eb^ ^b^uṇhakāle samuṭṭhitaṃ rūpa^eb^nti uṇhasantāpena santattaṃ rūpaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^sītautunā^eb^ti sappāyena sītautunā.

[03] 714^b^.^eb^ ^b^āyatanadvāravasenā^eb^ti āyatanasaṅkhātadvāravasena. kammadvāranivattanatthaṃ āyatanaggahaṇaṃ. ^b^kāyadvāre^eb^ti pasādakāyadvāre. ^b^manodvāraṃ^eb^ nāma sāvajjanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ. tassa nissayabhāvato hadayavatthuṃ sandhāya nissitavohārena ^b^``manodvāre''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, yattha manodvāruppatti.
[03] 715^b^.^eb^ ^b^somanassitadomanassitavasenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0411^ea^ somanassitadomanassitapuggalavasena, somanassitadomanassitakālavasena vā.
[03] ^b^ayamattho^eb^ti ayaṃ idāni vuccamāno saṅkhārānaṃ atīttarakhaṇatāsaṅkhāto attho.

[03] ^b^jīvita^eb^nti jīvitindriyaṃ. ^b^sukhadukkhā^eb^ti sukhadukkhavedanā. upekkhāpi hi sukhadukkhāsu eva antogadhā iṭṭhāniṭṭhabhāvato. ^b^attabhāvo^eb^ti jīvitavedanāviññāṇāni ṭhapetvā avasiṭṭhadhammā vuttā. saññāti keci. ^b^kevalā^eb^ti attanā niccabhāvena vā avomissā. ^b^ekacittasamāyuttā^eb^ti ekekena cittena sahitā. ^b^lahuso vattate khaṇo^eb^ti vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇikatāya lahuko atīttaro jīvitādīnaṃ khaṇo vattati.

[03] ^b^cullāsītisahassāni kappa^eb^nti caturāsītisahassaparimāṇaṃ kappaṃ, accantasaṃyoge etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^kappa^eb^nti ca sāmaññavasena ekavacanaṃ. ^b^marū^eb^ti devā. ^b^dvīhi cittehi samohitā^eb^ti evaṃ cirajīvinopi te dvīhi cittehi sahitā hutvā na tiṭṭhanti. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ^a^V2.0386^ea^ -- tesampi santāne jīvitādīni dvīhi cittehi saha na tiṭṭhanti, ekena cittena saha uppannāni teneva saha nirujjhanato yāva dutiyā na tiṭṭhantīti.

[03] ^b^ye niruddhā marantassā^eb^ti cavantassa sattassa cuticittena saddhiṃ niruddhāti vattabbā ye khandhā. ^b^tiṭṭhamānassa vā idhā^eb^ti ye vā idha pavattiyaṃ tiṭṭhantassa dharantassa bhaṅgappattiyā niruddhakkhandhā. ^b^sabbe^eb^pi ^b^sadisā^eb^ te sabbepi ekasadisā atthaṅgatā ^b^appaṭisandhikā^eb^ puna āgantvā paṭisandhānābhāvena vigatā. yathā hi cutikkhandhā na nibbattanti, evaṃ tato pubbepi khandhā. tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitanti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^anantarā ca ye bhaggā^eb^ti ye saṅkhārā anantarameva bhaggā niruddhā. ^b^ye ca bhaggā anāgate^eb^ti ye ca saṅkhārā anāgate bhaggā bhañjanasīlā bhijjissanti. ^b^tadantarā niruddhāna^eb^nti tesaṃ atītānāgatānaṃ antarā vemajjhe paccuppannataṃ patvā niruddhānaṃ bhaggānaṃ. ^b^vesamaṃ natthi lakkhaṇe^eb^ti tesaṃ tividhānampi bhaṅgalakkhaṇanimittaṃ visamatā visadisatā natthi.

[03] ^b^anibbattena^eb^ ^a^M2.0412^ea^ ^b^na jāto^eb^ti anuppannena cittena jāto na hoti, ajāto nāma hoti. ^b^paccuppannena^eb^ vattamānena cittena ^b^jīvati^eb^ jīvamāno nāma hoti. ^b^cittabhaṅgā mato loko^eb^ti cuticittassa viya sabbassapi tassa tassa cittassa bhaṅgappattiyā ayaṃ loko paramatthato mato nāma hoti niruddhassa appaṭisandhikattā. evaṃ santepi ^b^paññatti paramatthiyā^eb^ yāyaṃ taṃ taṃ santaṃ sanissayaṃ cittaṃ upādāya ``tisso jīvati, phusso jīvatī''ti evaṃ vacanappavattiyā visayabhūtā santānapaññatti, sā ettha paramatthiyā paramatthabhūtā. tathā hi vadanti ``nāmagottaṃ na jīratī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.76).

[03] ^b^anidhānagatā bhaggā^eb^ti ye bhaggā, na te katthaci nidhānaṃ gatā, atha kho abhāvameva gatā. ^b^puñjo natthi anāgate^eb^ yato āgaccheyyuṃ vattamānabhāvaṃ. ^b^nibbattā yepī^eb^ti ye paṭiladdhattabhāvā paccuppannā, tepi ^b^āragge sāsapūpamā tiṭṭhanti^eb^. yathā nāma sūciyaṃ ṭhitāyaṃ sāsapo khitto tassā sikhaṃ phuṭṭhamatto vigacchati na tiṭṭhati, evaṃ saṅkhārā uppajjitvā bhijjanti, na tesaṃ avaṭṭhānaṃ atthīti.
[03] ^b^bhaṅgo^eb^ ^a^V2.0387^ea^ ^b^nesaṃ purakkhato^eb^ti tesaṃ nibbattadhammānaṃ bhaṅgo nāma purato eva kato, ekaṃsabhāvī na apasakkatīti attho. ^b^purāṇehī^eb^ti purimakehi atītehi.

[03] ^b^adassanato^eb^ti apassitabbato. ^b^āyantī^eb^ti āgacchanti. ^b^``uppajjantī''^eb^ti imināpi kutoci rāsito āgamanābhāvamevāha. ^b^bhaggā gacchantudassana^eb^nti bhaggāpi katthaci upagamanābhāvato sabbena sabbaṃ adassanaṃ abhāvameva gacchanti. tattha nidassanamāha ^b^``vijjuppādo...pe0... vayanti cā''^eb^ti.

[03] 716^b^.^eb^ ^b^``vivaṭṭakappato paṭṭhāya uppajjanakarūpa''^eb^nti iminā sayameva uppajjanakadhammatāya ^b^``dhammatārūpa''^eb^nti anvatthanāmataṃ dasseti. ayalohādīsu ^b^ayo^eb^ nāma kāḷalohaṃ. ^b^lohaṃ^eb^ nāma jātilohaṃ vijātilohaṃ kittimalohaṃ pisācalohanti catubbidhaṃ. tattha ayo rajataṃ suvaṇṇaṃ tipu sīsaṃ tambalohaṃ vekantakalohanti imāni satta ^b^jātilohāni^eb^. nāganāsikalohaṃ ^b^vijātilohaṃ^eb^. kaṃsalohaṃ vaṭṭalohaṃ ^a^M2.0413^ea^ hārakūṭanti tīṇi ^b^kittimalohāni^eb^. morakkhakādi ^b^pisācalohaṃ^eb^. tattha tambalohaṃ vekantakanti imehi dvīhi jātilohehi saddhiṃ sesaṃ sabbampi idha ``loha''nti gahitanti. ^b^tipū^eb^ti setatipu. ^b^sīsa^eb^nti kāḷatipu. ^b^suvaṇṇaṃ^eb^ ākaruppannarasaviddhādibhedaṃ. ^b^muttā^eb^ sāmuddikamuttādi. ^b^maṇī^eb^ti veḷuriyalohitaṅgamasāragallāni ṭhapetvā avaseso sabbo maṇiviseso. ^b^veḷuriyo^eb^ vaṃsavaṇṇamaṇi. ^b^saṅkho^eb^ sāmuddikasaṅkho. ^b^silā^eb^ti kāḷasilāpaṇḍusilādibhedā sabbāpi ratanasammatasilā. ^b^pavāḷaṃ^eb^ nāma vaṭṭumaṃ viddhamaṃ. ^b^lohitaṅgaṃ^eb^ rattamaṇi. ^b^masāragallaṃ^eb^ kabaramaṇi. ^b^bhūmi^eb^ādayo pākaṭāva. ^b^tadassā^eb^ti taṃ dhammatārūpaṃ assa yogino.

[03] ^b^taruṇapallavavaṇṇa^eb^nti ambādīnaṃ taruṇapallavena samānavaṇṇaṃ. ^b^sabhāgarūpasantati^eb^nti vaṇṇādinā samānabhāgaṃ rūpasantānaṃ. ^b^anuppabandhāpayamāna^eb^nti hetuphalaparamparāya sambandhanavasena pavattanti.

[03] ^b^so^eb^ti yogī. ^b^ta^eb^nti asokarukkhapaṇṇaṃ. ^b^pariggahetvā^eb^ti ñāṇena paricchijja gahetvā. ^b^iminā nayenā^eb^ti iminā asokapaṇṇe vuttena nayena. ^b^sabbampi^eb^ ayalohādibhedaṃ ^b^dhammatārūpaṃ^eb^. tampi hi sītakāle sītalaṃ, uṇhakāle sūriyasantāpena uṇhataraṃ hoti. tattha sītabhāvena pavattaṃ ^a^V2.0388^ea^ rūpaṃ uṇhaṃ uṇhabhāvena pavattaṃ rūpaṃ sītaṃ na pāpuṇāti. tattha tattheva taṭataṭāyantaṃ bhijjatītiādinā yojetabbaṃ.
[03] 717^b^.^eb^ ^b^kalāpato^eb^ti arūpadhammakalāpato.

[03] yasmā tattha phassapañcamakā dhammā sabbacittuppādasādhāraṇā supākaṭā, suviññeyyā ca, tasmā tesaṃ vasena dassento ^b^``kalāpatoti phassapañcamakā dhammā''^eb^ti āha. ye ime sammasane uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā, sabbe te vinaṭṭhāti sambandho.

[03] ^b^pavattaṃ citta^eb^nti sattasu ṭhānesu sammasanavasena pavattaṃ cittaṃ. ^b^sammasanto^eb^ti ekajjhaṃ gahetvā sammasanto. ^b^taṃ yuttatara^eb^nti taṃ ariyavaṃsakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ yuttataraṃ āsannabhāvena vibhūtataraṃ rūpasattake sammasanaṃ saha gahetvā sammasanassa vuttattā. apica rūpasattake sammasanassa ^a^M2.0414^ea^ rūpadhammesu sātisayaṃ ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā pavattattā tabbisayaṃ arūpasammasanaṃ sātisayaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇappaṭivedhāya sampavattatīti taṃ yuttataraṃ, na pana apubbakesādisammasanaṃ katvā tabbisayaṃ pavattitaṃ. tathā sati kammaṭṭhānaṃ navaṃ navaṃ eva siyā, pubbe gahitaṃ sammasanavisayaṃ chaḍḍetvā aññassa sammasanavisayassa gaṇhanato. ^b^sesānipī^eb^ti yamakato sammasanādīnipi. ^b^tenevā^eb^ti ariyavaṃsakathānayeneva.

[03] 718^b^.^eb^ ^b^tampi citta^eb^nti ādānanikkhepato sammasanavasena pavattacittuppādampi. cittasīsena hi niddeso. esa nayo sabbattha. ^b^yamakato sammasati nāma^eb^ nāmarūpadhamme ārabbha yugaḷavasena sammasanassa pavattanato. ayañhi pubbe rūpasattakavasena sammasitvā ṭhitopi idāni ādānanikkhepādivasena sammasitvāva taṃ sammasati. khaṇikato sammasanādīsupi eseva nayo.

[03] 719^b^.^eb^ ^b^etampī^eb^ti etaṃ catutthasammasanacittampi. ^b^paṭhamacitta^eb^nti ādānanikkhepādivasena rūpaṃ ^a^V2.0389^ea^ sammasitacittaṃ, yaṃ rūpapariggāhakacittanti adhippetaṃ. sammasitasammasitacittasammasanena tesaṃ khaṇikabhāvassa vibhāvanato idaṃ sammasanaṃ ^b^``khaṇikato sammasana''^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03] 720^b^.^eb^ idameva ca sammasanaṃ diguṇitaṃ anekasammasanapaṭipāṭisambhavato ^b^``paṭipāṭito sammasana''^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^vaṭṭeyyā^eb^ti sambhaveyya. tathā sati paṭipāṭisammasanapasutā eva bhāvanā siyā, na mūlakammaṭṭhānupakārī, na cāyaṃ samāpatticāro. yasmā ca tattakena rūpadhammesu, arūpadhammesu ca aniccādilakkhaṇāni suṭṭhu vibhūtāni honti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``yāva dasamacittasammasanā...pe0... ṭhapetabba''^eb^nti. ^b^ṭhapetabba^eb^nti ca na ekādasamaṃ dvādasamena sammasitabbanti paṭipāṭito sammasanassa paricchedadassanaparaṃ, na tato sammasanato oramanadassanaparaṃ, tasmā punapi rūpaṃ pariggahetvā yāva dasamacittasammasanā bhāvanamanuyuñjateva. ^b^vutta^eb^nti ariyavaṃsakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03] 721^b^.^eb^ ^b^visuṃ sammasananayo nāma natthī^eb^ti aniccādimanasikāravinimutto añño vipassanāmanasikāro natthi. vipassanāya ca diṭṭhiādivikkhambhanā idha diṭṭhiugghāṭanādayoti adhippetā. vipassanāya eva hi pavattivisesena ^a^M2.0415^ea^ diṭṭhiugghāṭanādayo ijjhantīti dassento ^b^``yaṃ paneta''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^sattasaññā^eb^ti sattā atthīti uppajjanakasaññā. dubbalāya attadiṭṭhiyā sahagatasaññātipi vadanti. ^b^sattasaññaṃ ugghāṭitacittenā^eb^ti sattasaññāya vikkhambhanavasena pavattacittena diṭṭhi nuppajjati, saññāvipallāsahetūppajjanakā cittadiṭṭhivipallāsā tadabhāvena hontīti. ^b^māno^eb^ nāma yo diṭṭhūpanissayo apāyagamanīyo, so diṭṭhiyā vikkhambhitāya vikkhambhito eva hoti, diṭṭhiyā samucchinnāya samucchijjanatoti āha ^b^``diṭṭhiugghāṭita...pe0... māno nuppajjatī''^eb^ti. māno vikkhambhiyamāno taṇhāya pavattiṃ nivāreti, abhimatavisayesu eva taṇhāya pavattanatoti vuttaṃ ^b^``mānasamugghāṭita...pe0... taṇhā nuppajjatī''^eb^ti. ^b^taṇhā^eb^ti idha sukhumā nikanti adhippetāti āha ^b^``taṇhāya...pe0... pariyādinnā nāma hotī''^eb^ti.
[03] ^b^ayaṃ nayo^eb^ti idāni vuccamāno sammasanavidhi.

[03] ^b^mama vipassanā^eb^ti imassāpi attaniyasaññitāya vipassanāya sāmibhūto attā parāmasīyatīti ^a^V2.0390^ea^ diṭṭhigāhatāti tathā ^b^``gaṇhato hi diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṃ nāma na hotī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. kāmañcāyaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhikaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhisamadhigamena visuddhadiṭṭhiko, maggena pana asamugghāṭitattā anoḷārikāya ca diṭṭhiyā vasenevaṃ vuttaṃ.
[03] ^b^suṭṭhū^eb^ti sammā. ^b^manāpa^eb^nti ca kiriyāvisesanaṃ, manavaḍḍhanākārenāti attho. ubhayenāpi vipassanāvisayaṃ adhimānamāha. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``mānasamugghāṭo nāma na hotī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^vipassituṃ sakkomī^eb^ti tattha samatthatāpadesena guṇavisesayogato vipassanāya assādetabbatā dassīyati, cittaṃ vipassituṃ sakkomi. tasmā vipassanto eva kālaṃ vītināmessāmīti vipassanaṃ assādentassāti yojanā.

[03] yasmā diṭṭhisamugghāṭanaṃ nāmettha visesato anattānupassanāya hoti, tasmā taṃ dassentena ^b^``sace saṅkhārā''^eb^tiādinā anattānupassanāvidhiṃ vatvā yasmā pana anattato anupassantena saṅkhārā aniccatopi ^a^M2.0416^ea^ dukkhatopi anupassitabbā eva tadupabrūhanato, tasmā ^b^``hutvā abhāvaṭṭhenā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.
[03] yasmā mānasamugghāṭanaṃ nāma aniccānupassanāya hoti. khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanake saṅkhāre passantassa kuto mānassa avasaro. aniccasaññā bhāvetabbā asmimānasamugghāṭāyāti hi vuttaṃ.
