[03] ^b^kvacī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0456^ea^ ^a^V2.0429^ea^ katthaci ṭhāne, kāle, dhamme vā. atha vā ^b^kvacī^eb^ti ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhā vā. ^b^attano attāna^eb^nti sakattānaṃ. ``ayaṃ kho bhavaṃ brahmā mahābrahmā...pe0... seṭṭho sajitā vasī pitā bhūtabhabyāna''ntiādinā (dī0 ni0 1.42) parehi parikappitaṃ attānañca kassaci kiñcanabhūtaṃ na passatīti dassento ^b^``kassacī''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^parassā^eb^ti ``parajāti, paro puriso''ti ca evaṃ gahitassa. ^b^na ca mama kvacanī^eb^ti ettha ^b^mama^eb^-saddo aṭṭhāne payuttoti āha ^b^``mama-saddaṃ tāva ṭhapetvā''^eb^ti. ^b^parassa cā^eb^ti attato aññassa. ``paro puriso''ti evaṃbhūto attho mamatthāya ṭhito, tassa vasena mayhaṃ sabbaṃ sijjhatīti evaṃ ekaccadiṭṭhigatikaparikappitavasena paraṃ attānaṃ tañca attano kiñcanabhūtaṃ na passatīti dassento ^b^``na ca kvacanī''^eb^tiādimāha. ettha ca ^b^nāhaṃ kvacanī^eb^ti sakāttano abhāvaṃ passati. ^b^na kassaci kiñcanatasmi^eb^nti sakāttano eva kassaci anattaniyataṃ passati. ^b^na ca mamā^eb^ti etaṃ dvayaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^atthī^eb^ti paccekaṃ. ^b^na ca kvacani parassa attā atthī^eb^ti parassa attano abhāvaṃ passati. ^b^tassa parassa attano mama kiñcanatā na catthī^eb^ti parassa attano anattaniyataṃ passati. evaṃ ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhā ca khandhānaṃ attattaniyasuññatā suddhasaṅkhārapuñjatā catukoṭikasuññatāpariggaṇhanena diṭṭhā hoti. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``evamaya''^eb^ntiādi.

[03] 761^b^.^eb^ ^b^``chahākārehī''^eb^tiādinā niddesādīsu tattha tattha āgate pakāre suññatānupassanāya paribrūhanaṃ saṅgahetvā dasseti. tattha ^b^chahākārehī^eb^ti chahi gahaṇākārehi, gahetabbākārehi vā. ^b^niccenā^eb^ti ``nicco''ti parikappitena attanā vā aññena vā kenaci. ^b^niccenā^eb^ti vā niccabhāvena. dhuvādayo ``nicco''ti gahitasseva gahetabbākārā. tabbibhāgena hi imassa chakkatā. tattha niccatā nāma kūṭaṭṭhatā. dhuvabhāvo thiratā. sadā bhāvitā sassatatā. nibbikāratā avipariṇāmadhammatā. ^b^yāva jarāmaraṇā^eb^ti peyyālaṃ akatvā pariyosānapadameva dasseti.

[03] 762^b^.^eb^ na sāranti ^b^asāraṃ,^eb^ natthi etassa sāranti ^b^nissāraṃ^eb^. sārato apagataṃ, sāraṃ vā tato apagatanti ^b^sārāpagataṃ^eb^. keci panettha ^a^M2.0457^ea^ ``niccasārasārena vā sukhasārasārena vā attasārasārena vā''ti pāḷīti adhippāyena ``asāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagata''nti padattayaṃ eko suññatāpariggahākāro, aññathā satteva ākārā siyuṃ, na aṭṭhāti vadanti. apare pana ``subhasārasārenātipi ^a^V2.0430^ea^ pāḷiyaṃ atthīti `asāraṃ nissāraṃ sārāpagata'nti idaṃ padattayaṃ `niccasārasārenā'tiādīsu paccekaṃ yojetabba''nti vadanti. ^b^setavaccho^eb^ti setavaruṇako. ``minarukkho''tipi vadanti. ^b^pāḷibhaddako^eb^ti kiṃsuko.

[03] 763^b^.^eb^ niccasārādīnaṃ abhāvato ^b^rittato passati^eb^. parittato, lāmakattā vā ^b^tucchato^eb^. attasārābhāvena ^b^suññato^eb^. sayaṃ anattatāya ^b^anattato^eb^. issariyassa abhāvato, kenaci issariyaṃ kāretuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ca ^b^anissariyato^eb^. pheṇapiṇḍena bhājanādiṃ kātukāmassa viya rūpassa niccatādiṃ kātukāmassa taṃ na sijjhati, sakaicchāvasena vā kāci kiriyā natthīti ^b^akāmakāriyato^eb^. ``evaṃ rūpaṃ hotu, mā eva''nti ^b^alabbhanīyato^eb^. sayaṃ aññassa vase na vattati, nāpi aññaṃ attano vase vattetīti ^b^avasavattakato^eb^. yasmiṃ santāne sayaṃ tassa paro viya avidheyyatāya ^b^parato^eb^. kārakādi viya kāraṇehi, phalena ca ^b^vivittato^eb^. na hi kāraṇena phalaṃ, phalena vā kāraṇaṃ sagabbhaṃ tiṭṭhati. esa nayo vedanādīsupi.

[03] 764^b^.^eb^ ^b^rūpaṃ na satto^eb^tiādīsu yo lokavohārena satto, rūpaṃ so na hotīti ayamattho idha nādhippeto tassāvuttasiddhattā. na hi loko rūpamattaṃ ``satto''ti voharati, bāhirakaparikappito pana attā ``satto''ti adhippeto. so hi tehi rūpādīsu sattavisattatāya paresaṃ sañjāpanaṭṭhena ``satto''ti vuccati, rūpaṃ so na hotīti attho. suññatāpariggaṇhanañhetanti. esa nayo ^b^na jīvo^eb^tiādīsupi. tattha jīvanaṭṭhena ^b^jīvo^eb^. naranaṭṭhena netubhāvena ^b^naro^eb^. ``ahamasmī''ti mānuppattiṭṭhānatāya māno ettha vāti pavattatīti ^b^mānavo^eb^. thiyati ettha gabbhoti ^b^itthī^eb^. padhānabhāvena puri setīti ^b^puriso^eb^ ^a^M2.0458^ea^. āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti ^b^attā^eb^. paccattaṃ tassa tassa ahaṃkāravatthutāya ``aha''nti ca diṭṭhigatikehi attā vuccati, rūpaṃ pana tādisaṃ na hotīti suññatāpariggaṇhanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``rūpaṃ na satto''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tasmā aṭṭhahipi padehi rūpassa attasuññatāva dassitā. itarehi catūhi tassa kiñcanatābhāvo. tattha ^b^na mamā^eb^ti mayhaṃ attano santakaṃ na hoti, tathā aññassa attano santakaṃ na hoti, kassacipi attano santakaṃ na hoti attanoyeva abhāvato. ^b^``na attaniya''^eb^nti padena pakāsito evattho pariyāyantarehi tīhipi padehi pakāsito. esa nayo vedanādīsupi.

[03] 765^b^.^eb^ heṭṭhā ^a^V2.0431^ea^ kalāpasammasanassa daḷhabhāvāya vuttasammasananayāpi suññatānupassanāya daḷhabhāvāya saṃvattantīti dassento ^b^``tīraṇapariññāvasenā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha bhayassa ahiṃsanena ^b^asaraṇato^eb^. ``saraṇa''nti gahetuṃ ayuttatāya ^b^asaraṇībhūtato. ``anassādato''^eb^ti idaṃ pāḷiyaṃ natthi. sati ca tecattālīsa ākārā siyuṃ. rūpappavattiyaṃ sabbādīnavūpaladdhiyā ^b^ādīnavato. ``samudayato atthaṅgamato''^eb^ti idaṃ dvayaṃ yathā aniccato dassanaṃ panāḷikāya, niccasāravirahadīpanena vā suññatāvibhāvanaṃ hoti, evaṃ suññatāvibhāvananti katvā vuttaṃ. tathā ``yaṃ kho rūpaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ rūpassa assādo''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.26) dassanaṃ paccayapaccayuppannatāvibhāvanena suññatāvibhāvanaṃ. ``yaṃ rūpaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, ayaṃ rūpassa ādīnavo''ti (saṃ0 ni0 3.26) ca dassanaṃ niccatādisuññatābhāvanato. tathā ``yo rūpe chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ rūpassa nissaraṇa''nti evaṃ samudayādidassanānaṃ, itaresañca yathārahaṃ suññatānupassanānubrūhanatā daṭṭhabbā. yaṃ pana ādīnavato dassanaṃ, pubbe vatvāpi puna vacanaṃ assādapaṭikkhepato dassanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. vedanādīsupi dvācattālīsa ākārā netabbāti āha ^b^``vedanaṃ...pe0... viññāṇaṃ aniccato...pe0... nissaraṇato passatī''^eb^ti.
[03] ^b^vuttampi ca^eb^ niddese ^b^etaṃ^eb^ suññatāpariggaṇhanakathāsandassanaṃ ``asukāya pāḷiyā ayaṃ niddeso''ti dassanatthaṃ, tassa phalasandassanatthañca.

[03] 766^b^.^eb^ evaṃ ^a^M2.0459^ea^ tīraṇapariññāvasena paccekaṃ khandhesu dvācattālīsāya ākārehi suññataṃ pariggahetvāpi tividhānupassanāvaseneva bhāvanaṃ anuyuñjantassa saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇuppattīti dassento ^b^``evaṃ suññato''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^pariggaṇhanto^eb^ti sammasanto. ^b^bhayañca nandiñca vippahāyā^eb^ti ajjhupekkhakatāya saṅkhārānaṃ vipattiṃ nissāya uppajjanakabhayañceva tesaṃ sampattiṃ nissāya uppajjanakapītiñca pajahitvā. atha vā bhayatupaṭṭhānavasena uppajjanakañāṇabhayañca sammasanavasena uppajjanakapītisaṅkhātaṃ nandiñca pahāya. na hi sabbaso suññatāya diṭṭhāya bhayanandīnaṃ avasaro atthi, atha kho upekkhāva saṇṭhāti. tenāha ^b^``saṅkhāresu udāsīno hotī''^eb^ti. tattha yena micchāgāhena anudāsīnatā siyā, tadabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^``ahanti vā mamanti vā na gaṇhātī''^eb^ti āha. idānissa udāsīnatāya upamaṃ dassento ^b^``vissaṭṭhabhariyo viya puriso''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^a^V2.0432^ea^ anudāsīnatāpubbikā udāsīnatā vuccamānā idha opammatthaṃ pharatīti dassetuṃ ^b^``iṭṭhā kantā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^ativiya naṃ mamāyeyya^eb^ itthīnaṃ sāṭheyyakūṭeyyavaṅkeyyādīnaṃ ajānanato. ^b^muñcitukāmo hutvā^eb^ti muñcitukāmova hutvā, ^b^taṃ vissajjeyya^eb^ nirapekkhatāya vasenevāti adhippāyo. ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ yogāvacaro. muñcitukāmatāya uddhaṃ yāva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ na uppajjati, tāva pavattā vipassanā paṭisaṅkhānupassanā evāti āha ^b^``paṭisaṅkhānupassanāya saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto''^eb^ti.

[01] ^b^patilīyatī^eb^ti ekapassena nilīyati nilīnaṃ viya hoti. ^b^patikuṭatī^eb^ti saṅkucati. ^b^paṭivaṭṭatī^eb^ti vivaṭṭati. ^b^na sampasāriyatī^eb^ti na visarati, abhirativasena na pakkhandatīti attho.
[03] ^b^iccassā^eb^ti iti evaṃ assa yogino.

[03] 767^b^.^eb^ tikkhavisadasūrabhāvena saṅkhāresu ajjhupekkhane sijjhamāne ^b^taṃ panetaṃ^eb^ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ anekavāraṃ pavattamānaṃ paripākagamanena anulomañāṇassa paccayabhāvaṃ gacchantaṃ ^b^nibbānaṃ santato passati^eb^ nāma. tathābhūtañca ^b^sabbaṃ saṅkhārappavattaṃ vissajjetvā nibbānameva pakkhandati^eb^ nāma. tayidaṃ idha ñāṇaṃ anulomagotrabhuñāṇehi saddhiṃ ekattaṃ netvā vuttaṃ ekattanayavasena ^a^M2.0460^ea^. ^b^no ce nibbānaṃ santato passatī^eb^ti tāva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa aparipakkatamevāha. samuddaṃ tarantīti ^b^sāmuddikā,^eb^ saṃyattikā. disājānanako kāko ^b^disākāko,^eb^ lakkhaṇamattañcetaṃ yo koci tādiso sakunto veditabbo. ^b^videsa^eb^nti adesaṃ samudde aparicitaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^anugantvā^eb^ti anu anu gantvā.

[03] ^b^tayidaṃ^eb^ vipassanāñāṇaṃ. ^b^piṭṭhaṃ vaṭṭayamānaṃ viyā^eb^ti thūlathūlato vivecanavasena nipphoṭiyamānaṃ saṇhaṃ saṇhaṃ piṭṭhacuṇṇaṃ viya. ^b^nibbaṭṭitakappāsa^eb^nti nibbaṭṭitabījaṃ kappāsaṃ. ^b^vihanamānaṃ viyā^eb^ti dhanukena vihaññamānaṃ viya. upamādvayenapi punappunaṃ sammasanena vipassanāñāṇassa sukhumatarabhāvāpattimāha. yathā yathā hi vipassanābhāvanābalena tikkhā, visadā, sūrā ca hoti, tathā tathā sukhumatarāpi hotīti. ^b^saṅkhāravicinane^eb^ti pavicayassa sikhāppattatāya saṅkhāresu viya tesaṃ vicinanepi udāsīnaṃ hutvā tividhānupassanāvasena tiṭṭhati pakārantarassa abhāvato. ^a^V2.0433^ea^ ``sattadhā aṭṭhārasadhā''tiādinā vibhattāpi hi anupassanāpakārā aniccānupassanādīsveva tīsu antogadhāti matthakappattā vipassanā tāsaṃ eva vasena tiṭṭhati.

[03] 768^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ vimokkhamukhabhāvāpajjane, ariyapuggalavibhāgapaccayatthe ca. ^b^idaṃ^eb^ vipassanāñāṇaṃ. ^b^tiṇṇaṃ indriyāna^eb^nti saddhindriyasamādhindriyapaññindriyānaṃ. ^b^ādhipateyyavasenā^eb^ti sampayuttadhammānaṃ adhipatibhāvavasena. aniccānupassanābahulassa hi saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti, dukkhānupassanābahulassa samādhindriyaṃ, anattānupassanābahulassa paññindriyanti tissannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena balavatarabhāvaṃ pattāni imāni tīṇi indriyāni vimokkhamukhabhāvaṃ āpādentīti āha ^b^``tividhānupassanā...pe0... āpajjati nāmā''^eb^ti. ^b^tividhavimokkhamukhabhāva^eb^nti ettha ke pana tayo vimokkhā, kāni vā tīṇi vimokkhamukhānīti antolīne anuyoge vimokkhamukhādhīnattā vimokkhādhigamassa vimokkhamukhāni tāva dassento ^b^``tisso hi...pe0... vuccantī''^eb^ti vatvā ayañca attho pāḷito eva viññāyatīti dassento ^b^``yathāhā''^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] ^b^lokaniyyānāyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0461^ea^ lokato nikkhamanāya, sattalokassa vā vaṭṭadukkhato nikkhamanāya. ^b^paricchedaparivaṭumato^eb^ti udayabbayavasena paricchedato ceva parivaṭumato ca. ^b^samanupassanatāyā^eb^ti sammadeva anu anu passanāya saṃvattantīti sambandho. aniccānupassanā hi saṅkhāre ādito udayena, antato vayena paricchinne passati. ādiantavantatāya hi te aniccāti. ^b^animittāya ca dhātuyā^eb^ti sabbasaṅkhāranimittavirahato ``animittā''ti laddhanāmāya asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā. ^b^cittasampakkhandanatāyā^eb^ti paricchinditvā anulomañāṇādibhāvena sammadeva adhicittassa anupavisanatthāya. ^b^appaṇihitāyā^eb^ti rāgapaṇidhiādīnaṃ abhāvena ``appaṇihitā''ti laddhanāmāya. ^b^suññatāyā^eb^ti attasuññatāya ``suññatā''ti laddhanāmāya.

[03] ^b^gati^eb^nti nibbattiṃ. saṅkhārānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanena saṃvejiyamānaṃ cittaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ samuttejitaṃ nāma hotīti āha ^b^``manosamuttejanatāyāti cittasaṃvejanatāyā''^eb^ti. mamaṃkārena attaniyasaññitassa vatthuno sāmibhūto attā paṭhamaṃ parāmasīyati, tato attaniyanti āha ^b^``nāhaṃ, na mamāti evaṃ anattato samanupassanatāyā''^eb^ti. ^b^tīṇi padānī^eb^ti paricchedaparivaṭuma, manosamuttejana, samanupassanapadānīti vadanti, ``sabbasaṅkhāre''tiādīni pana tīṇi vākyāni tīṇi ^a^V2.0434^ea^ padānīti veditabbāni. ^b^tenevā^eb^ti aniccānupassanādīnaṃ vasena tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ padānaṃ vuttattā eva. ^b^pañhavissajjane^eb^ti ``aniccato manasi karoto kathaṃ saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahantī''ti pañhassa vissajjane.

[03] 769^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vimokkhamukhāni dassetvā idāni vimokkhe dassetuṃ ^b^``katame panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^aniccato manasi karonto^eb^ti aniccānupassanaṃ anuyuñjanto. ^b^adhimokkhabahulo^eb^ti saddhindriyabahulo. yassa visesato aniccānupassanā tikkhā sūrā hoti, tassa saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti. ``aniccā saṅkhārā''ti hi ādito saddhāmattakena paṭipajjitvā vipassanāya ukkaṃsagatāya tarupallavādīsu viya maṇikanakādīsupi tesaṃ aniccataṃ sātisayaṃ paccakkhato passato ``sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā''ti satthari saddhā balavatī pavattatīti so adhimokkhabahulo, adhimattasaddho ca hoti. tassa aniccānupassanābahulatāya aniccākārato ^a^M2.0462^ea^ vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti so ^b^``animittaṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhatī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^passaddhibahulo^eb^ti dukkhānupassanaṃ anuyuñjanto ``dukkhā saṅkhārā, tappaṭipakkhato sukho nirodho''ti ca manasikāravasena nibbānassa santapaṇītasukhabhāvaṃ adhimuccanto abhiṇhaṃ pītipāmojjasamāyogato passaddhibahulo hoti. tato ca adhimattasamādhindriyapaṭilābhena rāgapaṇidhiyā dūrībhāvato appaṇihitavimokkhasamadhigamo hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``dukkhato...pe0... paṭilabhatī''^eb^ti. ^b^vedabahulo^eb^ti anattānupassanaṃ anuyuñjanto attasuññatāya nipuṇañāṇavisayattā ñāṇabahulo hoti. tato ca adhimattapaññindriyapaṭilābhena mohassa dūrībhāvato suññatavimokkhasamadhigamo hotīti āha ^b^``anattato...pe0... paṭilabhatī''^eb^ti.

[03] yo aniccānupassanāya nimittavasena saṅkhāre pariggahetvā vipassanaṃ anuyuñjanto yattha idaṃ saṅkhāranimittaṃ sabbaso natthi, taṃ ``animittaṃ nibbāna''nti animittākārena adhimuccanto vuṭṭhānagāminimaggena ghaṭeti. tassa maggo animittato nibbānaṃ sacchikarotīti vuccatīti āha ^b^``animittākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto ariyamaggo''^eb^ti. svāyaṃ nibbānassa animittākāro neva maggena kato, na vipassanāya, atha kho sabhāvasiddho. tadārammaṇatāya ca maggo animittoti vuccatīti dassento āha ^b^``animittāya dhātuyā uppannattā animitto''^eb^ti. yo dukkhānupassanāvasena paṇidhiyā dūrībhāvakaraṇena appaṇihitaṃ adhimuccanto ^a^V2.0435^ea^, yo anattānupassanāvasena attūpaladdhiyā dūrībhāvakaraṇena suññataṃ adhimuccantoti ca ādinā yojetabbaṃ. tenāha ^b^``eteneva nayenā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] 770^b^.^eb^ yadi ariyamaggo tividhampi vimokkhanāmaṃ labhati, atha kasmā ^b^abhidhamme^eb^ vimokkhadvayameva āgatanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``yaṃ panā''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^ta^eb^nti abhidhamme vimokkhadvayavacanaṃ. ^b^nippariyāyato vipassanāgamanaṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti ujukameva vipassanato maggassa nāmāgamanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. kasmā? animittavipassanā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti. kāmaṃ ^b^sutte^eb^ ``animittañca bhāvehi, mānānusayamujjahā''ti (su0 ni0 344) animittavipassanā kathitā, sā pana niccanimittadhuvanimittāttanimittāni ^a^M2.0463^ea^ ugghāṭentīpi sayaṃ nimittadhammesu eva caratīti sanimittāva hotīti. apica abhidhammo nāma paramatthadesanā, animittamaggassa ca paramatthato hetuvekallameva. aniccānupassanāvasena hi ^b^animittavimokkho^eb^ kathito. tattha ca saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti, taṃ ariyamagge ekaṅgampi na hoti, amaggaṅgattā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ na sakkoti. itaresu dukkhānupassanāya vasena ^b^appaṇihitavimokkho,^eb^ anattānupassanāya vasena ^b^suññatavimokkho^eb^.

[03] tesu appaṇihitavimokkhena samādhindriyaṃ, suññatavimokkhena paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hotīti tāni ariyamaggassa aṅgattā attano maggassa nāmaṃ dātuṃ sakkonti, na animittamaggo tadabhāvatoti keci. ye pana vadanti ``animittamaggo āgamanato nāmaṃ alabhantopi saguṇato ca ārammaṇato ca nāmaṃ labhatī''ti, tesaṃ matena appaṇihitasuññatamaggāpi saguṇato eva, ārammaṇato eva ca nāmaṃ labheyyunti? taṃ ayuttaṃ. kasmā? maggo hi dvīhi kāraṇehi nāmaṃ labhati sarasato ca paccanīkato cāti, sabhāvato ca paṭipakkhato cāti attho. ^b^appaṇihitamaggo^eb^ hi rāgapaṇidhiādīhi vimutto, ^b^suññatamaggo^eb^ rāgādīhi suñño evāti te sarasato nāmaṃ labhanti. tathā ^b^appaṇihitamaggo^eb^ paṇidhissa paṭipakkho, ^b^suññatamaggo^eb^ attābhinivesassa evāti te paccanīkato nāmaṃ labhanti, ^b^animittamaggo^eb^ pana rāgādinimittānaṃ, niccanimittādīnaṃ vā abhāvena sarasato eva nāmaṃ labhati, no paccanīkato. na hi so saṅkhāranimittārammaṇāya aniccānupassanāya paṭipakkho, sā ^a^V2.0436^ea^ panassa anulomabhāve ṭhitāti sabbathāpi abhidhammapariyāyena animittamaggo na labbhati. tena vuttaṃ ^b^``taṃ nippariyāyato vipassanāgamanaṃ sandhāyā''^eb^ti.

[01] yasmā suttantapariyāyena animittamaggo labbhati. vuṭṭhānagāminī hi vipassanā yaṃ yaṃ sammasantī vuṭṭhānaṃ gacchati, tassa tassa vasena āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā attano maggassa nāmaṃ deti, tattha aniccato vuṭṭhahantassa maggo animitto hoti, dukkhato vuṭṭhahantassa appaṇihito, anattato vuṭṭhahantassa suññato, tasmā suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā esāti katvā idha tayopi vimokkhā uddhaṭā. yaṃ pana ^b^paṭisambhidāmagge^eb^ abhinivesanimittapaṇidhimuñcanaṃ upādāya tissannampi anupassanānaṃ tadāgamanavasena tadanvayassa maggassa ca suññatavimokkhādibhāvo niddiṭṭho, tassa pariyāyabhāve ^a^M2.0464^ea^ vattabbameva natthīti dassetuṃ ^b^``vipassanāñāṇaṃ hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. vipassanāñāṇaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge ``appaṇihito, vimokkho''ti ca kiñcāpi vuttanti sambandho.

[01] ^b^aniccānupassanāñāṇa^eb^nti ``aniccā saṅkhārā''ti anupassanāvasena pavattañāṇaṃ. ^b^niccato abhinivesaṃ muñcatī^eb^ti ``te niccā''ti niccākārato pavattamicchābhinivesaviddhaṃsanavasena, tadanvayaṃ pana maggañāṇaṃ samucchedavasena muñcati. ^b^itī^eb^ti tasmā. aniccābhinivesato rittatāya, vimuttatāya ca ^b^suññato vimokkho^eb^. sesapadesupi eseva nayo.

[03] ^b^ta^eb^nti tividhaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ. tattha yassa pariyāyato, yassa ca nippariyāyato nāmalābho, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``saṅkhāranimittassā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^na nippariyāyena,^eb^ atha kho pariyāyenāti attho. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti nippariyāyakathābhāvato. ^b^vimokkhadvayameva vuttaṃ^eb^ abhidhammeti adhippāyo. ^b^etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ vipassanādhikāre. ``tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā''ti etasmiṃ vā uddesavacane.
[03] 771^b^.^eb^ ^b^tesaṃ vibhāgāyā^eb^ti tesaṃ yathāvuttānaṃ sattannaṃ ariyapuggalānaṃ saddhānusāriādibhāvena vibhattasabhāvatāya.

[03] 772^b^.^eb^ ^b^saddhindriyaṃ paṭilabhatī^eb^ti saddhānusāribhāvitākāraṇabhūtaṃ adhimattaṃ saddhindriyaṃ paṭilabhati. adhimokkhabahulatāya, saddhindriyādhimattatāya ca kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. apica ayamettha ^a^V2.0437^ea^ saṅkhepattho -- aniccākārasallakkhaṇassa saddhābhibuddhiyā upanissayabhāvato tadanvaye magge saddhā tikkhatarā hoti, tena aṭṭhamako ^b^saddhānusārī^eb^ nāma hoti. ^b^sesesu sattasu ṭhānesū^eb^ti paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya yāva aggaphalā sattasu ṭhānesu. ``sattasu ṭhānesū''ti kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu sesesu chasu ṭhānesu saddhāvimutto, aggaphale pana sacāyaṃ arūpajjhānalābhī, ubhatobhāgavimutto hoti, no ce arūpajjhānalābhī, paññāvimutto, na saddhāvimutto. ^b^abhidhamme^eb^ hi --

[02] ``katamo ca puggalo ^b^saddhāvimutto^eb^? idhekacco puggalo `idaṃ dukkha'nti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti, `ayaṃ dukkhasamudayo'ti, `ayaṃ dukkhanirodho'ti, `ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā'ti yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti. tathāgatappaveditā cassa dhammā paññāya diṭṭhā ^a^M2.0465^ea^ honti, paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti, no ca kho yathādiṭṭhippattassa. ayaṃ vuccati puggalo saddhāvimutto''ti (pu0 pa0 208) --

[25] ekaccāsavaparikkhayavacanato saddhāvimuttassa sekkhabhāvo viññāyati, na asekkhabhāvo. aṭṭhakathāyañca ``dve dhurāni, dve abhinivesā, dve sīsānī''ti vacanato natthi arahato saddhāvimuttatāti? saccametaṃ nippariyāyato. nippariyāyakathā hi abhidhammo, idha pana pariyāyena evaṃ vuttaṃ. yadi pariyāyato arahato saddhāvimuttatā, ko pana so pariyāyo? saddhāvimuttanvayatā. yo hi aggamaggakkhaṇe saddhāvimutto hoti, so aggaphalakkhaṇepi tadanvayatāya saddhāvimuttoti ^b^paṭisambhidāmagge^eb^ pariyāyena vuttoti idhāpi tatheva vuttaṃ. atha vā saddhāvimuttasadisatāya arahā saddhāvimutto. kā panettha sadisatā? yathā saddhāvimuttassa sekkhassa kilesakkhayo kuṇṭhena asinā kadalicchedasadiso ``no ca kho yathādiṭṭhippattassā''ti vacanato, evaṃ tadanvayassāpi arahatoti ayamettha sadisatā. kiṃ pana nesaṃ kilesapahāne nānattaṃ atthīti? natthi. atha kasmā saddhāvimutto diṭṭhippattaṃ na pāpuṇātīti? āgamanīyanānattena. diṭṭhippatto hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appakasirena akilamanto vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti, saddhāvimutto kicchena kasirena vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti. apica paññāyapi nesaṃ vemattatā. sā ca yāvatikā labbhatevāti vadanti. evañca katvā paṭhamamaggādīsu satipi indriyasamatte saddhādīnaṃ tikkhatāvacanampi samatthitaṃ hoti.

[03] 773^b^.^eb^ ^b^so^eb^ti ^a^V2.0438^ea^ dukkhato vuṭṭhito. ^b^sabbatthā^eb^ti aṭṭhasupi ṭhānesu. nanu ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ``dve dhurānī''ti niyamitattā paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe saddhānusārī vā siyā, dhammānusārī vā? idha na saddhānusārī yutto, kāyasakkhitāpi arahato natthi. ^b^abhidhamme^eb^ hi --

[02] ``katamo ca puggalo ^b^kāyasakkhī^eb^? idhekacco puggalo aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati, paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti. ayaṃ vuccati puggalo kāyasakkhī''ti (pu0 pa0 208) --

[25] ekaccāsavaparikkhayavacanato ^a^M2.0466^ea^ kāyasakkhino sekkhabhāvova viññāyatīti? saccametaṃ nippariyāyato, idha pana pariyāyena vuttaṃ. ko pana so pariyāyoti? kāyasakkhisadisatā. upacārarūpajjhānasamādhito hi sātisayaṃ arūpasamādhisamphassaṃ laddhā nibbattīti ekaccāsavaparikkhayaṃ upādāya ``kāyasakkhī''ti vattabbapuggalena sātisayasamādhisamphassatadadhiṭṭhānāsavaparikkhayasāmaññaṃ apekkhitvā kāyasakkhī viya ^b^kāyasakkhī^eb^ti arahā ^b^paṭisambhidāmagge^eb^ vuttoti idhāpi tameva nayaṃ gahetvā arahatopi kāyasakkhitā vuttā. suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā hesāti. nippariyāyena pana paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya chasu ṭhānesu kāyasakkhī nāma hoti, so ca kho aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī, na vipassanāyāniko sukkhavipassako, upacāramattalābhī, rūpajjhānamattalābhī vā. ^b^passaddhibahulo^eb^ti ca passaddhisīsena samādhi vuttoti sātisayasamādhilābhī samathayānikova adhippeto, samathayānikasseva ca kāyasakkhibhāvo heṭṭhā vutto. ^b^arūpajjhāna^eb^nti catubbidhaṃ arūpajjhānaṃ. tattha pana ekampi laddhā arahattaṃ patto ubhatobhāgavimutto eva hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``arūpajjhāna''^eb^micceva vuttaṃ, na ``cattāri arūpajjhānānī''ti. tenāyaṃ catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnaṃ, nirodhasamāpattiyā ca vasena pañcavidho hoti. esa nayo kāyasakkhimhipi. dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttoti ^b^ubhatobhāgavimutto^eb^.

[03] 774^b^.^eb^ paññavato nipuṇatarā, gambhīrā ca atthā pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahantīti anattato manasi karoto vedabahulatā, paññindriyapaṭilābho ca vutto. ^b^dhammānusārī hoti^eb^ paññindriyassa adhimattattā. paññā hi idha ``dhammo''ti adhippetā ``saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo''tiādīsu viya (jā0 1.1.57).
[03] 775^b^.^eb^ yassā ^a^V2.0439^ea^ pāḷiyā vasena idha ariyapuggalassa saddhāvimuttādibhāvo vutto, taṃ pāḷiṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``vuttaṃ heta''^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03] 776^b^.^eb^ ``saddhindriyassa adhimattattā saddhāvimutto''ti evamādiatthassa sādhakaṃ ^b^aparampi vuttaṃ. ``saddahanto vimutto''^eb^ti etena sabbathā avimuttassa ^a^M2.0467^ea^ saddhāmattena vimuttabhāvadassanena saddhāvimuttassa sekkhabhāvameva vibhāveti. ^b^saddhāvimutto^eb^ti vā saddhāya adhimuttoti attho.

[03] ^b^phuṭṭhantaṃ sacchikato^eb^ti phuṭṭhānaṃ anantaraṃ phuṭṭhanto, phuṭṭhānaṃ arūpajjhānānaṃ anantaro kāloti adhippāyo, accantasaṃyoge cetaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, phuṭṭhānantarakālameva sacchikaraṇūpāyena sacchikātabbaṃ sacchākāsīti vuttaṃ hoti. bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ vā etaṃ yathā ``ekamanta''nti (pārā0 2). yo hi arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato, nāmakāyekadesato ca vikkhambhanavimokkhena vimutto, tena nirodhasaṅkhāto vimokkho ālocito pakāsito viya hoti, na pana kāyena sacchikato, nirodhaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ katvā ekaccesu āsavesu khepitesu tena so sacchikatova hoti. tasmā so sacchikātabbaṃ yathāālocitaṃ nāmakāyena sacchākāsīti ^b^kāyasakkhī^eb^ti vuccati, na tu vimutto ekaccānaṃ āsavānaṃ aparikkhīṇattā. ^b^diṭṭhantaṃ patto^eb^ti dassanasaṅkhātassa sotāpattimaggañāṇassa anantaraṃ pattoti vuttaṃ hoti. paṭhamaphalato paṭṭhāya hi yāva aggamaggā diṭṭhippattoti. ^b^``diṭṭhiyā patto''^eb^ti vā pāṭho, catusaccadassanasaṅkhātāya diṭṭhiyā nirodhaṃ pattoti attho. ime ca saddhāvimuttādayo tayo paramatthato apariyositañāṇakiccāti taṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``saddahanto vimuccatī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^jhānaphassa^eb^nti sātisayaṃ jhānaphassaṃ. tena arūpajjhānaphasso saṅgahito hoti.

[03] ^b^``dukkhā saṅkhārā^eb^ti ^b^ñātaṃ hotī''^eb^ti iminā dukkhasaccapaṭivedhamāha, ^b^``sukho nirodho^eb^ti ^b^ñātaṃ hotī''^eb^ti iminā nirodhasaccapaṭivedhaṃ. tadubhayena ca samudayamaggasaccapaṭivedhaṃ nānantariyakabhāvato. ^b^``ñātaṃ hotī''^eb^ti iminā dutiyamaggakiccaṃ, ^b^``diṭṭhaṃ hotī''^eb^ti iminā tatiyamaggakiccaṃ, ^b^``viditaṃ hotī''^eb^ti iminā catutthamaggakiccaṃ, ^b^``sacchikata''^eb^nti iminā paṭhamaphalakiccaṃ, ^b^``phusita''^eb^nti iminā sesaphaladvayakiccaṃ. iti diṭṭhippattassa maggaphalañāṇabyāpāradassanāni imāni padānīti vadanti.

[03] 777^b^.^eb^ ^b^itaresū^eb^ti ^a^V2.0440^ea^ saddhānusāriādipadesu. ^b^saddhaṃ anusaratī^eb^ti āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ saddhaṃ anugacchati. yathā sā tikkhā sūrā ahosi ^a^M2.0468^ea^, maggakkhaṇepi tadanurūpameva pavattetīti attho. ^b^saddhāya vā anusaratī^eb^ti saddhāya kāraṇabhūtāya saccapaṭivedhassa anurūpaṃ sarati gacchati, paṭipajjatīti attho. dvīhipi atthavikappehi saddhāya adhimattataṃyeva vibhāveti. ^b^dhammānusārī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^ubhatobhāgavimutto^eb^ti dvīhi bhāgehi dve vāre vimutto, rūpakāyato ca nāmakāyato ca vikkhambhanavasena, samucchedavasena ca vimuttoti attho. arūpajjhānena rūpakāyato ca nāmakāyekadesato ca vimutto, ariyamaggena nāmakāyato vimuttoti ubhohi bhāgehi dve vāre vimuttattā ubhatobhāgavimutto. ^b^pajānanto vimutto^eb^ti paṭhamajjhānaphassena vinā parijānanādippakārehi cattāri ariyasaccāni jānanto paṭivijjhanto tesaṃ kiccānaṃ matthakappattiyā niṭṭhitakiccatāya visesena muttoti vimutto.

[03] ayaṃ panettha nippariyāyato saṅkhepakathā -- yassa aniccākārato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, so adhimokkhabahulo saddhindriyassa tikkhabhāvena paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe ^b^saddhānusārī^eb^ nāma hoti, majjhe chasu ṭhānesu ^b^saddhāvimutto^eb^. aggaphalakkhaṇe ^b^paññāvimutto^eb^ nāma hoti. tathā yassa dukkhākārato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, tassa passaddhibahulatāya samādhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti dukkhupanisāya saddhāyapi tibbatarattā, dhuraniyamato ca. sopi paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe ^b^saddhānusārī^eb^ eva hoti, majjhe chasu ṭhānesu ^b^saddhāvimutto,^eb^ ante ^b^paññāvimutto^eb^ ca hoti. yassa pana anattākārato vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, so vedabahulo paññindriyassa tikkhabhāvena paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe ^b^dhammānusārī^eb^ eva hoti, majjhe chasu ṭhānesu ^b^diṭṭhippatto,^eb^ ante ^b^paññāvimutto^eb^ eva hoti. ime pana na aṭṭhavimokkhalābhino, aṭṭhavimokkhalābhī pana paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe ^b^saddhānusārī^eb^ vā ^b^dhammānusārī^eb^ vā siyā. majjhe chasu ṭhānesu ^b^kāyasakkhī,^eb^ pariyosāne ^b^ubhatobhāgavimutto^eb^ti.
[06] saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ.

[03] 778^b^.^eb^ yaṃ taṃ vimokkhamukhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā sattāriyapuggalavibhāgāya ca paccayo hotīti vuttaṃ, ^b^taṃ panetaṃ^eb^ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ. ^b^purimena ñāṇadvayenā^eb^ti muñcitukamyatāpaṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇadvayena ^b^atthato^eb^ ^a^M2.0469^ea^ ^b^ekaṃ,^eb^ pavattiākārabhedato nānanti adhippāyo. yathāvuttamatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāya, pāḷiyā ca sādhetuṃ ^b^``tenāhū''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. muñcitukamyatāmuñcanupāyakaraṇañāṇānipi saṅkhāresu udāsīnabhāveneva pavattanato saṅkhārupekkhāsamaññāneva hontīti ^a^V2.0441^ea^ vuttaṃ ^b^``idaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ ekameva tīṇi nāmāni labhatī''^eb^ti. tena saṅkhārupekkhāvohāro muñcitukamyatādiñāṇasamudāyavisayoti dasseti.

[03] 780^b^.^eb^ ^b^uppādādīnī^eb^ti uppādapavattādiapadesena vutte saṅkhāre. ^b^pariccajitukāmatā^eb^ti tappaṭibandhachandarāgappahānena vissajjitukāmatā. ^b^paṭisaṅkhāna^eb^nti punappunaṃ tīraṇaṃ. ^b^muñcitvā^eb^ti nirālayabhāvāpattiyā apekkhāvissajjanavasena vissajjitvā. ^b^avasāne^eb^ti tathākaraṇassa uttarakālaṃ. yāva nibbānasampakkhandanā na ijjhati, tāva vicinanepi udāsīnatāya ñāṇassa santānavasena pavattiṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``ajjhupekkhanaṃ santiṭṭhanā''^eb^ti. ^b^eva^eb^nti ajjhupekkhanākārasāmaññato ``muñcitukamyatā ca sā santiṭṭhanā cā''ti vuttākārena.
[03] 781^b^.^eb^ ^b^ime dhammā^eb^ti ime ñāṇasaṅkhātā dhammā, ñāṇapariyāyo vā idha dhamma-saddo, tasmā imāni ñāṇānīti attho. ^b^ekattā^eb^ti ekasabhāvā.

[03] 782^b^.^eb^ ^b^vuṭṭhānagāminī hoti^eb^ vuṭṭhānagamanato. ^b^saṅkhārupekkhādiñāṇattayassā^eb^ti saṅkhārupekkhānulomagotrabhusaññitassa ñāṇattayassa. kiccavasena pavattiṭṭhānavasenapi lokiyañāṇānaṃ upari ṭhitattā vuttaṃ ^b^``uttamabhāvaṃ pattattā''^eb^ti. ^b^nimittabhūtato^eb^ti vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtato khandhapañcakato. tenāha ^b^``abhiniviṭṭhavatthuto''^eb^ti. tañhi vipassanāya gocarakaraṇasaṅkhātena abhinivesena abhiniviṭṭhavatthunti pavuccati. taṃ panetaṃ sasantatipariyāpannampi parato diṭṭhitāya ``bahiddhā''ti vuttaṃ. tadeva hi ``bahiddhā sabbanimittānī''ti tattha tattha vuccati. ^b^ajjhattapavattato^eb^ti sasantāne micchādiṭṭhipavattanāadito, tadanuvattakakilesakkhandhehi ca. tañhi sasantatiyaṃ kilesappavattabhāvato, tannimittaṃ asati maggabhāvanāya uppajjanakaupādinnakkhandhapavattabhāvato ca tathā vuttaṃ. vuṭṭhahanañca nesaṃ ārammaṇākaraṇaṃ, āyatiṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanañca. ^b^ghaṭiyati^eb^ attano anantarameva maggasamuppattito.

[03] 783^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0470^ea^ tasmiṃ ``abhiniviṭṭhavatthuto vuṭṭhahanato''ti saṅkhepavacane. ajjhattabahiddhā rūpārūpapapañcakkhandhalakkhaṇattayavasena ayaṃ ^b^mātikā^eb^ uddeso. ^b^ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā^eb^ti sasantatipariyāpannesu khandhesu vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā. ^b^``ajjhattā vuṭṭhātī''^eb^ti idaṃ ^a^V2.0442^ea^ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā ajjhattadhammārammaṇattā pariyāyato vuttaṃ, nippariyāyato pana maggo sabbatopi vuṭṭhāti. ^b^bahiddhā vuṭṭhātī^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^ekappahārenā^eb^ti ekajjhaṃ, taṃ pana ajjhattādivibhāgaṃ akatvā ``yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma''nti (dī0 ni0 1.298; saṃ0 ni0 5.1081; mahāva0 16; paṭi0 ma0 2.30) avibhāgena vuṭṭhānagāminiyā pavattivasena veditabbaṃ, tayidaṃ satthu sammukhā desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesentassa ñāṇuttarassa sambhavatīti vadanti.
[03] 784^b^.^eb^ ^b^suddhājjhattadassanamatteneva maggavuṭṭhānaṃ na hoti^eb^ mamaṃkāravatthunopi pariññeyyattā maggasaṅkhātaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ, maggena vā vuṭṭhānaṃ ^b^maggavuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^.

[03] 785^b^.^eb^ ^b^rāsiṃ katvā^eb^ti bhūtupādāyavasena duvidhaṃ antarabhedavasena anekabhedampi ``ruppanaṭṭhena rūpa''nti piṇḍato gahetvā. yathā rūpe vipassanābhiniveso yebhuyyena vipassanāyānikassa, evaṃ arūpe vipassanābhiniveso yebhuyyena samathayānikassa hoti. ^b^abhiniveso^eb^ti ca vipassanāya pubbabhāge kattabbanāmarūpaparicchedo veditabbo. tasmā paṭhamaṃ rūpapariggaṇhanaṃ rūpe abhiniveso. esa nayo sesesupi.

[03] 786^b^.^eb^ ^b^yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma^eb^nti kāmaṃ udayabbayapariggaṇhanaṃ abhinivesoti dassitaṃ, yathāupaṭṭhite pana rūpārūpadhamme, tesañca paccaye pariggahetvā saṅkhepeneva vipassanāñāṇaṃ cārento ñāṇuttaro yathānisinnova ñāṇapaṭipāṭiyā khippameva saccāni paṭivijjhanto ekappahārena pañcahi khandhehi vuṭṭhāti nāma. aññathā ekeneva lokiyacittena pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ pariggahaparijānanādīnaṃ asambhavato. na hi sanidassanasappaṭighādiṃ ekajjhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ sakkā. yassa pana ekavāraṃ ñāṇena phassitaṃ, puna taṃ phassitabbameva, tādisassa vasena vuttanti vadanti.

[03] 788^b^.^eb^ ettha ^a^M2.0471^ea^ ca abhiniveso akāraṇaṃ vuṭṭhānameva pamāṇaṃ, tasmā heṭṭhā vuttavimokkhāriyapuggalavibhāgāpi vuṭṭhānavasena sambhavantīti dassetuṃ ^b^``ettha ca yopī''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^tayopi janā^eb^ti vuṭṭhānavasena bhede asatipi abhinivesavaseneva laddhaṃ bhedaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
[03] 789^b^.^eb^ ^b^saddhiṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0443^ea^ ^b^purimapacchimañāṇehī^eb^ti bhayatupaṭṭhānādipurimañāṇehi ceva gotrabhuādipacchimañāṇehi ca saha. ^b^uddāna^eb^nti uddeso.

[03] ^b^yattha katthaci...pe0... vaṭṭeyyuṃ^eb^ taṃtaṃñāṇaṭṭhāniyassa upamāvatthuno labbhanato. ^b^imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne^eb^ti imasmiṃ vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāpadese. ^b^sabba^eb^nti sabbaṃ ñāṇaṃ, sabbaṃ vā ñāṇakiccaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti vemajjhe ṭhatvā vibhāviyamānattā. ^b^vuttā^eb^ visuddhikathāyaṃ.
[03] 790^b^.^eb^ ^b^nilīyitvā^eb^ti upavisitvā. ^b^parāmasitvā^eb^ti vīmaṃsitvā.

[03] ^b^gayhupagaṃ adisvā^eb^ti gahaṇayoggaṃ niccasārādiṃ adisvā. cittassa vaṅkabhāvakarānaṃ māyādīnaṃ suṭṭhu vikkhambhanena anulomassa ujukasākhāsadisatā. nibbānālocanato gotrabhuñāṇassa uddhaṃ ullokanasadisatā. appatiṭṭhe nibbāne patiṭṭhitattā maggañāṇassa ākāse uppatanasadisatā.

[03] 791^b^.^eb^ ^b^sappavissajjanaṃ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ^eb^ sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ vissajjitvā nibbānassa ālambanato. ^b^āgatamaggaṃ olokentassa ṭhānaṃ viya maggañāṇaṃ^eb^ asammohapaṭivedhavasena attanopi dassanato. ^b^abhayaṭṭhāne ṭhāna^eb^nti abhayaṭṭhānaṃ sampattamāha, na tassa pāpuṇapaṭipattiṃ.

[03] 792^b^.^eb^ attatthādīnaṃ anavabujjhanato ``ahaṃ, mamā''ti gahaṇassa niddokkamanasadisatā. ^b^muñcitukamyatā^eb^ggahaṇeneva paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanāpi gahitā. tissannampi tāsaṃ saṃsārato nikkhamanādhimuttatāya nikkhamanamaggolokanasadisatā. magge diṭṭhe maggapaṭipatti viya anulome siddhe maggo siddho evāti anulomassa maggadassanasadisatā. saṅkhāranimittato nikkhantattā ādittagharato ^b^nikkhamanaṃ viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ. vegena^eb^ ^b^gamanaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0472^ea^ ^b^viya maggañāṇaṃ^eb^ vissajjetabbagahetabbapadesesu sādhanakiccavisesayogato.
[03] 793^b^.^eb^ parato na mamāyitabbato ca passitabbānaṃ khandhānaṃ ^b^``ahaṃ, mamā''^eb^ti gahaṇassa rājagoṇānaṃ sakagahaṇasadisatā vuttā.

[03] 794^b^.^eb^ sabhaye ^a^V2.0444^ea^ abhayadassanahetutāya khandhānaṃ ``ahaṃ, mamā''ti gahaṇassa yakkhiniyā saṃvāsasadisatā. ^b^susānavijahanaṃ viya^eb^ saṅkhārasusānaṃ vijahitvā nibbānārammaṇavasena pavattaṃ ^b^gotrabhu^eb^.
[03] 795^b^.^eb^ ^b^puttagiddhinī^eb^ti puttavacchalā. ^b^ottappamānā^eb^ti sārajjayamānā. oḷārikaoḷārikalobhakkhandhādivikkhambhanena saṅkhārapariccajanato anulomassa tattheva dārakoropanasadisatā.

[03] 796^b^.^eb^ ^b^vuṭṭhānagāminiyā...pe0... dassanatthaṃ vuttā,^eb^ na purimāsu viya bhayatupaṭṭhānādīsu ṭhitassa bhāyanādiākāradassanatthanti adhippāyo. aparāparuppattito, cirānubandhato, dussahato ca vaṭṭadukkhasadisaṃ jighacchādukkhanti āha ^b^``saṃsāravaṭṭajighacchāyā''^eb^ti. kāyagatāsati eva bhojanaṃ ^b^kāyagatāsatibhojanaṃ^eb^. sā panettha maggasampayuttā sammāsati kāyānupassanādikiccasādhanavasena amatarasaparibhogatāya ca ^b^``amatarasaṃ kāyagatāsatibhojana''^eb^nti vuttā. tenāha bhagavā ``amataṃ te, bhikkhave, paribhuñjanti, ye kāyagatāsatiṃ paribhuñjantī''tiādi (a0 ni0 1.600).
[03] phalarasāmalakasiṅgīveramuggamāsādi ^b^anekaṅgasambhāraṃ^eb^.
[03] kapaṇāseribhāvādikaraṇena taṇhāsinehassa sītasadisatā. ^b^maggateja^eb^nti ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ indaggiṃ.
[03] rāgaggiādayo ekādasaggī vūpasamanti etthāti ^b^ekādasaggivūpasamaṃ,^eb^ nibbānaṃ.
[03] ^b^andhakārapareto^eb^ti caturaṅgasamannāgatena andhakārena kiñci attatthaṃ vā paratthaṃ vā kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvena abhibhūto. ñāṇamayo āloko etissāti ^b^ñāṇālokā,^eb^ maggabhāvanā.
[03] amatabhūtaṃ ^a^M2.0473^ea^, amatabhāvasādhakaṃ vā osadhaṃ ^b^amatosadhaṃ,^eb^ nibbānaṃ. heṭṭhā attanā vuttameva saṅkhārupekkhābyāpāraṃ nigamanavasena dassento ^b^``tena vutta''^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] 797^b^.^eb^ nirālayatāya ^a^V2.0445^ea^ taṇhāvasena bhavādīsu avisaṭajjhāsayo hutvā tato saṅkucitacitto patilīnabhāvena carati pavattatīti patilīnacaro, tassa ^b^patilīnacarassa^eb^. saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanatāya ^b^bhikkhuno^eb^ kāyacittavivekasiddhiyā ^b^vivittamāsanaṃ bhajamānassa. sāmaggiya^eb^nti yuttaṃ, patirūpanti attho. ^b^bhavane^eb^ti kāmabhavādike tividhepi bhave. so hi idha bhavanaṭṭhena bhavanti vutto. ^b^na dassaye^eb^ti anuppajjanavasena na dasseyya. ^b^tassa taṃ^eb^ adassanaṃ sāmaggiyanti buddhādayo ariyā ^b^āhū^eb^ti yojanā.

[03] ^b^niyametvā^eb^ti niyataṃ ekaṃsikaṃ katvā. bojjhaṅgavisesaṃ, maggaṅgavisesaṃ, jhānaṅgavisesaṃ, paṭipadāvisesaṃ, vimokkhavisesanti visesasaddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. ^b^visesa^eb^nti chasattabhāvo sattaṭṭhabhāvo pañcādibhāvoti imaṃ yathākkamaṃ bojjhaṅgādīnaṃ ariyamagge labbhamānabhedaṃ. ^b^pādakajjhāna^eb^nti maggassa āsannavuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ jhānaṃ. ^b^vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā^eb^ti maggāsannāya eva vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya gocarabhūtā vipassitā. ^b^puggalajjhāsayo^eb^ti ubhinnaṃ bhede sati vipassakassa ajjhāsayo. ettha ca paṭhamaṃ ^b^kecī^eb^ti vutto tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero. dutiyaṃ ^b^kecī^eb^ti vutto moravāpīvāsimahādattatthero. tatiyaṃ ^b^kecī^eb^ti vutto tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero.

[03] ^b^tesampi vādesu ayaṃ pubbabhāgavuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā niyametiyevāti veditabbā^eb^. kasmā? vipassanāniyameneva hi paṭhamattheravādepi apādakapaṭhamajjhānapādakamaggā paṭhamajjhānikāva honti, itare ca dutiyajjhānikādimaggā pādakajjhānavipassanāniyamehi taṃtaṃjhānikāva tato tato dutiyādipādakajjhānato uppannassa saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa pādakajjhānātikkantānaṃ aṅgānaṃ asamāpajjitukāmatāvirāgabhāvanābhāvato, itarassa ca atabbhāvato. yathā hi maggāsannāya vipassanāya somanassasahagatatte maggassa paṭhamādijhānikatā ca upekkhāsahagatatte pañcamajjhānikatā eva ca hoti, tato ca bojjhaṅgādīnaṃ ^a^M2.0474^ea^ visesoti tesaṃ niyamane āsannakāraṇaṃ, padhānakāraṇañca vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā, na evaṃ pādakajjhānādayo. yasmā pana pādakajjhānena vinā vipassanāva imaṃ yathāvuttavisesaṃ niyametuṃ na sakkoti, vuttanayena pana padhānakāraṇaṃ hotiyeva, tasmā ``vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāva niyametī''ti avatvā ``vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā niyametiyevā''ti vuttaṃ. evaṃ sesavādesupi vipassanāniyamo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo. yathā hi pādakajjhānātikkantānaṃ aṅgānaṃ asamāpajjitukāmatāvirāgabhāvanābhūtā ^a^V2.0446^ea^ vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā adhiṭṭhānabhūtena pādakajjhānena āhitavisesā maggassa bojjhaṅgādivisesaniyāmikā hoti, evaṃ ārammaṇabhūtasammasitajjhānātikkantānaṃ aṅgānaṃ jigucchanākāravirāgabhāvanābhūtā sammasitajjhānena āhitavisesā, ubhayasabbhāve ajjhāsayavasena tato aññatarena āhitavisesā ca vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā maggassa bojjhaṅgādivisesaṃ niyametīti.

[03] 798^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatra^eb^ tasmiṃ bojjhaṅgādivisesaniyamane. ajhānalābhī suddhavipassanāyānikova sukkhavipassako. so hi jhānasinehena vipassanāya asiniddhabhāvato sukkhā lūkhā vipassanā etassāti ^b^sukkhavipassako^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre^eb^ti pādakajjhānato aññe saṅkhāre. tena pādakajjhānasaṅkhāresu sammasitesu vattabbameva natthīti dasseti. ^b^``paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā''^eb^ti hi vuttaṃ. ettha ca sukkhavipassakādiggahaṇaṃ vipassanāniyamassa ekantikabhāvadassanatthaṃ. na hi vuṭṭhānagāminiṃ vinā kevalaṃ pādakajjhānādayo niyamahetū diṭṭhā, vuṭṭhānagāminī pana pādakajjhānādīnaṃ abhāvepi sukkhavipassakādīnaṃ maggassa paṭhamajjhānikabhāvahetu, tasmā sā bojjhaṅgādivisesaniyamane ekantikahetūti. idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^``tesaṃ hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^ayaṃ viseso^eb^ti ayaṃ jhānādīnaṃ caturaṅgikādiviseso, na pubbe viya vipassanāniyameneva, atha kho pādakajjhānaniyamena ceva vipassanāniyamena ca. ^b^tesampī^eb^ti pañcakanaye dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānāni pādakāni katvā uppāditamaggānampi. ^b^``āsannapadese''^eb^ti iminā vipassakena antarantarā paviṭṭhasamāpattiyā vasena ayaṃ viseso natthīti dasseti.

[03] 799^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrāpi^eb^ ^a^M2.0475^ea^ ^b^cā^eb^ti dutiyattheravādepi. taṃtaṃsamāpattisadisatā taṃtaṃsammasitasaṅkhāravipassanāniyamehi hoti. tatrāpi hi vipassanā taṃtaṃvirāgāvirāgabhāvanābhāvena somanassasahagatā, upekkhāsahagatā ca hutvā jhānaṅgādiniyamaṃ maggassa karotīti evaṃ vipassanāniyamo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] 800^b^.^eb^ ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃtaṃjhānasadisabhavaṃ. ^b^svāyamattho^eb^ pādakajjhānasammasitajjhānupanissayehi vinā ajjhāsayamattena asijjhanaṃ upanissayena vinā saṅkappamattena sakadāgāmiphalādīnaṃ asijjhanadīpakena ^b^nandakovādena dīpetabbo^eb^. tattha hi yathā sotāpannāyapi paripuṇṇasaṅkappataṃ vadantena ^a^V2.0447^ea^ bhagavatā ``yassa yassa upanissayo atthi, tassa tasseva ajjhāsayo niyāmako, nāññassā''ti tena tena paripuṇṇasaṅkappatā hoti, na tato paraṃ, saṅkappasabbhāve satipi asijjhanatoti ayamattho dīpito, evamidhāpi yassa yassa dutiyādijhānikassa maggassa yathāvutto upanissayo atthi, tassa tasseva ajjhāsayo niyāmako, nāññassa satipi tasmiṃ asijjhanato. imasmiṃ pana vāde pādakasammasitajjhānupanissayasabbhāve ajjhāsayo ekantena hoti taṃtaṃphalūpanissayasabbhāve taṃtaṃsaṅkappo viyāti tadabhāvābhāvato ``ajjhāsayo niyametī''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^etthāpī^eb^ti tatiyattheravādepi. ^b^vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ``yato yato samāpattito vuṭṭhāyā''tiādinā vuttanayena. tasmā ``tatrāpi hi vipassanā''tiādinā idha vuttanayena tadattho veditabbo.

[03] 801^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vipassanāya bojjhaṅgādiniyāmikataṃ dassetvā idāni paṭipadādiniyāmikataṃ dassento ^b^``sace panāya''^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^aya^eb^nti saṅkhārupekkhā vuttā. sāpi hi kāmaṃ ``imaṃ vāraṃ rocesu''nti ettha kalāpasammasanāvasāne udayabbayānupassanāya pavattamānāya uppannassa vipassanupakkilesassa tikkhattuṃ vikkhambhanena kicchatāvāraṃ dukkhāpaṭipadāti rocesunti vadanti, ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ pana ``vipassanāñāṇe tikkhe sūre pasanne vahante uppannaṃ vipassanānikantiṃ dukkhena kasirena kilamanto pariyādiyatī''ti vuttattā pubbabhāge muñcitukamyatādibhāvena pavattamānā ^a^M2.0476^ea^ saṅkhārupekkhā attano paṭipakkhe kicchena kasirena vikkhambhentī dukkhāpaṭipadāpakkheyeva tiṭṭhatīti. tenāha ^b^``ādito kilese vikkhambhayamānā''^eb^tiādi. keci pana ``yena ñāṇena vipassanupakkilesā vikkhambhitā, tena saddhiṃ idaṃ ñāṇaṃ ekattanayavasena ekaṃ katvā ^b^`ādito kilese vikkhambhayamānā'^eb^ti vutta''nti vadanti. ^b^sappayogenā^eb^ti cittappayogasaṅkhātena saussāhanena. ^b^sasaṅkhārenā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ubhayenāpi vikkhambhanassa kicchasiddhimeva vadati. ^b^vipariyāyenā^eb^ti adukkhena appayogena asaṅkhārena. maggasaññitaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ anugantvā parivasati vippavasati etthāti parivāso, vipassanā parivāso etassa atthīti ^b^vipassanāparivāso,^eb^ maggapātubhāvo, taṃ pana sīghaṃ kurumānā khippābhiññā nāma hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``saṇika''^eb^nti. kurumānā ayaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāti yojanā. yato maggo āgacchati, taṃ āgamanīyaṭṭhānaṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^āgamanīyaṭṭhāne^eb^. maggassa pabhavaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā nāmaṃ detīti sambandho. dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiññādivipassanānayo añño, añño eva maggoti āha ^b^``attano attano maggassā''^eb^ti. ^b^tena^eb^ āgamanato laddhanāmena ``dukkhāpaṭipadā ^a^V2.0448^ea^ dandhābhiññā''tiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati. na hi maggassa sarasato edisaṃ nāmaṃ atthi.

[03] ^b^sā panāyaṃ^eb^ vuttappabhedā ^b^paṭipadā. nānā hotī^eb^ti visuṃ visuṃ hoti. ekassa bhikkhuno ^b^catūsupi maggesu ekāva^eb^ hotīti niyamo natthi calanato. ^b^ahesu^eb^nti vuttaṃ, amhākaṃ bhagavantaṃ sandhāya hontīti pana vattabbaṃ. sabbesampi hi sammāsambuddhānaṃ cattāropi maggā sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññāva hontīti. paṭipadāpasaṅgena adhipatimpi dassetuṃ ^b^``yathā cā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^adhipatayo^eb^ti chandādiadhipatayo. pubbābhisaṅkhārānurūpañhi maggo paccekaṃ chandādhipateyyo vā hoti vīriyādīsu aññatarādhipateyyo vā, na kassaci niyamo atthi. tenāha ^b^``kassaci bhikkhuno''^eb^tiādi.

[03] 802^b^.^eb^ pubbe vuttappakārato sātisayaṃ katvā anavasesato maggassa nāmalābhe kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^sarasenā^eb^ti sabhāvena attano pavattivisesena. ^b^paccanīkenā^eb^ti paṭipakkhavasena. ^b^saguṇenā^eb^ti attano guṇavasena.

[03] kāmañcettha ^a^M2.0477^ea^ yathā āgamanena vinā saguṇena, ārammaṇena ca maggassa nāmalābho avavatthito, evaṃ paccanīkena vinā saraseneva nāmalābho, tathāpi sarasādayo paccekaṃ nāmalābhassa kāraṇamevāti dassetuṃ ^b^``sarasena vā''^eb^tiādinā sabbattha aniyamattho ^b^vā^eb^-saddo vutto. te ca asaṅkarato dassetuṃ ^b^``sace hī''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^sammasitvā^eb^ti sammasanahetu. hetuattho hi ayaṃ ^b^tvā^eb^-saddo ``ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ hoti, sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hotī''tiādīsu viya, maggakattukāya vuṭṭhānakiriyāya ekantikahetubhūtā saṅkhārupekkhā phalūpacārena ^b^``vuṭṭhātī''^eb^ti vuttā. yasmā vā saṅkhārupekkhāti vuṭṭhānagāminiyā etaṃ upalakkhaṇaṃ, tadantogadhañca gotrabhuñāṇaṃ nimittato vuṭṭhāti, tasmā vuttaṃ ekattanayena ^b^``sammasitvā vuṭṭhātī''^eb^ti. ^b^animittavimokkhena vimuccatī^eb^ti animittasaññitena vimuccanena vimuccati, ``maggo''ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^vimuccatī^eb^ti vā taṃsamaṅgī ariyapuggalo. sesadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^idaṃ sarasato nāmaṃ nāmā^eb^ti idaṃ nimittādivirahato animittaṃ appaṇihitaṃ suññatanti tividhampi maggassa sabhāvato siddhanāmaṃ nāma.

[03] ^b^esā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0449^ea^ maggo. so ca kho pubbabhāgamaggena saddhiṃ ekaṃ katvā vutto ekattanayena. ^b^idaṃ paccanīkato nāmaṃ nāmā^eb^ti idaṃ niccanimittādīnaṃ paṇidhiyā, attasaññāya ca pahānavasena laddhaṃ maggassa animittādināmattayaṃ paṭipakkhato siddhanāmaṃ nāma.

[03] ^b^suññattā^eb^ti vivittattā. na hi magge rāgādayo santi. ^b^rūpanimittādīna^eb^nti rūpanimittavedanānimittādīnaṃ gahetabbānanti adhippāyo. ^b^rāganimittādīna^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. saviggahānaṃ viya upaṭṭhānañhettha nimittanti adhippetaṃ. ^b^idamassa saguṇato^eb^ nāmanti idaṃ rāgādivivittattā rūpanimittādipaṇidhiādiabhāvavasena assa maggassa saguṇato siddhaṃ nāmaṃ.

[03] ^b^svāya^eb^nti so ayaṃ maggo. ^b^suññata^eb^nti sabbasaṅkhārasuññato, attasuññato ca ^b^suññataṃ^eb^. sabbasaṅkhāranimittābhāvato ^b^animittaṃ^eb^. taṇhāpaṇidhiādīnaṃ abhāvena ^b^appaṇihitaṃ. idamassa ārammaṇato nāma^eb^nti yathā sukhārammaṇaṃ rūpaṃ ``sukha''nti vuccati, evaṃ suññatādināmassa nibbānassa ^a^M2.0478^ea^ ārammaṇakaraṇato idaṃ assa maggassa suññatādibhedaṃ ārammaṇato siddhaṃ nāmaṃ.

[03] 803^b^.^eb^ anattānupassanā attasuññatāya diṭṭhattā sarasato ^b^suññatā nāma^eb^. tassā suññatāvipassanāya maggo vipassanāgamanena ^b^suññato. animittā nāma^eb^ niccanimittādīnaṃ ugghāṭanato. ^b^idaṃ pana^eb^ maggassa animittanāmaṃ ^b^na abhidhammapariyāyena labbhati^eb^. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? abhidhamme sarasaṃ anāmasitvā paccanīkato nāmalābhato. yo hi saguṇārammaṇehi nāmalābho, so sarasappadhāno hoti, saraseneva ca nāmalābhe sabbamaggānaṃ suññatādibhāvoti vavatthānaṃ na siyā. tasmā abhidhamme satipi dvīhipi kāraṇehi animittanāmalābhe paccanīkatova nāmavavatthānakaraṇaṃ gayhatīti tadabhāvā na labbhati. atha vā ^b^na labbhatī^eb^ti aññanirapekkhehi saguṇārammaṇehi na labbhati. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? abhidhamme sarasapaccanīkehi sahitehi nāmalābhato. paccanīkañhi vavatthānakaraṇaṃ anapekkhitvā kevalassa sarasassa nāmahetubhāvo abhidhamme natthi, avavatthānāpattito. tasmā attābhinivesapaṇidhipaṭipakkhavipassanānulomā maggā satipi sarasantare paccanīkasahitena sarasena nāmaṃ labhanti. animittamaggassa pana vipassanā nimittapaṭipakkhā na hoti, sayaṃ nimittaggahaṇato nimittaggahaṇānivāraṇāti tadanulomo maggopi na nimittassa paṭipakkho. yadi siyā, nimittagatavipassanāyapi paṭipakkho siyā, tasmā vijjamānopi saraso vavatthānakarapaccanīkābhāvā abhidhamme animittanāmadāyako ^a^V2.0450^ea^ na gayhatīti. yadi evaṃ, aniccānupassanānulomo maggo abhidhamme asaṅgahito siyāti? na, suddhikapaṭipadānaye tassa saṅgahitattā. tasmā eva hi so vutto. suttante pana pariyāyadesanattā saguṇārammaṇamattenapi nāmaṃ gayhatīti āha ^b^``suttantapariyāyena labbhatī''^eb^ti. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. āgamanavasenapi maggassa animittanāmaṃ labbhatiyevāti dassetuṃ ^b^``tatrā hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^āgamanīyaṭṭhāne^eb^ti āgamanapaṭipadāṭhāne. sesaṃ vuttanayattā uttānamevāti.
[06] saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 804^b^.^eb^ ^b^adhimokkhasaddhā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0479^ea^ pasādabhūto vatthugato nicchayo adhimokkho. tasmā tathābhūtā bhāvanāvisesena kiccato adhimattatāya balavatarā nibbattati. ^b^supaggahita^eb^nti suṭṭhu paggahitaṃ. asallīnaṃ paṭutarabhāvena paṭipakkhavidhamanasamatthaṃ vīriyaṃ hoti. ^b^sūpaṭṭhitā^eb^ti tikkhataratāya ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvena suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā sati hoti. ^b^susamāhita^eb^nti passaddhisukhānaṃ sātisayatāya suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ ārammaṇe sammadeva ṭhapitaṃ appitaṃ viya hoti. ^b^tikkhatarā^eb^ti anulomañāṇuppattiyā paccayo bhavituṃ samatthabhāvena sātisayaṃ tikkhā sūrā. saṅkhārānaṃ vicinanepi majjhattabhūta^b^saṅkhārupekkhā^eb^ paññā ^b^uppajjati. aniccāti vā...pe0... sammasitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otaratī^eb^ti aniccādīsu ekenākārena sammasantī sattakkhattuṃ pavattitvā bhijjantī bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇā nāma hoti tato paraṃ bhavaṅgassa vāroti katvā. ^b^saṅkhārupekkhāya katanayenevā^eb^ti aniccādinā ālambanakaraṇanayeneva, na sammasitanayena. tenāha ^b^``ārammaṇaṃ kurumāna''^eb^nti. ^b^āvaṭṭetvā^eb^ti nivattetvā cittassa bhavaṅgavasena vattituṃ adatvā. visadisacittapavattisaṅkhātāya vīciyā abhāvena avīcikā, cittasantati. kiriyamanodhātuyā hi bhavaṅge āvaṭṭite kiriyamayacittapavattivipākacittuppattiyā savīcikā santarā, na evaṃ manodvārāvajjanenāti vuttaṃ ^b^``avīcikaṃ cittasantatiṃ anuppabandhamāna''^eb^nti. ^b^tathevā^eb^ti yathā atītāsu dvattiṃsajavanavīthīsu saṅkhārupekkhā ``aniccā''ti vā ``dukkhā''ti vā ``anattā''ti vā saṅkhāre ārammaṇamakāsi, tatheva. ^b^parikammanti vuccati^eb^ maggassa parikammattā paṭisaṅkhārakattā ^a^V2.0451^ea^. ^b^upacāranti vuccati^eb^ maggassa āsannattā, samīpacārikattā vā. anulomattaṃ sayameva vadati.

[03] ayañca nayo kāmaṃ maggavīthiyaṃ paṭhamajavanassa paṭisaṅkharaṇaṭṭho, dutiyassa tato āsannaṭṭho, tatiyassa heṭṭhimuparimānaṃ anulomaṭṭho ca yuttoti vutto, tathāpi sabbesampi imā samaññā sambhavantīti dassetuṃ ^b^``avisesena panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^āsevana^eb^nti ādarena sevanaṃ. ^b^purimabhāgapacchimabhāgāna^eb^nti heṭṭhimānaṃ, uparimānañca dhammakoṭṭhāsānaṃ. ^b^aṭṭhanna^eb^nti udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ. sabbāpi vipassanā lakkhaṇattayasammasanakiccāva ^a^M2.0480^ea^, idampi tathevāti vuttaṃ ^b^``tathakiccatāyā''^eb^ti. ^b^uparī^eb^ti magge. ^b^bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ^eb^ tathakiccatāya anulometi sammosādipaṭipakkhavidhamanato. idāni anulomañāṇassa tadubhayakiccānulomaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^``tañhī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha anulomañāṇaṃ saccapaṭicchādakamohakkhandhādīnaṃ ^b^sātisayaṃ^eb^ vidhamanena lokiyañāṇesu ukkaṃsapariyantagataṃ, tato eva heṭṭhā nibbattitaudayabbayañāṇādīnampi kiccaṃ paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena atthato sādhentameva hutvā pavattati, tathāpavattamānañca tesaṃ kiccaṃ anulomentaṃ viya hotīti āha ^b^``udayabbayavantānaṃ...pe0... tathakiccatāya anulometī''^eb^ti. tattha ^b^``bhayato upaṭṭhita''^eb^nti imināpi ārammaṇasīsena ñāṇabyāpārameva vadati sappaṭibhayānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ yathāsabhāvadassanadīpanato. sesesu pana sattasupi ṭhānesu ñāṇabyāpārova dassito. yasmā etaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ aniccādīsu aññataralakkhaṇavaseneva saṅkhāre ārabbha pavattati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``aniccalakkhaṇādivasena saṅkhāre ārabbha pavattattā''^eb^ti. ^b^tāya paṭipattiyā^eb^ti yā sā anulomañāṇassa thūlathūlasaccapaṭicchādakasaṃkilesavikkhambhanapaṭipatti, tāya. na hi anulomañāṇe tathā anuppanne gotrabhuñāṇaṃ nibbānaṃ ālambituṃ sakkoti, gotrabhuñāṇe vā anuppanne maggañāṇaṃ uppajjatīti.

[03] vuttamatthaṃ opammena pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^``yathā hī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha aṭṭhannaṃ ^b^vohārikamahāmattānaṃ agatigamanaṃ pahāya^eb^ taṃtaṃvinicchayakaraṇaṃ viya aṭṭhannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ pahāya saṅkhāresu udayabbayādipaṭipatti, rañño majjhattabhāvo viya anulomañāṇassa purimapacchimadhammakoṭṭhāsassa anukūlatā. ^b^tenevā^eb^ti heṭṭhimañāṇānaṃ anulomanamukhena uparibodhipakkhiyānaṃ anulomanatoyeva. ^b^saccānulomikanti vuccati^eb^ maggasaccassa anulomikattā.
[06] anulomañāṇaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 805^b^.^eb^ kiñci ^a^M2.0481^ea^ ^a^V2.0452^ea^ asaṅkhatārammaṇampi ñāṇaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā ekasaṅgahanti katvā ^b^``saṅkhārārammaṇāyā''^eb^ti visesanaṃ kataṃ. tañhi visesato vuṭṭhānaṃ ariyamaggaṃ gacchati upetīti vuṭṭhānagāminīti vattabbataṃ labhati. tenāha ^b^``sabbena sabba''^eb^ntiādi. ^b^asammohattha^eb^nti tattha tattha sutte pariyāyantarehi āgatāya sammohābhāvatthaṃ. ^b^suttasaṃsandanā^eb^ti suttānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ suttapadānaṃ anusandānaṃ.

[03] ye lokiye saṅkhāre ārabbha anulomapariyosānā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā pavattati, taṃsannissitā tappaṭibaddhā taṇhā tehi vinā appavattanato tammayā nāma, tammayāva tammayatā, tammayā vā taṇhāsampayuttā khandhā, tesaṃ bhāvo tammayatā, sā eva taṇhā. tappaṭipakkhā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā ^b^atammayatā^eb^. tena vuttaṃ ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ``tammayatā nāma taṇhā, tassā pariyādiyanato vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā atammayatāti vuccatī''ti (ma0 ni0 aṭṭha0 3.310). ^b^nissāyā^eb^ti taṃ atammayataṃ nissayaṃ katvā, bhāvetvāti attho. ^b^ekattā^eb^ti ettha ayaṃ pāḷi ``atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā rūpesu...pe0... phoṭṭhabbesu, ayaṃ, bhikkhave, upekkhā nānattā nānattasitā''ti (ma0 ni0 3.310), sayampi nānāsabhāvā, nānārammaṇanissitā cāti attho. sā pana samādhisampayuttā vipassanupekkhā veditabbā. ``atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā ākāsānañcāyatananissitā...pe0... nevasaññānāsaññāyatananissitā, ayaṃ, bhikkhave, upekkhā ekattā ekattasitā''ti (ma0 ni0 3.310). yā hi taṃtaṃarūpacittuppādapariyāpannā upekkhā, sā ekasabhāvattā, ekārammaṇattā ca ekattā, ekattasitā cāti vuccati, sā pana taṃtaṃjhānasahagatavedanupekkhā ca tadārammaṇavipassanupekkhā cāti vadanti. ^b^taṃ pajahathā^eb^ti tadārammaṇakilesapahānena pajahatha. tenāha ^b^``taṃ samatikkamathā''^eb^ti.
[03] ^b^nibbidā^eb^ti vuṭṭhānagāminī. tattha hi sutte ^b^virajjatī^eb^ti maggakiccamāha, ^b^vimuccatī^eb^ti phalakiccaṃ.

[03] ^b^susimasuttaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0482^ea^ ^a^V2.0453^ea^ nidānavagge. tattha ^b^dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ^eb^ vuṭṭhānagāminīti ^b^vuttā^eb^ dhammaṭṭhitiyaṃ paṭiccasamuppāde asammuyhanavasena pavattanato. ^b^nibbāne ñāṇa^eb^nti maggañāṇamāha.
[03] ^b^saññā kho, poṭṭhapādā^eb^ti ettha kāmaṃ ``saññā''icceva vuccati, pubbe pana ``saññaggaṃ phusatī''ti vuttattā āha ^b^``saññagganti vuttā''^eb^ti.
[03] ^b^paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhī^eb^ti tadekadesabhūtā vuṭṭhānagāminī vuttā. samudāyesu hi pavattā vohārā avayavesupi pavattantīti. ^b^pārisuddhipadhāniyaṅga^eb^nti pārisuddhiyā padhānakāraṇaṃ.
[03] ^b^tīhi nāmehī^eb^ti anulomagotrabhuvodānasaṅkhātehi tīhi nāmehi.
[03] ^b^kittitā^eb^ti thomitā ariyamaggādhiṭṭhānatāya. mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esanaṭṭhena ^b^mahesinā^eb^ sammāsambuddhena. santakilesatāya ^b^santā. yoga^eb^nti bhāvanaṃ, bhāvanābhiyogaṃ vā.
[06] paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti ekavīsatimaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 806^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^M2.0483^ea^ ^a^V2.0454^ea^ ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā niddese anuppatte sā yassa ñāṇassa anantaraṃ uppajjati, taṃ tāva dassento ^b^``ito paraṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ hotī''^eb^ti āha. ^b^ito para^eb^nti ito anulomañāṇato upari. ^b^ta^eb^nti gotrabhuñāṇaṃ. ^b^neva paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ bhajati^eb^ aniccādivasena saṅkhārānaṃ aggahaṇato. ^b^na ñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ bhajati^eb^ satipi nibbānārammaṇatte kilesānaṃ akhepanato. tato evetaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ visayaṃ uddesantaṃ dassanakiccaṃ karontaṃ kiriyamanodhātu viya maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṃ vuccati. ^b^antarā^eb^ti chaṭṭhasattamavisuddhīnaṃ vemajjhe. ^b^abbohārikameva hoti^eb^ ubhayavisuddhilakkhaṇatābhāvato. tathāpi vuṭṭhānagāminiyā pariyosānatāya vipassanāpakkhikaṃ. tenevassa taṃsotapatitatā. tenāha ^b^``vipassanāsote...pe0... saṅkhaṃ gacchatī''^eb^ti. etenassa paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhibhajanaṃ dasseti. sotassa ariyassāadito pajjanaṃ sotāpatti, so eva maggo, sotaṃ vā ariyaṃ ādito pajjati adhigacchatīti sotāpatti, paṭhamako. tassa maggo ^b^sotāpattimaggo^eb^. paṭisandhivasena sakideva imaṃ manussalokaṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī, tassa maggo ^b^sakadāgāmimaggo^eb^. paṭisandhivasena kāmabhavaṃ na āgacchatīti anāgāmī, tassa maggo ^b^anāgāmimaggo^eb^. kilesādīnaṃ hananādinā arahaṃ, aggamaggaṭṭho. tassa bhāvo arahattaṃ, so eva maggoti ^b^arahattamaggo. catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ^eb^ ekajjhaṃ gahetvā ^b^ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma^eb^.

[01] ^b^tehi tīhipī^eb^ti heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ anulomañāṇānaṃ vuttattā vuttaṃ, tīsu vā dvinnaṃ antogadhattā. ^b^tīhipī^eb^ti vā vikappantarasampiṇḍanattho ^b^pi^eb^-saddo, tena tīhipi dvīhipīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^attano balānurūpenā^eb^ti attano attano ānubhāvānukūlaṃ. paṭhamañhi anulomañāṇaṃ sabboḷārikaṃ, dutiyaṃ tato nātioḷārikaṃ, tatiyaṃ tato nātioḷārikaṃ tamaṃ antaradhāpeti. atha vā ^b^balānurūpenā^eb^ti heṭṭhā ^a^V2.0455^ea^ saṅkhārupekkhāya āhitabalānurūpena ^a^M2.0484^ea^. pubbābhisaṅkhāravasena hi anulomañāṇassāpi maggañāṇassa viya saddhāvimuttadiṭṭhippattānaṃ pavattiākārasiddho attheva mudutikkhatāviseso. ^b^palibodhato upaṭṭhāti^eb^ palibodhabhāvapaṭicchādakassa tamassa antaradhāpitattā. ^b^``āsevanante''^eb^ti iminā dutiyassa vā tatiyassa vā anulomañāṇassa anantaraṃ gotrabhuñāṇuppatti, na paṭhamassāti dasseti tassa anāsevanattā. na hi aladdhāsevanaṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkoti. nimittādivirahato, tabbidhurato ca ^b^``animitta''^eb^ntiādinā nibbānaṃ visesitaṃ. ^b^puthujjanagotta^eb^nti ariyehi asammissaṃ puthujjanasamaññaṃ. ^b^gotta^eb^nti hi ekavaṃsajānaṃ samānā samaññā, evaṃ idhāpīti. ^b^puthujjanasaṅkha^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ, ^b^puthujjanabhūmi^eb^nti puthujjanavatthuṃ. ekantikatāya ekavārameva ca uppajjanato ^b^apunarāvaṭṭakaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^bahiddhā vuṭṭhānavivaṭṭane^eb^ti asaṅkhatadhātuyā bahibhāvato bahiddhāsaññitā saṅkhāragatā vuṭṭhānabhūte vivaṭṭane nipphajjamāne paññā. ^b^abhibhuyyatī^eb^ti abhibhavati. ^b^pakkhandatī^eb^ti anupavisati. ettha ca ^b^``uppādaṃ abhibhuyyatī''^eb^tiādinā puthujjanagottābhibhavanaṃ tadatikkamanamāha. ^b^``anuppādaṃ pakkhandatī''^eb^tiādinā ariyagottabhāvanaṃ tadubhayabhāvato.

[03] 807^b^.^eb^ ekāvajjanānaṃ nānāvīthitā natthīti na taṃnisedhanāya ekavīthiggahaṇaṃ, atha kho nānārammaṇānampi ekāvajjanānaṃ nānāvīthitā natthīti dassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^mahāmātika^eb^nti mahantaṃ udakavāhakaṃ. ^b^laṅghitvā^eb^ti anotaranto eva atikkamitvā. ^b^ullaṅghitvā^eb^ti uparibhāgeneva laṅghitvā. ninnapoṇapabbhāratā uttaruttaravisiṭṭhā ninnatāva.

[03] aṭṭhahi ñāṇehi anukkamena āhitavisesaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ nibbānārammaṇassa ñāṇassa paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ jātanti āha ^b^``udayabbayānupassanādinā vegena dhāvitvā''^eb^ti. rūpaṃ anekasantatisambandhatāya anekavaṭṭaracitā rajju viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^``rūparajjuṃ vā''^eb^ti. attabhāvassa rukkhaṭṭhāniyatāya vuttattā taṃsambandhadaṇḍaṭṭhāniyatā vedanādīsu ekasseva yuttā, na vedanādisamudāyassāti vuttaṃ ^b^``vedanādīsu aññataradaṇḍaṃ vā''^eb^ti. ^b^anulomāvajjanenā^eb^ti anulomassa āvajjanena. yena āvajjanena anulomañāṇaṃ uppajjati, tena ^b^taṃ^eb^ ārammaṇaṃ. ^b^``paṭhamena anulomacittena ullaṅghitvā''^eb^ti idaṃ sakkāyatīrassa tassa atikkamanārambhatāya ^a^M2.0485^ea^ vuttaṃ. ^b^``dutiyena nibbānaninnapoṇapabbhāramānaso''^eb^ti idaṃ tassa sabbasaṅkhārato sātisayaṃ alaggaṃ hutvā ^a^V2.0456^ea^ visaṅkhāre allīnabhāvato vuttaṃ. ^b^nibbāne^eb^ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena ^b^patati^eb^ yogāvacaro. ^b^ekārammaṇe^eb^ti ekavāraṃyeva ālambite ārammaṇe. tenāha ^b^``aladdhāsevanatāyā''^eb^ti. tena ekārammaṇe āsevanā upakāravatī, na tathā nānārammaṇeti dasseti.
[03] 808^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrā^eb^ti anulomagotrabhūnaṃ itarītarakiccākaraṇe. ^b^nakkhattayoga^eb^nti nakkhattena candassa yogaṃ, nakkhattayogavibhāvaniyaṃ vā kālaṃ, divasanti attho.
[03] ^b^tatthā^eb^tiādi upamāsaṃsandanaṃ.

[03] ^b^evaṃ nibbattāhī^eb^ti anulomañāṇāni viya saṅkhāre anālambitvā ahaṃ viya nibbānārammaṇe vattāhīti maggassa gotrabhunā dinnasaññāmuñcanaṃ, anubandhanañca nibbānārammaṇakaraṇameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.

[03] 809^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ gotrabhunā dinnasaññaṃ amuñcitvā viya tena gahitārammaṇeyeva vattitvā maggassa lobhakkhandhādinibbijjhane. usuṃ asati khippatīti ^b^issāso,^eb^ dhanuggaho. saragocaraṭṭhānaṃ nāma aṭṭhausabhamattaṃ. tañca kho dūre pātino majjhimapurisassa vasena catuhatthāya yaṭṭhiyā vīsatiyaṭṭhi usabhaṃ, tena ^b^aṭṭhausabhamatte padese^eb^ hatthavasena cattārīsādhikachasatahatthe padese. ^b^phalakasata^eb^nti asanasāramayaṃ phalakasataṃ. kumbhakāracakkasadise ^b^cakkayante. āvijjhitvā^eb^ti bhametvā. daṇḍakaghaṭṭanāya uppādetabbasaddo ^b^daṇḍakasaññā^eb^. phalakasatavinivijjhanassa paccayabhūtā ^b^daṇḍakasaññā viya gotrabhuñāṇaṃ^eb^ lobhakkhandhādinibbijjhanassa maggañāṇassa paccayabhāvato. ^b^issāso viya maggañāṇaṃ^eb^ nibbijjhitabbanivijjhanato.

[03] 810^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamabhavato paṭṭhāya nibbattanakaṃ ^b^anamataggasaṃsāravaṭṭadukkhasamuddaṃ soseti^eb^. saddhādhanaṃ sīladhanaṃ hiridhanaṃ ottappadhanaṃ sutadhanaṃ cāgadhanaṃ paññādhananti imesaṃ ^b^sattannaṃ ariyadhanānaṃ. sammukhībhāva^eb^nti paccakkhasiddhiṃ. pāṇātipātādipañcaverāni ^a^M2.0486^ea^ ceva pañcavīsatimahābhayāni cāti ^b^sabbaverabhayāni. aññesañca^eb^ ratanattaye niviṭṭhasaddhādīnaṃ. samudāye pavatto sotāpattimaggasaddo tadekadesepi pavattatīti āha ^b^``sotāpattimaggena sampayuttaṃ ñāṇa''^eb^nti.
[06] paṭhamamaggañāṇaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 811^b^.^eb^ ^b^tasseva^eb^ ^a^V2.0457^ea^ sotāpattimaggacittassa. kāmañcettha nātitikkhapaññassa dve, tikkhapaññassa tīṇi phalacittāni honti, avisesato pana gahitassa maggassa vasena ^b^``dve, tīṇi vā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^samādhimānantarikaññamāhū^eb^ti yaṃ attano pavattisamanantaraṃ niyameneva phalappadānato ānantarikasamādhīti āhūti attho. anantarameva pavattanakaṃ phalaṃ anantaraṃ, tattha niyutto, taṃ vā payojanaṃ etassāti ānantariko, maggo.

[03] ^b^āsevanante^eb^ti āsevanato ante, āsevanalābhino anulomañāṇassa anantaranti attho. laddhāsevanameva anulomaṃ gotrabhuṃ uppādeti. upari pana cha, satta vā javanāni pavattanti, tasmā cattāri phalacittāni hontīti vadeyyāti āha ^b^``sattacittaparamā ca ekāvajjanavīthī''^eb^ti.
[03] taṃ pana na sārato paccetabbanti yojanā. yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.

[03] 812^b^.^eb^ ^b^ettāvatā^eb^ti paṭhamamaggānantaraṃ phalassa uppattimakkena. ^b^bhusaṃ pamattopī^eb^ti devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṃ āgamma bhusaṃ pamattopi. ^b^yesaṃ^eb^ yathāvuttāavajjanajavanacittānaṃ ^b^uppattiyā esa^eb^ sotāpanno ^b^paccavekkhati^eb^ nāmāti adhippāyo.
[03] eteneva pasaṅgena sesānaṃ ariyānaṃ paccavekkhaṇāni dassetuṃ ^b^``yathā cā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^ukkaṭṭhaparicchedoyeva^eb^ ^a^M2.0487^ea^ ^b^ceso,^eb^ yadidaṃ pañcannaṃ, catunnañca paccavekkhaṇānaṃ dassananti attho. ^b^``abhāvenevā''^eb^ti etena pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇasamatthatā kassaci hoti, kassaci na hotīti dasseti. lobho eva ^b^lobhadhammo^eb^.

[03] 813^b^.^eb^ ^b^kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvāyā^eb^ti etesaṃ kilesānaṃ tanubhāvatthaṃ. tattha dvīhi kāraṇehi tanubhāvo adhiccuppattiyā, pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya ca. sakadāgāmissa hi vaṭṭānusārimahājanassa ^a^V2.0458^ea^ viya kilesā abhiṇhaṃ na uppajjanti, kadāci kadāci viraḷākārā hutvā uppajjanti. tathā uppajjantāpi maddantā chādentā andhakāraṃ karontā na uppajjanti, dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā mandamandā tanukākārā hutvā uppajjanti. keci pana ``sakadāgāmissāpi kilesā cirena uppajjanti, uppajjantāpi bahalāva uppajjanti. tathā hissa puttadhītaro dissantī''ti, taṃ akāraṇaṃ vatthupaṭisevanena vināpi gabbhaggahaṇasabbhāvato. tasmā vuttanayeneva dvīhi kāraṇehi tesaṃ tanubhāvo veditabbo. ^b^dutiyāyā^eb^ti gaṇanavasenapi dutiyāya, uppattivasenapi dutiyāya ^b^bhūmiyā. pattiyā^eb^ti sāmaññaphalassa paṭilābhāya. tañhi sampayuttānaṃ nissayabhāvato te dhammā bhavanti etthāti ^b^bhūmi^eb^. yasmā vā samānepi lokuttarabhāve sayampi bhavati uppajjati, na nibbānaṃ viya apātubhūtaṃ, tasmāpi ^b^``bhūmī''^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^yogaṃ karotī^eb^ti vipassanābhiyogaṃ karoti. ``navahākārehi indriyāni tikkhāni bhavantī''tiādinā (visuddhi0 2.699) vuttanayeneva yadaggena indriyānaṃ tikkhataṃ sampādeti, tadaggena balāni, bojjhaṅgāni ca paṭutarabhāvaṃ āpādento ^b^indriyabalabojjhaṅgāni samodhānetvā^eb^ lakkhaṇattayatīraṇavasena ^b^ñāṇena parimaddati^eb^. tattha aparāparaṃ ñāṇaṃ cārento ^b^parivatteti^eb^. tenāha ^b^``vipassanāvīthiṃ ogāhatī''^eb^ti. ^b^vuttanayenevā^eb^ti udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ uppādane vuttanayena. ^b^gotrabhuanantara^eb^nti ettha gotrabhu viya gotrabhu. paṭhamamaggapurecārikañāṇañhi puthujjanagottābhibhavanato, ariyagottabhavanato ca nippariyāyato gotrabhūti vuccati, idaṃ pana taṃsadisatāya pariyāyato gotrabhu. ekaccasaṃkilesavisuddhiyā ^a^M2.0488^ea^, pana accantavisuddhiyā ārammaṇakaraṇato ca vodānanti vuccati. tenāha ^b^paṭṭhāne^eb^ ``anulomaṃ vodānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo''ti (paṭṭhā 1.1.417). yasmā pana ^b^paṭisambhidāmagge^eb^ uppādādiabhibhavanatthaṃ upādāya ``aṭṭha gotrabhudhammā samādhivasena uppajjanti, dasa gotrabhudhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī''tiādīsu (paṭi0 ma0 1.60) gotrabhunāmenevetaṃ āgataṃ, tasmā idhāpi ``gotrabhuanantara''nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06] dutiyañāṇaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 814^b^.^eb^ ^b^sakidevā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0459^ea^ ekavāraṃyeva. ^b^``imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā''^eb^ti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito. ekacco idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva loke parinibbāti, ekacco idha patvā devaloke parinibbāti, ekacco devaloke patvā tattheva parinibbāti, ekacco devaloke patvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāti. ime cattāropi idha na gahitā. yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāti, ayaṃ ekova idha gahitoti veditabbo.
[03] ^b^kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ anavasesappahānāyā^eb^ti tesaṃyeva sakadāgāmimaggena tanukatānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ niravasesappahānāya. paṭisandhivasena kāmabhavassa anāgamanato ^b^anāgāmī^eb^.
[06] tatiyañāṇaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 815^b^.^eb^ ^b^opapātiko^eb^ti upapātayoniko. imināssa gabbhaseyyā paṭikkhittā. ^b^tattha parinibbāyī^eb^ti tattha suddhāvāse parinibbāyitā. ^b^anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā^eb^ti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena tasmā lokā idha ^a^M2.0489^ea^ anāvattanasabhāvo, buddhadassanadhammassavanānaṃ panatthāya āgamanaṃ hotiyeva.

[03] ^b^rūparāgārūparāgamānauddhaccāvijjānaṃ anavasesappahānāyā^eb^ti etesaṃ pañcannaṃ uddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ nissesappajahanatthāya. tattha rūpabhave chandarāgo ^b^rūparāgo^eb^. arūpabhave chandarāgo ^b^arūparāgo. māno^eb^ arahattamaggavajjhamāno. tathā ^b^uddhaccāvijjā^eb^.
[06] catutthañāṇaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 816^b^.^eb^ ^b^mahākhīṇāsavo^eb^ti ^a^V2.0460^ea^ mahānubhāvatānibandhanaṃ pūjāvacanametaṃ, na upādāyavacanaṃ yathā ``mahāmoggallāno''ti. na hi cūḷakhīṇāsavo nāma atthi. antimadehaṃ dhāretīti ^b^antimadehadhārī^eb^. khandhakilesābhisaṅkhārabhārānaṃ ohitattā oropitattā ^b^ohitabhāro^eb^. anuppatto sadatthaṃ sakatthanti ^b^anuppattasadattho. sadattho^eb^ti ca arahattaṃ veditabbaṃ. tañhi attupanibandhanaṭṭhena, attānaṃ avijahanaṭṭhena, attano paramatthaṭṭhena ca attano atthattā sakatthoti vuccati. parikkhīṇāni dasapi bhavasaṃyojanāni etassāti ^b^parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano^eb^. khandhādiatthaṃ sammā aññāya vimuttoti ^b^sammadaññāvimutto^eb^. aggo ca so dakkhiṇeyyo ca, aggadakkhiṇaṃ vā arahatīti ^b^aggadakkhiṇeyyo^eb^.
[03] 817^b^.^eb^ catunnaṃ maggañāṇānaṃ vasena ^b^catuñāṇāya. ānubhāvavijānanattha^eb^nti satipaṭṭhānapāripūriādikassa ānubhāvassa bodhanatthaṃ.

[03] paripuṇṇā bodhipakkhiyā etassāti paripuṇṇabodhipakkhiyo, maggo. tassa bhāvo ^b^paripuṇṇabodhipakkhiyabhāvo^eb^. vuṭṭhānabalehi sampayuttatāva ^b^vuṭṭhānabalasamāyogo, ye^eb^ saṃyojanādayo ^b^yena^eb^ paṭhamamaggādinā ^b^pahātabbā^eb^.
[03] 818^b^.^eb^ bujjhanaṭṭhena ^a^M2.0490^ea^ vā bodho, maggacittuppādo. tassa bujjhanakiriyāya anuguṇabhāvato pakkhe bhavāti ^b^bodhipakkhiyā^eb^.

[03] 819^b^.^eb^ ^b^tesu^eb^ bodhipakkhiyesu. ^b^ārammaṇesū^eb^ti kāyādiārammaṇesu. ^b^okkhanditvā^eb^ti anupavisitvā. ^b^pakkhanditvā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^upaṭṭhānato^eb^ti asubhākārādiggahaṇavasena upagantvā avaṭṭhānato. kāyādīsu asubhākārādiggahaṇaṃ pubbabhāgasatipaṭṭhānavasena subhasaññādipahānakiccasādhanaṃ maggasatipaṭṭhānavasena veditabbaṃ. tattha hi ekāva sati catukiccasādhanavasena pavattati.

[03] 820^b^.^eb^ ^b^padahantī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0461^ea^ vāyamanti, kāyacittāni paggaṇhanti vā. asobhāhetūnaṃ saṃkilesadhammānaṃ pajahanena, sobhāhetūnañca vodānadhammānaṃ bhāvanena ^b^sobhanaṃ,^eb^ sundaranti attho. ^b^seṭṭhabhāvāvahanato^eb^ti pāsaṃsatamabhāvasādhanato. ^b^padhānabhāvakāraṇato^eb^ti uttamabhāvahetuto.

[03] 821^b^.^eb^ ^b^pubbe vuttenā^eb^ti iddhividhañāṇaniddese (visuddhi0 2.369) vuttena. ^b^ijjhanaṭṭho^eb^ nipphajjanaṭṭho, paṭilābhasampadā vā, yena vā ijjhanti iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā honti, taṃ ^b^ijjhanaṃ^eb^. samādhipadhānasaṅkhārapamukhā maggadhammā idha ^b^``iddhī''^eb^ti adhippetā. ^b^pubbaṅgamaṭṭho^eb^ adhipatipaccayabhāvo. tasmā sotāpattimaggo ijjhatīti ^b^iddhi,^eb^ tasmā sampayuttā chandādayo ^b^pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena pādo^eb^. tassā eva ^b^phalabhūtāya^eb^ vuṭṭhānagāminiyā chandādayo ^b^pubbabhāgakāraṇaṭṭhena pādo. so^eb^ti iddhipādo. ^b^ime lokuttarāvā^eb^ti ime yathāvuttā chandādayo uttaracūḷabhājanīye āgatanayena lokuttarā veditabbā. ^b^chandādiadhipativasena paṭiladdhadhammāpi^eb^ phassādayo iddhipādā hontīti attho. kāmañcettha iddhipādo no adhipati, adhipati vā no iddhipādo nāma natthi, yathā pana ekasmiṃ rajje rajjārahesu catūsu rājakumāresu ekasmiṃ kāle ekova rajjamanusāsati, na sabbe, evaṃ ekamekasmiṃ cittuppāde ekova adhipati, iddhipādo ca hotīti veditabbo.

[03] 822^b^.^eb^ ^b^assaddhiyaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0491^ea^ saddhāpaṭipakkhā akusalā dhammā, avatthugato pasādapatirūpako micchādhimokkho vā. ^b^kosajjaṃ^eb^ thinamiddhapadhāno akusalacittuppādo. ^b^pamādo^eb^ satisammoso tathāpavattā akusalā khandhā. ^b^abhibhavanasaṅkhātena adhipatiyaṭṭhenā^eb^ti assaddhiyādīnaṃ abhibhavanato abhibhavananti vattabbena adhimokkhapaggahaupaṭṭhānāvikkhepapajānanassa ekalakkhaṇena sampayuttadhammesu adhipatiyaṭṭhena. ^b^assaddhiyādīhi cā^eb^ti ^b^ca^eb^-saddo samuccayattho aṭṭhānappayutto, tasmā akampiyaṭṭhena ca sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena ca ^b^bala^eb^nti evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.

[03] 823^b^.^eb^ ^b^bujjhanakasattassā^eb^ti catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ paṭivijjhanakasattassa. yo heso lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppajjamānāya satiādidhammasāmaggiyā karaṇabhūtāya bujjhati kilesasantānaniddāya uṭṭhahati, cattāri vā ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā sacchikarotīti ^a^V2.0462^ea^ bodhīti vuccati ariyasāvako, tassa bodhissa bujjhanakasattassa aṅgāti ^b^bojjhaṅgā. niyyānikaṭṭhenā^eb^ti vaṭṭato nissaraṇaṭṭhena.

[03] 824^b^.^eb^ pubbabhāge nānācittesu labbhantīti sambandho. ^b^cuddasavidhenā^eb^ti ānāpānairiyāpathacatusampajaññapaṭikkūlamanasikāradhātumanasikārapabbāni, nava sivathikapabbāni cāti evaṃ cuddasavidhena. ^b^kāyaṃ pariggaṇhato ca kāyānupassanāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ labbhati, na vedanādayo pariggaṇhato. esa nayo sesesupi. ``sukhaṃ vedana''ntiādināti vā ``sāmisa''ntiādināti vā ``nirāmisa''ntiādināti vā evaṃ ^b^navavidhena^eb^. sarāgadosamohasaṃkhittamahaggatasamāhitasauttaravimuttapadānaṃ sapaṭipakkhānaṃ vasena ^b^soḷasavidhena^eb^. nīvaraṇupādānakkhandhāyatanabojjhaṅgasaccapabbānaṃ vasena ^b^pañcavidhena. imasmiṃ attabhāve^eb^ti paccuppanne attabhāve. ^b^anuppannapubba^eb^nti attano abhūtapubbaṃ. ^b^parassa uppannaṃ akusalaṃ disvā^eb^ tannimittañca vadhabandhārahādīnīti adhippāyo. ^b^tassā^eb^ti tādisassa. bhavati hi taṃsadisepi tabbohāro yathā ``tāniyeva osadhānī''ti. ^b^tassa pahānāyā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. jhānavipassanā ito aññasmiṃ attabhāve uppannapubbāpi siyunti vuttaṃ ^b^``imasmiṃ attabhāve anuppannapubba''^eb^nti, chandiddhipādasammāvācānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ. tesu vuttesu sesiddhipādasesaviratiyo atthato ^a^M2.0492^ea^ vuttāva hontīti lakkhaṇahāravasena ayamattho veditabbo. ^b^evaṃ nānācittesu labbhanti^eb^ pubbabhāge ete satipaṭṭhānasammappadhānaiddhipādā. ^b^catunnaṃ ñāṇāna^eb^nti catunnaṃ ariyamaggañāṇānaṃ. kāmaṃ sabbepi bodhipakkhiyadhammā maggacittuppādapariyāpannāva, tathāpi sātisayo sammappadhānabyāpāro maggakkhaṇeti vuttaṃ ^b^``phalakkhaṇe ṭhapetvā cattāro sammappadhāne''^eb^ti. ^b^avasesā tettiṃsa labbhanti,^eb^ te ca kho pariyāyato, na nippariyāyatoti adhippāyo.

[03] 825^b^.^eb^ ^b^sesesu panā^eb^ti iddhipādādīsu pañcasu koṭṭhāsesu. yathā sativīriyesu ``satipaṭṭhānaṃ sammappadhāna''nti saṅkhipanavasena hāpanaṃ, ``kāyānupassanā''tiādivibhāgadassanavasena vaḍḍhanaṃ atthi, īdisaṃ hāpanavaḍḍhanaṃ natthīti attho.

[03] 826^b^.^eb^ idāni sabbesu eva yathārahaṃ labbhamānavibhāgadassanatthaṃ ^b^``apicā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^tesū^eb^ti sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammesu. ^b^chaddhā^eb^ti ekadhā dvedhā catudhā pañcadhā aṭṭhadhā navadhāti evaṃ chappakārena ^b^te bhavanti^eb^.

[01] ^b^chandiddhipādādivasenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0463^ea^ chando chandiddhipādavaseneva, cittaṃ cittiddhipādavaseneva, pītipassaddhiupekkhā bojjhaṅgavaseneva, saṅkappādayo maggavasenevāti evaṃ ^b^nava ekavidhāva honti^eb^.

[03] ^b^cuddaseva asambhinnā^eb^ti sati vīriyaṃ chando cittaṃ paññā saddhā samādhi pīti passaddhi upekkhā sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvoti ime asambhinnā padantarasambhedena vinā aggahitaggahaṇena gayhamānā cuddaseva ca sabhāvadhammā. ^b^cuddasā^eb^ti ca ukkaṃsaparicchedena vuttaṃ. tañca kho paṭhamajjhānikamaggacittuppādavasena, dutiyajjhānike pana sammāsaṅkappābhāvato terasa, tatiyacatutthapañcamajjhānikesu pītisambojjhaṅgābhāvato dvādasa honti. ^b^``sattatiṃsappabhedato''^eb^ti idampi ukkaṃsavaseneva vuttaṃ, avakaṃsato pana vuttanayena ekasmiṃ khaṇe chattiṃsa, pañcatiṃsa honti, catunnaṃ adhipatīnaṃ ekajjhaṃ anuppajjanato ekasmiṃ khaṇe ekasseva iddhipādassa sambhavoti dvattiṃsa ca hontīti veditabbaṃ.

[03] sattatiṃsapabhedato ^a^M2.0493^ea^ kathanti āha ^b^``sakiccanipphādanato''^eb^tiādi, ekaccassa sabhāvato ekassāpi attano ānubhāvānurūpakāyānupassanāditaṃtaṃkiccasādhanatoti attho. ^b^sarūpena ca vuttito^eb^ti abhedassa cittiddhipādādikassa sarūpeneva pavattanato ca.

[03] ^b^etthā^eb^ti ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṃ. kasmā pana bodhipakkhiyesu jhānakoṭṭhāso na gahito, nanu jhānarahito ariyamaggo natthīti? saccaṃ natthi, tato eva na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ``bodhipakkhiyesu jhānaṃ na gahita''nti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇassa jhānassa maggaggahaṇeneva gahitattā. tañhi sandhāya ``yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetī''tiādi (dha0 sa0 277, 343 ādayo) vuttaṃ. ārammaṇūpanijjhānalakkhaṇassa panettha sambhavo eva natthi. aparo nayo -- kasmā pana bodhipakkhiyesu jhānakoṭṭhāso na gahito, nanu jhānarahito ariyamaggo natthi, na ca taṃ paṭipadā viya ekantapubbabhāgiyaṃ, nāpi ekaccapaṭisambhidā viya magganissando, atha kho maggacittuppādapariyāpanno, yato ``lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāvetī''ti (dha0 sa0 277, 343 ādayo) vuttaṃ, maggamaggaparivāradhammā ca bodhipakkhiyadhammāti? vuccate -- yaṃ tāva vuttaṃ jhānarahito ariyamaggo natthī''ti, tattha na ariyamaggasampayogamattena jhānassa bodhipakkhiyatā ^a^V2.0464^ea^ labbhati atippasaṅgato. āhārādīnampi hi bodhipakkhiyatā āpajjeyyāti. etena maggacittuppādapariyāpannatā bodhipakkhiyabhāvassa akāraṇanti dassitaṃ hoti.

[03] yaṃ pana vuttaṃ ``maggamaggaparivāradhammā ca bodhipakkhiyā''ti, tattha parivāraṭṭho kiṃ sahapavattiattho, udāhu parikkhāraṭṭhoti? yadi purimo pakkho, so pageva nillocito. atha dutiyo, idaṃ vicāretabbaṃ. kathaṃ pavattamānaṃ jhānaṃ maggassa parikkhāro? yadi sahajātādipaccayabhāvena, evaṃ sati phassādīnampi maggaparikkhāratā āpajjati. atha paṭipakkhavidhaṃsanena, na sabbe jhānadhammā paṭipakkhavidhaṃsanasamatthā. na hi vicāro, vedanā ca kassaci saṃkilesadhammassa ujupaṭipakkhabhāvena pavattanti. yaṃ pana ^b^peṭake^eb^ ``sukhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccassa, vicāro vicikicchāya paṭipakkho''ti vuttaṃ, taṃ pariyāyena vuttaṃ. na hi sukhaṃ sayaṃ uddhaccakukkuccassa paṭipakkho, paṭipakkhassa pana samādhissa paccayatāya paṭipakkho. na ca vicāro paññā viya, adhimokkho viya vā vicikicchāya paṭipakkho, paṭipakkhassa paṭirūpatāya pana paṭipakkho ^a^M2.0494^ea^ vutto. tathā pītipi na byāpādassa adoso viya ujupaṭipakkho, adosasampayogato pana paṭipakkho vutto. tena vuttaṃ ``taṃ pariyāyena vutta''nti. vitakkasamādhayo eva pana jhānadhammesu ujukaṃ paṭipakkhavidhaṃsanasamatthāti paṭipakkhaviddhaṃsanasamatthassa paripuṇṇassa jhānakoṭṭhāsassa abhāvato na cassa bodhipakkhiyesu saṅgaho kato. yasmā pana sammāsaṅkappo, sammāsamādhi ca maggapariyāpannā jhānadhammā, tasmā te sandhāya taṃsampayuttatāya vā itarepi gahetvā pariyāyena vuttaṃ ^b^pāḷiyaṃ^eb^ ``yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti niyyānika''ntiādi (dha0 sa0 277).

[03] 827^b^.^eb^ ^b^vuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ nimittato, pavattato ca vuṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^balasamāyogo^eb^ samathavipassanābalehi sampayuttatā. pariññābhisamayādivasena dukkhādīsu visesadassanaṭṭhena maggapaññāpi vipassanāti vuccatīti ^b^``lokiyavipassanā''^eb^ti visesetvā vuttaṃ. tenevāha ``vuṭṭhānaṭṭhena samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī''ti (paṭi0 ma0 2.5). nimittārammaṇattā nevanimittā vuṭṭhāti, pavatti...pe0... chindanato na pavattā vuṭṭhātīti yojanā. tattha nimittato vuṭṭhānaṃ saṅkhāranimittaṃ nissajjitvā nibbānārammaṇakaraṇaṃ. pavattato vuṭṭhānaṃ hetunirodhena āyatiṃ vipākappavattassa ^a^V2.0465^ea^ anuppavattidhammatāpādanaṃ. tenāha ^b^``samudayassa asamucchindanato pavattā na vuṭṭhātī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^dubhato^eb^ti ubhato, da-kārāgamaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^dubhā^eb^ti vā padantaramevetaṃ ubhayasaddena samānatthaṃ. ^b^dassanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti pariññābhisamayādilakkhaṇena catusaccadassanaṭṭhena. ^b^micchādiṭṭhiyā^eb^ti dvāsaṭṭhippabhedāyapi micchādiṭṭhiyā. ^b^tadanuvattakakilesehī^eb^ti apāyagamanīyatāya tassā micchādiṭṭhiyā anuvattakehi vicikicchādikilesehi. ^b^khandhehī^eb^ti etthāpi tadanuvattakasaddo ānetvā sambandhitabbo. te ca micchādiṭṭhiādipaccayā uppajjanārahā veditabbā. ^b^micchāsaṅkappā^eb^tiādīsupi tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti. ^b^bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhātī^eb^ti pāḷi saṃkhittā. yathā micchādiṭṭhimicchāsaṅkappā, evaṃ micchāvācādayopi apāyagamanīyā eva veditabbā. ^b^micchāvācākammantājīvā^eb^ cetanāsabhāvā. ^b^micchāsati^eb^ tathāpavattā cattāro khandhā. uparimaggattaye sammādiṭṭhi taṃtaṃmaggavajjhā ^a^M2.0495^ea^ mānato vuṭṭhāti. so hi ``ahamasmī''ti pavattiyā diṭṭhiṭṭhāniyo, micchāmaggato panettha vuṭṭhānaṃ anuddharitvā taṃtaṃmaggavajjhasaṃyojanānusayeheva vuṭṭhānaṃ uddhaṭaṃ.
[03] ^b^aṇusahagatā^eb^ti aṇubhāvaṃ gatā pattā, tanubhūtāti attho.

[03] 828^b^.^eb^ evaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ dassetvā idāni balasamāyogaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``lokiyānañcā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^samathabalaṃ adhikaṃ hoti^eb^ samādhibhāvanābhāvato. ^b^vipassanābalaṃ adhikaṃ hoti^eb^ ñāṇuttarattā vipassanābhāvanāya. samānabhāvena yuge naddhā baddhā viya hontīti ^b^yuganaddhā^eb^. tenāha ^b^``aññamaññaṃ anativattanaṭṭhenā''^eb^ti, kiccato anūnādhikabhāvenāti attho. tato eva ^b^samāyogo^eb^ti samaparicchedayogoti attho.

[03] samādhipaṭipakkhadassanatthaṃ ^b^``uddhaccasahagatakilesehī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, uddhaccapadhānehi kilesehīti adhippāyo. ^b^avikkhepo samādhī^eb^ti samucchindanena vikkhepassa ujupaṭipakkhabhūto samādhi. ^b^nirodhagocaro^eb^ti nibbānārammaṇo. ^b^vuṭṭhānaṭṭhenā^eb^ti vuṭṭhānakabhāvena nimittato, pavattato ca vuṭṭhahamānavasena. ^b^ekarasā^eb^ti samānakiccā.

[03] 829^b^.^eb^ ^b^ye^eb^ ^a^V2.0466^ea^ ^b^dhammā^eb^ti ye saṃkilesadhammā. saṃyojanādīsu saṃyojanaṭṭhena bandhanaṭṭhena ^b^saṃyojanāni,^eb^ vibādhanaṭṭhena, upatāpanaṭṭhena vā ^b^kilesā,^eb^ micchāsabhāvāti ^b^micchattā,^eb^ loke dhammā lokapariyāpannā dhammāti ^b^lokadhammā,^eb^ maccherassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vāti ^b^macchariyaṃ,^eb^ viparītaṭṭhena ^b^vipallāsā,^eb^ ganthanaṭṭhena ^b^ganthā,^eb^ ayuttā gatīti ^b^agati,^eb^ āsavantīti ^b^āsavā,^eb^ ohanantīti ^b^oghā,^eb^ yojanaṭṭhena ^b^yogā,^eb^ nīvarantīti ^b^nīvaraṇāni,^eb^ dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamma parato āmasantīti ^b^parāmāsā,^eb^ bhusaṃ ādiyantīti ^b^upādānāni,^eb^ appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sentīti ^b^anusayā,^eb^ malīnabhāvakaraṇaṭṭhena ^b^malā,^eb^ akusalakammāni ca tāni sugatiduggatīnaṃ, tattha nibbattanakasukhadukkhānañca pathā cāti ^b^akusalakammapathā,^eb^ cittaṃ uppajjati etthāti ^b^cittuppādo,^eb^ cittacetasikarāsi ^a^M2.0496^ea^, akusalo ca so cittuppādo cāti akusalacittuppādoti akusalasaddaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^khandhehi khandhāna^eb^nti idhalokakkhandhehi paralokakkhandhānaṃ. ^b^yāvañhi te^eb^ti te rūparāgādayo yāva pavattanti na samucchijjanti, ^b^tāva etesaṃ^eb^ khandhaphaladukkhānaṃ ^b^anuparamo^eb^ avicchedoti. etena tesaṃ saṃyojanatthaṃ vibhāveti. ^b^uddha^eb^nti rūpārūpabhavesu, tatiyamagguppattiyā vā uddhaṃ. uddhaṃ bhajantīti uddhaṃbhāgā, rūpārūpabhavā, tesaṃ avicchedahetutāya hitāni ^b^uddhaṃbhāgiyāni^eb^.
[03] kilissanti, kilesenti cāti duvidhampi atthaṃ dassento ^b^``sayaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhattā''^eb^tiādimāha.
[03] ^b^micchāvimutti^eb^ ``lokathūpikādīsu mokkho''ti pavattamicchāvimokkho. abhinivisanādivasena micchā viparītaṃ na sammā pavattanato ^b^micchāñāṇaṃ^eb^ mohova.
[03] ^b^lokappavattiyā^eb^ti khandhappavattiyaṃ sati. ^b^anuparamadhammakattā^eb^ti puññapāpavasena aparāparaṃ avicchijjanato. ``lābhahetuko lābho''tiādinā ^b^kāraṇopacārena^eb^.
[03] āvāse macchariyaṃ, āvāsahetukaṃ vā macchariyaṃ ^b^āvāsamacchariyaṃ^eb^.
[03] ^b^tayo^eb^ti ^a^V2.0467^ea^ vatthuṃ abhinditvā vuttaṃ, bhinditvā pana vuccamāne dvādasa honti.

[03] ganthakaraṇaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paṭibaddhatākaraṇaṃ ^b^ganthana^eb^nti taṃ rūpakāyepi labbhatīti āha ^b^``nāmakāyassa ceva rūpakāyassa cā''^eb^ti. tattha byāpādassāpi abhisajjanupanayhavasena pavattanato ganthanaṭṭho veditabbo, yato tassa paṭighasaṃyojanabhāvo vutto.
[03] ^b^chandadosamohabhayehī^eb^ti chandadosamohabhayahetu. ^b^tañhī^eb^ti akattabbakaraṇaṃ, kattabbākaraṇañca.
[03] ^b^savanā^eb^ti pavattanato. ^b^savanato^eb^ti kilesāsucibhāvena vissandanato. puna ^b^savanato^eb^ti pasavanato.

[01] ^b^ākaḍḍhanaṭṭhena^eb^ ^a^M2.0497^ea^, ^b^duruttaraṇaṭṭhena cā^eb^ti etena oghā viya ^b^oghā^eb^ti dasseti. ārammaṇena, dukkhena ca viyogassa appadānasaṅkhātena yojanaṭṭhena ^b^yogā^eb^ti dasseti, saṃkilesakaraṇaṭṭhenāti attho. ^b^tesaññevā^eb^ti kāmarāgādīnaṃyeva. te hi sotavasena vattamānā soto viya sotapatite satte apāyasamuddaṃ pāpenti, saṃsārasamuddato ca sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na denti, yathāgahitañca ārammaṇaṃ vissajjituṃ na denti, yādisañca pāpaṃ katvā dukkhappatte punapi tādisena yojenti.

[03] ^b^cittassā^eb^ti kusalacittassa, visesato jhānacittassa. ādito varaṇaṃ ^b^āvaraṇaṃ^eb^. kilesavāsanaṃ netvā varaṇaṃ ^b^nīvaraṇaṃ^eb^. kuṭṭakavāṭādīhi viya pidahanaṃ ^b^paṭicchādanaṃ,^eb^ taṃ pana kusalādīni saṅgaṇhituṃ, pariññātuṃ, ñātuñca appadānavasena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
