[03] ^b^tassa tassa dhammassa sabhāva^eb^nti kāyādikassa tassa tassa dhammassa asubhādisabhāvaṃ. ^b^abhūtaṃ sabhāva^eb^nti subhādisabhāvaṃ.

[03] ^b^thāmagataṭṭhenā^eb^ti thāmagatabhāvena. ^b^thāmagata^eb^nti ca anaññasādhāraṇo kāmarāgādīnaṃ sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo. yena te eva bhagavatā ^b^``anusayā''^eb^ti vuttā. anusayanañca maggena appahīnabhāvena paccayasamavāye uppajjanārahatā. tenāha ^b^``punappunaṃ kāmarāgādīnaṃ uppattihetubhāvena anusentiyevā''^eb^ti.
[03] dummocanīyabhāvena ^a^V2.0468^ea^ pavattiṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``telañjanakalalaṃ viyā''^eb^ti.

[03] 830^b^.^eb^ ^b^sesā^eb^ti anapāyagamanīyā. sukhumā kāmarāgapaṭighāti sambandho. ^b^catutthañāṇavajjhā evā^eb^ti avadhāraṇena paṭhamañāṇādivajjhatā nivattīyati. tayidaṃ niyamadassanaṃ aññatthāpi netabbanti dassento ^b^``parato''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^``niyamaṃ na karissāmā''^eb^ti etena niyame akate heṭṭhimamaggavajjhatāpi anuññātā eva hotīti.
[03] ^b^lobha...pe0... catutthañāṇavajjhānī^eb^tiādīsu paṭhamañāṇādīhi hatāpāyagamanīyādibhāvānīti adhippāyo veditabbo. ādisaddena oḷārikasukhumatā gahitā.
[03] ^b^yase^eb^ti parivāre.
[03] agatīsu ^a^M2.0498^ea^ chandādayo kiñcāpi uparimaggavajjhā, tathāpi taṃmūlakassa akattabbakaraṇassa, kattabbākaraṇassa ca apāyagamanīyatāya paṭhamamaggavajjhā.

[03] katākatākusalākusalavisayaṃ yaṃ vippaṭisārabhūtaṃ kukkuccaṃ, taṃ idha ^b^tatiyañāṇavajjhaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ. yaṃ pana ``kukkuccapakatatāya āpattimāpajjatī''ti (pāci0 aṭṭha0 438; kaṅkhā0 aṭṭha0 nidānavaṇṇanā) vuttaṃ kukkuccaṃ, taṃ sandhāya ``kukkuccavicikicchā sotāpattimaggena pahīyantī''ti (dha0 sa0 aṭṭha0 1176) ^b^aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ^eb^ vuttaṃ. tasmā dvinnaṃ vacanānaṃ adhippāyo veditabbo. aññesupi edisesu ṭhānesu adhippāyo maggitabbo, na virodhato paccetabbo. oḷārikānavasesappahānaṃ vā sandhāya kukkuccassa paṭhamatatiyañāṇavajjhatā vuttāti veditabbaṃ. ``bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjitu''nti, ``kukkuccāyanto na paṭiggahesī''ti (pāci0 204) pana āgataṃ kukkuccaṃ, na nīvaraṇaṃ arahato uppajjanato, nīvaraṇapaṭirūpakaṃ pana ``kappati na kappatī''ti vīmaṃsanabhūtaṃ vinayakukkuccaṃ nāma, taṃ tathāpavattacittuppādova.
[03] ^b^kāmarāgapaṭighānusayā^eb^ aṇusahagatā ^b^tatiyañāṇavajjhā^eb^. oḷārikānaṃ pana dutiyañāṇavajjhatā heṭṭhā vuttanayāva.
[03] cittuppādaggahaṇena ^a^V2.0469^ea^ cettha makkhapaḷāsamāyāsāṭheyyapamādathambhasārambhādīnaṃ saṅgaho katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] 831^b^.^eb^ ^b^aphalo vāyāmo^eb^ti ettha atītānaṃ tāva pajahane aphalo hotu vāyāmo niruddhattā, anāgatānaṃ pana kathanti tesampi vakkhamānaṃ aviparītamatthaṃ ajānanto natthitāmattaṃ gahetvā codeti, tathāpi ``aphalo''ti pubbe pahātabbānaṃ natthitāya codanā katā, idāni pahānassa. yadi hi pahānaṃ atthi, kathaṃ pahātabbā santi? atha pahātabbā santi, kathaṃ pahānaṃ hoti? pahātabbā ca santi, pahānañca hotīti vippaṭisiddhametaṃ. kasmā? pahātabbesu santesu pahānassa asambhavato tadupago vāyāmo aphalo ālokatamānaṃ sahāvaṭṭhāne sati ālokassa aphalatā viya. athāpi kathañci pahānaṃ siyā? ^b^saṃkilesikā ca maggabhāvanā āpajjati^eb^ pahātabbapahāyakānaṃ sahāvaṭṭhānato ^a^M2.0499^ea^. ^b^vippayuttatā vā kilesānaṃ^eb^ cittavippayuttasaṅkhāravādīnaṃ vippayuttasaṅkhārānaṃ viyāti adhippāyo. taṃ pana nesaṃ vādīnaṃ yathā matimattaṃ, evamidhāpīti dassento āha ^b^``na ca paccuppannakileso cittavippayutto nāma atthī''^eb^ti. arūpadhammā hi ekavatthukādibhāvena vattamānā khaṇattayapariyāpannā paccuppannā, te kathaṃ cittena vippayuttā nāma siyuṃ, tasmā nattheva vippayuttatā kilesānaṃ. ^b^āveṇikā^eb^ti asādhāraṇā, sayameva uppāditā pāḷi anāruḷhāti adhippāyo. pāḷiyaṃyeva hi paṭikkhittanti sambandho. ^b^svāyaṃ^eb^ puggalo. ^b^hañcī^eb^ti yadi.

[03] ^b^vinibaddho^eb^ti mānena patthaddhacitto. ^b^parāmaṭṭho^eb^ti micchābhiniviṭṭho. ^b^thāmagato^eb^ti thāmagatakileso thirabhāvagatānusayo. ^b^tena hi natthi maggabhāvanā^eb^ti yasmā tīsupi kālesu kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ na yujjati, tikālikā ca kilesā, tasmā natthi maggabhāvanā, tāya sādhetabbaṃ kiccaṃ natthīti attho. ^b^``na hi natthi maggabhāvanā''^eb^tiādinā catukkhattuṃ vuttassa paṭikkhepassa paṭikkhepo. idaṃ vuttaṃ ``pāḷiyaṃyeva hī''tiādiṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^evamevā^eb^ti yathā ajātaphale taruṇarukkhe mūle chinne asati chedane āyatiṃ uppajjanārahāni chedanapaccayā anuppajjamānāni vinaṭṭhāni nāma honti, evameva maggabhāvanāya asati uppajjanārahā kilesā maggabhāvanāya anuppajjamānā ``pahīnā''ti vuccantīti upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^uppādo^eb^ti uppādasīsena uppādavanto khandhā vuttā. ^b^anuppāde^eb^ti ^a^V2.0470^ea^ nibbāne. ^b^ajātāyeva na jāyanti,^eb^ tasmā pahīnā nāma hontīti ``natthi kilesappahāna''nti paravādinā kato paṭikkhepo ``na hī''ti paṭikkhitto. te pana neva uppajjitvā vigatā, nāpi bhavissanti, na ca uppannāti ``atīte kilese pajahatī''tiādi na vattabbanti dasseti. ^b^hetunirodhā^eb^ti dukkhahetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ nirodhā. ^b^dukkhanirodho^eb^ti āyatiṃ uppajjanakadukkhassa nirodho. uppādapavattanimittāyūhanā paccuppannabhavavasena gahitā.

[03] 832^b^.^eb^ ^b^etenā^eb^ti ``ajātāyeva na jāyantī''tiādivacanena. vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtaṃ upādānakkhandhapañcakasaṅkhātaṃ bhūmipavattiṭṭhānaṃ laddhavanto ^b^bhūmiladdhā^eb^ yathā ``aggiāhito''ti, laddhabhūmikāti attho ^a^M2.0500^ea^. vattamānādiuppannavidhuratāya ^b^bhūmiladdhuppannā eva nāma te^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03] 833^b^.^eb^ anubhavitvā, bhavitvā ca apagataṃ ^b^bhūtāpagataṃ^eb^. anubhūtabhūtā hi bhūtatāsāmaññena bhūtasaddena vuttā. sāmaññameva hi upasaggena visesīyatīti. ^b^anubhūta^eb^saddo ca kammavacanicchāya abhāvato anubhāvakavācako daṭṭhabbo. vikappagāhavasena rāgādīhi, tabbipakkhehi ca akusalaṃ, kusalañca ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati, na vipāko kammavegakkhittattā, nāpi kiriyā ahetukānaṃ atidubbalatāya, sahetukānañca khīṇakilesassa chaḷaṅgupekkhāvato uppajjamānānaṃ atisantavuttittā. ettha ca purimanaye kusalākusalameva vattuṃ adhippāyavasena ``bhūtāpagata''nti vuttaṃ. yaṃ ``uppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ ṭhitiyā''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.651-662; vibha0 390-391) ettha ``uppanna''nti gahetvā taṃsadisānaṃ pahānaṃ, vuddhi ca vuttā. pacchimanaye ca-saddena kusalākusalañca ākaḍḍhitvā sabbaṃ saṅkhataṃ vuttaṃ bhutvāpagatabhāvābhidhānādhippāyena. vipaccituṃ okāsakaraṇavasena uppattitaṃ atītaṃ kammañca tato uppajjituṃ āraddho vipāko ca anāgato ^b^okāsakatuppanno^eb^ti vutto okāso kato etena, okāso kato etassāti ca atthadvayavasena, yaṃ uppannasaddena vināpi viññāyamānaṃ uppannaṃ sandhāya ``nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sañcetanikānaṃ kammāna''ntiādi (a0 ni0 10.217, 219) vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^tāsu tāsu bhūmīsū^eb^ti manussadevādiattabhāvasaṅkhātesu upādānakkhandhesu. tasmiṃ tasmiṃ santāne ^a^V2.0471^ea^ anuppattidhammataṃ anāpāditatāya ^b^asamūhataṃ^eb^. asamūhatattāyeva hissa natthīti navattabbatāya uppannavohāro.

[03] 834^b^.^eb^ ``kā bhūmi, ko vā bhūmiladdho''ti āsaṅkaṃ nivattetuṃ ^b^``ettha cā''^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^``vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā''^eb^ti etena khandhānaṃ apariññātataṃ dasseti, na ārammaṇabhāvamattaṃ tebhūmakaggahaṇeneva tassa siddhattā. apariññātā hi khandhā kilesānaṃ bhūmīti adhippetā. ^b^khandhesu^eb^ vatthubhūtesu. ^b^ārammaṇavasenā^eb^ti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena. ^b^atītānāgate,^eb^ pageva paccuppanneti adhippāyo. ^b^ta^eb^nti taṃ aññasantānagataṃ ^a^M2.0501^ea^ kilesajātaṃ. tato aññasmiṃ santāne ārammaṇakaraṇamattena bhūmiladdhaṃ nāma yadi siyāti sambandho. ^b^tassā^eb^ti kilesajātassa. ^b^appaheyyato^eb^ parasantatipatitattā ^b^na koci bhavamūlaṃ pajaheyya^eb^. bhūmiladdhañhi anusayitaṃ nāma hotīti adhippāyo. ^b^vatthuvasenā^eb^ti uppattiṭṭhānavasena. ^b^yattha yattha^eb^ bhave, santāne vā. pariññātānaṃ abhūmibhāvato ^b^``apariññātā''^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^uppādato pabhutī^eb^ti tesaṃ khandhānaṃ uppajjanato paṭṭhāya. kilesānaṃ appahīnabhāvaṃ ṭhapetvā aññassa kāraṇassa abhāvato ^b^tesu^eb^ khandhesu ^b^kilesajātaṃ anuseti,^eb^ tasmā ^b^taṃ^eb^ anusayitaṃ kilesajātaṃ, teneva anusayanasaṅkhātena ^b^appahīnaṭṭhena bhūmiladdhanti veditabbaṃ^eb^.

[03] 835^b^.^eb^ tattha ca bhūmibhūtesu khandhesu na sabbe sabbesaṃ vatthū honti, atha kho viseso atthīti taṃ dassento āha ^b^``yassa yesū''^eb^tiādi. tattha ^b^yassā^eb^ti yassa puggalassa. ^b^yesū^eb^ti satipi ajjhattabhāvasāmaññe yesu atītādikāmāvacarādibhedabhinnesu khandhesu. ^b^te eva^eb^ yathānusayitā ^b^khandhā^eb^. kiṃ panete kilesā ārammaṇaṃ karontā viya paricchijja paricchijja anusentīti? yato te eva khandhā tesaṃ kilesānaṃ vatthūti vuttā, na heva kho anusayānaṃ vatthuṃ paricchijja pavatti atthi. atītādikāmāvacarādivasena pana yathāparicchinne vatthusmiṃ yo kilesānaṃ appahīnaṭṭho, so paricchijja pavatto viya hotīti ^b^``atītakkhandhesū''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tena vatthuvasena bhūmiladdhaṃ hotīti vatthubhedena siyā tassa bhedoti dasseti. tathāvavatthitabhāvato eva hi ``aññataro lolajātiko taṃ rasapathaviṃ aṅguliyā sāyī''tiādivacanaṃ (dī0 ni0 3.120) kāmāvacarakkhandhesu anusayitānaṃ rasataṇhādīnaṃ rūpārūpāvacarakkhandhe atikkamitvā puna kāmāvacarakkhandhavatthukataṃ vibhāveti. tenāha ^b^``tathā kāmāvacarakkhandhesū''^eb^tiādi ^a^V2.0472^ea^. yathā cettha rūpārūpāvacarakkhandhe atikkamitvā pavatti, evaṃ kāmāvacarakkhandhe atikkamitvā pavatti hotīti āha ^b^``esa nayo rūpārūpāvacaresū''^eb^ti.

[03] pariyuṭṭhānābhibhavanavasena ca kilesānaṃ anusayanaṭṭho anumīyati tadabhāve abhāvato. yassa ye anusayā pahīnā, tesaṃ vatthu tena ^a^M2.0502^ea^ samatikkantaṃ pariññātattāti kuto nesaṃ bhūmisamaññāti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ ^b^``sotāpannādīsu panā''^eb^tiādi. idha ^b^vaṭṭamūlakilesā^eb^ti anusayā adhippetā, na avijjā, bhavataṇhā ca. ^b^yaṃ kiñci^eb^ cetanācetasikabhedaṃ, kāyikādibhedaṃ vā. ^b^itī^eb^ti evaṃ, appahīnānusayattāti adhippāyo. ^b^assā^eb^ti puthujjanassa. te panete anusayā atītādikāmāvacarādivasena yathāparicchinne tattha tattha vatthusmiṃ anusayantāpi te te pañcupādānakkhandhe avibhāgeneva vatthuṃ katvā anusentīti dassento ^b^``tassetaṃ vaṭṭamūla''^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03] 836^b^.^eb^ idāni tamatthaṃ anvayabyatirekavasena upamāya vibhāvetuṃ ^b^``pathavīrasādi viyā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. rukkhagacchalatādīnaṃ paccayabhūto sasambhārapathaviyā raso ^b^pathavīraso. āporase^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^sākhā^eb^ nāma khuddakasākhā. ^b^pasākho^eb^ viṭapo. ^b^rukkhapaveṇi^eb^nti rukkhaparāparaṃ. ^b^santānayamāne^eb^ti aparāparaṃ anuppabandhante.
[03] ^b^maṇḍūkakaṇṭako^eb^ti eko macchakaṇṭakoti vadanti. ^b^anupādāno^eb^ti pahīnacaturupādāno, rūpādīsu vā kiñcipi agaṇhanto.

[03] 837^b^.^eb^ idha ^b^samudācāro^eb^ nāma laddhattalābhatāti khaṇattayasamaṅgisamudācāruppannanti āha ^b^``vattamānuppannameva samudācāruppanna''^eb^nti. ^b^pubbabhāge anuppajjamānampī^eb^ti tasmiṃ āpāthagate ārammaṇe ādito pavattajavanavāresu anuppajjamānampi. ^b^adhiggahitattā^eb^ti ayonisomanasikārena abhiruyha gahitattā, daḷhaṃ gahitattāti attho. ^b^aparabhāge^eb^ti aparasmiṃ kālabhāge, kālantareti attho. ^b^ekantena uppattito^eb^ti paccayasamavāye sati tathā ayonisomanasikārassa tattha nibbattattā niyamena uppajjanato. ^b^kalyāṇigāme^eb^ti evaṃnāmake gāme. rohaṇe kira abhirūpānaṃ itthīnaṃ uppattiṭṭhānatāya so gāmo tathā vuccati. ^b^cittasantatimanāruḷha^eb^nti paccuppannataṃ paṭisedheti. ^b^``uppattinivārakassa hetuno abhāvā''^eb^ti etena paccaye ^a^V2.0473^ea^ sati paccayasamavāye uppajjanārahatāya avikkhambhitassa uppannatāpariyāyoti dasseti. nanu ca asamūhatuppannampi paccaye sati uppajjanārahameva? saccametaṃ, pahānavisesabhāvakato ^a^M2.0503^ea^ pana nesaṃ bhedo. yathā avikkhambhitāsamūhatabhūmiladdhuppannaṃ sati paccayasamavāye uppajjanārahaṃ, evaṃ ārammaṇādhiggahituppannampīti tividhassāpi bhūmiladdhena ekasaṅgahatā vuttā.

[03] 838^b^.^eb^ akusalampi bhūtāpagatuppannaṃ atītattā na pahātabbaṃ, tathā ekaccaṃ okāsakatuppannaṃ itaraṃ appahātabbato, sesadvayaṃ khaṇattayasamaṅgibhāvatoti āha ^b^``amaggavajjhattā''^eb^ti. ^b^kenacī^eb^ti catūsu maggañāṇesu kenaci. ^b^tassā^eb^ti yathāvuttassa catubbidhassapi uppannassa. ^b^taṃ uppannabhāvaṃ vināsayamāna^eb^nti anuppattidhammatāpādanena uppajjanārahataṃ vināsentaṃ. paṭhamaṃ lokiyañāṇena yathābalaṃ pahīnameva lokuttarañāṇaṃ pajahatīti lokiyaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.

[03] 839^b^.^eb^ ^b^saccābhisamayakālasmi^eb^nti catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ paṭivijjhanakkhaṇe. ^b^vuttānī^eb^ti ``dukkhaṃ pariññeyya''ntiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 5.1099), ``yo, bhikkhave, dukkhaṃ passatī''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 5.1100) ca vuttāni. ^b^yathāsabhāvenā^eb^ti aviparītasabhāvena. ``jānitabbānī''ti vatvā tesaṃ jānanavidhiṃ upamāvasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva vuttanayena dassetuṃ ^b^``vuttaṃ heta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] tattha ^b^yathā padīpo^eb^tiādi ekassa ñāṇassa ekakkhaṇe cattāri kiccāni kathaṃ sambhavanti. na hi tādisaṃ kiñci loke diṭṭhaṃ atthi, na ca vacanaṃ labbhatīti antolīnacodanaṃ manasi katvā vuttaṃ ^b^``pariññābhisamayenā''^eb^ti. anavasesato paricchijja jānanasaṅkhātena paṭivijjhanena ^b^abhisameti^eb^ asammohavasena ^b^paṭivijjhati. pahānābhisamayenā^eb^ti samucchedappahānasaṅkhātena paṭivijjhanena asammohato ^b^abhisameti. maggaṃ bhāvanābhisamayenā^eb^ti maggañāṇaṃ sammāsaṅkappādisesamaggaṃ sahajātādipaccayatāvasena bhāvanābhisamayena. ^b^abhisameti^eb^ pubbabhāgabhāvanāsambhūtena ariyamaggabhāvanāsaṅkhātena paṭivijjhanena abhisameti aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ asammohato ^a^V2.0474^ea^ paṭivijjhati. maggañāṇañhi sampayuttadhammesu sammohaṃ viddhaṃsentaṃ attanipi sammohaṃ viddhaṃsetiyeva. ^b^nirodha^eb^nti nibbānaṃ. ^b^sacchikiriyābhisamayenā^eb^ti paccakkhakaraṇasaṅkhātena paṭivijjhanena. ^b^pāpuṇātī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0504^ea^ adhigacchati. svāyaṃ adhigamo dassanapaṭivedhoti āha ^b^``passati paṭivijjhatī''^eb^ti.

[03] ^b^``nirodhaṃ...pe0... paṭivijjhatī''^eb^ti etena nirodhasaccamekaṃ ārammaṇapaṭivedhena cattāripi saccāni asammohapaṭivedhena maggañāṇaṃ paṭivijjhatīti evaṃ yuttivasena vibhāvitaṃ ekapaṭivedhaṃ āgamenapi sādhetuṃ ^b^``vuttampi ceta''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^``sabbaṃ veditabba''^eb^nti iminā ``yo dukkhasamudayaṃ passati, so dukkhampi passatī''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 5.1100) āgataṃ samudayaṃ saccādimūlakaṃ yojanaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03] na cetaṃ kālantaradassanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, atha kho ekapaṭivedhamevāti dassentena ``maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇaṃ, dukkhepetaṃ ñāṇa''ntiādinā (vibha0 794; paṭi0 ma0 1.109) aparaṃ suttapadaṃ ānītaṃ. tathā hi ``yo nu kho, āvuso, dukkhaṃ passati, dukkhasamudayampi so passati...pe0... paṭipadampi so passatī''ti (saṃ0 ni0 5.1100) ekasaccadassanasamaṅgino aññasaccadassanasamaṅgibhāvavicāraṇāya tamatthaṃ sādhetuṃ āyasmatā ^b^gavampati^eb^ttherena vuttaṃ, paccekañca saccattayadassanayojanā katā. aññathā kamābhisamaye purimadiṭṭhassa puna adassanato samudayādiṃ passato dukkhādidassanaṃ puna avattabbaṃ siyā, vuccamāne ca sabbadassanaṃ dassanantaraparamanti dassanānuparamo eva siyāti.

[01] nissayabhāvahetutāya dukkhapariññāya vaṭṭijhāpanasadisatā, paṭipakkhaviddhaṃsanatāya samudayappahānassa andhakāravidhamanasadisatā, ñāṇālokaparibrūhanatāya maggabhāvanāya ālokaviddhaṃsanasadisatā, tena tena maggena yathā yathā nirodhassa sacchikiriyā, tathā tathā kilesasnehapariyādānaṃ hotīti nirodhasacchikiriyāya snehapariyādānasadisatā kāraṇūpacārena vuttā.
[03] 840^b^.^eb^ ^b^obhāsetī^eb^ti pakāseti. ^b^kilesapaṭippassaddhi^eb^nti sabbakilesadarathapariḷāhavūpasamabhāvato kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhibhūtaṃ.

[03] 841^b^.^eb^ ^b^appetī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0475^ea^ pappoti. dukkhapariññāya sakkāyatīrasamatikkamabhāvato orimatīrappahānasadisatā, maggabhāvanāya sattattiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammāvahanatāya bhaṇḍavahanasadisatā.
[03] 842^b^.^eb^ pavattaṃ ^a^M2.0505^ea^ ñāṇaṃ assāti ^b^pavattañāṇo,^eb^ maggo. ^b^assa^eb^ maggassa.
[03] ^b^tathaṭṭhenā^eb^ti tathasabhāvena, pīḷanādiaviparītasabhāvenāti attho. ^b^ekapaṭivedhānī^eb^ti ekajjhaṃ paṭivijjhitabbākārāni.

[01] ^b^dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā ^b^buddhānussativaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi0 mahāṭī0 1.144) vuttameva. ^b^ekasaṅgahitānī^eb^ti ekeneva saṅgahitāni. kena? tathaṭṭhena, saccaṭṭhenāti attho. ^b^yaṃ ekasaṅgahita^eb^ntiādi ñāṇassa ekapaṭivedhadassanaṃ. maggañāṇañhi nirodhameva ārammaṇaṃ karontampi yo so dukkhādīsu tacchāvipallāsabhūtabhāvasaṅkhāto saccaṭṭho, tappaṭicchādakasammohaviddhaṃsanena taṃ yāthāvato paṭivijjhantaṃ paccakkhaṃ karontameva pavattati. yato aparabhāge pīḷanādayo soḷasapi saccaṭṭhā ariyassa hatthāmalakaṃ viya yāthāvato upaṭṭhahanti.

[03] 843^b^.^eb^ ^b^atthā^eb^ti ñāṇena araṇīyato atthāti laddhasamaññā ākārā. ^b^aññasaccadassanavasenā^eb^ti samudayādisaccantaradassanavasena. ^b^āvibhāvato^eb^ti pakāsabhāvato. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ye ākārā dukkhādīsu sabhāvavasena, saccantaradassanavasena ca āvibhavanti, te pīḷanādayo cattāroyevāti soḷaseva vuttā, na aññeti. ayamattho idhādhippetoti kathamidaṃ viññāyatīti āha ^b^``tattha katamaṃ dukkhe ñāṇa''^eb^ntiādi. tenetaṃ dasseti -- yasmā pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ visuṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasenapi saccañāṇaṃ vuttaṃ kiccanibbattivasenapi, tasmā viññāyati ``sabhāvato, saccantaradassanato ca saccānaṃ ākārā āvibhavantī''ti.

[03] kiccanibbattivasena dassanaṃ āvibhāvato dassanasadisanti taṃ anāmasitvā itarameva dassento ^b^``tatthā''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti tesu dvīsu dassanesu. ^b^āyūhita^eb^nti piṇḍavasena nibbattitaṃ. yañhi kiñci paccayuppannaṃ nāma, sabbaṃ taṃ samuditameva nibbattatīti. ^b^saṅkhata^eb^nti paccayantarehi samecca sambhūya kataṃ. ^b^rāsikata^eb^nti puñjakataṃ. anekameva hi paccayuppannaṃ ekajjhaṃ ^a^V2.0476^ea^ nibbattamānaṃ attano paccayehi rāsikataṃ viya hotīti. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti samudayena āyūhitattā. ^b^assā^eb^ti dukkhasaccassa. yasmiṃ santāne uppanno ^a^M2.0506^ea^, tassa ^b^kilesasantāpaharo^eb^. sayampi kilesapariḷāhābhāvato ^b^susītalo. santāpaṭṭho āvibhavati^eb^ uḷāradassanena tadaññassa anuḷārabhāvo viyāti dassento āha ^b^``āyasmato''^eb^tiādi. ^b^avipariṇāmadhammassa^eb^ niccasabhāvassa ^b^vattabbameva natthi^eb^ paṭipakkhato āvibhavanākārassa sukhasiddhito.

[03] ^b^nidānaṭṭho āvibhavati^eb^ idamassa nidadātīti. saṃyogapalibodhaṭṭhā paṭipakkhavasena āvibhavanākārāti dassento āha ^b^``visaṃyogabhūtassā''^eb^tiādi. kilesadukkhehi saṃyojanaṭṭho ^b^saṃyogaṭṭho^eb^. saṃsāracārake palibuddhanaṭṭho ^b^palibodhaṭṭho^eb^.

[03] kilesasaṅgaṇikādivasena ^b^avivekabhūtassa. vivekaṭṭho^eb^ upadhivivekatā. sabbasaṅkhāravivittatā asaṅkhatabhāvoti evaṃ acchariyabbhutasabhāvopi ariyamaggo saṅkhato eva, ayameva ca eko asaṅkhatoti nirodhassa asaṅkhatabhāvo supākaṭo hoti. ^b^dukkhaṃ visaṃ^eb^ maraṇadhammato tassa agadabhūtaṃ ^b^amataṃ nibbānaṃ^eb^.

[03] ``maggo''ti sambhāvetabbataṃ patto sukhumasantabhāvena upaṭṭhito nikantibhūtopi ^b^nāyaṃ^eb^ samudayo ^b^hetu nibbānassa pattiyā. ayaṃ^eb^ ariyamaggo ^b^hetū^eb^ti maggāmaggañāṇadassane vuttanayena maggassa ^b^hetuṭṭho āvibhavati. nirodhadassanenā^eb^ti ativiya nipuṇassa paramagambhīrassa nirodhasaccassa dassanena. tenāha ^b^``paramasukhumānī''^eb^tiādi. ^b^dukkhadassanenā^eb^ti ativiya ādīnavappattiyā vipulatarādīnavassa dukkhasaccassa dassanena. tappaṭipakkhato ^b^ādhipateyyaṭṭho^eb^. tenāha ^b^``anekarogātura...pe0... uḷārabhāvo viyā''^eb^ti. evamete yathārahaṃ anvayato, byatirekato ca saccesu āvibhavanākārā vibhāvitā.

[01] ^b^ekekassā^eb^ti ekekassa atthassa, pīḷanāyūhananissaraṇaniyyānaṭṭhe sandhāyāha. ^b^tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇa^eb^nti saṅkhatādiatthe. ^b^ye pana^eb^ vādino. ^b^nānābhisamaya^eb^nti nānāñāṇena abhisamayaṃ, catunnaṃ saccānaṃ nānākkhaṇe nānāñāṇena paṭivijjhananti attho. yadi hi maggañāṇassa catūsu saccesu nānābhisamayo siyā, dukkhadassanādīhi paṭhamamaggādīhi pahātabbānaṃ saṃyojanattayādīnaṃ ^a^M2.0507^ea^ ekadesappahānaṃ āpajjati. tathā ca sati ekadesasotāpattimaggaṭṭhatādippasaṅgo. taṃtaṃdassanānantarañca ^a^V2.0477^ea^ taṃtaṃphalena bhavitabbanti taṃtaṃpaheyyakilesapaṭippassaddhibhūtānaṃ phalānaṃ maggānaṃ viya catukkatā siyā. tathā ca sati ekadesasotāpannatādippasaṅgo. kiñca bhiyyo -- yadi maggañāṇassa nānābhisamayo siyā, aññena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ passati. aññena samudayaṃ, aññena nirodhaṃ, aññena maggaṃ, evaṃ sati maggakiccaṃ aparipuṇṇameva siyā. maggadassanena hi dvayagati, teneva vā tassa dassanaṃ, aññena vāti. tattha paṭhamo tāva pakkho na yujjati attani pavattiyā asambhavato. na hi teneva aṅgulaggena tameva parāmasituṃ sakkā. atha aññena anavaṭṭhānappasaṅgo ``yena maggaṃ passati, sopi maggo. tampi yena passati, sopi maggo''ti. tasmā ekābhisamayato yathāvutto asammohapaṭivedhova yutto. apica paricchinditabbaṃ, samucchinditabbañca saccadvayaṃ ārabbha pavattamānassa maggañāṇassa paricchindanasamucchindanāni na sambhavanti tato anissaraṇato. na hi dukkhapariññāsamudayappahānāni dukkhasamudayasaccārammaṇena ñāṇena kātuṃ sakkuṇeyyāni. nibbānārammaṇena pana tattha, itaradvaye ca sammohaṃ viddhaṃsentena sakkā kātunti ekābhisamayo eva yutto. ayaṃ pana attho pāḷiyaṃ āgato evāti ^b^``tesaṃ uttaraṃ abhidhamme kathāvatthusmiṃ vuttamevā''^eb^ti.

[03] 845^b^.^eb^ ^b^abhiññāpaññā^eb^tiādīnaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. apica sutamayāya, cintāmayāya, ekaccabhāvanāmayāya ca abhivisiṭṭhāya paññāya ñātā ^b^abhiññātā. āveṇikā bhūmi^eb^ pariññantarānaṃ avisayabhāvato. na hi nāmarūpaparicchedapaccayapariggahaṇavasena tīraṇapariññādīnaṃ pavatti atthi.

[03] 846^b^.^eb^ anulomañāṇampi aniccādivaseneva saṅkhāre ārabbha pavattati, pageva paṭisaṅkhānupassanādayoti āha ^b^``yāva anulomā āveṇikā bhūmī''^eb^ti. kāmañcettha tīraṇapariññābhūmiyaṃ ñātappahānapariññāyopi laddhāvasarā, tattha pana yathā tīraṇapariññā sātisayaṃ kiccakārī, na tathā itarāti āveṇikaggahaṇaṃ.

[03] 847^b^.^eb^ nippariyāyena ^a^M2.0508^ea^ pahānapariññā nāma maggañāṇanti ^b^``yāva maggañāṇā bhūmī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ ^a^V2.0478^ea^. ^b^ayaṃ idha adhippetā^eb^ti idha abhisamayakāle kiccavicāre ayaṃ pahānapariññā adhippetā tadatthattā sesapariññānaṃ. tenāha ^b^``yasmā vā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] ^b^tadatthāyevā^eb^ti pahānapariññatthā eva. atha vā ^b^tadatthāyevā^eb^ti pahānatthā eva. atha vā ^b^tadatthāyevā^eb^ti maggatthā eva. ñātatīraṇapariññā hi yāvadeva maggādhigamatthāya pavattā. ^b^niyamato ñātā ceva tīritā ca honti^eb^ ñātatīritabhāvehi vinā pahānābhāvato, pahānasiddhiyañca ñātatīritabhāvasiddhito. maggañāṇañhi dukkhe pariññābhisamayavasena pavattamānaṃ tassa sabhāvalakkhaṇaṃ viya sāmaññalakkhaṇampi paṭivijjhatīti vuccati tappaṭicchādakasammohaviddhaṃsanato. tenāha ^b^``pariññattayampi...pe0... veditabba''^eb^nti.

[03] 848^b^.^eb^ ^b^pariññā viyā^eb^ti tividhatāsāmaññaṃ nidasseti, na pariññāpahātabbatāsāmaññaṃ vikkhambhanappahānassa aripaññākiccabhāvato. kāmacchandādayo yathā na cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāya tiṭṭhanti, evaṃ pariyuṭṭhānassa nisedhanaṃ appavattikaraṇaṃ vikkhambhanaṃ, vikkhambhanameva pahānaṃ ^b^vikkhambhanappahānaṃ. pākaṭattā^eb^ti ``ayaṃ abyāpannacitto vigatathinamiddho''tiādinā (a0 ni0 4.198) paresampi pākaṭattā. ^b^``na sahasā cittaṃ ajjhottharantī''^eb^ti idaṃ paṭiladdhamattassa jhānassa vasena vuttaṃ, subhāvite pana paguṇajjhāne yāva carimakacittampi na ajjhottharanteva. atha vā ^b^jhānassa pubbabhāgepī^eb^ti jhānādhigamatthāya pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā. ^b^pacchābhāgepī^eb^ti jhānaṃ labhitvā aññakiccappasutassapi. ^b^vitakkādayo^eb^ti vitakkavicārapītisukharūpasaññādayo. dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ paṭipakkhā dutiyādīsu appitesuyeva vikkhambhanti, tato tato vuṭṭhitamattassa pana pavattanti parittacittavaseneva vuṭṭhahanato.

[03] 849^b^.^eb^ ^b^``padīpena andhakārassa viyā''^eb^ti idaṃ paṭipakkhena pahīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. paṭipakkho hi padīpo andhakārassa, ghaṭappahāro pana sevālassa na paṭipakkho, kevalaṃ pavattinivāraṇamattameva karotīti. tena asatipi ujuvipaccanīkatāya dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ vitakkādīnaṃ vikkhambhanassa taṃ nidassanaṃ suṭṭhutaraṃ yujjati. ^b^``vipassanāya avayavabhūtenā''^eb^ti idaṃ idhādhikatatadaṅgappahānassa ^a^M2.0509^ea^ dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. sīlavisodhanādināpi hi tadaṅgappahānaṃ hotiyevāti. ^b^ñāṇaṅgenā^eb^ti ñāṇasaṅkhātena kāraṇena. tadaṅgena tadaṅgassa pahānaṃ ^b^tadaṅgappahānaṃ^eb^. sati vijjamāne khandhapañcakasaṅkhāte kāye, sayaṃ vā tattha sati diṭṭhi ^b^sakkāyadiṭṭhi,^eb^ ``rūpaṃ attato ^a^V2.0479^ea^ samanupassatī''tiādinā (saṃ0 ni0 3.81; 4.345) nayena vuttā attānudiṭṭhi. soḷasavatthukā, aṭṭhavatthukā ca kaṅkhāva malaṃ ^b^kaṅkhāmalaṃ. samūhagāhassā^eb^ti ``attā attaniya''nti evaṃ pavattasamūhagahaṇassa pahānaṃ kalāpasammasanena ekādasasu okāsesu pakkhipitvā vikiraṇavasena khandhānaṃ dassanato. ^b^assādasaññāyā^eb^ti pañcakkhandhe assādanavasena pavattamicchāsaññāya. ^b^appaṭisaṅkhānassā^eb^ti paṭisaṅkhānapaṭipakkhassa mohassa. ^b^anupekkhanassā^eb^ti apekkhāya. saṅkhāresu niccādigāho ^b^saccapaṭilomagāho^eb^ maggasaccādhigamassa vilomanato. sādīnavesu anādīnavasaññitā, anādīnave ca sādīnavasaññitā ^b^saccapaṭilomagāho^eb^ti ca vadanti.
[03] evaṃ visuddhikkamena tadaṅgappahānaṃ dassetvā idāni aṭṭhārasamahāvipassanāvasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``yaṃ vā panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha yaṃ vā pana pahānanti sambandho.
[03] 850^b^.^eb^ ^b^vuttameva^eb^ ``sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ aniccato anupassatī''tiādinā (visuddhi0 2.742).
[03] santatisamūhakiccārammaṇānaṃ vasena ghanaggahaṇaṃ ghanasaññā, tassā ^b^ghanasaññāya^eb^.
[03] ^b^nirodhe adhimuttatā, tāyā^eb^ti tiyaddhagatānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhameva disvā tattha adhimuccanavasena pavattapaññā, tāya. ^b^āyūhanassā^eb^ti abhisaṅkharaṇassa.

[03] ^b^taṃ taṃ pariccheda^eb^nti ādānanikkhepādikaṃ taṃ taṃ paricchedaṃ. ^b^aññathāpavattidassana^eb^nti vuttaparicchedato pubbe, pacchā ca aññākārappavattiyā dassanaṃ, avatthāvisesappavattidassanaṃ vā. ^b^dhuvasaññāyā^eb^ti thirabhāvaggahaṇassa.
[03] ^b^sārādānābhinivesassā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0510^ea^ asāresu sāragahaṇābhinivesassa.
[03] saṃsayamicchāñāṇānaṃ vasena sammuyhanaṃ sammoho, so eva abhinivesoti ^b^sammohābhiniveso^eb^. saṅkhāresu leṇatāṇabhāvaggahaṇaṃ ^b^ālayābhiniveso,^eb^ atthato bhavanikanti.

[01] yathā ^a^V2.0480^ea^ cittaṃ saṅkhāre muñcitvā vivaṭṭaṃ nibbānaṃ pakkhandati, tathā pavattanato saṅkhārupekkhā ca anulomañca ``vivaṭṭānupassanā''ti vuttaṃ. niviṭṭhabhāvena ogāḷhabhāvena pavattasaṃyojanādikilesā eva ^b^kilesābhiniveso. nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ samādhi^eb^nti vipassanāsamādhimāha.

[03] 851^b^.^eb^ ^b^asanivicakkaṃ^eb^ asanimaṇḍalaṃ. ^b^evaṃ pahāna^eb^nti anuppattidhammatāpādanamāha. kammakilesānaṃ, sabbesampi vā saṅkhārānaṃ khayaṃ nirodhaṃ gacchatīti ^b^khayagāmī,^eb^ ariyamaggo. lokuttaraggahaṇeneva siddhepi khayagāmiggahaṇaṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ. ^b^samucchedappahānamevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ nippariyāyataṃ upādāya. ^b^tadatthānevā^eb^ti samucchedappahānatthāneva. tena vikkhambhanatadaṅgappahānānaṃ maggasambhāratamāha tehi vinā asijjhanato. atha vā ^b^tadatthānevā^eb^ti maggatthāneva. tena tadatthatāya tesaṃ taṃkiccataṃ dasseti. tenāha ^b^``tasmā''^eb^tiādi. tamevatthaṃ upamāya dassetuṃ ^b^``paṭirājānaṃ vadhitvā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^yampi tato pubbe kata^eb^nti yaṃ tatorajjappattito pubbe kataṃ paccantasādhanaduggaviddhaṃsanādi. yathā ^b^idañcidañca raññā katantiyeva vuccati,^eb^ evaṃ lokiyañāṇena sādhitānipi vikkhambhanatadaṅgappahānāni samucchedappahānavasena pavattassa maggassa kiccabhāvena vuccanti, tadatthatāya, tesaṃ taṃsantatipatitatāya ca maggassāti veditabbā.

[03] 852^b^.^eb^ lokiyassa, lokiyā vā sacchikiriyā ^b^lokiyasacchikiriyā^eb^. evaṃ ^b^lokuttarasacchikiriyā^eb^ veditabbā. ^b^lābhīmhī^eb^ti lābhī amhi. tathā ^b^vasīmhī^eb^ti etthāpi. ^b^paccakkhato ñāṇaphassenā^eb^ti paccakkhato ārammaṇakaraṇasaṅkhātena ñāṇaphassanena. ^b^``paccakkhato''^eb^ti ca iminā anumānato ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ nivatteti, ``īdisamida''nti paccavekkhaṇavasena paccakkhato jānanaṃ hettha ``ñāṇaphasso''ti adhippeto. ^b^phassitā^eb^ti ñāṇena phuṭṭhā.
[03] jhānamaggaphalāni ^a^M2.0511^ea^ viya attano santāne anuppādetvāpi tappaṭicchādakasammohaviddhaṃsanavasena tathāviddhaṃsanapavattañāṇaṃ ^b^aparappaccayañāṇaṃ^eb^.
[03] ^b^passanto^eb^ paccakkhato jānanto. ^b^amatogadha^eb^nti amatapariyāpannaṃ, amatasaṅkhātanti attho.

[03] sotāpattimaggo paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato dassanaṃ, tena dassanena sacchikiriyā ^b^dassanasacchikiriyā^eb^. kiñcāpi gotrabhuñāṇaṃ tato paṭhamataraṃ nibbānaṃ passati, ālambanakaraṇato ^a^V2.0481^ea^ disvā kattabbakiccākaraṇato pana na dassananti vuccati. ^b^sā duvidhāpī^eb^ti sā dassanabhāvanāvasena duvidhāpi sacchikiriyā. ^b^dassanabhāvanāvasenā^eb^ti dassanamaggabhāvanāmaggavasena. tena amaggavasena pavattanibbānassa paccavekkhaṇasacchikiriyaṃ nivatteti. ^b^nibbānassā^eb^ti pana iminā maggaphalesu paccavekkhaṇasacchikiriyaṃ. ^b^imassa ñāṇassā^eb^ti imassa yathādhigatassa lokuttarañāṇassa.

[03] 853^b^.^eb^ ^b^abhimatā^eb^ti adhippetā. bhāvanā nāma uppādanā, santānaparibhāvanā cāti tadubhayaṃ dassento ^b^``lokiyāna''^eb^ntiādimāha. yadaggena hi lokiyā kusalādayo uppāditā, vaḍḍhitā ca, tadaggenassa sīlabhāvanā, kāyabhāvanā, cittabhāvanā, paññābhāvanā ca lokiyā nipphāditā hoti, tāya ca santānopi paribhāvitoti. ^b^tāsu^eb^ lokiyalokuttarabhāvanāsu ^b^idha^eb^ ñāṇadassanavisuddhikathāyaṃ ^b^lokuttara^eb^bhāvanā ^b^adhippetā,^eb^ na itarā tassā sambhārabhāvato. ^b^catubbidhampetaṃ ñāṇa^eb^nti etaṃ catubbidhampi ariyamaggañāṇaṃ lokuttarāni sammāvācādibhedāni ^b^sīlādīni uppādeti^eb^. kathaṃ? sahajātādipaccayatāya. ^b^sīlādīnī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena samādhissa gahaṇaṃ, na paññāya. na hi tadeva taṃ uppādeti, maggacittuppādo pana uppādeti. tadantogadhabhāvā sammāsaṅkappo. so hi pañcakkhandhasaṅgahitoti vadanti. ^b^sīlādīnī^eb^ti vā phalasīlādīnampi gahaṇanti paññāyapi gahaṇaṃ yujjatiyeva. ^b^sahajātapaccayāditāyā^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena anantarapaccayāditāyapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^tehi ca santānaṃ vāsetī^eb^ti tehi samucchindanapaṭipassambhanavasena pavattehi lokuttarehi sīlādīhi ariyapuggalo attano santānaṃ paribhāveti. yaṃ nissāya parāvuttīti vadanti. yathā pariññattayampi ^a^M2.0512^ea^ pahānattayampi maggañāṇassa kiccanti vuttaṃ pariyāyena, na evamidha. idha pana ^b^lokuttarabhāvanāva assa^eb^ maggañāṇassa ^b^kiccaṃ^eb^. na hettha bhāvanāya pariyāyo labbhatīti avadhāraṇaṃ. tena lokiyabhāvanaṃ nivatteti.

[03] ^b^evaṃ sarūpeneva āgatāyā^eb^ti ``cittaṃ bhāvaya''nti samādhi viya cittasīsena anāgantvā ``paññaṃ bhāvaya''nti evaṃ sarūpeneva āgatāya paññāya. ^b^yaṃ vuttaṃ^eb^ uddesavasena. ^b^ettāvatā taṃ vitthāritaṃ hoti^eb^. ayañca pañho vissajjito hotīti sambandho.
[06] ñāṇadassanavisuddhiniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti bāvīsatimaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 854^b^.^eb^ ^b^anekasatānisaṃsā^eb^ ^a^M2.0513^ea^ ^a^V2.0482^ea^ sāvakabodhiādivipulodātaguṇavisesāvahattā. ^b^vitthārato^eb^ti nayadassanaṃ akatvā ``ayampi paññābhāvanāya ānisaṃso, ayampī''ti anupadadassanavasena vitthārato pakāsetuṃ na sukaraṃ atibahubhāvato. ^b^assā^eb^ti paññābhāvanāya. ^b^nānākilesaviddhaṃsana^eb^nti sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchādivasena nānāvidhānaṃ kilesadhammānaṃ tadaṅgādivasena pajahanaṃ. ^b^ariyaphalarasānubhavana^eb^nti sotāpattiphalādiphalasukhapaṭisaṃvedanaṃ.

[03] 855^b^.^eb^ ``ariyaphalarasānubhavana''nti eteneva kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ dīpīyatīti ^b^``ariyamaggakkhaṇe''^eb^ti visesavacanaṃ, tabbhāvabhāvato vā. siddhe hi samucchedappahāne paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ siddhameva hotīti.

[03] ^b^bhīmavegānupatitā^eb^ti sakalaṃ lokaṃ bhindantena viya bhīmena bhayānakena vegena sahasā patitā. ^b^siluccaye^eb^ti pabbate selaputhule. ^b^satejujjalamaṇḍalo^eb^ti saradakālasamiddhena attano tejasā samujjaladuddikkhamaṇḍalo. vadhabandhanādiduggatiparipakkilesādijātiādi^b^sabbānatthavidhāyakaṃ. sandiṭṭhika^eb^nti paccakkhabhūtaṃ. ^b^jaññā^eb^ti jāneyya. ^b^idhā^eb^ti imissaṃ paññābhāvanāyaṃ.

[03] 856^b^.^eb^ ariyassa ^a^V2.0483^ea^ maggassa phalaṃ ^b^ariyaphalaṃ,^eb^ ariyañca taṃ visuddhattā phalañcātipi ^b^ariyaphalaṃ,^eb^ tassa ^b^raso,^eb^ paṭippassaddhivimuttisukhaṃ, ^b^anubhavanaṃ^eb^ nibbānārammaṇassa tassa paṭisevanaṃ. ^b^tatrā^eb^ti tesu dvīsu ākāresu. ^b^assā^eb^ti ariyaphalassa.

[03] 857^b^.^eb^ saṃyojanesu ^a^M2.0514^ea^ pahīnesu sabbepi kilesā pahīnāyeva hontīti saṃyojanānaṃyeva gahaṇaṃ. ^b^saṃyojanappahānamattameva^eb^ ariyamaggassa ^b^phalaṃ nāma,^eb^ na aññaṃ kiñci atthantaraṃ vipākabhūtanti adhippāyo. tenāha ^b^``phalaṃ nāma na koci añño dhammo atthī''^eb^ti. ke panetaṃ vadantīti? andhakādayo. te hi ``arahattaṃ arahattanti, āvuso, vuccati...pe0... mohakkhayo''ti (saṃ0 ni0 4.315) suttapadassa atthaṃ aññathā gahetvā nippariyāyato ``arahattaṃ nāma kiñci natthi, kilesappahānameva tathā voharīyatī''ti vadantā sesaphalepi paṭikkhipanti. ^b^idaṃ suttampī^eb^ti paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷimāha. pakaṭṭho ukkaṭṭho yogoti payogo, ariyamaggo, payoganimittaṃ jātakilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhi ^b^payogapaṭippassaddhi^eb^. yā pana ariyamaggassa bhāvitattā labbhamānāpi yassā vipākapaññāya nippajjamānāya nippajjati, sā paṭippassaddhiyaṃ nipphādetabbāyaṃ paññāti ^b^paṭippassaddhipaññā^eb^ti vuttā. ^b^sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiyā vuṭṭhātī^eb^ti sammādiṭṭhiyā ujuvipaccanīkadassanavasena vatvā tadaññatopi vuṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``tadanuvattakakilesehī''^eb^ti vuttaṃ, tassā micchādiṭṭhiyā sampayogato, upanissayato ca anuvattakakilesehi. tena tadekaṭṭhappahānamāha. ^b^khandhehī^eb^ti tadanuvattakakkhandhehi, tāya micchādiṭṭhiyā sampayuttakkhandhehi ceva tappaccayā āyatiṃ uppajjanakkhandhehi cāti attho. ^b^bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehī^eb^ti yathāvuttakilesakkhandhehi bahiddhābhūtehi vipassanāya gocarabhūtehi sabbasaṅkhāranimittehi.

[03] evaṃ maggakiccaṃ dassetvā idāni tassa vasena phalaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``tampayogapaṭippassaddhattā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^tampayogapaṭippassaddhattā^eb^ti tassa ajjhattabahiddhā vuṭṭhānādipayogassa paṭippassaddhattā. maggo hi nimittato, pavattato ca vuṭṭhahanto kilese pajahatīti attano khaṇe taṃ payogaṃ karoti nāma, phalakkhaṇe panassa so payogo paṭippassaddho vūpasanto nāma hoti. tena vuttaṃ ``tampayogapaṭippassaddhattā''ti. ^b^uppajjatī^eb^ti maggānantaraṃ ^a^V2.0484^ea^ dvikkhattuṃ vā tikkhattuṃ vā uppajjati. phalasamāpattikāle pana bahukkhattuṃ, nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa dvikkhattuṃ uppajjati. sabbampi yathāvuttapayogapaṭippassaddhinimittaṃ uppajjanato ``tampayogapaṭippassaddhattā uppajjatī''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^maggassetaṃ phala^eb^nti yathāvuttā vipākā sammādiṭṭhi nāma, etaṃ ariyamaggassa ^a^M2.0515^ea^ phalanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^vitthāretabba^eb^nti ``sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe abhiniropanaṭṭhena sammāsaṅkappo micchāsaṅkappā''tiādinā (paṭi0 ma0 1.63) saṅkappādivasena, sesamaggavasena ca vitthārato veditabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, ime dhammā appamāṇārammaṇā^eb^ti appamāṇārammaṇatāya maggehi nibbisesatāya. tathā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasaṅkhāto mahaggato dhammo nirodhato vuṭṭhānavelāyaṃ appamāṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayoti ariyaphalassa anantarapaccayatāya ca dīpanāti ^b^evamādīnipi ettha^eb^ ariyaphalassa sabhāvadhammabhāvena atthitāya ^b^sādhakāni,^eb^ na yathādassitapaṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiyevāti adhippāyo.
[03] 858^b^.^eb^ ^b^phalasamāpattiya^eb^nti phalapavattisaṅkhātāya samāpattiyaṃ. ^b^assā^eb^ti ariyaphalassa. sarūpakattukāraṇākāraṭṭhitivuṭṭhānānantaravasena ^b^idaṃ pañhākammaṃ^eb^.
[03] 859^b^.^eb^ ^b^ariyaphalassa nirodhe appanā^eb^ti ariyassa phalajhānassa nibbāne ārammaṇabhūte appanākārena pavatti.

[03] 860^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbepi puthujjanā^eb^ti jhānasamāpattilābhinopi puthujjanā na samāpajjanti, pageva itare. ^b^ariyā sabbepi^eb^ phalasamāpattiṃ ^b^samāpajjantī^eb^ti kāmaṃ sāmaññajotanā, sā pana visesaniviṭṭhāyeva hoti. ^b^adhigatattā^eb^ti pana hetukittanaṃ. uparimānampi heṭṭhimāya lokiyasamāpattiyā viya samāpajjanaṃ sādhentaṃ viya ṭhitanti taṃ nivattento ^b^``uparimā panā''^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^uparimā^eb^ti sakadāgāmiādayo. ^b^heṭṭhima^eb^nti sotāpattiphalādiṃ. ^b^na samāpajjanti^eb^ satipi adhigatatte. kasmāti ce? kāraṇamāha ^b^``puggalantarabhāvūpagamanena paṭippassaddhattā''^eb^ti. etena uparimo ariyo heṭṭhimaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati attanā adhigatattā, yathā taṃ lokiyasamāpattinti, evaṃ pavattaṃ hetuṃ byabhicāreti. na hi lokiyajjhānesu puggalantarabhāvūpagamanaṃ nāma atthi visesābhāvato. idha pana asamugghāṭitakammakilesanirodhanena ^a^V2.0485^ea^ puthujjanehi viya sotāpannassa, sotāpannādīhi sakadāgāmiādīnaṃ puggalantarabhāvūpagamanaṃ atthi. yato heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā phaladhammā uparūpari maggadhammehi ^a^M2.0516^ea^ nivattitā paṭipakkhehi viya abhibhūtā appavattidhammataṃyeva āpannā. tenāha ``paṭippassaddhattā''ti.

[03] apica kusalakiriyapavatti nāma aññādisī, vipākapavatti ca aññādisī, anantaraphalattā ca lokuttarakusalānaṃ heṭṭhimato uparimo bhavantaragato viya hoti. taṃtaṃphalavaseneva hi ariyānaṃ sotāpannādināmalābho. te sace aññaphalasamaṅginopi honti, sotāpannādināmampi tesaṃ avaṭṭhitaṃ siyā, tena tena jhānena gahitapaṭisandhiko viyāti tassa tassa ariyassa taṃ taṃ phalaṃ bhavaṅgasadisanti na uparimassa heṭṭhimaphalasamaṅgitāya lesopi sambhavati, kuto tassa samāpajjananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^heṭṭhimā ca uparima^eb^nti heṭṭhimā ca sotāpannādayo ariyā uparimaṃ sakadāgāmiphalādiṃ na samāpajjantīti sambandho. tattha kāraṇamāha ^b^``anadhigatattā''^eb^ti. na hi anadhigatasamāpattiṃ samāpajjituṃ sakkā.

[03] ^b^``attano attanoyeva pana phalaṃ samāpajjantī''^eb^ti iminā sabbepi ariyā attano attano phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjantīti atthe āpanne tattha kesañci matibhedaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^``keci panā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^ete hi samādhismiṃ paripūrakārino^eb^ti yasmā hi te ``uparimā dve''ti vuttā anāgāmino, arahanto ca samādhismiṃ paripūrakārino, itare pana sīlesu paripūrakārino, tasmā dve eva phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjantīti. na hi samādhipāripūriyā vinā samāpattivaḷañjanaṃ sambhavatīti adhippāyo. ^b^ta^eb^nti ``samādhismiṃ paripūrakārino''ti tehi vuttakāraṇaṃ. ^b^akāraṇamevā^eb^ti ayuttiyeva. kasmāti ce? āha ^b^``puthujjanassāpī''^eb^tiādi. tassattho -- sabbaso asamucchinnakilesassa puthujjanassāpi attanā paṭiladdhalokiyasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ labbhati, kimaṅgaṃ pana samucchinnekaccakilesānaṃ heṭṭhimānaṃ ariyānaṃ, tasmā tesaṃ samādhismiṃ aparipūrakāritā attano phalasamāpattiṃ asamāpajjanassa akāraṇanti. yutticintā nāma pāḷianāruḷhe atthe yuttā, ayaṃ panattho pāḷiāruḷhoti kāraṇāpadese anādarakaraṇamukhena pāḷiṃ dassento ^b^``kiñcetthā''^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^sotāpattimaggapaṭilābhatthāyā^eb^ti sotāpattimaggassa samadhigamāya. ^b^sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāyā^eb^ti sotāpattiphalasamāpattiyā samāpajjanatthaṃ. esa nayo sesesupi.

[03] ettha ^a^M2.0517^ea^ ^a^V2.0486^ea^ ca ``suññatavihārasamāpattatthāya animittavihārasamāpattatthāyā''tiādinā sarūpato uddhaṭattā tato pubbe āgatā maggaphalavārā appaṇihitavasena vuttā. tattha anattānupassanāmukhena, aniccānupassanāmukhena ca pavattānaṃ phalasamāpattīnaṃ purecarā gotrabhudhammā navadasabhāvena vuttāti veditabbā. ``sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāyā''tiādinā pana catūsupi phalesu ekasadisaṃ desanāya āgatattā sotāpannasakadāgāminopi attano phalaṃ samāpajjantīti viññāyati. maggānantaraphalavasena taṃ vuttanti ca na sakkā vattuṃ vipassanāvasena dasannaṃ gotrabhudhammānaṃ dassanavasena desanāya āraddhattā, maggavāreneva ca tadatthasiddhito. na ca maggānantaraṃ phalaṃ ``phalasamāpattī''ti vuccati visuṃ parikammābhāvato. tasmā phalasamāpattivacaneneva sotāpannādīnampi phalasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ siddhaṃ. tenāha ^b^``tasmā''^eb^tiādi.

[03] 861^b^.^eb^ payojanampi tadatthāya paṭipattiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti tannimittaṃ paṭipajjanatoti ^b^``kasmā samāpajjantī''^eb^ti kāraṇaṃ pucchitvā ^b^``diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārattha''^eb^nti payojanaṃ vissajjitaṃ. ^b^kasmā^eb^ti vā sampadāne nissakkavacanaṃ, kissāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārattha^eb^nti diṭṭheva dhamme kilesadarathapariḷāhavūpasamena santena sukhavihārena viharaṇatthaṃ. satipi vipākabhāve parikammena vinā anuppajjanato phalasamāpattidhammānaṃ tassa tassa ariyassa rucivaseneva pavatti, yato nesaṃ sādhipatitāti āha ^b^``addhāna...pe0... samāpajjantī''^eb^ti.

[03] 862^b^.^eb^ ^b^dvīhi ākārehī^eb^ti dvīhi kāraṇehi. yathā hi lokiyajjhānānaṃ samadhigamo sampayogasamaṅgibhāvena sijjhamāno pahānaṅgasamatikkamamukhena vuccati tathā samadhigantabbattā, evaṃ phalasamāpattipi nibbānamanasikārena sijjhamānā tadaññārammaṇāmanasikāramukhena vuccati sabbasaṅkhārato vinivaṭṭitamānasatāvasena samijjhanato. tenāha ^b^``nibbānato''^eb^tiādi. udayabbayañāṇādiñāṇaparamparavasena hi sabbaphalacittaṃ saṅkhārato sabbaso nibbinnavirattacittassa tato vinissaṭanibbānārammaṇaṃ pavattati. evaṃ pavattamānañca taṃ ^b^nibbānato aññassa ārammaṇassa amanasikārā, nibbānassa ca manasikārā^eb^ pavattatīti vuccati.

[03] ^b^animittāya^eb^ ^a^M2.0518^ea^ ^b^cetovimuttiyā^eb^ti animittavimokkhadvayāya phalasamāpattiyā, aniccānupassanāmukhena ^a^V2.0487^ea^ vā samāpajjitabbāya phalasamāpattiyā. ^b^samāpattiyā^eb^ti samāpajjanatthāya. ^b^sabbanimittāna^eb^nti rūpādisabbasaṅkhāranimittānaṃ. ^b^amanasikāro^eb^ti ādīnavato disvā vissaṭṭhatāya anāvajjanaṃ asamannāhāro. ^b^animittāya ca dhātuyā manasikāro^eb^ti sabbasaṅkhāranimittābhāvato animittāya. kehici paccayehi na saṅkhatattā ca asaṅkhatāti laddhanāmāya asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā phalasamāpattisahajātena manasikārena manasikaraṇaṃ, tassā vā dhātuyā phalasamāpatticittasaṅkhāte manasikaraṇaṃ.

[03] 863^b^.^eb^ ^b^udayabbayādivasenā^eb^ti udayabbayabhaṅgabhayatupaṭṭhānādivasena pavattanakānaṃ navannampi ñāṇānaṃ byāpāraṃ vadati. tenāha ^b^``pavattānupubbavipassanassā''^eb^ti. ^b^saṅkhārārammaṇagotrabhuñāṇānantara^eb^nti saṅkhārārammaṇassa ``vodāna''nti laddhanāmassa gotrabhuñāṇassa anantaraṃ. kasmā panettha gotrabhuñāṇaṃ maggañāṇapurecārikaṃ viya nibbānārammaṇaṃ na hotīti? phaladhammānaṃ aniyyānikabhāvato. ariyamaggadhammā eva hi niyyānikā. vuttañhetaṃ ``katame dhammā niyyānikā? cattāro maggā apariyāpannā''ti (dha0 sa0 1295, 1609). tasmā ekantena niyyānikasabhāvassa ubhatovuṭṭhānabhāvena pavattamānassa maggañāṇassa anantarapaccayabhūtena ñāṇena nimittato vuṭṭhiteneva bhavitabbanti tassa nibbānārammaṇatā yuttā, na pana ariyamaggassa bhāvitattā tassa vipākabhāvena pavattamānānaṃ kilesānaṃ asamucchindanato aniyyānikattā avuṭṭhānasabhāvānaṃ phalañāṇānaṃ purecārikañāṇassa kadācipi nibbānārammaṇatā ubhayattha anulomañāṇānaṃ atulyākārato. ariyamaggavīthiyañhi anulomañāṇāni anibbiddhapubbānaṃ thūlathūlalobhakkhandhādīnaṃ sātisayaṃ padālanena lokiyañāṇesu ukkaṃsapāramippattāni maggañāṇānuguṇāni uppajjanti. phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ pana tāni tena tena maggena tesaṃ tesaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā tattha kilesavikkhambhane nirussukkāni kevalaṃ ariyānaṃ phalasamāpattisukhasamaṅgibhāvassa parikammamattāni hutvā uppajjantīti na tesaṃ kutoci vuṭṭhānasambhavo, yato nesaṃ pariyosānañāṇaṃ saṅkhāranimittavuṭṭhānato nibbānārammaṇaṃ siyā.

[03] evañca ^a^M2.0519^ea^ katvā ``sekkhassa attano phalasamāpattivaḷañjanatthāya udayabbayādivasena saṅkhāre sammasantassa vipassanāñāṇānupubbiyā phalameva uppajjati, na maggo''ti idañca aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. tenāha ^b^``sekkhassāpi phalameva uppajjati, na maggo''^eb^ti. nibbānārammaṇe appanajjhānavasena yathāparicchinnakālaṃ nirantaraṃ phalacittasseva pavattanaṃ samāpajjanaṃ ^a^V2.0488^ea^ phalasamāpattīti āha ^b^``phalasamāpattivasena nirodhe cittaṃ appetī''^eb^ti. yadi anupubbavipassanānaṃ vasena phalasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ, tena nīhārena sekkhassa uparimaggenāpi bhavitabbanti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^``phalasamāpattininnatāyā''^eb^tiādi. tena aññoyeva vipassanācāro ariyamaggāvaho, añño phalasamāpattiāvahoti dasseti, svāyaṃ vipassanāya vibhāgo vutto eva. ^b^ye panā^eb^ti abhayagirivāsino sandhāyāha. te hi maggaphalavipassanāya āloḷetvā vadanti. teneva hi ^b^``evaṃ satī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^arahā paccekabuddho bhavissati^eb^ yadi itaratthāpi vipassanā tadatthāya saṃvatteyyāti adhippāyo. ^b^pāḷivaseneva ca paṭikkhitta^eb^nti ``dasa gotrabhudhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī''ti maggatthā phalatthā vipassanā visuṃ katvā pavattapāḷivaseneva tesaṃ vacanaṃ paṭikkhittantipi na gahetabbaṃ, aññathā ``dasa gotrabhudhammā''ti vacanaṃ virujjheyyāti. ^b^idameva pana gahetabba^eb^nti vuttassevatthassa nigamanaṃ. ^b^phalañcassā^eb^tiādi mahaggatavipākānaṃ viya lokuttaravipākānañca kusalasarikkhatādassanaṃ. jhānato sarikkhatādassaneneva cettha bojjhaṅgamaggaṅgavasenāpi sarikkhatā dassitāyevāti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 864^b^.^eb^ ^b^ṭhitiyā^eb^ti pabandhaṭṭhitiyā. yathāparicchinnakālañhi samāpattiyā pabandhavasenāvaṭṭhānaṃ idha ^b^ṭhitī^eb^ti. ``cande vā sūriye vā ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ gate vuṭṭhahissāmī''ti kālāvadhiggahaṇavasena samāpajjanaṃ cittassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ ^b^abhisaṅkhāro^eb^.

[03] 865^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabbānevetānī^eb^ti rūpanimittādisabbāneva etāni ekato kāmaṃ na manasi karoti asambhavato. ^b^sabbasaṅgāhikavasenā^eb^ti anavasesapariyādānavasena. samudāyasaddā hi avayavesupi pavattanti ^a^M2.0520^ea^, avayavabyatirekena ca samudāyo na labbhatīti avayavagatampi kiccaṃ samudāyavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti sabbesaṃ saṅkhāranimittānaṃ ekato manasikārābhāvato. yasmā bhavaṅgacitte uppanne phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhito nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``yaṃ bhavaṅgassā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma kammādi. ^b^manasi karoto^eb^ti bhavaṅgasahagatena manasikārena manasi karoto, taṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ bhavaṅgamanasi karoto.

[03] 866^b^.^eb^ ^b^phalassa phalameva vā anantaraṃ hoti^eb^ purimassa purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ. ^b^bhavaṅgaṃ^eb^ ^a^V2.0489^ea^ ^b^vā^eb^ sabbapacchimassa. ^b^phalānantaraṃ^eb^ maggavīthiyaṃ, phalasamāpattiyañca. ^b^``yena phalena nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ hotī''^eb^ti idaṃ phaluppattiyā nirodhā vuṭṭhānabhāvato vuttaṃ. ^b^ta^eb^nti nirodhāvuṭṭhānabhāvena vuttaṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ vā aggaphalaṃ vā. ^b^nevasaññānāsaññāyatanānantara^eb^nti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa kusalassa, kiriyassa vā anantaraṃ satipi sattāhātikkame vijātiyena antarikattā.

[03] ^b^paṭippassaddhadaratha^eb^nti sabbaso passaddhakilesadarathaṃ. ^b^amatārammaṇa^eb^nti nibbānārammaṇaṃ. ^b^subha^eb^nti asobhanatāya kilesassāpi abhāvato sobhanaṃ. taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ lokāmisaṃ vantaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ etenāti ^b^vantalokāmisaṃ^eb^. vūpasantakilesatāya, susantatāya ca ^b^santaṃ^eb^. yena dhammena yogato samaṇo nāma hoti, tassa ariyamaggasaṅkhātassa sāmaññassa phalanti ^b^sāmaññaphalaṃ^eb^.

[03] ^b^ojavantenā^eb^ti sabhāvasampannena. ^b^sucinā^eb^ti kilesāsucivirahato parisuddhena. ^b^sukhenā^eb^ti anuttarasukhena. ^b^abhisandita^eb^nti sabbaso lūkhabhāvāpagamanena sinehitaṃ. ^b^sātātisātenā^eb^ti mahaggatasātato, lokuttarakusalasātato ca ativiya sātena madhurena. maggasukhatopi hi phalasukhaṃ santataratāya paṇītataraṃ. ^b^amatena^eb^ sammoditaṃ. ^b^``madhuṃ viyā''^eb^ti iminā sātātisātataṃyeva vibhāveti.
[03] tassa ariyassa phalassa rasabhūtaṃ sārabhūtaṃ taṃ sukhaṃ paññaṃ bhāvetvā yasmā paṇḍito vindati paṭilabhatīti yojanā.
[03] 867^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatrā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0521^ea^ tasmiṃ ``nirodhasamāpattiyā samāpajjanasamatthatā''ti saṃkhittavacane. ^b^idaṃ^eb^ sarūpādivasena ^b^pañhākammaṃ. katthā^eb^ti kasmiṃ bhave.

[03] 868^b^.^eb^ ^b^anupubbanirodhavasenā^eb^ti vipassanānugatā aṭṭha samāpattiyo ārohantena taṃtaṃpaṭipakkhanirodhamukhena tiṇṇaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ anupubbato nirodhavasena. yathāparicchinnakālaṃ yā cittacetasikānaṃ appavatti, ayaṃ nirodhasamāpattīti attho. ^b^ke samāpajjanti, ke na samāpajjantī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0490^ea^ kāmaṃ samāpajjanasamatthā padhānatāya paṭhamaṃ pucchitā, tabbissajjanaṃ pana garubhāvato pacchā vissajjetuṃ asamāpajjanake tāva dassento ^b^``sabbepi...pe0... na samāpajjantī''^eb^ti āha yathā ``vāmaṃ muñca, dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhā''ti. tattha ^b^``sabbepī''^eb^ti idaṃ puthujjanādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ visesanaṃ. te hi aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ lābhinopi alābhino viya samādhismiṃ aparipūrakāritāya nirodhaṃ samāpajjituṃ na sakkonti. kāmacchandādisamucchindanena hi samādhismiṃ paripūrakāritā, na jhānādhigamamattena. ^b^anāgāmino, arahanto^eb^ti ettha sukkhavipassakā ca anāgāmino, sukkhavipassakā ca arahantoti sukkhavipassakasaddo paccekaṃ yojetabbo. ubhayepi cete satipi vipassanābale samādhibalassa abhāvato nirodhaṃ na samāpajjanti. anupubbavihārasambhavataññevettha samādhibalaṃ icchitabbaṃ. purimakā pana tayo satipi samādhibale vipassanābalassa abhāvato, aparipuṇṇattā ca samāpajjituṃ na sakkonti. aparipuṇṇatā cassa saṅkhārānaṃ na sammā parimadditattā. ^b^aṭṭha samāpatti...pe0... samāpajjantī''^eb^ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ pāḷivaseneva dassetuṃ ^b^``dvīhi balehī''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^tayo ca saṅkhārāna^eb^nti ettha ^b^tayo^eb^ti sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṃ, tiṇṇanti attho. ^b^ñāṇacariyāhī^eb^ti ñāṇappavattīhi. ^b^nirodhasamāpattiyā^eb^ti nirodhasamāpajjanāya ñāṇaṃ. ^b^ayañca sampadā^eb^ti ayaṃ baladvayasamannāgamādikā yathāvuttanirodhasamāpattiāvahā sampatti. ^b^anāgāmikhīṇāsave^eb^ti anāgāmino ceva khīṇāsave ca.

[03] 869^b^.^eb^ ^b^samathabala^eb^nti kāmacchandādike paccanīkadhamme sametīti samatho, so eva paṭipakkhehi akampiyaṭṭhena balaṃ. aniccādivasena vividhehi ^a^M2.0522^ea^ ākārehi passatīti vipassanā, sā eva vuttanayena balanti ^b^vipassanābalaṃ. nekkhammavasenā^eb^tiādīsu kāmacchandavikkhambhanassa nekkhammasaṅkappassa, alobhapadhānassa vā tathāpavattakusalacittuppādassa vasena cittassa ekaggatāsaṅkhāto yo avikkhepo, taṃ ^b^samathabalaṃ^eb^. byāpādavikkhambhanassa abyāpādavitakkassa, adosapadhānassa vā tathāpavattakusalacittuppādassa vaseneva. thinamiddhavikkhambhikāya vibhūtaṃ katvā manasikaraṇena upaṭṭhitāalokasaññāya vasena. uddhaccavikkhambhanassa avikkhepassa samādhānassa vasena. sakalamicchāvitakkavikkhambhanassa sikhāpattāanāpānassatisiddhapaṭinissaggānupassiassāsapassāsānaṃ vasena cittassa ekaggatāsaṅkhāto yo avikkhepo, taṃ ^b^samathabala^eb^nti atthayojanā.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V2.0491^ea^ upacārassa jhānassa vasena samathabalaṃ dassetvā idāni taṃ aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ vasena paṭipakkhehi anabhibhavanīyatāya ca balappattivasena dassetuṃ ^b^``paṭhamajjhānenā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha ^b^nīvaraṇe^eb^ti nīvaraṇanimittaṃ nīvaraṇapaccayā. ^b^na kampati^eb^ jhānasamaṅgipuggalo, jhānasampayuttasamādhi vā. so hi visesato idha ``samathabala''nti adhippeto. tathā hi ^b^kenaṭṭhena samathabala^eb^nti balaṭṭho pucchito. ^b^uddhacce^eb^ti uddhaccanimittaṃ. ^b^uddhaccasahagatakilese^eb^ti uddhaccena sampayuttamohāhirikādikilesahetu. ^b^khandhe^eb^ti uddhaccasampayuttacatukkhandhanimittaṃ. ^b^na kampatī^eb^tiādīni aññamaññavevacanāni. ^b^kampanaṃ^eb^ vā ṭhānāpagamo. ^b^calanaṃ^eb^ paribbhamanaṃ. ^b^vedhanaṃ^eb^ sandhāvanaṃ. ^b^uddhacce^eb^ na kampati, uddhaccasahagatakilese na calati, uddhaccasahagatakkhandhe na vedhatīti vā yojetabbaṃ. uddhaccaggahaṇañcettha samathassa ujupaṭipakkhatāya tadabhibhavena balappattidassanatthaṃ. tenetaṃ aṭṭhannampi samāpattīnaṃ sādhāraṇato kiccātisayadassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^idaṃ samathabala^eb^nti yāyaṃ nekkhammādivasena laddhāya cittekaggatāya nīvaraṇādīhi akampanīyatā, tāni ca abhibhavitvā avaṭṭhānaṃ, idaṃ samathabalaṃ.

[03] idāni vipassanābalaṃ niddisanto yasmā vipassanā saṅkhepato sattahi anupassanāhi saṅgahitā, tasmā tato tato samāpattito vuṭṭhāya tāsaṃ vasena anupassanā kātabbā, tattakeneva cettha anupassanākiccaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hotīti ^b^``aniccānupassanā vipassanābalaṃ...pe0... paṭinissaggānupassanā vipassanābala''^eb^nti sarūpato dassetvā puna tā heṭṭhā ^a^M2.0523^ea^ vuttanayena visayavibhāgena dassetuṃ ^b^``rūpe aniccānupassanā''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. idhāpi paṭipakkhehi anabhibhavanīyatāva balaṭṭhoti dassetuṃ ^b^``kenaṭṭhena vipassanābala''^eb^ntiādi āraddhaṃ. tattha ^b^avijjāyā^eb^ti dvādasasu akusalacittuppādesu avijjānimittaṃ. ^b^avijjāsahagatakilese^eb^ti avijjāya sampayuttalobhadosādikilesavatthunimittaṃ. sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva. avijjaggahaṇañcettha vipassanāya ujupaṭipakkhatāya tadabhibhavena balappattidassanatthaṃ. tenetaṃ sattannampi anupassanānaṃ sādhāraṇato kiccātisayadassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^idaṃ vipassanābala^eb^nti yāyaṃ aniccānupassanādivasena laddhassa vipassanāñāṇassa niccasaññādinimittaṃ akampanīyatā, tā ca abhibhavitvā avaṭṭhānaṃ, idaṃ vipassanābalaṃ.

[03] ^b^vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhārā^eb^ vācaṃ saṅkharonti pavattentīti katvā. tenāha ``pubbe kho, āvuso visākha, vitakketvā vicāretvā pacchā vācaṃ bhindati, tasmā vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhāro''ti ^a^V2.0492^ea^ (ma0 ni0 1.463; saṃ0 ni0 4.348). te pana dutiyajjhāne vūpasantā hontīti āha ^b^``dutiyajjhānaṃ...pe0... paṭippassaddhā hontī''^eb^ti. kāyena saṅkharīyantīti ^b^kāyasaṅkhārā,^eb^ assāsapassāsā. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``assāsapassāsā kho, āvuso visākha, kāyikā ete dhammā kāyappaṭibaddhā, tasmā assāsapassāsā kāyasaṅkhāro''ti (ma0 ni0 1.463; saṃ0 ni0 4.348). te pana yasmā catutthajjhāne vūpasantā honti, tasmā āha ^b^``catutthajjhānaṃ...pe0... paṭippassaddhā hontī''^eb^ti. cittena saṅkharīyantīti ^b^cittasaṅkhārā,^eb^ saññā vedanā. tathā hi vuttaṃ ``saññā ca vedanā ca cetasikā ete dhammā cittappaṭibaddhā, tasmā saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhāro''ti (saṃ0 ni0 1.463; saṃ0 ni0 4.348). te pana yasmā nirodhaṃ samāpannassa vūpasamanti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``saññāvedayita...pe0... paṭippassaddhā hontī''^eb^ti.

[03] ñāṇacariyāsu vivaṭṭānupassanāggahaṇeneva tassa ādibhūtā sesānupassanāpi gahitāva honti tadavinābhāvato. ^b^maggo ñāṇacariyā, phalasamāpatti ñāṇacariyā^eb^ti maggaphalasamāpattīnaṃ ñāṇacariyābhāvavacanaṃ maggaphaladhammānaṃ ñāṇapadhānattā, ñāṇena vā indriyādhipatihetumaggapaccayādivasena sātisayapaccayabhūtena sesā maggaphaladhammā caritā pavattitāti katvā tathā vuttaṃ. samādhicariyāsupi eseva nayo ^a^M2.0524^ea^. ^b^imāhi soḷasahī^eb^ti aṭṭhannaṃ anupassanānaṃ, aṭṭhannañca maggaphalañāṇānaṃ vasena imāhi soḷasahi ñāṇapavattīhi.

[03] ^b^navahi samādhicariyāhī^eb^ti aṭṭha samāpattiyo aṭṭha samādhicariyā, tāsaṃ upacārasamādhi upacārasamādhibhāvanāsāmaññena ekā samādhicariyāti evaṃ navahi samādhicariyāhi. tenāha ^b^``paṭhamajjhānaṃ samādhicariyā''^eb^tiādi. ^b^paṭhamajjhānapaṭilābhatthāya vitakko cā^eb^tiādi nānāvajjanupacāravasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, uparisamāpattīnampi upacārassa tatheva vuttattā. na hi ekāvajjane catutthajjhānādiupacāre pītiādayo sambhavanti. ettha ca ``paṭhamajjhānapaṭilābhatthāyā''tiādivacanena upacārasamādhissāpi pāripūrī icchitabbāti dasseti. kiṃ panettha samathabalasamādhicariyānaṃ nānattaṃ, kiṃ vā vipassanābalalokiyañāṇacariyānaṃ? yathā samathabalepi ``nekkhammavasenā''tiādinā upacārasamādhinā saddhiṃ aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu appanāsamādhiyeva vutto, tathā samādhicariyāsu, vipassanābalalokiyañāṇacariyāsu ca vipassanāva vuttāti? kiñcāpi vuttā, vivaṭṭānupassanā pana purecarañāṇādivipassanābale avuttā ^a^V2.0493^ea^ eva ñāṇacariyāsu vuttā. apica paṭipakkhehi akampiyaṭṭho ^b^balaṭṭho,^eb^ pañcannaṃ vasībhāvānaṃ vasena suciṇṇatā ^b^cariyaṭṭho,^eb^ eteneva samathabalasamādhicariyānampi nānattaṃ saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^vasībhāvatā paññā^eb^ti ettha vaso etassa atthīti vasī, tassa bhāvo vasībhāvo, sā eva vasībhāvatā. ^b^``vasiyo''^eb^ti pana pāḷiyaṃ itthiliṅgavasena vuttattā tāyo dassetuṃ ^b^``vasīti pañca vasiyo''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tattha jhānaṃ āvajjantassa nirantaraṃ jhānaṅgesu cittappavattanasamatthatā ^b^āvajjanavasī^eb^. samāpajjitukāmassa sīghaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā ^b^samāpajjanavasī^eb^. accharāmattaṃ vā katipayaccharāmattaṃ vā khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā ^b^adhiṭṭhānavasī^eb^. tatheva lahuṃ vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā ^b^vuṭṭhānavasī. paccavekkhaṇavasī^eb^ pana āvajjanavasiyā eva sijjhati. paccavekkhaṇajavanāneva hi tattha āvajjanānantarānīti. ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana heṭṭhā āgato eva. ayañca vasībhāvo samādhicariyānaṃ vasena vutto. ñāṇacariyāsu pana lokuttarānaṃ ñāṇacariyānaṃ vasībhāvāpādanakiccaṃ nāma natthi. paṭipakkhassa suvihatattā sabhāvasiddho tattha ^a^M2.0525^ea^ vasībhāvo, lokiyānaṃ pana paguṇabalavabhāvāpādanena vasībhāvo labbhateva.

[03] 870^b^.^eb^ ^b^ukkaṭṭhaniddeso^eb^ti anavasesaniddeso. ^b^cuddasahi ñāṇacariyāhi hoti^eb^ aggamaggaphalānaṃ anadhigatattāti. ^b^yadi eva^eb^nti yadi ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena ``soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhī''ti vuttaṃ, tato avakaṃsavasenapi icchitabbaṃ, ^b^evaṃ^eb^ sante ^b^kiṃ na hoti^eb^ nirodhasamāpajjananti adhippāyo. pañca kāmaguṇā vatthubhūtā etassa santīti ^b^pañcakāmaguṇiko,^eb^ kāmarāgo. ^b^appahīnattā^eb^ asamucchinnattā. na hi kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanappahānamattaṃ nirodhassa adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhavituṃ sakkoti. ^b^tasmā^eb^ti samādhipāripanthikassa kāmarāgassa supahīnattā. etena kāmaṃ maggaphalañāṇacariyā lokiyañāṇasamādhicariyā viya nirodhasamāpajjane sarūpena na viniyujjanti tadā appavattanato, tassa tassa pana paṭipakkhassa samucchindanena balacariyānaṃ visesapaccayatāya nirodhasamāpattiyā adhiṭṭhānaṃ hotīti dasseti. ^b^esā^eb^ti anāgāmī. idañhi ``nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassā''tiādivacanaṃ anāgāminova nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusala''nti (paṭṭhā0 1.1.417) vacanato, aññathā ``nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakiriyā''ti (paṭṭhā0 1.1.417) vucceyya.

[03] 871^b^.^eb^ ^b^``pañcavokārabhave''^eb^ti ^a^V2.0494^ea^ kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu catuvokārabhavepi arūpajjhānavasena yathārahaṃ anupubbasamāpatti labbhatīti? kāmaṃ labbhati, sā pana ``anupubbasamāpattī''ti na vuccati ekadesabhāvato. aṭṭhasamāpattivaseneva ca ``anupubbasamāpattī''ti vuccatīti dassento āha ^b^``paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ uppatti natthī''^eb^ti. ^b^vatthussa abhāvā^eb^ti hadayavatthuno abhāvāti vadanti, karajakāyasaṅkhātassa pana vatthuno abhāvāti attho. yadi hi āruppe nirodhaṃ samāpajjeyya, cittacetasikānaṃ, aññassa ca kassaci abhāvato apaññattikova bhaveyya anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutasadiso. kiñcāyaṃ upādāya nirodhaṃ samāpannoti vucceyya, kiṃ vā etāya vatthucintāya. aṅgavekallatova natthi āruppe nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ.

[03] 872^b^.^eb^ ^b^saṅkhārānaṃ^eb^ ^a^M2.0526^ea^ ^b^pavattibhede^eb^ti saṅkhatadhammānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe uppajjane, bhijjane ca, tesaṃ vā kusalādibhedabhinne yathārahaṃ tīhi dukkhatāhi upaddute pavattivibhāge. cittacetasikavigamehi rūpadhammesu labbhamānāpi saṅkhāradukkhatā abbohārikataṃ āpajjati. ^b^ukkaṇṭhitvā^eb^ti nibbinditvā. ^b^nibbānaṃ patvā^eb^ti anupādisesanibbānaṃ patvā viya. ^b^sukha^eb^nti niddukkhaṃ.

[03] 873^b^.^eb^ ^b^samathavipassanāvasenā^eb^ti yuganaddhānaṃ viya aññamaññūpakāritāya sahitānaṃ vasena. ^b^ussakkitvā^eb^ti ukkaṃsaṃ patvā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanā, yāva ca anulomañāṇā āruhitvā. ^b^nirodhayato^eb^ti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā taṃ nirodhentassa. aññassa kassacipi cittassa anuppajjanena ^b^evamassā^eb^ nirodhasamāpattiyā ^b^samāpajjanaṃ hoti. ``yo hī''^eb^tiādinā ``samathavipassanāvasenā''ti vuttamevatthaṃ byatirekamukhena vivarati. ^b^nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ patvā tiṭṭhati^eb^ taduddhaṃ suddhasamathavipassanāya abhāvato. ^b^yo vipassanāvaseneva ussakkati^eb^ sace ariyo phalasamāpattatthiko, so attano ^b^phalasamāpattiṃ patvā tiṭṭhati^eb^. atha puthujjano, sekho vā maggatthiko tāya ce vipassanāya maggaṃ patvā phale ṭhito, sopi phalasamāpattiṃ patvā tiṭṭhaticceva vuccati. ^b^so^eb^ti ubhayavasena paṭipanno. ^b^ta^eb^nti nirodhasamāpattiṃ.

[03] 874^b^.^eb^ yena phaladvayasamannāgamādinā nirodhaṃ samāpajjituṃ samattho hoti, so vidhi pageva vibhāvitoti samāpajjanākārameva dassento ^b^``katabhattakicco''^eb^tiādimāha. tañhi sabbāsampi ^a^V2.0495^ea^ bhāvanānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ pubbakiccaṃ. ^b^tattha saṅkhāre^eb^ti tasmiṃ paṭhamajjhāne, paṭhamajjhānacittuppāde vā saṅkhāre.

[03] ``vipassatī''ti vuttaṃ, kīdisī panettha vipassanā icchitabbāti taṃ niddhāraṇatthaṃ ^b^``vipassanā panesā''^eb^tiādinā tameva vipassanaṃ tidhā bhinditvā dasseti. ^b^mandā^eb^ ce vipassanā, dandhābhiññaṃ maggaṃ sādheti. ^b^tikkhā^eb^ ce, khippābhiññanti ayaṃ mandatikkhatāya viseso. lakkhaṇappattā pana vipassanā maggassa paccayo hotiyevāti imamatthaṃ dassento āha ^b^``saṅkhāra...pe0... hotiyevā''^eb^ti. ^b^tikkhāva vaṭṭati^eb^ saṅkhārārammaṇepi sati sabbasaṅkhārehi vivaṭṭanākāreneva pavattanato, maggo viya visaṅkhāragatassa phalassa ^a^M2.0527^ea^ paccayabhāvato ca. tenāha ^b^``maggabhāvanāsadisā''^eb^ti. yasmā atimandā samathādikā saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhane asamatthā samathaniṭṭhā hoti, atitikkhā ñāṇādikā sātisayaṃ saṅkhāresu dosadassane phalasamāpattiniṭṭhā hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^``nātimandanātitikkhā vaṭṭatī''^eb^ti. ^b^esa^eb^ nirodhasamāpajjanako. ^b^te saṅkhāre^eb^ti te paṭhamajjhānasaṅkhāre.

[03] ^b^``tathevā''^eb^ti iminā ``nātimandāya nātitikkhāyā''ti imamatthaṃ ākaḍḍhati. esa nayo sesesupi. ``ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre tatheva vipassatī''ti vattabbaṃ, heṭṭhā vuttanayattā pana taṃ avatvā ^b^``catubbidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ karoti''^eb^cceva vuttanti keci, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ. vipassanācārato hi samādhicāro, tasmā samāpattito vuṭṭhāya pubbakiccaṃ kātabbaṃ. tathā hi paratopi ``ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya imaṃ pubbakiccaṃ katvā''tiādiṃ (visuddhi0 2.879) vakkhati, na pana ``tattha saṅkhāre tatheva vipassitvā''ti. ^b^nānābaddhāvikopana^eb^nti attanā asambaddhassa parikkhārassa avināsanaṃ. yathā taṃ na vinassati, tathā adhiṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^saṅghapaṭimānana^eb^nti saṅghassa paṭimānanāvajjanaṃ. ^b^satthupakkosana^eb^nti satthu pakkosanāvajjanaṃ. ^b^addhānapariccheda^eb^nti jīvitaddhānaparicchedaṃ pubbakiccaṃ karotīti sambandho.
[03] 875^b^.^eb^ ^b^adhiṭṭhātabba^eb^nti cittaṃ uppādetabbaṃ. tathā cittuppādanameva hettha adhiṭṭhānaṃ.

[03] cittajarūpādīnaṃ anuppajjanato, pacchājātapaccayādiupatthambhābhāvato ca sattāhameva tathā sarīraṃ ^a^V2.0496^ea^ pavattati, tato paraṃ kilamatīti sattāhameva paricchinditvā nirodhaṃ samāpajjantīti vadanti.

[03] ^b^samāpattivasenevā^eb^ti nirodhasamāpattivaseneva. ^b^naṃ^eb^ aggiādiantarāyaṃ ^b^rakkhati^eb^ samāpannako adhiṭṭhānavasenāti adhippāyo. ^b^āyasmato sañjīvassā^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā ^b^iddhikathāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi0 2.374) vuttameva.

[03] 876^b^.^eb^ ^b^etassā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0528^ea^ nirodhaṃ samāpajjantassa, nirodhasamāpajjanassa vā. ^b^tasmiṃ samaye^eb^ti tasmiṃ tassa bhikkhuno upasaṅkamanasamaye vuṭṭhātiyeva. kālaparicchedasadisañhetaṃ.

[03] ^b^evaṃ garukā^eb^ti aggiādīhipi anabhibhavanīyaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpannaṃ samāpattito vuṭṭhāpanato evaṃ garukā hi ^b^saṅghassa āṇā nāma,^eb^ tasmā attano hitasukhaṃ ākaṅkhantena jīvitahetupi saṅghassa āṇā na atikkamitabbāti adhippāyo.
[03] 877^b^.^eb^ ^b^na pakkosati^eb^ ``satthā taṃ, āvuso, āmantetī''ti. ``vuṭṭhahissāmī''ti āvajjitabbanti sambandho.

[03] 878^b^.^eb^ ^b^jīvitaddhānassā^eb^ti attano jīvitakālassa jīvitappavattiyā. āyu eva ^b^āyusaṅkhārā^eb^. ``āyūsmāviññāṇānī''ti ca vadanti, te cassa pakaticittasseva ārammaṇaṃ honti. ^b^antonirodhe^eb^ maraṇaṃ natthi carimabhavaṅgena mīyanato. ^b^āvajjitvāva samāpajjitabbaṃ^eb^ ``sahasā maraṇaṃ mā ahosī''ti. sahasā hi maraṇe aññabyākaraṇabhikkhuovādadānasāsanānubhāvadīpanānaṃ anissaro siyā, anāgāmino vā aggamaggānadhigamo siyā. ^b^avasesa^eb^nti nānābaddhāvikopanāditividhampi pubbakiccaṃ. ^b^vuttaṃ^eb^ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ.

[03] 879^b^.^eb^ kiñcāpi ``ekaṃ vā dve vā''ti aniyametvā viya vuttaṃ, dve vāre eva pana niyamato vadanti. ^b^cittavāre^eb^ti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanacittavāre. ^b^nirodhaṃ phusatī^eb^ti acittakabhāvamevāha. ^b^nirodhassa payogattā^eb^ti cittanirodhāya payogabhāvato, baladvayasambharaṇādipayogassa cittanirodhattāti attho. samathavipassanābalasamannāgamo, ñāṇasamādhicariyāvasībhāvo cettha ^a^V2.0497^ea^ aññamaññānativattanavaseneva icchitabboti āha ^b^``dve samathavipassanādhamme yuganaddhe katvā''^eb^ti. ^b^anupubbanirodhassa payogo^eb^ti paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ, tadanupassanānañca anupubbato nirodhanassāyaṃ payogo. ^b^idaṃ^eb^ vuttanayena ^b^aṭṭhasamāpattiārohanaṃ na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā^eb^ samāpajjanassa. tasmā dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ upari cittāni na pavattantīti yojanā.

[01] ^b^parato^eb^ ^a^M2.0529^ea^ ^b^acittako bhavituṃ na sakkotī^eb^ti sakalaṃ yathāparicchinnakālaṃ acittako bhavituṃ na sakkoti. tañca kho saṅghapaṭimānanasatthupakkosanāddhānaparicchedāvajjanānaṃ akaraṇena, na nānābaddhāvikopanassa. tassa hi akaraṇena kadāci kevalaṃ tādisassa parikkhārassa avināso na siyā, na nirodhasamāpattivibandho. ayañca attho ^b^mahānāgattheravatthunā^eb^ vibhāvito eva. evaṃ sante tīhi ākārehi nirodhasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti āpajjati, tasmā taṃ na sārato paccetabbaṃ. ^b^paṭinivattitvā puna ākiñcaññāyataneyeva patiṭṭhātī^eb^ti iminā samāpattiyā vibandhe jāte evaṃ hotīti dasseti, avibandheneva pana yathāparicchinnakālavītikkamane phalacittuppattiyā vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti. evañca katvā gambhīrakandaroruḷhatattapāsāṇakkantapurisanidassanampi samatthitaṃ hotīti keci vadanti. apare pana ``pubbakiccassa akatattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpannamattova `paṭinivattitvā ākiñcaññāyatane patiṭṭhātī'ti vuttattā saṅghapaṭimānanādiekaccapubbakiccākaraṇe aṅgavekallato nirodhasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ na ijjhatevā''ti vadanti. vattasadisañhetaṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā, yadidaṃ pubbakiccakaraṇaṃ. tasmā tattha yaṃ garutaraṃ, tassa akaraṇaṃ samāpajjanaṃ vibandhatīti apare. vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. ``ākiñcaññāyatane patiṭṭhātī''ti ca idaṃ puna ākiñcaññāyatanassa samāpajjitabbattā vuttaṃ. samāpajjitvā hi vuṭṭhāya pubbakiccassa kātabbattā.
[03] ^b^yathā panā^eb^tiādi katapubbakiccatāsāmaññena upamāsaṃsandanaṃ.
[03] 880^b^.^eb^ ^b^assā^eb^ti nirodhasamāpattiyā. ^b^``kālaparicchedavasenā''^eb^tiādinā catūhi ākārehi nirodhasamāpattiyā ṭhānaṃ dasseti.
[03] 882^b^.^eb^ ^b^vivekaninna^eb^nti ^a^V2.0498^ea^ nissaraṇavivekaninnaṃ, pageva saṅkhāravimukhatāya, phalacittuppattiyā cāti veditabbaṃ.

[03] 883^b^.^eb^ ūsaṅkhārattayapaṭippassaddhiyā, avasesacetasikaviññāṇābhāvena rūpadhammamattāvasesatāya ca matanirodhasamāpannānaṃ avisesaṃ gahetvā pucchā ^b^``matassa ca samāpannassa ca ko viseso''^eb^ti. kāmaṃ nesaṃ saṅkhārattayapaṭippassaddhiādīhi ^a^M2.0530^ea^ aviseso, rūpadhammamattāvasesatāya pana āyūsmāindriyānaṃ apagamānapagamanaṃ visesoti dassetuṃ ^b^``yvāya''^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03] 884^b^.^eb^ ^b^sabhāvato^eb^ti sabhāvadhammato, paramatthatoti attho. paramatthato hi vijjamānānaṃ saṅkhatādibhāvena vattabbataṃ labhati, na avijjamānaṃ. ^b^samāpajjantassa vasenā^eb^ti yasmā samāpajjantassa ariyapuggalassa samathavipassanādhamme yuganaddhe katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo ārohantassa anukkamena saṅkhārānaṃ paṭippassambhanapayoganibbattiyā nirodhasamāpatti nipphannā nāma hoti, tasmā taṃ payoganibbattiṃ upādāya ^b^``nipphannā''ti vattuṃ vaṭṭati^eb^.

[03] saṅkhāravūpasamato, santadhammasamanvayato ca ^b^santaṃ^eb^. ariyehi eva nisevitabbattā ^b^ariyanisevitaṃ^eb^. tissannampi dukkhatānaṃ nibbutabhāvato ^b^nibbānamiti saṅkhaṃ upāgataṃ. ariyaṃ pañña^eb^nti suvisuddhaṃ maggaphalapaññaṃ. ^b^imissāpī^eb^ti nirodhasamāpattiyā. ^b^samāpattisamatthatā^eb^ti samāpajjanasamatthatā.

[03] 885^b^.^eb^ ^b^āhuneyyabhāvādisiddhī^eb^ti āhuneyyapāhuneyyadakkhiṇeyyāñjalikaraṇīyānuttarapuññakkhettabhāvasiddhi. ^b^avisesenā^eb^ti dassanamaggapaññādivisesena vinā, ^b^etissā^eb^ lokuttarapaññāya. ānetvā hunitabbanti āhunaṃ, dūratopi ānetvā dātabbadānaṃ, taṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yuttoti ^b^āhuneyyo^eb^. pāhunaṃ vuccati āgantukadānaṃ, taṃ paṭiggahetuṃ yuttoti ^b^pāhuneyyo^eb^. dakkhiṇaṃ arahatīti ^b^dakkhiṇeyyo,^eb^ añjalikaraṇaṃ añjalikammaṃ, taṃ arahatīti ^b^añjalikaraṇīyo^eb^. anuttaraṃ uttamaṃ sattānaṃ puññaviruhanaṭṭhānanti ^b^anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassā^eb^ti ayamettha saṅkhepo. vitthāro pana heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.

[03] 886^b^.^eb^ ^b^mandāya^eb^ ^a^V2.0499^ea^ ^b^vipassanāya āgato^eb^ti atikkhāya vipassanāya vasena paṭhamamaggapaññaṃ bhāvetvā sotāpannabhāvaṃ āgato. saddhādīnaṃ mudūnaṃ indriyānaṃ vasena ^b^mudindriyopi^eb^ samāno. ^b^sattakkhattuparamo^eb^ti sattakkhattuṃ paramā bhavūpapatti attabhāvaggahaṇaṃ, tato paraṃ aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nādiyatīti ^a^M2.0531^ea^ sattakkhattuparamo. ^b^saṃsaritvā^eb^ti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena aparāparaṃ gantvā. ^b^dukkhassantaṃ karotī^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhassa pariyantaṃ pariyosānaṃ karoti. ayaṃ kālena devalokassa, kālena manussalokassāti missakassa bhavassa vasena ^b^``sattasugatibhave saṃsaritvā''^eb^ti vutto. kulato kulaṃ gacchatīti ^b^kolaṃkolo^eb^. sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyato paṭṭhāya hi nīcakule upapatti nāma natthi, mahābhogakulesuyeva nibbattatīti attho. ^b^dve vā tīṇi vā kulānī^eb^ti devamanussavasena dve vā tayo vā bhave. iti ayampi missakabhaveneva kathito. desanāmattameva cetaṃ ``dve vā tīṇi vā''ti. yāva chaṭṭhabhavā saṃsarantopi kolaṃkolova hoti. attabhāvaggahaṇasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃyeva khandhabījaṃ etassa atthīti ^b^ekabījī. ``mānusakaṃ bhava''^eb^nti idampi desanāmattaṃ. ``devabhavaṃ nibbattetī''tipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. ko panetesaṃ imaṃ pabhedaṃ niyametīti? tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā. sace hi upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā balavatī hoti, ekabījī nāma hoti. tato mandāya kolaṃkolo, tato mandatarāya sattakkhattuparamo.

[03] 887^b^.^eb^ paṭisandhivasena sakiṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī. ^b^sakidevā^eb^ti ekavāraṃyeva. ^b^``imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā''^eb^ti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito. ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva parinibbāti, ekacco idha patvā devaloke parinibbāti, ekacco devaloke patvā tattheva parinibbāti, ekacco devaloke patvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāti. ime cattāropi idha na gahitā. yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāti, ayaṃ idha gahito.

[03] 888^b^.^eb^ paṭisandhivasena idha anāgamanato ^b^anāgāmī. indriyavemattatāvasenā^eb^ti saddhādīnaṃ vimuttiparipācakaindriyānaṃ paropariyattena. ^b^pañcadhā idha vihāya niṭṭho hotī^eb^ti so anāgāmī antarāparinibbāyiādibhāvena pañcapakārena imaṃ lokaṃ pajahitvā parinibbāyanako hoti. āyuvemajjhassa antarāyeva kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyanato ^b^antarāparinibbāyī^eb^ ^a^M2.0532^ea^. ^b^upahaccā^eb^ti vā upagantvā kālakiriyaṃ. ^b^appayogenā^eb^ti adhimattapayogena vinā appakasireneva tikkhindriyatāya ^a^V2.0500^ea^ sukheneva. ^b^sappayogenā^eb^ti ettha vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo. uddhaṃ vā hi bhāvena uddhamassa taṇhāsotaṃ, vaṭṭasotaṃ vāti ^b^uddhaṃsoto^eb^. uddhaṃ vā gantvā paṭilabhitabbato uddhamassa maggasotanti ^b^uddhaṃsoto^eb^. paṭisandhivasena akaniṭṭhabhavaṃ gacchatīti ^b^akaniṭṭhagāmī^eb^.

[03] ^b^yatthupapanno^eb^ti avihādīsu yattha yattha upapanno. imesaṃ pana anāgāmīnaṃ pabhedajānanatthaṃ uddhaṃsotākaniṭṭhagāmicatukkaṃ veditabbaṃ -- yo hi avihato paṭṭhāya cattāro devaloke sodhetvā akaniṭṭhaṃ gantvā parinibbāti, ayaṃ ^b^uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī^eb^ nāma. yo pana heṭṭhā tayo devaloke sodhetvā sudassīdevaloke ṭhatvā parinibbāti, ayaṃ ^b^uddhaṃsoto nākaniṭṭhagāmī^eb^ nāma. yo ito akaniṭṭhameva gantvā parinibbāti, ayaṃ ^b^nauddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmī^eb^ nāma. yo pana heṭṭhā catūsu devalokesu tattha tattheva parinibbāti, ayaṃ ^b^nauddhaṃsoto nākaniṭṭhagāmī^eb^ nāma. ete pana avihesu upapannasamanantarā āyuvemajjhaṃ appatvā, patvā ca parinibbāyanavasena tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahaccaparinibbāyī, eko uddhaṃsototi pañca. te asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyivibhāgena dasa honti. tathā atappasudassasudassīsūti cattāro dasakā cattālīsaṃ. akaniṭṭhe pana uddhaṃsoto natthi. tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahaccaparinibbāyīti cattāro. te asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyivibhāgena aṭṭhāti aṭṭhacattālīsaṃ anāgāmino.
[03] sotāpannā pana paṭipadābhedena cattāro sattakkhattuparamā, cattāro kolaṃkolā, cattāro ekabījinoti saddhādhurena paṭipannā dvādasa, tathā paññādhurenāti catuvīsati.
[03] sakadāgāmino suññatavimokkhena vimuttā paṭipadāvasena cattāro, tathā animittāppaṇihitavimokkhehīti dvādasa.

[03] 889^b^.^eb^ tathā arahanto. te pana dvādasa paññāvimuttā, dvādasa ubhatobhāgavimuttā, dvādasa tevijjā, dvādasa chaḷabhiññā, dvādasa paṭisambhidāppattāti ^a^M2.0533^ea^ samasaṭṭhi honti. evamete saddhiṃ paccekasambuddhasammāsambuddhehi chacattālīsādhikasataṃ ariyā. yasmā tesaṃ ariyabhāvasiddhi ariyāya paññābhāvanāya, tena vuttaṃ ``āhuneyyabhāvādisiddhipi imissā lokuttarapaññābhāvanāya ānisaṃso''ti. lokiyavijjābhiññāhi vināpi ubhatobhāgavimuttatā hotīti ^a^V2.0501^ea^ ubhatobhāgavimutto visuṃ gahito. ^b^yaṃ sandhāya vutta^eb^nti yaṃ catutthamaggapaññābhāvanaṃ sandhāya heṭṭhā saṅkhepato gāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ pana vuttākāraṃ nigamanavasena dassetuṃ ^b^``maggakkhaṇe''^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. kāmaṃ catūsupi maggakkhaṇesu taṃ jaṭaṃ vijaṭeti nāma, phalakkhaṇesupi yathārahaṃ vijaṭitajaṭo, aggaphalakkhaṇeyeva pana sabbaso vijaṭitajaṭo, tato paraṃ vijaṭetabbāya jaṭāya abhāvato. tenettha heṭṭhā heṭṭhimamaggapaññābhāvanānisaṃsassa vuttattāva catutthamaggapaññābhāvanāvasena attho vutto.
[03] ^b^rati^eb^nti abhiratiṃ, abhirucinti attho. ^b^tatthā^eb^ti ariyāya paññābhāvanāya.
[03] 890^b^.^eb^ ^b^imissā gāthāyā^eb^ti imissaṃ gāthāyaṃ. gāthā hi attano atthabhūtassa visuddhimaggassa ādhārabhāvena vuttā, sāmivacanaṃ vā etaṃ atthassa taṃsambandhibhāvato.
[06] paññābhāvanānisaṃsaniddesavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06] iti tevīsatimaparicchedavaṇṇanā.

[03] 891^b^.^eb^ ^b^imissā^eb^ ^a^M2.0534^ea^ ^b^dāni gāthāyā^eb^tiādīnaṃ gāthānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vutto eva. svāyaṃ ``visuddhimaggaṃ bhāsissa''nti evaṃ paṭiññāto visuddhimaggo ettāvatā bhāsito hotīti sambandho.

[03] 892^b^.^eb^ ^b^tatthā^eb^tiādīsu ayaṃ padasambandhena saddhiṃ saṅkhepattho -- ^b^tesaṃ^eb^ ``sīle patiṭṭhāyā''tigāthāyaṃ vuttānaṃ sīlādippabhedānaṃ ^b^atthānaṃ pañcannampi^eb^ mahā^b^nikāyānaṃ aṭṭhakathānaye^eb^ aṭṭhakathātantiyaṃ tattha tattha ^b^vutto yo vinicchayo, yebhuyyena taṃ sabbaṃ samāharitvā^eb^ samānetvā nikāyantarassa nikāyagatavādadosasaṅkarehi ^b^mutto^eb^ so ^b^nicchayo yasmā pakāsito, tasmā visuddhikāmehi yogīhi etasmiṃ visuddhimagge ādaro karaṇīyo^eb^yevāti.
[03] ettāvatā ^a^M2.0535^ea^ ^a^V2.0502^ea^ ca --
[21] suvisuddhasamācāro, visuddhanayamaṇḍitaṃ.
[22] ^b^visuddhimaggaṃ^eb^ lokassa, yadaccantavisuddhiyā..
[21] abhāsi karuṇāvega-samussāhitamānaso.
[22] mahesi vipulodāta-visuddhimatipāṭavo..
[21] tassa atthaṃ pakāsetuṃ, kathāmaggaṃ purātanaṃ.
[22] nissāya yā samāraddhā, ^b^atthasaṃvaṇṇanā^eb^ mayā..
[21] āyācito siddhagāma-pariveṇanivāsinā.
[22] therena ^b^dāṭhanāgena,^eb^ suddhācārena dhīmatā..
[21] sā esā paramatthānaṃ, tattha tattha yathārahaṃ.
[22] nidhānato ^b^paramattha-mañjūsā^eb^ nāma nāmato..
[21] sampattā pariniṭṭhānaṃ, anākulavinicchayā.
[22] aṭṭhāsītippamāṇāya, pāḷiyā bhāṇavārato..
[21] iti taṃ saṅkharontena, yaṃ taṃ adhigataṃ mayā.
[22] puññaṃ tassānubhāvena, lokanāthassa sāsane..
[21] ogāhetvā visuddhāya, sīlādipaṭipattiyā.
[22] sabbepi dehino hontu, vimuttirasabhāgino..
[21] ciraṃ ^a^V2.0503^ea^ tiṭṭhatu lokasmiṃ, sammāsambuddhasāsanaṃ.
[22] tasmiṃ sagāravā niccaṃ, hontu sabbepi pāṇino..
[21] sammā vassatu kālena, devo rājā mahīpati.

[06] badaratitthavihāravāsinā ācariyadhammapālena katā
[06] paramatthamañjūsā nāma visuddhimaggamahāṭīkā samattā.
[06] visuddhimagga-mahāṭīkā samattā.

[03] 365^b^.^eb^ idāni ^a^M2.0001^ea^ ^a^V2.0001^ea^ yāsaṃ lokikābhiññānaṃ vasena ayaṃ samādhibhāvanā abhiññānisaṃsāti vuttā, tā abhiññā sampādetuṃ yasmā pathavīkasiṇādīsu adhigatacatutthajjhānena yoginā yogo kātabbo. evañhissa sā samādhibhāvanā adhigatānisaṃsā ceva bhavissati thiratarā ca, so adhigatānisaṃsāya thiratarāya samādhibhāvanāya samannāgato sukheneva paññābhāvanaṃ sampādessati. tasmā abhiññākathaṃ tāva ārabhissāma.

[01] bhagavatā hi adhigatacatutthajjhānasamādhīnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ samādhibhāvanānisaṃsadassanatthañceva uttaruttari paṇītapaṇītadhammadesanatthañca ^a^V2.0002^ea^ ``so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte iddhividhāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti. so anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotī''tiādinā (dī0 ni0 1.238) nayena iddhividhaṃ, dibbasotadhātuñāṇaṃ, cetopariyañāṇaṃ, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ, sattānaṃ cutūpapāte ñāṇanti pañca lokikābhiññā vuttā.
[03] tattha ^a^M2.0002^ea^ ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotītiādikaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ kātukāmena ādikammikena yoginā odātakasiṇapariyantesu aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu aṭṭha aṭṭha samāpattiyo nibbattetvā --

[03] kasiṇānulomato, kasiṇapaṭilomato, kasiṇānulomapaṭilomato, jhānānulomato, jhānapaṭilomato, jhānānulomapaṭilomato, jhānukkantikato, kasiṇukkantikato, jhānakasiṇukkantikato, aṅgasaṅkantito, ārammaṇasaṅkantito, aṅgārammaṇasaṅkantito, aṅgavavatthāpanato, ārammaṇavavatthāpanatoti.
[03] imehi cuddasahi ākārehi cittaṃ paridametabbaṃ.

[03] 366^b^.^eb^ katamaṃ panettha kasiṇānulomaṃ...pe0... katamaṃ ārammaṇavavatthāpananti. idha bhikkhu pathavīkasiṇe jhānaṃ samāpajjati, tato āpokasiṇeti evaṃ paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu satakkhattumpi sahassakkhattumpi samāpajjati, idaṃ ^b^kasiṇānulomaṃ^eb^ nāma.
[03] odātakasiṇato pana paṭṭhāya tatheva paṭilomakkamena samāpajjanaṃ ^b^kasiṇapaṭilomaṃ^eb^ nāma.
[01] pathavīkasiṇato paṭṭhāya yāva odātakasiṇaṃ, odātakasiṇatopi paṭṭhāya yāva pathavīkasiṇanti evaṃ anulomapaṭilomavasena punappunaṃ samāpajjanaṃ ^b^kasiṇānulomapaṭilomaṃ^eb^ nāma.
[03] paṭhamajjhānato pana paṭṭhāya paṭipāṭiyā yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ, tāva punappunaṃ samāpajjanaṃ ^b^jhānānulomaṃ^eb^ nāma.
[03] nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato ^a^V2.0003^ea^ paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānaṃ, tāva punappunaṃ samāpajjanaṃ ^b^jhānapaṭilomaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03] paṭhamajjhānato paṭṭhāya yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānanti evaṃ anulomapaṭilomavasena punappunaṃ samāpajjanaṃ ^b^jhānānulomapaṭilomaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03] pathavīkasiṇe pana paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva tatiyaṃ samāpajjati, tato tadeva ugghāṭetvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, tato ākiñcaññāyatananti ^a^M2.0003^ea^ evaṃ kasiṇaṃ anukkamitvā jhānasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṃ ^b^jhānukkantikaṃ^eb^ nāma. evaṃ āpokasiṇādimūlikāpi yojanā kātabbā.

[03] pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā puna tadeva tejokasiṇe, tato nīlakasiṇe, tato lohitakasiṇeti iminā nayena jhānaṃ anukkamitvā kasiṇasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṃ ^b^kasiṇukkantikaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03] pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato tejokasiṇe tatiyaṃ, nīlakasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatananti iminā nayena jhānassa ceva kasiṇassa ca ukkamanaṃ ^b^jhānakasiṇukkantikaṃ^eb^ nāma.
[03] pathavīkasiṇe pana paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva itaresampi samāpajjanaṃ ^b^aṅgasaṅkantikaṃ^eb^ nāma.
[03] pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tadeva āpokasiṇe...pe0... tadeva odātakasiṇeti evaṃ sabbakasiṇesu ekasseva jhānassa samāpajjanaṃ ^b^ārammaṇasaṅkantikaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03] pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā āpokasiṇe dutiyaṃ, tejokasiṇe tatiyaṃ, vāyokasiṇe catutthaṃ, nīlakasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, pītakasiṇato viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ^a^V2.0004^ea^, lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ, odātakasiṇato nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti evaṃ ekantarikavasena aṅgānañca ārammaṇānañca saṅkamanaṃ ^b^aṅgārammaṇasaṅkantikaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03] paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pana pañcaṅgikanti vavatthapetvā dutiyaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ, tatiyaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ...pe0... nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti evaṃ jhānaṅgamattasseva vavatthāpanaṃ ^b^aṅgavavatthāpanaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03] tathā idaṃ pathavīkasiṇanti vavatthapetvā idaṃ āpokasiṇaṃ...pe0... idaṃ odātakasiṇanti evaṃ ārammaṇamattasseva vavatthāpanaṃ ^b^ārammaṇavavatthāpanaṃ^eb^ nāma ^a^M2.0004^ea^. aṅgārammaṇavavatthāpanampi eke icchanti. aṭṭhakathāsu pana anāgatattā addhā taṃ bhāvanāmukhaṃ na hoti.

[03] 367^b^.^eb^ imehi pana cuddasahi ākārehi cittaṃ aparidametvā pubbe abhāvitabhāvano ādikammiko yogāvacaro iddhivikubbanaṃ sampādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. ādikammikassa hi kasiṇaparikammampi bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. katakasiṇaparikammassa nimittuppādanaṃ bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. uppanne nimitte taṃ vaḍḍhetvā appanādhigamo bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. adhigatappanassa cuddasahākārehi cittaparidamanaṃ bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. cuddasahākārehi paridamitacittassāpi iddhivikubbanaṃ nāma bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova sakkoti. vikubbanappattassāpi khippanisantibhāvo nāma bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova khippanisantī hoti. therambatthale mahārohaṇaguttattherassa gilānupaṭṭhānaṃ āgatesu tiṃsamattesu iddhimantasahassesu upasampadāya aṭṭhavassiko rakkhitatthero viya. tassānubhāvo pathavīkasiṇaniddese (visuddhi0 1.78 ādayo) vuttoyeva. taṃ panassānubhāvaṃ disvā thero āha ``āvuso, sace rakkhito nābhavissa sabbe garahappattā assāma `nāgarājānaṃ rakkhituṃ nāsakkhiṃsū'ti. tasmā attanā gahetvā vicaritabbaṃ āvudhaṃ nāma malaṃ sodhetvāva gahetvā vicarituṃ vaṭṭatī''ti. te therassa ovāde ṭhatvā tiṃsasahassāpi bhikkhū khippanisantino ahesuṃ.

[03] khippanisantiyāpi ^a^V2.0005^ea^ ca sati parassa patiṭṭhābhāvo bhāro, satesu sahassesu vā ekova hoti, giribhaṇḍavāhanapūjāya mārena aṅgāravasse pavattite ākāse pathaviṃ māpetvā aṅgāravassaparittārako thero viya.

[03] balavapubbayogānaṃ pana buddhapaccekabuddhāggasāvakādīnaṃ vināpi iminā vuttappakārena bhāvanānukkamena arahattapaṭilābheneva idañca iddhivikubbanaṃ aññe ^a^M2.0005^ea^ ca paṭisambhidādibhedā guṇā ijjhanti. tasmā yathā piḷandhanavikatiṃ kattukāmo suvaṇṇakāro aggidhamanādīhi suvaṇṇaṃ muduṃ kammaññaṃ katvāva karoti, yathā ca bhājanavikatiṃ kattukāmo kumbhakāro mattikaṃ suparimadditaṃ muduṃ katvā karoti, evameva ādikammikena imehi cuddasahākārehi cittaṃ paridametvā chandasīsacittasīsavīriyasīsavīmaṃsāsīsasamāpajjanavasena ceva āvajjanādivasībhāvavasena ca muduṃ kammaññaṃ katvā iddhividhāya yogo karaṇīyo. pubbahetusampannena pana kasiṇesu catutthajjhānamatte ciṇṇavasināpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati. yathā panettha yogo kātabbo, taṃ vidhiṃ dassento bhagavā ``so evaṃ samāhite citte''tiādimāha.
